These doubts emerged and grew as a series of unhappy events unfolded in 2011: the Diederik Stapel fraud case (see Stroebe, Postmes, & Spears, 2012, this issue), the publication in a major social psychology journal of an article purporting to show evidence of extrasensory perception (Bem, 2011) followed by widespread public mockery (see Galak, LeBoeuf, Nelson, & Simmons, in press; Wagenmakers, Wetzels, Borsboom, & van der Maas, 2011), reports by Wicherts and colleagues that psychologists are often unwilling or unable to share their published data for reanalysis (Wicherts, Bakker, & Molenaar, 2011; see also Wicherts, Borsboom, Kats, & Molenaar, 2006), and the publication of an important article in Psychological Science showing how easily researchers can, in the absence of any real effects, nonetheless obtain statistically significant differences through various questionable research practices (QRPs) such as exploring multiple dependent variables or covariates and only reporting these when they yield significant results (Simmons, Nelson, & Simonsohn, 2011). For those psychologists who expected that the embarrassments of 2011 would soon recede into memory, 2012 offered instead a quick plunge from bad to worse, with new indications of outright fraud in the field of social cognition (Simonsohn, 2012), an article in Psychological Science showing that many psychologists admit to engaging in at least some of the QRPs examined by Simmons and colleagues (John, Loewenstein, & Prelec, 2012), troubling new meta-analytic evidence suggesting that the QRPs described by Simmons and colleagues may even be leaving telltale signs visible in the distribution of p values in the psychological literature (Masicampo & Lalande, in press; Simonsohn, 2012), and an acrimonious dust-up in science magazines and blogs centered around the problems some investigators were having in replicating well-known results from the field of social cognition (Bower, 2012; Yong, 2012). Although the very public problems experienced by psychology over this 2-year period are embarrassing to those of us working in the field, some have found comfort in the fact that, over the same period, similar concerns have been arising across the scientific landscape (triggered by revelations that will be described shortly). Some of the suspected causes of unreplicability, such as publication bias (the tendency to publish only positive findings) have been discussed for years; in fact, the phrase file-drawer problem was first coined by a distinguished psychologist several decades ago (Rosenthal, 1979). However, many have speculated that these problems have been exacerbated in recent years as academia reaps the harvest of a hypercompetitive academic climate and an incentive scheme that provides rich rewards for overselling one’s work and few rewards at all for caution and circumspection (see Giner-Sorolla, 2012, this issue). Equally disturbing, investigators seem to be replicating each others’ work even less often than they did in the past, again presumably reflecting an incentive scheme gone askew (a point discussed in several articles in this issue, e.g., Makel, Plucker, & Hegarty, 2012). The frequency with which errors appear in the psychological literature is not presently known, but a number of facts suggest it might be disturbingly high. Ioannidis (2005) has shown through simple mathematical modeling that any scientific field that ignores replication can easily come to the miserable state wherein (as the title of his most famous article puts it) “most published research findings are false” (see also Ioannidis, 2012, this issue, and Pashler & Harris, 2012, this issue). Meanwhile, reports emerging from cancer research have made such grim scenarios seem more plausible: In 2012, several large pharmaceutical companies revealed that their efforts to replicate exciting preclinical findings from published academic studies in cancer biology were only rarely verifying the original results (Begley & Ellis, 2012; see also Osherovich, 2011; Prinz, Schlange, & Asadullah, 2011).
papers.abstract_zh: 目前心理科学是否出现了信任危机，反映出从业者对该领域研究结果的可靠性产生了前所未有的怀疑？显然是有的。随着2011年一系列不愉快事件的发生，这些怀疑出现了，并有所增长:Diederik Stapel欺诈案(见Stroebe，Postmes，& Spears，2012，这一期)，在一份主要的社会心理学杂志上发表了一篇文章，声称显示了超感知觉的证据(Bem，2011)，随后受到了广泛的公开嘲笑(见Galak，LeBoeuf，Nelson，& Simmons，正在出版中；Wagenmakers，Wetzels，Borsboom，& van der Maas，2011)，Wicherts及其同事报告说，心理学家往往不愿意或不能分享他们发表的数据进行再分析(Wicherts，Bakker，& Molenaar，2011；另见Wicherts，Borsboom，Kats，& Molenaar，2006)，以及发表在《心理科学》上的一篇重要文章，该文章表明，在没有任何实际影响的情况下，研究人员可以通过各种有问题的研究实践(qrp)轻松地获得统计学上的显著差异，如探索多个因变量或协变量，并仅在它们产生显著结果时报告这些结果(Simmons，Nelson，& Simonsohn，2011)。对于那些预计2011年的尴尬将很快消失在记忆中的心理学家来说，2012年反而提供了一个从糟糕到更糟糕的快速跳水，在社会认知领域出现了新的明显的欺诈迹象(Simonsohn，2012)，心理科学中的一篇文章显示，许多心理学家承认至少参与了Simmons及其同事检查的一些快速反应程序(John，Loewenstein，& Prelec，2012)。 令人不安的新荟萃分析证据表明，Simmons及其同事描述的qrp甚至可能在心理学文献中的p值分布中留下明显的迹象(Masicampo & Lalande，出版中； Simonsohn，2012)，科学杂志和博客上围绕一些研究人员在复制社会认知领域的知名结果时遇到的问题展开了激烈的争论(Bower，2012；永，2012)。虽然心理学在这两年中所经历的非常公开的问题令我们这些在该领域工作的人感到尴尬，但一些人已经找到了安慰，因为在同一时期，类似的担忧已经在整个科学领域出现(由即将描述的启示引发)。一些不可复制的可疑原因，如发表偏倚(倾向于只发表积极的发现)已经讨论了多年；事实上，抽屉问题这个短语是由一位杰出的心理学家在几十年前首次提出的(Rosenthal，1979)。然而，许多人推测，这些问题在最近几年已经恶化，因为学术界收获了高度竞争的学术氛围和奖励计划，这种奖励计划为过度销售自己的工作提供了丰厚的奖励，而对谨慎和谨慎却几乎没有奖励(见吉纳-索罗拉，2012年，这一期)。同样令人不安的是，研究人员似乎比过去更少地重复彼此的工作，这可能再次反映了一个倾斜的激励机制(这一点在本期的几篇文章中讨论过，例如，马克尔、普吕克尔和赫加蒂，2012)。错误出现在心理学文献中的频率目前还不清楚，但许多事实表明它可能高得令人不安。约安尼迪斯(2005)通过简单的数学建模表明，任何忽视复制的科学领域都很容易陷入悲惨的境地，其中(正如他最著名的文章的标题所言)“大多数发表的研究结果都是错误的”(另见约安尼迪斯，2012，本期，以及Pashler & Harris，2012，本期)。与此同时，来自癌症研究的报告让这种严峻的情景看起来更加可信:2012年，几家大型制药公司透露，他们在癌症生物学方面复制已发表学术研究中令人兴奋的临床前发现的努力很少验证原始结果(Begley & Ellis，2012；另见Osherovich，2011年；普林茨、施朗格和阿萨杜拉，2011年)。
papers.title_zh: 编辑介绍

papers.title: An Efficient Data-Independent Priority Queue and its Application to Dark Pools
papers.authors: Sahar Mazloom, Benjamin E. Diamond, Antigoni Polychroniadou, Tucker Balch
papers.abstract: We introduce a secure data-independent priority queue which supports polylogarithmic-time insertion operations and constant-time deletions and read-front (aka peek) operations as opposed to the originally introduced queue by Toft (PODC '11). Moreover, we minimize the number of comparisons required to perform different operations on Toft's priority queue. Data-independent data structures—first identified explicitly by Toft, and further elaborated by Mitchell and Zimmerman (STACS '14)—serve the purpose of computing on encrypted data without executing branching code which can be used to avoid prohibitively expensive operations in secure computation applications. Focusing on the costly sorting operations, we show significant asymptotic improvements over prior privacy preserving dark pool applications. Dark pools are securities-trading venues which attain ad-hoc order privacy, by matching orders outside of publicly visible exchanges via the so-called dark pool operators. In this paper, we describe an efficient and secure dark pool (implementing a full continuous double auction) based on our new priority queue. Our construction's security guarantees are cryptographic based on secure multiparty computation (MPC), and do not require that the dark pool operators are trusted. Our construction improves upon the asymptotic efficiency attained by previous efforts. Existing cryptographic dark pools process new orders in time which grows linearly in the size of the standing order book; ours does so in polylogarithmic time. We describe a concrete implementation of our MPC protocol with malicious security in the honest majority setting. We also report benchmarks of our implementation and compare them to prior works. Our protocol reduces the total running time by several orders of magnitude over prior secure dark pool solutions.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们引入了一个安全的数据无关的优先级队列，它支持多对数时间的插入操作和常数时间的删除和读前(又名peek)操作，这与最初由托夫特(PODC 11)引入的队列相反。此外，我们最小化了在托夫特优先级队列上执行不同操作所需的比较次数。与数据无关的数据结构首先由托夫特明确提出，并由Mitchell和Zimmerman(STACS 14)进一步阐述，其目的是在不执行分支代码的情况下对加密数据进行计算，分支代码可用于避免安全计算应用中代价高昂的操作。集中在昂贵的排序操作，我们显示出显著的渐进改进超过以前的隐私保护暗池应用。暗池是证券交易场所，通过所谓的暗池操作者在公开可见的交易所之外撮合订单，实现临时订单保密。在本文中，我们描述了一个基于新的优先级队列的高效安全的暗池(实现了完全连续的双向拍卖)。我们的构造的安全保证是基于安全多方计算(MPC)的加密，并且不要求暗池操作者是可信的。我们的构造改进了先前努力所获得的渐近效率。现有的加密暗池及时处理新订单，其在长期订单簿的大小上线性增长；我们是在多对数时间内完成的。我们描述了我们的MPC协议在诚实多数环境下的恶意安全性的具体实现。我们还报告了我们实现的基准，并将它们与以前的工作进行比较。与以前的安全暗池解决方案相比，我们的协议将总运行时间减少了几个数量级。
papers.title_zh: 一种高效的数据无关优先级队列及其在暗池中的应用

papers.title: Find Thy Neighbourhood: Privacy-Preserving Local Clustering
papers.authors: Pranav Shriram A, Nishat Koti, Varsha Bhat Kukkala, Arpita Patra, Bhavish Raj Gopal
papers.abstract: Identifying a cluster around a seed node in a graph, termed local clustering, finds use in several applications, including fraud detection, targeted advertising, community detection, etc. However, performing local clustering is challenging when the graph is distributed among multiple data owners, which is further aggravated by the privacy concerns that arise in disclosing their view of the graph. This necessitates designing solutions for privacy-preserving local clustering and is addressed for the first time in the literature. We propose using the technique of secure multiparty computation (MPC) to achieve the same. Our local clustering algorithm is based on the heat kernel PageRank (HKPR) metric, which produces the best-known cluster quality. En route to our final solution, we have two important steps: (i) designing data-oblivious equivalent of the state-of-the-art algorithms for computing local clustering and HKPR values, and (ii) compiling the data-oblivious algorithms into its secure realisation via an MPC framework that supports operations over fixed-point arithmetic representation such as multiplication and division. Keeping efficiency in mind for large graphs, we choose the best-known honest-majority 3-party framework of SWIFT (Koti et al., USENIX'21) and enhance it with some of the necessary yet missing primitives, before using it for our purpose. We benchmark the performance of our secure protocols, and the reported run time showcases the practicality of the same. Further, we perform extensive experiments to evaluate the accuracy loss of our protocols. Compared to their cleartext counterparts, we observe that the results are comparable and thus showcase the practicality of the designed protocols.
papers.abstract_zh: 识别图中种子节点周围的聚类，称为局部聚类，在若干应用中找到用途，包括欺诈检测、定向广告、社区检测等。然而，当图表分布在多个数据所有者之间时，执行本地聚类是具有挑战性的，这由于在公开他们的图表视图时出现的隐私问题而进一步恶化。这使得设计保护隐私的本地集群的解决方案成为必要，并且在文献中首次被提出。我们建议使用安全多方计算(MPC)技术来实现同样的目的。我们的局部聚类算法基于热核PageRank (HKPR)度量，这产生了最佳的聚类质量。在通向我们的最终解决方案的途中，我们有两个重要的步骤:(I)设计用于计算局部聚类和HKPR值的最新算法的数据不经意等效物，以及(ii)通过MPC框架将数据不经意算法编译成其安全实现，该MPC框架支持定点算术表示上的操作，例如乘法和除法。考虑到大型图形的效率，我们选择了SWIFT最著名的诚实多数三方框架(Koti等人，USENIX 21)，并在使用它之前，用一些必要但缺失的原语对其进行了增强。我们对我们的安全协议的性能进行了基准测试，报告的运行时间展示了同样的实用性。此外，我们进行了大量的实验来评估我们的协议的准确性损失。与它们的明文对应相比，我们观察到结果是可比较的，因此展示了所设计的协议的实用性。
papers.title_zh: 找到你的邻居:保护隐私的局部聚类

papers.title: Result-pattern-hiding Conjunctive Searchable Symmetric Encryption with Forward and Backward Privacy
papers.authors: Dandan Yuan, Cong Zuo, Shujie Cui, Giovanni Russello
papers.abstract: Dynamic searchable symmetric encryption (DSSE) enables the data owner to outsource its database (document sets) to an untrusted server and make searches and updates securely and efficiently. Conjunctive DSSE can process conjunctive queries that return the documents containing multiple keywords. However, a conjunctive search could leak the keyword pair result pattern (KPRP), where attackers can learn which documents contain any two keywords involved in the query. File-injection attack shows that KPRP can be utilized to recover searched keywords. To protect data effectively, DSSE should also achieve forward privacy, i.e., hides the link between updates to previous searches, and backward privacy, i.e., prevents deleted entries being accessed by subsequent searches. Otherwise, the attacker could recover updated/searched keywords and records. However, no conjunctive DSSE scheme in the literature can hide KPRP in sub-linear search efficiency while guaranteeing forward and backward privacy. In this work, we propose the first sub-linear KPRP-hiding conjunctive DSSE scheme (named HDXT) with both forward and backward privacy guarantees. To achieve these three security properties, we introduce a new cryptographic primitive: Attribute-updatable Hidden Map Encryption (AUHME). AUHME enables HDXT to efficiently and securely perform conjunctive queries and update the database in an oblivious way. In comparison with previous work that has weaker security guarantees, HDXT shows comparable, and in some cases, even better performance.
papers.abstract_zh: 动态可搜索对称加密(DSSE)使数据所有者能够将其数据库(文档集)外包给不受信任的服务器，并安全高效地进行搜索和更新。合取DSSE可以处理返回包含多个关键字的文档的合取查询。但是，联合搜索可能会泄漏关键字对结果模式(KPRP)，攻击者可以通过该模式了解哪些文档包含查询中涉及的任意两个关键字。文件注入攻击表明，KPRP可以用来恢复搜索关键字。为了有效地保护数据，DSSE还应该实现前向隐私，即隐藏对先前搜索的更新之间的链接，以及后向隐私，即防止被删除的条目被后续搜索访问。否则，攻击者可以恢复更新/搜索的关键字和记录。然而，在文献中没有合取DSSE方案能够在保证前向和后向隐私的同时隐藏次线性搜索效率中的KPRP。在这篇论文中，我们提出了第一个具有前向和后向隐私保证的次线性KPRP隐藏联合DSSE方案(命名为HDXT)。为了实现这三个安全属性，我们引入了一个新的密码原语:属性可更新的隐藏映射加密(AUHME)。AUHME使HDXT能够高效、安全地执行联合查询，并以一种不经意的方式更新数据库。与以前安全性保证较弱的工作相比，HDXT表现出相当的性能，在某些情况下甚至更好。
papers.title_zh: 具有前向和后向隐私的隐藏结果模式的联合可搜索对称加密

papers.title: Private Graph Extraction via Feature Explanations
papers.authors: Iyiola E. Olatunji, Mandeep Rathee, Thorben Funke, Megha Khosla
papers.abstract: Privacy and interpretability are two important ingredients for achieving trustworthy machine learning. We study the interplay of these two aspects in graph machine learning through graph reconstruction attacks. The goal of the adversary here is to reconstruct the graph structure of the training data given access to model explanations. Based on the different kinds of auxiliary information available to the adversary, we propose several graph reconstruction attacks. We show that additional knowledge of post-hoc feature explanations substantially increases the success rate of these attacks. Further, we investigate in detail the differences between attack performance with respect to three different classes of explanation methods for graph neural networks: gradient-based, perturbation-based, and surrogate model-based methods. While gradient-based explanations reveal the most in terms of the graph structure, we find that these explanations do not always score high in utility. For the other two classes of explanations, privacy leakage increases with an increase in explanation utility. Finally, we propose a defense based on a randomized response mechanism for releasing the explanations, which substantially reduces the attack success rate. Our code is available at https://github.com/iyempissy/graph-stealing-attacks-with-explanation.
papers.abstract_zh: 隐私和可解释性是实现可信机器学习的两个重要因素。我们通过图重构攻击来研究这两个方面在图机器学习中的相互作用。对手的目标是在已知模型解释的情况下重建训练数据的图形结构。基于对手可获得的不同种类的辅助信息，我们提出了几种图重构攻击。我们表明，额外的事后特征解释知识大大增加了这些攻击的成功率。此外，我们还详细研究了图神经网络的三种不同解释方法在攻击性能上的差异:基于梯度的方法、基于扰动的方法和基于代理模型的方法。虽然基于梯度的解释揭示了图形结构的大部分内容，但我们发现这些解释在实用性方面并不总是得分很高。对于另外两类解释，隐私泄露随着解释效用的增加而增加。最后，我们提出了一种基于随机响应机制的防御方法来发布解释，这大大降低了攻击成功率。我们的代码可以在https://github . com/iyenpissy/graph-stealing-attacks-with-explaining上找到。
papers.title_zh: 经由特征解释的私有图提取

papers.title: iSTELAN: Disclosing Sensitive User Information by Mobile Magnetometer from Finger Touches
papers.authors: Reham Mohamed, Habiba Farrukh, Yidong Lu, He Wang, Z. Berkay Celik
papers.abstract: We show a new type of side-channel leakage in which the built-in magnetometer sensor in Apple's mobile devices captures touch events of users. When a conductive material such as the human body touches the mobile device screen, the electric current passes through the screen capacitors generating an electromagnetic field around the touch point. This electromagnetic field leads to a sharp fluctuation in the magnetometer signals when a touch occurs, both when the mobile device is stationary and held in hand naturally. These signals can be accessed by mobile applications running in the background without requiring any permissions. We develop iSTELAN, a three-stage attack, which exploits this side-channel to infer users' application and touch data. iSTELAN translates the magnetometer signals to a binary sequence to reveal users' touch events, exploits touch event patterns to fingerprint the type of application a user is using, and models touch events to identify users' touch event types performed on different applications. We demonstrate the iSTELAN attack on 22 users while using 7 popular app types and show that it achieves an average accuracy of 90% for disclosing touch events, 74% for classifying application type used, and 73% for detecting touch event types.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们展示了一种新型的侧信道泄漏，其中苹果移动设备中的内置磁力计传感器捕捉用户的触摸事件。当人体等导电材料接触移动设备屏幕时，电流通过屏幕电容器，在接触点周围产生电磁场。当触摸发生时，该电磁场导致磁力计信号的剧烈波动，无论是在移动设备静止还是自然手持时。这些信号可以被在后台运行的移动应用程序访问，而不需要任何许可。我们开发了iSTELAN，一个三阶段攻击，利用这个侧通道来推断用户的应用和触摸数据。iSTELAN将磁力计信号转换为二进制序列，以揭示用户的触摸事件，利用触摸事件模式来识别用户正在使用的应用程序类型，并对触摸事件进行建模，以识别用户在不同应用程序上执行的触摸事件类型。我们在22个用户上演示了iSTELAN攻击，同时使用7种流行的应用程序类型，并显示它在披露触摸事件方面达到了90%的平均准确率，在分类所使用的应用程序类型方面达到了74%，在检测触摸事件类型方面达到了73%。
papers.title_zh: iSTELAN:移动磁力计通过手指触摸泄露敏感用户信息

papers.title: SoK: Managing risks of linkage attacks on data privacy
papers.authors: Jovan Powar, Alastair R. Beresford
papers.abstract: Novel attacks on dataset privacy are usually met with the same range of responses: surprise that a route to information gain exists from information previously thought to be safe; disputes around the viability or validity of the attack in real-world contexts; and, in the case of the computer science community, a drive to produce techniques that provably protect against the new class of attack. The result is a disjointed landscape with no shared approach to modelling threats to dataset privacy, and a toolbox of technically complex systems whose guarantees come with narrow assumptions and whose application in real-world contexts is hard to achieve. In this paper we aim to understand these issues by charting the history of dataset privacy attacks and systematising breaches through the lens of data linkage. We show how identification or information gain on a dataset's subjects can be expressed as data linkage, and use this to present a taxonomy of threat models which we apply to ninety-four attacks from across the literature. Our work demonstrates that dataset privacy must be approached first as a risk management problem, rather than one of strict guarantees, an approach which aligns well with law and practice. Our taxonomy of attacker intents provides a coherent language for expressing the wide variety of threat models in dataset privacy, and a framework for understanding how risks identified under one model can be understood within another. We also present insights around the factors that affect the feasibility and severity of attacks, and proposals for practical techniques that can be used for risk appraisal and management by practitioners, researchers, and regulators alike.
papers.abstract_zh: 对数据集隐私的新攻击通常会遇到相同范围的反应:惊讶于从以前认为安全的信息中获取信息的途径存在；围绕攻击在现实环境中的可行性或有效性的争议；对于计算机科学界来说，这是一种开发技术的动力，这种技术可以证明可以抵御这种新型攻击。结果是一个脱节的局面，没有共同的方法来模拟对数据集隐私的威胁，以及一个技术复杂的系统工具箱，其保证来自狭隘的假设，其在现实世界中的应用很难实现。在本文中，我们旨在通过绘制数据集隐私攻击的历史并从数据关联的角度系统化违规行为来理解这些问题。我们展示了数据集主题上的标识或信息获取如何可以表示为数据链接，并使用它来呈现威胁模型的分类，我们将该分类应用于文献中的94个攻击。我们的工作表明，数据集隐私必须首先作为一个风险管理问题来处理，而不是一个严格的保证，这种方法符合法律和实践。我们对攻击者意图的分类提供了一种一致的语言来表达数据集隐私中各种各样的威胁模型，并提供了一个框架来理解在一个模型下识别的风险如何在另一个模型中被理解。我们还围绕影响攻击的可行性和严重性的因素提出了见解，并提出了可供从业者、研究人员和监管者等用于风险评估和管理的实用技术建议。
papers.title_zh: SoK:管理数据隐私的链接攻击风险

papers.title: Heads in the Clouds? Measuring Universities' Migration to Public Clouds: Implications for Privacy & Academic Freedom
papers.authors: Tobias Fiebig, Seda F. Gürses, Carlos Gañán, Erna Kotkamp, Fernando Kuipers, Martina Lindorfer, Menghua Prisse, Taritha Sari
papers.abstract: With the emergence of remote education and work in universities due to COVID-19, the 'zoomification' of higher education, i.e., the migration of universities to the clouds, reached the public discourse. Ongoing discussions reason about how this shift will take control over students' data away from universities, and may ultimately harm the privacy of researchers and students alike. However, there has been no comprehensive measurement of universities' use of public clouds and reliance on Software-as-a-Service offerings to assess how far this migration has already progressed. We perform a longitudinal study of the migration to public clouds among universities in the U.S. and Europe, as well as institutions listed in the Times Higher Education (THE) Top100 between January 2015 and October 2022. We find that cloud adoption differs between countries, with one cluster (Germany, France, Austria, Switzerland) showing a limited move to clouds, while the other (U.S., U.K., the Netherlands, THE Top100) frequently outsources universities' core functions and services---starting long before the COVID-19 pandemic. We attribute this clustering to several socio-economic factors in the respective countries, including the general culture of higher education and the administrative paradigm taken towards running universities. We then analyze and interpret our results, finding that the implications reach beyond individuals' privacy towards questions of academic independence and integrity.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着远程教育和工作在大学中的出现，由于新冠肺炎，高等教育的“动物化”，即大学向云的迁移，达到了公共话语。正在进行的讨论的原因是，这种转变将如何把学生数据的控制权从大学手中夺走，并可能最终损害研究人员和学生的隐私。然而，目前还没有全面衡量大学对公共云的使用以及对软件即服务产品的依赖程度，来评估这种迁移的进展情况。我们对2015年1月至2022年10月期间美国和欧洲的大学以及《泰晤士报高等教育》( THE)100强中列出的机构迁移到公共云的情况进行了纵向研究。我们发现不同国家采用云的情况有所不同，其中一个集群(德、法、奥、瑞)向云的迁移有限，而另一个集群(美国、英国、荷兰、前100名)则经常外包大学的核心功能和服务——早在新冠肺炎疫情之前就开始了。我们将这种聚集归因于各自国家的几个社会经济因素，包括高等教育的一般文化和管理大学的行政模式。然后，我们分析和解释我们的结果，发现其影响超越了个人隐私，涉及到学术独立和诚信的问题。
papers.title_zh: 脑袋在云里？衡量大学向公共云的迁移:对隐私和学术自由的影响

papers.title: Lessons Learned: Surveying the Practicality of Differential Privacy in the Industry
papers.authors: Gonzalo Munilla Garrido, Xiaoyuan Liu, Florian Matthes, Dawn Song
papers.abstract: Since its introduction in 2006, differential privacy has emerged as a predominant statistical tool for quantifying data privacy in academic works. Yet despite the plethora of research and open-source utilities that have accompanied its rise, with limited exceptions, differential privacy has failed to achieve widespread adoption in the enterprise domain. Our study aims to shed light on the fundamental causes underlying this academic-industrial utilization gap through detailed interviews of 24 privacy practitioners across 9 major companies. We analyze the results of our survey to provide key findings and suggestions for companies striving to improve privacy protection in their data workflows and highlight the necessary and missing requirements of existing differential privacy tools, with the goal of guiding researchers working towards the broader adoption of differential privacy. Our findings indicate that analysts suffer from lengthy bureaucratic processes for requesting access to sensitive data, yet once granted, only scarcely-enforced privacy policies stand between rogue practitioners and misuse of private information. We thus argue that differential privacy can significantly improve the processes of requesting and conducting data exploration across silos, and conclude that with a few of the improvements suggested herein, the practical use of differential privacy across the enterprise is within striking distance.
papers.abstract_zh: 自2006年引入以来，差分隐私已成为量化学术著作中数据隐私的主要统计工具。然而，尽管伴随着它的崛起出现了大量的研究和开源工具，除了少数例外，差分隐私未能在企业领域获得广泛采用。我们的研究旨在通过对9家主要公司的24名隐私从业者的详细采访，揭示这种学术-产业利用差距背后的根本原因。我们分析我们的调查结果，为努力改善其数据工作流中的隐私保护的公司提供关键发现和建议，并强调现有差分隐私工具的必要和缺失要求，目标是指导研究人员更广泛地采用差分隐私。我们的研究结果表明，分析师在申请访问敏感数据时会遭遇冗长的官僚程序，然而一旦获得授权，只有很少执行的隐私政策会阻止流氓从业者和滥用私人信息。因此，我们认为，差分隐私可以显著改善跨孤岛请求和进行数据探索的流程，并得出结论，通过本文建议的一些改进，差分隐私在整个企业中的实际使用指日可待。
papers.title_zh: 经验教训:调查行业中差异隐私的实用性

papers.title: Privacy Property Graph: Towards Automated Privacy Threat Modeling via Static Graph-based Analysis
papers.authors: Immanuel Kunz, Konrad Weiss, Angelika Schneider, Christian Banse
papers.abstract: Privacy threat modeling should be done frequently throughout development and production to be able to quickly mitigate threats. Yet, it can also be a very time-consuming activity. In this paper, we use an enhanced code property graph to partly automate the privacy threat modeling process: It automatically generates a data flow diagram from source code which exhibits privacy properties of data flows, and which can be analyzed semi-automatically via queries. We provide a list of such reusable queries that can be used to detect various privacy threats. To enable this analysis, we integrate a taint-tracking mechanism into the graph using privacy-specific labels. Since no benchmark for such an approach exists, we also present a test suite for privacy threat implementations which comprises implementations for 22 privacy threats in multiple programming languages. We expect that our approach significantly reduces time consumption of threat modeling and show that it also has potential beyond the threat categories defined by LINDDUN, e.g. to detect privacy anti-patterns and verify compliance to privacy policies.
papers.abstract_zh: 在整个开发和生产过程中，应该经常进行隐私威胁建模，以便能够快速缓解威胁。然而，这也是一项非常耗时的活动。在本文中，我们使用一个增强的代码属性图来部分自动化隐私威胁建模过程:它从源代码中自动生成一个数据流图，该图展示了数据流的隐私属性，并且可以通过查询进行半自动分析。我们提供了这种可重用查询的列表，可用于检测各种隐私威胁。为了支持这种分析，我们使用隐私特定的标签将污点跟踪机制集成到图中。由于不存在这种方法的基准，我们还提出了一个隐私威胁实现的测试套件，它包括用多种编程语言实现的22个隐私威胁。我们希望我们的方法能够显著减少威胁建模的时间消耗，并表明它还具有超越LINDDUN定义的威胁类别的潜力，例如，检测隐私反模式并验证对隐私策略的遵从性。
papers.title_zh: 隐私属性图:通过基于静态图的分析实现自动隐私威胁建模

papers.title: DeepSE-WF: Unified Security Estimation for Website Fingerprinting Defenses
papers.authors: Alexander Veicht, Cédric Renggli, Diogo Barradas
papers.abstract: Website fingerprinting (WF) attacks, usually conducted with the help of a machine learning-based classifier, enable a network eavesdropper to pinpoint which website a user is accessing through the inspection of traffic patterns. These attacks have been shown to succeed even when users browse the Internet through encrypted tunnels, e.g., through Tor or VPNs. To assess the security of new defenses against WF attacks, recent works have proposed feature-dependent theoretical frameworks that estimate the Bayes error of an adversary's features set or the mutual information leaked by manually-crafted features. Unfortunately, as WF attacks increasingly rely on deep learning and latent feature spaces, our experiments show that security estimations based on simpler (and less informative) manually-crafted features can no longer be trusted to assess the potential success of a WF adversary in defeating such defenses. In this work, we propose DeepSE-WF, a novel WF security estimation framework that leverages specialized kNN-based estimators to produce Bayes error and mutual information estimates from learned latent feature spaces, thus bridging the gap between current WF attacks and security estimation methods. Our evaluation reveals that DeepSE-WF produces tighter security estimates than previous frameworks, reducing the required computational resources to output security estimations by one order of magnitude.
papers.abstract_zh: 网站指纹(WF)攻击通常在基于机器学习的分类器的帮助下进行，使网络窃听者能够通过检查流量模式来确定用户正在访问哪个网站。已经证明，即使当用户通过加密隧道，例如通过Tor或VPN浏览因特网时，这些攻击也会成功。为了评估新防御对WF攻击的安全性，最近的工作提出了依赖于特征的理论框架，该框架估计对手特征集的贝叶斯误差或人工制作的特征泄露的交互信息。不幸的是，随着WF攻击越来越依赖于深度学习和潜在的特征空间，我们的实验表明，基于更简单(信息量更少)的手工制作的特征的安全估计不再能够被信任来评估WF对手在击败这种防御方面的潜在成功。在这项工作中，我们提出了DeepSE-WF，一种新的WF安全估计框架，它利用专门的基于kNN的估计器从学习的潜在特征空间产生贝叶斯误差和互信息估计，从而弥合了当前WF攻击和安全估计方法之间的差距。我们的评估表明，与以前的框架相比，DeepSE-WF产生了更严格的安全估计，将输出安全估计所需的计算资源减少了一个数量级。
papers.title_zh: 迪普塞-WF:网站指纹防御的统一安全评估

papers.title: iPET: Privacy Enhancing Traffic Perturbations for Secure IoT Communications
papers.authors: Akshaye Shenoi, Prasanna Karthik Vairam, Kanav Sabharwal, Jialin Li, Dinil Mon Divakaran
papers.abstract: IoT devices constantly communicate with servers over the Internet, allowing an attacker to extract sensitive information by passively monitoring the network traffic. Recent research works have shown that a network attacker with a trained machine learning (ML) model can accurately fingerprint IoT devices learned from the (encrypted) traffic flows of the devices. Such fingerprinting attacks are capable of revealing the make and model of the devices, which can further be used to extract detailed user activities. In this work, we develop and propose iPET, a novel adversarial perturbation-based traffic modification system that defends against fingerprinting attacks. iPET design employs GAN (Generative Adversarial Networks) in a tuneable way, allowing users to specify the maximum bandwidth overhead they are willing to tolerate for the defense. A fundamental idea of iPET is to deliberately introduce stochasticity between model instances. This approach limits a counter attack, as it inhibits an attacker from recreating an identical perturbation model and using it for fingerprinting. We evaluate the effectiveness of our defense against state-of-the-art fingerprinting models and with three different attacker capabilities. Our evaluations on synthetic and real-world datasets demonstrate that iPET decreases the accuracy of even the potent attackers. We also show that the traffic perturbations generated by iPET generalize well to different fingerprinting schemes that an attacker may deploy.
papers.abstract_zh: 物联网设备不断通过互联网与服务器通信，使得攻击者能够通过被动监控网络流量来提取敏感信息。最近的研究工作表明，具有训练有素的机器学习(ML)模型的网络攻击者可以准确地从设备的(加密)流量中获取物联网设备的指纹。这种指纹攻击能够暴露设备的品牌和型号，这可以进一步用于提取详细的用户活动。在这项工作中，我们开发并提出了iPET，一个新的对抗性扰动为基础的流量修改系统，抵御指纹攻击。iPET设计以可调的方式采用GAN(生成式对抗网络),允许用户指定他们愿意为防御容忍的最大带宽开销。iPET的一个基本思想是有意地在模型实例之间引入随机性。这种方法限制了反击，因为它禁止攻击者重新创建相同的扰动模型并将其用于指纹识别。我们用三种不同的攻击者能力来评估我们防御最先进的指纹模型的有效性。我们在合成和真实数据集上的评估表明，iPET甚至降低了强大攻击者的准确性。我们还表明，iPET产生的流量扰动可以很好地推广到攻击者可能部署的不同指纹识别方案。
papers.title_zh: iPET:用于安全物联网通信的隐私增强流量扰动

papers.title: Creative beyond TikToks: Investigating Adolescents' Social Privacy Management on TikTok
papers.authors: Nico Ebert, Tim Geppert, Joanna Strycharz, Melanie Knieps, Michael Hönig, Elke Brucker-Kley
papers.abstract: TikTok has been criticized for its low privacy standards, but little is known about how its adolescent users protect their privacy. Based on interviews with 54 adolescents in Switzerland, this study provides a comprehensive understanding of young TikTok users' privacy management practices related to the creation of videos. The data were explored using the COM-B model, an established behavioral analysis framework adapted for sociotechnical privacy research. Our overall findings are in line with previous research on other social networks: adolescents are aware of privacy related to their online social connections (social privacy) and perform conscious privacy management. However, we also identified new patterns related to the central role of algorithmic recommendations potentially relevant for other social networks. Adolescents are aware that TikTok's special algorithm, combined with the app's high prevalence among their peers, could easily put them in the spotlight. Some adolescents also reduce TikTok, which was originally conceived as a social network, to its extensive audio-visual capabilities and share TikToks via more private channels (e.g., Snapchat) to manage audiences and avoid identification by peers. Young users also find other creative ways to protect their privacy such as identifying stalkers or maintaining multiple user accounts with different privacy settings to establish granular audience management. Based on our findings, we propose various concrete measures to develop interventions that protect the privacy of adolescents on TikTok.
papers.abstract_zh: 抖音因其低隐私标准而受到批评，但很少有人知道其青少年用户如何保护他们的隐私。基于对瑞士54名青少年的访谈，本研究全面了解了年轻抖音用户与视频创作相关的隐私管理实践。这些数据是使用COM-B模型进行研究的，这是一个适用于社会技术隐私研究的既定行为分析框架。我们的总体发现与之前对其他社交网络的研究一致:青少年意识到与他们的在线社交联系相关的隐私(社交隐私)，并进行有意识的隐私管理。然而，我们也发现了与算法推荐的核心作用相关的新模式，这些模式可能与其他社交网络相关。青少年意识到，抖音的特殊算法，加上该应用在同龄人中的高流行度，很容易让他们成为焦点。一些青少年还将最初被视为社交网络的抖音降低到其广泛的视听功能，并通过更私人的渠道(如Snapchat)分享TikToks，以管理受众并避免被同龄人识别。年轻用户也找到其他创造性的方法来保护他们的隐私，如识别跟踪者或维护具有不同隐私设置的多个用户帐户，以建立精细的观众管理。基于我们的发现，我们提出了各种具体措施，以发展干预，保护抖音青少年的隐私。
papers.title_zh: 超越吉克多克的创意:抖音青少年社会隐私管理调查

papers.title: Distributed GAN-Based Privacy-Preserving Publication of Vertically-Partitioned Data
papers.authors: Xue Jiang, Yufei Zhang, Xuebing Zhou, Jens Grossklags
papers.abstract: In the era of big data, user data are often vertically partitioned and stored at different local parties. Exploring the data from all the local parties would enable data analysts to gain a better understanding of the user population from different perspectives. However, the publication of vertically-partitioned data faces a dilemma: on the one hand, the original data cannot be directly shared by local parties due to privacy concerns; on the other hand, independently privatizing the local datasets before publishing may break the potential correlation between the cross-party attributes and lead to a significant utility loss. Prior solutions compute the privatized multivariate distributions of different attribute sets for constructing a synthetic integrated dataset. However, these algorithms are only applicable for low-dimensional structured data and may suffer from large utility loss with the increase in data dimensionality. Following the idea of synthetic data generation, we propose VertiGAN, the first framework based on a generative adversarial network (GAN) for publishing vertically-partitioned data with privacy protection. The framework adopts a GAN model comprised of one multi-output global generator and multiple local discriminators. The generator is collaboratively trained by the server and local parties to learn the distribution of all parties' local data and is used to generate a high-utility synthetic integrated dataset on the server side. Additionally, we apply differential privacy (DP) during the training process to ensure strict privacy guarantees for the local data. We evaluate the framework's performance on a number of real-world datasets containing 68--1501 classification attributes and show that our framework is more capable of capturing joint distributions and cross-attribute correlations compared to statistics-based baseline algorithms. Moreover, with a privacy guarantee of epsilon=8, our framework achieves around a 2%~15% improvement in classification accuracy compared to the baseline algorithms. Extensive experimental results demonstrate the capability and efficiency of our framework in synthesizing vertically-partitioned data while striking a satisfactory utility-privacy balance.
papers.abstract_zh: 大数据时代，用户数据往往被垂直分区，存储在不同的本地方。探索来自所有本地方的数据将使数据分析师能够从不同角度更好地了解用户群体。然而，垂直分区数据的发布面临一个困境:一方面，由于隐私问题，原始数据不能被本地各方直接共享；另一方面，在发布之前独立私有化本地数据集可能会破坏跨方属性之间的潜在相关性，并导致重大的效用损失。现有的解决方案计算不同属性集的私有化多元分布，用于构建合成的集成数据集。然而，这些算法仅适用于低维结构化数据，并且可能随着数据维数的增加而遭受较大的效用损失。遵循合成数据生成的思想，我们提出了VertiGAN，这是第一个基于生成对抗网络(GAN)的框架，用于发布具有隐私保护的垂直划分数据。该框架采用由一个多输出全局生成器和多个局部鉴别器组成的GAN模型。该生成器由服务器和本地方协作训练，以学习所有方的本地数据的分布，并用于在服务器端生成高效用的合成集成数据集。此外，我们在训练过程中应用差分隐私(DP)来确保本地数据的严格隐私保证。我们在包含68 - 1501个分类属性的大量真实世界数据集上评估了该框架的性能，并表明与基于统计的基线算法相比，我们的框架更能够捕捉联合分布和跨属性相关性。此外，在隐私保证ε= 8的情况下，与基线算法相比，我们的框架在分类精度方面实现了大约2%~15%的提高。大量的实验结果证明了我们的框架在综合垂直划分的数据的能力和效率，同时达到了令人满意的效用-隐私平衡。
papers.title_zh: 基于分布式GAN的垂直分区数据隐私保护发布

papers.title: How Website Owners Face Privacy Issues: Thematic Analysis of Responses from a Covert Notification Study Reveals Diverse Circumstances and Challenges
papers.authors: Alina Stöver, Nina Gerber, Henning Pridöhl, Max Maass, Sebastian Bretthauer, Indra Spiecker genannt Döhmann, Matthias Hollick, Dominik Herrmann
papers.abstract: Many websites contain services from third parties. Misconfigurations of these services can lead to missing compliance with legal obligations and privacy risks for website users. Previous research indicates that one cause for such privacy issues is missing awareness. However, reasons for the missing awareness and other reasons for the prevalence of privacy issues are not widely researched; that includes website owners’ dealing with those issues. To shed light on the issue, we analyze 1043 responses from website owners to a notification about a privacy issue on their website using thematic analysis, following an exploratory and qualitative approach. Our analysis shows that, next to unawareness of the issue, incorrect technical implementation and ambiguous responsibilities are among the reasons for privacy issues. Also, website owners face different challenges, such as a lack of knowledge or slow organizational coordination and processes. In addition, our results show that the circumstances in which they operate their website influences how they act and what challenges they face. To illustrate these differences in website owners, we derive three personas from our thematic analysis: (1) the Ignorant Hobbyist, (2) the Busy Self-Employed, and (3) the Informed Multi-Stakeholder. These personas cover the majority of the aspects of the analyzed responses and represent the diversity of website owners and their backgrounds. Given the challenges and backgrounds of website owners, we discuss which prerequisites must be fulfilled to remediate privacy issues on websites. Finally, we present measures that support website owners in remediating privacy issues and show how to adapt these measures to the needs of different website owners. We hope that better support for website owners will also lead to better privacy for website visitors.
papers.abstract_zh: 许多网站包含来自第三方的服务。对这些服务的错误配置可能会导致网站用户无法履行法律义务和隐私风险。先前的研究表明，这种隐私问题的一个原因是缺乏意识。然而，缺乏意识的原因和隐私问题盛行的其他原因没有被广泛研究；这包括网站所有者对这些问题的处理。为了阐明这一问题，我们使用主题分析，遵循探索性和定性的方法，分析了网站所有者对其网站上关于隐私问题的通知的1043个回复。我们的分析表明，除了对问题的不了解之外，不正确的技术实现和不明确的责任也是隐私问题的原因之一。此外，网站所有者面临着不同的挑战，如缺乏知识或缓慢的组织协调和流程。此外，我们的结果表明，他们运营网站的环境会影响他们的行为方式和面临的挑战。为了说明网站所有者的这些差异，我们从我们的主题分析中得出了三种角色:(1)无知的业余爱好者，(2)忙碌的个体经营者，以及(3)知情的多方利益相关者。这些人物角色涵盖了所分析回答的大部分方面，代表了网站所有者及其背景的多样性。考虑到网站所有者的挑战和背景，我们讨论了补救网站隐私问题必须满足的先决条件。最后，我们提出了支持网站所有者补救隐私问题的措施，并展示了如何根据不同网站所有者的需求调整这些措施。我们希望对网站所有者的更好支持也将为网站访问者带来更好的隐私。
papers.title_zh: 网站所有者如何面对隐私问题:一项隐蔽通知研究的主题分析反应揭示了不同的情况和挑战

papers.title: Usability and Enforceability of Global Privacy Control
papers.authors: Sebastian Zimmeck, Oliver Wang, Kuba Alicki, Jocelyn Wang, Sophie Eng
papers.abstract: Web tracking by ad networks and other data-driven businesses is often privacy-invasive. Privacy laws, such as the California Consumer Privacy Act, aim to give people more control over their data. In particular, they provide a right to opt out from web tracking via privacy preference signals, notably Global Privacy Control (GPC). GPC holds the promise of enabling people to exercise their opt out rights on the web. Broad adoption of GPC hinges on its usability. In a usability survey we find that 94% of the participants would turn on GPC indicating a need for such efficient and effective opt out mechanism. 81% of the participants in our survey also have a correct understanding of what GPC does ensuring that their intent is accurately represented by their choice. The effectiveness of GPC is dependent on whether websites' GPC compliance can be enforced. A site's GPC compliance can be analyzed based on privacy flags, such as the US Privacy String, which is used on many sites to indicate the opt out status of a web user. Leveraging the US Privacy String for GPC purposes we implement a proof-of-concept browser extension that successfully and correctly analyzes sites' GPC compliance at a rate of 89%. We further implement a web crawler for our browser extension demonstrating that our analysis approach is scalable. We find that many sites do not respect GPC opt out signals despite being legally obligated to do so. Only 54/464 (12%) sites with a US Privacy String opt out users after having received a GPC signal.
papers.abstract_zh: 广告网络和其他数据驱动型企业的网络跟踪通常会侵犯隐私。隐私法，如加州消费者隐私法，旨在让人们对自己的数据有更多的控制权。特别是，它们通过隐私偏好信号，特别是全球隐私控制(GPC)，提供了退出网络跟踪的权利。GPC承诺让人们在网络上行使他们的选择退出权。GPC的广泛采用取决于它的可用性。在一项可用性调查中，我们发现94%的参与者会选择GPC，这表明需要这样一种高效的选择退出机制。在我们的调查中，81%的参与者对GPC的工作有正确的理解，确保他们的选择准确地代表了他们的意图。GPC的有效性取决于网站的GPC合规性能否得到执行。可以根据隐私标志来分析站点的GPC合规性，例如US Privacy字符串，它在许多站点上用于指示web用户的退出状态。利用美国隐私字符串实现GPC目的，我们实施了一个概念验证浏览器扩展，成功且正确地分析了站点的GPC合规性，符合率为89%。我们还为我们的浏览器扩展实现了一个网络爬虫，证明了我们的分析方法是可扩展的。我们发现许多网站不尊重GPC选择退出信号，尽管法律上有义务这样做。在收到GPC信号后，只有54/464 (12%)带有美国隐私字符串的网站选择退出用户。
papers.title_zh: 全球隐私控制的可用性和可执行性

papers.title: Watching your call: Breaking VoLTE Privacy in LTE/5G Networks
papers.authors: Zishuai Cheng, Mihai Ordean, Flavio D. Garcia, Baojiang Cui, Dominik Rys
papers.abstract: Voice over LTE (VoLTE) and Voice over NR (VoNR), are two similar technologies that have been widely deployed by operators to provide a better calling experience in LTE and 5G networks, respectively. The VoLTE/NR protocols rely on the security features of the underlying LTE/5G network to protect users' privacy such that nobody can monitor calls and learn details about call times, duration, and direction. In this paper, we introduce a new privacy attack which enables adversaries to analyse encrypted LTE/5G traffic and recover any VoLTE/NR call details. We achieve this by implementing a novel mobile-relay adversary which is able to remain undetected by using an improved physical layer parameter guessing procedure. This adversary facilitates the recovery of encrypted configuration messages exchanged between victim devices and the mobile network. We further propose an identity mapping method which enables our mobile-relay adversary to link a victim's network identifiers to the phone number efficiently, requiring a single VoLTE protocol message. We evaluate the real-world performance of our attacks using four modern commercial off-the-shelf phones and two representative, commercial network carriers. We collect over 60 hours of traffic between the phones and the mobile networks and execute 160 VoLTE calls, which we use to successfully identify patterns in the physical layer parameter allocation and in VoLTE traffic, respectively. Our real-world experiments show that our mobile-relay works as expected in all test cases, and the VoLTE activity logs recovered describe the actual communication with 100% accuracy. Finally, we show that we can link network identifiers such as International Mobile Subscriber Identities (IMSI), Subscriber Concealed Identifiers (SUCI) and/or Globally Unique Temporary Identifiers (GUTI) to phone numbers while remaining undetected by the victim.
papers.abstract_zh: LTE上的语音(VoLTE)和NR上的语音(VoNR)是运营商广泛部署的两种类似技术，分别用于在LTE和5G网络中提供更好的呼叫体验。VoLTE/NR协议依赖于底层LTE/5G网络的安全功能来保护用户的隐私，这样就没有人能够监控呼叫并了解有关呼叫时间、持续时间和方向的详细信息。在本文中，我们介绍了一种新的隐私攻击，它使对手能够分析加密的LTE/5G流量，并恢复任何VoLTE/NR呼叫细节。我们通过实现一种新颖的移动中继对手来实现这一点，该对手能够通过使用改进的物理层参数猜测过程来保持不被检测到。这个对手有助于恢复受害者设备和移动网络之间交换的加密配置消息。我们进一步提出了一种身份映射方法，使我们的移动中继对手能够有效地将受害者的网络标识符链接到电话号码，只需要一条VoLTE协议消息。我们使用四个现代商用现成电话和两个有代表性的商业网络运营商来评估我们的攻击的真实性能。我们收集了超过60小时的电话和移动网络之间的流量，并执行了160次VoLTE呼叫，我们使用这些呼叫成功地分别识别了物理层参数分配和VoLTE流量中的模式。我们的真实实验表明，我们的移动中继在所有测试情况下都像预期的那样工作，并且恢复的VoLTE活动日志以100%的准确度描述了实际通信。最后，我们证明了我们可以将网络标识符(如国际移动用户身份(IMSI)、用户隐藏标识符(SUCI)和/或全球唯一临时标识符(GUTI))与电话号码关联起来，而不会被受害者检测到。
papers.title_zh: 观看您的通话:打破LTE/5G网络中的VoLTE隐私

papers.title: Strengthening Privacy-Preserving Record Linkage using Diffusion
papers.authors: Frederik Armknecht, Youzhe Heng, Rainer Schnell
papers.abstract: Linking personal records from different databases is an essential step in many data workflows. Privacy-Preserving Record-Linkage (PPRL) techniques have been developed to link persons despite errors in the identifiers without violating their privacy. Designing efficient PPRL schemes with high linkage quality and a strong level of privacy protection is challenging. PPRL based on Bloom filter encoding (BF) is currently one of the most popular methods as they offer high efficiency and linkage quality. However, it turned out that these schemes are vulnerable to several attacks, with pattern mining and graph matching attacks considered to be the most serious by far. While several proposals have been made to strengthen BF-based PPRL schemes against these attacks, all these lack a proper security analysis or do not preserve the high efficiency and linkage quality. This paper shows that both problems can be addressed by extending the scheme with an appropriate linear diffusion layer. As opposed to previous schemes, we provide extensive theoretical and experimental analysis that confirms that the resulting scheme provides high efficiency and linkage quality and significantly increases security against the attacks mentioned above.
papers.abstract_zh: 链接不同数据库中的个人记录是许多数据工作流中的重要步骤。隐私保护记录链接(PPRL)技术已被开发出来，即使身份识别资料有错误，也能在不侵犯个人隐私的情况下将个人联系起来。设计具有高链接质量和强隐私保护水平的高效PPRL方案是具有挑战性的。基于布隆过滤器编码(BF)的PPRL是目前最流行的方法之一，因为它们提供了高效率和链接质量。然而，事实证明这些方案容易受到几种攻击，其中模式挖掘和图匹配攻击被认为是迄今为止最严重的攻击。虽然已经提出了一些建议来加强基于BF的PPRL方案以抵抗这些攻击，但是所有这些都缺乏适当的安全性分析或者没有保持高效率和连接质量。本文表明，这两个问题都可以通过用适当的线性扩散层扩展该方案来解决。与以前的方案相反，我们提供了广泛的理论和实验分析，证实了所得到的方案提供了高效率和链接质量，并且显著地增加了针对上述攻击的安全性。
papers.title_zh: 使用扩散加强隐私保护记录链接

papers.title: A Unified Framework for Quantifying Privacy Risk in Synthetic Data
papers.authors: Matteo Giomi, Franziska Boenisch, Christoph Wehmeyer, Borbála Tasnádi
papers.abstract: Synthetic data is often presented as a method for sharing sensitive information in a privacy-preserving manner by reproducing the global statistical properties of the original data without dis closing sensitive information about any individual. In practice, as with other anonymization methods, synthetic data cannot entirely eliminate privacy risks. These residual privacy risks need instead to be ex-post uncovered and assessed. However, quantifying the actual privacy risks of any synthetic dataset is a hard task, given the multitude of facets of data privacy. We present Anonymeter, a statistical framework to jointly quantify different types of privacy risks in synthetic tabular datasets. We equip this framework with attack-based evaluations for the singling out, linkability, and inference risks, which are the three key indicators of factual anonymization according to data protection regulations, such as the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). To the best of our knowledge, we are the first to introduce a coherent and legally aligned evaluation of these three privacy risks for synthetic data, as well as to design privacy attacks which model directly the singling out and linkability risks. We demonstrate the effectiveness of our methods by conducting an extensive set of experiments that measure the privacy risks of data with deliberately inserted privacy leakages, and of synthetic data generated with and without differential privacy. Our results highlight that the three privacy risks reported by our framework scale linearly with the amount of privacy leakage in the data. Furthermore, we observe that synthetic data exhibits the lowest vulnerability against linkability, indicating one-to-one relationships between real and synthetic data records are not preserved. Finally, with a quantitative comparison we demonstrate that Anonymeter outperforms existing synthetic data privacy evaluation frameworks both in terms of detecting privacy leaks, as well as computation speed. To contribute to a privacy-conscious usage of synthetic data, we publish Anonymeter as an open-source library (https://github.com/statice/anonymeter).
papers.abstract_zh: 合成数据通常是一种以隐私保护方式共享敏感信息的方法，通过再现原始数据的全局统计属性，而不会泄露任何个人的敏感信息。在实践中，与其他匿名方法一样，合成数据无法完全消除隐私风险。相反，这些残留的隐私风险需要事后发现和评估。然而，考虑到数据隐私的诸多方面，量化任何合成数据集的实际隐私风险都是一项艰巨的任务。我们提出了Anonymeter，这是一个统计框架，用于联合量化合成表格数据集中不同类型的隐私风险。我们为该框架配备了基于攻击的评估，用于筛选、可链接性和推断风险，这是根据数据保护法规(如欧洲通用数据保护法规(GDPR))进行事实匿名化的三个关键指标。据我们所知，我们率先对合成数据的这三种隐私风险进行了一致且合法的评估，并设计了直接模拟挑选风险和可链接性风险的隐私攻击。我们通过进行一组广泛的实验来证明我们的方法的有效性，这些实验测量了故意插入隐私泄漏的数据的隐私风险，以及有和没有差分隐私的合成数据的隐私风险。我们的结果强调，我们的框架报告的三个隐私风险与数据中的隐私泄露量成线性比例。此外，我们观察到合成数据表现出最低的可链接性脆弱性，表明真实和合成数据记录之间的一对一关系没有被保留。最后，通过定量比较，我们证明Anonymeter在检测隐私泄露和计算速度方面都优于现有的合成数据隐私评估框架。为了有助于保护合成数据的隐私，我们将Anonymeter作为开源库发布(https://github . com/static e/Anonymeter)。
papers.title_zh: 量化合成数据中隐私风险的统一框架

papers.title: Unintended Memorization and Timing Attacks in Named Entity Recognition Models
papers.authors: Rana Salal Ali, Benjamin Zi Hao Zhao, Hassan Jameel Asghar, Tham Nguyen, Ian David Wood, Mohamed Ali Kâafar
papers.abstract: Named entity recognition models (NER), are widely used for identifying named entities (e.g., individuals, locations, and other information) in text documents. Machine learning based NER models are increasingly being applied in privacy-sensitive applications that need automatic and scalable identification of sensitive information to redact text for data sharing. In this paper, we study the setting when NER models are available as a black-box service for identifying sensitive information in user documents and show that these models are vulnerable to membership inference on their training datasets. With updated pre-trained NER models from spaCy, we demonstrate two distinct membership attacks on these models. Our first attack capitalizes on unintended memorization in the NER's underlying neural network, a phenomenon NNs are known to be vulnerable to. Our second attack leverages a timing side-channel to target NER models that maintain vocabularies constructed from the training data. We show that different functional paths of words within the training dataset in contrast to words not previously seen have measurable differences in execution time. Revealing membership status of training samples has clear privacy implications. For example, in text redaction, sensitive words or phrases to be found and removed, are at risk of being detected in the training dataset. Our experimental evaluation includes the redaction of both password and health data, presenting both security risks and a privacy/regulatory issues. This is exacerbated by results that indicate memorization after only a single phrase. We achieved a 70% AUC in our first attack on a text redaction use-case. We also show overwhelming success in the second timing attack with an 99.23% AUC. Finally we discuss potential mitigation approaches to realize the safe use of NER models in light of the presented privacy and security implications of membership inference attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 命名实体识别模型(NER)广泛用于识别文本文档中的命名实体(例如，个人、位置和其他信息)。基于机器学习的NER模型越来越多地应用于隐私敏感的应用中，这些应用需要自动和可扩展地识别敏感信息，以编辑文本用于数据共享。在本文中，我们研究了NER模型作为识别用户文档中敏感信息的黑盒服务时的设置，并表明这些模型在其训练数据集上容易受到成员推断的影响。利用来自spaCy的经过更新的预训练的NER模型，我们演示了对这些模型的两种不同的成员攻击。我们的第一次攻击利用了NER底层神经网络中的无意记忆，这是一种众所周知的神经网络易受攻击的现象。我们的第二次攻击利用一个定时旁路来针对维护从训练数据构建的词汇表的NER模型。我们发现，在训练数据集中，单词的不同功能路径与之前未见过的单词相比，在执行时间上有可测量的差异。暴露训练样本的成员状态具有明显的隐私含义。例如，在文本编校中，要查找和删除的敏感词或短语有在训练数据集中被检测到的风险。我们的实验性评估包括密码和健康数据的编辑，存在安全风险和隐私/监管问题。这种情况会因为只记住一个短语的结果而加剧。我们在对文本编辑用例的第一次攻击中实现了70%的AUC。我们还在第二次计时攻击中取得了压倒性的成功，AUC为99.23%。最后，我们讨论了潜在的缓解方法，以实现安全使用NER模型鉴于目前的隐私和成员推理攻击的安全影响。
papers.title_zh: 命名实体识别模型中的无意记忆和计时攻击

papers.title: RPM: Robust Anonymity at Scale
papers.authors: Donghang Lu, Aniket Kate
papers.abstract: This work presents RPM, a scalable anonymous communication protocol suite using secure multiparty computation (MPC) with the offline-online model. We generate random, unknown permutation matrices in a secret-shared fashion and achieve improved (online) performance and the lightest communication and computation overhead for the clients compared to the state of art robust anonymous communication protocols. Using square-lattice shuffling, we make our protocol scale well as the number of clients increases. We provide three protocol variants, each targeting different input volumes and MPC frameworks/libraries. Besides, due to the modular design, our protocols can be easily generalized to support more MPC functionalities and security properties as they get developed. We also illustrate how to generalize our protocols to support two-way anonymous communication and secure sorting. We have implemented our protocols using the MP-SPDZ library suit and the benchmark illustrates that our protocols achieve unprecedented online phase performance with practical offline phases.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文介绍了RPM，这是一个可扩展的匿名通信协议套件，使用离线-在线模型的安全多方计算(MPC)。我们以秘密共享的方式生成随机的、未知的置换矩阵，并且与现有的健壮匿名通信协议相比，为客户端实现了改进的(在线)性能和最轻的通信和计算开销。使用方格子洗牌，我们使我们的协议规模以及客户端数量的增加。我们提供了三种协议变体，每种都针对不同的输入卷和MPC框架/库。此外，由于模块化设计，我们的协议可以很容易地推广到支持更多的MPC功能和安全属性，因为他们得到了发展。我们还说明了如何推广我们的协议，以支持双向匿名通信和安全排序。我们已经使用MP-SPDZ库套件实现了我们的协议，基准测试表明，我们的协议在实际的离线阶段实现了前所未有的在线阶段性能。
papers.title_zh: RPM:大规模的稳健匿名

papers.title: Private Sampling with Identifiable Cheaters
papers.authors: César Sabater, Florian Hahn, Andreas Peter, Jan Ramon
papers.abstract: In this paper we study verifiable sampling from probability distributions in the context of multi-party computation. This has various applications in randomized algorithms performed collaboratively by parties not trusting each other. One example is differentially private machine learning where noise should be drawn, typically from a Laplace or Gaussian distribution, and it is desirable that no party can bias this process. In particular, we propose algorithms to draw random numbers from uniform, Laplace, Gaussian and arbitrary probability distributions, and to verify honest execution of the protocols through zero-knowledge proofs. We propose protocols that result in one party knowing the drawn number and protocols that deliver the drawn random number as a shared secret.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们研究了多方计算环境下概率分布的可验证抽样。这在由互不信任的各方合作执行的随机化算法中有各种应用。一个例子是差分私有机器学习，其中噪声应该被提取，典型地来自拉普拉斯或高斯分布，并且希望没有一方能够对该过程有偏见。特别地，我们提出了从均匀、拉普拉斯、高斯和任意概率分布中抽取随机数的算法，并通过零知识证明来验证协议的诚实执行。我们提出了导致一方知道抽取的数字的协议和将抽取的随机数作为共享秘密传送的协议。
papers.title_zh: 有可识别骗子的私人抽样

papers.title: Investigating how Users Imagine their Personal Privacy Assistant
papers.authors: Alina Stöver, Sara Hahn, Felix Kretschmer, Nina Gerber
papers.abstract: Personal Privacy Assistants (PPAs) can support users in managing their privacy. Conducting a user study, we provide qualitative and quantitative insights into how users imagine their PPA and how PPAs designs can appear for different user groups. We highlight five aspects derived from the literature that are essential when designing a PPA: What features should the PPA have? How should the PPA learn the users’ preferences? What level of user involvement in its decisions should the PPAs have? Which vendor should offer the PPA? What data are users willing to disclose to their PPA? Our results provide a holistic view of user perceptions of PPAs. We identify two user groups that differ in their characteristics, such as technology affinity and privacy concerns, and have different ideas of a PPA in terms of automation level and provider, for example. We discuss our results in relation to the literature and derive recommendations for designing PPAs to fulfill user needs.
papers.abstract_zh: 个人隐私助手(PPAs)可以支持用户管理他们的隐私。进行用户研究，我们提供定性和定量的见解，了解用户如何想象他们的PPA和PPAs设计如何出现在不同的用户群。我们强调了设计PPA时从文献中得出的五个重要方面:PPA应该有什么特征？PPA应该如何了解用户的偏好？PPAs的决策应该有多大程度的用户参与？哪个供应商应该提供PPA？用户愿意向他们的PPA透露哪些数据？我们的结果提供了用户对PPAs感知的整体视图。我们确定了两个用户群，它们的特征不同，例如技术相似性和隐私问题，并且例如在自动化水平和提供商方面对PPA有不同的想法。我们讨论了与文献相关的结果，并得出设计PPAs以满足用户需求的建议。
papers.title_zh: 调查用户如何想象他们的个人隐私助手

papers.title: SoK: Content Moderation for End-to-End Encryption
papers.authors: Sarah Scheffler, Jonathan R. Mayer
papers.abstract: Popular messaging applications now enable end-to-end-encryption (E2EE) by default, and E2EE data storage is becoming common. These important advances for security and privacy create new content moderation challenges for online services, because services can no longer directly access plaintext content. While ongoing public policy debates about E2EE and content moderation in the United States and European Union emphasize child sexual abuse material and misinformation in messaging and storage, we identify and synthesize a wealth of scholarship that goes far beyond those topics. We bridge literature that is diverse in both content moderation subject matter, such as malware, spam, hate speech, terrorist content, and enterprise policy compliance, as well as intended deployments, including not only privacy-preserving content moderation for messaging, email, and cloud storage, but also private introspection of encrypted web traffic by middleboxes. In this work, we systematize the study of content moderation in E2EE settings. We set out a process pipeline for content moderation, drawing on a broad interdisciplinary literature that is not specific to E2EE. We examine cryptography and policy design choices at all stages of this pipeline, and we suggest areas of future research to fill gaps in literature and better understand possible paths forward.
papers.abstract_zh: 流行的消息应用程序现在默认启用端到端加密(E2EE ), E2EE数据存储变得越来越普遍。这些安全和隐私方面的重要进步为在线服务带来了新的内容审核挑战，因为服务不再能够直接访问明文内容。虽然美国和欧盟正在进行的关于E2EE和内容调节的公共政策辩论强调儿童性虐待材料以及消息传递和存储中的错误信息，但我们发现并综合了大量远远超出这些主题的学术成果。我们将内容审核主题(如恶意软件、垃圾邮件、仇恨言论、恐怖主义内容和企业政策合规性)以及预期部署(不仅包括针对消息、电子邮件和云存储的隐私保护内容审核，还包括通过中间媒介对加密的web流量进行的私下检查)多样化的文献联系起来。在这项工作中，我们系统地研究了E2EE环境中的内容调节。我们制定了内容审核的流程，利用了广泛的跨学科文献，这些文献并不局限于E2EE。我们在这个管道的所有阶段检查密码学和政策设计选择，并且我们建议未来的研究领域来填补文献中的空白并且更好地理解可能的前进道路。
papers.title_zh: SoK:端到端加密的内容审核

papers.title: ezDPS: An Efficient and Zero-Knowledge Machine Learning Inference Pipeline
papers.authors: Haodi Wang, Thang Hoang
papers.abstract: Machine Learning as a service (MLaaS) permits resource-limited clients to access powerful data analytics services ubiquitously. Despite its merits, MLaaS poses significant concerns regarding the integrity of delegated computation and the privacy of the server’s model parameters. To address this issue, Zhang et al. (CCS'20) initiated the study of zero-knowledge Machine Learning (zkML). Few zkML schemes have been proposed afterward; however, they focus on sole ML classification algorithms that may not offer satisfactory accuracy or require large-scale training data and model parameters, which may not be desirable for some applications. We propose ezDPS, a new efficient and zero-knowledge ML inference scheme. Unlike prior works, ezDPS is a zkML pipeline in which the data is processed in multiple stages for high accuracy. Each stage of ezDPS is harnessed with an established ML algorithm that is shown to be effective in various applications, including Discrete Wavelet Transformation, Principal Components Analysis, and Support Vector Machine. We design new gadgets to prove ML operations effectively. We fully implemented ezDPS and assessed its performance on real datasets. Experimental results showed that ezDPS achieves one-to-three orders of magnitude more efficient than the generic circuit-based approach in all metrics while maintaining more desirable accuracy than single ML classification approaches.
papers.abstract_zh: 机器学习即服务(MLaaS)允许资源有限的客户端无处不在地访问强大的数据分析服务。尽管有其优点，MLaaS在委托计算的完整性和服务器模型参数的隐私性方面引起了极大的关注。为了解决这个问题，张等人(CCS'20)发起了零知识机器学习(zkML)的研究。后来很少提出zkML方案；然而，它们集中于单一的ML分类算法，这些算法可能不能提供令人满意的精度或者需要大规模的训练数据和模型参数，这对于一些应用来说可能是不期望的。我们提出了一种新的高效的零知识ML推理方案ezDPS。与以前的作品不同，ezDPS是一个zkML管道，其中数据在多个阶段进行处理，以获得高精度。ezDPS的每一级都利用已建立的ML算法，该算法在各种应用中被证明是有效的，包括离散小波变换、主成分分析和支持向量机。我们设计新的小工具来有效地证明ML操作。我们完全实现了ezDPS，并在真实数据集上评估了它的性能。实验结果表明，在所有度量中，ezDPS实现了比一般的基于电路的方法高一至三个数量级的效率，同时保持了比单一ML分类方法更理想的准确度。
papers.title_zh: ezDPS:一种高效的零知识机器学习推理管道

papers.title: Two-Cloud Private Read Alignment to a Public Reference Genome
papers.authors: Sindhuja Madabushi, Parameswaran Ramanathan
papers.abstract: The human genome is the ultimate identifier of an individual even though most of it is identical across human beings. Biological differences between two individuals are encoded in a set of base pair variations called Single Nucleotide Polymorphisms (SNPs), which may be indicative of an individual's personal information such as skin color and susceptibility to diseases. The large-scale nature of human genome necessitates outsourcing of genomic computations to public clouds. However, this raises some serious privacy concerns. The fact that the human reference template is public poses additional challenges. In this paper, we propose a two-cloud private read alignment algorithm using the Burrows-Wheeler Transform and the FM-Index. Our algorithm runs in the same order of complexity as the core FM-Index alignment algorithm without privacy. Our proposed scheme is able to achieve accuracy comparable to modern alignment algorithms such as Bowtie with complete privacy.
papers.abstract_zh: 人类基因组是个体的最终标识符，尽管它在人类中的大部分是相同的。两个个体之间的生物学差异编码在一组称为单核苷酸多态性(SNPs)的碱基对变异中，这些变异可以指示个体的个人信息，例如肤色和对疾病的易感性。人类基因组的大规模本质要求将基因组计算外包给公共云。然而，这引起了一些严重的隐私问题。人工参考模板是公开的这一事实带来了额外的挑战。在本文中，我们提出了一种使用Burrows-Wheeler变换和FM-Index的双云私有读对齐算法。我们的算法与无隐私的核心FM-Index对齐算法具有相同的复杂度。我们提出的方案能够实现与现代对齐算法(如Bowtie)相当的准确性，并具有完全的隐私性。
papers.title_zh: 与公共参考基因组的双云私有读取比对

papers.title: PubSub-ML: A Model Streaming Alternative to Federated Learning
papers.authors: Lovedeep Gondara, Ke Wang
papers.abstract: Federated learning is a decentralized learning framework where participating sites are engaged in a tight collaboration, forcing them into symmetric sharing and the agreement in terms of data samples, feature spaces, model types and architectures, privacy settings, and training processes. We propose PubSub-ML, Publish-Subscribe for Machine Learning, as a solution in a loose collaboration setting where each site maintains local autonomy on these decisions. In PubSub-ML, each site is either a publisher or a subscriber or both. The publishers publish differentially private machine learning models and the subscribers subscribe to published models in order to construct customized models for local use, essentially benefiting from other sites' data by distilling knowledge from publishers' models while respecting data privacy. The term “model streaming” comes from the extension of PubSub-ML to decentralized data streams with concept drift. Our extensive empirical evaluation shows that PubSub-ML outperforms federated learning methods by a significant margin.
papers.abstract_zh: 联合学习是一种分散的学习框架，其中参与站点进行紧密的协作，迫使它们在数据样本、特征空间、模型类型和架构、隐私设置和训练过程方面进行对称共享和达成一致。我们提出PubSub-ML，即机器学习的发布-订阅，作为一种松散协作环境中的解决方案，其中每个站点在这些决策上保持本地自治。在PubSub-ML中，每个站点要么是发布者，要么是订阅者，或者两者都是。发布者发布不同的私有机器学习模型，订阅者订阅已发布的模型，以构建供本地使用的定制模型，通过从发布者的模型中提取知识，同时尊重数据隐私，本质上受益于其他网站的数据。术语“模型流”来自于PubSub-ML对概念漂移的去中心化数据流的扩展。我们广泛的经验评估表明，PubSub-ML的性能远远优于联邦学习方法。
papers.title_zh: PubSub-ML:联邦学习的模型流替代方案

papers.title: Intersectional Thinking about PETs: A Study of Library Privacy
papers.authors: Nora McDonald, Rachel Greenstadt, Andrea Forte
papers.abstract: This qualitative study examines the privacy challenges perceived by librarians who afford access to physical and electronic spaces and are in a unique position of safeguarding the privacy of their patrons. As internet “service providers,” librarians represent a bridge between the physical and internet world, and thus offer a unique sight line to the convergence of privacy, identity, and social disadvantage. Drawing on interviews with 16 librarians, we describe how they often interpret or define their own rules when it comes to privacy to protect patrons who face challenges that stem from structures of inequality outside their walls. We adopt the term “intersectional thinking” to describe how librarians reported thinking about privacy solutions, which is focused on identity and threats of structural discrimination (the rules, norms, and other determinants of discrimination embedded in institutions and other societal structures that present barriers to certain groups or individuals), and we examine the role that low/no-tech strategies play in ameliorating these threats. We then discuss how librarians act as "privacy intermediaries" for patrons, the potential analogue for this role for developers of systems, the power of low/no-tech strategies, and implications for design and research of privacy-enhancing technologies (PETs).
papers.abstract_zh: 这项定性研究调查了图书馆员所感知的隐私挑战，他们提供物理和电子空间，并处于保护其顾客隐私的独特地位。作为互联网“服务提供者”，图书馆员代表了物理世界和互联网世界之间的桥梁，因此为隐私、身份和社会劣势的融合提供了独特的视线。根据对16名图书馆员的采访，我们描述了当涉及隐私时，他们如何解释或定义自己的规则，以保护面临挑战的顾客，这些挑战源于他们墙外的不平等结构。我们采用术语“交叉思维”来描述图书馆员如何报告对隐私解决方案的思考，这种思考侧重于身份和结构性歧视的威胁(嵌入在机构和其他社会结构中对某些群体或个人构成障碍的歧视的规则、规范和其他决定因素)，我们检查了低/无技术策略在缓解这些威胁方面的作用。然后，我们讨论了图书馆员如何充当顾客的“隐私中介”，系统开发者扮演这一角色的潜在类比，低技术/无技术策略的力量，以及对隐私增强技术(PETs)的设计和研究的影响。
papers.title_zh: 关于宠物的交叉思考:图书馆隐私研究

papers.title: SoK: Differentially Private Publication of Trajectory Data
papers.authors: Àlex Miranda-Pascual, Patricia Guerra-Balboa, Javier Parra-Arnau, Jordi Forné, Thorsten Strufe
papers.abstract: Trajectory analysis holds many promises, from improvements in traffic management to routing advice or infrastructure development. However, learning users' paths is extremely privacy-invasive. Therefore, there is a necessity to protect trajectories such that we preserve the global properties, useful for analysis, while specific and private information of individuals remains inaccessible. Trajectories, however, are difficult to protect, since they are sequential, highly dimensional, correlated, bound to geophysical restrictions, and easily mapped to semantic points of interest. This paper aims to establish a systematic framework on protective masking and synthetic-generation measures for trajectory databases with syntactic and differentially private (DP) guarantees, including also utility properties, derived from ideas and limitations of existing proposals. To reach this goal, we systematize the utility metrics used throughout the literature, deeply analyze the DP granularity notions, explore and elaborate on the state of the art on privacy-enhancing mechanisms and their problems, and expose the main limitations of DP notions in the context of trajectories.
papers.abstract_zh: 轨迹分析有许多承诺，从交通管理的改善到路线建议或基础设施开发。然而，了解用户的路径是非常侵犯隐私的。因此，有必要保护轨迹，以便我们保存对分析有用的全局属性，而个人的具体和私人信息仍然不可访问。然而，轨迹很难保护，因为它们是连续的、高度多维的、相关的、受地球物理限制的约束，并且容易映射到感兴趣的语义点。本文旨在为轨迹数据库建立一个保护性屏蔽和综合生成措施的系统框架，该框架具有句法和差分私有(DP)保证，还包括效用属性，源自现有建议的思想和局限性。为了实现这一目标，我们系统化了文献中使用的效用度量，深入分析了DP粒度概念，探索并阐述了隐私增强机制及其问题的最新发展，并揭示了DP概念在轨迹上下文中的主要局限性。
papers.title_zh: SoK:轨迹数据的差分私有发布

papers.title: Editors' Introduction
papers.authors: Kostas Chatzikokolakis, Aaron Johnson
papers.abstract: Is there currently a crisis of confidence in psychological science reflecting an unprecedented level of doubt among practitioners about the reliability of research findings in the field? It would certainly appear that there is. These doubts emerged and grew as a series of unhappy events unfolded in 2011: the Diederik Stapel fraud case (see Stroebe, Postmes, & Spears, 2012, this issue), the publication in a major social psychology journal of an article purporting to show evidence of extrasensory perception (Bem, 2011) followed by widespread public mockery (see Galak, LeBoeuf, Nelson, & Simmons, in press; Wagenmakers, Wetzels, Borsboom, & van der Maas, 2011), reports by Wicherts and colleagues that psychologists are often unwilling or unable to share their published data for reanalysis (Wicherts, Bakker, & Molenaar, 2011; see also Wicherts, Borsboom, Kats, & Molenaar, 2006), and the publication of an important article in Psychological Science showing how easily researchers can, in the absence of any real effects, nonetheless obtain statistically significant differences through various questionable research practices (QRPs) such as exploring multiple dependent variables or covariates and only reporting these when they yield significant results (Simmons, Nelson, & Simonsohn, 2011). For those psychologists who expected that the embarrassments of 2011 would soon recede into memory, 2012 offered instead a quick plunge from bad to worse, with new indications of outright fraud in the field of social cognition (Simonsohn, 2012), an article in Psychological Science showing that many psychologists admit to engaging in at least some of the QRPs examined by Simmons and colleagues (John, Loewenstein, & Prelec, 2012), troubling new meta-analytic evidence suggesting that the QRPs described by Simmons and colleagues may even be leaving telltale signs visible in the distribution of p values in the psychological literature (Masicampo & Lalande, in press; Simonsohn, 2012), and an acrimonious dust-up in science magazines and blogs centered around the problems some investigators were having in replicating well-known results from the field of social cognition (Bower, 2012; Yong, 2012). Although the very public problems experienced by psychology over this 2-year period are embarrassing to those of us working in the field, some have found comfort in the fact that, over the same period, similar concerns have been arising across the scientific landscape (triggered by revelations that will be described shortly). Some of the suspected causes of unreplicability, such as publication bias (the tendency to publish only positive findings) have been discussed for years; in fact, the phrase file-drawer problem was first coined by a distinguished psychologist several decades ago (Rosenthal, 1979). However, many have speculated that these problems have been exacerbated in recent years as academia reaps the harvest of a hypercompetitive academic climate and an incentive scheme that provides rich rewards for overselling one’s work and few rewards at all for caution and circumspection (see Giner-Sorolla, 2012, this issue). Equally disturbing, investigators seem to be replicating each others’ work even less often than they did in the past, again presumably reflecting an incentive scheme gone askew (a point discussed in several articles in this issue, e.g., Makel, Plucker, & Hegarty, 2012). The frequency with which errors appear in the psychological literature is not presently known, but a number of facts suggest it might be disturbingly high. Ioannidis (2005) has shown through simple mathematical modeling that any scientific field that ignores replication can easily come to the miserable state wherein (as the title of his most famous article puts it) “most published research findings are false” (see also Ioannidis, 2012, this issue, and Pashler & Harris, 2012, this issue). Meanwhile, reports emerging from cancer research have made such grim scenarios seem more plausible: In 2012, several large pharmaceutical companies revealed that their efforts to replicate exciting preclinical findings from published academic studies in cancer biology were only rarely verifying the original results (Begley & Ellis, 2012; see also Osherovich, 2011; Prinz, Schlange, & Asadullah, 2011).
papers.abstract_zh: 目前心理科学是否出现了信任危机，反映出从业者对该领域研究结果的可靠性产生了前所未有的怀疑？显然是有的。随着2011年一系列不愉快事件的发生，这些怀疑出现了，并有所增长:Diederik Stapel欺诈案(见Stroebe，Postmes，& Spears，2012，这一期)，在一份主要的社会心理学杂志上发表了一篇文章，声称显示了超感知觉的证据(Bem，2011)，随后受到了广泛的公开嘲笑(见Galak，LeBoeuf，Nelson，& Simmons，正在出版中；Wagenmakers，Wetzels，Borsboom，& van der Maas，2011)，Wicherts及其同事报告说，心理学家往往不愿意或不能分享他们发表的数据进行再分析(Wicherts，Bakker，& Molenaar，2011；另见Wicherts，Borsboom，Kats，& Molenaar，2006)，以及发表在《心理科学》上的一篇重要文章，该文章表明，在没有任何实际影响的情况下，研究人员可以通过各种有问题的研究实践(qrp)轻松地获得统计学上的显著差异，如探索多个因变量或协变量，并仅在它们产生显著结果时报告这些结果(Simmons，Nelson，& Simonsohn，2011)。对于那些预计2011年的尴尬将很快消失在记忆中的心理学家来说，2012年反而提供了一个从糟糕到更糟糕的快速跳水，在社会认知领域出现了新的明显的欺诈迹象(Simonsohn，2012)，心理科学中的一篇文章显示，许多心理学家承认至少参与了Simmons及其同事检查的一些快速反应程序(John，Loewenstein，& Prelec，2012)。 令人不安的新荟萃分析证据表明，Simmons及其同事描述的qrp甚至可能在心理学文献中的p值分布中留下明显的迹象(Masicampo & Lalande，出版中； Simonsohn，2012)，科学杂志和博客上围绕一些研究人员在复制社会认知领域的知名结果时遇到的问题展开了激烈的争论(Bower，2012；永，2012)。虽然心理学在这两年中所经历的非常公开的问题令我们这些在该领域工作的人感到尴尬，但一些人已经找到了安慰，因为在同一时期，类似的担忧已经在整个科学领域出现(由即将描述的启示引发)。一些不可复制的可疑原因，如发表偏倚(倾向于只发表积极的发现)已经讨论了多年；事实上，抽屉问题这个短语是由一位杰出的心理学家在几十年前首次提出的(Rosenthal，1979)。然而，许多人推测，这些问题在最近几年已经恶化，因为学术界收获了高度竞争的学术氛围和奖励计划，这种奖励计划为过度销售自己的工作提供了丰厚的奖励，而对谨慎和谨慎却几乎没有奖励(见吉纳-索罗拉，2012年，这一期)。同样令人不安的是，研究人员似乎比过去更少地重复彼此的工作，这可能再次反映了一个倾斜的激励机制(这一点在本期的几篇文章中讨论过，例如，马克尔、普吕克尔和赫加蒂，2012)。错误出现在心理学文献中的频率目前还不清楚，但许多事实表明它可能高得令人不安。约安尼迪斯(2005)通过简单的数学建模表明，任何忽视复制的科学领域都很容易陷入悲惨的境地，其中(正如他最著名的文章的标题所言)“大多数发表的研究结果都是错误的”(另见约安尼迪斯，2012，本期，以及Pashler & Harris，2012，本期)。与此同时，来自癌症研究的报告让这种严峻的情景看起来更加可信:2012年，几家大型制药公司透露，他们在癌症生物学方面复制已发表学术研究中令人兴奋的临床前发现的努力很少验证原始结果(Begley & Ellis，2012；另见Osherovich，2011年；普林茨、施朗格和阿萨杜拉，2011年)。
papers.title_zh: 编辑介绍

papers.title: Trust TEE?: Exploring the Impact of Trusted Execution Environments on Smart Home Privacy Norms
papers.authors: Pratik Musale, Adam Lee
papers.abstract: IoT devices like smart cameras and speakers provide convenience but can collect sensitive information within private spaces. While research has investigated user perception of comfort with information flows originating from these types of devices, little focus has been given to the role of the sensing hardware in influencing these sentiments. Given the proliferation of trusted execution environments (TEEs) across commodity- and server-class devices, we surveyed 1049 American adults using the Contextual Integrity framework to understand how the inclusion of cloud-based TEEs in IoT ecosystems may influence comfort with data collection and use. We find that cloud-based TEEs significantly increase user comfort across information flows. These increases are more pronounced for devices manufactured by smaller companies and show that cloud-based TEEs can bridge the previously-documented gulfs in user trust between small and large companies. Sentiments around consent, bystander data, and indefinite retention are unaffected by the presence of TEEs, indicating the centrality of these norms.
papers.title_zh: 信任TEE？:探索可信执行环境对智能家居隐私规范的影响
papers.abstract_zh: 智能相机和扬声器等物联网设备提供了便利，但也可能在私人空间收集敏感信息。虽然研究已经调查了用户对源自这些类型设备的信息流的舒适度感知，但是很少关注传感硬件在影响这些情绪中的作用。鉴于商用和服务器级设备中可信执行环境(tee)的激增，我们使用上下文完整性框架调查了1049名美国成年人，以了解在物联网生态系统中包含基于云的tee会如何影响数据收集和使用的舒适度。我们发现基于云的tee显著提高了用户在信息流中的舒适度。这些增长对于小公司制造的设备来说更加明显，表明基于云的tee可以弥合小公司和大公司之间之前记录的用户信任鸿沟。围绕同意、旁观者数据和无限期保留的情绪不受tee存在的影响，表明这些规范的中心地位。

papers.title: Ruffle: Rapid 3-Party Shuffle Protocols
papers.authors: Pranav Shriram A, Nishat Koti, Varsha Bhat Kukkala, Arpita Patra, Bhavish Raj Gopal, Somya Sangal
papers.abstract: Secure shuffle is an important primitive that finds use in several applications such as secure electronic voting, oblivious RAMs, secure sorting, to name a few. For time-sensitive shuffle-based applications that demand a fast response time, it is essential to design a fast and efficient shuffle protocol. In this work, we design secure and fast shuffle protocols relying on the techniques of secure multiparty computation. We make several design choices that aid in achieving highly efficient protocols. Specifically, we consider malicious 3-party computation setting with an honest majority and design robust ring-based protocols. Our shuffle protocols provide a fast online (i.e., input-dependent) phase compared to the state-of-the-art for the considered setting. To showcase the efficiency improvements brought in by our shuffle protocols, we consider two distinct applications of anonymous broadcast and secure graph computation via the GraphSC paradigm. In both cases, multiple shuffle invocations are required. Hence, going beyond standalone shuffle invocation, we identify two distinct scenarios of multiple invocations and provide customised protocols for the same. Further, we showcase that our customized protocols not only provide a fast response time, but also provide improved overall run time for multiple shuffle invocations. With respect to the applications, we not only improve in terms of efficiency, but also work towards providing improved security guarantees, thereby outperforming the respective state-of-the-art works. We benchmark our shuffle protocols and the considered applications to analyze the efficiency improvements with respect to various parameters
papers.title_zh: Ruffle:快速三方洗牌协议
papers.abstract_zh: 安全混洗是一种重要的原语，可用于多种应用，例如安全电子投票、不经意ram、安全排序等。对于要求快速响应时间的时间敏感型混洗应用，设计快速有效的混洗协议至关重要。在这项工作中，我们依靠安全多方计算技术设计了安全快速的洗牌协议。我们选择了几种有助于实现高效协议的设计方案。具体来说，我们考虑恶意的三方计算设置与诚实的多数，并设计鲁棒的基于环的协议。我们的shuffle协议提供了一个快速的在线(即，依赖于输入)阶段，与所考虑的设置的最先进状态相比。为了展示我们的混洗协议带来的效率改进，我们通过GraphSC范例考虑匿名广播和安全图计算的两个不同应用。在这两种情况下，都需要多次洗牌调用。因此，超越独立的混洗调用，我们确定了两种不同的多次调用场景，并为其提供了定制的协议。此外，我们展示了我们定制的协议不仅提供了快速的响应时间，还为多个shuffle调用提供了改进的总体运行时间。在应用程序方面，我们不仅提高了效率，还致力于提供更好的安全保证，从而超越了各自最先进的作品。我们对我们的shuffle协议和所考虑的应用进行了基准测试，以分析相对于各种参数的效率改进

papers.title: Story Beyond the Eye: Glyph Positions Break PDF Text Redaction
papers.authors: Maxwell Bland, Anushya Iyer, Kirill Levchenko
papers.abstract:
In this work we find that many current redactions of PDF text are insecure due to non-redacted character positioning information. In particular, subpixel-sized horizontal shifts in redacted and non-redacted characters can be recovered and used to effectively deredact first and last names. Unfortunately these findings affect redactions where the text underneath the black box is removed from the PDF.
 We demonstrate these findings by performing a comprehensive vulnerability assessment of common PDF redaction types. We examine 11 popular PDF redaction tools, including Adobe Acrobat, and find that they leak information about redacted text. We also effectively deredact hundreds of real-world PDF redactions, including those found in OIG investigation reports and FOIA responses. 
 To correct the problem, we have released open source algorithms to fix vulnerable redactions and reduce the amount of information leaked by nonexcising redactions (where the text underneath the redaction is copy-pastable). We have also notified the developers of the studied redaction tools. We have notified the Office of Inspector General, the Free Law Project, PACER, Adobe, Microsoft, and the US Department of Justice. We are working with several of these groups to prevent our discoveries from being used for malicious purposes.
papers.title_zh: 眼睛之外的故事:字形位置打破PDF文本密文
papers.abstract_zh:
在这项工作中，我们发现，由于非编校字符定位信息，许多当前的PDF文本编校是不安全的。特别是，可以恢复密文和非密文字符中的子像素大小的水平移动，并用于有效地删除名字和姓氏。不幸的是，这些发现影响了从PDF中删除黑盒下的文本的修订。
我们通过对常见PDF编辑类型进行全面的漏洞评估来展示这些发现。我们检查了11种流行的PDF编校工具，包括Adobe Acrobat，发现它们泄露了关于编校文本的信息。我们还有效地取消了数百个真实世界的PDF编辑，包括那些在OIG调查报告和FOIA回应中发现的内容。
为了纠正这个问题，我们发布了开源算法来修复易受攻击的密文，并减少由非精确密文泄露的信息量(密文下的文本是可复制粘贴的)。我们也已经通知了研究编辑工具的开发者。我们已经通知了监察长办公室、自由法律项目、PACER、Adobe、微软和美国司法部。我们正与其中几个团体合作，以防止我们的发现被用于恶意目的。

papers.title: Towards Sentence Level Inference Attack Against Pre-trained Language Models
papers.authors: Kang Gu, Ehsanul Kabir, Neha Ramsurrun, Soroush Vosoughi, Shagufta Mehnaz
papers.abstract: In recent years, pre-trained language models (e.g., BERT and GPT) have shown the superior capability of textual representation learning, benefiting from their large architectures and massive training corpora. The industry has also quickly embraced language models to develop various downstream NLP applications. For example, Google has already used BERT to improve its search system. The utility of the language embeddings also brings about potential privacy risks. Prior works have revealed that an adversary can either identify whether a keyword exists or gather a set of possible candidates for each word in a sentence embedding. However, these attacks cannot recover coherent sentences which leak high-level semantic information from the original text. To demonstrate that the adversary can go beyond the word-level attack, we present a novel decoder-based attack, which can reconstruct meaningful text from private embeddings after being pre-trained on a public dataset of the same domain. This attack is more challenging than a word-level attack due to the complexity of sentence structures. We comprehensively evaluate our attack in two domains and with different settings to show its superiority over the baseline attacks. Quantitative experimental results show that our attack can identify up to 3.5X of the number of keywords identified by the baseline attacks. Although our method reconstructs high-quality sentences in many cases, it often produces lower-quality sentences as well. We discuss these cases and the limitations of our method in detail
papers.title_zh: 针对预训练语言模型的句子级推理攻击
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，预训练语言模型(如伯特和GPT)得益于其庞大的体系结构和海量的训练语料库，显示出优越的文本表征学习能力。业界也迅速采用语言模型来开发各种下游NLP应用程序。例如，谷歌已经使用BERT来改进其搜索系统。语言嵌入的实用性也带来了潜在的隐私风险。先前的工作揭示了对手可以识别关键字是否存在，或者为句子嵌入中的每个单词收集一组可能的候选。然而，这些攻击无法恢复从原始文本中泄漏高级语义信息的连贯句子。为了证明对手可以超越单词级攻击，我们提出了一种新的基于解码器的攻击，它可以在相同领域的公共数据集上进行预训练后，从私有嵌入中重建有意义的文本。由于句子结构的复杂性，这种攻击比单词级攻击更具挑战性。我们在两个域和不同的设置下对我们的攻击进行了综合评估，以显示其相对于基线攻击的优越性。定量实验结果表明，我们的攻击可以识别的关键词数量是基线攻击的3.5倍。虽然我们的方法在许多情况下重建了高质量的句子，但它也经常产生较低质量的句子。我们详细讨论了这些情况和我们方法的局限性

papers.title: Time-Deniable Signatures
