papers.authors: Gabrielle Beck, Arka Rai Choudhuri, Matthew Green, Abhishek Jain, Pratyush Ranjan Tiwari
papers.abstract: In this work we propose time-deniable signatures (TDS), a new primitive that facilitates deniable authentication in protocols such as DKIM-signed email. As with traditional signatures, TDS provide strong authenticity for message content, at least {\em for a sender-chosen period of time}. Once this time period has elapsed, however, time-deniable signatures can be forged by any party who obtains a signature. This forgery property ensures that signatures serve a useful authentication purpose for a bounded time period, while also allowing signers to plausibly disavow the creation of older signed content. Most critically, and unlike many past proposals for deniable authentication, TDS do not require interaction with the receiver or the deployment of any persistent cryptographic infrastructure or services beyond the signing process ( e.g., APIs to publish secrets or author timestamp certificates.) We first investigate the security definitions for time-deniability, demonstrating that past definition attempts are insufficient (and indeed, allow for broken signature schemes.) We then propose an efficient construction of TDS based on well-studied assumptions.
papers.title_zh: 可否认时间的签名
papers.abstract_zh: 在这项工作中，我们提出了时间可否认签名(TDS)，这是一个新的原语，有助于在协议中可否认的认证，如DKIM签名的电子邮件。与传统签名一样，TDS为消息内容提供了很强的真实性，至少在发送者选择的时间段内是如此。然而，一旦该时间段过去，获得签名的任何一方都可以伪造可否认时间的签名。这种伪造属性确保签名在有限的时间段内提供有用的认证目的，同时还允许签名者貌似有理地否认创建旧的签名内容。最关键的是，与过去许多可否认认证的提议不同，TDS不需要与接收者交互，也不需要部署签名过程之外的任何持久加密基础设施或服务(例如，发布秘密或作者时间戳证书的API)。)我们首先研究时间可否认性的安全定义，证明过去的定义尝试是不充分的(事实上，允许破坏签名方案。)然后，我们基于经过充分研究的假设，提出了一种有效的TDS结构。

papers.title: Lessons in VCR Repair: Compliance of Android App Developers with the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA)
papers.authors: Nikita Samarin, Shayna Kothari, Zaina Siyed, Oscar Bjorkman, Reena Yuan, Primal Wijesekera, Noura Alomar, Jordan Fischer, Chris Jay Hoofnagle, Serge Egelman
papers.abstract: The California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) provides California residents with a range of enhanced privacy protections and rights. Our research investigated the extent to which Android app developers comply with the provisions of the CCPA that require them to provide consumers with accurate privacy notices and respond to "verifiable consumer requests" (VCRs) by disclosing personal information that they have collected, used, or shared about consumers for a business or commercial purpose. We compared the actual network traffic of 109 apps that we believe must comply with the CCPA to the data that apps state they collect in their privacy policies and the data contained in responses to "right to know" requests that we submitted to the app's developers. Of the 69 app developers who substantively replied to our requests, all but one provided specific pieces of personal data (as opposed to only categorical information). However, a significant percentage of apps collected information that was not disclosed, including identifiers (55 apps, 80%), geolocation data (21 apps, 30%), and sensory data (18 apps, 26%) among other categories. We discuss improvements to the CCPA that could help app developers comply with "right to know" requests and other related regulations.
papers.title_zh: 录像机维修的教训:Android应用程序开发人员遵守加州消费者隐私法案(CCPA)
papers.abstract_zh: 《加州消费者隐私法》( CCPA)为加州居民提供了一系列增强的隐私保护和权利。我们的研究调查了Android应用程序开发人员在多大程度上遵守了CCPA的规定，该规定要求他们向消费者提供准确的隐私声明，并通过披露他们出于商业目的收集、使用或分享的消费者个人信息来回应“可验证的消费者请求”(vcr)。我们将我们认为必须遵守CCPA的109个应用程序的实际网络流量与应用程序在其隐私政策中声明收集的数据以及我们提交给应用程序开发者的“知情权”请求回复中包含的数据进行了比较。在对我们的请求做出实质性回复的69个应用程序开发者中，除了一个之外，所有人都提供了具体的个人数据(而不仅仅是分类信息)。然而，相当大比例的应用程序收集了未披露的信息，包括标识符(55个应用程序，80%)、地理位置数据(21个应用程序，30%)和感官数据(18个应用程序，26%)以及其他类别。我们讨论了对CCPA的改进，这些改进可以帮助应用程序开发人员遵守“知情权”要求和其他相关法规。

papers.title: CERTainty: Detecting DNS Manipulation at Scale using TLS Certificates
papers.authors: Elisa Tsai, Deepak Kumar, Ram Sundara Raman, Gavin Li, Yael Eiger, Roya Ensafi
papers.abstract: DNS manipulation is an increasingly common technique used by censors and other network adversaries to prevent users from accessing restricted Internet resources and hijack their connections. Prior work in detecting DNS manipulation relies largely on comparing DNS resolutions with trusted control results to identify inconsistencies. However, the emergence of CDNs and other cloud providers practicing content localization and load balancing leads to these heuristics being inaccurate, paving the need for more verifiable signals of DNS manipulation. In this paper, we develop a new technique, CERTainty, that utilizes the widely established TLS certificate ecosystem to accurately detect DNS manipulation, and obtain more information about the adversaries performing such manipulation. We find that untrusted certificates, mismatching hostnames, and blockpages are powerful proxies for detecting DNS manipulation. Our results show that previous work using consistency-based heuristics is inaccurate, allowing for 72.45% false positives in the cases detected as DNS manipulation. Further, we identify 17 commercial DNS filtering products in 52 countries, including products such as SafeDNS, SkyDNS, and Fortinet, and identify the presence of 55 ASes in 26 countries that perform ISP-level DNS manipulation. We also identify 226 new blockpage clusters that are not covered by previous research. We are integrating techniques used by CERTainty into active measurement platforms to continuously and accurately monitor DNS manipulation.
papers.title_zh: 确定性:使用TLS证书大规模检测DNS操纵
papers.abstract_zh: DNS操纵是审查者和其他网络对手越来越常用的技术，用来防止用户访问受限的互联网资源并劫持他们的连接。先前在检测DNS操纵方面的工作主要依赖于将DNS解析与可信控制结果进行比较来识别不一致性。然而，cdn和其他实践内容本地化和负载平衡的云提供商的出现导致这些试探法不准确，从而需要更多可验证的DNs操纵信号。在本文中，我们开发了一种新技术“确定性”,它利用广泛建立的TLS证书生态系统来准确检测DNS操纵，并获得有关执行此类操纵的对手的更多信息。我们发现不受信任的证书、不匹配的主机名和屏蔽页是检测DNS操纵的有力代理。我们的结果表明，以前使用基于一致性的启发式算法是不准确的，在检测为DNS操纵的情况下，允许72.45%的误报。此外，我们在52个国家/地区发现了17种商用DNS过滤产品，包括SafeDNS、SkyDNS和Fortinet等产品，并在26个国家/地区发现了55个执行ISP级别DNS操作的as。我们还确定了226个新的块页面集群，这些集群没有被先前的研究覆盖。我们正在将肯定性使用的技术集成到主动测量平台中，以持续准确地监控DNS操纵。

papers.title: Evolution of Composition, Readability, and Structure of Privacy Policies over Two Decades
papers.authors: Andrick Adhikari, Sanchari Das, Rinku Dewri
papers.abstract: Privacy policies outline data collection and sharing practices followed by an organization, together with choice and control measures available to users to manage the process. However, users have often needed help reading and understanding such documents, regardless of their being written in a natural language. The fundamental problems with privacy policies persist despite advancements in privacy design, frameworks, and regulations. To identify the causes of privacy policies being persistently challenging to comprehend, it is vital to investigate historical policy patterns and understand the evolution of privacy policies concerning information packaging and presentation. To this aid, we create a sentence-level classifier to conduct a large-scale longitudinal analysis on different privacy policies from 130,604 organizations, totaling approximately one million policies from 1997 to 2019. We annotate 10,717 sentences from 115 policies in the OPP-115 corpus to implement the classifier and then use those annotations to train the XLNet and BERT classifiers. Results from our analysis reveal that specific data practice categories experience more frequent policy changes than others, making it challenging to track relevant information over time. In addition, we discover that every category has distinct composition, readability, and structural issues, which exacerbate when categories frequently co-occur in a document. Based on our observations, we provide recommendations for policy articulation and revision to make privacy policy documents conform to better coherence and structure.
papers.title_zh: 二十年来隐私政策的组成、可读性和结构的演变
papers.abstract_zh: 隐私政策概述了组织遵循的数据收集和共享实践，以及用户可用于管理该过程的选择和控制措施。然而，用户经常需要帮助阅读和理解这样的文档，不管它们是用自然语言写的。尽管隐私设计、框架和法规有所进步，但隐私政策的基本问题依然存在。要找出隐私政策一直难以理解的原因，调查历史政策模式并了解与信息包装和呈现相关的隐私政策的演变是至关重要的。为此，我们创建了一个句子级分类器，对130，604个组织的不同隐私政策进行大规模纵向分析，从1997年到2019年总共约有一百万项政策。我们在OPP-115语料库中标注了来自115个策略的10，717个句子来实现分类器，然后使用这些标注来训练XLNet和BERT分类器。我们的分析结果显示，特定的数据实践类别比其他类别经历更频繁的政策变化，这使得随着时间的推移跟踪相关信息变得非常困难。此外，我们发现每个类别都有不同的组成、可读性和结构问题，当类别频繁地在文档中同时出现时，这些问题会更加严重。基于我们的观察，我们提供了政策表达和修订的建议，以使隐私政策文件符合更好的一致性和结构。

papers.title: SoK: New Insights into Fully Homomorphic Encryption Libraries via Standardized Benchmarks
papers.authors: Charles Gouert, Dimitris Mouris, Nektarios Georgios Tsoutsos
papers.abstract: Fully homomorphic encryption (FHE) enables arbitrary computation on encrypted data, allowing users to upload ciphertexts to cloud servers for computation while mitigating privacy risks. Many cryptographic schemes fall under the umbrella of FHE, and each scheme has several open-source implementations with its own strengths and weaknesses. Nevertheless, developers have no straightforward way to choose which FHE scheme and implementation is best suited for their application needs, especially considering that each scheme offers different security, performance, and usability guarantees. To allow programmers to effectively utilize the power of FHE, we employ a series of benchmarks called the Terminator 2 Benchmark Suite and present new insights gained from running these algorithms with a variety of FHE back - ends. Contrary to generic benchmarks that do not take into consideration the inherent challenges of encrypted computation, our methodology is tailored to the secure computational primitives of each target FHE implementation. To ensure fair comparisons, we developed a versatile compiler(called T2) that converts arbitrary benchmarks written in a domain - specific language into identical encrypted programs running on different popular FHE libraries as a backend.Our analysis exposes for the first time the advantages and disadvantages of each FHE library as well as the types of applications most suited for each computational domain(i.e., binary, integer, and floating - point).
papers.title_zh: SoK:通过标准化基准对全同态加密库的新见解
papers.abstract_zh: 全同态加密(FHE)支持对加密数据进行任意计算，允许用户将密文上传到云服务器进行计算，同时降低隐私风险。许多加密方案都属于FHE的范畴，每个方案都有几个开源实现，各有优缺点。然而，开发人员没有直接的方法来选择哪个FHE方案和实现最适合他们的应用程序需求，尤其是考虑到每个方案提供不同的安全性、性能和可用性保证。为了让程序员能够有效地利用FHE的能力，我们采用了一系列名为Terminator 2基准测试套件的基准测试，并展示了在各种FHE后端运行这些算法所获得的新见解。与不考虑加密计算固有挑战的通用基准相反，我们的方法是针对每个目标FHE实现的安全计算原语量身定制的。为了确保公平的比较，我们开发了一个多功能的编译器(称为T2 ),它可以将用特定领域语言编写的任意基准转换为运行在不同流行的FHE库上的相同的加密程序作为后端。我们的分析首次揭示了每个FHE库的优点和缺点，以及最适合每个计算域(即二进制、整数和浮点)的应用类型。

papers.title: Comparing Large-Scale Privacy and Security Notifications
papers.authors: Christine Utz, Matthias Michels, Martin Degeling, Ninja Marnau, Ben Stock
papers.abstract: Over the last decade, web security research has used notification campaigns as a tool to help web operators fix security problems or stop infrastructure abuse. First attempts at applying this approach to privacy issues focused on single services or vendors. Hence, little is known if notifications can also raise awareness and encourage remediation of more complex, vendor-independent violations of privacy legislation at scale, such as informed consent to cookie usage under the EU's ePrivacy Directive or the General Data Protection Regulation's requirement for a privacy policy. It is also unclear how privacy notifications perform and are perceived compared to those about security vulnerabilities. To fill this research gap, we conduct a large-scale, automated email notification study with more than 115K websites we notify about lack of a privacy policy, use of third-party cookies without or before informed consent, and input forms for personal data that do not use HTTPS. We investigate the impact of warnings about fines and compare the results with security notifications to more than 40K domains about openly accessible Git repositories. Based on our measurements and interactions with operators through email and a survey, we find that notifications about privacy issues are not as well received as security notifications. They result in lower fix rates, less incentive to take immediate action, and more negative feedback. Specific reasons include a lack of awareness and knowledge of privacy laws' applicability, difficulties to pinpoint the problem, and limited intrinsic motivation.
papers.title_zh: 比较大规模隐私和安全通知
papers.abstract_zh: 在过去的十年中，web安全研究将通知活动作为一种工具，帮助web运营商解决安全问题或阻止基础设施滥用。将这种方法应用于隐私问题的最初尝试集中在单个服务或供应商上。因此，很少有人知道通知是否也可以提高意识，并鼓励对更复杂、独立于供应商的大规模违反隐私立法的行为进行补救，例如根据欧盟的电子隐私指令或通用数据保护法规对隐私政策的要求对cookie的使用进行知情同意。与那些关于安全漏洞的通知相比，隐私通知是如何执行和被感知的也不清楚。为了填补这一研究空白，我们对超过115，000个网站进行了大规模的自动电子邮件通知研究，我们通知这些网站缺乏隐私政策，未经或事先知情同意使用第三方cookies，以及不使用HTTPS的个人数据输入表单。我们调查了罚款警告的影响，并将结果与超过40K个关于可公开访问的Git库的域的安全通知进行了比较。根据我们的测量以及通过电子邮件和调查与运营商的互动，我们发现关于隐私问题的通知不如安全通知那样受欢迎。它们导致更低固定利率、更少的立即采取行动的动机和更多的负面反馈。具体原因包括缺乏对隐私法适用性的认识和知识，难以查明问题，以及内在动机有限。

papers.title: RAVEN: Stateless Rapid IP Address Variation for Enterprise Networks
papers.authors: Liang Wang, Hyojoon Kim, Prateek Mittal, Jennifer Rexford
papers.abstract: Enterprise networks face increasing threats against the privacy of their clients. Existing enterprise services like Network Address Translation (NAT) offer limited privacy protection, at the cost of requiring per-flow state. In this paper, we introduce RAVEN (Rapid Address Variation for Enterprise Networks), a network-based privacy solution that is complementary to application-layer defenses. RAVEN protects privacy by frequently changing the client's public IP address. With RAVEN, a client is not limited to using a single IP address at a given time, or even for a given connection. RAVEN goes further, breaking the association between packets that belong to the same connection by frequently changing the client's IP address within a single connection. RAVEN achieves this through a novel division of labor: the client uses a transport protocol, like QUIC, that supports seamless connection migration, and decides when to switch its IP address, while the enterprise network actually changes the client's IP address in a stateless manner at line rate and ensures end-to-end packet delivery. We implement RAVEN using QUIC and off-the-shelf programmable switches. We deploy RAVEN in a test IPv6 network and evaluate its defense against webpage fingerprinting attacks. Even with a strong adversary, the average precision of the best adaptive attacks drops from 0.96 to 0.84, with a 0.5% degradation in client throughput. When RAVEN changes IP addresses at unpredictable frequency, the precision of the best attacks falls to 0.78---the same effectiveness as WTF-PAD.
papers.title_zh: RAVEN:企业网络的无状态快速IP地址变化
papers.abstract_zh: 企业网络面临着越来越多的针对客户隐私的威胁。像网络地址转换(NAT)这样的现有企业服务提供有限的隐私保护，代价是需要每个流的状态。在本文中，我们介绍了RAVEN(企业网络快速地址变化)，这是一种基于网络的隐私解决方案，是对应用层防御的补充。RAVEN通过频繁更改客户端的公共IP地址来保护隐私。有了RAVEN，客户端就不局限于在给定的时间使用单个IP地址，甚至不局限于给定的连接。RAVEN走得更远，通过在单个连接中频繁更改客户端的IP地址，打破了属于同一连接的数据包之间的关联。RAVEN通过一种新颖的分工来实现这一点:客户端使用一种支持无缝连接迁移的传输协议，如QUIC，并决定何时切换其IP地址，而企业网络实际上以无状态的方式以线路速率改变客户端的IP地址，并确保端到端的数据包传输。我们使用QUIC和现成的可编程开关来实现RAVEN。我们在一个测试IPv6网络中部署了RAVEN，并评估了它对网页指纹攻击的防御能力。即使面对强大的对手，最佳自适应攻击的平均精度也会从0.96下降到0.84，客户端吞吐量下降0.5%。当RAVEN以不可预测的频率改变IP地址时，最佳攻击的精度下降到0.78——与WTF-PAD的有效性相同。

papers.title: How to Combine Membership-Inference Attacks on Multiple Updated Machine Learning Models
papers.authors: Matthew Jagielski, Stanley Wu, Alina Oprea, Jonathan R. Ullman, Roxana Geambasu
papers.abstract: A large body of research has shown that machine learning models are vulnerable to membership inference (MI) attacks that violate the privacy of the participants in the training data. Most MI research focuses on the case of a single standalone model, while production machine-learning platforms often update models over time, on data that often shifts in distribution, giving the attacker more information. This paper proposes new attacks that take advantage of one or more model updates to improve MI. A key part of our approach is to leverage rich information from standalone MI attacks mounted separately against the original and updated models, and to combine this information in specific ways to improve attack effectiveness. We propose a set of combination functions and tuning methods for each, and present both analytical and quantitative justification for various options. Our results on four public datasets show that our attacks are effective at using update information to give the adversary a significant advantage over attacks on standalone models, but also compared to a prior MI attack that takes advantage of model updates in a related machine-unlearning setting. We perform the first measurements of the impact of distribution shift on MI attacks with model updates, and show that a more drastic distribution shift results in significantly higher MI risk than a gradual shift. We also show that our attacks are effective at auditing differentially private fine tuning. We make our code public on Github: https://github.com/stanleykywu/model-updates.
papers.title_zh: 如何在多个更新的机器学习模型上组合成员推理攻击
papers.abstract_zh: 大量研究表明，机器学习模型容易受到成员推理(MI)攻击，这种攻击侵犯了训练数据中参与者的隐私。大多数MI研究都集中在单个独立模型的情况下，而生产机器学习平台通常会随着时间的推移更新模型，数据通常会在分布中发生变化，从而为攻击者提供更多信息。本文提出了利用一个或多个模型更新来改进MI的新攻击。我们方法的一个关键部分是利用针对原始和更新型号单独发起的独立MI攻击的丰富信息，并以特定方式组合这些信息以提高攻击效率。我们提出了一套组合功能和调整方法，并提出了各种选择的分析和定量的理由。我们在四个公共数据集上的结果表明，我们的攻击在使用更新信息方面是有效的，使对手比在独立模型上的攻击具有显著的优势，但也与先前的MI攻击相比，MI攻击在相关的机器不学习设置中利用模型更新。我们通过模型更新对分布变化对心梗攻击的影响进行了首次测量，并表明更剧烈的分布变化比逐渐变化导致明显更高的心梗风险。我们还表明，我们的攻击是有效的审计差异私人微调。我们在Github:https://github.com/stanleykywu/model-updates.上公开我们的代码

papers.title: SenRev: Measurement of Personal Information Disclosure in Online Health Communities
papers.authors: Faysal Hossain Shezan, Minjun Long, David Hasani, Gang Wang, Yuan Tian
papers.abstract: With life style shifting during the pandemic, online health communities start to attract more users (including healthcare workers and patients) to discuss health-related questions. While such online platforms provide convenience to users, with health-related information shared broadly over text and images (e.g., X-Ray scans, photocopies of documents), they also raise questions regarding privacy. In this paper, we propose SenRev to systematically measure the leakages of sensitive information in those publicly available discussions. We use SenRev to analyze 1,894,900 multi-modal and multi-lingual data elements from four different online health communities. We find that sensitive data leakages are common; overall 1,324,064 (69.88%) pieces of evidence of data leakages are detected, with 23,587 (1.78%) of them involving identifiers and 1,300,477 (98.22%) involving quasi-identifiers. Surprisingly, leakages through medical images occur more frequently in the community of healthcare professionals compared with the other communities. Finally, based on our results, we discuss the potential directions for countermeasures.
papers.title_zh: SenRev:在线健康社区个人信息披露的测量
papers.abstract_zh: 随着疫情期间生活方式的转变，在线健康社区开始吸引更多用户(包括医护人员和患者)来讨论与健康相关的问题。虽然这种在线平台为用户提供了便利，通过文本和图像(如x光扫描、文件复印件)广泛分享健康相关信息，但它们也带来了隐私问题。在本文中，我们建议SenRev系统地测量这些公开讨论中敏感信息的泄漏。我们使用SenRev分析了来自四个不同在线健康社区的1，894，900个多模态和多语言数据元素。我们发现敏感数据泄露很常见；总共检测到1，324，064件(69.88%)数据泄露证据，其中23，587件(1.78%)涉及标识符，1，300，477件(98.22%)涉及准标识符。令人惊讶的是，与其他社区相比，通过医学图像的泄漏在医疗保健专业人员社区中更频繁地发生。最后，基于我们的结果，我们讨论了潜在的对策方向。

papers.title: "My face, my rules": Enabling Personalized Protection Against Unacceptable Face Editing
papers.authors: Zhujun Xiao, Jenna Cryan, Yuanshun Yao, Yi Hong Gordon Cheo, Yuanchao Shu, Stefan Saroiu, Ben Y. Zhao, Haitao Zheng
papers.abstract: Today, face editing is widely used to refine/alter photos in both professional and recreational settings. Yet it is also used to modify (and repost) existing online photos for cyberbullying. Our work considers an important open question: 'How can we support the collaborative use of face editing on social platforms while protecting against unacceptable edits and reposts by others?' This is challenging because, as our user study shows, users vary widely in their definition of what edits are (un)acceptable. Any global filter policy deployed by social platforms is unlikely to address the needs of all users, but hinders social interactions enabled by photo editing. Instead, we argue that face edit protection policies should be implemented by social platforms based on individual user preferences. When posting an original photo online, a user can choose to specify the types of face edits (dis)allowed on the photo. Social platforms use these per-photo edit policies to moderate future photo uploads, i.e., edited photos containing modifications that violate the original photo's policy are either blocked or shelved for user approval. Realizing this personalized protection, however, faces two immediate challenges: (1) how to accurately recognize specific modifications, if any, contained in a photo; and (2) how to associate an edited photo with its original photo (and thus the edit policy). We show that these challenges can be addressed by combining highly efficient hashing based image search and scalable semantic image comparison, and build a prototype protector (Alethia) covering nine edit types. Evaluations using IRB-approved user studies and data-driven experiments (on 839K face photos) show that Alethia accurately recognizes edited photos that violate user policies and induces a feeling of protection to study participants. This demonstrates the initial feasibility of personalized face edit protection. We also discuss current limitations and future directions to push the concept forward.
papers.title_zh: “我的脸，我的规则”:针对不可接受的面部编辑启用个性化保护
papers.abstract_zh: 今天，面部编辑广泛用于在专业和娱乐环境中改进/改变照片。然而，它也被用来修改(和转发)现有的网络欺凌照片。我们的工作考虑了一个重要的开放性问题:“我们如何支持社交平台上面部编辑的协作使用，同时防止他人不可接受的编辑和转发？”这很有挑战性，因为正如我们的用户研究显示的，用户对于什么样的编辑是(不)可接受的定义有很大的不同。社交平台部署的任何全局过滤器政策都不可能满足所有用户的需求，而是会阻碍照片编辑实现的社交互动。相反，我们认为面部编辑保护政策应该由社交平台根据个人用户偏好来实施。当在线发布原始照片时，用户可以选择指定照片上允许的面部编辑类型。社交平台使用这些每张照片的编辑政策来调节未来的照片上传，即，包含违反原始照片政策的修改的编辑过的照片被阻止或搁置，以供用户批准。然而，实现这种个性化保护面临两个直接的挑战:(1)如何准确地识别照片中包含的特定修改，如果有的话；以及(2)如何将编辑过的照片与其原始照片(以及编辑策略)相关联。我们证明了这些挑战可以通过结合高效的基于哈希的图像搜索和可扩展的语义图像比较来解决，并建立了一个覆盖九种编辑类型的原型保护器(Alethia)。使用IRB批准的用户研究和数据驱动实验(在839K人脸照片上)进行的评估表明，Alethia能够准确识别违反用户政策的编辑过的照片，并诱导研究参与者产生保护感。这证明了个性化面部编辑保护的初步可行性。我们还讨论了当前的限制和未来的方向，以推动这一概念向前发展。

papers.title: Examining the Hydra: Simultaneously Shared Links in Tor and the Effects on its Performance
papers.authors: Sebastian Pahl, Florian Adamsky, Daniel Kaiser, Thomas Engel
papers.abstract: Tor is a popular privacy-enhancing technology that allows anonymous communication using onion routing. However, such technologies are only helpful if used; therefore, performance is an important aspect. One of the main performance bottlenecks of Tor is the cross-circuit interference (CCI) problem. Tor multiplexes multiple circuits over a single Transport Layer Security (TLS) 1.2 connection if they share a path segment (link). Therefore, they have the same congestion window, which can yield unfair bandwidth allocation. However, there has been little work in understanding this problem in more depth. This paper investigates the number of simultaneously shared links in the current Tor network, which are the root cause of CCI. We developed a novel shared links simulator called SALSA to investigate this problem. Our results show that 3.7 % of active links are shared, and the involving Onion Routers (ORs) have the most common bandwidth capabilities. Additionally, we show that the internal circuits and exit policy influence the CCI problem. Furthermore, we model the number of shared links when the demand grows further and show that the number of shared links can go up to 16 %. Finally, we run Shadow simulations with a 25 % down-scaled Tor network and show that a network without shared links is faster.
papers.title_zh: 检查Hydra:Tor中同时共享的链接以及对其性能的影响
papers.abstract_zh: Tor是一种流行的隐私增强技术，允许使用洋葱路由进行匿名通信。然而，这样的技术只有在使用时才有帮助；所以性能是一个重要的方面。Tor的主要性能瓶颈之一是跨线路干扰(CCI)问题。如果多个电路共享一个路径段(链路)，Tor会在单个传输层安全性(TLS) 1.2连接上多路复用这些电路。因此，它们具有相同的拥塞窗口，这会产生不公平的带宽分配。然而，在更深入地理解这个问题方面几乎没有什么工作。本文调查了当前Tor网络中同时共享的链路数量，这是CCI的根本原因。我们开发了一个新颖的共享链接模拟器SALSA来研究这个问题。我们的结果显示，3.7 %的活动链路是共享的，涉及的洋葱路由器(ORs)具有最常见的带宽能力。此外，我们表明，内部电路和退出政策影响CCI问题。此外，当需求进一步增长时，我们对共享链接的数量进行建模，并显示共享链接的数量可以达到16 %。最后，我们用25 %缩减的Tor网络运行阴影模拟，并显示没有共享链路的网络更快。

papers.title: SoK: Membership Inference is Harder Than Previously Thought
papers.authors: Antreas Dionysiou, Elias Athanasopoulos
papers.abstract: Membership Inference Attacks (MIAs) can be conducted based on specific settings/assumptions and experience different limitations. In this paper, first, we provide a systematization of knowledge for all representative MIAs found in the literature. Second, we empirically evaluate and compare the MIA success rates achieved on Machine Learning (ML) models trained with some of the most common generalization techniques. Third, we examine the contribution of potential data leaks to successful MIAs. Fourth, we examine if the depth of Artificial Neural Networks (ANNs) affects MIA success rate and to what extent. For the experimental analysis, we focus solely on well-generalizable target models (various architectures trained on multiple datasets), having only black-box access to them. Our results suggest the following: (a) MIAs on well-generalizable targets suffer from significant limitations which undermine their practicality, (b) common generalization techniques result in ML models which are comparably robust against MIAs, (c) data leaks, although effective for overfitted models, do not facilitate MIAs in case of well-generalizable targets, (d) deep ANN architectures are not more vulnerable to MIAs compared to shallower ones or the opposite, and (e) well-generalizable models can be robust against MIAs even when not achieving state-of-the-art performance.
papers.title_zh: SoK:成员推断比之前想象的要难
papers.abstract_zh: 成员推理攻击(mia)可以基于特定的设置/假设进行，并经历不同的限制。在这篇论文中，首先，我们为在文献中发现的所有有代表性的mia提供一个知识的系统化。第二，我们根据经验评估和比较在用一些最常见的泛化技术训练的机器学习(ML)模型上实现的MIA成功率。第三，我们检查潜在的数据泄漏对成功的mia的贡献。第四，我们研究了人工神经网络的深度是否影响MIA的成功率，以及影响的程度。对于实验分析，我们只关注可概括的目标模型(在多个数据集上训练的各种架构)，只有对它们的黑盒访问。我们的结果表明:(a)良好概括的目标上的mia受到显著的限制，这破坏了它们的实用性，(b)普通的概括技术导致ML模型相对于mia是鲁棒的，(c)数据泄漏，尽管对于过度拟合的模型是有效的，但在良好概括的目标的情况下不便于mia，(d)与较浅的或相反的情况相比，深度ANN架构并不更容易受到mia的攻击，以及(e)良好概括的模型即使在没有达到最先进的性能时也可以对mia是鲁棒的。

papers.title: Losing Less: A Loss for Differentially Private Deep Learning
papers.authors: Ali Shahin Shamsabadi, Nicolas Papernot
papers.abstract: Differentially Private Stochastic Gradient Descent, DP-SGD, is the canonical approach to training deep neural networks with guarantees of Differential Privacy (DP). However, the modifications DP-SGD introduces to vanilla gradient descent negatively impact the accuracy of deep neural networks. In this paper, we are the first to observe that some of this performance can be recovered when training with a loss tailored to DP-SGD; we challenge cross-entropy as the de facto loss for deep learning with DP. Specifically, we introduce a loss combining three terms: the summed squared error, the focal loss, and a regularization penalty. The first term encourages learning with faster convergence. The second term emphasizes hard-to-learn examples in the later stages of training. Both are beneficial because the privacy cost of learning increases with every step of DP-SGD. The third term helps control the sensitivity of learning, decreasing the bias introduced by gradient clipping in DP-SGD. Using our loss function, we achieve new state-of-the-art tradeoffs between privacy and accuracy on MNIST, FashionMNIST, and CIFAR10. Most importantly, we improve the accuracy of DP-SGD on CIFAR10 by 4% for a DP guarantee of 𝜀 = 3.
papers.title_zh: 损失更少:差异私人深度学习的损失
papers.abstract_zh: 差分隐私随机梯度下降(DP-SGD)是训练具有差分隐私(DP)保证的深度神经网络的规范方法。然而，DP-SGD对标准梯度下降的修改对深度神经网络的精度产生了负面影响。在这篇论文中，我们首次观察到，当根据DP-SGD调整损失进行训练时，这种性能可以部分恢复；我们质疑交叉熵是用DP进行深度学习的事实损失。具体来说，我们引入了一个结合了三项的损失:误差平方和、聚焦损失和正则化损失。第一个术语鼓励以更快的收敛速度学习。第二学期强调训练后期难学的例子。两者都是有益的，因为学习的隐私成本随着DP-SGD的每一步而增加。第三项有助于控制学习的灵敏度，减少DP-SGD中由梯度削波引入的偏差。使用我们的损失函数，我们在MNIST、FashionMNIST和CIFAR10上实现了隐私和准确性之间的最新折衷。最重要的是，对于𝜀 = 3的DP保证，我们在CIFAR10上将DP-SGD的准确性提高了4%。

papers.title: Convolutions in Overdrive: Maliciously Secure Convolutions for MPC
papers.authors: Marc Rivinius, Pascal Reisert, Sebastian Hasler, Ralf Küsters
papers.abstract: Machine learning (ML) has seen a strong rise in popularity in recent years and has become an essential tool for research and industrial applications. Given the large amount of high quality data needed and the often sensitive nature of ML data, privacy-preserving collaborative ML is of increasing importance. In this paper, we introduce new actively secure multiparty computation (MPC) protocols which are specially optimized for privacy-preserving machine learning applications. We concentrate on the optimization of (tensor) convolutions which belong to the most commonly used components in ML architectures, especially in convolutional neural networks but also in recurrent neural networks or transformers, and therefore have a major impact on the overall performance. Our approach is based on a generalized form of structured randomness that speeds up convolutions in a fast online phase. The structured randomness is generated with homomorphic encryption using adapted and newly constructed packing methods for convolutions, which might be of independent interest. Overall our protocols extend the state-of-the-art Overdrive family of protocols (Keller et al., EUROCRYPT 2018). We implemented our protocols on-top of MP-SPDZ (Keller, CCS 2020) resulting in a full-featured implementation with support for faster convolutions. Our evaluation shows that our protocols outperform state-of-the-art actively secure MPC protocols on ML tasks like evaluating ResNet50 by a factor of 3 or more. Benchmarks for depthwise convolutions show order-of-magnitude speed-ups compared to existing approaches.
papers.title_zh: 超速行驶中的卷积:恶意保护MPC的卷积
papers.abstract_zh: 机器学习(ML)近年来越来越受欢迎，已经成为研究和工业应用的重要工具。考虑到大量高质量数据的需求和ML数据的敏感性，隐私保护的协作ML变得越来越重要。在本文中，我们介绍了新的主动安全多方计算(MPC)协议，这些协议是专门为保护隐私的机器学习应用而优化的。我们专注于(张量)卷积的优化，它属于ML架构中最常用的组件，尤其是在卷积神经网络中，但也在递归神经网络或变换器中，因此对整体性能有重大影响。我们的方法是基于一种广义形式的结构随机性，在快速在线阶段加速卷积。结构化的随机性是利用同态加密来生成的，该同态加密使用了适用的和新构造的卷积打包方法，这可能是独立感兴趣的。总的来说，我们的协议扩展了最先进的Overdrive系列协议(Keller等人，EUROCRYPT 2018)。我们在MP-SPDZ (Keller，CCS 2020)之上实现了我们的协议，从而实现了支持更快卷积的全功能实现。我们的评估表明，在评估ResNet50等ML任务上，我们的协议优于最先进的主动安全MPC协议3倍或更多。与现有方法相比，深度方向卷积的基准显示了数量级的加速。

papers.title: VESPo: Verified Evaluation of Secret Polynomials (with application to dynamic proofs of retrievability)
papers.authors: Jean-Guillaume Dumas, Aude Maignan, Clément Pernet, Daniel S. Roche
papers.abstract: Proofs of Retrievability are protocols which allow a Client to store data remotely and to efficiently ensure, via audits, that the entirety of that data is still intact. Dynamic Proofs of Retrievability (DPoR) also support efficient retrieval and update of any small portion of the data. We propose a novel protocol for arbitrary outsourced data storage that achieves both low remote storage size and audit complexity. A key ingredient, that can be also of intrinsic interest, reduces to efficiently evaluating a secret polynomial at given public points, when the (encrypted) polynomial is stored on an untrusted Server. The Server performs the evaluations and also returns associated certificates. A Client can check that the evaluations are correct using the certificates and some pre-computed keys, more efficiently than re-evaluating the polynomial. Our protocols support two important features: the polynomial itself can be encrypted on the Server, and it can be dynamically updated by changing individual coefficients cheaply without redoing the entire setup. Our methods rely on linearly homomorphic encryption and pairings, and our implementation shows good performance for polynomial evaluations with millions of coefficients, and efficient DPoR with terabytes of data. For instance, for a 1TB database, compared to the state of art, we can reduce the Client storage by 5000x, communication size by 20x, and client-side audit time by 2x, at the cost of one order of magnitude increase in server-side audit time.
papers.title_zh: VESPo:秘密多项式的验证评估(应用于可检索性的动态证明)
papers.abstract_zh: 可检索性证明是允许客户远程存储数据并通过审计有效确保数据完整性的协议。可检索性的动态证明(DPoR)也支持任何小部分数据的有效检索和更新。我们提出了一个新的协议，用于任意外包数据存储，实现低远程存储大小和审计复杂性。当(加密的)多项式存储在不可信的服务器上时，一个关键因素(也可能是内在的兴趣)降低到在给定的公共点有效地评估秘密多项式。服务器执行评估并返回相关的证书。客户端可以使用证书和一些预先计算的密钥来检查评估是否正确，这比重新评估多项式更有效。我们的协议支持两个重要特性:多项式本身可以在服务器上加密，并且可以通过廉价地改变单个系数来动态更新，而无需重新进行整个设置。我们的方法依赖于线性同态加密和配对，并且我们的实现对于具有数百万系数的多项式求值表现出良好的性能，并且对于万亿字节的数据表现出高效的DPoR。例如，对于1TB的数据库，与现有技术相比，我们可以将客户端存储减少5000倍，通信大小减少20倍，客户端审计时间减少2倍，代价是服务器端审计时间增加一个数量级。

papers.title: DPrio: Efficient Differential Privacy with High Utility for Prio
papers.authors: Dana Keeler, Chelsea Komlo, Emily Lepert, Shannon Veitch, Xi He
papers.abstract: Private data collection systems such as Prio ensure data privacy by distributing trust among a set of mutually trusted parties, to allow for aggregate data collection without disclosing any single client's data in the clear. While systems like Prio are undergoing widespread interest and adoption, these systems lack efficient mechanisms to provide differential privacy guarantees. In this work, we present a lightweight method that we call DPrio to augment Prio and related systems with differential privacy assurances while ensuring higher data utility than existing noise generation protocols. We compare our results against four related constructions in the literature, and identify how DPrio achieves improved data utility relative to the assumed number of dishonest clients and servers, with only minimal (and batchable) server communication overhead. We present several case studies and discuss considerations for real-world implementations.
papers.title_zh: DP Rio:Prio的高效高效用差分隐私
papers.abstract_zh: Prio等私人数据收集系统通过在一组相互信任的各方之间分配信任来确保数据隐私，从而允许在不公开任何单个客户数据的情况下进行汇总数据收集。虽然像Prio这样的系统正受到广泛的关注和采用，但这些系统缺乏有效的机制来提供不同的隐私保证。在这项工作中，我们提出了一种轻量级的方法，我们称之为DPrio，以增强Prio和相关系统的差分隐私保证，同时确保比现有的噪声生成协议更高的数据利用率。我们将我们的结果与文献中的四个相关结构进行比较，并确定DPrio如何实现相对于假定数量的不诚实客户端和服务器的改进的数据效用，并且仅具有最小的(和可批处理的)服务器通信开销。我们展示了几个案例研究，并讨论了现实世界实现的注意事项。

papers.title: Blocking JavaScript Without Breaking the Web: An Empirical Investigation
papers.authors: Abdul Haddi Amjad, Zubair Shafiq, Muhammad Ali Gulzar
papers.abstract: Modern websites heavily rely on JavaScript (JS) to implement legitimate functionality as well as privacy-invasive advertising and tracking. Browser extensions such as NoScript block any script not loaded by a trusted list of endpoints, thus hoping to block privacy-invasive scripts while avoiding breaking legitimate website functionality. In this paper, we investigate whether blocking JS on the web is feasible without breaking legitimate functionality. To this end, we conduct a large-scale measurement study of JS blocking on 100K websites. We evaluate the effectiveness of different JS blocking strategies in tracking prevention and functionality breakage. Our evaluation relies on quantitative analysis of network requests and resource loads as well as manual qualitative analysis of visual breakage. First, we show that while blocking all scripts is quite effective at reducing tracking, it significantly degrades functionality on approximately two-thirds of the tested websites. Second, we show that selective blocking of a subset of scripts based on a curated list achieves a better trade-off. However, there remain approximately 15% “mixed” scripts, which essentially merge tracking and legitimate functionality and thus cannot be blocked without causing website breakage. Finally, we show that fine-grained blocking of a subset of JS methods, instead of scripts, reduces major breakage by 3.8× while providing the same level of tracking prevention. Our work highlights the promise and open challenges in fine-grained JS blocking for tracking prevention without breaking the web.
papers.title_zh: 阻断JavaScript而不破坏网络:一项实证研究
papers.abstract_zh: 现代网站严重依赖JavaScript (JS)来实现合法功能以及侵犯隐私的广告和跟踪。浏览器扩展(如NoScript)会阻止任何未被可信端点列表加载的脚本，从而希望阻止侵犯隐私的脚本，同时避免破坏合法的网站功能。在本文中，我们调查了在不破坏合法功能的情况下，在web上阻止JS是否可行。为此，我们对100K个网站进行了大规模的JS封杀测量研究。我们评估了不同JS阻塞策略在跟踪预防和功能破坏方面的有效性。我们的评估依赖于对网络请求和资源负载的定量分析，以及对视觉破坏的手动定性分析。首先，我们表明，虽然屏蔽所有脚本在减少跟踪方面非常有效，但它显著降低了大约三分之二的测试网站的功能。第二，我们证明了基于精选列表的脚本子集的选择性阻塞实现了更好的折衷。然而，仍有大约15%的“混合”脚本，它们本质上合并了跟踪和合法功能，因此无法在不导致网站崩溃的情况下被阻止。最后，我们展示了对JS方法子集的细粒度阻止，而不是脚本，在提供相同级别的跟踪预防的同时，将主要破坏减少了3.8倍。我们的工作强调了细粒度JS阻止在不破坏网络的情况下进行跟踪预防的前景和公开挑战。

papers.title: Data Security on the Ground: Investigating Technical and Legal Requirements under the GDPR
papers.authors: Tina Marjanov, Maria Konstantinou, Magdalena Józwiak, Dayana Spagnuelo
papers.abstract: The GDPR has been in force since 2018, but there is still uncertainty about how to comply with several of its provisions, including Article 32 which sets forth the requirements for data security. While scholars in this field have previously analysed the law or the industry standards, we use the fines imposed so far for violation of Article 32 as our primary data. We annotate and analyse technical and legal aspects of a representative subset of cases. Using clustering, four groups of cases with distinct characteristics emerge from our research. Three of the four groups of cases suffer from data incidents, but for different reasons: a targeted attack, non-technical human mistakes, or a combination of mistakes. The final group includes cases where no actual data incident happened, but fines were still imposed due to insufficient organisational measures and high risk or imminent harm to the data subjects. We uncover from the cases different measures that apply to each of the groups, ranging from compliance with the highest industry standards to organisational measures and enhanced internal privacy awareness.
papers.title_zh: 地面数据安全:调查GDPR的技术和法律要求
papers.abstract_zh: 《GDPR》自2018年起生效，但如何遵守其中的几项规定仍存在不确定性，包括规定数据安全要求的第32条。虽然这一领域的学者以前分析过法律或行业标准，但我们使用迄今为止对违反第32条的罚款作为我们的主要数据。我们注释和分析了一些典型案例的技术和法律方面。通过聚类，我们的研究中出现了四组具有不同特征的案例。四组案例中有三组遭遇数据事件，但原因不同:有针对性的攻击、非技术性的人为错误或错误的组合。最后一组包括没有发生实际数据事件，但由于组织措施不足以及对数据主体的高风险或迫在眉睫的伤害而仍然被处以罚款的情况。我们从这些案例中发现了适用于每个团队的不同措施，从遵守最高行业标准到组织措施和增强内部隐私意识。

papers.title: Differential Privacy for Black-Box Statistical Analyses
papers.authors: Nitin Kohli, Paul Laskowski
papers.abstract: We formalize a notion of a privacy wrapper, defined as an algorithm that can take an arbitrary and untrusted script and produce an output with differential privacy guarantees. Our novel privacy wrapper, named TAHOE, incorporates two design ideas: a type of stability under subsetting, and randomization over subset size. We show that TAHOE imposes differential privacy for every possible script. When the data alphabet is finite and small enough, TAHOE can be practically run on a single computer. Performance simulations show that TAHOE has greater accuracy than a benchmark algorithm based on a subsample-and-aggregate approach for certain scenarios and parameter values.
papers.title_zh: 黑盒统计分析的差分隐私
papers.abstract_zh: 我们形式化了隐私包装器的概念，隐私包装器被定义为一种算法，它可以采用任意的、不可信的脚本，并产生具有不同隐私保证的输出。我们的新的隐私包装器，命名为TAHOE，结合了两个设计思想:一种子集下的稳定性，以及子集大小上的随机化。我们证明了TAHOE为每一个可能的脚本强加了不同的隐私。当数据字母表有限且足够小时，TAHOE实际上可以在单台计算机上运行。性能模拟表明，对于某些场景和参数值，TAHOE比基于子采样-聚集方法的基准算法具有更高的准确性。

papers.title: Secure and Accurate Summation of Many Floating-Point Numbers
papers.authors: Marina Blanton, Michael T. Goodrich, Chen Yuan
papers.abstract: Motivated by the importance of floating-point computations, we study the problem of securely and accurately summing many floating-point numbers. Prior work has focused on security absent accuracy or accuracy absent security, whereas our approach achieves both of them. Specifically, we show how to implement floating-point superaccumulators using secure multi-party computation techniques, so that a number of participants holding secret shares of floating-point numbers can accurately compute their sum while keeping the individual values private.
papers.title_zh: 许多浮点数的安全而精确的求和
papers.abstract_zh: 由于浮点计算的重要性，我们研究了安全和准确地对许多浮点数求和的问题。先前的工作集中于缺乏准确性的安全性或缺乏安全性的准确性，而我们的方法实现了这两者。具体来说，我们展示了如何使用安全多方计算技术实现浮点超级累加器，以便持有浮点数秘密份额的多个参与者可以准确计算它们的总和，同时保持单个值的私密性。

papers.title: Private Collection Matching Protocols
papers.authors: Kasra Edalatnejad, Mathilde Raynal, Wouter Lueks, Carmela Troncoso
papers.abstract: We introduce Private Collection Matching (PCM) problems, in which a client aims to determine whether a collection of sets owned by a server matches their interests. Existing privacy-preserving cryptographic primitives cannot solve PCM problems efficiently without harming privacy. We propose a modular framework that enables designers to build privacy-preserving PCM systems that output one bit: whether a collection of server sets matches the client's set. The communication cost of our protocols scales linearly with the size of the client's set and is independent of the number of server elements. We demonstrate the potential of our framework by designing and implementing novel solutions for two real-world PCM problems: determining whether a dataset has chemical compounds of interest, and determining whether a document collection has relevant documents. Our evaluation shows that we offer a privacy gain with respect to existing works at a reasonable communication and computation cost.
papers.title_zh: 私有集合匹配协议
papers.abstract_zh: 我们介绍了私有集合匹配(PCM)问题，其中客户的目标是确定服务器拥有的集合是否匹配他们的兴趣。现有的保护隐私的密码原语不能在不损害隐私的情况下有效地解决PCM问题。我们提出了一个模块化的框架，使设计者能够构建保护隐私的PCM系统，该系统输出一个比特:服务器集的集合是否与客户机集匹配。我们的协议的通信成本与客户端集的大小成线性比例，并且与服务器元素的数量无关。我们通过为两个现实世界的PCM问题设计和实现新颖的解决方案来展示我们的框架的潜力:确定数据集是否具有感兴趣的化学化合物，以及确定文档集合是否具有相关文档。我们的评估表明，我们以合理的通信和计算成本提供了相对于现有作品的隐私增益。

papers.title: A Method for Securely Comparing Integers using Binary Trees
papers.authors: Anselme Tueno, Jonas Janneck, David Boehm
papers.abstract: In this paper, we propose a new protocol for secure integer comparison which consists of parties having each a private integer. The goal of the computation is to compare both integers securely and reveal to the parties a single bit that tells which integer is larger. Nothing more should be revealed. To achieve a low communication overhead, this can be done by using homomorphic encryption (HE). Our protocol relies on binary decision trees that is a special case of branching programs and can be implemented using HE. We assume a client-server setting where each party holds one of the integers, the client also holds the private key of a homomorphic encryption scheme and the evaluation is done by the server. In this setting, our protocol outperforms the original DGK protocol of Damgård et al. and reduces the running time by at least 45%. In the case where both inputs are encrypted, our scheme reduces the running time of a variant of DGK by 63%.
papers.title_zh: 一种使用二叉树安全比较整数的方法
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们提出了一个新的安全整数比较协议，该协议由拥有私有整数的多方组成。计算的目标是安全地比较两个整数，并向双方显示一个比特，告诉他们哪个整数更大。没什么可透露的了。为了实现低通信开销，这可以通过使用同态加密(HE)来实现。我们的协议依赖于二叉决策树，它是分支程序的一个特例，可以用HE来实现。我们假设客户端-服务器设置，其中每一方持有一个整数，客户端也持有同态加密方案的私钥，并且评估由服务器完成。在这种情况下，我们的协议优于Damgå rd等人的原始DGK协议，并将运行时间减少了至少45%。在两个输入都被加密的情况下，我们的方案将一个DGK变体的运行时间减少了63%。

papers.title: Practical Delegatable Anonymous Credentials From Equivalence Class Signatures
papers.authors: Omid Mir, Daniel Slamanig, Balthazar Bauer, René Mayrhofer
papers.abstract: Anonymous credentials (ACs) systems are a powerful cryptographic tool for privacy-preserving applications and provide strong user privacy guarantees for authentication and access control. ACs allow users to prove possession of attributes encoded in a credential without revealing any information beyond them. A delegatable AC (DAC) system is an enhanced AC system that allows the owners of credentials to delegate the obtained credential to other users. This allows to model hierarchies as usually encountered within public-key infrastructures (PKIs). DACs also provide stronger privacy guarantees than traditional AC systems since the identities of issuers and delegators can also be hidden. In this paper we present a novel DAC scheme that supports attributes, provides anonymity for delegations, allows the delegators to restrict further delegations, and also comes with an efficient construction. Our approach builds on a new primitive that we call structure-preserving signatures on equivalence classes on updatable commitments (SPSEQ-UC). The high-level idea is to use a special signature scheme that can sign vectors of set commitments, where signatures can be extended by additional set commitments. Signatures additionally include a user's public key, which can be switched. This allows us to efficiently realize delegation in the DAC. Similar to conventional SPSEQ, the signatures and messages can be publicly randomized and thus allow unlinkable delegation and showings in the DAC system. We present further optimizations such as cross-set commitment aggregation that, in combination, enable efficient selective showing of attributes in the DAC without using costly zero-knowledge proofs. We present an efficient instantiation that is proven to be secure in the generic group model and finally demonstrate the practical efficiency of our DAC by presenting performance benchmarks based on an implementation.
papers.title_zh: 等价类签名中实用的可委托匿名证书
papers.abstract_zh: 匿名证书(ACs)系统是隐私保护应用程序的强大加密工具，为身份验证和访问控制提供了强大的用户隐私保证。ACs允许用户证明拥有凭证中编码的属性，而不泄露任何其他信息。可委派AC (DAC)系统是一种增强的AC系统，它允许凭证的所有者将获得的凭证委派给其他用户。这允许对公钥基础设施(PKI)中经常遇到的层次结构进行建模。DAC还提供了比传统AC系统更强的隐私保证，因为发布者和委托者的身份也可以被隐藏。在本文中，我们提出了一个新颖的DAC方案，它支持属性，为委托提供匿名性，允许委托人限制进一步的委托，并且具有高效的结构。我们的方法建立在一个新的原语上，我们称之为可更新承诺等价类上的结构保持签名(SPSEQ-UC)。高层次的想法是使用一个特殊的签名方案，它可以对集合承诺的向量进行签名，其中签名可以通过附加的集合承诺进行扩展。签名还包括用户的公钥，该公钥是可以转换的。这允许我们在DAC中有效地实现委托。类似于传统的SPSEQ，签名和消息可以公开随机化，从而允许DAC系统中不可链接的委托和显示。我们提出了进一步的优化，例如交叉集承诺聚合，这两者相结合，能够在DAC中有效地选择性显示属性，而无需使用昂贵的零知识证明。我们提出了一个有效的实例化，它在通用组模型中被证明是安全的，最后通过提出基于实现的性能基准来展示我们的DAC的实际效率。

papers.title: Editors' Introduction
papers.authors: Kostas Chatzikokolakis, Aaron Johnson
papers.abstract: Is there currently a crisis of confidence in psychological science reflecting an unprecedented level of doubt among practitioners about the reliability of research findings in the field? It would certainly appear that there is. These doubts emerged and grew as a series of unhappy events unfolded in 2011: the Diederik Stapel fraud case (see Stroebe, Postmes, & Spears, 2012, this issue), the publication in a major social psychology journal of an article purporting to show evidence of extrasensory perception (Bem, 2011) followed by widespread public mockery (see Galak, LeBoeuf, Nelson, & Simmons, in press; Wagenmakers, Wetzels, Borsboom, & van der Maas, 2011), reports by Wicherts and colleagues that psychologists are often unwilling or unable to share their published data for reanalysis (Wicherts, Bakker, & Molenaar, 2011; see also Wicherts, Borsboom, Kats, & Molenaar, 2006), and the publication of an important article in Psychological Science showing how easily researchers can, in the absence of any real effects, nonetheless obtain statistically significant differences through various questionable research practices (QRPs) such as exploring multiple dependent variables or covariates and only reporting these when they yield significant results (Simmons, Nelson, & Simonsohn, 2011). For those psychologists who expected that the embarrassments of 2011 would soon recede into memory, 2012 offered instead a quick plunge from bad to worse, with new indications of outright fraud in the field of social cognition (Simonsohn, 2012), an article in Psychological Science showing that many psychologists admit to engaging in at least some of the QRPs examined by Simmons and colleagues (John, Loewenstein, & Prelec, 2012), troubling new meta-analytic evidence suggesting that the QRPs described by Simmons and colleagues may even be leaving telltale signs visible in the distribution of p values in the psychological literature (Masicampo & Lalande, in press; Simonsohn, 2012), and an acrimonious dust-up in science magazines and blogs centered around the problems some investigators were having in replicating well-known results from the field of social cognition (Bower, 2012; Yong, 2012). Although the very public problems experienced by psychology over this 2-year period are embarrassing to those of us working in the field, some have found comfort in the fact that, over the same period, similar concerns have been arising across the scientific landscape (triggered by revelations that will be described shortly). Some of the suspected causes of unreplicability, such as publication bias (the tendency to publish only positive findings) have been discussed for years; in fact, the phrase file-drawer problem was first coined by a distinguished psychologist several decades ago (Rosenthal, 1979). However, many have speculated that these problems have been exacerbated in recent years as academia reaps the harvest of a hypercompetitive academic climate and an incentive scheme that provides rich rewards for overselling one’s work and few rewards at all for caution and circumspection (see Giner-Sorolla, 2012, this issue). Equally disturbing, investigators seem to be replicating each others’ work even less often than they did in the past, again presumably reflecting an incentive scheme gone askew (a point discussed in several articles in this issue, e.g., Makel, Plucker, & Hegarty, 2012). The frequency with which errors appear in the psychological literature is not presently known, but a number of facts suggest it might be disturbingly high. Ioannidis (2005) has shown through simple mathematical modeling that any scientific field that ignores replication can easily come to the miserable state wherein (as the title of his most famous article puts it) “most published research findings are false” (see also Ioannidis, 2012, this issue, and Pashler & Harris, 2012, this issue). Meanwhile, reports emerging from cancer research have made such grim scenarios seem more plausible: In 2012, several large pharmaceutical companies revealed that their efforts to replicate exciting preclinical findings from published academic studies in cancer biology were only rarely verifying the original results (Begley & Ellis, 2012; see also Osherovich, 2011; Prinz, Schlange, & Asadullah, 2011).
papers.abstract_zh: 目前心理科学是否出现了信任危机，反映出从业者对该领域研究结果的可靠性产生了前所未有的怀疑？显然是有的。随着2011年一系列不愉快事件的发生，这些怀疑出现了，并有所增长:Diederik Stapel欺诈案(见Stroebe，Postmes，& Spears，2012，这一期)，在一份主要的社会心理学杂志上发表了一篇文章，声称显示了超感知觉的证据(Bem，2011)，随后受到了广泛的公开嘲笑(见Galak，LeBoeuf，Nelson，& Simmons，正在出版中；Wagenmakers，Wetzels，Borsboom，& van der Maas，2011)，Wicherts及其同事报告说，心理学家往往不愿意或不能分享他们发表的数据进行再分析(Wicherts，Bakker，& Molenaar，2011；另见Wicherts，Borsboom，Kats，& Molenaar，2006)，以及发表在《心理科学》上的一篇重要文章，该文章表明，在没有任何实际影响的情况下，研究人员可以通过各种有问题的研究实践(qrp)轻松地获得统计学上的显著差异，如探索多个因变量或协变量，并仅在它们产生显著结果时报告这些结果(Simmons，Nelson，& Simonsohn，2011)。对于那些预计2011年的尴尬将很快消失在记忆中的心理学家来说，2012年反而提供了一个从糟糕到更糟糕的快速跳水，在社会认知领域出现了新的明显的欺诈迹象(Simonsohn，2012)，心理科学中的一篇文章显示，许多心理学家承认至少参与了Simmons及其同事检查的一些快速反应程序(John，Loewenstein，& Prelec，2012)。 令人不安的新荟萃分析证据表明，Simmons及其同事描述的qrp甚至可能在心理学文献中的p值分布中留下明显的迹象(Masicampo & Lalande，出版中； Simonsohn，2012)，科学杂志和博客上围绕一些研究人员在复制社会认知领域的知名结果时遇到的问题展开了激烈的争论(Bower，2012；永，2012)。虽然心理学在这两年中所经历的非常公开的问题令我们这些在该领域工作的人感到尴尬，但一些人已经找到了安慰，因为在同一时期，类似的担忧已经在整个科学领域出现(由即将描述的启示引发)。一些不可复制的可疑原因，如发表偏倚(倾向于只发表积极的发现)已经讨论了多年；事实上，抽屉问题这个短语是由一位杰出的心理学家在几十年前首次提出的(Rosenthal，1979)。然而，许多人推测，这些问题在最近几年已经恶化，因为学术界收获了高度竞争的学术氛围和奖励计划，这种奖励计划为过度销售自己的工作提供了丰厚的奖励，而对谨慎和谨慎却几乎没有奖励(见吉纳-索罗拉，2012年，这一期)。同样令人不安的是，研究人员似乎比过去更少地重复彼此的工作，这可能再次反映了一个倾斜的激励机制(这一点在本期的几篇文章中讨论过，例如，马克尔、普吕克尔和赫加蒂，2012)。错误出现在心理学文献中的频率目前还不清楚，但许多事实表明它可能高得令人不安。约安尼迪斯(2005)通过简单的数学建模表明，任何忽视复制的科学领域都很容易陷入悲惨的境地，其中(正如他最著名的文章的标题所言)“大多数发表的研究结果都是错误的”(另见约安尼迪斯，2012，本期，以及Pashler & Harris，2012，本期)。与此同时，来自癌症研究的报告让这种严峻的情景看起来更加可信:2012年，几家大型制药公司透露，他们在癌症生物学方面复制已发表学术研究中令人兴奋的临床前发现的努力很少验证原始结果(Begley & Ellis，2012；另见Osherovich，2011年；普林茨、施朗格和阿萨杜拉，2011年)。
papers.title_zh: 编辑介绍

papers.title: Robust Fingerprint of Privacy-Preserving Location Trajectories
papers.authors: Yuzhou Jiang, Emre Yilmaz, Erman Ayday
papers.abstract: Location-based services have brought significant convenience to people in their daily lives, and trajectory data are also in high demand. However, directly releasing those data raises privacy and liability (e.g., due to unauthorized distribution of such datasets) concerns since location data contain users' sensitive information, e.g., regular moving patterns and favorite spots. To address this, we propose a novel fingerprinting scheme that simultaneously identifies unauthorized redistribution of location trajectory datasets and provides differential privacy guarantees for shared data. Observing data utility degradation due to differentially private mechanisms, we introduce a utility-focused post-processing scheme to regain spatio-temporal correlations between points in a location trajectory. We further integrate this post-processing scheme into our fingerprinting scheme as a sampling method. The proposed fingerprinting scheme alleviates the degradation in the utility of the shared dataset due to the noise introduced by differentially private mechanisms (i.e., adds the fingerprint by preserving the publicly known statistics of the data). Meanwhile, it does not violate differential privacy throughout the entire process due to immunity to post-processing, a fundamental property of differential privacy. Our proposed fingerprinting scheme is robust against known and well-studied attacks against a fingerprinting scheme including random flipping attacks, correlation-based flipping attacks, and collusions among multiple parties, making it difficult for the attackers to infer the fingerprint codes and avoid accusation. Through experiments on two real-life location trajectory datasets and two synthetic ones, we show that our scheme achieves high fingerprint robustness and outperforms existing approaches. Furthermore, the proposed fingerprinting scheme increases data utility for differentially private datasets, which is beneficial to data analyzers.
papers.title_zh: 隐私保护位置轨迹的鲁棒指纹
papers.abstract_zh: 基于位置的服务给人们的日常生活带来了极大的便利，对轨迹数据的需求也很大。然而，直接发布这些数据会引起隐私和责任(例如，由于这种数据集的未授权分发)问题，因为位置数据包含用户的敏感信息，例如，规律的移动模式和喜爱的地点。为了解决这个问题，我们提出了一种新的指纹方案，该方案同时识别位置轨迹数据集的未授权再分发，并为共享数据提供不同的隐私保证。观察到由于差分私有机制导致的数据效用退化，我们引入了一种以效用为中心的后处理方案来重新获得位置轨迹中点之间的时空相关性。我们进一步将这种后处理方案集成到我们的指纹方案中，作为一种采样方法。所提出的指纹方案减轻了由于差分私有机制(即，通过保存数据的公共已知统计来添加指纹)引入的噪声而导致的共享数据集的效用的退化。同时，由于对后处理的免疫性，它在整个过程中不违反差分隐私，这是差分隐私的一个基本属性。我们提出的指纹方案对已知的和被充分研究的攻击是鲁棒的，这些攻击包括随机翻转攻击、基于相关性的翻转攻击和多方合谋，使得攻击者难以推断指纹代码和避免指控。通过在两个真实的位置轨迹数据集和两个合成的位置轨迹数据集上的实验，我们表明我们的方案获得了较高的指纹鲁棒性，并且优于现有的方法。此外，所提出的指纹化方案增加了对于差别私有数据集的数据效用，这对于数据分析器是有益的。

papers.title: Funshade: Function Secret Sharing for Two-Party Secure Thresholded Distance Evaluation
papers.authors: Alberto Ibarrondo, Hervé Chabanne, Melek Önen
papers.abstract: We propose a novel privacy-preserving, two-party computation of various distance metrics (e.g., Hamming distance, Scalar Product) followed by a comparison with a fixed threshold, which is known as one of the most useful and popular building blocks for many different applications including machine learning, biometric matching, etc. Our solution builds upon recent advances in function secret sharing and makes use of an optimized version of arithmetic secret sharing. Thanks to this combination, our new solution named Funshade is the first to require only one round of communication and two ring elements of communication in the online phase, outperforming all prior state-of-the-art schemes while relying on lightweight cryptographic primitives. Lastly, we implement our solution from scratch in portable C and expose it in Python, testifying its high performance by running secure biometric identification against a database of 1 million records in ~10 seconds with full correctness and 32-bit precision, without parallelization.
papers.title_zh: Funshade:用于两方安全阈值距离评估的函数秘密共享
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了一种新颖的隐私保护、各种距离度量(例如，汉明距离、标量积)的双方计算，随后与固定阈值进行比较，这被认为是包括机器学习、生物特征匹配等许多不同应用的最有用和最流行的构建块之一。我们的解决方案建立在函数秘密共享的最新进展之上，并利用了算术秘密共享的优化版本。由于这种结合，我们名为Funshade的新解决方案是第一个在在线阶段只需要一轮通信和两个通信环元素的解决方案，在依赖轻量级加密原语的同时，优于所有先前的最先进方案。最后，我们用portable C从头开始实现了我们的解决方案，并在Python中公开了它，通过在大约10秒内对100万条记录的数据库运行安全生物识别，证明了它的高性能，具有完全的正确性和32位精度，无需并行化。

papers.title: Attribute-based Single Sign-On: Secure, Private, and Efficient
papers.authors: Tore Kasper Frederiksen, Julia Hesse, Bertram Poettering, Patrick Towa
papers.abstract: A Single Sign-On (SSO) system allows users to access different remote services while authenticating only once. SSO can greatly improve the usability and security of online activities by dispensing with the need to securely remember or store tens or hundreds of authentication secrets. On the downside, today's SSO providers can track users' online behavior, and collect personal data that service providers want to see asserted before letting a user access their resources. In this work, we propose a new policy-based Single Sign-On service, i.e., a system that produces access tokens that are conditioned on the user's attributes fulfilling a specified policy. Our solution is based on multi-party computation and threshold cryptography, and generates access tokens of standardized format. The central idea is to distribute the role of the SSO provider among several entities, in order to shield user attributes and access patterns from each individual entity. We provide a formal security model and analysis in the Universal Composability framework, against proactive adversaries. Our implementation and benchmarking show the practicality of our system for many real-world use cases.
papers.title_zh: 基于属性的单点登录:安全、私有、高效
papers.abstract_zh: 单点登录(SSO)系统允许用户在只进行一次身份验证的情况下访问不同的远程服务。SSO可以极大地提高在线活动的可用性和安全性，因为它不需要安全地记住或存储数十或数百个身份验证机密。不利的一面是，今天的SSO提供商可以跟踪用户的在线行为，并收集服务提供商希望在用户访问他们的资源之前确认的个人数据。在这项工作中，我们提出了一个新的基于策略的单点登录服务，即一个系统产生访问令牌，这些令牌是以满足指定策略的用户属性为条件的。我们的解决方案基于多方计算和门限密码，并生成标准化格式的访问令牌。中心思想是在几个实体之间分配SSO提供者的角色，以便对每个实体屏蔽用户属性和访问模式。我们在通用可组合性框架中提供了一个正式的安全模型和分析，以对抗主动的对手。我们的实现和基准测试显示了我们的系统对于许多真实世界用例的实用性。

papers.title: On the Robustness of Topics API to a Re-Identification Attack
papers.authors: Nikhil Jha, Martino Trevisan, Emilio Leonardi, Marco Mellia
papers.abstract: Web tracking through third-party cookies is considered a threat to users' privacy and is supposed to be abandoned in the near future. Recently, Google proposed the Topics API framework as a privacy-friendly alternative for behavioural advertising. Using this approach, the browser builds a user profile based on navigation history, which advertisers can access. The Topics API has the possibility of becoming the new standard for behavioural advertising, thus it is necessary to fully understand its operation and find possible limitations. This paper evaluates the robustness of the Topics API to a re-identification attack where an attacker reconstructs the user profile by accumulating user's exposed topics over time to later re-identify the same user on a different website. Using real traffic traces and realistic population models, we find that the Topics API mitigates but cannot prevent re-identification to take place, as there is a sizeable chance that a user's profile is unique within a website's audience. Consequently, the probability of correct re-identification can reach 15-17%, considering a pool of 1,000 users. We offer the code and data we use in this work to stimulate further studies and the tuning of the Topic API parameters.
papers.title_zh: 主题API对重识别攻击的鲁棒性研究
papers.abstract_zh: 通过第三方cookies进行网络跟踪被认为是对用户隐私的威胁，应该会在不久的将来被放弃。最近，Google提出了Topics API框架，作为行为广告的隐私友好替代方案。使用这种方法，浏览器根据广告客户可以访问的导航历史建立用户档案。Topics API有可能成为行为广告的新标准，因此有必要充分理解其操作并找到可能的局限性。本文评估了Topics API对重新识别攻击的鲁棒性，在这种攻击中，攻击者通过累积用户暴露的主题来重建用户配置文件，以便稍后在不同的网站上重新识别同一用户。使用真实的流量跟踪和现实的人口模型，我们发现主题API减轻但不能防止重新识别的发生，因为有相当大的机会，用户的个人资料在网站的受众中是唯一的。因此，考虑到1000个用户的池，正确重新识别的概率可以达到15-17%。我们提供了在这项工作中使用的代码和数据，以促进进一步的研究和主题API参数的调整。

papers.title: Evaluating practical QUIC website fingerprinting defenses for the masses
papers.authors: Sandra Siby, Ludovic Barman, Christopher A. Wood, Marwan Fayed, Nick Sullivan, Carmela Troncoso
papers.abstract: Website fingerprinting (WF) is a well-known threat to users' web privacy. New Internet standards, such as QUIC, include padding to support defenses against WF. Previous work on QUIC WF only analyzes the effectiveness of defenses when users are behind a VPN. Yet, this is not how most users browse the Internet. In this paper, we provide a comprehensive evaluation of QUIC-padding-based defenses against WF when users directly browse the web, i.e., without VPNs, HTTPS proxies, or other tunneling protocols. We confirm previous claims that network-layer padding cannot provide effective protection against powerful adversaries capable of observing all traffic traces. We show that the claims hold even against adversaries with constraints on traffic visibility and processing power. We then show that the current approach to web development, in which the use of third-party resources is the norm, impedes the effective use of padding-based defenses as it requires first and third parties to coordinate in order to thwart traffic analysis. We show that even when coordination is possible, in most cases, protection comes at a high cost.
papers.title_zh: 为大众评估实用的QUIC网站指纹防御
papers.abstract_zh: 网站指纹(WF)是一个众所周知的对用户网络隐私的威胁。新的互联网标准，如QUIC，包括支持防御WF的填充。之前关于QUIC WF的工作仅仅分析了当用户在VPN后面时防御的有效性。然而，这并不是大多数用户浏览互联网的方式。在本文中，我们对用户直接浏览网页时，即没有VPN、HTTPS代理或其他隧道协议的情况下，基于QUIC填充的WF防御措施进行了全面的评估。我们证实了之前的说法，即网络层填充无法针对能够观察所有流量跟踪的强大对手提供有效保护。我们表明，这些主张甚至适用于流量可见性和处理能力受限的对手。然后，我们展示了当前的web开发方法，其中第三方资源的使用是规范，阻碍了基于填充的防御的有效使用，因为它需要第一方和第三方协调以阻止流量分析。我们表明，即使协调是可能的，在大多数情况下，保护的成本很高。

papers.title: Save The Implicit Flow? Enabling Privacy-Preserving RP Authentication in OpenID Connect
papers.authors: Maximilian Kroschewski, Anja Lehmann
papers.abstract:
OpenID Connect (OIDC) is a Single Sign-On (SSO) protocol that allows users to authenticate to various Relying Parties (RPs) via an Identity Provider (IdP). The main drawback of SSO is its lack of privacy, as the IdP learns the RP’s identity at each user’s login. OIDC supports several protocol flows, of which only one, the Implicit Flow, gives hope for any privacy, as it does not require direct communication between the IdP and RP. This design was initially intended for RPs with technical limitations that prevent them from storing credentials and thus authenticating to the IdP. However, RP authentication is crucial to ensure that users only access properly registered RPs. As a result, the Implicit Flow is being discussed to be excluded from the OAuth specification on which OIDC is based.
 This paper demonstrates a privacy-preserving approach incorporating RP authentication into the Implicit Flow. The IdP can restrict its service to authenticated RPs and tie each authentication token to a specific user and RP without acquiring knowledge of which user is accessing which RP. We formally define the desired security and privacy properties of such an authenticated Implicit Flow, propose a provably secure construction from generic building blocks, and report on an implementation of our scheme
papers.title_zh: 保存隐式流？在OpenID Connect中启用隐私保护RP身份验证
papers.abstract_zh:
OpenID Connect (OIDC)是一种单点登录(SSO)协议，允许用户通过身份提供者(IdP)向各种依赖方(RPs)进行身份验证。SSO的主要缺点是缺乏私密性，因为IdP在每个用户登录时都会获知RP的身份。OIDC支持几个协议流，其中只有一个，隐式流，提供了任何隐私的希望，因为它不需要IdP和RP之间的直接通信。这种设计最初是为具有技术限制的RPs设计的，这些技术限制阻止RPs存储凭证，从而无法向IdP进行身份验证。但是，RP身份验证对于确保用户仅访问正确注册的RP至关重要。结果，隐式流被讨论排除在OIDC所基于的OAuth规范之外。
本文演示了一种隐私保护方法，将RP认证合并到隐式流程中。IdP可以将其服务限制于经过认证的RP，并将每个认证令牌绑定到特定的用户和RP，而无需了解哪个用户正在访问哪个RP。我们正式定义了这样一个被认证的隐式流的安全和隐私属性，提出了一个可证明安全的构造，并报告了我们的方案的实现

papers.title: Locality-Sensitive Hashing Does Not Guarantee Privacy! Attacks on Google's FLoC and the MinHash Hierarchy System
papers.authors: Florian Turati, Karel Kubícek, Carlos Cotrini, David A. Basin
papers.abstract: Recently proposed systems aim at achieving privacy using locality-sensitive hashing. We show how these approaches fail by presenting attacks against two such systems: Google's FLoC proposal for privacy-preserving targeted advertising and the MinHash Hierarchy, a system for processing location trajectories in a privacy-preserving way. Our attacks refute the pre-image resistance, anonymity, and privacy guarantees claimed for these systems. In the case of FLoC, we show how to deanonymize users using Sybil attacks and to reconstruct 10% or more of the browsing history for 30% of its users using Generative Adversarial Networks. We achieve this only analyzing the hashes used by FLoC. For MinHash, we precisely identify the location trajectory of a subset of individuals and, on average, we can limit users' trajectory to just 10% of the possible geographic area, again using just the hashes. In addition, we refute their differential privacy claims.
papers.title_zh: 区分位置的散列法不能保证隐私！对谷歌FLoC和MinHash等级系统的攻击
papers.abstract_zh: 最近提出的系统旨在使用位置敏感散列来实现隐私。我们通过展示对两个这样的系统的攻击来展示这些方法是如何失败的:谷歌的保护隐私的定向广告的FLoC提案和以保护隐私的方式处理位置轨迹的系统MinHash Hierarchy。我们的攻击驳斥了这些系统声称的前图像抵抗、匿名和隐私保证。在FLoC的例子中，我们展示了如何使用Sybil攻击去匿名化用户，以及如何使用生成式对抗网络为其30%的用户重建10%或更多的浏览历史。我们仅通过分析FLoC使用的散列来实现这一点。对于MinHash，我们精确地识别出个人子集的位置轨迹，平均来说，我们可以将用户的轨迹限制在10%的可能地理区域内，同样只使用哈希。此外，我们反驳了他们的差异隐私主张。

papers.title: Track You: A Deep Dive into Safety Alerts for Apple AirTags
papers.authors: Narmeen Shafqat, Nicole Gerzon, Maggie Van Nortwick, Victor Sun, Alan Mislove, Aanjhan Ranganathan
papers.abstract: Bluetooth-based item trackers have sparked apprehension over their potential misuse in harmful stalking and privacy violations. In response, manufacturers have implemented safety alerts to notify victims of extended tracking by unknown item trackers. In this study, we specifically investigate the anti-stalking mechanism of Apple's AirTag. We identify and analyze potential triggers of safety alerts that have not been examined in previous research, such as the local time, the victim's device model, AirTag's battery life, and the distance between the AirTag and the victim's device. Furthermore, we demonstrate a novel possibility of developing a stealthy cloned AirTag capable of tracking victims directly on the Find My app while circumventing safety alerts on the victim’s device. Our experiments demonstrate that, despite regular updates to the public key and MAC address, our cloned AirTag can provide real-time location updates even with a four months old key, thereby highlighting the challenges in designing a robust anti-stalking framework. Furthermore, we propose practical solutions to mitigate stalking risks from cloned AirTags and enhance the existing anti-stalking safeguards for AirTags. These suggestions seek to provide a foundation for similar Bluetooth-based item trackers to improve their anti-stalking protections while ensuring optimal tracking efficiency. We conducted rigorous experiments to validate our findings, ensuring their accuracy and reliability. Our evaluation highlights that safety alerts take over 8 hours to appear during the day and are more prompt during the night, particularly after 11 pm.
papers.title_zh: 追踪你:深入探究苹果空中标签的安全警告
papers.abstract_zh: 基于蓝牙的物品追踪器引发了人们对其可能被滥用于有害跟踪和侵犯隐私的担忧。作为回应，制造商实施了安全警报，以通知受害者未知物品追踪器的长期追踪。在这项研究中，我们专门研究了苹果AirTag的反跟踪机制。我们识别并分析了以前的研究中没有检查过的安全警报的潜在触发因素，如当地时间、受害者的设备型号、AirTag的电池寿命以及AirTag和受害者设备之间的距离。此外，我们展示了一种新的可能性，即开发一种隐形的克隆AirTag，能够在“查找我的应用程序”上直接跟踪受害者，同时绕过受害者设备上的安全警报。我们的实验表明，尽管定期更新公钥和MAC地址，但我们克隆的AirTag甚至可以使用四个月前的密钥提供实时位置更新，从而突出了设计强大的反跟踪框架的挑战。此外，我们提出了实用的解决方案，以减轻克隆航空标签的跟踪风险，并增强现有的航空标签反跟踪保护措施。这些建议旨在为类似的基于蓝牙的物品跟踪器提供基础，以改善其反跟踪保护，同时确保最佳跟踪效率。我们进行了严格的实验来验证我们的发现，确保其准确性和可靠性。我们的评估强调，安全警报在白天需要8个多小时才能出现，在晚上更为迅速，尤其是在晚上11点以后。

papers.title: Disparate Vulnerability in Link Inference Attacks against Graph Neural Networks
papers.authors: Da Zhong, Ruotong Yu, Kun Wu, Xiuling Wang, Jun Xu, Wendy Hui Wang
papers.abstract: Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) have been widely used in various graph-based applications. Recent studies have shown that GNNs are vulnerable to link-level membership inference attacks (LMIA) which can infer whether a given link was included in the training graph of a GNN model. While most of the studies focus on the privacy vulnerability of the links in the entire graph, none have inspected the privacy risk of specific subgroups of links (e.g., links between LGBT users). In this paper, we present the first study of disparity in subgroup vulnerability (DSV) of GNNs against LMIA. First, with extensive empirical evaluation, we demonstrate the existence of non-negligible DSV under various settings of GNN models and input graphs. Second, by both statistical and causal analysis, we identify the difference between three specific graph structural properties of subgroups as one of the underlying reasons for DSV. Among the three properties, the difference between subgroup density has the largest causal effect on DSV. Third, inspired by the causal analysis, we design a new defense mechanism named FairDefense to mitigate DSV while providing protection against LMIA. At a high level, at each iteration of target model training, FairDefense randomizes the membership of edges in the training graph with a given probability, aiming to reduce the gap between the density of different subgroups for DSV mitigation. Our empirical results demonstrate that FairDefense outperforms the existing defense methods in the trade-off between defense and target model accuracy. More importantly, it offers better DSV mitigation.
papers.title_zh: 图神经网络链接推理攻击中的不同脆弱性
papers.abstract_zh: 图形神经网络(GNNs)已经广泛应用于各种基于图形的应用中。最近的研究表明，GNN容易受到链接级成员推理攻击(LMIA ),该攻击可以推断给定的链接是否包含在GNN模型的训练图中。虽然大多数研究集中在整个图中链接的隐私脆弱性，但没有一个研究检查了特定链接子群(例如，LGBT用户之间的链接)的隐私风险。在本文中，我们提出了第一个研究的差距，在亚组脆弱性(DSV)GNNs对LMIA。首先，通过广泛的实证评估，我们证明了在GNN模型和输入图的各种设置下不可忽略的DSV的存在。第二，通过统计和因果分析，我们确定子群的三个特定图结构属性之间的差异是DSV的潜在原因之一。在这三个属性中，子群密度的差异对DSV的因果影响最大。第三，受因果分析的启发，我们设计了一个名为FairDefense的新防御机制来减轻DSV，同时提供对LMIA的保护。在高层次上，在目标模型训练的每次迭代中，FairDefense以给定的概率随机化训练图中的边的成员资格，旨在减少不同子组的密度之间的差距以减轻DSV。我们的实证结果表明，FairDefense在防御和目标模型准确性之间的权衡优于现有的防御方法。更重要的是，它提供了更好的DSV缓解。

papers.title: The Self-Anti-Censorship Nature of Encryption: On the Prevalence of Anamorphic Cryptography
papers.authors: Miroslaw Kutylowski, Giuseppe Persiano, Duong Hieu Phan, Moti Yung, Marcin Zawada
papers.abstract: As part of the responses to the ongoing crypto wars, the notion of Anamorphic Encryption was put forth. The notion allows private communication in spite of a dictator who is engaged in an extreme form of surveillance and or censorship, where it asks for all private keys and knows and may even dictate all messages. The original work pointed out efficient ways to use two known schemes in the anamorphic mode, bypassing the draconian censorship and hiding information from the all-powerful dictator. A question left open was whether these examples are outlier results or whether anamorphic mode is pervasive in existing systems. Here we answer the above question: we develop new techniques, expand the notion, and show that the notion of Anamorphic Cryptography is, in fact, very much prevalent. We first refine the notion of Anamorphic Encryption with respect to the nature of covert communication. Specifically, we distinguish Single-Receiver Encryption for many to one communication, and Multiple-Receiver Encryption for many to many communication within the group of conspiring users. We then show that Anamorphic Encryption can be embedded in the randomness used in the encryption, and we give families of constructions that can be applied to numerous ciphers. In total the families cover classical encryption schemes, some of which in actual use. Among our examples is an anamorphic channel with much higher capacity than the regular channel. In sum, the work shows the very large extent of the potential futility of control and censorship over the use of strong encryption by the dictator (typical for and even stronger than governments engaging in the ongoing crypto-wars): While such limitations obviously hurt utility which encryption typically brings to safety in computing systems, they essentially, are not helping the dictator. While the actual implications of what we show here and what it means in practice require further policy and legal analyses and perspectives, the technical aspects regarding the issues are clearly showing the futility of the war against Cryptography.
papers.title_zh: 加密的自我反审查本质——论变形密码的盛行
papers.abstract_zh: 作为对正在进行的加密战争的回应的一部分，变形加密的概念被提出。这一概念允许私人通信，尽管独裁者正在从事极端形式的监视和/或审查，在这种情况下，它要求所有的私钥，知道，甚至可以支配所有的消息。最初的工作指出了在变形模式下使用两种已知方案的有效方法，绕过严厉的审查制度，并对全能的独裁者隐藏信息。一个悬而未决的问题是，这些例子是否是异常结果，或者变形模式是否在现有系统中普遍存在。在这里，我们回答了上面的问题:我们开发了新的技术，扩展了这个概念，并表明变形密码术的概念实际上非常普遍。我们首先根据隐蔽通信的性质提炼变形加密的概念。具体来说，我们区分多对一通信的单接收者加密和共谋用户组内多对多通信的多接收者加密。然后，我们证明了变形加密可以嵌入到加密中使用的随机性中，并且我们给出了可以应用于许多密码的构造族。总的来说，这些系列涵盖了经典的加密方案，其中一些已投入实际使用。在我们的例子中，变形通道的容量比常规通道高得多。总之，这项工作在很大程度上表明了对独裁者使用强加密的控制和审查的潜在无效性(对于参与正在进行的密码战争的政府来说，这是典型的，甚至比政府更强):尽管这些限制显然损害了加密通常给计算系统带来的安全性，但它们本质上并没有帮助独裁者。虽然我们在这里展示的内容的实际含义及其在实践中的意义需要进一步的政策和法律分析和视角，但有关这些问题的技术方面清楚地表明，反对加密的战争是徒劳的。

papers.title: MAPLE: A Metadata-Hiding Policy-Controllable Encrypted Search Platform with Minimal Trust
papers.authors: Tung Le, Thang Hoang
papers.abstract: Commodity encrypted storage platforms (e.g., IceDrive, pCloud) permit data store and sharing across multiple users while preserving data confidentiality. However, end-to-end encryption may not be sufficient since it only offers confidentiality when the data is at rest or in transit. Meanwhile, sensitive information can be leaked from metadata representing activities during data operations (e.g., query, processing). Recent encrypted search platforms such as DORY (OSDI’20) or DURASIFT (WPES’19) permit multi-user data query functionalities, while protecting metadata privacy. However, they either incur a high processing overhead or offer limited security/functionality, and require strong trust assumptions. We propose MAPLE, a new metadata-hiding encrypted search platform that offers query functionalities (search, update) on the shared data across multiple users with complex policy controls. MAPLE protects metadata privacy all the time during query processing, while achieving significantly (asymptotically) lower processing overhead than state-of-the-art platforms. The core technique of MAPLE is the design of oblivious data structures for search index and access control coupled with secure computation techniques to enable efficient query processing with a minimal trust. We fully implemented MAPLE and evaluated its performance on commodity cloud (Amazon EC2) under real settings. Experimental results showed that MAPLE achieved a concrete performance comparable with its counterparts, while offering provably stronger security guarantees and more diverse functionalities.
papers.title_zh: MAPLE:一个元数据隐藏策略可控的最小信任加密搜索平台
papers.abstract_zh: 商用加密存储平台(例如IceDrive、pCloud)允许多个用户存储和共享数据，同时保持数据机密性。然而，端到端加密可能还不够，因为它只在数据静止或传输时提供机密性。同时，在数据操作(例如，查询、处理)期间，敏感信息可能从表示活动的元数据中泄露。最近的加密搜索平台，如DORY(OSDI 20年)或durassift(WPES 19年)允许多用户数据查询功能，同时保护元数据隐私。然而，它们要么导致高处理开销，要么提供有限的安全性/功能性，并且需要强信任假设。我们提出MAPLE，这是一个新的元数据隐藏加密搜索平台，通过复杂的策略控制为多个用户提供共享数据的查询功能(搜索、更新)。MAPLE在查询处理过程中始终保护元数据隐私，同时实现了比最先进的平台显著(渐进地)更低的处理开销。MAPLE的核心技术是为搜索索引和访问控制设计不经意数据结构，并结合安全计算技术，以最小的信任实现高效的查询处理。我们完全实现了MAPLE，并在真实设置下评估了它在商品云(Amazon EC2)上的性能。实验结果表明，MAPLE实现了与同类产品相当的具体性能，同时提供了可证明的更强的安全性保证和更多样化的功能。

papers.title: Attacks on Encrypted Response-Hiding Range Search Schemes in Multiple Dimensions
papers.authors: Evangelia Anna Markatou, Francesca Falzon, Zachary Espiritu, Roberto Tamassia
papers.abstract: In this work, we present the first database reconstruction attacks against response-hiding private range search schemes on encrypted databases of arbitrary dimensions. Falzon et al. (VLDB 2022) present a number of range-supporting schemes on arbitrary dimensions exhibiting different security and efficiency trade-offs. Additionally, they characterize a form of leakage, structure pattern leakage, also present in many one-dimensional schemes e.g., Demertzis et al. (SIGMOD 2016) and Faber et al. (ESORICS 2015). We present the first systematic study of this leakage and attack a broad collection of schemes, including schemes that allow the responses to contain false-positives (often considered the gold standard in security). We characterize the information theoretic limitations of a passive persistent adversary. Our work shows that for range queries, structure pattern leakage can be as vulnerable to attacks as access pattern leakage. We give a comprehensive evaluation of our attacks with a complexity analysis, a prototype implementation, and an experimental assessment on real-world datasets.
papers.title_zh: 对多维加密响应隐藏范围搜索方案的攻击
papers.abstract_zh: 在这项工作中，我们提出了第一个对任意维加密数据库的响应隐藏私有范围搜索方案的数据库重建攻击。法尔松等人(VLDB 2022)提出了许多在任意维度上的射程支持方案，展示了不同的安全性和效率权衡。此外，他们还描述了一种泄漏形式，即结构模式泄漏，也存在于许多一维方案中，例如Demertzis等人(SIGMOD 2016年)和Faber等人(ESORICS 2015年)。我们首次系统地研究了这种泄漏，并攻击了大量的方案，包括允许响应包含假阳性的方案(通常被认为是安全方面的黄金标准)。我们描述了被动持久对手的信息论局限性。我们的工作表明，对于范围查询，结构模式泄漏和访问模式泄漏一样容易受到攻击。我们通过复杂性分析、原型实现和在真实数据集上的实验评估对我们的攻击进行了全面的评估。

papers.title: Trifecta: Faster High-Throughput Three-Party Computation over WAN Using Multi-Fan-In Logic Gates
papers.authors: Sina Faraji, Florian Kerschbaum
papers.abstract: Multi-party computation (MPC) has been a very active area of research, and recent industrial deployments exist. Practical MPC is currently limited to low-latency, high-throughput network setups, i.e., local-area networks (LAN). However, many use cases require the participation of different entities located in different data centers, i.e., communication over wide-area networks (WAN). Although, constant-round MPC exists, it has very high communication cost. In this paper we investigate the reduction of the round complexity of secret-shared based multi-party computation. We propose a new three-party computation protocol that allows to compute multi-fan-in gates in one round without any precomputation. Our protocol outperforms related work, including constant-round protocols, over WANs. For example, we improve throughput of AES-128 over WAN by a factor of more than 2.2x compared to related work.
papers.title_zh: Trifecta:使用多扇入逻辑门在广域网上实现更快的高吞吐量三方计算
papers.abstract_zh: 多方计算(MPC)一直是一个非常活跃的研究领域，最近已经有了工业部署。实际的MPC目前限于低延迟、高吞吐量的网络设置，即局域网(LAN)。然而，许多用例需要位于不同数据中心的不同实体的参与，即广域网(WAN)上的通信。虽然存在恒定轮次的MPC，但是它具有非常高的通信成本。本文研究了如何降低基于秘密共享的多方计算的轮复杂度。我们提出了一个新的三方计算协议，允许在一轮中计算多个扇入门，而无需任何预计算。我们的协议优于相关的工作，包括恒定轮协议，在广域网上。例如，与相关工作相比，我们将AES-128在广域网上的吞吐量提高了2.2倍以上。

papers.title: Exploring the Privacy Risks of Adversarial VR Game Design
papers.authors: Vivek Nair, Gonzalo Munilla Garrido, Dawn Song, James F. O'Brien
papers.abstract: Fifty study participants playtested an innocent-looking "escape room" game in virtual reality (VR). Within just a few minutes, an adversarial program had accurately inferred over 25 of their personal data attributes, from anthropometrics like height and wingspan to demographics like age and gender. As notoriously data-hungry companies become increasingly involved in VR development, this experimental scenario may soon represent a typical VR user experience. Since the Cambridge Analytica scandal of 2018, adversarially-designed gamified elements have been known to constitute a significant privacy threat in conventional social platforms. In this work, we present a case study of how metaverse environments can similarly be adversarially constructed to covertly infer dozens of personal data attributes from seemingly-anonymous users. While existing VR privacy research largely focuses on passive observation, we argue that because individuals subconsciously reveal personal information via their motion in response to specific stimuli, active attacks pose an outsized risk in VR environments.
papers.title_zh: 探索对抗性虚拟游戏设计的隐私风险
papers.abstract_zh: 五十名研究参与者在虚拟现实(VR)中玩了一个看起来很无辜的“密室”游戏。在短短几分钟内，一个对抗性的程序准确地推断出了他们超过25项个人数据属性，从身高和翼展等人体测量数据到年龄和性别等人口统计数据。随着众所周知的数据饥渴公司越来越多地参与到VR开发中，这种实验性的场景可能很快就会代表一种典型的VR用户体验。自2018年剑桥分析丑闻以来，敌对设计的游戏化元素已被认为在传统社交平台上构成了重大的隐私威胁。在这项工作中，我们提出了一个案例研究，如何元宇宙环境可以类似地被对抗性地构建，以秘密地从看似匿名的用户推断出几十个个人数据属性。虽然现有的虚拟现实隐私研究主要集中在被动观察上，但我们认为，由于个体通过他们对特定刺激的反应下意识地透露个人信息，主动攻击在虚拟现实环境中构成了巨大的风险。

papers.title: DP-SIPS: A simpler, more scalable mechanism for differentially private partition selection
papers.authors: Marika Swanberg, Damien Desfontaines, Samuel Haney
