papers.abstract: Partition selection, or set union, is an important primitive in differentially private mechanism design: in a database where each user contributes a list of items, the goal is to publish as many of these items as possible under differential privacy. In this work, we present a novel mechanism for differentially private partition selection. This mechanism, which we call {DP-SIPS}, is very simple: it consists of iterating the naive algorithm over the data set multiple times, removing the released partitions from the data set while increasing the privacy budget at each step. This approach preserves the scalability benefits of the naive mechanism, yet its utility compares favorably to more complex approaches developed in prior work.
papers.title_zh: DP-SIPS:一种更简单、更可扩展的差分私有分区选择机制
papers.abstract_zh: 分区选择或集合并是差别私有机制设计中的一个重要原语:在每个用户贡献一个项目列表的数据库中，目标是在差别私有下发布尽可能多的项目。在这项工作中，我们提出了一种新的差分私有分区选择机制。我们称之为{DP-SIPS}的这种机制非常简单:它包括在数据集上多次迭代朴素算法，从数据集中删除释放的分区，同时在每一步增加隐私预算。这种方法保留了naive机制的可伸缩性优势，但它的效用优于先前工作中开发的更复杂的方法。

papers.title: Understanding EdTech's Privacy and Security Issues: Understanding the Perception and Awareness of Education Technologies' Privacy and Security Issues
papers.authors: Rakibul Hasan
papers.abstract: A clear and well-documented LaTeX document is presented as an article formatted for publication by ACM in a conference proceedings or journal publication. Based on the "acmart" document class, this article presents and explains many of the common variations, as well as many of the formatting elements an author may use in the preparation of the documentation of their work.
papers.title_zh: 了解教育技术的隐私和安全问题:了解对教育技术的隐私和安全问题的理解和认识
papers.abstract_zh: 一个清晰的、记录良好的LaTeX文档以文章的形式呈现，由ACM在会议记录或期刊出版物上发布。基于“acmart”文档类，本文介绍并解释了许多常见的变体，以及作者在准备其作品的文档时可能使用的许多格式元素。

papers.title: Researchers' Experiences in Analyzing Privacy Policies: Challenges and Opportunities
papers.authors: Abraham H. Mhaidli, Selin Fidan, An Doan, Gina Herakovic, Mukund Srinath, Lee Matheson, Shomir Wilson, Florian Schaub
papers.abstract: Companies' privacy policies and their contents are being analyzed for many reasons, including to assess the readability, usability, and utility of privacy policies; to extract and analyze data practices of apps and websites; to assess compliance of companies with relevant laws and their own privacy policies, and to develop tools and machine learning models to summarize and read policies. Despite the importance and interest in studying privacy policies from researchers, regulators, and privacy activists, few best practices or approaches have emerged and infrastructure and tool support is scarce or scattered. In order to provide insight into how researchers study privacy policies and the challenges they face when doing so, we conducted 26 interviews with researchers from various disciplines who have conducted research on privacy policies. We provide insights on a range of challenges around policy selection, policy retrieval, and policy content analysis, as well as multiple overarching challenges researchers experienced across the research process. Based on our findings, we discuss opportunities to better facilitate privacy policy research, including research directions for methodologically advancing privacy policy analysis, potential structural changes around privacy policies, and avenues for fostering an interdisciplinary research community and maturing the field.
papers.title_zh: 研究者分析隐私政策的经验:挑战与机遇
papers.abstract_zh: 出于多种原因，公司的隐私政策及其内容正在被分析，包括评估隐私政策的可读性、可用性和实用性；提取和分析应用程序和网站的数据实践；评估公司对相关法律和他们自己的隐私政策的遵守情况，并开发工具和机器学习模型来总结和阅读政策。尽管研究人员、监管机构和隐私维权人士对研究隐私政策很重视，也很感兴趣，但几乎没有出现最佳实践或方法，基础设施和工具支持也很匮乏或分散。为了深入了解研究人员如何研究隐私政策以及他们在研究时面临的挑战，我们对从事隐私政策研究的不同学科的研究人员进行了26次采访。我们提供了关于围绕政策选择、政策检索和政策内容分析的一系列挑战的见解，以及研究人员在整个研究过程中经历的多重重大挑战。基于我们的发现，我们讨论了更好地促进隐私政策研究的机会，包括方法上推进隐私政策分析的研究方向，围绕隐私政策的潜在结构变化，以及培养跨学科研究社区和使该领域成熟的途径。

papers.title: Your DRM Can Watch You Too: Exploring the Privacy Implications of Browsers (mis)Implementations of Widevine EME
papers.authors: Gwendal Patat, Mohamed Sabt, Pierre-Alain Fouque
papers.abstract: Thanks to HTML5, users can now view videos on Web browsers without installing plug-ins or relying on specific devices. In 2017, W3C published Encrypted Media Extensions (EME) as the first official Web standard for Digital Rights Management (DRM), with the overarching goal of allowing seamless integration of DRM systems on browsers. EME has prompted numerous voices of dissent with respect to the inadequate protection of users. Of particular interest, privacy concerns were articulated, especially that DRM systems inherently require uniquely identifying information on users' devices to control content distribution better. Despite this anecdotal evidence, we lack a comprehensive overview of how browsers have supported EME in practice and what privacy implications are caused by their implementations. In this paper, we fill this gap by investigating privacy leakage caused by EME relying on proprietary and closed-source DRM systems. We focus on Google Widevine because of its versatility and wide adoption. We conduct empirical experiments to show that browsers diverge when complying EME privacy guidelines, which might undermine users' privacy. For instance, we find that many browsers gladly give away the identifying Widevine Client ID with no or little explicit consent from users. Moreover, we characterize the privacy risks of users tracking when browsers miss applying EME guidelines regarding privacy. Because of being closed-source, our work involves reverse engineering to dissect the contents of EME messages as instantiated by Widevine. Finally, we implement EME Track, a tool that automatically exploits bad Widevine-based implementations to break privacy.
papers.title_zh: 你的数字版权管理也可以监视你:探索浏览器的隐私含义(错误)实现威德文EME
papers.abstract_zh: 由于HTML5，用户现在可以在网络浏览器上观看视频，而无需安装插件或依赖特定设备。2017年，W3C发布了加密媒体扩展(EME)作为第一个数字版权管理(DRM)的官方Web标准，其首要目标是允许在浏览器上无缝集成DRM系统。EME引发了许多对用户保护不足的异议。特别令人感兴趣的是，隐私问题被清楚地表达出来，特别是DRM系统固有地需要用户设备上的唯一识别信息，以更好地控制内容分发。尽管有这些轶事证据，我们缺乏对浏览器在实践中如何支持EME以及它们的实现会导致什么隐私问题的全面概述。在本文中，我们通过调查EME依赖专有和闭源DRM系统导致的隐私泄露来填补这一空白。我们关注Google Widevine是因为它的多功能性和广泛应用。我们进行实证实验，以显示浏览器分歧时，遵守EME隐私准则，这可能会破坏用户的隐私。例如，我们发现许多浏览器在没有或很少得到用户明确同意的情况下，很乐意提供标识Widevine客户端ID。此外，我们描述了当浏览器错过应用EME隐私准则时用户跟踪的隐私风险。因为是闭源的，我们的工作包括逆向工程来剖析由Widevine实例化的EME消息的内容。最后，我们实现了EME跟踪，这是一个自动利用不良的基于Widevine的实现来破坏隐私的工具。

papers.title: Privacy-Preserving Outsourced Certificate Validation
papers.authors: Tarek Galal, Anja Lehmann
papers.abstract:
Digital Covid certificates are the first widely deployed end-user cryptographic certificates. For service providers, such as airlines or event ticket vendors, that needed to check that their (global) customers satisfy certain health policies, the verification of such Covid certificates was challenging though - not because of the cryptography involved, but due to the multitude of issuers, different certificate types and the evolving nature of country-specific policies that had to be supported. As Covid certificates contain sensitive health information, their (online) presentation to non-health related entities also poses clear privacy risk. To address both challenges, the EU proposed a specification for outsourcing the verification process to a validator service, that executes the process and informs service providers of the result. The WHO announced to adapt this approach for general vaccination credentials beyond Covid-19. While being beneficial to improve security and privacy for service providers, their solution requires strong trust assumption for the (central) validation service that learns all health-related details of the users.
 
 In our work, we propose and formally model a privacy-preserving variant of such an outsourced validation service. Therein the validator learns the attributes it is supposed to verify, but not the users identity. Still, the validator’s assertion is blindly bound to the user’s identity to ensure the desired user-binding. We analyze the EU specification in our model and show that it only meets a subset of those goals. Our analysis further shows that the EU protocol is unnecessarily complex and can be significantly simplified while maintaining the same (weak) level of security. Finally, we propose a new construction for privacy-preserving certificate validation that provably satisfies all desired goals.
papers.title_zh: 保护隐私的外包证书验证
papers.abstract_zh:
数字Covid证书是第一个广泛部署的最终用户加密证书。对于需要检查其(全球)客户是否满足特定健康政策的服务提供商(如航空公司或赛事门票供应商)而言，验证此类Covid证书颇具挑战性——这不是因为涉及到加密技术，而是因为发行者众多、证书类型不同以及必须支持的国家特定政策不断变化的性质。由于Covid证书包含敏感的健康信息，因此将其(在线)呈现给非健康相关实体也带来了明显的隐私风险。为了解决这两个挑战，欧盟提出了一个将验证过程外包给验证器服务的规范，验证器服务执行该过程并将结果通知服务提供商。世卫组织宣布将这一方法用于新冠肺炎以外的普通疫苗接种证书。虽然有利于提高服务提供商的安全性和隐私，但他们的解决方案需要对(中央)验证服务的强信任假设，该验证服务了解用户的所有健康相关细节。

在我们的工作中，我们提出并正式建模了这种外包验证服务的隐私保护变体。在这里，验证器知道它应该验证的属性，但不知道用户的身份。尽管如此，验证器的断言盲目地绑定到用户的身份，以确保期望的用户绑定。我们在我们的模型中分析了欧盟规范，并表明它只满足这些目标的一个子集。我们的分析进一步表明，欧盟协议是不必要的复杂，可以大大简化，同时保持相同(弱)的安全水平。最后，我们提出了一个新的隐私保护证书验证的构造，可证明满足所有期望的目标。

papers.title: Examining StyleGAN as a Utility-Preserving Face De-identification Method
papers.authors: Seyyed Mohammad Sadegh Moosavi Khorzooghi, Shirin Nilizadeh
papers.abstract: Several face de-identification methods have been proposed to preserve users’ privacy by obscuring their faces. These methods, however, can degrade the quality of photos, and they usually do not preserve the utility of faces, i.e., their age, gender, pose, and facial expression. Recently, advanced generative adversarial network models, such as StyleGAN [ 33], have been proposed, which generate realistic, high-quality imaginary faces. In this paper, we investigate the use of StyleGAN in generating de-identified faces through style mixing, where the styles or features of the target face and an auxiliary face get mixed to generate a de-identified face that carries the utilities of the target face. We examined this de-identification method for preserving utility and privacy by implementing several face detection, verification, and identification attacks and conducting a user study. The results from our extensive experiments, human evaluation, and comparison with two state-of-the-art face de-identification methods, i.e., CIAGAN and DeepPrivacy, show that StyleGAN performs on par or better than these methods, preserving users’ privacy and images’ utility. In particular, the results of the machine learning-based experiments show that StyleGAN0-4 preserves utility better than CIAGAN and DeepPrivacy while preserving privacy at the same level. StyleGAN 0-3 preserves utility at the same level while providing more privacy. In this paper, for the first time, we also performed a carefully designed user study to examine both privacy and utility-preserving properties of StyleGAN 0-3, 0-4, and 0-5, as well as CIAGAN and DeepPrivacy from the human observers’ perspectives. Our statistical tests showed that participants tend to verify and identify StyleGAN 0-5 images easier than DeepPrivacy images. All the methods but StyleGAN 0-5 had significantly lower identification rates than CIAGAN. Regarding utility, as expected, StyleGAN 0-5 performed significantly better in preserving some attributes. Among all methods, on average, participants believe gender has been preserved the most while naturalness has been preserved the least.
papers.title_zh: 一种保持实用性的人脸识别方法
papers.abstract_zh: 已经提出了几种面部去识别方法来通过模糊他们的面部来保护用户的隐私。然而，这些方法会降低照片的质量，并且它们通常不保存人脸的效用，即，他们的年龄、性别、姿势和面部表情。最近，已经提出了高级的生成对抗网络模型，例如StyleGAN [ 33]，其生成逼真的、高质量的想象人脸。在本文中，我们研究了StyleGAN在通过风格混合生成去识别人脸中的使用，其中目标人脸和辅助人脸的风格或特征混合以生成携带目标人脸效用的去识别人脸。我们通过实施几种人脸检测、验证和识别攻击并进行用户研究，检验了这种去识别方法的实用性和隐私保护。我们的大量实验、人类评估以及与两种最先进的人脸去识别方法(即CIAGAN和DeepPrivacy)的比较结果表明，StyleGAN的性能与这些方法相当或更好，从而保护了用户的隐私和图像的效用。特别地，基于机器学习的实验结果表明，StyleGAN0-4在相同水平上保护隐私的同时，比CIAGAN和DeepPrivacy更好地保护了效用。StyleGAN 0-3在提供更多隐私的同时保持了相同水平的实用性。在本文中，我们还首次执行了一项精心设计的用户研究，从人类观察者的角度检查了StyleGAN 0-3、0-4和0-5以及CIAGAN和DeepPrivacy的隐私和效用保留属性。我们的统计测试表明，参与者倾向于验证和识别StyleGAN 0-5图像比DeepPrivacy图像更容易。除StyleGAN 0-5外，所有方法的识别率均显著低于CIAGAN。关于实用性，正如所料，StyleGAN 0-5在保留某些属性方面表现得更好。在所有方法中，平均而言，参与者认为性别被保留得最多，而自然性被保留得最少。

papers.title: Structural and functional explanations for informing lay and expert users: the case of functional encryption
papers.authors: Ala Sarah Alaqra, Farzaneh Karegar, Simone Fischer-Hübner
papers.abstract: Usable explanations of privacy-enhancing technologies (PETs) help users make more informed privacy decisions, but the explanations of PETs are generally geared toward individuals with more technical knowledge. To explain functional encryption (FE) to experts and laypersons, we investigate structural and functional explanations and explore users' interests and preferences, as well as how they affect users' comprehension and decisions about sharing data. To this end (with an EU-based population), we conducted four focus groups, in combination with walk-throughs, with 13 participants in the first study, followed by an online survey with 347 experts and 370 laypersons. Both explanations were considered useful in fulfilling the different needs of participants interested in the privacy policy information. Participants, regardless of their expertise, trusted and were more satisfied with the structural explanation. However, functional explanations had a higher contribution to all participants' comprehension. We, therefore, recommend combining both types of explanations for a usable privacy policy.
papers.title_zh: 告知外行和专家用户的结构和功能解释:功能加密的例子
papers.abstract_zh: 对隐私增强技术(PETs)的可用解释有助于用户做出更明智的隐私决策，但对PETs的解释通常是针对拥有更多技术知识的个人。为了向专家和外行人解释函数加密，我们研究了结构和函数解释，探索了用户的兴趣和偏好，以及它们如何影响用户对共享数据的理解和决策。为此(以EU-为基地的人群)，我们进行了四个焦点小组，结合走查，在第一项研究中有13名参与者，随后有347名专家和370名外行进行了在线调查。这两种解释都被认为有助于满足对隐私政策信息感兴趣的参与者的不同需求。参与者，不管他们的专业知识如何，都相信并更满意结构性的解释。然而，功能性解释对所有参与者的理解有更高的贡献。因此，我们建议结合这两种类型的解释来制定一个可用的隐私政策。

papers.title: Compact and Divisible E-Cash with Threshold Issuance
papers.authors: Alfredo Rial, Ania M. Piotrowska
papers.abstract: Decentralized, offline, and privacy-preserving e-cash could fulfil the need for both scalable and byzantine fault-resistant payment systems. Existing offline anonymous e-cash schemes are unsuitable for distributed environments due to a central bank. We construct a distributed offline anonymous e-cash scheme, in which the role of the bank is performed by a quorum of authorities, and present its two instantiations. Our first scheme is compact, i.e. the cost of the issuance protocol and the size of a wallet are independent of the number of coins issued, but the cost of payment grows linearly with the number of coins spent. Our second scheme is divisible and thus the cost of payments is also independent of the number of coins spent, but the verification of deposits is more costly. We provide formal security proof of both schemes and compare the efficiency of their implementations.
papers.title_zh: 具有门限发行的紧凑可分电子现金
papers.abstract_zh: 分散的、离线的和保护隐私的电子现金可以满足可扩展的和拜占庭式的抗故障支付系统的需求。由于存在中央银行，现有的离线匿名电子现金方案不适用于分布式环境。我们构造了一个分布式离线匿名电子现金方案，其中银行的角色由法定人数的权威机构来执行，并给出了它的两个实例。我们的第一个方案是紧凑的，即发行协议的成本和钱包的大小与发行的硬币数量无关，但是支付成本随着花费的硬币数量线性增长。我们的第二个方案是可分的，因此支付成本也与花费的硬币数量无关，但是存款的验证成本更高。我们提供了两种方案的形式化安全证明，并比较了它们的实现效率。

papers.title: Speculative Privacy Concerns about AR Glasses Data Collection
papers.authors: Andrea Gallardo, Chris Choy, Jaideep Juneja, Efe Bozkir, Camille Cobb, Lujo Bauer, Lorrie Cranor
papers.abstract: As technology companies develop mass market augmented reality (AR) glasses that are increasingly sensor-laden and affordable, uses of such devices pose potential privacy and security problems. Though prior work has broadly addressed some of these problems, our work specifically addresses the potential data collection of 15 data types by AR glasses and five potential data uses. Via semi-structured interviews, we explored the attitudes and concerns of 21 current AR technology users regarding potential data collection and data use by hypothetical consumer-grade AR glasses. Participants expressed diverse concerns and suggested potential limits to AR data collection and use, evoking privacy concepts and informational norms. We discuss how participants’ attitudes and reservations about data collection and use, like definitions of privacy, are varying and context-dependent, and make recommendations for designers and policy makers, including customizable and multidimensional privacy solutions.
papers.title_zh: 对AR眼镜数据收集的猜测性隐私担忧
papers.abstract_zh: 随着科技公司开发越来越多的传感器和负担得起的大众市场增强现实(AR)眼镜，这种设备的使用带来了潜在的隐私和安全问题。虽然先前的工作已经广泛地解决了这些问题中的一些，但是我们的工作具体地解决了AR眼镜的15种数据类型的潜在数据收集和五种潜在数据使用。通过半结构化采访，我们探讨了21位当前AR技术用户对假设的消费级AR眼镜的潜在数据收集和数据使用的态度和担忧。与会者表达了不同的关切，并提出了AR数据收集和使用的潜在限制，引发了隐私概念和信息规范。我们讨论了参与者对数据收集和使用的态度和保留，如隐私的定义，是如何变化和依赖于上下文的，并为设计者和决策者提出了建议，包括可定制的多维隐私解决方案。

papers.title: End-to-end Privacy Preserving Training and Inference for Air Pollution Forecasting with Data from Rival Fleets
papers.authors: Gauri Gupta, Krithika Ramesh, Anwesh Bhattacharya, Divya Gupta, Rahul Sharma, Nishanth Chandran, Rijurekha Sen
papers.abstract: Privacy-preserving machine learning (PPML) promises to train machine learning (ML) models by combining data spread across multiple data silos. Theoretically, secure multiparty computation (MPC) allows multiple data owners to train models on their joint data without revealing the data to each other. However, the prior implementations of this secure training using MPC have three limitations: they have only been evaluated on CNNs, and LSTMs have been ignored; fixed point approximations have affected training accuracies compared to training in floating point; and due to significant latency overheads of secure training via MPC, its relevance for practical tasks with streaming data remains unclear. The motivation of this work is to report our experience of addressing the practical problem of secure training and inference of models for urban sensing problems, e.g., traffic congestion estimation, or air pollution monitoring in large cities, where data can be contributed by rival fleet companies while balancing the privacy-accuracy trade-offs using MPC-based techniques.Our first contribution is to design a custom ML model for this task that can be efficiently trained with MPC within a desirable latency. In particular, we design a GCN-LSTM and securely train it on time-series sensor data for accurate forecasting, within 7 minutes per epoch. As our second contribution, we build an end-to-end system of private training and inference that provably matches the training accuracy of cleartext ML training. This work is the first to securely train a model with LSTM cells. Third, this trained model is kept secret-shared between the fleet companies and allows clients to make sensitive queries to this model while carefully handling potentially invalid queries. Our custom protocols allow clients to query predictions from privately trained models in milliseconds, all the while maintaining accuracy and cryptographic security.
papers.title_zh: 利用来自竞争舰队的数据进行空气污染预报的端到端隐私保护训练和推断
papers.abstract_zh: 保护隐私的机器学习(PPML)承诺通过组合分布在多个数据仓库的数据来训练机器学习(ML)模型。理论上，安全多方计算(MPC)允许多个数据所有者根据他们的联合数据训练模型，而不会向彼此透露数据。然而，使用MPC的这种安全训练的先前实现具有三个限制:它们仅在CNN上被评估，并且LSTMs被忽略；与浮点训练相比，定点近似已经影响了训练精度；并且由于通过MPC的安全训练的显著延迟开销，其与流数据的实际任务的相关性仍然不清楚。这项工作的动机是报告我们解决城市传感问题模型的安全训练和推理的实际问题的经验，例如交通拥堵估计或大城市的空气污染监测，其中数据可以由竞争对手的车队公司提供，同时使用基于MPC的技术平衡隐私准确性的权衡。我们的第一个贡献是为这个任务设计一个定制的ML模型，它可以在期望的延迟内用MPC有效地训练。特别是，我们设计了一个GCN-LSTM，并根据时间序列传感器数据安全地对其进行训练，以便在每个时期的7分钟内进行准确预测。作为我们的第二个贡献，我们建立了一个端到端的私人训练和推理系统，该系统可证明与明文ML训练的训练准确性相匹配。这项工作是第一次用LSTM细胞安全地训练一个模型。第三，这种经过训练的模型是保密的——在车队公司之间共享，并允许客户对这种模型进行敏感查询，同时小心处理潜在的无效查询。我们的定制协议允许客户在几毫秒内从私人训练的模型中查询预测，同时保持准确性和加密安全性。

papers.title: Everybody's Looking for SSOmething: A large-scale evaluation on the privacy of OAuth authentication on the web
papers.authors: Yana Dimova, Tom van Goethem, Wouter Joosen
papers.abstract: The management of many different login credentials can be tricky for the average web user. OAuth eases this process by invoking identity providers (IdPs) as intermediaries, which identify the users and access their data on behalf of the website, without sharing their credentials. However, the information that IdPs share with websites is not always limited to basic data. Our work observes and documents that IdPs make a variety of resources (scopes) available to be requested by websites, most of which are not necessary for user identification (e.g., location, interests). By performing a large-scale analysis on OAuth-based login on the web, we show that 18.53% of websites using OAuth request at least one non-minimal scope. Additionally, our findings show that at least part of the requested information is redundant since websites provide alternative login methods that require less information from the user. Moreover, through a manual analysis we observe that revoking access to these scopes seems not to hinder the functionality of the website. Finally, when comparing OAuth-based login with registering a new account, we find that OAuth is often the more privacy-friendly option in terms of the amount of personal data being shared with the website.
papers.title_zh: 每个人都在寻找一些东西:一个关于OAuth认证隐私的大规模评估
papers.abstract_zh: 对于普通的web用户来说，管理许多不同的登录凭证可能很棘手。OAuth通过调用身份提供者(IDP)作为中介来简化这一过程，身份提供者代表网站识别用户并访问他们的数据，而不共享他们的凭据。然而，国内流离失所者与网站分享的信息并不总是局限于基本数据。我们的工作观察并记录了IDP使各种资源(范围)可供网站请求，其中大多数对于用户识别(例如，位置、兴趣)是不必要的。通过对web上基于OAuth的登录进行大规模分析，我们发现18.53%使用OAuth的网站请求至少一个非最小范围。此外，我们的研究结果表明，至少有一部分被请求的信息是多余的，因为网站提供的替代登录方法需要用户提供的信息较少。此外，通过手动分析，我们观察到撤销对这些范围的访问似乎不会妨碍网站的功能。最后，当比较基于OAuth的登录和注册新帐户时，我们发现就与网站共享的个人数据量而言，OAuth通常是更有利于隐私的选择。

papers.title: On the Role and Form of Personal Information Disclosure in Cyberbullying Incidents
papers.authors: Sadiq Aliyu, Kavous Salehzadeh Niksirat, Kévin Huguenin, Mauro Cherubini
papers.abstract: Disclosing personal information significantly increases the likelihood of incidents of cyberbullying. This highlights the significance of investigating the relationships between various stakeholders in cyberbullying incidents. Our objective is to gain insight into the roles of the stakeholders, types, and typical paths of personal information in cyberbullying incidents. To achieve this, we conducted a large-scale survey with a representative sample of internet users from the United States and Nigeria (N = 1555). Our findings indicate that cyberbullying is often fueled by personal information that becomes known, directly or through social media, to other stakeholders. Cyberbullying incidents involve more than just attackers and victims; they can involve other stakeholders as third-parties 'disclosers' Both strangers and friends typically engage in such activities. Cyberbullying incidents are twice as common in Nigeria as in the United States. Our findings have implications for design, social-media literacy programs, and policy.
papers.title_zh: 个人信息披露在网络欺凌事件中的作用和形式
papers.abstract_zh: 披露个人信息会大大增加网络欺凌事件的可能性。这凸显了调查网络欺凌事件中各利益相关者之间关系的重要性。我们的目标是深入了解网络欺凌事件中利益相关者的角色、类型以及个人信息的典型途径。为了实现这一目标，我们对来自美国和尼日利亚的具有代表性的互联网用户样本进行了大规模调查(N = 1555)。我们的发现表明，网络欺凌往往是由直接或通过社交媒体为其他利益相关者所知的个人信息所推动的。网络欺凌事件涉及的不仅仅是攻击者和受害者；他们可以让其他利益相关者作为第三方“披露者”参与进来，陌生人和朋友通常都会参与此类活动。网络欺凌事件在尼日利亚的发生率是美国的两倍。我们的发现对设计、社交媒体素养项目和政策都有意义。

papers.title: GDPRxiv: Establishing the State of the Art in GDPR Enforcement
papers.authors: Chen Sun, Evan Jacobs, Daniel Lehmann, Andrew Crouse, Supreeth Shastri
papers.abstract: Though European Union's General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is hailed as a model privacy regulation, details about its enforcement are not well understood. To address this gap, we propose establishing the state of the art (SOTA) in GDPR enforcement, and present the design and implementation of GDPRxiv: an information archival system that collects and curates GDPR rulings, judgements, reports, and official guidances. GDPRxiv consists of 8000+ official precedents and guidances, the largest such collection. To demonstrate the usefulness of this corpora, we share insights gleaned at the aggregate-level (say, how is the GDPR being enforced in the field) and at the article-level (say, what are the common failures observed in the field while implementing article-17 Right to be Forgotten). We release all of our software artifacts and datasets at https://GDPRxiv.org.
papers.title_zh: GDPRxiv:建立最先进的GDPR执法系统
papers.abstract_zh: 尽管欧盟的《一般数据保护条例》( GDPR)被誉为隐私条例的典范，但关于其实施的细节并不为人所知。为了弥补这一差距，我们建议在GDPR执法中建立最先进的(SOTA ),并介绍GDPRxiv的设计和实现:一个收集和管理GDPR裁决、判决、报告和官方指南的信息档案系统。GDPRxiv包含8000多个官方判例和指南，是最大的此类收藏。为了证明这个语料库的有用性，我们分享了在总体层面(比如，GDPR是如何在实地执行的)和在文章层面(比如，在实地执行第17条“被遗忘的权利”时观察到的常见失败)收集的见解。我们在https://GDPRxiv.org发布我们所有的软件产品和数据集。

papers.title: Privacy-Preserving Federated Recurrent Neural Networks
papers.authors: Sinem Sav, Abdulrahman Diaa, Apostolos Pyrgelis, Jean-Philippe Bossuat, Jean-Pierre Hubaux
papers.abstract: We present RHODE, a novel system that enables privacy-preserving training of and prediction on Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs) in a cross-silo federated learning setting by relying on multiparty homomorphic encryption. RHODE preserves the confidentiality of the training data, the model, and the prediction data; and it mitigates federated learning attacks that target the gradients under a passive-adversary threat model. We propose a packing scheme, multi-dimensional packing, for a better utilization of Single Instruction, Multiple Data (SIMD) operations under encryption. With multi-dimensional packing, RHODE enables the efficient processing, in parallel, of a batch of samples. To avoid the exploding gradients problem, RHODE provides several clipping approximations for performing gradient clipping under encryption. We experimentally show that the model performance with RHODE remains similar to non-secure solutions both for homogeneous and heterogeneous data distributions among the data holders. Our experimental evaluation shows that RHODE scales linearly with the number of data holders and the number of timesteps, sub-linearly and sub-quadratically with the number of features and the number of hidden units of RNNs, respectively. To the best of our knowledge, RHODE is the first system that provides the building blocks for the training of RNNs and its variants, under encryption in a federated learning setting.
papers.title_zh: 保护隐私的联邦递归神经网络
papers.abstract_zh: 我们介绍了RHODE，这是一个新的系统，它通过依赖于多方同态加密，在跨筒仓联邦学习设置中实现对递归神经网络(RNNs)的隐私保护训练和预测。RHODE保护训练数据、模型和预测数据的机密性；并且它减轻了针对被动-对手威胁模型下的梯度的联合学习攻击。为了更好地利用加密下的单指令多数据(SIMD)操作，我们提出了一种打包方案——多维打包。借助多维填料，RHODE能够并行高效处理一批样品。为了避免爆炸式渐变问题，RHODE提供了几种在加密下执行渐变裁剪的裁剪近似方法。我们通过实验表明，对于数据持有者之间的同构和异构数据分布，使用RHODE的模型性能仍然类似于非安全解决方案。我们的实验评估表明，RHODE分别与数据保持器的数量和时间步长的数量成线性关系，与特征的数量和rnn的隐藏单元的数量成亚线性和亚二次关系。据我们所知，RHODE是第一个在联合学习环境中加密的情况下，为RNNs及其变体的训练提供构件的系统。

papers.title: A Utility-Preserving Obfuscation Approach for YouTube Recommendations
papers.authors: Jiang Zhang, Hadi Askari, Konstantinos Psounis, Zubair Shafiq
papers.abstract: Online content platforms optimize engagement by providing personalized recommendations to their users. These recommendation systems track and profile users to predict relevant content a user is likely interested in. While the personalized recommendations provide utility to users, the tracking and profiling that enables them poses a privacy issue because the platform might infer potentially sensitive user interests. There is increasing interest in building privacy-enhancing obfuscation approaches that do not rely on cooperation from online content platforms. However, existing obfuscation approaches primarily focus on enhancing privacy but at the same time they degrade the utility because obfuscation introduces unrelated recommendations. We design and implement DeHarpo, an obfuscation approach for YouTube's recommendation system that not only obfuscates a user's video watch history to protect privacy but then also denoises the video recommendations by YouTube to preserve their utility. In contrast to prior obfuscation approaches, DeHarpo adds a denoiser that makes use of a ``secret'' input (i.e., a user's actual watch history) as well as information that is also available to the adversarial recommendation system (i.e., obfuscated watch history and corresponding ``nois`` recommendations). Our large-scale evaluation of DeHarpo shows that it outperforms the state-of-the-art by a factor of 2x in terms of preserving utility for the same level of privacy, while maintaining stealthiness and robustness to de-obfuscation.
papers.title_zh: 一种保持效用的YouTube推荐模糊方法
papers.abstract_zh: 在线内容平台通过向用户提供个性化推荐来优化参与度。这些推荐系统跟踪和描述用户，以预测用户可能感兴趣的相关内容。虽然个性化推荐为用户提供了效用，但是支持用户的跟踪和简档提出了隐私问题，因为平台可能推断出潜在的敏感用户兴趣。人们对构建不依赖于在线内容平台合作的隐私增强模糊方法越来越感兴趣。然而，现有的混淆方法主要关注于增强隐私，但同时它们降低了效用，因为混淆引入了不相关的推荐。我们设计并实现了DeHarpo，这是一种用于YouTube推荐系统的混淆方法，它不仅混淆用户的视频观看历史以保护隐私，而且还对YouTube的视频推荐进行去噪以保护它们的效用。与现有的混淆方法相反，DeHarpo增加了一个反混淆器，该反混淆器利用“秘密”输入(即，用户的实际观看历史)以及对抗推荐系统也可用的信息(即，混淆的观看历史和相应的“nois”推荐)。我们对DeHarpo的大规模评估表明，在保持相同隐私级别的效用方面，它比最先进的技术高出2倍，同时保持了去混淆的隐秘性和鲁棒性。

papers.title: Differentially Private Simple Genetic Algorithms
papers.authors: Thomas Humphries, Florian Kerschbaum
papers.abstract: The differentially private (DP) selection problem is a fundamental building block in the private literature that is commonly solved with the exponential mechanism. It is well known that efficiency is the major drawback of the exponential mechanism, as the utility function must be computed for all elements in the domain. Genetic algorithms (GAs) use the principles of evolution in nature to efficiently search through large domains and select the best candidate. We observe that GAs have many appealing properties for DP Selection. These include being robust to noisy objectives, placing no restriction on the utility function, and efficient runtime for large domains. However, prior work investigating DP GAs has shown poor utility in practice and often gives the highest utility when zero generations are conducted (indicating that GA operations are not beneficial under DP). This work provides a new DPGA based on the simple GA that addresses the weaknesses of prior solutions. We reduce the destructive nature of previous GA operators and utilize several techniques to reduce the noise from DP. Our modifications allow us to utilize the GA operators over multiple generations (under DP) and improve the GA's overall utility over zero generation techniques. Our work shows that private GAs are competitive with state-of-the-art general and problem-specific solutions to the DP selection problem, with runtime sublinear in the domain size.
papers.title_zh: 差分私有简单遗传算法
papers.abstract_zh: 差别私有(DP)选择问题是私有文献中的基本构件，通常用指数机制来解决。众所周知，效率是指数机制的主要缺点，因为必须为域中的所有元素计算效用函数。遗传算法(GAs)使用自然界中的进化原理来有效地搜索大范围并选择最佳候选。我们观察到气体对于DP选择具有许多吸引人的性质。这些包括对噪声目标的鲁棒性，对效用函数没有限制，以及对大范围的有效运行时间。然而，之前研究DP气体的工作表明，在实践中效用很差，并且当实施零代时，效用通常最高(表明在DP下GA操作没有益处)。这项工作提供了一个新的基于简单遗传算法的DPGA，解决了以前解决方案的缺点。我们减少了以前的遗传算子的破坏性，并利用几种技术来减少来自DP的噪声。我们的修改允许我们在多代(在DP下)中使用GA算子，并且相对于零代技术提高了GA的整体效用。我们的工作表明，私有GAs与DP选择问题的最先进的一般和特定问题解决方案相比具有竞争力，其运行时间在域大小上是次线性的。

papers.title: Data-Explainable Website Fingerprinting with Network Simulation
papers.authors: Rob Jansen, Ryan Wails
papers.abstract: Website fingerprinting (WF) attacks allow an adversary to associate a website with the encrypted traffic patterns produced when accessing it, thus threatening to destroy the client-server unlinkability promised by anonymous communication networks. Explainable WF is an open problem in which we need to improve our understanding of (1) the machine learning models used to conduct WF attacks; and (2) the WF datasets used as inputs to those models. This paper focuses on explainable datasets; that is, we develop an alternative to the standard practice of gathering low-quality WF datasets using synthetic browsers in large networks without controlling for natural network variability. In particular, we demonstrate how network simulation can be used to produce explainable WF datasets by leveraging the simulator's high degree of control over network operation. Through a detailed investigation of the effect of network variability on WF performance, we find that: (1) training and testing WF attacks in networks with distinct levels of congestion increases the false-positive rate by as much as 200%; (2) augmenting the WF attacks by training them across several networks with varying degrees of congestion decreases the false-positive rate by as much as 83%; and (3) WF classifiers trained on completely simulated data can achieve greater than 80% accuracy when applied to the real world.
papers.title_zh: 基于网络模拟的可解释数据的网站指纹识别
papers.abstract_zh: 网站指纹(WF)攻击允许对手将网站与访问时产生的加密流量模式相关联，从而有可能破坏匿名通信网络所承诺的客户端-服务器不可链接性。可解释的WF是一个公开的问题，其中我们需要提高我们对(1)用于进行WF攻击的机器学习模型的理解；以及(2)用作这些模型的输入的WF数据集。本文关注可解释的数据集；也就是说，我们开发了在大型网络中使用合成浏览器收集低质量WF数据集的标准实践的替代方案，而没有控制自然的网络可变性。特别是，我们演示了如何通过利用模拟器对网络操作的高度控制，使用网络模拟来产生可解释的WF数据集。通过对网络可变性对WF性能的影响的详细调查，我们发现:(1)在具有不同拥塞等级的网络中训练和测试WF攻击增加了高达200%的误报率；(2)通过在具有不同程度拥塞的几个网络上训练WF攻击来增加它们，降低了高达83%的假阳性率；以及(3)当应用于真实世界时，在完全模拟的数据上训练的WF分类器可以达到大于80%的准确度。

papers.title: Verifiable Distributed Aggregation Functions
papers.authors: Hannah Davis, Christopher Patton, Mike Rosulek, Phillipp Schoppmann
papers.abstract: The modern Internet is built on systems that incentivize collection of information about users. In order to minimize privacy loss, it is desirable to prevent these systems from collecting more information than is required for the application. The promise of multi-party computation is that data can be aggregated without revealing individual measurements to the data collector. This work offers a provable security treatment for "Verifiable Distributed Aggregation Functions (VDAFs)", a class of multi-party computation protocols being considered for standardization by the IETF. We propose a formal framework for the analysis of VDAFs and apply it to two constructions. The first is Prio3, one of the candidates for standardization. This VDAF is based on the Prio system of Corrigan-Gibbs and Boneh (NSDI 2017). We prove that Prio3 achieves our security goals with only minor changes to the draft. The second construction, called Doplar, is introduced by this paper. Doplar is a round-reduced variant of the Poplar system of Boneh et al. (IEEE S&P 2021), itself a candidate for standardization. The cost of this improvement is a modest increase in overall bandwidth and computation.
papers.title_zh: 可验证的分布式聚合函数
papers.abstract_zh: 现代互联网建立在鼓励收集用户信息的系统之上。为了最小化隐私损失，希望防止这些系统收集比应用程序所需更多的信息。多方计算的承诺是可以聚合数据，而不会向数据收集器透露单个的测量结果。这项工作为“可验证的分布式聚合函数(VDAFs)”提供了一种可证明的安全性处理，这是一类由IETF考虑标准化的多方计算协议。我们提出了一个分析VDAFs的形式化框架，并将其应用于两个构造。首先是Prio3，标准化的候选之一。该VDAF基于科里甘-吉布斯和博纳(NSDI 2017)的Prio系统。我们证明Prio3实现了我们的安全目标，只对草案做了微小的修改。本文介绍了第二种结构，称为Doplar。Doplar是Boneh等人(IEEE S&P 2021)的杨树系统的一种舍入变体，其本身是标准化的候选。这种改进的代价是总带宽和计算量的适度增加。

papers.title: Throwing Your Weight Around: Fixing Tor's Positional Weighting
papers.authors: Aaron Johnson, Aaron D. Jaggard, Paul Syverson
papers.abstract: We analyze deficiencies in Tor's positional weighting system, identifying cases in which the system either fails to produce valid weights or fails to properly load balance across positions. We describe how an attacker can take advantage of these failures to reduce Tor's performance, thereby also easing censorship and surveillance through a denial-of-service attack. Our attacks exploit incorrectly determined positional-weight equations by adding new capacity to the network or, for even more covertness, by just minor changes in the status of existing malicious relays. Our analysis of past Tor consensuses shows that these attacks could have reduced the throughput of the network by as much as 45% due only to their triggering of Tor's flawed position weights. Rather than a mere patch to Tor's currently ad hoc scheme, we then propose a new, systematic method for deriving positional weights and propose two goal sets generated using that method. We derive new sets of weights, prove that they satisfy these goal sets, and give examples of how they would change the weights from the current system. Tor could use our results to quickly fix the main deficiencies of its positional weights as well as adopt a better approach long-term.
papers.title_zh: 四处耀武扬威:固定Tor的位置权重
papers.abstract_zh: 我们分析Tor持仓加权系统的缺陷，找出系统无法产生有效权重或无法正确平衡持仓的情况。我们描述了攻击者如何利用这些失败来降低Tor的性能，从而通过拒绝服务攻击来放松审查和监视。我们的攻击通过向网络增加新的容量，或者为了更加隐蔽，通过对现有恶意中继的状态进行微小的改变，来利用错误确定的位置权重方程。我们对过去Tor共识的分析表明，这些攻击可能会使网络吞吐量降低45%，这仅仅是因为它们触发了Tor有缺陷的位置权重。我们提出了一种新的、系统的方法来推导位置权重，并提出了使用该方法生成的两个目标集，而不仅仅是对Tor当前的特别方案的修补。我们推导出新的权重集，证明它们满足这些目标集，并举例说明它们将如何改变当前系统的权重。Tor可以使用我们的结果快速修复其位置权重的主要缺陷，并采用更好的长期方法。

2022.journals_title: Proceedings on Privacy Enhancing Technologies, Volume 2022

papers.title: Editors' Introduction
papers.authors: Kostas Chatzikokolakis, Aaron Johnson
papers.abstract: Is there currently a crisis of confidence in psychological science reflecting an unprecedented level of doubt among practitioners about the reliability of research findings in the field? It would certainly appear that there is. These doubts emerged and grew as a series of unhappy events unfolded in 2011: the Diederik Stapel fraud case (see Stroebe, Postmes, & Spears, 2012, this issue), the publication in a major social psychology journal of an article purporting to show evidence of extrasensory perception (Bem, 2011) followed by widespread public mockery (see Galak, LeBoeuf, Nelson, & Simmons, in press; Wagenmakers, Wetzels, Borsboom, & van der Maas, 2011), reports by Wicherts and colleagues that psychologists are often unwilling or unable to share their published data for reanalysis (Wicherts, Bakker, & Molenaar, 2011; see also Wicherts, Borsboom, Kats, & Molenaar, 2006), and the publication of an important article in Psychological Science showing how easily researchers can, in the absence of any real effects, nonetheless obtain statistically significant differences through various questionable research practices (QRPs) such as exploring multiple dependent variables or covariates and only reporting these when they yield significant results (Simmons, Nelson, & Simonsohn, 2011). For those psychologists who expected that the embarrassments of 2011 would soon recede into memory, 2012 offered instead a quick plunge from bad to worse, with new indications of outright fraud in the field of social cognition (Simonsohn, 2012), an article in Psychological Science showing that many psychologists admit to engaging in at least some of the QRPs examined by Simmons and colleagues (John, Loewenstein, & Prelec, 2012), troubling new meta-analytic evidence suggesting that the QRPs described by Simmons and colleagues may even be leaving telltale signs visible in the distribution of p values in the psychological literature (Masicampo & Lalande, in press; Simonsohn, 2012), and an acrimonious dust-up in science magazines and blogs centered around the problems some investigators were having in replicating well-known results from the field of social cognition (Bower, 2012; Yong, 2012). Although the very public problems experienced by psychology over this 2-year period are embarrassing to those of us working in the field, some have found comfort in the fact that, over the same period, similar concerns have been arising across the scientific landscape (triggered by revelations that will be described shortly). Some of the suspected causes of unreplicability, such as publication bias (the tendency to publish only positive findings) have been discussed for years; in fact, the phrase file-drawer problem was first coined by a distinguished psychologist several decades ago (Rosenthal, 1979). However, many have speculated that these problems have been exacerbated in recent years as academia reaps the harvest of a hypercompetitive academic climate and an incentive scheme that provides rich rewards for overselling one’s work and few rewards at all for caution and circumspection (see Giner-Sorolla, 2012, this issue). Equally disturbing, investigators seem to be replicating each others’ work even less often than they did in the past, again presumably reflecting an incentive scheme gone askew (a point discussed in several articles in this issue, e.g., Makel, Plucker, & Hegarty, 2012). The frequency with which errors appear in the psychological literature is not presently known, but a number of facts suggest it might be disturbingly high. Ioannidis (2005) has shown through simple mathematical modeling that any scientific field that ignores replication can easily come to the miserable state wherein (as the title of his most famous article puts it) “most published research findings are false” (see also Ioannidis, 2012, this issue, and Pashler & Harris, 2012, this issue). Meanwhile, reports emerging from cancer research have made such grim scenarios seem more plausible: In 2012, several large pharmaceutical companies revealed that their efforts to replicate exciting preclinical findings from published academic studies in cancer biology were only rarely verifying the original results (Begley & Ellis, 2012; see also Osherovich, 2011; Prinz, Schlange, & Asadullah, 2011).
papers.abstract_zh: 目前心理科学是否出现了信任危机，反映出从业者对该领域研究结果的可靠性产生了前所未有的怀疑？显然是有的。随着2011年一系列不愉快事件的发生，这些怀疑出现了，并有所增长:Diederik Stapel欺诈案(见Stroebe，Postmes，& Spears，2012，这一期)，在一份主要的社会心理学杂志上发表了一篇文章，声称显示了超感知觉的证据(Bem，2011)，随后受到了广泛的公开嘲笑(见Galak，LeBoeuf，Nelson，& Simmons，正在出版中；Wagenmakers，Wetzels，Borsboom，& van der Maas，2011)，Wicherts及其同事报告说，心理学家往往不愿意或不能分享他们发表的数据进行再分析(Wicherts，Bakker，& Molenaar，2011；另见Wicherts，Borsboom，Kats，& Molenaar，2006)，以及发表在《心理科学》上的一篇重要文章，该文章表明，在没有任何实际影响的情况下，研究人员可以通过各种有问题的研究实践(qrp)轻松地获得统计学上的显著差异，如探索多个因变量或协变量，并仅在它们产生显著结果时报告这些结果(Simmons，Nelson，& Simonsohn，2011)。对于那些预计2011年的尴尬将很快消失在记忆中的心理学家来说，2012年反而提供了一个从糟糕到更糟糕的快速跳水，在社会认知领域出现了新的明显的欺诈迹象(Simonsohn，2012)，心理科学中的一篇文章显示，许多心理学家承认至少参与了Simmons及其同事检查的一些快速反应程序(John，Loewenstein，& Prelec，2012)。 令人不安的新荟萃分析证据表明，Simmons及其同事描述的qrp甚至可能在心理学文献中的p值分布中留下明显的迹象(Masicampo & Lalande，出版中； Simonsohn，2012)，科学杂志和博客上围绕一些研究人员在复制社会认知领域的知名结果时遇到的问题展开了激烈的争论(Bower，2012；永，2012)。虽然心理学在这两年中所经历的非常公开的问题令我们这些在该领域工作的人感到尴尬，但一些人已经找到了安慰，因为在同一时期，类似的担忧已经在整个科学领域出现(由即将描述的启示引发)。一些不可复制的可疑原因，如发表偏倚(倾向于只发表积极的发现)已经讨论了多年；事实上，抽屉问题这个短语是由一位杰出的心理学家在几十年前首次提出的(Rosenthal，1979)。然而，许多人推测，这些问题在最近几年已经恶化，因为学术界收获了高度竞争的学术氛围和奖励计划，这种奖励计划为过度销售自己的工作提供了丰厚的奖励，而对谨慎和谨慎却几乎没有奖励(见吉纳-索罗拉，2012年，这一期)。同样令人不安的是，研究人员似乎比过去更少地重复彼此的工作，这可能再次反映了一个倾斜的激励机制(这一点在本期的几篇文章中讨论过，例如，马克尔、普吕克尔和赫加蒂，2012)。错误出现在心理学文献中的频率目前还不清楚，但许多事实表明它可能高得令人不安。约安尼迪斯(2005)通过简单的数学建模表明，任何忽视复制的科学领域都很容易陷入悲惨的境地，其中(正如他最著名的文章的标题所言)“大多数发表的研究结果都是错误的”(另见约安尼迪斯，2012，本期，以及Pashler & Harris，2012，本期)。与此同时，来自癌症研究的报告让这种严峻的情景看起来更加可信:2012年，几家大型制药公司透露，他们在癌症生物学方面复制已发表学术研究中令人兴奋的临床前发现的努力很少验证原始结果(Begley & Ellis，2012；另见Osherovich，2011年；普林茨、施朗格和阿萨杜拉，2011年)。
papers.title_zh: 编辑介绍

papers.title: Personal information inference from voice recordings: User awareness and privacy concerns
papers.authors: Jacob Leon Kröger, Leon Gellrich, Sebastian Pape, Saba Rebecca Brause, Stefan Ullrich
papers.abstract: Abstract Through voice characteristics and manner of expression, even seemingly benign voice recordings can reveal sensitive attributes about a recorded speaker (e. g., geographical origin, health status, personality). We conducted a nationally representative survey in the UK (n = 683, 18–69 years) to investigate people’s awareness about the inferential power of voice and speech analysis. Our results show that – while awareness levels vary between different categories of inferred information – there is generally low awareness across all participant demographics, even among participants with professional experience in computer science, data mining, and IT security. For instance, only 18.7% of participants are at least somewhat aware that physical and mental health information can be inferred from voice recordings. Many participants have rarely (28.4%) or never (42.5%) even thought about the possibility of personal information being inferred from speech data. After a short educational video on the topic, participants express only moderate privacy concern. However, based on an analysis of open text responses, unconcerned reactions seem to be largely explained by knowledge gaps about possible data misuses. Watching the educational video lowered participants’ intention to use voice-enabled devices. In discussing the regulatory implications of our findings, we challenge the notion of “informed consent” to data processing. We also argue that inferences about individuals need to be legally recognized as personal data and protected accordingly.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要通过语音特征和表达方式，即使看似良性的语音记录也可以揭示关于被记录的说话者的敏感属性(例如，地理来源、健康状况、个性)。我们在英国进行了一项具有全国代表性的调查(n = 683，18-69岁)，以调查人们对语音和言语分析的推理能力的认识。我们的结果表明——虽然不同类别的推断信息的认知水平不同——但所有参与者的认知水平普遍较低，即使在具有计算机科学、数据挖掘和IT安全专业经验的参与者中也是如此。例如，只有18.7%的参与者至少在某种程度上意识到可以从语音记录中推断出生理和心理健康信息。许多参与者很少(28.4%)或从未(42.5%)想过从语音数据中推断个人信息的可能性。在一个简短的关于这个话题的教育视频之后，参与者只表达了适度的隐私担忧。然而，基于对开放文本回答的分析，漠不关心的反应似乎在很大程度上可以用关于可能的数据误用的知识缺口来解释。观看教育视频降低了参与者使用语音设备的意愿。在讨论我们的发现的监管含义时，我们对数据处理的“知情同意”的概念提出了质疑。我们还认为，关于个人的推论需要在法律上被承认为个人数据，并得到相应的保护。
papers.title_zh: 从录音中推断个人信息:用户意识和隐私问题

papers.title: Forward and Backward-Secure Range-Searchable Symmetric Encryption
papers.authors: Jiafan Wang, Sherman S. M. Chow
papers.abstract: Abstract Dynamic searchable symmetric encryption (DSSE) allows a client to query or update an outsourced encrypted database. Range queries are commonly needed. Previous range-searchable schemes either do not support updates natively (SIGMOD’16) or use file indexes of many long bit-vectors for distinct keywords, which only support toggling updates via homomorphically flipping the presence bit. (ESORICS’18). We propose a generic upgrade of any (inverted-index) DSSE to support range queries (a.k.a. range DSSE), without homomorphic encryption, and a specific instantiation with a new trade-off reducing client-side storage. Our schemes achieve forward security, an important property that mitigates file injection attacks. Moreover, we identify a variant of injection attacks against the first somewhat dynamic scheme (ESORICS’18). We also extend the definition of backward security to range DSSE and show that our schemes are compatible with a generic upgrade of backward security (CCS’17). We comprehensively analyze the computation and communication overheads, including implementation details of client-side index-related operations omitted by prior schemes. We show high empirical efficiency for million-scale databases over a million-scale keyword space.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要动态可搜索对称加密(DSSE)允许客户端查询或更新外包加密数据库。通常需要范围查询。先前的可范围搜索的方案或者不支持本地更新(SIGMOD’16 ),或者对不同的关键字使用许多长位向量的文件索引，其仅支持通过同态翻转存在位来切换更新。(ESORICS'18)。我们提出了任何(倒排索引)DSSE的通用升级，以支持范围查询(也称为范围DSSE)，没有同态加密，以及具有新的折衷的特定实例化，减少了客户端存储。我们的方案实现了前向安全性，这是减轻文件注入攻击的一个重要属性。此外，我们确定了针对第一种动态方案的注入攻击的变体(ESORICS'18)。我们还将后向安全性的定义扩展到距离DSSE，并表明我们的方案与后向安全性的一般升级(CCS'17)兼容。我们全面分析了计算和通信开销，包括先前方案中省略的客户端索引相关操作的实现细节。我们展示了在百万规模的关键词空间上百万规模的数据库的高经验效率。
papers.title_zh: 前向和后向安全范围可搜索对称加密

papers.title: (∈, δ)-Indistinguishable Mixing for Cryptocurrencies
papers.authors: Mingyu Liang, Ioanna Karantaidou, Foteini Baldimtsi, S. Dov Gordon, Mayank Varia
papers.abstract: Abstract We propose a new theoretical approach for building anonymous mixing mechanisms for cryptocurrencies. Rather than requiring a fully uniform permutation during mixing, we relax the requirement, insisting only that neighboring permutations are similarly likely. This is defined formally by borrowing from the definition of differential privacy. This relaxed privacy definition allows us to greatly reduce the amount of interaction and computation in the mixing protocol. Our construction achieves O(n·polylog(n)) computation time for mixing n addresses, whereas all other mixing schemes require O(n2) total computation across all parties. Additionally, we support a smooth tolerance of fail-stop adversaries and do not require any trusted setup. We analyze the security of our generic protocol under the UC framework, and under a stand-alone, game-based definition. We finally describe an instantiation using ring signatures and confidential transactions.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要我们提出了一种新的理论方法来建立加密货币的匿名混合机制。在混合过程中，我们没有要求完全一致的排列，而是放宽了要求，只坚持相邻的排列有相似的可能性。这是借用差分隐私的定义正式定义的。这种宽松的隐私定义允许我们大大减少混合协议中的交互和计算量。对于混合n个地址，我们的构造实现了O(n polylog(n))的计算时间，而所有其他混合方案需要所有各方O(n2)的总计算量。此外，我们支持故障停机对手的平稳容错，并且不需要任何可信设置。我们在UC框架下，以及在独立的、基于游戏的定义下，分析了我们的通用协议的安全性。我们最后描述了一个使用环签名和保密事务的实例。
papers.title_zh: 加密货币的(∈，δ)-不可区分混合

papers.title: MLEFlow: Learning from History to Improve Load Balancing in Tor
papers.authors: Hussein Darir, Hussein Sibai, Chin-Yu Cheng, Nikita Borisov, Geir E. Dullerud, Sayan Mitra
papers.abstract: Abstract Tor has millions of daily users seeking privacy while browsing the Internet. It has thousands of relays to route users’ packets while anonymizing their sources and destinations. Users choose relays to forward their traffic according to probability distributions published by the Tor authorities. The authorities generate these probability distributions based on estimates of the capacities of the relays. They compute these estimates based on the bandwidths of probes sent to the relays. These estimates are necessary for better load balancing. Unfortunately, current methods fall short of providing accurate estimates leaving the network underutilized and its capacities unfairly distributed between the users’ paths. We present MLEFlow, a maximum likelihood approach for estimating relay capacities for optimal load balancing in Tor. We show that MLEFlow generalizes a version of Tor capacity estimation, TorFlow-P, by making better use of measurement history. We prove that the mean of our estimate converges to a small interval around the actual capacities, while the variance converges to zero. We present two versions of MLEFlow: MLEFlow-CF, a closed-form approximation of the MLE and MLEFlow-Q, a discretization and iterative approximation of the MLE which can account for noisy observations. We demonstrate the practical benefits of MLEFlow by simulating it using a flow-based Python simulator of a full Tor network and packet-based Shadow simulation of a scaled down version. In our simulations MLEFlow provides significantly more accurate estimates, which result in improved user performance, with median download speeds increasing by 30%.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要Tor每天有数百万用户在浏览互联网时寻求隐私。它有数以千计的中继来路由用户的数据包，同时匿名用户的来源和目的地。用户根据Tor权威发布的概率分布选择中继来转发他们的流量。当局基于对继电器容量的估计来生成这些概率分布。他们根据发送到中继站的探测带宽来计算这些估计值。这些估计对于更好的负载平衡是必要的。不幸的是，当前的方法不能提供准确的估计，使得网络未被充分利用，并且其容量不公平地分布在用户路径之间。我们提出了MLEFlow，一种估计Tor中最优负载均衡的中继容量的最大似然方法。我们表明，MLEFlow通过更好地利用测量历史，概括了Tor容量估计的一个版本，TorFlow-P。我们证明了我们的估计的均值收敛于实际容量附近的一个小区间，而方差收敛于零。我们提出了MLEFlow的两个版本:MLEFlow-CF，MLE和MLEFlow-Q的闭合形式近似，MLE的离散化和迭代近似，可以考虑噪声观测。我们通过使用完整tor网络的基于流的Python模拟器和缩小版本的基于包的阴影模拟来模拟MLEFlow，展示了mle flow的实际好处。在我们的模拟中，MLEFlow提供了更加精确的估计，从而提高了用户性能，平均下载速度提高了30%。
papers.title_zh: MLEFlow:从历史中学习以改善Tor中的负载平衡

papers.title: How Can and Would People Protect From Online Tracking?
papers.authors: Maryam Mehrnezhad, Kovila P. L. Coopamootoo, Ehsan Toreini
papers.abstract: Abstract Online tracking is complex and users find it challenging to protect themselves from it. While the academic community has extensively studied systems and users for tracking practices, the link between the data protection regulations, websites’ practices of presenting privacy-enhancing technologies (PETs), and how users learn about PETs and practice them is not clear. This paper takes a multidimensional approach to find such a link. We conduct a study to evaluate the 100 top EU websites, where we find that information about PETs is provided far beyond the cookie notice. We also find that opting-out from privacy settings is not as easy as opting-in and becomes even more difficult (if not impossible) when the user decides to opt-out of previously accepted privacy settings. In addition, we conduct an online survey with 614 participants across three countries (UK, France, Germany) to gain a broad understanding of users’ tracking protection practices. We find that users mostly learn about PETs for tracking protection via their own research or with the help of family and friends. We find a disparity between what websites offer as tracking protection and the ways individuals report to do so. Observing such a disparity sheds light on why current policies and practices are ineffective in supporting the use of PETs by users.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要在线跟踪很复杂，用户发现保护自己免受其害很有挑战性。虽然学术界已经广泛研究了跟踪实践的系统和用户，但数据保护法规、网站展示隐私增强技术(pet)的实践以及用户如何了解和实践pet之间的联系尚不清楚。本文采用多维的方法来寻找这种联系。我们进行了一项研究来评估100家顶级欧盟网站，我们发现这些网站提供的关于宠物的信息远远超出了cookie通知的范围。我们还发现，退出隐私设置不像加入隐私设置那么容易，当用户决定退出之前接受的隐私设置时，退出会变得更加困难(如果不是不可能的话)。此外，我们对三个国家(英国、法国、德国)的614名参与者进行了在线调查，以广泛了解用户的跟踪保护实践。我们发现，用户大多通过自己的研究或在家人和朋友的帮助下了解宠物的跟踪保护。我们发现网站提供的跟踪保护和个人报告的方式之间存在差异。观察这种差异有助于理解为什么当前的政策和实践在支持用户使用宠物方面是无效的。
papers.title_zh: 人们如何保护自己免受网上追踪？

papers.title: Towards Improving Code Stylometry Analysis in Underground Forums
papers.authors: Michal Tereszkowski-Kaminski, Sergio Pastrana, Jorge Blasco, Guillermo Suarez-Tangil
papers.abstract: Abstract Code Stylometry has emerged as a powerful mechanism to identify programmers. While there have been significant advances in the field, existing mechanisms underperform in challenging domains. One such domain is studying the provenance of code shared in underground forums, where code posts tend to have small or incomplete source code fragments. This paper proposes a method designed to deal with the idiosyncrasies of code snippets shared in these forums. Our system fuses a forum-specific learning pipeline with Conformal Prediction to generate predictions with precise confidence levels as a novelty. We see that identifying unreliable code snippets is paramount to generate high-accuracy predictions, and this is a task where traditional learning settings fail. Overall, our method performs as twice as well as the state-of-the-art in a constrained setting with a large number of authors (i.e., 100). When dealing with a smaller number of authors (i.e., 20), it performs at high accuracy (89%). We also evaluate our work on an open-world assumption and see that our method is more effective at retaining samples.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象代码风格学已经成为一种识别程序员的强大机制。虽然在这一领域取得了重大进展，但现有机制在具有挑战性的领域表现不佳。其中一个领域是研究地下论坛中共享代码的出处，那里的代码帖子往往只有很小或不完整的源代码片段。本文提出了一种方法，旨在处理这些论坛中共享的代码片段的特性。我们的系统将特定论坛的学习管道与保形预测相融合，以生成具有精确置信度的预测，这是一种创新。我们看到，识别不可靠的代码片段对于生成高准确度的预测至关重要，而这是一项传统学习设置失败的任务。总体而言，我们的方法在具有大量作者(即，100个)的受限设置中的性能是现有技术的两倍。当处理较少数量的作者(即20个)时，它的准确率很高(89%)。我们还在开放世界假设上评估了我们的工作，并看到我们的方法在保留样本方面更有效。
papers.title_zh: 改进地下论坛中的代码风格分析

papers.title: Ulixes: Facial Recognition Privacy with Adversarial Machine Learning
papers.authors: Thomas Cilloni, Wei Wang, Charles Walter, Charles Fleming
papers.abstract: Abstract Facial recognition tools are becoming exceptionally accurate in identifying people from images. However, this comes at the cost of privacy for users of online services with photo management (e.g. social media platforms). Particularly troubling is the ability to leverage unsupervised learning to recognize faces even when the user has not labeled their images. In this paper we propose Ulixes, a strategy to generate visually non-invasive facial noise masks that yield adversarial examples, preventing the formation of identifiable user clusters in the embedding space of facial encoders. This is applicable even when a user is unmasked and labeled images are available online. We demonstrate the effectiveness of Ulixes by showing that various classification and clustering methods cannot reliably label the adversarial examples we generate. We also study the effects of Ulixes in various black-box settings and compare it to the current state of the art in adversarial machine learning. Finally, we challenge the effectiveness of Ulixes against adversarially trained models and show that it is robust to countermeasures.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要面部识别工具在从图像中识别人方面变得异常准确。然而，这是以牺牲照片管理在线服务(如社交媒体平台)用户的隐私为代价的。尤其令人不安的是利用无监督学习来识别人脸的能力，即使用户没有标记他们的图像。在本文中，我们提出了Ulixes，一种生成视觉上非侵入性的面部噪声掩模的策略，该掩模产生对立的例子，防止在面部编码器的嵌入空间中形成可识别的用户群。即使当用户未被掩蔽并且标记的图像在线可用时，这也是适用的。我们通过表明各种分类和聚类方法不能可靠地标记我们生成的对立例子来证明Ulixes的有效性。我们还研究了Ulixes在各种黑盒设置中的效果，并将其与对抗性机器学习的当前艺术状态进行比较。最后，我们对Ulixes对抗对抗性训练模型的有效性进行了挑战，并表明它对对抗措施是鲁棒的。
papers.title_zh: Ulixes:具有对抗性机器学习的面部识别隐私

papers.title: If This Context Then That Concern: Exploring users' concerns with IFTTT applets
papers.authors: Mahsa Saeidi, McKenzie Calvert, Audrey Au, Anita Sarma, Rakesh B. Bobba
papers.abstract: Abstract End users are increasingly using trigger-action platforms like If-This-Then-That (IFTTT) to create applets to connect smart-home devices and services. However, there are inherent implicit risks in using such applets—even non-malicious ones—as sensitive information may leak through their use in certain contexts (e.g., where the device is located, who can observe the resultant action). This work aims to understand to what extent end users can assess this implicit risk. More importantly we explore whether usage context makes a difference in end-users’ perception of such risks. Our work complements prior work that has identified the impact of usage context on expert evaluation of risks in IFTTT by focusing the impact of usage context on end-users’ risk perception. Through a Mechanical Turk survey of 386 participants on 49 smart-home IFTTT applets, we found that participants have a nuanced view of contextual factors and that different values for contextual factors impact end-users’ risk perception differently. Further, our findings show that nudging the participants to think about different usage contexts led them to think deeper about the associated risks and raise their concern scores.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要终端用户越来越多地使用触发动作平台，如If-This-Then-than(If TTT)来创建连接智能家居设备和服务的小程序。然而，使用此类小程序(即使是非恶意的)也存在固有的潜在风险，因为在某些情况下使用它们可能会泄露敏感信息(例如，设备位于何处，谁可以观察到最终的操作)。这项工作旨在了解最终用户可以在多大程度上评估这种隐性风险。更重要的是，我们探索了使用环境是否会影响最终用户对此类风险的感知。我们的工作补充了先前的工作，即通过关注使用环境对最终用户风险感知的影响，确定使用环境对IFTTT中风险的专家评估的影响。通过Mechanical Turk对49个智能家居IFTTT小程序上的386名参与者的调查，我们发现参与者对背景因素有细微的看法，背景因素的不同值对最终用户的风险感知有不同的影响。此外，我们的研究结果表明，推动参与者思考不同的使用环境会让他们更深入地思考相关的风险，并提高他们的关注分数。
papers.title_zh: 如果这种情况下，然后关注:探索用户的关注与IFTTT小程序

papers.title: User Perceptions of Gmail's Confidential Mode
papers.authors: Elham Al Qahtani, Yousra Javed, Mohamed Shehab
papers.abstract: Abstract Gmail’s confidential mode enables a user to send confidential emails and control access to their content through setting an expiration time and passcode, pre-expiry access revocation, and prevention of email forwarding, downloading, and printing. This paper aims to understand user perceptions and motivations for using Gmail’s confidential mode (GCM). Our structured interviews with 19 Gmail users at UNC Charlotte show that users utilize this mode to share their private documents with recipients and perceive that this mode encrypts their emails and attachments. The most commonly used feature of this mode is the default time expiration of one week, and the least used feature is the pre-expiry access revocation. Our analysis suggests several design improvements.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要Gmail的机密模式允许用户发送机密电子邮件，并通过设置过期时间和密码、过期前访问撤销以及阻止电子邮件转发、下载和打印来控制对其内容的访问。本文旨在了解用户对使用Gmail保密模式(GCM)的看法和动机。我们对北卡罗来纳大学夏洛特分校19名Gmail用户的结构化采访表明，用户利用这种模式与收件人分享他们的私人文档，并认为这种模式会加密他们的电子邮件和附件。这种模式最常用的功能是一周的默认时间到期，最少使用的功能是到期前访问撤销。我们的分析提出了几项设计改进。
papers.title_zh: 用户对Gmail保密模式的看法

papers.title: Toward Uncensorable, Anonymous and Private Access Over Satoshi Blockchains
papers.authors: Ruben Recabarren, Bogdan Carbunar
papers.abstract: Abstract Providing unrestricted access to sensitive content such as news and software is difficult in the presence of adaptive and resourceful surveillance and censoring adversaries. In this paper we leverage the distributed and resilient nature of commercial Satoshi blockchains to develop the first provably secure, censorship resistant, cost-efficient storage system with anonymous and private access, built on top of commercial cryptocurrency transactions. We introduce max-rate transactions, a practical construct to persist data of arbitrary size entirely in a Satoshi blockchain. We leverage max-rate transactions to develop UWeb, a blockchain-based storage system that charges publishers to self-sustain its decentralized infrastructure. UWeb organizes blockchain-stored content for easy retrieval, and enables clients to store and access content with provable anonymity, privacy and censorship resistance properties. We present results from UWeb experiments with writing 268.21 MB of data into the live Litecoin blockchain, including 4.5 months of live-feed BBC articles, and 41 censorship resistant tools. The max-rate writing throughput (183 KB/s) and blockchain utilization (88%) exceed those of state-of-the-art solutions by 2-3 orders of magnitude and broke Litecoin’s record of the daily average block size. Our simulations with up to 3,000 concurrent UWeb writers confirm that UWeb does not impact the confirmation delays of financial transactions.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要在适应性强、足智多谋的监视和审查对手面前，很难提供对敏感内容(如新闻和软件)的无限制访问。在本文中，我们利用商业Satoshi区块链的分布式和弹性特性，开发了第一个可证明是安全的、抗审查的、具有匿名和私人访问的经济高效的存储系统，构建在商业加密货币交易之上。我们引入了最大速率事务，这是一个实用的构造，可以完全在一个Satoshi区块链中持久存储任意大小的数据。我们利用最大速率交易开发UWeb，这是一个总部位于区块链的存储系统，向出版商收费，以自我维持其分散的基础设施。UWeb组织区块链存储的内容，以便于检索，并使客户能够存储和访问具有可证明的匿名性，隐私和审查阻力属性的内容。我们展示了UWeb实验的结果，该实验将268.21 MB数据写入实时Litecoin区块链，包括4.5个月的实时BBC文章和41个防审查工具。最大写入吞吐量(183 KB/s)和区块链利用率(88%)比最先进的解决方案高出2-3个数量级，并打破了Litecoin的每日平均块大小记录。我们对多达3，000个并发UWeb作者的模拟证实了UWeb不会影响金融交易的确认延迟。
papers.title_zh: 走向不受审查，匿名和私人访问区块链

papers.title: OmniCrawl: Comprehensive Measurement of Web Tracking With Real Desktop and Mobile Browsers
papers.authors: Darion Cassel, Su-Chin Lin, Alessio Buraggina, William Wang, Andrew Zhang, Lujo Bauer, Hsu-Chun Hsiao, Limin Jia, Timothy Libert
papers.abstract: Abstract Over half of all visits to websites now take place in a mobile browser, yet the majority of web privacy studies take the vantage point of desktop browsers, use emulated mobile browsers, or focus on just a single mobile browser instead. In this paper, we present a comprehensive web-tracking measurement study on mobile browsers and privacy-focused mobile browsers. Our study leverages a new web measurement infrastructure, OmniCrawl, which we develop to drive browsers on desktop computers and smartphones located on two continents. We capture web tracking measurements using 42 different non-emulated browsers simultaneously. We find that the third-party advertising and tracking ecosystem of mobile browsers is more similar to that of desktop browsers than previous findings suggested. We study privacy-focused browsers and find their protections differ significantly and in general are less for lower-ranked sites. Our findings also show that common methodological choices made by web measurement studies, such as the use of emulated mobile browsers and Selenium, can lead to website behavior that deviates from what actual users experience.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要现在，超过一半的网站访问发生在移动浏览器中，然而大多数网络隐私研究都利用桌面浏览器的优势，使用模拟的移动浏览器，或者只关注单一的移动浏览器。在本文中，我们提出了一个全面的网络跟踪测量研究的移动浏览器和隐私为重点的移动浏览器。我们的研究利用了一种新的网络测量基础设施OmniCrawl，我们开发这种基础设施是为了驱动位于两大洲的台式电脑和智能手机上的浏览器。我们同时使用42个不同的非模拟浏览器来捕捉网络跟踪测量。我们发现，移动浏览器的第三方广告和跟踪生态系统比之前的发现更类似于桌面浏览器。我们研究了注重隐私的浏览器，发现它们的保护措施差别很大，一般来说对排名较低的网站保护较少。我们的发现还表明，网络测量研究做出的常见方法选择，如使用模拟移动浏览器和Selenium，会导致网站行为偏离实际用户体验。
papers.title_zh: OmniCrawl:用真实的桌面和移动浏览器全面测量网络跟踪

papers.title: Making the Most of Parallel Composition in Differential Privacy
papers.authors: Josh Smith, Hassan Jameel Asghar, Gianpaolo Gioiosa, Sirine Mrabet, Serge Gaspers, Paul Tyler
papers.abstract: Abstract We show that the ‘optimal’ use of the parallel composition theorem corresponds to finding the size of the largest subset of queries that ‘overlap’ on the data domain, a quantity we call the maximum overlap of the queries. It has previously been shown that a certain instance of this problem, formulated in terms of determining the sensitivity of the queries, is NP-hard, but also that it is possible to use graph-theoretic algorithms, such as finding the maximum clique, to approximate query sensitivity. In this paper, we consider a significant generalization of the aforementioned instance which encompasses both a wider range of differentially private mechanisms and a broader class of queries. We show that for a particular class of predicate queries, determining if they are disjoint can be done in time polynomial in the number of attributes. For this class, we show that the maximum overlap problem remains NP-hard as a function of the number of queries. However, we show that efficient approximate solutions exist by relating maximum overlap to the clique and chromatic numbers of a certain graph determined by the queries. The link to chromatic number allows us to use more efficient approximate algorithms, which cannot be done for the clique number as it may underestimate the privacy budget. Our approach is defined in the general setting of f-differential privacy, which subsumes standard pure differential privacy and Gaussian differential privacy. We prove the parallel composition theorem for f-differential privacy. We evaluate our approach on synthetic and real-world data sets of queries. We show that the approach can scale to large domain sizes (up to 1020000), and that its application can reduce the noise added to query answers by up to 60%.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要我们表明，并行合成定理的“最佳”使用对应于找到在数据域上“重叠”的查询的最大子集的大小，我们称之为查询的最大重叠量。以前已经表明，这个问题的某个实例，在确定查询的敏感度方面是NP难的，但是也可以使用图论算法，例如寻找最大团，来近似查询敏感度。在本文中，我们考虑了上述实例的一个重要推广，它包含了更广泛的不同私有机制和更广泛的查询类别。我们证明了对于一类特定的谓词查询，确定它们是否不相交可以在属性数的时间多项式内完成。对于这个类，我们证明了最大重叠问题作为查询次数的函数仍然是NP难的。然而，我们表明，通过将最大重叠与查询所确定的某个图的团数和色数相关联，存在有效的近似解。到色数的链接允许我们使用更有效的近似算法，这不能用于团数，因为它可能低估隐私预算。我们的方法被定义在f-差分隐私的一般设置中，它包含标准的纯差分隐私和高斯差分隐私。我们证明了f-微分隐私的平行合成定理。我们在合成和真实世界的查询数据集上评估了我们的方法。我们表明，该方法可以扩展到大的域大小(高达1020000)，并且其应用可以将添加到查询答案的噪声减少高达60%。
papers.title_zh: 差分隐私中并行合成的充分利用

papers.title: Zen and the art of model adaptation: Low-utility-cost attack mitigations in collaborative machine learning
papers.authors: Dmitrii Usynin, Daniel Rueckert, Jonathan Passerat-Palmbach, Georgios Kaissis
papers.abstract: Abstract In this study, we aim to bridge the gap between the theoretical understanding of attacks against collaborative machine learning workflows and their practical ramifications by considering the effects of model architecture, learning setting and hyperparameters on the resilience against attacks. We refer to such mitigations as model adaptation. Through extensive experimentation on both, benchmark and real-life datasets, we establish a more practical threat model for collaborative learning scenarios. In particular, we evaluate the impact of model adaptation by implementing a range of attacks belonging to the broader categories of model inversion and membership inference. Our experiments yield two noteworthy outcomes: they demonstrate the difficulty of actually conducting successful attacks under realistic settings when model adaptation is employed and they highlight the challenge inherent in successfully combining model adaptation and formal privacy-preserving techniques to retain the optimal balance between model utility and attack resilience.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要在本研究中，我们旨在通过考虑模型架构、学习设置和超参数对攻击弹性的影响，弥合针对协作机器学习工作流的攻击的理论理解与其实际分支之间的差距。我们把这种缓解称为模型适应。通过对基准数据集和真实数据集的大量实验，我们为协作学习场景建立了一个更实用的威胁模型。特别是，我们通过实施一系列属于更广泛的模型反演和成员推理类别的攻击来评估模型适应的影响。我们的实验产生了两个值得注意的结果:它们证明了当采用模型自适应时，在现实环境下实际进行成功攻击的难度，并且它们突出了在成功结合模型自适应和正式的隐私保护技术以保持模型效用和攻击弹性之间的最佳平衡时所固有的挑战。
papers.title_zh: Zen和模型适应的艺术:合作机器学习中的低效用成本攻击缓解

papers.title: AriaNN: Low-Interaction Privacy-Preserving Deep Learning via Function Secret Sharing
papers.authors: Théo Ryffel, Pierre Tholoniat, David Pointcheval, Francis R. Bach
papers.abstract: Abstract We propose AriaNN, a low-interaction privacy-preserving framework for private neural network training and inference on sensitive data. Our semi-honest 2-party computation protocol (with a trusted dealer) leverages function secret sharing, a recent lightweight cryptographic protocol that allows us to achieve an efficient online phase. We design optimized primitives for the building blocks of neural networks such as ReLU, MaxPool and BatchNorm. For instance, we perform private comparison for ReLU operations with a single message of the size of the input during the online phase, and with preprocessing keys close to 4× smaller than previous work. Last, we propose an extension to support n-party private federated learning. We implement our framework as an extensible system on top of PyTorch that leverages CPU and GPU hardware acceleration for cryptographic and machine learning operations. We evaluate our end-to-end system for private inference between distant servers on standard neural networks such as AlexNet, VGG16 or ResNet18, and for private training on smaller networks like LeNet. We show that computation rather than communication is the main bottleneck and that using GPUs together with reduced key size is a promising solution to overcome this barrier.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要我们提出AriaNN，一个低交互隐私保护框架，用于私有神经网络训练和对敏感数据的推理。我们的半诚实的两方计算协议(与可信的经销商)利用了函数秘密共享，这是一种最新的轻量级加密协议，允许我们实现高效的在线阶段。我们为ReLU、MaxPool和BatchNorm等神经网络的构建模块设计了优化的原语。例如，我们在联机阶段使用输入大小的单个消息对ReLU操作执行私有比较，并且预处理密钥比以前的工作小近4倍。最后，我们提出一个扩展来支持多方私有联合学习。我们将我们的框架实现为PyTorch之上的可扩展系统，该系统利用CPU和GPU硬件加速进行加密和机器学习操作。我们评估了我们的端到端系统，用于标准神经网络(如AlexNet、VGG16或ResNet18)上的远程服务器之间的私人推理，以及小型网络(如LeNet)上的私人训练。我们表明计算而不是通信是主要的瓶颈，使用GPU和减小的密钥大小是克服这一障碍的有希望的解决方案。
papers.title_zh: AriaNN:通过函数秘密共享的低交互隐私保护深度学习

papers.title: Proof-of-Vax: Studying User Preferences and Perception of Covid Vaccination Certificates
papers.authors: Marvin Kowalewski, Franziska Herbert, Theodor Schnitzler, Markus Dürmuth
papers.abstract: Abstract Digital tools play an important role in fighting the current global COVID-19 pandemic. We conducted a representative online study in Germany on a sample of 599 participants to evaluate the user perception of vaccination certificates. We investigated five different variants of vaccination certificates based on deployed and planned designs in a between-group design, including paper-based and app-based variants. Our main results show that the willingness to use and adopt vaccination certificates is generally high. Overall, paper-based vaccination certificates were favored over app-based solutions. The willingness to use digital apps decreased significantly by a higher disposition to privacy and increased by higher worries about the pandemic and acceptance of the coronavirus vaccination. Vaccination certificates resemble an interesting use case for studying privacy perceptions for health-related data. We hope that our work will educate the currently ongoing design of vaccination certificates, give us deeper insights into the privacy of health-related data and apps, and prepare us for future potential applications of vaccination certificates and health apps in general.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要数字工具在对抗当前全球新冠肺炎疫情中发挥着重要作用。我们在德国对599名参与者进行了代表性的在线研究，以评估用户对疫苗接种证书的看法。我们调查了基于组间设计中部署和计划设计的疫苗接种证书的五种不同变体，包括基于纸质和基于应用程序的变体。我们的主要结果表明，使用和采用疫苗接种证的意愿普遍较高。总体而言，纸质疫苗接种证明比基于应用程序的解决方案更受青睐。对隐私的更高倾向导致使用数字应用的意愿显著下降，而对疫情和接受冠状病毒疫苗接种的更高担忧则增加了使用数字应用的意愿。疫苗证书类似于一个有趣的用例，用于研究健康相关数据的隐私感知。我们希望我们的工作将教育目前正在进行的疫苗接种证书的设计，让我们更深入地了解健康相关数据和应用程序的隐私，并为疫苗接种证书和健康应用程序的未来潜在应用做好准备。
papers.title_zh: Vax证明:研究用户偏好和对Covid疫苗接种证书的认知

papers.title: Differentially private partition selection
papers.authors: Damien Desfontaines, James Voss, Bryant Gipson, Chinmoy Mandayam
papers.abstract: Abstract Many data analysis operations can be expressed as a GROUP BY query on an unbounded set of partitions, followed by a per-partition aggregation. To make such a query differentially private, adding noise to each aggregation is not enough: we also need to make sure that the set of partitions released is also differentially private. This problem is not new, and it was recently formally introduced as differentially private set union [14]. In this work, we continue this area of study, and focus on the common setting where each user is associated with a single partition. In this setting, we propose a simple, optimal differentially private mechanism that maximizes the number of released partitions. We discuss implementation considerations, as well as the possible extension of this approach to the setting where each user contributes to a fixed, small number of partitions.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要许多数据分析操作可以通过在一组无限的分区上进行查询来表示为一个组，然后是每个分区的聚合。要使这样的查询具有不同的私有性，向每个聚合添加噪声是不够的:我们还需要确保所释放的分区集也是不同私有的。这个问题并不新鲜，最近它被正式引入作为差别私有集合联合[14]。在本文中，我们将继续这方面的研究，并将重点放在每个用户都与一个分区相关联的公共设置上。在这种情况下，我们提出了一个简单的、最优的差分私有机制，它可以最大化被释放分区的数量。我们将讨论实现考虑事项，以及将这种方法扩展到每个用户贡献固定的少量分区的设置的可能性。
papers.title_zh: 差分私有分区选择

papers.title: Circuit-PSI With Linear Complexity via Relaxed Batch OPPRF
papers.authors: Nishanth Chandran, Divya Gupta, Akash Shah
papers.abstract: Abstract In 2-party Circuit-based Private Set Intersection (Circuit-PSI), P0 and P1 hold sets S0 and S1 respectively and wish to securely compute a function f over the set S0 ∩ S1 (e.g., cardinality, sum over associated attributes, or threshold intersection). Following a long line of work, Pinkas et al. (PSTY, Eurocrypt 2019) showed how to construct a concretely efficient Circuit-PSI protocol with linear communication complexity. However, their protocol requires super-linear computation. In this work, we construct concretely efficient Circuit-PSI protocols with linear computational and communication cost. Further, our protocols are more performant than the state-of-the-art, PSTY – we are ≈ 2.3× more communication efficient and are up to 2.8× faster. We obtain our improvements through a new primitive called Relaxed Batch Oblivious Programmable Pseudorandom Functions (RB-OPPRF) that can be seen as a strict generalization of Batch OPPRFs that were used in PSTY. This primitive could be of independent interest.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要在基于两方电路的私有集合交集(电路-PSI)中，P0和P1分别持有集合S0和S1，并且希望安全地计算集合S0 ∩ S1上的函数f(例如，基数、相关属性上的和或阈值交集)。通过长期工作，Pinkas等人(PSTY，Eurocrypt 2019)展示了如何构建一个具有线性通信复杂性的具体高效的电路PSI协议。然而，他们的协议需要超线性计算。在本文中，我们构造了具有线性计算和通信开销的具体有效的Circuit-PSI协议。此外，我们的协议比最先进的PSTY更具性能——我们的通信效率提高了约2.3倍，速度提高了2.8倍。我们通过一种新的称为松弛批处理不经意可编程伪随机函数(RB-OPPRF)的原语来获得我们的改进，该原语可以被视为PSTY中使用的批处理OPPRF的严格推广。这个原语可能是独立的兴趣。
papers.title_zh: 通过宽松批量OPPRF实现线性复杂度的电路PSI

papers.title: Multiparty Reach and Frequency Histogram: Private, Secure, and Practical
papers.authors: Badih Ghazi, Ben Kreuter, Ravi Kumar, Pasin Manurangsi, Jiayu Peng, Evgeny Skvortsov, Yao Wang, Craig Wright
papers.abstract: Abstract Consider the setting where multiple parties each hold a multiset of users and the task is to estimate the reach (i.e., the number of distinct users appearing across all parties) and the frequency histogram (i.e., fraction of users appearing a given number of times across all parties). In this work we introduce a new sketch for this task, based on an exponentially distributed counting Bloom filter. We combine this sketch with a communication-efficient multi-party protocol to solve the task in the multi-worker setting. Our protocol exhibits both differential privacy and security guarantees in the honest-but-curious model and in the presence of large subsets of colluding workers; furthermore, its reach and frequency histogram estimates have a provably small error. Finally, we show the practicality of the protocol by evaluating it on internet-scale audiences.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要考虑这样一种设置，其中多方各自拥有多组用户，任务是估计到达范围(即，出现在所有参与方的不同用户的数量)和频率直方图(即，出现在所有参与方的给定次数的用户的比例)。在这项工作中，我们介绍了一个新的草图，基于指数分布计数布隆过滤器。我们将这个草图与一个通信高效的多方协议相结合，以解决多工作人员环境中的任务。我们的协议在诚实但好奇的模型中以及在存在大量合谋者的情况下展示了不同的隐私和安全保证；此外，它的范围和频率直方图估计有一个可证明的小误差。最后，我们通过在互联网规模的观众上进行评估，展示了该协议的实用性。
papers.title_zh: 多方接触和频率直方图:私密、安全和实用

papers.title: Polymath: Low-Latency MPC via Secure Polynomial Evaluations and Its Applications
papers.authors: Donghang Lu, Albert Yu, Aniket Kate, Hemanta K. Maji
papers.abstract: Abstract While the practicality of secure multi-party computation (MPC) has been extensively analyzed and improved over the past decade, we are hitting the limits of efficiency with the traditional approaches of representing the computed functionalities as generic arithmetic or Boolean circuits. This work follows the design principle of identifying and constructing fast and provably-secure MPC protocols to evaluate useful high-level algebraic abstractions; thus, improving the efficiency of all applications relying on them. We present Polymath, a constant-round secure computation protocol suite for the secure evaluation of (multi-variate) polynomials of scalars and matrices, functionalities essential to numerous data-processing applications. Using precise natural precomputation and high-degree of parallelism prevalent in the modern computing environments, Polymath can make latency of secure polynomial evaluations of scalars and matrices independent of polynomial degree and matrix dimensions. We implement our protocols over the HoneyBadgerMPC library and apply it to two prominent secure computation tasks: privacy-preserving evaluation of decision trees and privacy-preserving evaluation of Markov processes. For the decision tree evaluation problem, we demonstrate the feasibility of evaluating high-depth decision tree models in a general n-party setting. For the Markov process application, we demonstrate that Poly-math can compute large powers of transition matrices with better online time and less communication.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要虽然安全多方计算(MPC)的实用性在过去的十年中已经得到了广泛的分析和改进，但是将计算功能表示为一般算术或布尔电路的传统方法正在触及效率的极限。这项工作遵循识别和构造快速且可证明安全的MPC协议的设计原则，以评估有用的高级代数抽象；从而提高依赖它们的所有应用程序的效率。我们提出了Polymath，这是一个用于标量和矩阵的(多变量)多项式的安全评估的恒定循环安全计算协议套件，是许多数据处理应用的基本功能。使用精确的自然预计算和现代计算环境中普遍存在的高度并行性，Polymath可以使标量和矩阵的安全多项式求值的延迟与多项式次数和矩阵维数无关。我们在HoneyBadgerMPC库上实现了我们的协议，并将其应用于两个突出的安全计算任务:决策树的隐私保护评估和马尔可夫过程的隐私保护评估。对于决策树评估问题，我们证明了在一般的n方设置中评估高深度决策树模型的可行性。对于马尔可夫过程应用，我们证明了Poly-math可以计算大幂的转移矩阵，具有更好的在线时间和更少的通信。
papers.title_zh: Polymath:基于安全多项式计算的低延迟MPC及其应用

papers.title: Privacy-preserving FairSwap: Fairness and privacy interplay
papers.authors: Sepideh Avizheh, Preston Haffey, Reihaneh Safavi-Naini
papers.abstract: Abstract Fair exchange protocols are among the most important cryptographic primitives in electronic commerce. A basic fair exchange protocol requires that two parties who want to exchange their digital items either receive what they have been promised, or lose nothing. Privacy of fair exchange requires that no one else (other than the two parties) learns anything about the items. Fairness and privacy have been considered as two distinct properties of an exchange protocol. In this paper, we show that subtle ways of leaking the exchange item to the third parties affect fairness in fair exchange protocols when the item is confidential. Our focus is on Fair-Swap, a recently proposed fair exchange protocol that uses a smart contract for dispute resolution, has proven security in UC (Universal Composability) framework, and provides privacy when both parties are honest. We demonstrate, however, that FairSwap’s dispute resolution protocol leaks information to the public and this leakage provides opportunities for the dishonest parties to influence the protocol’s fairness guarantee. We then propose an efficient privacy-enhanced version of Fair-Swap, prove its security and give an implementation and performance evaluation of our proposed system. Our privacy enhancement uses circuit randomization, and we prove its security and privacy in an extension of universal composability model for non-monolithic adversaries that would be of independent interest.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要公平交换协议是电子商务中最重要的密码原语之一。一个基本的公平交换协议要求想要交换他们的数字项目的双方要么得到他们被承诺的东西，要么什么都不失去。公平交易的私密性要求除了交易双方之外，其他任何人都不知道有关物品的任何信息。公平和隐私被认为是交换协议的两个不同的属性。在本文中，我们证明了当交换项目是机密的时，向第三方泄漏交换项目的微妙方式会影响公平交换协议的公平性。我们的重点是Fair-Swap，这是一个最近提出的公平交换协议，它使用智能合同来解决争议，已经在UC(通用可组合性)框架中证明了安全性，并在双方诚实时提供隐私。然而，我们证明了FairSwap的争议解决协议向公众泄漏了信息，并且这种泄漏为不诚实的各方提供了影响协议的公平性保证的机会。然后，我们提出了一个有效的隐私增强的公平交换版本，证明了它的安全性，并给出了我们提出的系统的实现和性能评估。我们的隐私增强使用电路随机化，并且我们在一个扩展的通用可组合性模型中证明了它的安全性和隐私性，该模型适用于具有独立兴趣的非单片对手。
papers.title_zh: 保护隐私的公平交换:公平与隐私的相互作用

papers.title: If You Like Me, Please Don't "Like" Me: Inferring Vendor Bitcoin Addresses From Positive Reviews
papers.authors: Jochen Schäfer, Christian Müller, Frederik Armknecht
papers.abstract: Abstract Bitcoin and similar cryptocurrencies are becoming increasingly popular as a payment method in both legitimate and illegitimate online markets.
