papers.abstract_zh: 为了公众的利益，组织经常收集私人数据并发布综合统计数据。如果不采取保护隐私的措施，对手可能会使用发布的统计数据来推断私人数据集中描述的个人的未经授权的信息。差分私有算法通过用噪声稍微扰乱底层统计来解决这一挑战，从而在数学上限制了可以从每次数据发布中推断出的信息量。正确校准这些算法，进而校准数据集中描述的人的泄露风险，需要数据管理员为隐私预算参数ɛ.选择一个值然而，几乎没有选择ɛ的正式指导，这项任务需要对概率隐私-效用权衡进行推理。此外，在统计推断的背景下选择ɛ需要在存在测量误差和差分隐私(DP)噪声的情况下对准确度折衷进行推理。我们提出了可视化隐私(ViP)，一个交互式界面，可视化ɛ，准确性和泄露风险之间的关系，以支持设置和分割查询之间的ɛ。当用户调整ɛ时，ViP动态更新描述预期准确性和风险的可视化。ViP还有一个推断设置，允许用户推断DP噪声对统计推断的影响。最后，我们展示了一项研究的结果，其中16名很少或没有DP背景的研究人员使用ViP和对照完成了一系列与设置ɛ相关的任务。我们发现，ViP有助于参与者更正确地回答与判断DP-noise释放可能下落的概率以及比较DP-noise和非私有置信区间相关的问题。
papers.title_zh: 不同隐私数据发布中隐私效用权衡的可视化

papers.title: Editors' Introduction
papers.authors: Kostas Chatzikokolakis, Aaron Johnson
papers.abstract: Is there currently a crisis of confidence in psychological science reflecting an unprecedented level of doubt among practitioners about the reliability of research findings in the field? It would certainly appear that there is. These doubts emerged and grew as a series of unhappy events unfolded in 2011: the Diederik Stapel fraud case (see Stroebe, Postmes, & Spears, 2012, this issue), the publication in a major social psychology journal of an article purporting to show evidence of extrasensory perception (Bem, 2011) followed by widespread public mockery (see Galak, LeBoeuf, Nelson, & Simmons, in press; Wagenmakers, Wetzels, Borsboom, & van der Maas, 2011), reports by Wicherts and colleagues that psychologists are often unwilling or unable to share their published data for reanalysis (Wicherts, Bakker, & Molenaar, 2011; see also Wicherts, Borsboom, Kats, & Molenaar, 2006), and the publication of an important article in Psychological Science showing how easily researchers can, in the absence of any real effects, nonetheless obtain statistically significant differences through various questionable research practices (QRPs) such as exploring multiple dependent variables or covariates and only reporting these when they yield significant results (Simmons, Nelson, & Simonsohn, 2011). For those psychologists who expected that the embarrassments of 2011 would soon recede into memory, 2012 offered instead a quick plunge from bad to worse, with new indications of outright fraud in the field of social cognition (Simonsohn, 2012), an article in Psychological Science showing that many psychologists admit to engaging in at least some of the QRPs examined by Simmons and colleagues (John, Loewenstein, & Prelec, 2012), troubling new meta-analytic evidence suggesting that the QRPs described by Simmons and colleagues may even be leaving telltale signs visible in the distribution of p values in the psychological literature (Masicampo & Lalande, in press; Simonsohn, 2012), and an acrimonious dust-up in science magazines and blogs centered around the problems some investigators were having in replicating well-known results from the field of social cognition (Bower, 2012; Yong, 2012). Although the very public problems experienced by psychology over this 2-year period are embarrassing to those of us working in the field, some have found comfort in the fact that, over the same period, similar concerns have been arising across the scientific landscape (triggered by revelations that will be described shortly). Some of the suspected causes of unreplicability, such as publication bias (the tendency to publish only positive findings) have been discussed for years; in fact, the phrase file-drawer problem was first coined by a distinguished psychologist several decades ago (Rosenthal, 1979). However, many have speculated that these problems have been exacerbated in recent years as academia reaps the harvest of a hypercompetitive academic climate and an incentive scheme that provides rich rewards for overselling one’s work and few rewards at all for caution and circumspection (see Giner-Sorolla, 2012, this issue). Equally disturbing, investigators seem to be replicating each others’ work even less often than they did in the past, again presumably reflecting an incentive scheme gone askew (a point discussed in several articles in this issue, e.g., Makel, Plucker, & Hegarty, 2012). The frequency with which errors appear in the psychological literature is not presently known, but a number of facts suggest it might be disturbingly high. Ioannidis (2005) has shown through simple mathematical modeling that any scientific field that ignores replication can easily come to the miserable state wherein (as the title of his most famous article puts it) “most published research findings are false” (see also Ioannidis, 2012, this issue, and Pashler & Harris, 2012, this issue). Meanwhile, reports emerging from cancer research have made such grim scenarios seem more plausible: In 2012, several large pharmaceutical companies revealed that their efforts to replicate exciting preclinical findings from published academic studies in cancer biology were only rarely verifying the original results (Begley & Ellis, 2012; see also Osherovich, 2011; Prinz, Schlange, & Asadullah, 2011).
papers.abstract_zh: 目前心理科学是否出现了信任危机，反映出从业者对该领域研究结果的可靠性产生了前所未有的怀疑？显然是有的。随着2011年一系列不愉快事件的发生，这些怀疑出现了，并有所增长:Diederik Stapel欺诈案(见Stroebe，Postmes，& Spears，2012，这一期)，在一份主要的社会心理学杂志上发表了一篇文章，声称显示了超感知觉的证据(Bem，2011)，随后受到了广泛的公开嘲笑(见Galak，LeBoeuf，Nelson，& Simmons，正在出版中；Wagenmakers，Wetzels，Borsboom，& van der Maas，2011)，Wicherts及其同事报告说，心理学家往往不愿意或不能分享他们发表的数据进行再分析(Wicherts，Bakker，& Molenaar，2011；另见Wicherts，Borsboom，Kats，& Molenaar，2006)，以及发表在《心理科学》上的一篇重要文章，该文章表明，在没有任何实际影响的情况下，研究人员可以通过各种有问题的研究实践(qrp)轻松地获得统计学上的显著差异，如探索多个因变量或协变量，并仅在它们产生显著结果时报告这些结果(Simmons，Nelson，& Simonsohn，2011)。对于那些预计2011年的尴尬将很快消失在记忆中的心理学家来说，2012年反而提供了一个从糟糕到更糟糕的快速跳水，在社会认知领域出现了新的明显的欺诈迹象(Simonsohn，2012)，心理科学中的一篇文章显示，许多心理学家承认至少参与了Simmons及其同事检查的一些快速反应程序(John，Loewenstein，& Prelec，2012)。 令人不安的新荟萃分析证据表明，Simmons及其同事描述的qrp甚至可能在心理学文献中的p值分布中留下明显的迹象(Masicampo & Lalande，出版中； Simonsohn，2012)，科学杂志和博客上围绕一些研究人员在复制社会认知领域的知名结果时遇到的问题展开了激烈的争论(Bower，2012；永，2012)。虽然心理学在这两年中所经历的非常公开的问题令我们这些在该领域工作的人感到尴尬，但一些人已经找到了安慰，因为在同一时期，类似的担忧已经在整个科学领域出现(由即将描述的启示引发)。一些不可复制的可疑原因，如发表偏倚(倾向于只发表积极的发现)已经讨论了多年；事实上，抽屉问题这个短语是由一位杰出的心理学家在几十年前首次提出的(Rosenthal，1979)。然而，许多人推测，这些问题在最近几年已经恶化，因为学术界收获了高度竞争的学术氛围和奖励计划，这种奖励计划为过度销售自己的工作提供了丰厚的奖励，而对谨慎和谨慎却几乎没有奖励(见吉纳-索罗拉，2012年，这一期)。同样令人不安的是，研究人员似乎比过去更少地重复彼此的工作，这可能再次反映了一个倾斜的激励机制(这一点在本期的几篇文章中讨论过，例如，马克尔、普吕克尔和赫加蒂，2012)。错误出现在心理学文献中的频率目前还不清楚，但许多事实表明它可能高得令人不安。约安尼迪斯(2005)通过简单的数学建模表明，任何忽视复制的科学领域都很容易陷入悲惨的境地，其中(正如他最著名的文章的标题所言)“大多数发表的研究结果都是错误的”(另见约安尼迪斯，2012，本期，以及Pashler & Harris，2012，本期)。与此同时，来自癌症研究的报告让这种严峻的情景看起来更加可信:2012年，几家大型制药公司透露，他们在癌症生物学方面复制已发表学术研究中令人兴奋的临床前发现的努力很少验证原始结果(Begley & Ellis，2012；另见Osherovich，2011年；普林茨、施朗格和阿萨杜拉，2011年)。
papers.title_zh: 编辑介绍

papers.title: A Multi-Region Investigation of the Perceptions and Use of Smart Home Devices
papers.authors: Patrick Bombik, Tom Wenzel, Jens Grossklags, Sameer Patil
papers.abstract: Smart Home Devices are household objects and appliances that are augmented with network connectivity and interactive capabilities. However, the benefits and conveniences of such augmentation are tempered by corresponding increases in privacy and security threats. Studies of user perceptions of these threats and user practices for addressing them are limited mostly to specific devices and/or small samples from a single region. To address this gap, we compared perceptions and practices of people in three geographic regions regarding privacy and security matters related to Smart Home Devices. Across these regions, we found differences in perceived regulatory protection and other regional factors. Our findings suggest that a co-evolution of the design and public policy related to Smart Home Devices could enhance privacy protection and drive increased adoption of these devices.
papers.abstract_zh: 智能家居设备是增强了网络连接和交互能力的家用物品和电器。然而，这种增强的好处和便利被隐私和安全威胁的相应增加所冲淡。对用户对这些威胁的感知以及用户应对这些威胁的实践的研究大多局限于特定设备和/或来自单个地区的小样本。为了弥补这一差距，我们比较了三个地理区域的人们对智能家居设备相关隐私和安全问题的看法和做法。在这些地区，我们发现了监管保护和其他地区因素的差异。我们的研究结果表明，与智能家居设备相关的设计和公共政策的共同发展可以增强隐私保护，并推动这些设备的普及。
papers.title_zh: 对智能家居设备的认知和使用的多地区调查

papers.title: Charting App Developers' Journey Through Privacy Regulation Features in Ad Networks
papers.authors: Mohammad Tahaei, Kopo M. Ramokapane, Tianshi Li, Jason I. Hong, Awais Rashid
papers.abstract: Mobile apps enable ad networks to collect and track users. App developers are given “configurations” on these platforms to limit data collection and adhere to privacy regulations; however, the prevalence of apps that violate privacy regulations because of third parties, including ad networks, begs the question of how developers work through these configurations and how easy they are to utilize. We study privacy regulations-related interfaces on three widely used ad networks using two empirical studies, a systematic review and think-aloud sessions with eleven developers, to shed light on how ad networks present privacy regulations and how usable the provided configurations are for developers. We find that information about privacy regulations is scattered in several pages, buried under multiple layers, and uses terms and language developers do not understand. While ad networks put the burden of complying with the regulations on developers, our participants, on the other hand, see ad networks responsible for ensuring compliance with regulations. To assist developers in building privacy regulations-compliant apps, we suggest dedicating a section to privacy, offering easily accessible configurations (both in graphical and code level), building testing systems for privacy regulations, and creating multimedia materials such as videos to promote privacy values in the ad networks’ documentation.
papers.abstract_zh: 移动应用使广告网络能够收集和跟踪用户。应用程序开发者在这些平台上被给予“配置”，以限制数据收集并遵守隐私法规；然而，由于第三方(包括广告网络)而违反隐私法规的应用程序的盛行，引发了开发者如何处理这些配置以及它们有多容易利用的问题。我们研究了三个广泛使用的广告网络上的隐私法规相关界面，使用了两个实证研究，一个系统回顾和与11个开发者的有声思维会议，以阐明广告网络如何呈现隐私法规以及所提供的配置对开发者的可用性。我们发现有关隐私法规的信息分散在几页纸中，隐藏在多层之下，并且使用了开发人员不理解的术语和语言。虽然广告网络将遵守法规的责任推给了开发者，但另一方面，我们的参与者认为广告网络有责任确保遵守法规。为了帮助开发人员构建符合隐私法规的应用程序，我们建议在广告网络的文档中专门开辟一个隐私部分，提供易于访问的配置(包括图形和代码级别)，构建隐私法规的测试系统，并创建视频等多媒体材料来宣传隐私价值。
papers.title_zh: 通过广告网络中的隐私监管功能绘制应用程序开发人员的旅程

papers.title: "All apps do this": Comparing Privacy Concerns Towards Privacy Tools and Non-Privacy Tools for Social Media Content
papers.authors: Vanessa Bracamonte, Sebastian Pape, Sascha Löbner
papers.abstract: Users report that they have regretted accidentally sharing personal information on social media. There have been proposals to help protect the privacy of these users, by providing tools which analyze text or images and detect personal information or privacy disclosure with the objective to alert the user of a privacy risk and transform the content. However, these proposals rely on having access to users’ data and users have reported that they have privacy concerns about the tools themselves. In this study, we investigate whether these privacy concerns are unique to privacy tools or whether they are comparable to privacy concerns about non-privacy tools that also process personal information. We conduct a user experiment to compare the level of privacy concern towards privacy tools and nonprivacy tools for text and image content, qualitatively analyze the reason for those privacy concerns, and evaluate which assurances are perceived to reduce that concern. The results show privacy tools are at a disadvantage: participants have a higher level of privacy concern about being surveilled by the privacy tools, and the same level concern about intrusion and secondary use of their personal information compared to non-privacy tools. In addition, the reasons for these concerns and assurances that are perceived to reduce privacy concern are also similar. We discuss what these results mean for the development of privacy tools that process user content.
papers.abstract_zh: 用户报告称，他们后悔不小心在社交媒体上分享了个人信息。已经有人提议通过提供分析文本或图像并检测个人信息或隐私泄露的工具来帮助保护这些用户的隐私，目的是提醒用户注意隐私风险并转换内容。然而，这些建议依赖于对用户数据的访问，用户报告说他们对工具本身有隐私问题。在这项研究中，我们调查了这些隐私问题是隐私工具特有的，还是与处理个人信息的非隐私工具的隐私问题相当。我们进行了一项用户实验，以比较针对文本和图像内容的隐私工具和非隐私工具的隐私关注程度，定性分析这些隐私关注的原因，并评估哪些保证被认为可以减少这种关注。结果显示隐私工具处于劣势:与非隐私工具相比，参与者对被隐私工具监视的隐私担忧程度更高，对个人信息被侵入和二次使用的担忧程度相同。此外，这些担忧的原因和被认为减少隐私担忧的保证也是相似的。我们讨论这些结果对处理用户内容的隐私工具的发展意味着什么。
papers.title_zh: “所有应用都这样做”:比较社交媒体内容的隐私工具和非隐私工具的隐私问题

papers.title: My Cookie is a phoenix: detection, measurement, and lawfulness of cookie respawning with browser fingerprinting
papers.authors: Imane Fouad, Cristiana Santos, Arnaud Legout, Nataliia Bielova
papers.abstract: Stateful and stateless web tracking gathered much attention in the last decade, however they were always measured separately. To the best of our knowledge, our study is the first to detect and measure cookie respawning with browser and machine fingerprinting. We develop a detection methodology that allows us to detect cookies dependency on browser and machine features. Our results show that 1, 150 out of the top 30, 000 Alexa websites deploy this tracking mechanism. We find out that this technique can be used to track users across websites even when third-party cookies are deprecated. Together with a legal scholar, we conclude that cookie respawning with browser fingerprinting lacks legal interpretation under the GDPR and the ePrivacy directive, but its use in practice may breach them, thus subjecting it to fines up to 20 million e.
papers.abstract_zh: 在过去的十年中，有状态和无状态web跟踪吸引了很多关注，但是它们总是被分开测量。据我们所知，我们的研究是第一个使用浏览器和机器指纹来检测和测量cookie响应的研究。我们开发了一种检测方法，允许我们检测cookies对浏览器和机器功能的依赖性。我们的结果显示，前30，000个Alexa网站中有1，150个部署了这种跟踪机制。我们发现这种技术可以用于跨网站跟踪用户，即使第三方cookies已经过时。与一位法律学者一起，我们得出结论，根据GDPR和ePrivacy指令，带有浏览器指纹的cookie resp Shawn缺乏法律解释，但它在实践中的使用可能违反它们，因此使其遭受高达2000万欧元的罚款
papers.title_zh: 我的cookie是一只凤凰:用浏览器指纹检测Cookie响应的检测、测量和合法性

papers.title: Exploring the Privacy Concerns of Bystanders in Smart Homes from the Perspectives of Both Owners and Bystanders
papers.authors: Ahmed Alshehri, Joseph Spielman, Amiya Prasad, Chuan Yue
papers.abstract: Smart home IoT devices collect data not only from owners of the devices, but also from bystanders in a smart home (e.g., visiting family members, friends, or domestic workers). Existing research mainly considered the privacy concerns of bystanders from their own perspectives. In this paper, we design and conduct a survey study to more comprehensively explore the privacy concerns of bystanders from the perspectives of both owners and bystanders. For owners, we investigate their understanding of their own data practices, their views on bystanders’ privacy, and their willingness to negotiate data practices with bystanders. For bystanders, we investigate their privacy concerns, their expectations of disclosures by owners, and their willingness to share their data with owners. We recruited 200 owners and 100 bystanders. We found that most owners of smart homes recognize the privacy rights of bystanders, do not fully understand their own data practices, and are willing to address the privacy concerns of trusted bystanders. We also found that most bystanders have concerns about their privacy in other people’s smart homes, do not expect owners to disclose data practices, and are willing to share data about them with owners if they consent. Reaching a temporary agreement about data practices between owners and bystanders might require some negotiation. So, we also explore the willingness of owners and bystanders on negotiating data collection, storage, and sharing in smart homes. We found that many owners and bystanders have different preferences regarding negotiating data practices. Based on our findings, we provide recommendations for enhancing the privacy protection in smart homes.
papers.abstract_zh: 智能家居物联网设备不仅收集设备所有者的数据，还收集智能家居中旁观者的数据(例如，来访的家庭成员、朋友或家政工人)。现有的研究主要从旁观者自身的角度考虑他们的隐私问题。在本文中，我们设计并进行一项调查研究，从所有者和旁观者的角度更全面地探讨旁观者的隐私问题。对于所有者，我们调查他们对自己的数据实践的理解，他们对旁观者隐私的看法，以及他们与旁观者协商数据实践的意愿。对于旁观者，我们调查他们的隐私问题，他们对所有者披露的期望，以及他们与所有者共享数据的意愿。我们招募了200名业主和100名旁观者。我们发现，大多数智能家居的所有者都承认旁观者的隐私权利，但并不完全了解自己的数据实践，并愿意解决可信旁观者的隐私问题。我们还发现，大多数旁观者对他们在他人智能家居中的隐私有担忧，不期望业主披露数据做法，并愿意在业主同意的情况下与他们分享有关他们的数据。在所有者和旁观者之间达成关于数据实践的临时协议可能需要一些协商。因此，我们也探讨了业主和旁观者在智能家居中协商数据收集、存储和共享的意愿。我们发现，许多所有者和旁观者对于协商数据实践有不同的偏好。基于我们的发现，我们提出了加强智能家居隐私保护的建议。
papers.title_zh: 从所有者和旁观者的角度探讨智能家居中旁观者的隐私问题

papers.title: Adversarial Images Against Super-Resolution Convolutional Neural Networks for Free
papers.authors: Arezoo Rajabi, Mahdieh Abbasi, Rakesh B. Bobba, Kimia Tajik
papers.abstract: Super-Resolution Convolutional Neural Networks (SRCNNs) with their ability to generate highresolution images from low-resolution counterparts, exacerbate the privacy concerns emerging from automated Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs)-based image classifiers. In this work, we hypothesize and empirically show that adversarial examples learned over CNN image classifiers can survive processing by SRCNNs and lead them to generate poor quality images that are hard to classify correctly. We demonstrate that a user with a small CNN is able to learn adversarial noise without requiring any customization for SRCNNs and thwart the privacy threat posed by a pipeline of SRCNN and CNN classifiers (95.8% fooling rate for Fast Gradient Sign with ε = 0.03). We evaluate the survivability of adversarial images generated in both black-box and white-box settings and show that black-box adversarial learning (when both CNN classifier and SRCNN are unknown) is at least as effective as white-box adversarial learning (when only CNN classifier is known). We also assess our hypothesis on adversarial robust CNNs and observe that the supper-resolved white-box adversarial examples can fool these CNNs more than 71.5% of the time.
papers.abstract_zh: 超分辨率卷积神经网络(SRCNNs)能够从低分辨率图像生成高分辨率图像，加剧了基于自动卷积神经网络(CNN)的图像分类器出现的隐私问题。在这项工作中，我们假设并根据经验表明，通过CNN图像分类器学习的对立示例可以在SRCNNs的处理中存活，并导致它们生成难以正确分类的低质量图像。我们证明了具有小CNN的用户能够在不需要对SRCNN进行任何定制的情况下学习敌对噪声，并且挫败了由Sr CNN和CNN分类器的流水线造成的隐私威胁(对于ε = 0.03的快速梯度符号，95.8%的愚弄率)。我们评估了在黑盒和白盒设置中生成的对抗图像的生存性，并表明黑盒对抗学习(当CNN分类器和SRCNN都未知时)至少与白盒对抗学习(当只有CNN分类器已知时)一样有效。我们还评估了我们关于对抗性强CNN的假设，并观察到超分辨白盒对抗性例子可以在超过71.5%的时间里欺骗这些CNN。
papers.title_zh: 免费对抗超分辨率卷积神经网络的对抗图像

papers.title: Integrating Privacy into the Electric Vehicle Charging Architecture
papers.authors: Dustin Kern, Timm Lauser, Christoph Krauß
papers.abstract: The Electric Vehicle (EV) charging architecture consists of several actors which communicate with different protocols. A serious issue is the lack of adequate privacy-preserving measures that enables the generation of movement profiles or inferring consumer habits by all of the involved actors. In this paper, we propose an extension of a Trusted Platform Module (TPM)-based Direct Anonymous Attestation (DAA) scheme to enable privacy-preserving charging authorization and billing. Our implementation shows that our solution can be easily integrated into existing protocols of the Plug-and-Charge (PnC) EV charging architecture and introduces only minor overhead. The formal analysis using the Tamarin prover shows the security and privacy of our protocol extension.
papers.abstract_zh: 电动汽车(EV)充电架构由几个参与者组成，它们使用不同的协议进行通信。一个严重的问题是缺乏足够的隐私保护措施，使得所有参与的行为者能够生成运动简档或推断消费者习惯。在本文中，我们提出了一个基于可信平台模块(TPM)的直接匿名证明(DAA)方案的扩展，以实现隐私保护的收费授权和计费。我们的实现表明，我们的解决方案可以很容易地集成到现有的即插即用(PnC)电动车充电架构的协议中，并且只引入很少的开销。使用Tamarin证明者的形式分析显示了我们的协议扩展的安全性和隐私性。
papers.title_zh: 将隐私融入电动汽车充电架构

papers.title: "It Feels Like Whack-a-mole": User Experiences of Data Removal from People Search Websites
papers.authors: Kejsi Take, Kevin Gallagher, Andrea Forte, Damon McCoy, Rachel Greenstadt
papers.abstract: People Search Websites aggregate and publicize users’ Personal Identifiable Information (PII), previously sourced from data brokers. This paper presents a qualitative study of the perceptions and experiences of 18 participants who sought information removal by hiring a removal service or requesting removal from the sites. The users we interviewed were highly motivated and had sophisticated risk perceptions. We found that they encountered obstacles during the removal process, resulting in a high cost of removal, whether they requested it themselves or hired a service. Participants perceived that the successful monetization of users PII motivates data aggregators to make the removal more difficult. Overall, self management of privacy by attempting to keep information off the internet is difficult and its’ success is hard to evaluate. We provide recommendations to users, third parties, removal services and researchers aiming to improve the removal process.
papers.abstract_zh: 人民搜索网站收集和公布用户的个人身份信息(PII)，以前来源于数据经纪人。本文提出了一个定性研究的看法和经验的18名与会者寻求信息删除雇用删除服务或要求删除网站。我们采访的用户积极性很高，并有复杂的风险认知。我们发现他们在移除过程中遇到了障碍，导致移除成本很高，无论是他们自己请求还是雇佣服务。参与者认为，用户PII的成功货币化促使数据整合商加大了移除的难度。总的来说，通过试图将信息从互联网上移除来实现隐私的自我管理是困难的，其成功与否也很难评估。我们向用户、第三方、清除服务和研究人员提供建议，旨在改进清除过程。
papers.title_zh: “感觉像打地鼠”:用户从搜索网站上删除数据的体验

papers.title: Learning to Behave: Improving Covert Channel Security with Behavior-Based Designs
papers.authors: Ryan Wails, Andrew Stange, Eliana Troper, Aylin Caliskan, Roger Dingledine, Rob Jansen, Micah Sherr
papers.abstract: Censorship-resistant communication systems generally use real-world cover protocols to establish a covert channel through which uncensored communication can occur. Unfortunately, many previously proposed systems use cover protocols inconsistently with the way humans normally use those protocols, leading to anomalous network traffic patterns that have been shown to be discoverable by real-world censors. In this paper, we argue that censorship-resistant communication systems should follow two behavior-based design properties: (i) behavioral independence: systems should isolate the operation of their covert channels from the operation of their cover protocols, and (ii) behavioral realism: systems should either opportunistically use existing genuine cover protocol instances or run new protocol instances that are modeled after genuine ones. These properties ensure that the behavior of a system’s users will not degrade its security. We demonstrate how to achieve these properties through the design and evaluation of Raven, a censorship-resistant messaging system that uses email cover protocols identically to the way humans use email. Raven uses a generative adversarial network that is trained on genuine email data to control the timing and sizes of the email messages it sends and receives, and these messages are transferred independently of user actions. Our evaluation shows that, compared to the state-of-the-art email-based Mailet system, Raven raises the false-positive rate from 3% to 50% when detecting covert channel usage with 100% recall.
papers.abstract_zh: 抗审查的通信系统通常使用真实世界的覆盖协议来建立隐蔽通道，通过该通道可以进行未经审查的通信。不幸的是，许多以前提出的系统使用的覆盖协议与人类通常使用这些协议的方式不一致，导致异常的网络流量模式，这些模式已被证明可被现实世界的审查者发现。在本文中，我们认为，抗审查的通信系统应该遵循两个基于行为的设计属性:(I)行为独立性:系统应该将它们的隐蔽信道的操作与它们的覆盖协议的操作隔离开来，以及(ii)行为现实主义:系统应该机会主义地使用现有的真实覆盖协议实例，或者运行模仿真实覆盖协议实例的新协议实例。这些属性确保系统用户的行为不会降低其安全性。我们通过Raven的设计和评估演示了如何实现这些特性，Raven是一个抗审查的消息系统，它使用与人类使用电子邮件相同的电子邮件覆盖协议。Raven使用一个生成式对抗网络，该网络经过真实电子邮件数据的训练，可以控制它发送和接收的电子邮件消息的时间和大小，这些消息的传输独立于用户的操作。我们的评估表明，与最先进的基于电子邮件的Mailet系统相比，Raven在检测隐蔽通道使用时的误报率从3%提高到50%，召回率为100%。
papers.title_zh: 学会行为:用基于行为的设计提高隐蔽通道的安全性

papers.title: I know what you did on Venmo: Discovering privacy leaks in mobile social payments
papers.authors: Rajat Tandon, Pithayuth Charnsethikul, Ishank Arora, Dhiraj Murthy, Jelena Mirkovic
papers.abstract: Venmo is a US-based mobile social payments platform. Each Venmo transaction requires a “payment note”, a brief memo. By default, these memos are visible to all other Venmo users. Using three data sets of Venmo transactions, which span 8 years and a total of 389 M transactions with over 22.5 M unique users, we quantify the extent of private data leaks from public transaction notes. To quantify the leaks, we develop a classification framework SENMO, that uses BERT and regular expressions to classify public transaction notes as sensitive or non-sensitive. We find that 41 M notes (10.5%) leak some sensitive information such as health condition, political orientation and drug/alcohol consumption involving 8.5 M (37.8%) users. We further find that users seek privacy by making their notes private, inconspicuous or cryptic. However, the large increase in Venmo’s user base means that the number of users whose privacy is publicly exposed has grown substantially. Finally, the privacy of a user who transacts with a group on Venmo can be reduced or eliminated through the actions of other users. We find that this happens to around half of Alcoholics Anonymous, gambling and biker gang group members. Our findings strongly suggest that public-by-default payment information puts many users at risk of unintended privacy leaks.
papers.abstract_zh: Venmo是一家总部位于美国的移动社交支付平台。每笔Venmo交易都需要一份“付款通知”，一份简短的备忘录。默认情况下，所有其他Venmo用户都可以看到这些备忘录。我们使用Venmo交易的三个数据集，时间跨度为8年，共有超过2250万独立用户的3.89亿笔交易，量化了公共交易记录中私人数据泄露的程度。为了量化泄漏，我们开发了一个分类框架SENMO，它使用BERT和正则表达式将公共交易票据分类为敏感或非敏感。我们发现，4100万封短信(10.5%)泄露了一些敏感信息，如健康状况、政治倾向和药物/酒精消费，涉及850万(37.8%)用户。我们进一步发现，用户通过使他们的笔记私密、不显眼或隐晦来寻求隐私。然而，Venmo用户群的大量增加意味着隐私被公开曝光的用户数量大幅增长。最后，与Venmo上的群组进行交易的用户的隐私可以通过其他用户的行为来减少或消除。我们发现，这种情况发生在大约一半的匿名酗酒者，赌博和骑自行车的团伙成员身上。我们的发现强烈表明，默认公开的支付信息使许多用户处于无意的隐私泄露的风险中。
papers.title_zh: 我知道你在Venmo上做了什么:发现移动社交支付中的隐私泄露

papers.title: Privacy accounting εconomics: Improving differential privacy composition via a posteriori bounds
papers.authors: Valentin Hartmann, Vincent Bindschaedler, Alexander Bentkamp, Robert West
papers.abstract: Differential privacy (DP) is a widely used notion for reasoning about privacy when publishing aggregate data. In this paper, we observe that certain DP mechanisms are amenable to a posteriori privacy analysis that exploits the fact that some outputs leak less information about the input database than others. To exploit this phenomenon, we introduce output differential privacy (ODP) and a new composition experiment, and leverage these new constructs to obtain significant privacy budget savings and improved privacy–utility tradeoffs under composition. All of this comes at no cost in terms of privacy; we do not weaken the privacy guarantee. To demonstrate the applicability of our a posteriori privacy analysis techniques, we analyze two well-known mechanisms: the Sparse Vector Technique and the Propose-Test-Release framework. We then show how our techniques can be used to save privacy budget in more general contexts: when a differentially private iterative mechanism terminates before its maximal number of iterations is reached, and when the output of a DP mechanism provides unsatisfactory utility. Examples of the former include iterative optimization algorithms, whereas examples of the latter include training a machine learning model with a large generalization error. Our techniques can be applied beyond the current paper to refine the analysis of existing DP mechanisms or guide the design of future mechanisms.
papers.abstract_zh: 差分隐私(DP)是一个广泛使用的概念，用于发布聚合数据时的隐私推理。在本文中，我们观察到某些DP机制服从后验隐私分析，后验隐私分析利用了这样一个事实，即一些输出比其他输出泄漏更少的关于输入数据库的信息。为了利用这一现象，我们引入了输出差分隐私(ODP)和一个新的组合实验，并利用这些新的结构来获得显著的隐私预算节省和组合下改进的隐私-效用权衡。所有这些在隐私方面都是免费的；我们不会削弱隐私保障。为了证明我们的后验隐私分析技术的适用性，我们分析了两个众所周知的机制:稀疏向量技术和建议-测试-发布框架。然后，我们展示了如何在更一般的情况下使用我们的技术来节省隐私预算:当差分隐私迭代机制在达到其最大迭代次数之前终止时，以及当DP机制的输出提供不令人满意的效用时。前者的例子包括迭代优化算法，而后者的例子包括用大的泛化误差训练机器学习模型。我们的技术可以应用到当前论文之外，以改进现有DP机制的分析或指导未来机制的设计。
papers.title_zh: 隐私会计ε经济学:通过后验界限改进差别隐私构成

papers.title: Moby: A Blackout-Resistant Anonymity Network for Mobile Devices
papers.authors: Amogh Pradeep, Hira Javaid, Ryan Williams, Antoine Rault, David R. Choffnes, Stevens Le Blond, Bryan Ford
papers.abstract: Internet blackouts are challenging environments for anonymity and censorship resistance. Existing popular anonymity networks (e.g., Freenet, I2P, Tor) rely on Internet connectivity to function, making them impracticable during such blackouts. In such a setting, mobile ad-hoc networks can provide connectivity, but prior communication protocols for ad-hoc networks are not designed for anonymity and attack resilience. We address this need by designing, implementing, and evaluating Moby, a blackout-resistant anonymity network for mobile devices. Moby provides end-to-end encryption, forward secrecy and sender-receiver anonymity. It features a bi-modal design of operation, using Internet connectivity when available and ad-hoc networks during blackouts. During periods of Internet connectivity, Moby functions as a regular messaging application and bootstraps information that is later used in the absence of Internet connectivity to achieve secure anonymous communications. Moby incorporates a model of trust based on users’ contact lists, and a trust establishment protocol that mitigates flooding attacks. We perform an empirically informed simulation-based study based on cellphone traces of 268,596 users over the span of a week for a large cellular provider to determine Moby’s feasibility and present our findings. Last, we implement and evaluate the Moby client as an Android app.
papers.abstract_zh: 互联网封锁正在挑战匿名和审查阻力的环境。现有的流行匿名网络(例如Freenet、I2P、Tor)依赖于互联网连接来运行，使得它们在这种停电期间不可行。在这种情况下，移动自组织网络可以提供连接性，但是用于自组织网络的现有通信协议不是为匿名性和抗攻击性而设计的。我们通过设计、实现和评估莫比来满足这一需求，这是一种针对移动设备的抗中断匿名网络。莫比提供端到端加密、前向保密和发送者-接收者匿名。它采用双模式操作设计，在可用时使用互联网连接，在停电时使用临时网络。在互联网连接期间，莫比作为一个常规的消息应用程序运行，并引导信息，这些信息稍后在没有互联网连接的情况下用于实现安全的匿名通信。莫比结合了基于用户联系人列表的信任模型，以及减轻洪泛攻击的信任建立协议。我们对一家大型手机供应商的268，596名用户进行了为期一周的手机追踪，在此基础上进行了一项基于经验的模拟研究，以确定莫比的可行性并展示我们的研究结果。最后，我们将莫比客户端作为一款Android应用进行了实现和评估。
papers.title_zh: 莫比:移动设备的抗停电匿名网络

papers.title: Athena: Probabilistic Verification of Machine Unlearning
papers.authors: David Marco Sommer, Liwei Song, Sameer Wagh, Prateek Mittal
papers.abstract: The right to be forgotten, also known as the right to erasure, is the right of individuals to have their data erased from an entity storing it. The status of this long held notion was legally solidified recently by the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) in the European Union. As a consequence, there is a need for mechanisms whereby users can verify if service providers comply with their deletion requests. In this work, we take the first step in proposing a formal framework, called Athena, to study the design of such verification mechanisms for data deletion requests – also known as machine unlearning – in the context of systems that provide machine learning as a service (MLaaS). Athena allows the rigorous quantification of any verification mechanism based on hypothesis testing. Furthermore, we propose a novel verification mechanism that leverages backdoors and demonstrate its effectiveness in certifying data deletion with high confidence, thus providing a basis for quantitatively inferring machine unlearning. We evaluate our approach over a range of network architectures such as multi-layer perceptrons (MLP), convolutional neural networks (CNN), residual networks (ResNet), and long short-term memory (LSTM) and over 6 different datasets. We demonstrate that: (1) our approach has minimal effect on the accuracy of the ML service but provides high confidence verification of unlearning, even if multiple users employ our system to ascertain compliance with data deletion requests, and (2) our mechanism is robust against servers deploying state-of-the-art backdoor defense methods. Overall, our approach provides a foundation for a quantitative analysis of verifying machine unlearning, which can provide support for legal and regulatory frameworks pertaining to users’ data deletion requests.
papers.abstract_zh: 被遗忘权，也称为擦除权，是个人将其数据从存储数据的实体中擦除的权利。最近，欧盟的《一般数据保护条例》( GDPR)从法律上巩固了这一长期持有的观念。因此，需要一种机制，通过该机制，用户可以验证服务提供商是否遵从他们的删除请求。在这项工作中，我们迈出了第一步，提出了一个名为Athena的正式框架，以研究在提供机器学习即服务(MLaaS)的系统背景下，针对数据删除请求(也称为机器遗忘)的这种验证机制的设计。Athena允许基于假设测试的任何验证机制的严格量化。此外，我们提出了一种新的验证机制，该机制利用了后门，并证明了其在高置信度下验证数据删除的有效性，从而为定量推断机器去学习提供了基础。我们在一系列网络架构上评估了我们的方法，如多层感知器(MLP)、卷积神经网络(CNN)、残差网络(ResNet)和长短期记忆(LSTM)以及超过6个不同的数据集。我们证明:(1)我们的方法对ML服务的准确性具有最小的影响，但是提供了高置信度的遗忘验证，即使多个用户使用我们的系统来确定符合数据删除请求，以及(2)我们的机制对于部署最先进的后门防御方法的服务器是健壮的。总之，我们的方法为验证机器遗忘的定量分析提供了基础，这可以为与用户的数据删除请求相关的法律和监管框架提供支持。
papers.title_zh: Athena:机器去学习的概率验证

papers.title: Fully Secure PSI via MPC-in-the-Head
papers.authors: S. Dov Gordon, Carmit Hazay, Phi Hung Le
papers.abstract: We design several new protocols for private set intersection (PSI) with active security: one for the two party setting, and two protocols for the multi-party setting. In recent years, the state-of-the-art protocols for two party PSI have all been built from OT-extension. This has led to extremely efficient protocols that provide correct output to one party; seemingly inherent to the approach, however, is that there is no efficient way to relay the result to the other party with a provable correctness guarantee. Furthermore, there is no natural way to extend this line of works to more parties. We consider a new instantiation of an older approach. Using the MPC-in-the-head paradigm of Ishai et al. [IPS08], we construct a polynomial with roots that encode the intersection, without revealing the inputs. Our reliance on this paradigm allows us to base our protocol on passively secure Oblivious Linear Evaluation (OLE) (requiring 4 such amortized calls per input element). Unlike state-ofthe-art prior work, our protocols provide correct output to all parties. We have implemented our protocols, providing the first benchmarks for PSI that provides correct output to all parties. Additionally, we present a variant of our multi-party protocol that provides output only to a central server.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们设计了几个新的具有主动安全性的私有集合相交协议:一个用于两方设置，两个用于多方设置。近年来，双方PSI的最新协议都是从OT-extension构建的。这导致了向一方提供正确输出的极其有效的协议；然而，这种方法似乎固有的一点是，没有有效的方法将结果传递给另一方，并保证可证明的正确性。此外，没有自然的方法将这一系列的工作扩展到更多的方面。我们考虑旧方法的新实例。使用Ishai等人[IPS08]的MPC-in-the-head范式，我们构建了一个多项式，其根编码交集，而不显示输入。我们对这个范例的依赖允许我们将我们的协议建立在被动安全的不经意线性评估(OLE)的基础上(每个输入元素需要4个这样的分摊调用)。与现有技术不同，我们的协议为各方提供了正确的输出。我们已经实施了我们的协议，为PSI提供了第一个基准，为各方提供了正确的输出。此外，我们提出了我们的多方协议的变体，它只向中央服务器提供输出。
papers.title_zh: 通过头部MPC充分保护PSI

papers.title: Trace Oddity: Methodologies for Data-Driven Traffic Analysis on Tor
papers.authors: Vera Rimmer, Theodor Schnitzler, Tom van Goethem, Abel Rodríguez Romero, Wouter Joosen, Katharina Kohls
papers.abstract: Traffic analysis attacks against encrypted web traffic are a persisting problem. However, there is a large gap between the scientific estimate of attack threats and the real-world situation. As traffic analysis attacks depend on very specific metadata information, they are sensitive to artificial changes in the transmission characteristics. While the advent of deep learning greatly improves the performance rates of traffic analysis attacks on Tor in research settings, deep neural networks are known for being implicitly vulnerable to artifacts in data. Removing artifacts from our experimental setups is essential to minimizing the risk of evaluation bias. In this work, we study a state-of-the-art end-to-end traffic correlation attack on Tor and propose a novel data collection setup. Our design addresses the key constraint of prior work: instead of using a single proxy node for collecting exit traffic, we deploy multiple proxies. Our extensive analysis shows that in the multi-proxy design (i) end-to-end round-trip times are more realistic than in the original design, and that (ii) traffic correlation attack performance degrades significantly on realistic timings. For a reliable and informative evaluation, we develop a general scientific methodology for replication and comparison of machine and deep-learning attacks on Tor. Our evaluation indicates high relevance of the multi-proxy data collection setup and the novel dataset.
papers.abstract_zh: 针对加密web流量的流量分析攻击是一个长期存在的问题。然而，对攻击威胁的科学估计与现实情况之间存在很大差距。由于流量分析攻击依赖于非常具体的元数据信息，因此它们对传输特性的人为变化非常敏感。虽然深度学习的出现极大地提高了研究环境中Tor上流量分析攻击的性能率，但深度神经网络因隐含地易受数据中伪像的影响而闻名。从我们的实验设置中移除伪影对于最小化评估偏差的风险是至关重要的。在本文中，我们研究了Tor上的端到端流量关联攻击，并提出了一种新的数据收集机制。我们的设计解决了先前工作的关键限制:我们部署了多个代理，而不是使用单个代理节点来收集出口流量。我们的广泛分析表明，在多代理设计中,( I)端到端往返时间比原始设计中更真实，以及(ii)流量相关性攻击性能在真实计时上显著下降。为了进行可靠和翔实的评估，我们开发了一种通用的科学方法，用于复制和比较机器和深度学习对Tor的攻击。我们的评估表明多代理数据收集设置和新数据集的高度相关性。
papers.title_zh: 追踪异常:Tor上数据驱动的流量分析方法

papers.title: SoK: SCT Auditing in Certificate Transparency
papers.authors: Sarah Meiklejohn, Joe DeBlasio, Devon O'Brien, Chris Thompson, Kevin Yeo, Emily Stark
papers.abstract: The Web public key infrastructure is essential to providing secure communication on the Internet today, and certificate authorities play a crucial role in this ecosystem by issuing certificates. These authorities may misissue certificates or suffer misuse attacks, however, which has given rise to the Certificate Transparency (CT) project. The goal of CT is to store all issued certificates in public logs, which can then be checked for the presence of potentially misissued certificates. Thus, the requirement that a given certificate is indeed in one (or several) of these logs lies at the core of CT. In its current deployment, however, most individual clients do not check that the certificates they see are in logs, as requesting a proof of inclusion directly reveals the certificate and thus creates the clear potential for a violation of that client’s privacy. In this paper, we explore the techniques that have been proposed for privacy-preserving auditing of certificate inclusion, focusing on their effectiveness, efficiency, and suitability in a near-term deployment. In doing so, we also explore the parallels with related problems involving browser clients. Guided by a set of constraints that we develop, we ultimately observe several key limitations in many proposals, ranging from their privacy provisions to the fact that they focus on the interaction between a client and a log but leave open the question of how a client could privately report any certificates that are missing.
papers.abstract_zh: Web公钥基础设施对于在当今的互联网上提供安全的通信是必不可少的，而认证机构通过颁发证书在这个生态系统中扮演着至关重要的角色。然而，这些机构可能会误发证书或遭受误用攻击，这就产生了证书透明性(CT)项目。CT的目标是将所有颁发的证书存储在公共日志中，然后可以检查公共日志中是否存在可能颁发错误的证书。因此，给定证书确实在一个(或几个)日志中的要求是CT的核心。但是，在其当前部署中，大多数个人客户端不会检查他们看到的证书是否在日志中，因为请求包含证明会直接暴露证书，从而明显可能侵犯该客户端的隐私。在本文中，我们探讨了已提出的用于证书包含的隐私保护审计的技术，重点关注它们在近期部署中的有效性、效率和适用性。在这样做的同时，我们也探索了浏览器客户端相关问题的相似之处。在我们开发的一组约束的指导下，我们最终观察到许多提案中的几个关键限制，从它们的隐私条款到它们关注客户端和日志之间的交互，但留下了客户端如何私下报告任何丢失的证书的问题。
papers.title_zh: SoK:证书透明度中的SCT审计

papers.title: In Search of Lost Utility: Private Location Data
papers.authors: Szilvia Lestyán, Gergely Ács, Gergely Biczók
papers.abstract: The unavailability of training data is a permanent source of much frustration in research, especially when it is due to privacy concerns. This is particularly true for location data since previous techniques all suffer from the inherent sparseness and high dimensionality of location trajectories which render most techniques impractical, resulting in unrealistic traces and non-scalable methods. Moreover, time information of location visits is usually dropped, or its resolution is drastically reduced. In this paper we present a novel technique for privately releasing a composite generative model and whole high-dimensional location datasets with detailed time information. To generate high-fidelity synthetic data, we leverage several peculiarities of vehicular mobility such as its language-like characteristics (“you should know a location by the company it keeps”) or how humans plan their trips from one point to the other. We model the generator distribution of the dataset by first constructing a variational autoencoder to generate the source and destination locations, and the corresponding timing of trajectories. Next, we compute transition probabilities between locations with a feed forward network, and build a transition graph from the output of this model, which approximates the distribution of all paths between the source and destination (at a given time). Finally, a path is sampled from this distribution with a Markov Chain Monte Carlo method. The generated synthetic dataset is highly realistic, scalable, provides good utility and, nonetheless, provably private. We evaluate our model against two state-of-theart methods and three real-life datasets demonstrating the benefits of our approach.
papers.abstract_zh: 训练数据的不可用性是研究中许多挫折的永久来源，尤其是当它是由于隐私问题时。对于位置数据来说尤其如此，因为先前的技术都受到位置轨迹的固有稀疏性和高维数的影响，这使得大多数技术不切实际，导致不切实际的轨迹和不可扩展的方法。此外，位置访问的时间信息通常会丢失，或者其分辨率会大幅降低。在本文中，我们提出了一种新的技术，用于秘密发布复合生成模型和具有详细时间信息的整个高维位置数据集。为了生成高保真的合成数据，我们利用了车辆移动性的几个特性，如其类似语言的特征(“你应该知道它所保持的公司的位置”)或人类如何计划他们从一点到另一点的旅行。我们通过首先构建变分自动编码器来生成源和目的地位置以及轨迹的相应定时，从而对数据集的生成器分布进行建模。接下来，我们使用前馈网络计算位置之间的转移概率，并根据该模型的输出构建转移图，该图近似于源和目的地之间所有路径的分布(在给定时间)。最后，使用马尔可夫链蒙特卡罗方法从该分布中采样路径。生成的合成数据集是高度现实的，可扩展的，提供了良好的效用，尽管如此，可证明是私有的。我们用两种最先进的方法和三个真实数据集来评估我们的模型，证明了我们方法的好处。
papers.title_zh: 寻找失去的效用:私人位置数据

papers.title: Are You Really Muted?: A Privacy Analysis of Mute Buttons in Video Conferencing Apps
papers.authors: Yucheng Yang, Jack West, George K. Thiruvathukal, Neil Klingensmith, Kassem Fawaz
papers.abstract: Video conferencing apps (VCAs) make it possible for previously private spaces — bedrooms, living rooms, and kitchens — into semi-public extensions of the office. For the most part, users have accepted these apps in their personal space without much thought about the permission models that govern the use of their private data during meetings. While access to a device’s video camera is carefully controlled, little has been done to ensure the same level of privacy for accessing the microphone. In this work, we ask the question: what happens to the microphone data when a user clicks the mute button in a VCA? We first conduct a user study to analyze users’ understanding of the permission model of the mute button. Then, using runtime binary analysis tools, we trace raw audio flow in many popular VCAs as it traverses the app from the audio driver to the network. We find fragmented policies for dealing with microphone data among VCAs — some continuously monitor the microphone input during mute, and others do so periodically. One app transmits statistics of the audio to its telemetry servers while the app is muted. Using network traffic that we intercept en route to the telemetry server, we implement a proof-of-concept background activity classifier and demonstrate the feasibility of inferring the ongoing background activity during a meeting — cooking, cleaning, typing, etc. We achieved 81.9% macro accuracy on identifying six common background activities using intercepted outgoing telemetry packets when a user is muted.
papers.abstract_zh: 视频会议应用程序(VCAs)使得以前的私人空间——卧室、客厅和厨房——成为办公室的半公共扩展成为可能。在很大程度上，用户已经在他们的个人空间接受了这些应用，而没有太多考虑会议期间管理他们私人数据使用的许可模式。虽然对设备摄像头的访问受到严格控制，但在访问麦克风时，几乎没有采取任何措施来确保同样的隐私级别。在这项工作中，我们提出了这样一个问题:当用户点击VCA中的静音按钮时，麦克风数据会发生什么变化？我们首先进行用户研究，分析用户对静音按钮权限模型的理解。然后，使用运行时二进制分析工具，我们跟踪许多流行VCA中的原始音频流，因为它从音频驱动程序到网络遍历应用程序。我们在VCA中发现处理麦克风数据的分散策略，有些在静音期间持续监控麦克风输入，有些则定期监控。一个应用程序在静音时将音频的统计数据传输到遥测服务器。使用我们在通往遥测服务器的途中拦截的网络流量，我们实现了一个概念验证后台活动分类器，并演示了推断会议期间正在进行的后台活动(烹饪、清洁、打字等)的可行性。当用户静音时，我们使用截获的传出遥测数据包识别六种常见的后台活动，达到了81.9%的宏观准确性。
papers.title_zh: 你真的静音了吗？:视频会议应用中静音按钮的隐私分析

papers.title: "We may share the number of diaper changes": A Privacy and Security Analysis of Mobile Child Care Applications
papers.authors: Moritz Gruber, Christian Höfig, Maximilian Golla, Tobias Urban, Matteo Große-Kampmann
papers.abstract: Mobile child care management applications can help child care facilities, preschools, and kindergartens to save time and money by allowing their employees to speed up everyday child care tasks using mobile devices. Such apps often allow child care workers to communicate with parents or guardians, sharing their children’s most private data (e. g., activities, photos, location, developmental aspects, and sometimes even medical information). To offer these services, child care apps require access to very sensitive data of minors that should never be shared over insecure channels and are subject to restrictive privacy laws. This work analyzes the privacy and security of 42 Android child care applications and their cloud-backends using a combination of static and dynamic analysis frameworks, configuration scanners, and inspecting their privacy policies. The results of our analysis show that while children do not use these apps, they can leak sensitive data about them. Alarming are the findings that many third-party (tracking) services are embedded in the applications and that adversaries can access personal data by abusing vulnerabilities in the applications. We hope our work will raise awareness about the privacy risks introduced by these applications and that regulatory authorities will focus more on these risks in the future.
papers.abstract_zh: 移动儿童护理管理应用程序允许员工使用移动设备加快日常儿童护理任务，从而帮助儿童护理机构、幼儿园和托儿所节省时间和资金。这类应用程序通常允许儿童护理人员与父母或监护人交流，分享他们孩子最隐私的数据(例如，活动、照片、位置、发展方面，有时甚至是医疗信息)。为了提供这些服务，儿童护理应用程序需要访问未成年人的非常敏感的数据，这些数据绝不能通过不安全的渠道共享，并且受到限制性隐私法律的限制。这项工作结合使用静态和动态分析框架、配置扫描器和检查隐私政策，分析了42个Android儿童护理应用程序及其云后端的隐私和安全。我们的分析结果表明，虽然儿童不使用这些应用程序，但他们可能会泄露有关这些应用程序的敏感数据。令人震惊的发现是，许多第三方(跟踪)服务嵌入在应用程序中，对手可以通过滥用应用程序中的漏洞来访问个人数据。我们希望我们的工作将提高对这些应用程序带来的隐私风险的认识，并希望监管机构在未来更多地关注这些风险。
papers.title_zh: “我们可以分享换尿布的次数”:移动儿童护理应用的隐私和安全分析

papers.title: Deletion inference, reconstruction, and compliance in machine (un)learning
papers.authors: Ji Gao, Sanjam Garg, Mohammad Mahmoody, Prashant Nalini Vasudevan
papers.abstract: Privacy attacks on machine learning models aim to identify the data that is used to train such models. Such attacks, traditionally, are studied on static models that are trained once and are accessible by the adversary. Motivated to meet new legal requirements, many machine learning methods are recently extended to support machine unlearning, i.e., updating models as if certain examples are removed from their training sets, and meet new legal requirements. However, privacy attacks could potentially become more devastating in this new setting, since an attacker could now access both the original model before deletion and the new model after the deletion. In fact, the very act of deletion might make the deleted record more vulnerable to privacy attacks. Inspired by cryptographic definitions and the differential privacy framework, we formally study privacy implications of machine unlearning. We formalize (various forms of) deletion inference and deletion reconstruction attacks, in which the adversary aims to either identify which record is deleted or to reconstruct (perhaps part of) the deleted records. We then present successful deletion inference and reconstruction attacks for a variety of machine learning models and tasks such as classification, regression, and language models. Finally, we show that our attacks would provably be precluded if the schemes satisfy (variants of) deletion compliance (Garg, Goldwasser, and Vasudevan, Eurocrypt’20).
papers.abstract_zh: 对机器学习模型的隐私攻击旨在识别用于训练此类模型的数据。传统上，这种攻击是在静态模型上研究的，这些模型只经过一次训练，对手就可以访问。出于满足新的法律要求的动机，许多机器学习方法最近被扩展以支持机器去学习，即，更新模型，就好像某些示例被从它们的训练集中移除一样，并且满足新的法律要求。然而，在这种新的设置中，隐私攻击可能变得更具破坏性，因为攻击者现在可以访问删除前的原始模型和删除后的新模型。事实上，删除行为可能会使被删除的记录更容易受到隐私攻击。受密码定义和差分隐私框架的启发，我们正式研究了机器遗忘的隐私含义。我们形式化了(各种形式的)删除推理和删除重建攻击，其中对手的目标是识别哪个记录被删除或者重建(可能是部分)被删除的记录。然后，我们介绍了成功的删除推理和重建攻击的各种机器学习模型和任务，如分类，回归和语言模型。最后，我们证明，如果方案满足删除合规性(的变体)，我们的攻击将被可证明地排除(Garg，Goldwasser，和Vasudevan，Eurocrypt'20)。
papers.title_zh: 机器(不)学习中的删除推理、重构和顺应性

papers.title: Leave No Data Behind - Empirical Insights into Data Erasure from Online Services
papers.authors: Eduard Rupp, Emmanuel Syrmoudis, Jens Grossklags
papers.abstract: Privacy regulations such as the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) of the European Union promise to empower users of online services and to strengthen competition in online markets. Its Article 17, the Right to Erasure (Right to be Forgotten), is part of a set of user rights that aim to give users more control over their data by allowing them to switch between services more easily and to delete their data from the old service. In our study, we investigated the data deletion practices of a sample of 90 online services. In a twostage process, we first request the erasure of our data and analyze to what extent public data (e.g., posts on a social network) remains accessible in a non-anonymized format. More than six months later, we request information on our data using Right of Access requests under Art. 15 GDPR to find out if and what data remains. Our results show that a majority of services perform data erasures without observable breaches of the provisions of Art. 17 GDPR. At 27%, the share of non-compliant services is not negligible; in particular, we observe differences between requests submitted using a dedicated button and formal requests under Art. 17 GDPR.
papers.abstract_zh: 欧洲联盟的一般数据保护条例(GDPR)等隐私条例承诺增强在线服务用户的能力，并加强在线市场的竞争。其第17条，擦除权(被遗忘权)，是一系列用户权利的一部分，旨在通过允许用户更容易地在服务之间切换以及从旧服务中删除数据，给予用户对其数据的更多控制权。在我们的研究中，我们调查了90个在线服务样本的数据删除实践。在一个两阶段的过程中，我们首先要求删除我们的数据，并分析公共数据(例如，社交网络上的帖子)在多大程度上仍然可以以非匿名格式访问。六个多月后，我们根据《GDPR法案》第15条使用访问权请求来请求有关我们数据的信息，以确定是否还有哪些数据。我们的结果表明，大多数服务执行数据擦除没有明显违反第17条GDPR的规定。27%的不合规服务的份额不可忽略；特别是，我们注意到使用专用按钮提交的请求与根据《GDPR公约》第17条提交的正式请求之间的差异。
papers.title_zh: 不留任何数据—从在线服务中擦除数据的经验洞察

papers.title: Mixnet optimization methods
papers.authors: Iness Ben Guirat, Claudia Díaz
papers.abstract: We propose a method to optimally select mix network parameters for a given deployment context and adversarial model. Our method considers both worstcase and average-case anonymity and selects configurations that meet worst-case constraints while maximizing average anonymity. We apply our methods to mixnet size optimization to determine the number and width of mixnet layers, and provide results for various deployment and adversarial scenarios. For cases where the deployment context suddenly changes (drop in user traffic) we evaluate countermeasures based on mix-generated dummy traffic and show that inexpensive link dummies can significantly boost protection in some of these cases.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了一种方法来为给定的部署环境和对抗模型最优地选择混合网络参数。我们的方法考虑最坏情况和平均情况下的匿名性，并选择满足最坏情况约束的配置，同时最大化平均匿名性。我们将我们的方法应用于mixnet大小优化，以确定mixnet层的数量和宽度，并为各种部署和对抗场景提供结果。对于部署环境突然改变(用户流量下降)的情况，我们基于混合生成的虚拟流量评估对策，并表明在某些情况下，廉价的虚拟链路可以显著增强保护。
papers.title_zh: Mixnet优化方法

papers.title: On dark patterns and manipulation of website publishers by CMPs
papers.authors: Michael Toth, Nataliia Bielova, Vincent Roca
papers.abstract: Web technologies and services widely rely on data collection via tracking users on websites. In the EU, the collection of such data requires user consent thanks to the ePrivacy Directive (ePD), and the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). To comply with these regulations and integrate consent collection into their websites, website publishers often rely on third-party contractors, called Consent Management Providers (CMPs), that provide consent pop-ups as a service. Since the GDPR came in force in May 2018, the presence of CMPs continuously increased. In our work, we systematically study the installation and configuration process of consent pop-ups and their potential effects on the decision making of the website publishers. We make an in-depth analysis of the configuration process from ten services provided by five popular CMP companies and identify common unethical design choices employed. By analysing CMP services on an empty experimental website, we identify manipulation of website publishers towards subscription to the CMPs paid plans and then determine that default consent pop-ups often violate the law. We also show that configuration options may lead to non-compliance, while tracking scanners offered by CMPs manipulate publishers. Our findings demonstrate the importance of CMPs and design space offered to website publishers, and we raise concerns around the privileged position of CMPs and their strategies influencing website publishers.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络技术和服务广泛依赖于通过跟踪网站上的用户来收集数据。在欧盟，根据《电子隐私指令》(ePD)和《一般数据保护条例》(GDPR)，收集此类数据需要用户同意。为了遵守这些法规并将同意收集集成到他们的网站中，网站发布者通常依赖于第三方承包商，称为同意管理提供商(CMPs)，他们提供同意弹出窗口作为服务。自《GDPR》于2018年5月生效以来，中医的存在不断增加。在我们的工作中，我们系统地研究了同意弹出窗口的安装和配置过程及其对网站发布者决策的潜在影响。我们对五家流行的CMP公司提供的十种服务的配置过程进行了深入分析，并确定了常见的不道德设计选择。通过分析一个空的实验性网站上的CMP服务，我们确定了网站出版商对订阅CMPs付费计划的操纵，然后确定默认同意弹出窗口经常违反法律。我们还表明，配置选项可能会导致不符合，而跟踪扫描仪提供的CMPs操纵出版商。我们的发现证明了CMP和提供给网站出版商的设计空间的重要性，我们对CMP的特权地位及其影响网站出版商的策略提出了关注。
papers.title_zh: CMPs对网站出版商的黑暗模式和操纵

papers.title: Leveraging strategic connection migration-powered traffic splitting for privacy
papers.authors: Mona Wang, Anunay Kulshrestha, Liang Wang, Prateek Mittal
papers.abstract: Network-level adversaries have developed increasingly sophisticated techniques to surveil and control users’ network traffic. In this paper, we exploit our observation that many encrypted protocol connections are no longer tied to device IP address (e.g., the connection migration feature in QUIC, or IP roaming in WireGuard and Mosh), due to the need for performance in a mobile-first world. We design and implement a novel framework, Connection Migration Powered Splitting (CoMPS), that utilizes these performance features for enhancing user privacy. With CoMPS, we can split traffic mid-session across network paths and heterogeneous network protocols. Such traffic splitting mitigates the ability of a network-level adversary to perform traffic analysis attacks by limiting the amount of traffic they can observe. We use CoMPS to construct a website fingerprinting defense that is resilient against traffic analysis attacks by a powerful adaptive adversary in the open-world setting. We evaluate our system using both simulated splitting data and real-world traffic that is actively split using CoMPS. In our real-world experiments, CoMPS reduces the precision and recall of VarCNN to 29.9% and 36.7% respectively in the openworld setting with 100 monitored classes. CoMPS is not only immediately deployable with any unaltered server that supports connection migration, but also incurs little overhead, decreasing throughput by only 5-20%.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络级别的对手已经开发出越来越复杂的技术来监视和控制用户的网络流量。在本文中，我们利用了我们的观察结果，即由于在移动优先的世界中对性能的需求，许多加密协议连接不再依赖于设备IP地址(例如，QUIC中的连接迁移功能，或者WireGuard和Mosh中的IP漫游)。我们设计并实现了一个新颖的框架，连接迁移驱动分裂(CoMPS)，它利用这些性能特征来增强用户隐私。有了CoMPS，我们可以在网络路径和异构网络协议之间的会话中间分割流量。这种流量分离通过限制网络级对手可以观察到的流量来削弱他们执行流量分析攻击的能力。我们使用CoMPS构建了一个网站指纹防御系统，该系统可以抵御开放环境中强大的适应性对手的流量分析攻击。我们使用模拟分流数据和使用CoMPS主动分流的真实流量来评估我们的系统。在我们的真实实验中，CoMPS在具有100个监控类的openworld环境下将VarCNN的准确率和召回率分别降低到29.9%和36.7%。CoMPS不仅可以立即部署到任何支持连接迁移的服务器上，而且开销很小，吞吐量仅降低5-20%。
papers.title_zh: 利用战略连接迁移驱动的流量分离保护隐私

papers.title: DALock: Password Distribution-Aware Throttling
papers.authors: Jeremiah Blocki, Wuwei Zhang
papers.abstract: Large-scale online password guessing attacks are widespread and pose a persistant privacy and security threat to users. The common method for mitigating the risk of online cracking is to lock out the user after a fixed number (K) of consecutive incorrect login attempts. Selecting the value of K induces a classic security-usability trade-off. When K is too large, a hacker can (quickly) break into a significant fraction of user accounts, but when K is too low, we will start to annoy honest users by locking them out after a few mistakes. Motivated by the observation that honest user mistakes typically look quite different from an online attacker’s password guesses, we introduce DALock, a distribution-aware password lockout mechanism to reduce user annoyance while minimizing user risk. As the name suggests, DALock is designed to be aware of the frequency and popularity of the password used for login attacks. At the same time, standard throttling mechanisms (e.g., K-strikes) are oblivious to the password distribution. In particular, DALock maintains an extra “hit count" in addition to “strike count" for each user, which is based on (estimates of) the cumulative probability of all login attempts for that particular account. We empirically evaluate DALock with an extensive battery of simulations using real-world password datasets. In comparison with the traditional K-strikes mechanism, our simulations indicate that DALock offers a superior simulated security/usability trade-off. For example, in one of our simulations, we are able to reduce the success rate of an attacker to 0.05% (compared to 1% for the 3strikes mechanism) whilst simultaneously reducing the unwanted lockout rate for accounts that are not under attack to just 0.08% (compared to 4% for the 3-strikes mechanism).
papers.abstract_zh: 大规模在线密码猜测攻击非常普遍，并对用户的隐私和安全构成持续威胁。降低在线破解风险的常用方法是在固定次数(K)的连续错误登录尝试后锁定用户。选择K值会导致经典的安全性-可用性权衡。当K太大时，黑客可以(迅速)侵入相当一部分用户账户，但当K太低时，我们会在出现几次错误后将诚实的用户锁定，从而开始惹恼他们。由于观察到诚实用户的错误通常看起来与在线攻击者的密码猜测非常不同，我们引入了DALock，这是一种分发感知的密码锁定机制，可以减少用户的烦恼，同时最大限度地降低用户风险。顾名思义，DALock旨在了解用于登录攻击的密码的频率和流行程度。同时，标准节流机制(例如，K-strikes)不理会密码分发。特别是，除了每个用户的“点击计数”之外，DALock还维护了一个额外的“点击计数”,该计数基于该特定帐户所有登录尝试的累积概率(估计值)。我们使用真实世界的密码数据集，通过大量的模拟实验对DALock进行了实证评估。与传统的K-strikes机制相比，我们的模拟表明，DALock提供了一个更好的模拟安全性/可用性权衡。例如，在我们的一个模拟中，我们能够将攻击者的成功率降低到0.05%(相比之下，三击机制为1%)，同时将未受攻击的帐户的不必要的锁定率降低到0.08%(相比之下，三击机制为4%)。
papers.title_zh: DALock:密码分发感知节流

papers.title: On Defeating Graph Analysis of Anonymous Transactions
papers.authors: Christoph Egger, Russell W. F. Lai, Viktoria Ronge, Ivy K. Y. Woo, Hoover H. F. Yin
papers.abstract: In a ring-signature-based anonymous cryptocurrency, signers of a transaction are hidden among a set of potential signers, called a ring, whose size is much smaller than the number of all users. The ringmembership relations specified by the sets of transactions thus induce bipartite transaction graphs, whose distribution is in turn induced by the ring sampler underlying the cryptocurrency. Since efficient graph analysis could be performed on transaction graphs to potentially deanonymise signers, it is crucial to understand the resistance of (the transaction graphs induced by) a ring sampler against graph analysis. Of particular interest is the class of partitioning ring samplers. Although previous works showed that they provide almost optimal local anonymity, their resistance against global, e.g. graph-based, attacks were unclear. In this work, we analyse transaction graphs induced by partitioning ring samplers. Specifically, we show (partly analytically and partly empirically) that, somewhat surprisingly, by setting the ring size to be at least logarithmic in the number of users, a graph-analysing adversary is no better than the one that performs random guessing in deanonymisation up to constant factor of 2.
papers.abstract_zh: 在基于环签名的匿名加密货币中，交易的签名者隐藏在一组潜在的签名者中，称为环，其大小远小于所有用户的数量。因此，由交易集指定的环成员关系产生了二分交易图，其分布又由加密货币下的环采样器产生。由于可以对潜在匿名签名者的事务图执行有效的图分析，所以理解环采样器对图分析的阻力(由环采样器引起的事务图)是至关重要的。特别令人感兴趣的是一类分隔环取样器。尽管先前的工作表明它们提供了几乎最优的局部匿名性，但是它们对全局(例如基于图的)攻击的抵抗性还不清楚。在这篇文章中，我们分析了由划分环采样器导出的事务图。具体来说，我们(部分通过分析，部分通过经验)表明，有些令人惊讶的是，通过将环的大小设置为用户数量的至少对数，分析图形的对手并不比在去匿名化中执行随机猜测的对手好到常数因子2。
papers.title_zh: 匿名交易的挫败图分析

papers.title: User-friendly yet rarely read: A case study on the redesign of an online HIPAA authorization
papers.authors: Sarah Pearman, Ellie Young, Lorrie Faith Cranor
papers.abstract: In this paper we describe the iterative evaluation and refinement of a consent flow for a chatbot being developed by a large U.S. health insurance company. This chatbot’s use of a cloud service provider triggers a requirement for users to agree to a HIPAA authorization. We highlight remote usability study and online survey findings indicating that simplifying the interface and language of the consent flow can improve the user experience and help users who read the content understand how their data may be used. However, we observe that most users in our studies, even those using our improved consent flows, missed important information in the authorization until we asked them to review it again. We also show that many people are overconfident about the privacy and security of healthcare data and that many people believe HIPAA protects in far more contexts than it actually does. Given that our redesigns following best practices did not produce many meaningful improvements in informed consent, we argue for the need for research on alternate approaches to health data disclosures such as standardized disclosures; methods borrowed from clinical research contexts such as multimedia formats, quizzes, and conversational approaches; and automated privacy assistants.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们描述了美国一家大型医疗保险公司正在开发的聊天机器人同意流程的迭代评估和细化。该聊天机器人使用云服务提供商触发了用户同意HIPAA授权的要求。我们强调远程可用性研究和在线调查结果表明，简化同意流程的界面和语言可以改善用户体验，并帮助阅读内容的用户了解他们的数据可能会被如何使用。然而，我们观察到，在我们的研究中，大多数用户，甚至是那些使用我们改进的同意流程的用户，都错过了授权中的重要信息，直到我们要求他们再次审查它。我们还表明，许多人对医疗保健数据的隐私和安全性过于自信，许多人认为HIPAA保护的环境比实际情况多得多。鉴于我们遵循最佳实践的重新设计并没有在知情同意方面产生许多有意义的改进，我们认为有必要研究健康数据披露的替代方法，如标准化披露；从临床研究背景中借用的方法，如多媒体格式、测验和对话方法；和自动化隐私助手。
papers.title_zh: 用户友好但很少阅读:关于重新设计在线HIPAA授权的案例研究

papers.title: OrgAn: Organizational Anonymity with Low Latency
papers.authors: Debajyoti Das, Easwar Vivek Mangipudi, Aniket Kate
papers.abstract: There is a growing demand for network-level anonymity for delegates at global organizations such as the UN and Red Cross. Numerous anonymous communication (AC) systems have been proposed over the last few decades to provide anonymity over the internet; however, they introduce high latency overhead, provide weaker anonymity guarantees, or are difficult to deploy at the organizational networks. Recently, the PriFi system introduced a client/relay/server model that suitably utilizes the organizational network topology and proposes a low-latency, strong-anonymity AC protocol. Using an efficient lattice-based (almost) keyhomomorphic pseudorandom function and Netwon’s power sums, we present a novel AC protocol OrgAn in this client/relay/server model that provides strong anonymity against a global adversary controlling the majority of the network. OrgAn’s cryptographic design allows it to overcome several major problems with any realistic PriFi instantiation: (a) unlike PriFi, OrgAn avoids frequent, interactive, slot-agreement protocol among the servers; (b) a PriFi relay has to receive frequent communication from the servers, which can not only become a latency bottleneck but also reveal the access pattern to the servers and increases the chance of server collusion/coercion, while OrgAn servers are absent from any real-time process. We demonstrate how to make this public-key cryptographic solution scale equally well as the symmetric-cryptographic PriFi with practical pre-computation and storage requirements. Through a prototype implementation, we show that OrgAn provides similar throughput and end-to-end latency guarantees as PriFi, while still discounting the setup challenges in PriFi.
papers.abstract_zh: 联合国和红十字会等全球性组织的代表对网络级匿名的需求越来越大。在过去的几十年中，已经提出了许多匿名通信(AC)系统来提供互联网上的匿名；然而，它们引入了高延迟开销，提供了较弱的匿名保证，或者难以在组织网络中部署。最近，PriFi系统引入了客户端/中继/服务器模型，该模型适当地利用了组织网络拓扑，并提出了低延迟、强匿名性的AC协议。使用一个有效的基于格的(几乎)密钥同态伪随机函数和Netwon的幂和，我们在这个客户端/中继/服务器模型中提出了一个新的AC协议机构，它提供了强匿名性来对抗控制网络大部分的全局对手。OrgAn的密码设计允许它克服任何真实的PriFi实例化的几个主要问题:(a)与PriFi不同，OrgAn避免了服务器之间频繁的、交互式的槽协议；(b)PriFi中继必须接收来自服务器的频繁通信，这不仅会成为延迟瓶颈，还会暴露对服务器的访问模式，并增加服务器共谋/胁迫的机会，而器官服务器不参与任何实时过程。我们演示了如何使这种公钥加密解决方案与具有实际预计算和存储要求的对称加密PriFi一样可伸缩。通过一个原型实现，我们表明OrgAn提供了与PriFi相似的吞吐量和端到端延迟保证，同时仍然忽略了PriFi中的设置挑战。
papers.title_zh: 器官:低延迟的组织匿名

papers.title: FingerprinTV: Fingerprinting Smart TV Apps
papers.authors: Janus Varmarken, Jad Al Aaraj, Rahmadi Trimananda, Athina Markopoulou
papers.abstract: This paper proposes FingerprinTV, a fully automated methodology for extracting fingerprints from the network traffic of smart TV apps and assessing their performance. FingerprinTV (1) installs, repeatedly launches, and collects network traffic from smart TV apps; (2) extracts three different types of network fingerprints for each app, i.e., domain-based fingerprints (DBF), packet-pair-based fingerprints (PBF), and TLS-based fingerprints (TBF); and (3) analyzes the extracted fingerprints in terms of their prevalence, distinctiveness, and sizes. From applying FingerprinTV to the top-1000 apps of the three most popular smart TV platforms, we find that smart TV app network fingerprinting is feasible and effective: even the least prevalent type of fingerprint manifests itself in at least 68% of apps of each platform, and up to 89% of fingerprints uniquely identify a specific app when two fingerprinting techniques are used together. By analyzing apps that exhibit identical fingerprints, we find that these apps often stem from the same developer or “no code” app generation toolkit. Furthermore, we show that many apps that are present on all three platforms exhibit platformspecific fingerprints.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文提出了FingerprinTV，这是一种从智能电视应用的网络流量中提取指纹并评估其性能的全自动方法。FingerprinTV (1)安装、反复启动、收集智能电视app的网络流量；(2)为每个应用程序提取三种不同类型的网络指纹，即基于域的指纹(DBF)、基于包对的指纹(PBF)和基于TLS的指纹(TBF)；以及(3)分析提取的指纹的普遍性、独特性和大小。通过将FingerprinTV应用于三个最受欢迎的智能电视平台的前1000个应用程序，我们发现智能电视应用程序网络指纹是可行和有效的:即使是最不普遍的指纹类型也在每个平台的至少68%的应用程序中表现出来，当两种指纹技术一起使用时，高达89%的指纹可以唯一识别特定的应用程序。通过分析显示相同指纹的应用程序，我们发现这些应用程序通常来自同一个开发人员或“无代码”应用程序生成工具包。此外，我们还发现，这三个平台上的许多应用都有特定于平台的特征。
papers.title_zh: FingerprinTV:指纹智能电视应用

papers.title: ZoomP3: Privacy-Preserving Publishing of Online Video Conference Recordings
papers.authors: Yuanyi Sun, Sencun Zhu, Yu Chen
papers.abstract: The COVID-19 epidemic has made online video conferencing extremely popular throughout the world, with many schools, companies and government sectors using video conferencing applications (e.g., Zoom, Google Meet) in a daily basis. These applications also provide local or cloud recording services, which allow the replay or sharing of video conference recordings (VCRs) in a later time. Such convenience, however, can easily cause infringement of privacy as meeting participants’ personally identifiable information (e.g., face, name, voice) may be exposed to the public without their awareness or consent. While privacy regulation and training can help relieve the situation, efficient and effective tools are also highly desired to protect the privacysensitive users in the VCRs before their public releases. In this work, we propose the first Privacy-Preserving Publishing system (ZoomP3 ) that automatically processes video and audio information in VCRs for privacy protection. Besides leveraging and integrating multiple state-of-the-art computer vision and audio processing tools seamlessly into our system, a number of optimization algorithms are proposed to improve the scalability of the system, enabling it to protect the privacy of long video conferences. We have conducted various tests with short and long videos, and the results (with online demos) verified that ZoomP3 system is suitable for largescale use. It may be applied as an online service, e.g., by Zoom, or by large organizations such as universities, research institutes and government sectors.
papers.abstract_zh: 新冠肺炎疫情使得在线视频会议在全世界范围内非常流行，许多学校、公司和政府部门每天都在使用视频会议应用程序(如Zoom、Google Meet)。这些应用程序还提供本地或云录制服务，允许以后重放或共享视频会议记录(vcr)。然而，这种便利可能容易导致侵犯隐私，因为会议参与者的个人可识别信息(例如，面部、姓名、声音)可能在他们不知道或不同意的情况下暴露给公众。虽然隐私管理和培训有助于缓解这种情况，但是也非常需要高效和有效的工具来在公开发布之前保护vcr中的隐私敏感用户。在这项工作中，我们提出了第一个隐私保护发布系统(ZoomP3 ),它自动处理vcr中的视频和音频信息以保护隐私。除了利用和集成多种最先进的计算机视觉和音频处理工具到我们的系统中，还提出了许多优化算法来提高系统的可扩展性，使其能够保护长时间视频会议的隐私。我们用短视频和长视频进行了各种测试，结果(用在线演示)验证了ZoomP3系统适合大规模使用。它可以作为在线服务来应用，例如由Zoom或由诸如大学、研究机构和政府部门的大型组织来应用。
papers.title_zh: ZoomP3:在线视频会议录音的隐私保护发布

papers.title: PrivacyScout: Assessing Vulnerability to Shoulder Surfing on Mobile Devices
papers.authors: Mihai Bâce, Alia Saad, Mohamed Khamis, Stefan Schneegass, Andreas Bulling
papers.abstract: One approach to mitigate shoulder surfing attacks on mobile devices is to detect the presence of a bystander using the phone’s front-facing camera. However, a person’s face in the camera’s field of view does not always indicate an attack. To overcome this limitation, in a novel data collection study (N=16), we analysed the influence of three viewing angles and four distances on the success of shoulder surfing attacks. In contrast to prior works that mainly focused on user authentication, we investigated three common types of content susceptible to shoulder surfing: text, photos, and PIN authentications. We show that the vulnerability of text and photos depends on the observer’s location relative to the device, while PIN authentications are vulnerable independent of the observation location. We then present PrivacyScout – a novel method that predicts the shoulder-surfing risk based on visual features extracted from the observer’s face as captured by the front-facing camera. Finally, evaluations from our data collection study demonstrate our method’s feasibility to assess the risk of a shoulder surfing attack more accurately.
papers.abstract_zh: 减轻对移动设备的肩窥攻击的一种方法是使用手机的前置摄像头来检测旁观者的存在。然而，摄像机视野中的人脸并不总是表明受到了攻击。为了克服这一限制，在一项新的数据收集研究(N=16)中，我们分析了三个视角和四个距离对肩部冲浪攻击成功的影响。与以前主要关注用户认证的工作相比，我们研究了三种容易受到肩窥攻击的常见内容类型:文本、照片和PIN认证。我们表明，文本和照片的脆弱性取决于观察者相对于设备的位置，而PIN认证的脆弱性与观察位置无关。然后，我们介绍了privacy scout——一种新的方法，它根据前置摄像头捕捉到的观察者面部的视觉特征来预测肩部冲浪的风险。最后，来自我们的数据收集研究的评估证明了我们的方法的可行性，以更准确地评估肩冲浪攻击的风险。
papers.title_zh: PrivacyScout:评估移动设备上肩膀冲浪的脆弱性

papers.title: SoK: Assumptions Underlying Cryptocurrency Deanonymizations
papers.authors: Dominic Deuber, Viktoria Ronge, Christian Rückert
papers.abstract: In recent years, cryptocurrencies have increasingly been used in cybercrime and have become the key means of payment in darknet marketplaces, partly due to their alleged anonymity. Furthermore, the research attacking the anonymity of even those cryptocurrencies that claim to offer anonymity by design is growing and is being applied by law enforcement agencies in the fight against cybercrime. Their investigative measures require a certain degree of suspicion and it is unclear whether findings resulting from attacks on cryptocurrencies’ anonymity can indeed establish that required degree of suspicion. The reason for this is that these attacks are partly based upon uncertain assumptions which are often not properly addressed in the corresponding papers. To close this gap, we extract the assumptions in papers that are attacking Bitcoin, Monero and Zcash, major cryptocurrencies used in darknet markets which have also received the most attention from researchers. We develop a taxonomy to capture the different nature of those assumptions in order to help investigators to better assess whether the required degree of suspicion for specific investigative measures could be established. We found that assumptions based on user behaviour are in general the most unreliable and thus any findings of attacks based on them might not allow for intense investigative measures such as pre-trial detention. We hope to raise awareness of the problem so that in the future there will be fewer unlawful investigations based upon uncertain assumptions and thus fewer human rights violations.
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，加密货币越来越多地被用于网络犯罪，并成为暗网市场的主要支付手段，部分原因是其所谓的匿名性。此外，攻击甚至声称通过设计提供匿名性的加密货币的匿名性的研究正在增加，并被执法机构用于打击网络犯罪。他们的调查措施需要一定程度的怀疑，目前还不清楚对加密货币匿名性的攻击是否真的能够确定所需的怀疑程度。其原因是，这些攻击部分基于不确定的假设，而这些假设在相应的论文中往往没有得到适当的解决。为了缩小这一差距，我们摘录了攻击比特币、Monero和Zcash的论文中的假设，这些是暗网市场中使用的主要加密货币，也受到了研究人员的最大关注。我们开发了一个分类法来捕捉这些假设的不同性质，以帮助调查者更好地评估特定调查措施所需的怀疑程度是否可以建立。我们发现，基于用户行为的假设通常是最不可靠的，因此基于这些假设的任何攻击调查结果可能都不允许采取诸如审前拘留等严厉的调查措施。我们希望提高对这一问题的认识，以便今后减少基于不确定假设的非法调查，从而减少侵犯人权行为。
papers.title_zh: SoK:加密货币去匿名化背后的假设

papers.title: Watch Over Your TV: A Security and Privacy Analysis of the Android TV Ecosystem
papers.authors: Marcos Tileria, Jorge Blasco
papers.abstract: The rapid adoption of Smart TVs has resulted in them becoming another app-based ecosystem. In this context, Android TV is one of the major players as it is widely available across multiple TV manufacturers and has a high integration with other Google products. Yet, the Android TV ecosystem has remained unexplored. This paper presents a deep analysis of the Android TV ecosystem using a large dataset of TV apps. We give an insight into the stakeholder ecosystem, including developers, streaming services, and thirdparty libraries. We analyze the behavior of TV apps in terms of sensitive data collection and communication with other devices using a pipeline of static analysis tools, network traffic collection, and verification via manual analysis. We compare the mobile and TV version of popular streaming apps and found a significant degradation of TV apps in terms of quality and different data collection practices. Our study shows that most TV apps present potentially harmful behaviors, and in most cases, these can be attributed to tracking and advertisement services. We found a prevalence of static identifiers for tracking purposes despite this not being the recommendation. This finding suggests that Google’s new policies limiting advertising identifiers will not have a tangible effect on the TV ecosystem.
papers.abstract_zh: 智能电视的快速普及使其成为另一个基于应用的生态系统。在这种情况下，Android TV是主要参与者之一，因为它广泛适用于多家电视制造商，并与谷歌的其他产品高度集成。然而，Android电视生态系统仍未被探索。本文使用大量电视应用数据集对Android电视生态系统进行了深入分析。我们深入分析了利益相关者生态系统，包括开发者、流媒体服务和第三方库。我们使用一系列静态分析工具、网络流量收集和通过手动分析进行的验证，从敏感数据收集和与其他设备的通信方面分析电视应用的行为。我们比较了流行的流媒体应用程序的移动和电视版本，发现电视应用程序在质量和不同的数据收集做法方面有显著下降。我们的研究表明，大多数电视应用程序都存在潜在的有害行为，在大多数情况下，这些行为都可以归因于跟踪和广告服务。我们发现了用于跟踪目的的静态标识符的流行，尽管这不是建议。这一发现表明，谷歌限制广告标识符的新政策不会对电视生态系统产生切实的影响。
papers.title_zh: 观看你的电视:安卓电视生态系统的安全和隐私分析

papers.title: SoK: TEE-Assisted Confidential Smart Contract
papers.authors: Rujia Li, Qin Wang, Qi Wang, David Galindo, Mark Ryan
papers.abstract: The blockchain-based smart contract lacks privacy, since the contract state and instruction code are exposed to the public. Combining smart-contract execution with Trusted Execution Environments provides an efficient solution, called TEE-assisted smart contracts (TCSC), for protecting the confidentiality of contract states. However, the combination approaches are varied, and a systematic study is absent. Newly released systems may fail to draw upon the experience learned from existing protocols, such as repeating known design mistakes or applying TEE technology in insecure ways. In this paper, we first investigate and categorize existing systems into two types: the layer-one solution and the layer-two solution. Then, we establish an analysis framework to capture their common aspects, covering desired properties (for contract services), threat models, and security considerations (for underlying systems). Based on our taxonomy, we identify their ideal functionalities, and uncover fundamental flaws and challenges in each specification’s design. We believe that this work would provide a guide for the development of TEE-assisted smart contracts, as well as a framework to evaluate future TCSC systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 总部位于区块链的智能合约缺乏隐私，因为合约状态和指令代码都是公开的。将智能合同执行与可信执行环境相结合提供了一种有效的解决方案，称为TEE辅助智能合同(TCSC ),用于保护合同状态的机密性。然而，组合方法是多种多样的，缺乏系统的研究。新发布的系统可能无法从现有协议中吸取经验，例如重复已知的设计错误或以不安全的方式应用TEE技术。在本文中，我们首先调查现有的系统并将其分为两类:第一层解决方案和第二层解决方案。然后，我们建立一个分析框架来捕获它们的共同方面，包括期望的属性(对于合同服务)、威胁模型和安全性考虑(对于底层系统)。基于我们的分类法，我们确定它们的理想功能，并揭示每个规范设计中的基本缺陷和挑战。我们相信，这项工作将为TEE辅助智能合同的开发提供指导，并为评估未来的TCSC系统提供框架。
papers.title_zh: SoK: TEE辅助的机密智能合同

papers.title: Privacy-Preserving and Efficient Verification of the Outcome in Genome-Wide Association Studies
papers.authors: Anisa Halimi, Leonard Dervishi, Erman Ayday, Apostolos Pyrgelis, Juan Ramón Troncoso-Pastoriza, Jean-Pierre Hubaux, Xiaoqian Jiang, Jaideep Vaidya
papers.abstract: Providing provenance in scientific workflows is essential for reproducibility and auditability purposes. In this work, we propose a framework that verifies the correctness of the aggregate statistics obtained as a result of a genome-wide association study (GWAS) conducted by a researcher while protecting individuals' privacy in the researcher's dataset. In GWAS, the goal of the researcher is to identify highly associated point mutations (variants) with a given phenotype. The researcher publishes the workflow of the conducted study, its output, and associated metadata. They keep the research dataset private while providing, as part of the metadata, a partial noisy dataset (that achieves local differential privacy). To check the correctness of the workflow output, a verifier makes use of the workflow, its metadata, and results of another GWAS (conducted using publicly available datasets) to distinguish between correct statistics and incorrect ones. For evaluation, we use real genomic data and show that the correctness of the workflow output can be verified with high accuracy even when the aggregate statistics of a small number of variants are provided. We also quantify the privacy leakage due to the provided workflow and its associated metadata and show that the additional privacy risk due to the provided metadata does not increase the existing privacy risk due to sharing of the research results. Thus, our results show that the workflow output (i.e., research results) can be verified with high confidence in a privacy-preserving way. We believe that this work will be a valuable step towards providing provenance in a privacy-preserving way while providing guarantees to the users about the correctness of the results.
papers.abstract_zh: 在科学工作流程中提供出处对于再现性和可审计性至关重要。在这项工作中，我们提出了一个框架，用于验证由一名研究人员进行的全基因组关联研究(GWAS)所获得的聚合统计数据的正确性，同时保护研究人员数据集中的个人隐私。在GWAS，研究人员的目标是识别与给定表型高度相关的点突变(变异)。研究者发布所进行研究的工作流程、其输出和相关元数据。他们保持研究数据集的私密性，同时作为元数据的一部分提供部分噪声数据集(实现局部差异私密性)。为了检查工作流输出的正确性，验证者利用工作流、其元数据和另一个GWAS(使用公开可用的数据集进行)的结果来区分正确的统计数据和不正确的统计数据。为了进行评估，我们使用真实的基因组数据，并表明即使在提供少量变体的聚合统计数据时，也可以高精度地验证工作流输出的正确性。我们还量化了由于所提供的工作流及其相关元数据而导致的隐私泄露，并表明由于所提供的元数据而导致的额外隐私风险不会增加由于共享研究结果而导致的现有隐私风险。因此，我们的结果表明，工作流输出(即，研究结果)可以以隐私保护的方式被高度信任地验证。我们相信这项工作将是以保护隐私的方式提供出处的一个有价值的步骤，同时向用户保证结果的正确性。
papers.title_zh: 全基因组关联研究中结果的隐私保护和有效验证

papers.title: Editors' Introduction
papers.authors: Kostas Chatzikokolakis, Aaron Johnson
papers.abstract: Is there currently a crisis of confidence in psychological science reflecting an unprecedented level of doubt among practitioners about the reliability of research findings in the field? It would certainly appear that there is. These doubts emerged and grew as a series of unhappy events unfolded in 2011: the Diederik Stapel fraud case (see Stroebe, Postmes, & Spears, 2012, this issue), the publication in a major social psychology journal of an article purporting to show evidence of extrasensory perception (Bem, 2011) followed by widespread public mockery (see Galak, LeBoeuf, Nelson, & Simmons, in press; Wagenmakers, Wetzels, Borsboom, & van der Maas, 2011), reports by Wicherts and colleagues that psychologists are often unwilling or unable to share their published data for reanalysis (Wicherts, Bakker, & Molenaar, 2011; see also Wicherts, Borsboom, Kats, & Molenaar, 2006), and the publication of an important article in Psychological Science showing how easily researchers can, in the absence of any real effects, nonetheless obtain statistically significant differences through various questionable research practices (QRPs) such as exploring multiple dependent variables or covariates and only reporting these when they yield significant results (Simmons, Nelson, & Simonsohn, 2011). For those psychologists who expected that the embarrassments of 2011 would soon recede into memory, 2012 offered instead a quick plunge from bad to worse, with new indications of outright fraud in the field of social cognition (Simonsohn, 2012), an article in Psychological Science showing that many psychologists admit to engaging in at least some of the QRPs examined by Simmons and colleagues (John, Loewenstein, & Prelec, 2012), troubling new meta-analytic evidence suggesting that the QRPs described by Simmons and colleagues may even be leaving telltale signs visible in the distribution of p values in the psychological literature (Masicampo & Lalande, in press; Simonsohn, 2012), and an acrimonious dust-up in science magazines and blogs centered around the problems some investigators were having in replicating well-known results from the field of social cognition (Bower, 2012; Yong, 2012). Although the very public problems experienced by psychology over this 2-year period are embarrassing to those of us working in the field, some have found comfort in the fact that, over the same period, similar concerns have been arising across the scientific landscape (triggered by revelations that will be described shortly).
