Some of the suspected causes of unreplicability, such as publication bias (the tendency to publish only positive findings) have been discussed for years; in fact, the phrase file-drawer problem was first coined by a distinguished psychologist several decades ago (Rosenthal, 1979). However, many have speculated that these problems have been exacerbated in recent years as academia reaps the harvest of a hypercompetitive academic climate and an incentive scheme that provides rich rewards for overselling one’s work and few rewards at all for caution and circumspection (see Giner-Sorolla, 2012, this issue). Equally disturbing, investigators seem to be replicating each others’ work even less often than they did in the past, again presumably reflecting an incentive scheme gone askew (a point discussed in several articles in this issue, e.g., Makel, Plucker, & Hegarty, 2012). The frequency with which errors appear in the psychological literature is not presently known, but a number of facts suggest it might be disturbingly high. Ioannidis (2005) has shown through simple mathematical modeling that any scientific field that ignores replication can easily come to the miserable state wherein (as the title of his most famous article puts it) “most published research findings are false” (see also Ioannidis, 2012, this issue, and Pashler & Harris, 2012, this issue). Meanwhile, reports emerging from cancer research have made such grim scenarios seem more plausible: In 2012, several large pharmaceutical companies revealed that their efforts to replicate exciting preclinical findings from published academic studies in cancer biology were only rarely verifying the original results (Begley & Ellis, 2012; see also Osherovich, 2011; Prinz, Schlange, & Asadullah, 2011).
papers.abstract_zh: 目前心理科学是否出现了信任危机，反映出从业者对该领域研究结果的可靠性产生了前所未有的怀疑？显然是有的。随着2011年一系列不愉快事件的发生，这些怀疑出现了，并有所增长:Diederik Stapel欺诈案(见Stroebe，Postmes，& Spears，2012，这一期)，在一份主要的社会心理学杂志上发表了一篇文章，声称显示了超感知觉的证据(Bem，2011)，随后受到了广泛的公开嘲笑(见Galak，LeBoeuf，Nelson，& Simmons，正在出版中；Wagenmakers，Wetzels，Borsboom，& van der Maas，2011)，Wicherts及其同事报告说，心理学家往往不愿意或不能分享他们发表的数据进行再分析(Wicherts，Bakker，& Molenaar，2011；另见Wicherts，Borsboom，Kats，& Molenaar，2006)，以及发表在《心理科学》上的一篇重要文章，该文章表明，在没有任何实际影响的情况下，研究人员可以通过各种有问题的研究实践(qrp)轻松地获得统计学上的显著差异，如探索多个因变量或协变量，并仅在它们产生显著结果时报告这些结果(Simmons，Nelson，& Simonsohn，2011)。对于那些预计2011年的尴尬将很快消失在记忆中的心理学家来说，2012年反而提供了一个从糟糕到更糟糕的快速跳水，在社会认知领域出现了新的明显的欺诈迹象(Simonsohn，2012)，心理科学中的一篇文章显示，许多心理学家承认至少参与了Simmons及其同事检查的一些快速反应程序(John，Loewenstein，& Prelec，2012)。 令人不安的新荟萃分析证据表明，Simmons及其同事描述的qrp甚至可能在心理学文献中的p值分布中留下明显的迹象(Masicampo & Lalande，出版中； Simonsohn，2012)，科学杂志和博客上围绕一些研究人员在复制社会认知领域的知名结果时遇到的问题展开了激烈的争论(Bower，2012；永，2012)。虽然心理学在这两年中所经历的非常公开的问题令我们这些在该领域工作的人感到尴尬，但一些人已经找到了安慰，因为在同一时期，类似的担忧已经在整个科学领域出现(由即将描述的启示引发)。一些不可复制的可疑原因，如发表偏倚(倾向于只发表积极的发现)已经讨论了多年；事实上，抽屉问题这个短语是由一位杰出的心理学家在几十年前首次提出的(Rosenthal，1979)。然而，许多人推测，这些问题在最近几年已经恶化，因为学术界收获了高度竞争的学术氛围和奖励计划，这种奖励计划为过度销售自己的工作提供了丰厚的奖励，而对谨慎和谨慎却几乎没有奖励(见吉纳-索罗拉，2012年，这一期)。同样令人不安的是，研究人员似乎比过去更少地重复彼此的工作，这可能再次反映了一个倾斜的激励机制(这一点在本期的几篇文章中讨论过，例如，马克尔、普吕克尔和赫加蒂，2012)。错误出现在心理学文献中的频率目前还不清楚，但许多事实表明它可能高得令人不安。约安尼迪斯(2005)通过简单的数学建模表明，任何忽视复制的科学领域都很容易陷入悲惨的境地，其中(正如他最著名的文章的标题所言)“大多数发表的研究结果都是错误的”(另见约安尼迪斯，2012，本期，以及Pashler & Harris，2012，本期)。与此同时，来自癌症研究的报告让这种严峻的情景看起来更加可信:2012年，几家大型制药公司透露，他们在癌症生物学方面复制已发表学术研究中令人兴奋的临床前发现的努力很少验证原始结果(Begley & Ellis，2012；另见Osherovich，2011年；普林茨、施朗格和阿萨杜拉，2011年)。
papers.title_zh: 编辑介绍

papers.title: Blocked or Broken? Automatically Detecting When Privacy Interventions Break Websites
papers.authors: Michael Smith, Peter Snyder, Moritz Haller, Benjamin Livshits, Deian Stefan, Hamed Haddadi
papers.abstract: A core problem in the development and maintenance of crowdsourced filter lists is that their maintainers cannot confidently predict whether (and where) a new filter list rule will break websites. The enormity of the Web prevents filter list authors from broadly understanding the compatibility impact of a new blocking rule before shipping it to millions of users. This severely limits the benefits of filter-list-based content blocking: filter lists are both overly conservative (i.e. rules are tailored narrowly to reduce the risk of breaking things) and error-prone (i.e. blocking tools still break large numbers of sites). To scale to the size and scope of the Web, filter list authors need something better than the current status quo of user reports and manual review, to stop breakage before it has a chance to make it to end users. In this work, we design and implement the first automated system for predicting when a filter list rule breaks a website. We build a classifier, trained on a dataset generated by a combination of compatibility data extracted from the EasyList filter project and novel browser instrumentation, and find that our classifier is accurate to practical levels (AUC 0.88). Our open-source system requires no human interaction when assessing the compatibility risk of a proposed privacy intervention. We also present the 40 page behaviors that most predict breakage in observed websites.
papers.abstract_zh: 开发和维护众包过滤列表的一个核心问题是，他们的维护者无法自信地预测新的过滤列表规则是否(以及在哪里)会破坏网站。网络的庞大使得过滤列表的作者在向数百万用户发布新的拦截规则之前，无法广泛理解其兼容性影响。这严重限制了基于过滤列表的内容阻止的好处:过滤列表既过于保守(即规则被狭隘地定制以减少破坏的风险)，又容易出错(即阻止工具仍会破坏大量网站)。为了适应网络的规模和范围，过滤列表的作者需要比用户报告和人工审查的现状更好的东西，以在它有机会提供给最终用户之前阻止破坏。在这项工作中，我们设计并实现了第一个自动系统，用于预测过滤器列表规则何时破坏网站。我们构建了一个分类器，在由EasyList filter项目提取的兼容性数据和新颖的浏览器工具组合生成的数据集上进行训练，并发现我们的分类器精确到实际水平(AUC 0.88)。我们的开源系统在评估提议的隐私干预的兼容性风险时不需要人工干预。我们还提出了40个页面行为，这些行为最能预测网站的破损。
papers.title_zh: 堵了还是坏了？当隐私干预破坏网站时自动检测

papers.title: SoK: Privacy-enhancing Smart Home Hubs
papers.authors: Igor Zavalyshyn, Axel Legay, Annanda Rath, Etienne Rivière
papers.abstract: Smart homes are IoT systems enabling the automation of household operation. The unrestricted collection and processing of data by smart home systems raises legitimate privacy concerns for their users. Over the past decade, there has been significant interest in privacy-enhancing technologies applied at the level of a local smart hub physically located in the home and acting as a gateway between sensors, applications, platform providers, and services in the cloud. The number and variety of projects and research proposals can, however, make their comparison a daunting and unnecessarily complex task. We systematize existing knowledge in this field through the analysis and categorization of 10 industrial and community-contributed systems and 37 research proposals from the literature of the past 11 years. Our results shed light on the diversity of system and trust models considered in the state-of-the-art and on the associated privacy-enhancing technologies. We further identify open research problems and promising approaches that would benefit the smart home hub model and the protection of smart home users’ privacy.
papers.abstract_zh: 智能家居是实现家庭操作自动化的物联网系统。智能家居系统对数据的无限制收集和处理引起了用户的合法隐私担忧。在过去的十年中，人们对隐私增强技术产生了极大的兴趣，这些技术应用于物理上位于家中的本地智能中枢，并充当传感器、应用程序、平台提供商和云中服务之间的网关。然而，项目和研究提案的数量和种类可能使它们的比较成为一项令人生畏和不必要的复杂任务。我们通过对过去11年文献中的10个工业和社区贡献的系统和37个研究提案进行分析和分类，将该领域的现有知识系统化。我们的结果揭示了系统和信任模型的多样性，以及相关的隐私增强技术。我们进一步确定了开放的研究问题和有前途的方法，这将有利于智能家居中枢模型和保护智能家居用户的隐私。
papers.title_zh: SoK:增强隐私的智能家居中心

papers.title: On the Cost of Suppressing Volume for Encrypted Multi-maps
papers.authors: Megumi Ando, Marilyn George
papers.abstract: Structured encryption (STE) schemes allow a client to store sensitive data on a semi-trusted remote server and query the data. STE schemes strike a balance between privacy and efficiency by leaking some information to the server. In particular, many STE schemes leak the volume pattern i.e., response lengths, and the query equality pattern i.e., if any queries are repeated. Recently discovered leakage-abuse attacks demonstrate that leaking the volume pattern can be unsafe; that is, the server can reconstruct parts of the database from this leakage. To address this leakage, Kamara and Moataz proposed a novel multi-map encryption scheme, AVLH, that hides query volumes by padding responses with parts of other responses (Eurocrypt 2019). AVLH was shown to be more storage-efficient than the naive approach to pad responses with dummy values to reach the maximum response length. Subsequently, Patel et al. provided an even more efficient volume-hiding multimap scheme, dprfMM (CCS 2019). Despite these advances, the costs of fully suppressing query volumes are still unclear. In this paper, we provide the first lower bounds on STE schemes for multi-maps that leak at most the query equality pattern. Surprisingly, we find that in many cases, such STE schemes cannot be more storage-efficient than naively padding to the maximum length.
papers.abstract_zh: 结构化加密(STE)方案允许客户端将敏感数据存储在半信任的远程服务器上，并查询这些数据。STE方案通过向服务器泄露一些信息来平衡隐私和效率。特别地，许多STE方案泄露了容量模式，即响应长度，以及查询等式模式，即是否有任何查询被重复。最近发现的泄漏滥用攻击表明，泄漏卷模式可能是不安全的；也就是说，服务器可以从这种泄漏中重建部分数据库。为了解决这种泄漏，Kamara和Moataz提出了一种新的多映射加密方案AVLH，通过用其他响应的部分填充响应来隐藏查询量(Eurocrypt 2019)。AVLH比用虚拟值填充响应以达到最大响应长度的简单方法存储效率更高。随后，Patel等人提供了一种更有效的体积隐藏多映射方案dprfMM (CCS 2019)。尽管有这些进步，完全抑制查询量的成本仍然不清楚。在本文中，我们提供了至多泄漏查询等式模式的多映射的STE方案的第一个下界。令人惊讶的是，我们发现在许多情况下，这样的STE方案不会比天真地填充到最大长度更有存储效率。
papers.title_zh: 加密多地图的体积抑制代价

papers.title: XORBoost: Tree Boosting in the Multiparty Computation Setting
papers.authors: Kevin Deforth, Marc Desgroseilliers, Nicolas Gama, Mariya Georgieva, Dimitar Jetchev, Marius Vuille
papers.abstract: We present a novel protocol XORBoost for both training gradient boosted tree models and for using these models for inference in the multiparty computation (MPC) setting. Our protocol supports training for generically split datasets (vertical and horizontal splitting, or combination of those) while keeping all the information about features, thresholds, and evaluation paths private; only tree depth and the number of the binary trees are public parameters of the model. By using novel optimization techniques that reduce the number of oblivious permutation evaluations as well as sorting operations, we further speedup the algorithm. The protocol is agnostic to the underlying MPC framework or implementation.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了一种新的协议XORBoost，用于训练梯度增强树模型和在多方计算(MPC)设置中使用这些模型进行推理。我们的协议支持一般分裂数据集的训练(垂直和水平分裂，或它们的组合)，同时保持关于特征、阈值和评估路径的所有信息是私有的；只有树的深度和二叉树的数量是模型的公共参数。通过使用新的优化技术，减少了不经意置换评估和排序操作的数量，我们进一步加快了算法的速度。该协议不知道底层的MPC框架或实现。
papers.title_zh: XORBoost:多方计算设置中的树提升

papers.title: Neural Fuzzy Extractors: A Secure Way to Use Artificial Neural Networks for Biometric User Authentication
papers.authors: Abhishek Jana, Bipin Paudel, Md. Kamruzzaman Sarker, Monireh Ebrahimi, Pascal Hitzler, George T. Amariucai
papers.abstract: Powered by new advances in sensor development and artificial intelligence, the decreasing cost of computation, and the pervasiveness of handheld computation devices, biometric user authentication (and identification) is rapidly becoming ubiquitous. Modern approaches to biometric authentication, based on sophisticated machine learning techniques, cannot avoid storing either trained-classifier details or explicit user biometric data, thus exposing users’ credentials to falsification. In this paper, we introduce a secure way to handle user-specific information involved with the use of artificial neural networks for biometric authentication. Our proposed architecture, called a Neural Fuzzy Extractor (NFE), allows the coupling of pre-existing classifiers with fuzzy extractors, through an artificial-neuralnetwork-based buffer called an expander, with minimal or no performance degradation. The NFE thus offers all the performance advantages of modern deep-learningbased classifiers and all the security of standard fuzzy extractors. We demonstrate the NFE retrofit of a few classic artificial neural networks, for simple biometric authentication scenarios.
papers.abstract_zh: 在传感器开发和人工智能的新进展、计算成本的降低以及手持计算设备的普及的推动下，生物用户认证(和识别)正迅速变得无处不在。基于复杂的机器学习技术的现代生物认证方法无法避免存储训练过的分类器细节或明确的用户生物数据，从而使用户的凭证容易被伪造。在本文中，我们介绍了一种安全的方法来处理用户特定的信息，涉及使用人工神经网络进行生物认证。我们提出的体系结构，称为神经模糊提取器(NFE)，允许通过称为扩展器的基于人工神经网络的缓冲器将预先存在的分类器与模糊提取器耦合，而性能下降最小或没有下降。因此，NFE提供了现代基于深度学习的分类器的所有性能优势和标准模糊提取器的所有安全性。我们展示了几个经典的人工神经网络的NFE改型，用于简单的生物认证场景。
papers.title_zh: 神经模糊提取器:一种使用人工神经网络进行生物用户认证的安全方法

papers.title: Analyzing the Monetization Ecosystem of Stalkerware
papers.authors: Cassidy Gibson, Vanessa Frost, Katie Platt, Washington Garcia, Luis Vargas, Sara Rampazzi, Vincent Bindschaedler, Patrick Traynor, Kevin R. B. Butler
papers.abstract: Stalkerware is a form of malware that allows for the abusive monitoring of intimate partners. Primarily deployed on information-rich mobile platforms, these malicious applications allow for collecting information about a victim’s actions and behaviors, including location data, call audio, text messages, photos, and other personal details. While stalkerware has received increased attention from the security community, the ways in which stalkerware authors monetize their efforts have not been explored in depth. This paper represents the first large-scale technical analysis of monetization within the stalkerware ecosystem. We analyze the code base of 6,432 applications collected by the Coalition Against Stalkerware to determine their monetization strategies. We find that while far fewer stalkerware apps use ad libraries than normal apps, 99% of those that do use Google AdMob. We also find that payment services range from traditional in-app billing to cryptocurrency. Finally, we demonstrate that Google’s recent change to their Terms of Service (ToS) did not eliminate these applications, but instead caused a shift to other payment processors, while the apps can still be found on the Play Store; we verify through emulation that these apps often operate in blatant contravention of the ToS. Through this analysis, we find that the heterogeneity of markets and payment processors means that while point solutions can have impact on monetization, a multi-pronged solution involving multiple stakeholders is necessary to mitigate the financial incentive for developing stalkerware.
papers.abstract_zh: Stalkerware是一种恶意软件，允许对亲密伴侣进行滥用监控。这些恶意应用程序主要部署在信息丰富的移动平台上，允许收集受害者的行动和行为信息，包括位置数据、通话音频、短信、照片和其他个人详细信息。虽然stalkerware已经受到了安全社区越来越多的关注，但是stalkerware作者如何利用他们的工作赚钱还没有得到深入的研究。这篇论文首次对stalkerware生态系统中的货币化进行了大规模的技术分析。我们分析了反对Stalkerware联盟收集的6，432个应用程序的代码库，以确定它们的盈利策略。我们发现，虽然使用广告库的stalkerware应用程序比普通应用程序少得多，但99%的应用程序使用Google AdMob。我们还发现，支付服务的范围从传统的应用内计费到加密货币。最后，我们证明了谷歌最近对其服务条款(ToS)的更改并没有消除这些应用程序，而是导致了向其他支付处理器的转移，而这些应用程序仍然可以在Play Store上找到；我们通过仿真验证了这些应用程序的运行经常公然违反ToS。通过这一分析，我们发现市场和支付处理商的异质性意味着，虽然单点解决方案可能会对货币化产生影响，但涉及多个利益相关方的多管齐下的解决方案对于减轻开发stalkerware的财务激励是必要的。
papers.title_zh: 分析Stalkerware的货币化生态系统

papers.title: A Global Survey of Android Dual-Use Applications Used in Intimate Partner Surveillance
papers.authors: Majed Almansoori, Andrea Gallardo, Julio Poveda, Adil Ahmed, Rahul Chatterjee
papers.abstract: Intimate partner violence (IPV) is a pervasive societal problem that affects millions of people around the world. IPV perpetrators increasingly weaponize digital technologies like mobile applications (“apps”) to spy on, monitor, and harass victims. Surveillance-capable apps can have legitimate use cases, for example, locating children, and are therefore easily available on various mobile app stores like the Google Play Store. Nevertheless, these applications are easily repurposed by abusers to track their victims. The problem of such dual-use apps in IPV is global. However, current understanding of the ecosystem of such apps is limited to English-language apps, potentially limiting its relevance to non-English speaking IPV survivors across the world. In this paper, we study the prevalence of dualuse applications found in 15 languages and 27 countries. We collected 51,868 unique apps in 2020 from the Google Play Store, using queries such as “track wife’s location.” Through a semi-manual analysis of a subset of these apps, we discovered 854 unique dualuse apps, and estimate that among the apps collected from Google Play, 3,988 are dual-use apps. We found notable differences in app search results, suggested queries, and marketed capabilities of dual-use apps across different languages. For instance, we identified that 18% of dual-use apps do not have an English description, and 28% could not be found using English queries. Google Play (cursorily) blocks certain queries referring explicitly to intimate partner surveillance (IPS) to discourage potential abusers, but the blocking efficacy varies across languages. For example, we found that 80% of explicit IPS queries for English are blocked, but none for Bengali, Chinese, Hindi, Malay, Thai, and Vietnamese. Thus, abusers fluent in those languages can evade such blocking with no effort.
papers.abstract_zh: 亲密伴侣暴力(IPV)是一个普遍的社会问题，影响着全世界数百万人。IPV犯罪者越来越多地将数字技术武器化，如移动应用程序(“应用程序”)来监视、监控和骚扰受害者。具有监控功能的应用程序可以有合法的使用案例，例如，定位儿童，因此很容易在各种移动应用程序商店(如谷歌Play商店)上获得。然而，这些应用程序很容易被滥用者用来跟踪他们的受害者。IPV这种两用应用的问题是全球性的。然而，目前对这类应用生态系统的了解仅限于英语应用，这可能会限制其与全球非英语IPV幸存者的相关性。在本文中，我们研究了在15种语言和27个国家中发现的双重用途应用程序的流行情况。我们在2020年从谷歌Play商店收集了51868个独特的应用程序，使用诸如“追踪妻子的位置”的查询通过对这些应用子集的半手工分析，我们发现了854个独特的双重用途应用，并估计从Google Play收集的应用中，有3988个是双重用途应用。我们发现不同语言的应用搜索结果、建议查询和两用应用的营销能力存在显著差异。例如，我们发现18%的两用应用程序没有英文描述，28%的应用程序使用英文查询无法找到。Google Play(粗略地)屏蔽了某些明确涉及亲密伴侣监控(IPS)的查询，以阻止潜在的滥用者，但屏蔽效果因语言而异。例如，我们发现80%针对英语的显式IPS查询被阻止，但针对孟加拉语、汉语、印地语、马来语、泰语和越南语的查询却没有被阻止。因此，精通这些语言的滥用者可以毫不费力地逃避这种封锁。
papers.title_zh: 用于亲密伴侣监控的安卓两用应用的全球调查

papers.title: On the Feasibility of Linking Attack to Google/Apple Exposure Notification Framework
papers.authors: Kazuki Nomoto, Mitsuaki Akiyama, Masashi Eto, Atsuo Inomata, Tatsuya Mori
papers.abstract: Digital contact-tracing (DCT) applications have been installed on more than 188 M smartphones worldwide as an effective mechanism for monitoring contact with COVID-19 infected individuals. DCT is promising not only for COVID-19, but also for preparing for a possible future large-scale pandemic. The DCT framework is unique in that it combines Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) communications with cryptography techniques to track exposure on a large scale while protecting user privacy. The objective of this study is to assess the risk of the linking attack to the DCT frameworks; i.e., linking individuals to the identifiers contained in BLE broadcast frames that are supposed to be anonymized. Specifically, we target Google/Apple’s Exposure Notification (GAEN), which is the representative implementation of DCT. Our extensive experiments demonstrate that passively collected rolling proximity identifiers (RPIs) contained in the BLE frames can be linked to face photos which could lead to the exposure of privacy information with high accuracy, including infection status. We also demonstrate that an attacker with a few number of devices can correctly link RPIs and the images of the target person with a success rate of 86% at a rate of 5,000 users per hour. Based on these results, we propose countermeasures to reduce the inherent privacy risk of the GAEN framework.
papers.abstract_zh: 全球已有超过1.88亿部智能手机安装了数字接触追踪(DCT)应用程序，作为监控与新冠肺炎感染者接触的有效机制。DCT不仅对新冠肺炎很有前途，而且为将来可能出现的大规模疫情做准备。DCT框架的独特之处在于，它将蓝牙低能量(BLE)通信与加密技术相结合，以大规模跟踪暴露情况，同时保护用户隐私。这项研究的目的是评估DCT框架的链接攻击的风险；即把个人与包含在BLE广播帧中的被认为是匿名的标识符联系起来。具体来说，我们针对的是Google/Apple的曝光通知(GAEN)，它是DCT的代表性实现。我们的大量实验表明，包含在BLE帧中的被动收集的滚动邻近标识符(rpi)可以链接到面部照片，这可能导致高准确度的隐私信息的暴露，包括感染状态。我们还证明了一个拥有少量设备的攻击者可以在每小时5，000个用户的速度下，以86%的成功率正确地链接rpi和目标人的图像。基于这些结果，我们提出了降低GAEN框架固有隐私风险的对策。
papers.title_zh: 将攻击与Google/Apple暴露通知框架联系起来的可行性研究

papers.title: Towards Sparse Federated Analytics: Location Heatmaps under Distributed Differential Privacy with Secure Aggregation
papers.authors: Eugene Bagdasaryan, Peter Kairouz, Stefan Mellem, Adrià Gascón, Kallista A. Bonawitz, Deborah Estrin, Marco Gruteser
papers.abstract: We design a scalable algorithm to privately generate location heatmaps over decentralized data from millions of user devices. It aims to ensure differential privacy before data becomes visible to a service provider while maintaining high data accuracy and minimizing resource consumption on users’ devices. To achieve this, we revisit distributed differential privacy based on recent results in secure multiparty computation, and we design a scalable and adaptive distributed differential privacy approach for location analytics. Evaluation on public location datasets shows that this approach successfully generates metropolitan-scale heatmaps from millions of user samples with a worstcase client communication overhead that is significantly smaller than existing state-of-the-art private protocols of similar accuracy.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们设计了一种可扩展的算法，通过来自数百万用户设备的分散数据来私下生成位置热图。它旨在确保数据对服务提供商可见之前的不同隐私，同时保持高数据准确性并最大限度地减少用户设备上的资源消耗。为了实现这一点，我们基于安全多方计算的最新成果重新审视了分布式差分隐私，并设计了一种用于位置分析的可扩展和自适应的分布式差分隐私方法。在公共位置数据集上的评估表明，该方法成功地从数百万用户样本中生成了大城市规模的热图，并且在最坏的情况下，客户端通信开销明显小于类似精度的现有最新私有协议。
papers.title_zh: 走向稀疏联邦分析:安全聚合的分布式差分隐私下的位置热图

papers.title: 3LegRace: Privacy-Preserving DNN Training over TEEs and GPUs
papers.authors: Yue Niu, Ramy E. Ali, Salman Avestimehr
papers.abstract: Leveraging parallel hardware (e.g. GPUs) for deep neural network (DNN) training brings high computing performance. However, it raises data privacy concerns as GPUs lack a trusted environment to protect the data. Trusted execution environments (TEEs) have emerged as a promising solution to achieve privacypreserving learning. Unfortunately, TEEs’ limited computing power renders them not comparable to GPUs in performance. To improve the trade-off among privacy, computing performance, and model accuracy, we propose an asymmetric model decomposition framework, AsymML, to (1) accelerate training using parallel hardware; and (2) achieve a strong privacy guarantee using TEEs and differential privacy (DP) with much less accuracy compromised compared to DP-only methods. By exploiting the low-rank characteristics in training data and intermediate features, AsymML asymmetrically decomposes inputs and intermediate activations into low-rank and residual parts. With the decomposed data, the target DNN model is accordingly split into a trusted and an untrusted part. The trusted part performs computations on low-rank data, with low compute and memory costs. The untrusted part is fed with residuals perturbed by very small noise. Privacy, computing performance, and model accuracy are well managed by respectively delegating the trusted and the untrusted part to TEEs and GPUs. We provide a formal DP guarantee that demonstrates that, for the same privacy guarantee, combining asymmetric data decomposition and DP requires much smaller noise compared to solely using DP without decomposition. This improves the privacy-utility trade-off significantly compared to using only DP methods without decomposition. Furthermore, we present a rank bound analysis showing that the low-rank structure is preserved after each layer across the entire model. Our extensive evaluations on DNN models show that AsymML delivers 7.6× speedup in training compared to the TEE-only executions while ensuring privacy. We also demonstrate that AsymML is effective in protecting data under common attacks such as model inversion and gradient attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 利用并行硬件(例如GPU)进行深度神经网络(DNN)训练可以带来高计算性能。然而，它引发了数据隐私问题，因为GPU缺乏可信的环境来保护数据。可信执行环境已经成为实现隐私保护学习的一个有前途的解决方案。不幸的是，TEEs有限的计算能力使它们在性能上无法与GPU相比。为了改善隐私、计算性能和模型准确性之间的权衡，我们提出了一个非对称模型分解框架AsymML，以(1)使用并行硬件加速训练；以及(2)使用TEEs和差分隐私(DP)来实现强隐私保证，与仅DP的方法相比，具有更少的准确度损失。通过利用训练数据和中间特征中的低秩特征，AsymML不对称地将输入和中间激活分解成低秩和剩余部分。利用分解的数据，目标DNN模型相应地被分成可信部分和不可信部分。可信部分在低秩数据上执行计算，具有较低的计算和存储成本。不可信部分被馈入被非常小的噪声干扰的残差。通过将可信部分和不可信部分分别委托给tee和GPU，隐私、计算性能和模型准确性得到了很好的管理。我们提供了一个正式的DP保证，该保证表明，对于相同的隐私保证，将非对称数据分解和DP相结合比单独使用没有分解的DP需要小得多的噪声。与仅使用没有分解的DP方法相比，这显著地改善了隐私-效用权衡。此外，我们提出了一个秩界分析，表明低秩结构在整个模型的每一层之后都得到保留。我们对DNN模型的广泛评估表明，与仅使用TEE的执行相比，AsymML在训练中提供了7.6倍的加速，同时确保了隐私。我们还证明了AsymML在模型反演和梯度攻击等常见攻击下保护数据的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 3LegRace:关于发球台和GPU的隐私保护DNN培训

papers.title: How Usable Are iOS App Privacy Labels?
papers.authors: Shikun Zhang, Yuanyuan Feng, Yaxing Yao, Lorrie Faith Cranor, Norman Sadeh
papers.abstract: Standardized privacy labels that succinctly summarize those data practices that people are most commonly concerned about offer the promise of providing users with more effective privacy notices than full-length privacy policies. With their introduction by Apple in iOS 14 and Google’s recent adoption in its Play Store, mobile app privacy labels are for the first time available at scale to users. We report the first indepth interview study with 24 lay iPhone users to investigate their experiences, understanding, and perceptions of Apple’s privacy labels. We uncovered misunderstandings of and dissatisfaction with the iOS privacy labels that hinder their effectiveness, including confusing structure, unfamiliar terms, and disconnection from permission settings and controls. We identify areas where app privacy labels might be improved and propose suggestions to address shortcomings to make them more understandable, usable, and useful.
papers.abstract_zh: 标准化的隐私标签简明扼要地总结了人们最关心的数据实践，承诺为用户提供比完整长度的隐私政策更有效的隐私声明。随着苹果在iOS 14中引入移动应用隐私标签，以及谷歌最近在其Play Store中采用移动应用隐私标签，移动应用隐私标签首次大规模提供给用户。我们报告了对24名普通iPhone用户的首次深度访谈研究，以调查他们对苹果隐私标签的体验、理解和看法。我们发现了对iOS隐私标签的误解和不满，这些误解和不满阻碍了其有效性，包括混乱的结构、陌生的术语以及与权限设置和控制的脱节。我们确定了应用程序隐私标签可以改进的地方，并提出了解决缺点的建议，以使它们更容易理解、可用和有用。
papers.title_zh: iOS应用隐私标签的可用性如何？

papers.title: gOTzilla: Efficient Disjunctive Zero-Knowledge Proofs from MPC in the Head, with Application to Proofs of Assets in Cryptocurrencies
papers.authors: Foteini Baldimtsi, Panagiotis Chatzigiannis, S. Dov Gordon, Phi Hung Le, Daniel McVicker
papers.abstract: We present gOTzilla, a protocol for interactive zero-knowledge proofs for very large disjunctive statements of the following format: given publicly known circuit C, and set of values Y = {y1 , . . . , yn }, prove knowledge of a witness x such that C(x) = y1 ∨ C(x) = y2 ∨ · · · ∨ C(x) = yn . These type of statements are extremely important for the proof of assets (PoA) problem in cryptocurrencies where a prover wants to prove the knowledge of a secret key sk that associates with the hash of a public key H(pk) posted on the ledger. We note that the size of n in popular cryptocurrencies, such as Bitcoin, is estimated to 80 million. For the construction of gOTzilla, we start by observing that if we restructure the proof statement to an equivalent of proving knowledge of (x, y) such that (C(x) = y) ∧ (y = y1 ∨ · · · ∨ y = yn )), then we can reduce the disjunction of equalities to 1-out-of-N oblivious transfer (OT). Our overall protocol is based on the MPC in the head (MPCitH) paradigm. We additionally provide a concrete, efficient extension of our protocol for the case where C combines algebraic and non-algebraic statements (which is the case in the PoA application). We achieve an asymptotic communication cost of O(log n) plus the proof size of the underlying MPCitH protocol. While related work has similar asymptotic complexity, our approach results in concrete performance improvements. We implement our protocol and provide benchmarks. Concretely, for a set of size 1 million entries, the total run-time of our protocol is 14.89 seconds using 48 threads, with 6.18 MB total communication, which is about 4x faster compared to the state of the art when considering a disjunctive statement with algebraic and non-algebraic elements.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了gOTzilla，一个用于以下格式的非常大的析取语句的交互式零知识证明的协议:给定公知的电路C，以及一组值Y = {y1，.。。yn }，证明知道证人x，使得C(x)= y1∨C(x)= y2∨C(x)= yn。这些类型的陈述对于加密货币中的资产证明(PoA)问题是极其重要的，其中证明者想要证明与公布在分类帐上的公钥H(pk)的散列相关联的密钥sk的知识。我们注意到，在流行的加密货币(如比特币)中，n的大小估计为8000万。对于gOTzilla的构造，我们首先观察到，如果我们将证明语句重新构造为(x，y)的证明知识的等价形式，使得(C(x)= y)∧( y = y1∨y = yn))，那么我们可以将等式的析取简化为N取1不经意转移(OT)。我们的总体协议基于头部MPC(MPC ith)范式。此外，我们还为C语言结合了代数和非代数语句的情况(PoA应用程序就是这种情况)提供了一个具体、有效的协议扩展。我们实现了O(log n)的渐近通信成本加上底层MPCitH协议的证明大小。虽然相关的工作有类似的渐近复杂性，我们的方法导致具体的性能改善。我们实施我们的协议并提供基准。具体而言，对于一组大小为100万的条目，使用48个线程，我们的协议的总运行时间为14.89秒，总通信量为6.18 MB，当考虑具有代数和非代数元素的析取语句时，这比现有技术快大约4倍。
papers.title_zh: gOTzilla:来自MPC的高效析取零知识证明，以及在加密货币资产证明中的应用

papers.title: Developers Say the Darnedest Things: Privacy Compliance Processes Followed by Developers of Child-Directed Apps
papers.authors: Noura Alomar, Serge Egelman
papers.abstract: We investigate the privacy compliance processes followed by developers of child-directed mobile apps. While children’s online privacy laws have existed for decades in the US, prior research found relatively low rates of compliance. Yet, little is known about how compliance issues come to exist and how compliance processes can be improved to address them. Our results, based on surveys (n = 127) and interviews (n = 27), suggest that most developers rely on app markets to identify privacy issues, they lack complete understandings of the third-party SDKs they integrate, and they find it challenging to ensure that these SDKs are kept upto-date and privacy-related options are configured correctly. As a result, we find that well-resourced app developers outsource most compliance decisions to auditing services, and that smaller developers follow “best-effort” models, by assuming that their apps are compliant so long as they have not been rejected by app markets. We highlight the need for usable tools that help developers identify and fix mobile app privacy issues.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们调查了面向儿童的移动应用程序开发人员遵循的隐私合规流程。虽然儿童在线隐私法在美国已经存在了几十年，但之前的研究发现，遵守率相对较低。然而，对于合规性问题是如何产生的以及如何改进合规性流程来解决这些问题却知之甚少。我们基于调查(n = 127)和访谈(n = 27)的结果表明，大多数开发人员依赖应用市场来确定隐私问题，他们缺乏对他们集成的第三方SDK的完整了解，并且他们发现确保这些SDK保持最新并正确配置隐私相关选项是一项挑战。因此，我们发现资源充足的应用程序开发者将大多数合规性决策外包给审计服务，而较小的开发者遵循“尽力而为”的模式，假设他们的应用程序只要没有被应用程序市场拒绝，就是合规的。我们强调需要可用的工具来帮助开发人员识别和修复移动应用程序隐私问题。
papers.title_zh: 开发者说最糟糕的事情:儿童导向应用的开发者遵循的隐私合规流程

papers.title: LLAMA: A Low Latency Math Library for Secure Inference
papers.authors: Kanav Gupta, Deepak Kumaraswamy, Nishanth Chandran, Divya Gupta
papers.abstract: Secure machine learning (ML) inference can provide meaningful privacy guarantees to both the client (holding sensitive input) and the server (holding sensitive weights of the ML model) while realizing inferenceas-a-service. Although many specialized protocols exist for this task, including those in the preprocessing model (where a majority of the overheads are moved to an input independent offline phase), they all still suffer from large online complexity. Specifically, the protocol phase that executes once the parties know their inputs, has high communication, round complexity, and latency. Function Secret Sharing (FSS) based techniques offer an attractive solution to this in the trusted dealer model (where a dealer provides input independent correlated randomness to both parties), and 2PC protocols obtained based on these techniques have a very lightweight online phase. Unfortunately, current FSS-based 2PC works (AriaNN, PoPETS 2022; Boyle et al. Eurocrypt 2021; Boyle et al. TCC 2019) fall short of providing a complete solution to secure inference. First, they lack support for math functions (e.g., sigmoid, and reciprocal square root) and hence, are insufficient for a large class of inference algorithms (e.g. recurrent neural networks). Second, they restrict all values in the computation to be of the same bitwidth and this prevents them from benefitting from efficient float-to-fixed converters such as Tensorflow Lite that crucially use low bitwidth representations and mixed bitwidth arithmetic. In this work, we present LLAMA – an end-to-end, FSS based, secure inference library supporting precise low bitwidth computations (required by converters) as well as provably precise math functions; thus, overcoming all the drawbacks listed above. We perform an extensive evaluation of LLAMA and show that when compared with non-FSS based libraries supporting mixed bitwidth arithmetic and math functions (SIRNN, IEEE S&P 2021), it has at least an order of magnitude lower communication, rounds, and runtimes. We integrate LLAMA with the EzPC framework (IEEE EuroS&P 2019) and demonstrate its robustness by evaluating it on large benchmarks (such as ResNet-50 on the ImageNet dataset) as well as on benchmarks considered in AriaNN – here too LLAMA outperforms prior work.
papers.abstract_zh: 安全机器学习(ML)推理可以在实现推理服务的同时，为客户端(保存敏感输入)和服务器(保存ML模型的敏感权重)提供有意义的隐私保证。尽管对于这个任务存在许多专门的协议，包括预处理模型中的那些协议(其中大部分开销被转移到独立于输入的离线阶段)，但是它们都仍然受到大的在线复杂性的困扰。具体来说，一旦各方知道他们的输入就执行的协议阶段具有高通信、循环复杂性和延迟。基于函数秘密共享(FSS)的技术在可信经销商模型(其中经销商向双方提供独立于输入的相关随机性)中对此提供了一种有吸引力的解决方案，并且基于这些技术获得的2PC协议具有非常轻量级的在线阶段。不幸的是，当前基于FSS的2PC工作(AriaNN，PoPETS 2022博伊尔等人的欧洲密码2021；Boyle等人(TCC 2019)未能提供安全推理的完整解决方案。首先，它们缺乏对数学函数(例如sigmoid和平方根倒数)的支持，因此不足以支持一大类推理算法(例如递归神经网络)。其次，它们将计算中的所有值限制为相同的位宽，这使它们无法受益于高效的浮点到固定转换器，如Tensorflow Lite，这些转换器主要使用低位宽表示和混合位宽算法。在本文中，我们介绍了LLAMA——一个端到端、基于FSS的安全推理库，支持精确的低位宽计算(转换器需要)以及可证明精确的数学函数；从而克服了上面列出的所有缺点。我们对LLAMA进行了广泛的评估，并表明与支持混合位宽算术和数学函数的非FSS库(SIRNN，IEEE S&P 2021)相比，它的通信、轮次和运行时至少低一个数量级。我们将LLAMA与EzPC框架(IEEE EuroS&P 2019)集成在一起，并通过在大型基准(如ImageNet数据集上的ResNet-50)以及AriaNN中考虑的基准上对其进行评估来展示其鲁棒性——在这方面，LLAMA也优于之前的工作。
papers.title_zh: LLAMA:一个用于安全推理的低延迟数学库

papers.title: ATOM: Ad-network Tomography
papers.authors: Maaz Bin Musa, Rishab Nithyanand
papers.abstract: Data sharing between online trackers and advertisers is a key component in online behavioral advertising. This sharing can be facilitated through a variety of processes, including those not observable to the user’s browser. The unobservability of these processes limits the ability of researchers and auditors seeking to verify compliance with recent regulations (e.g., CCPA and CDPA) which require complete disclosure of data sharing partners. Unfortunately, the applicability of existing techniques to make inferences about unobservable data sharing relationships is limited due to their dependence on protocol- or case-specific artifacts of the online behavioral advertising ecosystem (e.g., they work only when client-side header bidding is used for ad delivery or when advertisers perform ad retargeting). As behavioral advertising technologies continue to evolve rapidly, the availability of these artifacts and the effectiveness of transparency solutions dependent on them remain ephemeral. In this paper, we propose a generalizable technique, called ATOM, to infer data sharing relationships between online trackers and advertisers. ATOM is different from prior approaches in that it is universally applicable — i.e., independent of ad delivery protocols or availability of artifacts. ATOM leverages the insight that by the very nature of behavioral advertising, ad creatives themselves can be used to infer data sharing between trackers and advertisers — after all, the topics and brands showcased in an ad are dependent on the data available to the advertiser. Therefore, by selectively blocking trackers and monitoring changes in the characteristics of ad creatives delivered by advertisers, ATOM is able to identify data sharing relationships between trackers and advertisers. The relationships discovered by our implementation of ATOM include those not found using prior approaches and are validated by external sources.
papers.abstract_zh: 在线追踪者和广告商之间的数据共享是在线行为广告的关键组成部分。这种共享可以通过各种过程来实现，包括那些用户浏览器不可见的过程。这些过程的不可观察性限制了研究人员和审计人员寻求验证是否符合最近的法规(例如，CCPA和CDPA)的能力，这些法规要求完全披露数据共享伙伴。不幸的是，对不可观察的数据共享关系进行推断的现有技术的适用性是有限的，这是由于它们依赖于在线行为广告生态系统的协议或案例特定的人工制品(例如，它们仅在客户端头部竞价用于广告投放时或当广告商执行广告重定向时才起作用)。随着行为广告技术继续快速发展，这些人工制品的可用性和依赖于它们的透明解决方案的有效性仍然是短暂的。在这篇文章中，我们提出了一个可推广的技术，称为原子，以推断在线追踪者和广告商之间的数据共享关系。ATOM不同于以前的方法，因为它是普遍适用的——即，独立于广告递送协议或工件的可用性。ATOM利用了这样一种见解，即根据行为广告的本质，广告创意本身可以用来推断追踪者和广告商之间的数据共享——毕竟，广告中展示的主题和品牌取决于广告商可用的数据。因此，通过选择性地阻止追踪器并监控广告商交付的广告创意的特征变化，ATOM能够识别追踪器和广告商之间的数据共享关系。我们的ATOM实现所发现的关系包括那些使用以前的方法没有发现的关系，这些关系是由外部资源验证的。
papers.title_zh: ATOM: Ad网络断层扫描

papers.title: Investigating GDPR Fines in the Light of Data Flows
papers.authors: Marlene Saemann, Daniel Theis, Tobias Urban, Martin Degeling
papers.abstract: While GDPR related fines to big companies like Amazon or Google have seen widespread media attention, data protection authorities have issued several hundred more penalties since 2018. This work analyzes 856 fines and their summaries provided by the CMS Law GDPR Enforcement Tracker. We extend the methodology of previous work that evaluated GDPR fines and, in particular, explore the fines in the light of data flows and we perform a detailed categorization. Our analysis shows that it is a combination of technical and organizational issues that are involved when a fine is imposed. Moreover, data protection authorities more often react to data subjects’ complaints when data breaches become public and when health-related data is involved. We further show that the root causes for fined data processing lie in the early data life cycle phases (e.g., data collection). Here, organizational problems are more prevalent (601 fines) than technical issues (314 fines), while technical issues are mentioned more often in later life cycle phases (e.g., retention, access and usage). Especially mistakes in the early phases of the data collection process (e.g., lacking a legal basis) and unauthorized disclosure in later phases are fined. We cluster the most frequent words and analyze relations to understand where data controllers put personal data at risk. The results confirm that access management is a common problem that results in the unintended disclosure of data.
papers.abstract_zh: 虽然GDPR对亚马逊或谷歌等大公司的相关罚款引起了媒体的广泛关注，但自2018年以来，数据保护当局又开出了数百张罚单。这项工作分析了CMS法律GDPR执法跟踪系统提供的856份罚款及其摘要。我们扩展了之前评估GDPR罚款的方法，特别是根据数据流探索罚款，并进行详细分类。我们的分析表明，罚款是技术和组织问题的结合。此外，当数据泄露公开以及涉及健康相关数据时，数据保护机构通常会对数据主体的投诉做出反应。我们进一步表明，细化数据处理的根本原因在于早期数据生命周期阶段(例如，数据收集)。在这里，组织问题(601罚款)比技术问题(314罚款)更普遍，而技术问题在生命周期的后期阶段(例如，保留、访问和使用)更经常被提及。尤其是数据收集过程早期阶段的错误(例如，缺乏法律依据)和后期阶段的未经授权的披露会受到罚款。我们将最常见的词进行聚类并分析关系，以了解数据控制者将个人数据置于何种风险之中。结果证实，访问管理是一个常见问题，会导致数据的意外泄露。
papers.title_zh: 根据数据流调查GDPR罚款

papers.title: Machine Learning with Differentially Private Labels: Mechanisms and Frameworks
papers.authors: Xinyu Tang, Milad Nasr, Saeed Mahloujifar, Virat Shejwalkar, Liwei Song, Amir Houmansadr, Prateek Mittal
papers.abstract: Label differential privacy is a relaxation of differential privacy for machine learning scenarios where the labels are the only sensitive information that needs to be protected in the training data. For example, imagine a survey from a participant in a university class about their vaccination status. Some attributes of the students are publicly available but their vaccination status is sensitive information and must remain private. Now if we want to train a model that predicts whether a student has received vaccination using only their public information, we can use label-DP. Recent works on label-DP use different ways of adding noise to the labels in order to obtain label-DP models. In this work, we present novel techniques for training models with label-DP guarantees by leveraging unsupervised learning and semi-supervised learning, enabling us to inject less noise while obtaining the same privacy, therefore achieving a better utility-privacy trade-off. We first introduce a framework that starts with an unsupervised classifier f0 and dataset D with noisy label set Y , reduces the noise in Y using f0 , and then trains a new model f using the less noisy dataset. Our noise reduction strategy uses the model f0 to remove the noisy labels that are incorrect with high probability. Then we use semi-supervised learning to train a model using the remaining labels. We instantiate this framework with multiple ways of obtaining the noisy labels and also the base classifier. As an alternative way to reduce the noise, we explore the effect of using unsupervised learning: we only add noise to a majority voting step for associating the learned clusters with a cluster label (as opposed to adding noise to individual labels); the reduced sensitivity enables us to add less noise. Our experiments show that these techniques can significantly outperform the prior works on label-DP.
papers.abstract_zh: 标签差分隐私是针对机器学习场景的差分隐私的放松，其中标签是训练数据中唯一需要保护的敏感信息。例如，想象一个来自一个大学班级的参与者的关于他们的疫苗接种状态的调查。学生的一些属性是公开的，但他们的疫苗接种状态是敏感信息，必须保密。现在，如果我们想训练一个模型，仅使用学生的公共信息来预测学生是否接受了疫苗接种，我们可以使用label-DP。最近关于label-DP的工作使用不同的方式将噪声添加到标签中，以便获得label-DP模型。在这项工作中，我们通过利用无监督学习和半监督学习，提出了具有标签DP保证的训练模型的新技术，使我们能够在获得相同隐私的同时注入更少的噪声，从而实现更好的效用-隐私权衡。我们首先引入一个框架，该框架从无监督分类器f0和具有噪声标签集Y的数据集D开始，使用f0减少Y中的噪声，然后使用噪声较小的数据集训练新的模型f。我们的噪声降低策略使用模型f0来移除高概率不正确的噪声标签。然后，我们使用半监督学习来使用剩余的标签训练模型。我们用多种获得噪声标签和基本分类器的方法来实例化这个框架。作为减少噪声的替代方式，我们探索使用无监督学习的效果:我们仅将噪声添加到多数投票步骤，用于将学习的聚类与聚类标签相关联(与将噪声添加到单个标签相反)；灵敏度的降低使我们能够添加更少的噪声。我们的实验表明，这些技术明显优于label-DP的现有工作。
papers.title_zh: 具有不同私有标签的机器学习:机制和框架

papers.title: Pika: Secure Computation using Function Secret Sharing over Rings
papers.authors: Sameer Wagh
papers.abstract: Machine learning algorithms crucially depend on non-linear mathematical functions such as division (for normalization), exponentiation (for softmax and sigmoid), tanh (as an activation function), logarithm (for crossentropy loss), and square root (for back-propagation of normalization layers). However, when machine learning is performed over secure computation, these protocols incur a large communication overhead and high round complexity. In this work, we propose new multi-party computation (MPC) protocols for such functions. Our protocols achieve constant round complexity (3 for semi-honest, 4 for malicious), an order of magnitude lower communication (54 − 121× lower than prior art), and high concrete efficiency (2−1163× faster runtime). We rely on recent advances in function secret sharing (FSS) to construct these protocols. Our contributions can be summarized as follows: (1) A constant round protocol to securely evaluate nonlinear functions such as division, exponentiation, logarithm, and tanh (in comparison to prior art which uses round complexity proportional to the rounds of iterative methods/required precision) with high accuracy. This construction largely follows prior work in look-up style secure computation. (2) Our main contribution is the extension of the above protocol to be secure in the presence of malicious adversaries in the honest majority setting. We provide a malicious sketching protocol for FSS schemes that works over rings and in order to prove its security, we extend (and prove) a corresponding form of SchwartzZippel lemma over rings. This is the first such extension of the lemma and it can be of independent interest in other domains of secure computation. (3) We implement our protocol and showcase order of magnitude improvements in runtime and communication. Given the low round complexity and substantially lower communication, our protocols achieve even better performance over network constrained environments such as WAN. Finally, we showcase how such functions can lead to scalability in machine learning. Note that techniques presented are applicable beyond the application of machine learning as the protocols effectively present an efficient 1-out-of-N oblivious transfer or an efficient private information retrieval protocol.
papers.abstract_zh: 机器学习算法主要依赖于非线性数学函数，例如除法(用于归一化)、取幂(用于softmax和sigmoid)、双曲正切(作为激活函数)、对数(用于交叉熵损失)和平方根(用于归一化层的反向传播)。然而，当机器学习在安全计算上执行时，这些协议招致大的通信开销和高的循环复杂度。在这项工作中，我们提出了新的多方计算(MPC)协议。我们的协议实现了恒定的循环复杂度(半诚实为3，恶意为4)，低一个数量级的通信(比现有技术低54121倍)，以及高的具体效率(运行时间快21163倍)。我们依靠函数秘密共享(FSS)的最新进展来构造这些协议。我们的贡献可以概括如下:(1)恒定轮协议，以高精度安全地评估非线性函数，例如除法、取幂、对数和双曲正切(与使用与迭代方法轮数/所需精度成比例的轮复杂度的现有技术相比)。这种构造很大程度上遵循了先前在查找式安全计算中的工作。(2)我们的主要贡献是扩展了上述协议，使其在诚实多数环境下，在恶意对手存在的情况下是安全的。我们为环上的FSS方案提供了一个恶意草绘协议，为了证明其安全性，我们扩展(并证明)了环上的SchwartzZippel引理的相应形式。这是该引理的第一个这样的扩展，它可以在安全计算的其他领域中引起独立的兴趣。(3)我们实现了我们的协议，并展示了运行时和通信方面的数量级改进。考虑到低轮复杂度和低得多的通信量，我们的协议在诸如WAN的网络受限环境中实现了甚至更好的性能。最后，我们展示了这样的函数如何导致机器学习的可扩展性。注意，所呈现的技术可应用于机器学习的应用之外，因为这些协议有效地呈现了高效的N选1不经意传输或高效的私有信息检索协议。
papers.title_zh: Pika:环上使用函数秘密共享的安全计算

papers.title: Flexible and scalable privacy assessment for very large datasets, with an application to official governmental microdata
papers.authors: Mário S. Alvim, Natasha Fernandes, Annabelle McIver, Carroll Morgan, Gabriel H. Nunes
papers.abstract: We present a systematic refactoring of the conventional treatment of privacy analyses, basing it on mathematical concepts from the framework of Quantitative Information Flow (QIF ). The approach we suggest brings three principal advantages: it is flexible, allowing for precise quantification and comparison of privacy risks for attacks both known and novel; it can be computationally tractable for very large, longitudinal datasets; and its results are explainable both to politicians and to the general public. We apply our approach to a very large case study: the Educational Censuses of Brazil, curated by the governmental agency inep, which comprise over 90 attributes of approximately 50 million individuals released longitudinally every year since 2007. These datasets have only very recently (2018–2021) attracted legislation to regulate their privacy — while at the same time continuing to maintain the openness that had been sought in Brazilian society. inep’s reaction to that legislation was the genesis of our project with them. In our conclusions here we share the scientific, technical, and communication lessons we learned in the process.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了一个隐私分析的传统处理的系统重构，它基于来自定量信息流(QIF)框架的数学概念。我们建议的方法带来了三个主要优点:它是灵活的，允许对已知和新的攻击的隐私风险进行精确的量化和比较；对于非常大的纵向数据集，它在计算上是易处理的；其结果可以向政治家和公众解释。我们将我们的方法应用于一个非常大的案例研究:由政府机构inep策划的巴西教育普查，它包括自2007年以来每年纵向发布的大约5000万个人的90多个属性。这些数据集直到最近(2018年至2021年)才吸引了监管其隐私的立法，同时继续保持巴西社会一直寻求的开放性。inep对该立法的反应是我们与他们合作项目的起源。在我们的结论中，我们分享了在此过程中所学到的科学、技术和沟通经验。
papers.title_zh: 针对超大型数据集的灵活且可扩展的隐私评估，以及对官方政府微观数据的应用

papers.title: "You offer privacy like you offer tea": Investigating Mechanisms for Improving Guest Privacy in IoT-Equipped Households
papers.authors: Karola Marky, Nina Gerber, Michelle Gabriela Pelzer, Mohamed Khamis, Max Mühlhäuser
papers.abstract: IoT devices are becoming more common and prevalent in private households. Since guests can be present in IoT-equipped households, IoT devices can pose considerable privacy risks to them. In this paper, we present an in-depth evaluation of privacy protection for guests considering the perspectives of hosts and guests. First, we interviewed 21 IoT device owners about four classes of mechanisms obtained from the literature and social aspects. Second, we conducted an online survey (N=264) that investigates the perspective of guests in IoT-equipped households. From our results, we learn that protection mechanisms should not introduce privacy threats and require low resources. Further, hosts should keep control over their devices and the aesthetics of their living spaces. Guests, however, value feedback about the status of privacy protection which can interfere with aesthetics. Privacy protection should rather foster collaboration and not impact the visit of the guest too severely. We use our results to identify a design space for guest privacy protection in IoT-equipped households.
papers.abstract_zh: 物联网设备在私人家庭中越来越普遍。由于客人可能出现在配备物联网的家庭中，物联网设备可能会给他们带来相当大的隐私风险。在本文中，我们从主人和客人的角度对客人的隐私保护进行了深入的评估。首先，我们采访了21位物联网设备所有者，从文献和社会方面获得了四类机制。第二，我们进行了一项在线调查(N=264)，调查配备物联网的家庭中客人的观点。从我们的结果中，我们了解到保护机制不应该引入隐私威胁，并且需要较少的资源。此外，主人应该控制他们的设备和他们生活空间的美学。然而，客人重视关于隐私保护状况的反馈，这可能会影响美观。隐私保护应该促进合作，而不是太严重地影响客人的访问。我们使用我们的结果来确定在物联网家庭中保护客人隐私的设计空间。
papers.title_zh: “你提供隐私就像你提供茶一样”:调查在配备物联网的家庭中改善客人隐私的机制

papers.title: Effects of Privacy Permissions on User Choices in Voice Assistant App Stores
papers.authors: Gary Liu, Nathan Malkin
papers.abstract: Intelligent voice assistants, and the thirdparty apps (aka “skills” or “actions”) that power them, are increasing in popularity and beginning to experiment with the ability to continuously listen to users. This paper studies how privacy concerns related to such always-listening voice assistants might affect consumer behavior and whether certain privacy mitigations would render them more acceptable. To explore these questions with more realistic user choices, we built an interactive app store that allowed users to install apps for a hypothetical always-listening voice assistant. In a study with 214 participants, we asked users to browse the app store and install apps for different voice assistants that offered varying levels of privacy protections. We found that users were generally more willing to install continuously-listening apps when there were greater privacy protections, but this effect was not universally present. The majority did not review any permissions in detail, but still expressed a preference for stronger privacy protections. Our results suggest that privacy factors into user choice, but many people choose to skip this information.
papers.abstract_zh: 智能语音助手和为其提供动力的第三方应用程序(也称为“技能”或“动作”)越来越受欢迎，并开始尝试持续倾听用户的能力。本文研究了与这种始终监听的语音助手相关的隐私问题可能如何影响消费者行为，以及某些隐私缓解措施是否会使它们更容易被接受。为了用更现实的用户选择来探索这些问题，我们建立了一个交互式应用程序商店，允许用户为一个假想的始终收听的语音助手安装应用程序。在一项有214名参与者的研究中，我们要求用户浏览应用商店，并为不同的语音助手安装应用，这些应用提供不同级别的隐私保护。我们发现，当有更好的隐私保护时，用户通常更愿意安装连续收听应用程序，但这种影响并不普遍存在。大多数人没有详细审查任何权限，但仍然表示倾向于更强的隐私保护。我们的结果表明，隐私因素影响用户的选择，但许多人选择跳过这些信息。
papers.title_zh: 语音助手应用商店中隐私权限对用户选择的影响

papers.title: Collection, usage and privacy of mobility data in the enterprise and public administrations
papers.authors: Alexandra Kapp
papers.abstract: Human mobility data is a crucial resource for urban mobility management, but it does not come without personal reference. The implementation of security measures such as anonymization is thus needed to protect individuals’ privacy. Often, a trade-off arises as such techniques potentially decrease the utility of the data and limit its use. While much research on anonymization techniques exists, there is little information on the actual implementations by practitioners, especially outside the big tech context. Within our study, we conducted expert interviews to gain insights into practices in the field. We categorize purposes, data sources, analysis, and modeling tasks to provide a profound understanding of the context such data is used in. We survey privacy-enhancing methods in use, which generally do not comply with state-of-the-art standards of differential privacy. We provide groundwork for further research on practice-oriented research by identifying privacy needs of practitioners and extracting relevant mobility characteristics for future standardized evaluations of privacy-enhancing methods.
papers.abstract_zh: 人员流动数据是城市流动管理的重要资源，但它离不开个人参考。因此，需要采取匿名等安全措施来保护个人隐私。通常，由于这些技术可能会降低数据的效用并限制其使用，因此需要进行权衡。虽然有很多关于匿名化技术的研究，但是很少有关于从业者实际实现的信息，尤其是在大的技术环境之外。在我们的研究中，我们进行了专家访谈，以深入了解该领域的实践。我们对目的、数据源、分析和建模任务进行分类，以提供对这些数据使用环境的深刻理解。我们调查了正在使用的隐私增强方法，这些方法通常不符合差分隐私的最新标准。我们通过识别从业者的隐私需求和提取相关的移动性特征，为未来隐私增强方法的标准化评估，为面向实践的研究提供进一步研究的基础。
papers.title_zh: 企业和公共管理机构中移动数据的收集、使用和隐私

papers.title: Ctrl-Shift: How Privacy Sentiment Changed from 2019 to 2021
papers.authors: Angelica Goetzen, Samuel Dooley, Elissa M. Redmiles
papers.abstract: People’s privacy sentiments influence changes in legislation as well as technology design and use. While single-point-in-time investigations of privacy sentiment offer useful insight, study of people’s privacy sentiments over time is also necessary to better understand and anticipate evolving privacy attitudes. In this work, we build off of a 2019 Pew Research study and use repeated cross-sectional surveys (n=6,676) from 2019, 2020, and 2021 to model the sentiments of people in the U.S. toward collection and use of data for government- and health-related purposes. After the onset of COVID-19, we observe significant decreases in respondent acceptance of government data use and significant increases in acceptance of health-related data uses. While differences in privacy attitudes between sociodemographic groups largely decreased over this time period, following the 2020 U.S. national elections, we observe some of the first evidence that privacy sentiments may change based on the alignment between a user’s politics and the political party in power. Our results offer insight into how privacy attitudes may have been impacted by recent events and allow us to identify potential predictors of changes in privacy attitudes during times of geopolitical or national change.
papers.abstract_zh: 人们的隐私观念影响着立法的变化以及技术的设计和使用。虽然对隐私情绪的单点及时调查提供了有用的见解，但对人们随着时间推移的隐私情绪的研究对于更好地理解和预测不断变化的隐私态度也是必要的。在这项工作中，我们建立在2019年皮尤研究的基础上，并使用2019年、2020年和2021年的重复横截面调查(n=6，676)来模拟美国人对收集和使用用于政府和健康相关目的的数据的看法。在新冠肺炎疫情爆发后，我们观察到受访者对政府数据使用的接受度显著下降，而对健康相关数据使用的接受度显著上升。虽然社会人口统计群体之间的隐私态度差异在这段时间内大大减少，但在2020年美国全国大选之后，我们观察到一些初步证据表明，隐私情绪可能会根据用户的政治和执政党之间的结盟而改变。我们的结果提供了隐私态度如何受到最近事件影响的见解，并允许我们确定地缘政治或国家变化时期隐私态度变化的潜在预测因素。
papers.title_zh: Ctrl-Shift:隐私情绪如何从2019年到2021年发生变化

papers.title: Keeping Privacy Labels Honest
papers.authors: Simon Koch, Malte Wessels, Benjamin Altpeter, Madita Olvermann, Martin Johns
papers.abstract: At the end of 2020, Apple introduced privacy nutritional labels, requiring app developers to state what data is collected by their apps and for what purpose. In this paper, we take an in-depth look at the privacy labels and how they relate to actual transmitted data. First, we give an exploratory statistically evaluation of 11074 distinct apps across 22 categories and their corresponding privacy label or lack thereof. Our dataset shows that only some apps provide privacy labels, and a small number self-declare that they do not collect any data. Additionally, our statistical methods showcase the differences of the privacy labels across application categories. We then select a subset of 1687 apps across 22 categories from the German App Store to conduct a no-touch traffic collection study. We analyse the traffic against a set of 18 honey-data points and a list of known advertisement and tracking domains. At least 276 of these apps violate their privacy label by transmitting data without declaration, showing that the privacy labels’ correctness was not validated during the app approval process. In addition, we evaluate the apps’ adherence to the GDPR in respect of providing a privacy consent form, through collected screenshots, and identify numerous potential violations of the directive.
papers.abstract_zh: 2020年底，苹果推出了隐私营养标签，要求应用开发者说明他们的应用收集了哪些数据，用于什么目的。在本文中，我们将深入探讨隐私标签以及它们与实际传输数据的关系。首先，我们对22个类别的11074个不同的应用程序及其相应的隐私标签或缺乏隐私标签进行了探索性的统计评估。我们的数据集显示，只有一些应用程序提供隐私标签，一小部分自我声明他们不收集任何数据。此外，我们的统计方法展示了隐私标签在不同应用类别中的差异。然后，我们从德国应用商店的22个类别中选择了1687个应用子集，进行无接触流量收集研究。我们根据一组18个蜜汁数据点和一个已知广告和跟踪域列表来分析流量。这些应用程序中至少有276个违反了隐私标签，在没有声明的情况下传输数据，表明隐私标签的正确性在应用程序批准过程中没有得到验证。此外，我们通过收集的屏幕截图评估了应用程序在提供隐私同意书方面对GDPR的遵守情况，并确定了许多潜在的违反指令的行为。
papers.title_zh: 保持隐私标签的真实性

papers.title: Zswap: zk-SNARK Based Non-Interactive Multi-Asset Swaps
papers.authors: Felix Engelmann, Thomas Kerber, Markulf Kohlweiss, Mikhail Volkhov
papers.abstract: Privacy-oriented cryptocurrencies, like Zcash or Monero, provide fair transaction anonymity and confidentiality, but lack important features compared to fully public systems, like Ethereum. Specifically, supporting assets of multiple types and providing a mechanism to atomically exchange them, which is critical for e.g. decentralized finance (DeFi), is challenging in the private setting. By combining insights and security properties from Zcash and SwapCT (PETS 21, an atomic swap system for Monero), we present a simple zk-SNARKs based transaction scheme, called Zswap, which is carefully malleable to allow the merging of transactions, while preserving anonymity. Our protocol enables multiple assets and atomic exchanges by making use of sparse homomorphic commitments with aggregated open randomness, together with Zcash friendly simulation-extractable non-interactive zero-knowledge (NIZK) proofs. This results in a provably secure privacypreserving transaction protocol, with efficient swaps, and overall performance close to that of existing deployed private cryptocurrencies. It is similar to Zcash Sapling and benefits from existing code-bases and implementation expertise.
papers.abstract_zh: 面向隐私的加密货币，如Zcash或Monero，提供了公平的交易匿名和保密性，但与以太坊等完全公开的系统相比，缺乏重要的功能。具体来说，支持多种类型的资产并提供一种自动交换它们的机制，这对于例如分散金融(DeFi)来说是至关重要的，在私有环境中是具有挑战性的。通过结合来自Zcash和SwapCT (PETS 21，Monero的原子交换系统)的见解和安全属性，我们提出了一个简单的基于zk-SNARKs的交易方案，称为Zswap，它具有良好的延展性，允许合并交易，同时保持匿名性。我们的协议通过使用具有聚集的开放随机性的稀疏同态承诺，以及Zcash友好的模拟可提取的非交互式零知识(NIZK)证明，实现了多资产和原子交换。这产生了可证明安全的隐私保护交易协议，具有高效的交换，并且总体性能接近于现有部署的私有加密货币。它类似于Zcash Sapling，并受益于现有的代码库和实现专业知识。
papers.title_zh: Zswap:基于zk-SNARK的非交互式多资产互换

papers.title: Formalizing and Estimating Distribution Inference Risks
papers.authors: Anshuman Suri, David Evans
papers.abstract: Distribution inference, sometimes called property inference, infers statistical properties about a training set from access to a model trained on that data. Distribution inference attacks can pose serious risks when models are trained on private data, but are difficult to distinguish from the intrinsic purpose of statistical machine learning—namely, to produce models that capture statistical properties about a distribution. Motivated by Yeom et al.’s membership inference framework, we propose a formal definition of distribution inference attacks general enough to describe a broad class of attacks distinguishing between possible training distributions. We show how our definition captures previous ratio-based inference attacks as well as new kinds of attack including revealing the average node degree or clustering coefficient of training graphs. To understand distribution inference risks, we introduce a metric that quantifies observed leakage by relating it to the leakage that would occur if samples from the training distribution were provided directly to the adversary. We report on a series of experiments across a range of different distributions using both novel black-box attacks and improved versions of the state-of-the-art white-box attacks. Our results show that inexpensive attacks are often as effective as expensive meta-classifier attacks, and that there are surprising asymmetries in the effectiveness of attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 分布推断有时也称为属性推断，它通过访问根据数据训练的模型来推断训练集的统计属性。当模型在私有数据上训练时，分布推断攻击可能会带来严重的风险，但很难与统计机器学习的内在目的区分开来，即，产生捕捉关于分布的统计属性的模型。受Yeom等人的成员推理框架的启发，我们提出了一个分布推理攻击的正式定义，该定义足够通用以描述区分可能的训练分布的一大类攻击。我们展示了我们的定义如何捕获以前的基于比率的推理攻击以及新类型的攻击，包括揭示训练图的平均节点度或聚类系数。为了理解分布推断风险，我们引入了一个度量，通过将观察到的泄漏与如果将来自训练分布的样本直接提供给对手时将会发生的泄漏相关联，来量化观察到的泄漏。我们报告了一系列实验，这些实验跨越了一系列不同的分布，使用了新颖的黑盒攻击和最新白盒攻击的改进版本。我们的结果表明，廉价的攻击通常与昂贵的元分类器攻击一样有效，并且攻击的有效性存在令人惊讶的不对称性。
papers.title_zh: 形式化和估计分布推断风险

papers.title: Connect the Dots: Tighter Discrete Approximations of Privacy Loss Distributions
papers.authors: Vadym Doroshenko, Badih Ghazi, Pritish Kamath, Ravi Kumar, Pasin Manurangsi
papers.abstract: The privacy loss distribution (PLD) provides a tight characterization of the privacy loss of a mechanism in the context of differential privacy (DP). Recent work [18–20, 24] has shown that PLD-based accounting allows for tighter (ε, δ)-DP guarantees for many popular mechanisms compared to other known methods. A key question in PLD-based accounting is how to approximate any (potentially continuous) PLD with a PLD over any specified discrete support. We present a novel approach to this problem. Our approach supports both pessimistic estimation, which overestimates the hockey-stick divergence (i.e., δ) for any value of ε, and optimistic estimation, which underestimates the hockey-stick divergence. Moreover, we show that our pessimistic estimate is the best possible among all pessimistic estimates. Experimental evaluation shows that our approach can work with much larger discretization intervals while keeping a similar error bound compared to previous approaches and yet give a better approximation than an existing method [24].
papers.abstract_zh: 隐私损失分布(PLD)提供了在差分隐私(DP)环境中机制的隐私损失的严格表征。最近的工作[18–20，24]表明，与其他已知方法相比，基于PLD的核算可以为许多流行的机制提供更紧密的(ε，δ)-DP保证。基于PLD的会计中的一个关键问题是如何在任何指定的离散支持上用PLD近似任何(潜在连续的)PLD。我们提出了一个解决这个问题的新方法。我们的方法支持悲观估计和乐观估计，悲观估计高估了任何ε值的曲棍球棒散度(即δ),乐观估计低估了曲棍球棒散度。此外，我们证明了我们的悲观估计是所有悲观估计中最好的。实验评估表明，与以前的方法相比，我们的方法可以在更大的离散化区间内工作，同时保持类似的误差范围，但比现有方法提供了更好的近似[24]。
papers.title_zh: 连接这些点:隐私损失分布的更紧密的离散近似值

papers.title: Hidden Issuer Anonymous Credential
papers.authors: Daniel Bosk, Davide Frey, Mathieu Gestin, Guillaume Piolle
papers.abstract: Identity Management Systems (IMS) allow users to prove characteristics about themselves to multiple service providers. IMS evolved from impractical, site-by-site authentication, to versatile, privacyenhancing Self Sovereign Identity (SSI) Frameworks. SSI frameworks often use Anonymous Credential schemes to provide user privacy, and more precisely unlinkability between uses of these credentials. However, these schemes imply the disclosure of the identity of the Issuer of a given credential to any service provider. This can lead to information leaks. We deal with this problem by introducing a new Anonymous Credential scheme that allows a user to hide the Issuer of a credential, while being able to convince the service providers that they can trust the credential, in the absence of a trusted setup. We prove this new scheme secure under the Computational Diffie Hellman assumption, and Decisional Diffie Hellman assumption, in the Random Oracle Model. We show that this scheme is efficient enough to be used with laptops, and to be integrated into SSI frameworks or any other IMS.
papers.abstract_zh: 身份管理系统(IMS)允许用户向多个服务提供商证明自己的特征。IMS从不切实际的逐站点认证发展到通用的、隐私增强的自我主权身份(SSI)框架。SSI框架通常使用匿名凭据方案来提供用户隐私，更准确地说，是这些凭据使用之间的不可链接性。然而，这些方案意味着给定凭证的发行者的身份向任何服务提供商公开。这可能导致信息泄露。我们通过引入一种新的匿名证书方案来解决这个问题，该方案允许用户隐藏证书的颁发者，同时能够使服务提供商相信他们可以信任该证书，而不需要可信的设置。在随机预言模型下，我们证明了新方案在计算性Diffie Hellman假设和判定性Diffie Hellman假设下是安全的。我们证明这个方案足够有效，可以用于笔记本电脑，并集成到SSI框架或任何其他im中。
papers.title_zh: 隐藏的颁发者匿名凭据

papers.title: A novel reconstruction attack on foreign-trade official statistics, with a Brazilian case study
papers.authors: Danilo Fabrino Favato, Gabriel Coutinho, Mário S. Alvim, Natasha Fernandes
papers.abstract: In this paper we describe, formalize, implement, and experimentally evaluate a novel transaction re-identification attack against official foreigntrade statistics releases in Brazil. The attack’s goal is to re-identify the importers of foreign-trade transactions (by revealing the identity of the company performing that transaction), which consequently violates those importers’ fiscal secrecy (by revealing sensitive information: the value and volume of traded goods). We provide a mathematical formalization of this fiscal secrecy problem using principles from the framework of quantitative information flow (QIF), then carefully identify the main sources of imprecision in the official data releases used as auxiliary information in the attack, and model transaction re-construction as a linear optimization problem solvable through integer linear programming (ILP). We show that this problem is NP-complete, and provide a methodology to identify tractable instances. We exemplify the feasibility of our attack by performing 2,003 transaction re-identifications that in total amount to more than $137M, and affect 348 Brazilian companies. Further, since similar statistics are produced by other statistical agencies, our attack is of broader concern.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们描述、形式化、实现并实验性地评估了一种针对巴西官方对外贸易统计数据发布的新型交易再识别攻击。攻击的目标是重新识别外贸交易的进口商(通过披露进行交易的公司的身份)，这因此违反了这些进口商的财务保密(通过披露敏感信息:交易商品的价值和数量)。我们使用定量信息流(QIF)框架中的原则提供了这一财政保密问题的数学形式化，然后仔细识别在攻击中用作辅助信息的官方数据发布中不精确的主要来源，并将交易重建建模为可通过整数线性规划(ILP)解决的线性优化问题。我们证明了这个问题是NP-完全的，并提供了一种识别易处理实例的方法。我们通过执行2003次交易重新识别来证明我们攻击的可行性，这些交易的总金额超过1 . 37亿美元，影响了348家巴西公司。此外，由于其他统计机构也有类似的统计数据，我们的攻击引起了更广泛的关注。
papers.title_zh: 对外贸官方统计数据的一种新的重构攻击——以巴西为例

papers.title: Private Aggregation of Trajectories
papers.authors: Badih Ghazi, Neel Kamal, Ravi Kumar, Pasin Manurangsi, Annika Zhang
papers.abstract: In this paper, we study the task of aggregating user-generated trajectories in a differentially private manner. We present a new algorithm for this problem and demonstrate its effectiveness and practicality through detailed experiments on real-world data. We also show that under simple and natural assumptions, our algorithm has provable utility guarantees.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们研究的任务是以不同的私有方式聚集用户生成的轨迹。我们提出了一种新的算法，并通过在真实数据上的详细实验证明了该算法的有效性和实用性。我们还表明，在简单和自然的假设下，我们的算法具有可证明的效用保证。
papers.title_zh: 轨迹的私有集合

papers.title: On the Challenges of Developing a Concise Questionnaire to Identify Privacy Personas
papers.authors: Tom Biselli, Enno Steinbrink, Franziska Herbert, Gina Maria Schmidbauer-Wolf, Christian Reuter
papers.abstract: Concise instruments to determine privacy personas – typical privacy-related user groups – are not available at present. Consequently, we aimed to identify them on a privacy knowledge–privacy behavior ratio based on a self-developed instrument. To achieve this, we conducted an item analysis (N = 820) and a confirmatory factor analysis (CFA) (N = 656) of data based on an online study with German participants. Starting with 81 items, we reduced those to an eleven-item questionnaire with the two scales privacy knowledge and privacy behavior. A subsequent cluster analysis (N = 656) revealed three distinct user groups: (1) Fundamentalists scoring high in privacy knowledge and behavior, (2) Pragmatists scoring average in privacy knowledge and behavior and (3) Unconcerned scoring low in privacy knowledge and behavior. In a closer inspection of the questionnaire, the CFAs supported the model with a close global fit based on RMSEA in a training and to a lesser extent in a cross-validation sample. Deficient local fit as well as validity and reliability coefficients well below generally accepted thresholds, however, revealed that the questionnaire in its current form cannot be considered a suitable measurement instrument for determining privacy personas. The results are discussed in terms of related persona conceptualizations, the importance of a methodologically sound investigation of corresponding privacy dimensions and our lessons learned.
papers.abstract_zh: 目前还没有确定隐私角色(典型的与隐私相关的用户群)的简明工具。因此，我们的目的是根据自主开发的工具确定他们的隐私知识-隐私行为比率。为了实现这一点，我们对基于德国参与者在线研究的数据进行了项目分析(N = 820)和验证性因子分析(CFA) (N = 656)。从81个项目开始，我们将其缩减为11个项目的问卷，包括隐私知识和隐私行为两个量表。随后的聚类分析(N = 656)揭示了三个不同的用户群:(1)原教旨主义者在隐私知识和行为方面得分高，(2)实用主义者在隐私知识和行为方面得分平均，以及(3)不关心者在隐私知识和行为方面得分低。在对调查问卷的进一步检查中，CFAs在一次培训中支持基于RMSEA的紧密全球拟合模型，并在较小程度上支持交叉验证样本。然而，不足的局部拟合以及远低于普遍接受的阈值的有效性和可靠性系数表明，当前形式的问卷不能被认为是确定隐私角色的合适的测量工具。研究结果从相关人物角色概念化、相应隐私维度的合理调查方法的重要性以及我们的经验教训等方面进行了讨论。
papers.title_zh: 开发一个简明的问卷来识别隐私角色的挑战

papers.title: Homomorphically counting elements with the same property
papers.authors: Ilia Iliashenko, Malika Izabachène, Axel Mertens, Hilder V. L. Pereira
papers.abstract: We propose homomorphic algorithms for privacy-preserving applications where we are given an encrypted dataset and we want to compute the number of elements that share a common property. We consider a two party scenario between a client and a server, where the storage and computation is outsourced to the server. We present two new efficient methods to solve this problem by homomorphically evaluating a selection function encoding the desired property, and counting the number of elements which evaluates to the same value. Our first method programs the homomorphic computation in the style of the the functional bootstrapping of TFHE and can be instantiated with essentially any homomorphic encryption scheme that operates on polynomials, like FV or BGV. Our second method relies on new homomorphic operations and ciphertext formats, and it is more suitable for applications where the number of possible inputs is much larger than the number of possible values for the property. We illustrate the feasibility of our methods by presenting a publicly available proof-ofconcept implementation in C++ and using it to evaluate a heatmap function over encrypted geographic points.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了用于隐私保护应用的同态算法，其中我们给定了一个加密的数据集，并且我们想要计算共享一个公共属性的元素的数量。我们考虑客户端和服务器之间的两方场景，其中存储和计算外包给服务器。我们提出了两个新的有效的方法来解决这个问题，通过同态地评估一个编码期望属性的选择函数，并计算评估为相同值的元素的数量。我们的第一种方法以TFHE的函数自举的风格对同态计算进行编程，并且基本上可以用任何对多项式进行操作的同态加密方案来实例化，如FV或BGV。我们的第二种方法依赖于新的同态运算和密文格式，并且它更适合于可能输入的数量远大于属性的可能值的数量的应用。我们展示了一个公开可用的C++概念验证实现，并使用它来评估加密地理点上的热图函数，以此来说明我们的方法的可行性。
papers.title_zh: 具有相同性质的同态计数元素

papers.title: Time- and Space-Efficient Aggregate Range Queries over Encrypted Databases
papers.authors: Zachary Espiritu, Evangelia Anna Markatou, Roberto Tamassia
papers.abstract: We present ARQ, a systematic framework for creating cryptographic schemes that handle range aggregate queries (sum, minimum, median, and mode) over encrypted datasets. Our framework does not rely on trusted hardware or specialized cryptographic primitives such as property-preserving or homomorphic encryption. Instead, ARQ unifies structures from the plaintext data management community with existing structured encryption primitives. We prove how such combinations yield efficient (and secure) constructions in the encrypted setting. We also propose a series of domain reduction techniques that can improve the space efficiency of our schemes against sparse datasets at the cost of small leakage. As part of this work, we designed and implemented a new, open-source, encrypted search library called Arca and implemented the ARQ framework using this library in order to evaluate ARQ’s practicality. Our experiments on real-world datasets demonstrate the efficiency of the schemes derived from ARQ in comparison to prior work.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了ARQ，一个用于创建加密方案的系统框架，该方案处理加密数据集上的范围聚集查询(总和、最小值、中间值和模式)。我们的框架不依赖于可信硬件或专门的密码原语，如属性保持或同态加密。相反，ARQ将明文数据管理社区的结构与现有的结构化加密原语统一起来。我们证明了这样的组合如何在加密设置中产生有效(和安全)的构造。我们还提出了一系列的区域缩减技术，这些技术可以提高我们的方案在稀疏数据集上的空间效率，代价是泄漏很小。作为这项工作的一部分，我们设计并实现了一个新的、开源的、加密的搜索库Arca，并使用这个库实现了ARQ框架，以评估ARQ的实用性。我们在真实数据集上的实验表明，与以前的工作相比，从ARQ导出的方案是有效的。
papers.title_zh: 加密数据库上时间和空间高效的聚集范围查询

papers.title: How Not to Handle Keys: Timing Attacks on FIDO Authenticator Privacy
papers.authors: Michal Kepkowski, Lucjan Hanzlik, Ian D. Wood, Mohamed Ali Kâafar
papers.abstract: This paper presents a timing attack on the FIDO2 (Fast IDentity Online) authentication protocol that allows attackers to link user accounts stored in vulnerable authenticators, a serious privacy concern. FIDO2 is a new standard specified by the FIDO industry alliance for secure token online authentication. It complements the W3C WebAuthn specification by providing means to use a USB token or other authenticator (which holds the secret authenticating material and implements FIDO protocols) as a second factor during the authentication process. From a cryptographic perspective, the protocol is a simple challenge-response where the elliptic curve digital signature algorithm is used to sign challenges. To protect the privacy of the user the token uses unique key pairs per service. To accommodate for small memory, tokens use various techniques that make use of a special parameter called a key handle sent by the service to the token with which the token can securely produce an authentication key (through generation or decryption). We identify and analyse a vulnerability in the way the processing of key handles is implemented that allows attackers to remotely link user accounts on multiple services. We show that for vulnerable authenticators there is a difference between the time it takes to process a key handle for a different service but correct authenticator, and for a different authenticator but correct service. This difference can be used to perform a timing attack allowing an adversary to link user’s accounts across services. We present several real world examples of adversaries that are in a position to execute our attack and can benefit from linking accounts. We found that two of the eight hardware authenticators we tested were vulnerable despite FIDO level 1 certification, indicating a not insignificant problem. This vulnerability cannot be easily mitigated on authenticators because, for security reasons, they usually do not allow firmware updates. In addition, we show that due to the way existing browsers implement the WebAuthn standard, the attack can be executed remotely. However, we discuss countermeasures that can be implemented by browser providers to mitigate the remote form of the attack.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文提出了对FIDO2(快速身份在线)认证协议的定时攻击，该协议允许攻击者链接存储在易受攻击的认证器中的用户帐户，这是一个严重的隐私问题。FIDO2是由FIDO行业联盟为安全令牌在线认证指定的新标准。它补充了W3C WebAuthn规范，提供了在认证过程中使用USB令牌或其他认证器(保存秘密认证材料并实现FIDO协议)作为第二个因素的方法。从加密的角度来看，该协议是一个简单的挑战-响应，其中椭圆曲线数字签名算法用于签署挑战。为了保护用户的隐私，令牌对每个服务使用唯一的密钥对。为了适应小内存，令牌使用各种技术，这些技术利用由服务发送给令牌的称为密钥句柄的特殊参数，令牌可以使用该参数安全地产生身份验证密钥(通过生成或解密)。我们发现并分析了密钥句柄处理实现方式中的一个漏洞，该漏洞允许攻击者远程链接多个服务上的用户帐户。我们表明，对于易受攻击的认证器，处理不同服务但正确的认证器的密钥句柄和不同认证器但正确的服务的密钥句柄所需的时间是不同的。这种差异可用于执行定时攻击，使得对手能够跨服务链接用户的帐户。我们提供了几个真实世界中的例子，这些例子说明了能够实施我们的攻击并能从链接帐户中获益的对手。我们发现，尽管通过了FIDO级认证，但我们测试的八个硬件授权码中有两个易受攻击，这表明问题不容忽视。授权码上的此漏洞不易消除，因为出于安全原因，授权码通常不允许固件更新。此外，我们表明，由于现有浏览器实现WebAuthn标准的方式，攻击可以远程执行。然而，我们讨论的对策可以由浏览器提供商实施，以减轻远程形式的攻击。
papers.title_zh: 如何不处理密钥:对FIDO认证者隐私的计时攻击

papers.title: Replay (Far) Away: Exploiting and Fixing Google/Apple Exposure Notification Contact Tracing
papers.authors: Christopher Ellis, Haohuang Wen, Zhiqiang Lin, Anish Arora
papers.abstract: Digital contact tracing offers significant promise to help reduce the spread of SARS-CoV-2 and other viruses. Google and Apple joined together in 2020 to create the Google/Apple Exposure Notification (GAEN) framework to determine encounters with anonymous users later diagnosed COVID-19 positive. However, as GAEN lacks geospatial awareness, it is susceptible to geographically distributed replay attacks. Anonymous, low-cost, crowd-sourced replay attack networks deployed by malicious actors (or far away nation-state attackers) who utilize malicious (or innocent) users’ smartphones to capture and replay GAEN advertisements can drastically increase false-positive rates even in areas that otherwise exhibit low positivity rates. In response to this powerful replay attack, we introduce GAEN+ , a solution that enhances GAEN with geospatial awareness while maintaining user privacy, and demonstrate its ability to effectively prevent geographically distributed replay attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 数字接触追踪为帮助减少新型冠状病毒病毒和其他病毒的传播提供了巨大的希望。谷歌和苹果在2020年联合创建了谷歌/苹果暴露通知(GAEN)框架，以确定遇到后来被诊断为新冠肺炎阳性的匿名用户。然而，由于GAEN缺乏地理空间感知能力，它很容易受到地理分布式重放攻击。由恶意行为者(或遥远的民族国家攻击者)部署的匿名、低成本、众包重放攻击网络利用恶意(或无辜)用户的智能手机来捕获和重放GAEN广告，即使在阳性率较低的地区也能大幅提高误报率。为了应对这种强大的重放攻击，我们引入了GAEN+，这是一种在维护用户隐私的同时增强GAEN地理空间感知的解决方案，并展示了其有效防止地理分布式重放攻击的能力。
papers.title_zh: 重播(远离):利用和修复谷歌/苹果曝光通知联系人追踪

papers.title: Adam in Private: Secure and Fast Training of Deep Neural Networks with Adaptive Moment Estimation
papers.authors: Nuttapong Attrapadung, Koki Hamada, Dai Ikarashi, Ryo Kikuchi, Takahiro Matsuda, Ibuki Mishina, Hiraku Morita, Jacob C. N. Schuldt
papers.abstract: Machine Learning (ML) algorithms, especially deep neural networks (DNN), have proven themselves to be extremely useful tools for data analysis, and are increasingly being deployed in systems operating on sensitive data, such as recommendation systems, banking fraud detection, and healthcare systems. This underscores the need for privacy-preserving ML (PPML) systems, and has inspired a line of research into how such systems can be constructed efficiently. However, most prior works on PPML achieve efficiency by requiring advanced ML algorithms to be simplified or substituted with approximated variants that are “MPC-friendly” before multi-party computation (MPC) techniques are applied to obtain a PPML systems. A drawback of this approach is that it requires careful fine-tuning of the combined ML and MPC algorithms, and might lead to less efficient algorithms or inferior quality ML (such as lower prediction accuracy). This is an issue for secure training of DNNs in particular, as this involves several arithmetic algorithms that are thought to be “MPCunfriendly”, namely, integer division, exponentiation, inversion, and square root extraction. In this work, we take a structurally different approach and propose a framework that allows efficient and secure evaluation of full-fledged state-of-the-art ML algorithms via secure multi-party computation. Specifically, we propose secure and efficient protocols for the above seemingly MPC-unfriendly computations (but which are essential to DNN). Our protocols are three-party protocols in the honest-majority setting, and we propose both passively secure and actively secure with abort variants. A notable feature of our protocols is that they simultaneously provide high accuracy and efficiency. This framework enables us to efficiently and securely compute modern ML algorithms such as Adam (Adaptive moment estimation) and the softmax function “as is”, without resorting to approximations. As a result, we obtain secure DNN training that outperforms state-of-the-art threeparty systems; our full training is up to 6.7 times faster than just the online phase of FALCON (Wagh et al. at PETS’21) and up to 4.2 times faster than Dalskov et al. (USENIX’21) on the standard benchmark network for secure training of DNNs. The potential advantage of our approach is even greater when considering more complex realistic networks. To demonstrate this, we perform measurements on real-world DNNs, AlexNet and VGG16, which are large networks containing millions of parameters. The performance of our framework for these networks is up to a factor of 26 ∼ 33 faster for AlexNet and 48 ∼ 51 faster for VGG16 to achieve an accuracy of 60% and 70%, respectively, when compared to FALCON. Even compared to CRYPTGPU (Tan et al. IEEE S&P’21), which is optimized for and runs on powerful GPUs, our framework achieves a factor of 2.1 and 4.1 faster performance, respectively, on these networks.
papers.abstract_zh: 机器学习(ML)算法，尤其是深度神经网络(DNN)，已被证明是非常有用的数据分析工具，并越来越多地部署在对敏感数据进行操作的系统中，如推荐系统、银行欺诈检测和医疗保健系统。这强调了保护隐私的ML (PPML)系统的必要性，并激发了对如何有效构建这种系统的一系列研究。然而，在多方计算(MPC)技术被应用于获得PPML系统之前，大多数关于PPML的现有工作通过要求先进的ML算法被简化或被“MPC友好”的近似变量替代来实现效率。这种方法的一个缺点是，它需要仔细微调组合的ML和MPC算法，并且可能导致效率较低的算法或质量较差的ML(例如较低的预测精度)。对于DNNs的安全训练来说，这尤其是一个问题，因为这涉及到几种被认为是“MPCunfriendly”的算术算法，即整数除法、取幂、求逆和平方根提取。在这项工作中，我们采用了一种结构上不同的方法，并提出了一个框架，允许通过安全的多方计算对成熟的最新ML算法进行高效和安全的评估。具体来说，我们为上述看起来对MPC不友好的计算(但对DNN是必要的)提出了安全有效的协议。我们的协议是诚实多数环境下的三方协议，我们提出了被动安全和主动安全的中止变体。我们的协议的一个显著特点是它们同时提供了高精度和高效率。该框架使我们能够高效、安全地计算现代最大似然算法，如Adam(自适应矩估计)和softmax函数“按原样”，而无需求助于近似。因此，我们获得了比最先进的三方系统更好的安全DNN培训；我们的完整训练比FALCON的在线阶段(Wagh等人在PETS'21)快6.7倍，比Dalskov等人(USENIX'21)在DNNs安全训练的标准基准网络上快4.2倍。当考虑更复杂的现实网络时，我们的方法的潜在优势甚至更大。为了证明这一点，我们在真实世界的DNNs、AlexNet和VGG16上进行测量，这些是包含数百万个参数的大型网络。与FALCON相比，我们的框架在这些网络中的性能对于AlexNet来说快了26 33倍，对于VGG16来说快了48 51倍，分别实现了60%和70%的准确率。即使与CRYPTGPU (Tan等人，IEEE 21)相比，我们的框架在这些网络上的性能也分别提高了2.1倍和4.1倍。
papers.title_zh: Adam in Private:具有自适应矩估计的深度神经网络的安全快速训练

papers.title: Privately Connecting Mobility to Infectious Diseases via Applied Cryptography
papers.authors: Alexandros Bampoulidis, Alessandro Bruni, Lukas Helminger, Daniel Kales, Christian Rechberger, Roman Walch
papers.abstract: Recent work has shown that cell phone mobility data has the unique potential to create accurate models for human mobility and consequently the spread of infected diseases [74]. While prior studies have exclusively relied on a mobile network operator’s subscribers’ aggregated data in modelling disease dynamics, it may be preferable to contemplate aggregated mobility data of infected individuals only. Clearly, naively linking mobile phone data with health records would violate privacy by either allowing to track mobility patterns of infected individuals, leak information on who is infected, or both. This work aims to develop a solution that reports the aggregated mobile phone location data of infected individuals while still maintaining compliance with privacy expectations. To achieve privacy, we use homomorphic encryption, validation techniques derived from zero-knowledge proofs, and differential privacy. Our protocol’s open-source implementation can process eight million subscribers in 70 minutes.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近的工作表明，手机移动数据具有独特的潜力，可以为人类移动以及传染病的传播创建准确的模型[74]。虽然先前的研究完全依赖于移动网络运营商的用户的聚合数据来模拟疾病动态，但是可能优选的是仅考虑受感染个体的聚合移动数据。显然，天真地将手机数据与健康记录联系起来会侵犯隐私，因为这可能会允许跟踪受感染个人的移动模式，泄露谁被感染的信息，或者两者都有。这项工作旨在开发一种解决方案，报告受感染个体的聚合移动电话位置数据，同时仍然符合隐私期望。为了实现隐私，我们使用同态加密、从零知识证明导出的验证技术和差分隐私。我们协议的开源实现可以在70分钟内处理800万用户。
papers.title_zh: 通过应用加密技术将移动性与传染病私下联系起来

2021.journals_title: Proceedings on Privacy Enhancing Technologies, Volume 2021

papers.title: Editors' Introduction
