papers.authors: Aaron Johnson, Florian Kerschbaum
papers.abstract: Is there currently a crisis of confidence in psychological science reflecting an unprecedented level of doubt among practitioners about the reliability of research findings in the field? It would certainly appear that there is. These doubts emerged and grew as a series of unhappy events unfolded in 2011: the Diederik Stapel fraud case (see Stroebe, Postmes, & Spears, 2012, this issue), the publication in a major social psychology journal of an article purporting to show evidence of extrasensory perception (Bem, 2011) followed by widespread public mockery (see Galak, LeBoeuf, Nelson, & Simmons, in press; Wagenmakers, Wetzels, Borsboom, & van der Maas, 2011), reports by Wicherts and colleagues that psychologists are often unwilling or unable to share their published data for reanalysis (Wicherts, Bakker, & Molenaar, 2011; see also Wicherts, Borsboom, Kats, & Molenaar, 2006), and the publication of an important article in Psychological Science showing how easily researchers can, in the absence of any real effects, nonetheless obtain statistically significant differences through various questionable research practices (QRPs) such as exploring multiple dependent variables or covariates and only reporting these when they yield significant results (Simmons, Nelson, & Simonsohn, 2011). For those psychologists who expected that the embarrassments of 2011 would soon recede into memory, 2012 offered instead a quick plunge from bad to worse, with new indications of outright fraud in the field of social cognition (Simonsohn, 2012), an article in Psychological Science showing that many psychologists admit to engaging in at least some of the QRPs examined by Simmons and colleagues (John, Loewenstein, & Prelec, 2012), troubling new meta-analytic evidence suggesting that the QRPs described by Simmons and colleagues may even be leaving telltale signs visible in the distribution of p values in the psychological literature (Masicampo & Lalande, in press; Simonsohn, 2012), and an acrimonious dust-up in science magazines and blogs centered around the problems some investigators were having in replicating well-known results from the field of social cognition (Bower, 2012; Yong, 2012). Although the very public problems experienced by psychology over this 2-year period are embarrassing to those of us working in the field, some have found comfort in the fact that, over the same period, similar concerns have been arising across the scientific landscape (triggered by revelations that will be described shortly). Some of the suspected causes of unreplicability, such as publication bias (the tendency to publish only positive findings) have been discussed for years; in fact, the phrase file-drawer problem was first coined by a distinguished psychologist several decades ago (Rosenthal, 1979). However, many have speculated that these problems have been exacerbated in recent years as academia reaps the harvest of a hypercompetitive academic climate and an incentive scheme that provides rich rewards for overselling one’s work and few rewards at all for caution and circumspection (see Giner-Sorolla, 2012, this issue). Equally disturbing, investigators seem to be replicating each others’ work even less often than they did in the past, again presumably reflecting an incentive scheme gone askew (a point discussed in several articles in this issue, e.g., Makel, Plucker, & Hegarty, 2012). The frequency with which errors appear in the psychological literature is not presently known, but a number of facts suggest it might be disturbingly high. Ioannidis (2005) has shown through simple mathematical modeling that any scientific field that ignores replication can easily come to the miserable state wherein (as the title of his most famous article puts it) “most published research findings are false” (see also Ioannidis, 2012, this issue, and Pashler & Harris, 2012, this issue). Meanwhile, reports emerging from cancer research have made such grim scenarios seem more plausible: In 2012, several large pharmaceutical companies revealed that their efforts to replicate exciting preclinical findings from published academic studies in cancer biology were only rarely verifying the original results (Begley & Ellis, 2012; see also Osherovich, 2011; Prinz, Schlange, & Asadullah, 2011).
papers.abstract_zh: 目前心理科学是否出现了信任危机，反映出从业者对该领域研究结果的可靠性产生了前所未有的怀疑？显然是有的。随着2011年一系列不愉快事件的发生，这些怀疑出现了，并有所增长:Diederik Stapel欺诈案(见Stroebe，Postmes，& Spears，2012，这一期)，在一份主要的社会心理学杂志上发表了一篇文章，声称显示了超感知觉的证据(Bem，2011)，随后受到了广泛的公开嘲笑(见Galak，LeBoeuf，Nelson，& Simmons，正在出版中；Wagenmakers，Wetzels，Borsboom，& van der Maas，2011)，Wicherts及其同事报告说，心理学家往往不愿意或不能分享他们发表的数据进行再分析(Wicherts，Bakker，& Molenaar，2011；另见Wicherts，Borsboom，Kats，& Molenaar，2006)，以及发表在《心理科学》上的一篇重要文章，该文章表明，在没有任何实际影响的情况下，研究人员可以通过各种有问题的研究实践(qrp)轻松地获得统计学上的显著差异，如探索多个因变量或协变量，并仅在它们产生显著结果时报告这些结果(Simmons，Nelson，& Simonsohn，2011)。对于那些预计2011年的尴尬将很快消失在记忆中的心理学家来说，2012年反而提供了一个从糟糕到更糟糕的快速跳水，在社会认知领域出现了新的明显的欺诈迹象(Simonsohn，2012)，心理科学中的一篇文章显示，许多心理学家承认至少参与了Simmons及其同事检查的一些快速反应程序(John，Loewenstein，& Prelec，2012)。 令人不安的新荟萃分析证据表明，Simmons及其同事描述的qrp甚至可能在心理学文献中的p值分布中留下明显的迹象(Masicampo & Lalande，出版中； Simonsohn，2012)，科学杂志和博客上围绕一些研究人员在复制社会认知领域的知名结果时遇到的问题展开了激烈的争论(Bower，2012；永，2012)。虽然心理学在这两年中所经历的非常公开的问题令我们这些在该领域工作的人感到尴尬，但一些人已经找到了安慰，因为在同一时期，类似的担忧已经在整个科学领域出现(由即将描述的启示引发)。一些不可复制的可疑原因，如发表偏倚(倾向于只发表积极的发现)已经讨论了多年；事实上，抽屉问题这个短语是由一位杰出的心理学家在几十年前首次提出的(Rosenthal，1979)。然而，许多人推测，这些问题在最近几年已经恶化，因为学术界收获了高度竞争的学术氛围和奖励计划，这种奖励计划为过度销售自己的工作提供了丰厚的奖励，而对谨慎和谨慎却几乎没有奖励(见吉纳-索罗拉，2012年，这一期)。同样令人不安的是，研究人员似乎比过去更少地重复彼此的工作，这可能再次反映了一个倾斜的激励机制(这一点在本期的几篇文章中讨论过，例如，马克尔、普吕克尔和赫加蒂，2012)。错误出现在心理学文献中的频率目前还不清楚，但许多事实表明它可能高得令人不安。约安尼迪斯(2005)通过简单的数学建模表明，任何忽视复制的科学领域都很容易陷入悲惨的境地，其中(正如他最著名的文章的标题所言)“大多数发表的研究结果都是错误的”(另见约安尼迪斯，2012，本期，以及Pashler & Harris，2012，本期)。与此同时，来自癌症研究的报告让这种严峻的情景看起来更加可信:2012年，几家大型制药公司透露，他们在癌症生物学方面复制已发表学术研究中令人兴奋的临床前发现的努力很少验证原始结果(Begley & Ellis，2012；另见Osherovich，2011年；普林茨、施朗格和阿萨杜拉，2011年)。
papers.title_zh: 编辑介绍

papers.title: SGX-MR: Regulating Dataflows for Protecting Access Patterns of Data-Intensive SGX Applications
papers.authors: A. K. M. Mubashwir Alam, Sagar Sharma, Keke Chen
papers.abstract: Abstract Intel SGX has been a popular trusted execution environment (TEE) for protecting the integrity and confidentiality of applications running on untrusted platforms such as cloud. However, the access patterns of SGX-based programs can still be observed by adversaries, which may leak important information for successful attacks. Researchers have been experimenting with Oblivious RAM (ORAM) to address the privacy of access patterns. ORAM is a powerful low-level primitive that provides application-agnostic protection for any I/O operations, however, at a high cost. We find that some application-specific access patterns, such as sequential block I/O, do not provide additional information to adversaries. Others, such as sorting, can be replaced with specific oblivious algorithms that are more efficient than ORAM. The challenge is that developers may need to look into all the details of application-specific access patterns to design suitable solutions, which is time-consuming and error-prone. In this paper, we present the lightweight SGX based MapReduce (SGX-MR) approach that regulates the dataflow of data-intensive SGX applications for easier application-level access-pattern analysis and protection. It uses the MapReduce framework to cover a large class of data-intensive applications, and the entire framework can be implemented with a small memory footprint. With this framework, we have examined the stages of data processing, identified the access patterns that need protection, and designed corresponding efficient protection methods. Our experiments show that SGX-MR based applications are much more efficient than the ORAM-based implementations.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要SGX是一种流行的可信执行环境(TEE ),用于保护运行在不可信平台(如云)上的应用的完整性和机密性。但是，SGX程序的访问模式仍然可以被对手观察到，这可能会泄露成功攻击的重要信息。研究人员一直在试验不经意内存(ORAM)来解决访问模式的隐私问题。ORAM是一个强大的低级原语，它为任何I/O操作提供应用程序不可知的保护，但是代价很高。我们发现，一些特定于应用程序的访问模式，如顺序块I/O，并不能为对手提供额外的信息。其他的，比如排序，可以用比ORAM更有效的特定的遗忘算法来代替。面临的挑战是，开发人员可能需要研究特定于应用程序的访问模式的所有细节，以设计合适的解决方案，这既耗时又容易出错。在本文中，我们提出了基于轻量级SGX的MapReduce (SGX-MR)方法，该方法调节数据密集型SGX应用的数据流，以便更容易地进行应用级访问模式分析和保护。它使用MapReduce框架来覆盖一大类数据密集型应用程序，并且整个框架可以用很小的内存占用来实现。在此框架下，我们检查了数据处理的各个阶段，确定了需要保护的访问模式，并设计了相应的高效保护方法。我们的实验表明，基于SGX-磁共振的应用程序比基于ORAM的实现更有效。
papers.title_zh: SGX-MR:调节数据流以保护数据密集型SGX应用程序的访问模式

papers.title: Controlled Functional Encryption Revisited: Multi-Authority Extensions and Efficient Schemes for Quadratic Functions
papers.authors: Miguel Ambrona, Dario Fiore, Claudio Soriente
papers.abstract: Abstract In a Functional Encryption scheme (FE), a trusted authority enables designated parties to compute specific functions over encrypted data. As such, FE promises to break the tension between industrial interest in the potential of data mining and user concerns around the use of private data. FE allows the authority to decide who can compute and what can be computed, but it does not allow the authority to control which ciphertexts can be mined. This issue was recently addressed by Naveed et al., that introduced so-called Controlled Functional encryption (or C-FE), a cryptographic framework that extends FE and allows the authority to exert fine-grained control on the ciphertexts being mined. In this work we extend C-FE in several directions. First, we distribute the role of (and the trust in) the authority across several parties by defining multi-authority C-FE (or mCFE). Next, we provide an efficient instantiation that enables computation of quadratic functions on inputs provided by multiple data-owners, whereas previous work only provides an instantiation for linear functions over data supplied by a single data-owner and resorts to garbled circuits for more complex functions. Our scheme leverages CCA2 encryption and linearly-homomorphic encryption. We also implement a prototype and use it to showcase the potential of our instantiation.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要在函数加密方案(FE)中，可信机构使指定方能够对加密数据计算特定的函数。因此，FE承诺打破行业对数据挖掘潜力的兴趣和用户对私人数据使用的担忧之间的紧张关系。FE允许权威机构决定谁可以计算和可以计算什么，但是它不允许权威机构控制哪些密文可以被挖掘。Naveed等人最近解决了这个问题，他们引入了所谓的受控函数加密(或C-FE)，这是一个加密框架，它扩展了FE并允许权威机构对正在挖掘的密文进行细粒度控制。在这项工作中，我们在几个方向上扩展了C-FE。首先，我们通过定义多权威机构C-FE(或mCFE)将权威机构的角色(和信任)分布在几方。接下来，我们提供了一种有效的实例化，该实例化使得能够对由多个数据所有者提供的输入计算二次函数，而先前的工作仅针对由单个数据所有者提供的数据提供了线性函数的实例化，并且针对更复杂的函数求助于乱码电路。我们的方案利用CCA2加密和线性同态加密。我们还实现了一个原型，并用它来展示我们实例化的潜力。
papers.title_zh: 受控函数加密再探:二次函数的多权限扩展和有效方案

papers.title: Unveiling Web Fingerprinting in the Wild Via Code Mining and Machine Learning
papers.authors: Valentino Rizzo, Stefano Traverso, Marco Mellia
papers.abstract: Abstract Fueled by advertising companies’ need of accurately tracking users and their online habits, web fingerprinting practice has grown in recent years, with severe implications for users’ privacy. In this paper, we design, engineer and evaluate a methodology which combines the analysis of JavaScript code and machine learning for the automatic detection of web fingerprinters. We apply our methodology on a dataset of more than 400, 000 JavaScript files accessed by about 1, 000 volunteers during a one-month long experiment to observe adoption of fingerprinting in a real scenario. We compare approaches based on both static and dynamic code analysis to automatically detect fingerprinters and show they provide different angles complementing each other. This demonstrates that studies based on either static or dynamic code analysis provide partial view on actual fingerprinting usage in the web. To the best of our knowledge we are the first to perform this comparison with respect to fingerprinting. Our approach achieves 94% accuracy in small decision time. With this we spot more than 840 fingerprinting services, of which 695 are unknown to popular tracker blockers. These include new actual trackers as well as services which use fingerprinting for purposes other than tracking, such as anti-fraud and bot recognition.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要由于广告公司需要准确跟踪用户及其在线习惯，web指纹技术近年来发展迅速，对用户隐私造成了严重影响。在本文中，我们设计、设计和评估了一种结合JavaScript代码分析和机器学习的方法，用于自动检测web指纹。在为期一个月的实验中，我们将我们的方法应用于约1000名志愿者访问的超过400，000个JavaScript文件的数据集，以观察指纹识别在真实场景中的采用。我们比较了基于静态和动态代码分析的方法，以自动检测指纹，并表明它们提供了不同的角度，相互补充。这表明，基于静态或动态代码分析的研究提供了web中实际指纹使用的部分视图。据我们所知，我们是第一个进行指纹比对的公司。我们的方法在很短的决策时间内达到94%的准确率。通过这种方式，我们发现了超过840种指纹识别服务，其中695种不为流行的追踪拦截器所知。这些包括新的实际追踪器以及将指纹用于追踪以外目的的服务，如反欺诈和机器人识别。
papers.title_zh: 通过代码挖掘和机器学习揭示网络指纹

papers.title: Differential Privacy at Risk: Bridging Randomness and Privacy Budget
papers.authors: Ashish Dandekar, Debabrota Basu, Stéphane Bressan
papers.abstract: Abstract The calibration of noise for a privacy-preserving mechanism depends on the sensitivity of the query and the prescribed privacy level. A data steward must make the non-trivial choice of a privacy level that balances the requirements of users and the monetary constraints of the business entity. Firstly, we analyse roles of the sources of randomness, namely the explicit randomness induced by the noise distribution and the implicit randomness induced by the data-generation distribution, that are involved in the design of a privacy-preserving mechanism. The finer analysis enables us to provide stronger privacy guarantees with quantifiable risks. Thus, we propose privacy at risk that is a probabilistic calibration of privacy-preserving mechanisms. We provide a composition theorem that leverages privacy at risk. We instantiate the probabilistic calibration for the Laplace mechanism by providing analytical results. Secondly, we propose a cost model that bridges the gap between the privacy level and the compensation budget estimated by a GDPR compliant business entity. The convexity of the proposed cost model leads to a unique fine-tuning of privacy level that minimises the compensation budget. We show its effectiveness by illustrating a realistic scenario that avoids overestimation of the compensation budget by using privacy at risk for the Laplace mechanism. We quantitatively show that composition using the cost optimal privacy at risk provides stronger privacy guarantee than the classical advanced composition. Although the illustration is specific to the chosen cost model, it naturally extends to any convex cost model. We also provide realistic illustrations of how a data steward uses privacy at risk to balance the trade-off between utility and privacy.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要隐私保护机制的噪声校准取决于查询的敏感性和规定的隐私级别。数据管理员必须做出重要的隐私级别选择，以平衡用户的需求和商业实体的资金约束。首先，我们分析了随机性来源在隐私保护机制设计中的作用，即由噪声分布引起的显性随机性和由数据生成分布引起的隐性随机性。更精细的分析使我们能够以可量化的风险提供更强的隐私保障。因此，我们提出风险隐私是隐私保护机制的概率校准。我们提供了一个利用风险隐私的合成定理。我们通过提供分析结果来实例化拉普拉斯机制的概率校准。第二，我们提出了一个成本模型，它弥补了隐私级别和由符合GDPR的商业实体估计的补偿预算之间的差距。提出的成本模型的凸性导致隐私级别的独特微调，从而最小化补偿预算。我们通过说明一个现实的场景来展示它的有效性，该场景通过使用拉普拉斯机制的风险隐私来避免过高估计补偿预算。我们定量地证明了使用代价最优隐私风险的合成比经典的高级合成提供了更强的隐私保证。尽管图示是特定于所选择的成本模型的，但是它自然地扩展到任何凸成本模型。我们还提供了数据管理员如何使用风险隐私来平衡效用和隐私之间的权衡的真实例子。
papers.title_zh: 不同的隐私风险:弥合随机性和隐私预算

papers.title: On the (Im)Practicality of Adversarial Perturbation for Image Privacy
papers.authors: Arezoo Rajabi, Rakesh B. Bobba, Mike Rosulek, Charles V. Wright, Wu-chi Feng
papers.abstract: Abstract Image hosting platforms are a popular way to store and share images with family members and friends. However, such platforms typically have full access to images raising privacy concerns. These concerns are further exacerbated with the advent of Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) that can be trained on available images to automatically detect and recognize faces with high accuracy. Recently, adversarial perturbations have been proposed as a potential defense against automated recognition and classification of images by CNNs. In this paper, we explore the practicality of adversarial perturbation-based approaches as a privacy defense against automated face recognition. Specifically, we first identify practical requirements for such approaches and then propose two practical adversarial perturbation approaches – (i) learned universal ensemble perturbations (UEP), and (ii) k-randomized transparent image overlays (k-RTIO) that are semantic adversarial perturbations. We demonstrate how users can generate effective transferable perturbations under realistic assumptions with less effort. We evaluate the proposed methods against state-of-theart online and offline face recognition models, Clarifai.com and DeepFace, respectively. Our findings show that UEP and k-RTIO respectively achieve more than 85% and 90% success against face recognition models. Additionally, we explore potential countermeasures that classifiers can use to thwart the proposed defenses. Particularly, we demonstrate one effective countermeasure against UEP.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象图像托管平台是一种与家人和朋友存储和分享图像的流行方式。然而，这种平台通常可以完全访问图像，这引起了隐私问题。随着卷积神经网络(CNN)的出现，这些担忧进一步加剧，卷积神经网络可以在可用图像上进行训练，以高精度自动检测和识别人脸。最近，对抗性扰动被认为是对CNN图像自动识别和分类的一种潜在防御。在本文中，我们探索了基于对抗性扰动的方法作为自动人脸识别隐私防御的实用性。具体来说，我们首先确定了这种方法的实际要求，然后提出了两种实际的敌对扰动方法——( I)学习通用集成扰动(UEP ),( ii)语义敌对扰动的k-随机化透明图像覆盖(k-RTIO)。我们展示了用户如何在现实的假设下以较少的努力产生有效的可转移扰动。我们分别针对最新的在线和离线人脸识别模型Clarifai.com和DeepFace对所提出的方法进行了评估。我们的研究结果表明，UEP和k-RTIO分别取得了超过85%和90%的人脸识别模型的成功。此外，我们探讨了分类器可以用来挫败拟议防御的潜在对策。特别地，我们展示了一个针对UEP的有效对策。
papers.title_zh: 图像隐私对抗性扰动的(不)实用性

papers.title: SoK: Privacy-Preserving Reputation Systems
papers.authors: Stan Gurtler, Ian Goldberg
papers.abstract: Abstract Trust and user-generated feedback have become increasingly vital to the normal functioning of the modern internet. However, deployed systems that currently incorporate such feedback do not guarantee users much in the way of privacy, despite a wide swath of research on how to do so spanning over 15 years. Meanwhile, research on systems that maintain user privacy while helping them to track and update each others’ reputations has failed to standardize terminology, or converge on what privacy guarantees should be important. Too often, this leads to misunderstandings of the tradeoffs underpinning design decisions. Further, key insights made in some approaches to designing such systems have not circulated to other approaches, leaving open significant opportunity for new research directions. This SoK investigates 42 systems describing privacy-preserving reputation systems from 2003–2019 in order to organize previous work and suggest directions for future work. Our three key contributions are the systematization of this body of research, the detailing of the tradeoffs implied by overarching design choices, and the identification of underresearched areas that provide promising opportunities for future work.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要信任和用户反馈对于现代互联网的正常运行变得越来越重要。然而，目前采用这种反馈的部署系统并不能保证用户的隐私，尽管15年来对如何做到这一点进行了大量的研究。与此同时，在帮助用户跟踪和更新彼此声誉的同时维护用户隐私的系统研究未能实现术语标准化，也未能就哪些隐私保障应该是重要的达成一致。这往往会导致对设计决策所依据的权衡的误解。此外，在设计这种系统的一些方法中取得的关键见解没有传播到其他方法，为新的研究方向留下了重要的机会。本SoK调查了2003年至2019年描述隐私保护声誉系统的42个系统，以组织以前的工作并为未来的工作提出建议。我们的三个主要贡献是研究主体的系统化，总体设计选择所隐含的权衡的详细说明，以及为未来工作提供有希望的机会的未充分研究的领域的识别。
papers.title_zh: SoK:保护隐私的声誉系统

papers.title: Scaling up Differentially Private Deep Learning with Fast Per-Example Gradient Clipping
papers.authors: Jaewoo Lee, Daniel Kifer
papers.abstract: Abstract Recent work on Renyi Differential Privacy has shown the feasibility of applying differential privacy to deep learning tasks. Despite their promise, however, differentially private deep networks often lag far behind their non-private counterparts in accuracy, showing the need for more research in model architectures, optimizers, etc. One of the barriers to this expanded research is the training time — often orders of magnitude larger than training non-private networks. The reason for this slowdown is a crucial privacy-related step called “per-example gradient clipping” whose naive implementation undoes the benefits of batch training with GPUs. By analyzing the back-propagation equations we derive new methods for per-example gradient clipping that are compatible with auto-differeniation (e.g., in Py-Torch and TensorFlow) and provide better GPU utilization. Our implementation in PyTorch showed significant training speed-ups (by factors of 54x - 94x for training various models with batch sizes of 128). These techniques work for a variety of architectural choices including convolutional layers, recurrent networks, attention, residual blocks, etc.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要最近关于Renyi差分隐私的工作显示了将差分隐私应用于深度学习任务的可行性。然而，尽管它们很有前途，差分私有深度网络在准确性上往往远远落后于非私有深度网络，这表明需要在模型架构、优化器等方面进行更多的研究。这种扩展研究的障碍之一是训练时间——通常比训练非私有网络大几个数量级。速度下降的原因是一个关键的隐私相关步骤，称为“每示例梯度裁剪”，其天真的实现抵消了GPU批量训练的好处。通过分析反向传播方程，我们推导出与自动微分(例如，Py-Torch和TensorFlow)兼容并提供更好的GPU利用率的每示例梯度裁剪的新方法。我们在PyTorch中的实现显示了显著的训练速度提升(对于训练批量为128的各种模型，提升了54-94倍)。这些技术适用于各种架构选择，包括卷积层、递归网络、注意力、剩余块等。
papers.title_zh: 利用快速逐示例梯度裁剪扩展差分私有深度学习

papers.title: Real-time Analysis of Privacy-(un)aware IoT Applications
papers.authors: Leonardo Babun, Z. Berkay Celik, Patrick D. McDaniel, A. Selcuk Uluagac
papers.abstract: Abstract Abstract: Users trust IoT apps to control and automate their smart devices. These apps necessarily have access to sensitive data to implement their functionality. However, users lack visibility into how their sensitive data is used, and often blindly trust the app developers. In this paper, we present IoTWATcH, a dynamic analysis tool that uncovers the privacy risks of IoT apps in real-time. We have designed and built IoTWATcH through a comprehensive IoT privacy survey addressing the privacy needs of users. IoTWATCH operates in four phases: (a) it provides users with an interface to specify their privacy preferences at app install time, (b) it adds extra logic to an app’s source code to collect both IoT data and their recipients at runtime, (c) it uses Natural Language Processing (NLP) techniques to construct a model that classifies IoT app data into intuitive privacy labels, and (d) it informs the users when their preferences do not match the privacy labels, exposing sensitive data leaks to users. We implemented and evaluated IoTWATcH on real IoT applications. Specifically, we analyzed 540 IoT apps to train the NLP model and evaluate its effectiveness. IoTWATcH yields an average 94.25% accuracy in classifying IoT app data into privacy labels with only 105 ms additional latency to an app’s execution.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要摘要:用户信任物联网应用来控制和自动化他们的智能设备。这些应用程序必须能够访问敏感数据来实现其功能。然而，用户对他们的敏感数据是如何被使用的缺乏可见性，并且经常盲目地信任应用开发者。在本文中，我们介绍了IoTWATcH，这是一种动态分析工具，可以实时揭示物联网应用的隐私风险。我们通过全面的物联网隐私调查设计并构建了IoTWATcH，以满足用户的隐私需求。IoTWATCH分为四个阶段:(a)它为用户提供一个界面，以在应用程序安装时指定他们的隐私偏好；(b)它在应用程序的源代码中添加额外的逻辑，以在运行时收集物联网数据及其接收者；(c)它使用自然语言处理(NLP)技术来构建一个模型，将物联网应用程序数据分类到直观的隐私标签中；以及(d)当用户的偏好与隐私标签不匹配时，它会通知用户，从而将敏感数据泄露暴露给用户。我们在真实的物联网应用上实现并评估了IoTWATcH。具体来说，我们分析了540个物联网应用程序来训练NLP模型并评估其有效性。IoTWATcH在将物联网应用数据分类到隐私标签方面的平均准确率为94.25%，应用执行的额外延迟仅为105毫秒。
papers.title_zh: 隐私感知(不感知)物联网应用的实时分析

papers.title: Secure training of decision trees with continuous attributes
papers.authors: Mark Abspoel, Daniel Escudero, Nikolaj Volgushev
papers.abstract: Abstract We apply multiparty computation (MPC) techniques to show, given a database that is secret-shared among multiple mutually distrustful parties, how the parties may obliviously construct a decision tree based on the secret data. We consider data with continuous attributes (i.e., coming from a large domain), and develop a secure version of a learning algorithm similar to the C4.5 or CART algorithms. Previous MPC-based work only focused on decision tree learning with discrete attributes (De Hoogh et al. 2014). Our starting point is to apply an existing generic MPC protocol to a standard decision tree learning algorithm, which we then optimize in several ways. We exploit the fact that even if we allow the data to have continuous values, which a priori might require fixed or floating point representations, the output of the tree learning algorithm only depends on the relative ordering of the data. By obliviously sorting the data we reduce the number of comparisons needed per node to O(N log2N) from the naive O(N2), where N is the number of training records in the dataset, thus making the algorithm feasible for larger datasets. This does however introduce a problem when duplicate values occur in the dataset, but we manage to overcome this problem with a relatively cheap subprotocol. We show a procedure to convert a sorting network into a permutation network of smaller complexity, resulting in a round complexity of O(log N) per layer in the tree. We implement our algorithm in the MP-SPDZ framework and benchmark our implementation for both passive and active three-party computation using arithmetic modulo 264. We apply our implementation to a large scale medical dataset of ≈ 290 000 rows using random forests, and thus demonstrate practical feasibility of using MPC for privacy-preserving machine learning based on decision trees for large datasets.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要我们应用多方计算(MPC)技术来展示，给定一个在多个互不信任的参与方之间秘密共享的数据库，参与方如何基于秘密数据来构建决策树。我们考虑具有连续属性的数据(即，来自大的域)，并开发类似于C4.5或CART算法的学习算法的安全版本。先前基于MPC的工作仅关注具有离散属性的决策树学习(De Hoogh et al. 2014)。我们的出发点是将现有的通用MPC协议应用于标准的决策树学习算法，然后以几种方式对其进行优化。我们利用了这样一个事实，即即使我们允许数据具有连续的值，先验地可能需要固定或浮点表示，树学习算法的输出仅取决于数据的相对排序。通过对数据进行遗忘排序，我们将每个节点所需的比较次数从朴素的O(N2)减少到O(N log2N)，其中N是数据集中训练记录的数量，从而使该算法对于更大的数据集可行。然而，当数据集中出现重复值时，这确实会引入一个问题，但是我们设法用一个相对便宜的子协议来克服这个问题。我们展示了将排序网络转换成更小复杂度的置换网络的过程，导致树中每层的轮复杂度为O(log N)。我们在MP-SPDZ框架中实现了我们的算法，并使用模264算法对被动和主动三方计算的实现进行了基准测试。我们使用随机森林将我们的实现应用于大约290 000行的大规模医疗数据集，从而证明了使用MPC进行基于大数据集决策树的隐私保护机器学习的实际可行性。
papers.title_zh: 连续属性决策树的安全训练

papers.title: Falcon: Honest-Majority Maliciously Secure Framework for Private Deep Learning
papers.authors: Sameer Wagh, Shruti Tople, Fabrice Benhamouda, Eyal Kushilevitz, Prateek Mittal, Tal Rabin
papers.abstract: Abstract We propose Falcon, an end-to-end 3-party protocol for efficient private training and inference of large machine learning models. Falcon presents four main advantages – (i) It is highly expressive with support for high capacity networks such as VGG16 (ii) it supports batch normalization which is important for training complex networks such as AlexNet (iii) Falcon guarantees security with abort against malicious adversaries, assuming an honest majority (iv) Lastly, Falcon presents new theoretical insights for protocol design that make it highly efficient and allow it to outperform existing secure deep learning solutions. Compared to prior art for private inference, we are about 8× faster than SecureNN (PETS’19) on average and comparable to ABY3 (CCS’18). We are about 16 − 200× more communication efficient than either of these. For private training, we are about 6× faster than SecureNN, 4.4× faster than ABY3 and about 2−60× more communication efficient. Our experiments in the WAN setting show that over large networks and datasets, compute operations dominate the overall latency of MPC, as opposed to the communication.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要我们提出了Falcon，一种用于大型机器学习模型的高效私人训练和推理的端到端三方协议。Falcon提供了四个主要优势——( I)它具有高度的表达能力，支持高容量网络，如vgg 16 ;( ii)它支持批量标准化，这对训练复杂网络，如AlexNet很重要;( iii) Falcon保证安全，防止恶意对手中止，假设诚实的大多数(iv)最后，Falcon为协议设计提供了新的理论见解，使其高效，并使其优于现有的安全深度学习解决方案。与用于私有推断的现有技术相比，我们平均比SecureNN (PETS'19)快大约8倍，并且与ABY3 (CCS'18)相当。我们的通信效率比这两者都要高16200倍。对于私人培训，我们比SecureNN快6倍，比ABY3快4.4倍，通信效率高260倍。我们在WAN环境中的实验表明，在大型网络和数据集上，计算操作主导了MPC的整体延迟，而不是通信。
papers.title_zh: Falcon:诚实多数恶意安全的私有深度学习框架

papers.title: The Audio Auditor: User-Level Membership Inference in Internet of Things Voice Services
papers.authors: Yuantian Miao, Minhui Xue, Chao Chen, Lei Pan, Jun Zhang, Benjamin Zi Hao Zhao, Dali Kaafar, Yang Xiang
papers.abstract: Abstract With the rapid development of deep learning techniques, the popularity of voice services implemented on various Internet of Things (IoT) devices is ever increasing. In this paper, we examine user-level membership inference in the problem space of voice services, by designing an audio auditor to verify whether a specific user had unwillingly contributed audio used to train an automatic speech recognition (ASR) model under strict black-box access. With user representation of the input audio data and their corresponding translated text, our trained auditor is effective in user-level audit. We also observe that the auditor trained on specific data can be generalized well regardless of the ASR model architecture. We validate the auditor on ASR models trained with LSTM, RNNs, and GRU algorithms on two state-of-the-art pipelines, the hybrid ASR system and the end-to-end ASR system. Finally, we conduct a real-world trial of our auditor on iPhone Siri, achieving an overall accuracy exceeding 80%. We hope the methodology developed in this paper and findings can inform privacy advocates to overhaul IoT privacy.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要随着深度学习技术的快速发展，在各种物联网设备上实现的语音服务越来越受欢迎。在本文中，我们通过设计一个音频审计器来验证特定用户是否不情愿地提供了用于在严格黑盒访问下训练自动语音识别(ASR)模型的音频，来检验语音服务问题空间中的用户级成员推理。利用输入音频数据及其相应翻译文本的用户表示，我们训练有素的审计员在用户级审计中是有效的。我们还观察到，不管ASR模型架构如何，在特定数据上训练的审计员可以被很好地一般化。我们在混合ASR系统和端到端ASR系统这两个最先进的管道上，用LSTM、RNNs和GRU算法训练的ASR模型来验证审计员。最后，我们在iPhone Siri上对我们的审计员进行了真实世界的测试，总体准确率超过80%。我们希望本文中开发的方法和研究结果可以通知隐私倡导者彻底检查物联网隐私。
papers.title_zh: 音频审计器:物联网语音服务中的用户级成员推理

papers.title: SoK: Managing Longitudinal Privacy of Publicly Shared Personal Online Data
papers.authors: Theodor Schnitzler, Muhammad Shujaat Mirza, Markus Dürmuth, Christina Pöpper
papers.abstract: Abstract Over the past decade, research has explored managing the availability of shared personal online data, with particular focus on longitudinal aspects of privacy. Yet, there is no taxonomy that takes user perspective and technical approaches into account. In this work, we systematize research on longitudinal privacy management of publicly shared personal online data from these two perspectives: user studies capturing users’ interactions related to the availability of their online data and technical proposals limiting the availability of data. Following a systematic approach, we derive conflicts between these two sides that have not yet been addressed appropriately, resulting in a list of challenging open problems to be tackled by future research. While limitations of data availability in proposed approaches and real systems are mostly time-based, users’ desired models are rather complex, taking into account content, audience, and the context in which data has been shared. Our systematic evaluation reveals interesting challenges broadly categorized by expiration conditions, data co-ownership, user awareness, and security and trust.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要在过去的十年中，研究探索了管理共享的个人在线数据的可用性，特别关注隐私的纵向方面。然而，没有一种分类法将用户视角和技术方法考虑在内。在这项工作中，我们从两个角度对公开共享的个人在线数据的纵向隐私管理进行了系统化研究:捕捉用户与其在线数据可用性相关的交互的用户研究和限制数据可用性的技术建议。遵循一个系统的方法，我们得到了这两个方面之间的冲突，还没有得到适当的解决，导致了一系列具有挑战性的开放问题，以解决未来的研究。虽然在建议的方法和实际系统中数据可用性的限制主要是基于时间的，但是考虑到内容、受众和数据共享的环境，用户期望的模型相当复杂。我们的系统评估揭示了一些有趣的挑战，这些挑战大致分为过期条件、数据共同所有权、用户意识以及安全性和信任度。
papers.title_zh: SoK:管理公开共享的个人在线数据的纵向隐私

papers.title: Editors' Introduction
papers.authors: Aaron Johnson, Florian Kerschbaum
papers.abstract: Is there currently a crisis of confidence in psychological science reflecting an unprecedented level of doubt among practitioners about the reliability of research findings in the field? It would certainly appear that there is. These doubts emerged and grew as a series of unhappy events unfolded in 2011: the Diederik Stapel fraud case (see Stroebe, Postmes, & Spears, 2012, this issue), the publication in a major social psychology journal of an article purporting to show evidence of extrasensory perception (Bem, 2011) followed by widespread public mockery (see Galak, LeBoeuf, Nelson, & Simmons, in press; Wagenmakers, Wetzels, Borsboom, & van der Maas, 2011), reports by Wicherts and colleagues that psychologists are often unwilling or unable to share their published data for reanalysis (Wicherts, Bakker, & Molenaar, 2011; see also Wicherts, Borsboom, Kats, & Molenaar, 2006), and the publication of an important article in Psychological Science showing how easily researchers can, in the absence of any real effects, nonetheless obtain statistically significant differences through various questionable research practices (QRPs) such as exploring multiple dependent variables or covariates and only reporting these when they yield significant results (Simmons, Nelson, & Simonsohn, 2011). For those psychologists who expected that the embarrassments of 2011 would soon recede into memory, 2012 offered instead a quick plunge from bad to worse, with new indications of outright fraud in the field of social cognition (Simonsohn, 2012), an article in Psychological Science showing that many psychologists admit to engaging in at least some of the QRPs examined by Simmons and colleagues (John, Loewenstein, & Prelec, 2012), troubling new meta-analytic evidence suggesting that the QRPs described by Simmons and colleagues may even be leaving telltale signs visible in the distribution of p values in the psychological literature (Masicampo & Lalande, in press; Simonsohn, 2012), and an acrimonious dust-up in science magazines and blogs centered around the problems some investigators were having in replicating well-known results from the field of social cognition (Bower, 2012; Yong, 2012). Although the very public problems experienced by psychology over this 2-year period are embarrassing to those of us working in the field, some have found comfort in the fact that, over the same period, similar concerns have been arising across the scientific landscape (triggered by revelations that will be described shortly). Some of the suspected causes of unreplicability, such as publication bias (the tendency to publish only positive findings) have been discussed for years; in fact, the phrase file-drawer problem was first coined by a distinguished psychologist several decades ago (Rosenthal, 1979). However, many have speculated that these problems have been exacerbated in recent years as academia reaps the harvest of a hypercompetitive academic climate and an incentive scheme that provides rich rewards for overselling one’s work and few rewards at all for caution and circumspection (see Giner-Sorolla, 2012, this issue). Equally disturbing, investigators seem to be replicating each others’ work even less often than they did in the past, again presumably reflecting an incentive scheme gone askew (a point discussed in several articles in this issue, e.g., Makel, Plucker, & Hegarty, 2012). The frequency with which errors appear in the psychological literature is not presently known, but a number of facts suggest it might be disturbingly high. Ioannidis (2005) has shown through simple mathematical modeling that any scientific field that ignores replication can easily come to the miserable state wherein (as the title of his most famous article puts it) “most published research findings are false” (see also Ioannidis, 2012, this issue, and Pashler & Harris, 2012, this issue). Meanwhile, reports emerging from cancer research have made such grim scenarios seem more plausible: In 2012, several large pharmaceutical companies revealed that their efforts to replicate exciting preclinical findings from published academic studies in cancer biology were only rarely verifying the original results (Begley & Ellis, 2012; see also Osherovich, 2011; Prinz, Schlange, & Asadullah, 2011).
papers.abstract_zh: 目前心理科学是否出现了信任危机，反映出从业者对该领域研究结果的可靠性产生了前所未有的怀疑？显然是有的。随着2011年一系列不愉快事件的发生，这些怀疑出现了，并有所增长:Diederik Stapel欺诈案(见Stroebe，Postmes，& Spears，2012，这一期)，在一份主要的社会心理学杂志上发表了一篇文章，声称显示了超感知觉的证据(Bem，2011)，随后受到了广泛的公开嘲笑(见Galak，LeBoeuf，Nelson，& Simmons，正在出版中；Wagenmakers，Wetzels，Borsboom，& van der Maas，2011)，Wicherts及其同事报告说，心理学家往往不愿意或不能分享他们发表的数据进行再分析(Wicherts，Bakker，& Molenaar，2011；另见Wicherts，Borsboom，Kats，& Molenaar，2006)，以及发表在《心理科学》上的一篇重要文章，该文章表明，在没有任何实际影响的情况下，研究人员可以通过各种有问题的研究实践(qrp)轻松地获得统计学上的显著差异，如探索多个因变量或协变量，并仅在它们产生显著结果时报告这些结果(Simmons，Nelson，& Simonsohn，2011)。对于那些预计2011年的尴尬将很快消失在记忆中的心理学家来说，2012年反而提供了一个从糟糕到更糟糕的快速跳水，在社会认知领域出现了新的明显的欺诈迹象(Simonsohn，2012)，心理科学中的一篇文章显示，许多心理学家承认至少参与了Simmons及其同事检查的一些快速反应程序(John，Loewenstein，& Prelec，2012)。 令人不安的新荟萃分析证据表明，Simmons及其同事描述的qrp甚至可能在心理学文献中的p值分布中留下明显的迹象(Masicampo & Lalande，出版中； Simonsohn，2012)，科学杂志和博客上围绕一些研究人员在复制社会认知领域的知名结果时遇到的问题展开了激烈的争论(Bower，2012；永，2012)。虽然心理学在这两年中所经历的非常公开的问题令我们这些在该领域工作的人感到尴尬，但一些人已经找到了安慰，因为在同一时期，类似的担忧已经在整个科学领域出现(由即将描述的启示引发)。一些不可复制的可疑原因，如发表偏倚(倾向于只发表积极的发现)已经讨论了多年；事实上，抽屉问题这个短语是由一位杰出的心理学家在几十年前首次提出的(Rosenthal，1979)。然而，许多人推测，这些问题在最近几年已经恶化，因为学术界收获了高度竞争的学术氛围和奖励计划，这种奖励计划为过度销售自己的工作提供了丰厚的奖励，而对谨慎和谨慎却几乎没有奖励(见吉纳-索罗拉，2012年，这一期)。同样令人不安的是，研究人员似乎比过去更少地重复彼此的工作，这可能再次反映了一个倾斜的激励机制(这一点在本期的几篇文章中讨论过，例如，马克尔、普吕克尔和赫加蒂，2012)。错误出现在心理学文献中的频率目前还不清楚，但许多事实表明它可能高得令人不安。约安尼迪斯(2005)通过简单的数学建模表明，任何忽视复制的科学领域都很容易陷入悲惨的境地，其中(正如他最著名的文章的标题所言)“大多数发表的研究结果都是错误的”(另见约安尼迪斯，2012，本期，以及Pashler & Harris，2012，本期)。与此同时，来自癌症研究的报告让这种严峻的情景看起来更加可信:2012年，几家大型制药公司透露，他们在癌症生物学方面复制已发表学术研究中令人兴奋的临床前发现的努力很少验证原始结果(Begley & Ellis，2012；另见Osherovich，2011年；普林茨、施朗格和阿萨杜拉，2011年)。
papers.title_zh: 编辑介绍

papers.title: Privacy-Preserving Multiple Tensor Factorization for Synthesizing Large-Scale Location Traces with Cluster-Specific Features
papers.authors: Takao Murakami, Koki Hamada, Yusuke Kawamoto, Takuma Hatano
papers.abstract: Abstract With the widespread use of LBSs (Location-based Services), synthesizing location traces plays an increasingly important role in analyzing spatial big data while protecting user privacy. In particular, a synthetic trace that preserves a feature specific to a cluster of users (e.g., those who commute by train, those who go shopping) is important for various geo-data analysis tasks and for providing a synthetic location dataset. Although location synthesizers have been widely studied, existing synthesizers do not provide su˚cient utility, privacy, or scalability, hence are not practical for large-scale location traces. To overcome this issue, we propose a novel location synthesizer called PPMTF (Privacy-Preserving Multiple Tensor Factorization). We model various statistical features of the original traces by a transition-count tensor and a visit-count tensor. We factorize these two tensors simultaneously via multiple tensor factorization, and train factor matrices via posterior sampling. Then we synthesize traces from reconstructed tensors, and perform a plausible deniability test for a synthetic trace. We comprehensively evaluate PPMTF using two datasets. Our experimental results show that PPMTF preserves various statistical features including cluster-specific features, protects user privacy, and synthesizes large-scale location traces in practical time. PPMTF also significantly outperforms the state-of-theart methods in terms of utility and scalability at the same level of privacy.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要随着LBSs(基于位置的服务)的广泛使用，合成位置轨迹在分析空间大数据的同时保护用户隐私方面发挥着越来越重要的作用。特别是，保留特定于一群用户(例如，乘火车上下班的人、购物的人)的要素的合成追踪对于各种地理数据分析任务和提供合成位置数据集非常重要。尽管位置合成器已经得到了广泛的研究，但是现有的合成器不能提供足够的实用性、保密性或可扩展性，因此对于大规模的位置跟踪是不实用的。为了克服这个问题，我们提出了一种新的位置合成器称为PPMTF(隐私保护多重张量分解)。我们通过转移计数张量和访问计数张量来模拟原始轨迹的各种统计特征。我们通过多重张量分解同时分解这两个张量，并通过后验采样训练因子矩阵。然后，我们从重建的张量合成道，并对合成道进行似是而非的可否认性测试。我们使用两个数据集全面评估PPMTF。我们的实验结果表明，PPMTF保留了包括特定聚类特征在内的各种统计特征，保护了用户隐私，并在实际时间内合成了大规模的位置轨迹。在相同的隐私级别下，PPMTF在实用性和可伸缩性方面也明显优于最先进的方法。
papers.title_zh: 用于合成具有特定聚类特征的大规模位置轨迹的隐私保护多重张量分解

papers.title: "Warn Them" or "Just Block Them"?: Investigating Privacy Concerns Among Older and Working Age Adults
papers.authors: Hirak Ray, Flynn Wolf, Ravi Kuber, Adam J. Aviv
papers.abstract: Abstract Prior work suggests that older adults are less aware of potential digital privacy risks compared to younger groups. We seek to expand on these findings by using drawmetrics with 20 older adults (60+) to visualize their experiences with digital privacy via drawing sessions. We further compared older adults with 20 adults of working age (18-59) with the goal of identifying both overlapping concerns and key differences that may be missed when viewing each group in isolation. We extended our evaluation with a survey with questions and themes derived from open-coding of the drawn images and confirmed three key differences between the age groups. These include older adults perceiving a greater threat from using online banking and e-commerce compared to working age adults, older adults exhibiting greater levels of concern about global scale threats, and working age adults showing more privacy-related concern regarding social media. Our findings can be used to potentially tailor applications to better accommodate privacy concerns for older adults.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要先前的工作表明，与年轻群体相比，老年人对潜在的数字隐私风险意识较低。我们试图通过对20名老年人(60岁以上)使用drawmetrics来扩展这些发现，通过绘画会议来可视化他们的数字隐私体验。我们进一步比较了老年人和20名工作年龄(18-59岁)的成年人，目的是确定重叠的关注点和在孤立地观察每一组时可能忽略的关键差异。我们通过一项调查扩展了我们的评估，该调查的问题和主题来自于所绘制图像的开放编码，并确认了年龄组之间的三个关键差异。其中包括，与工作年龄的成年人相比，老年人认为使用网上银行和电子商务的威胁更大，老年人对全球范围的威胁表现出更大程度的担忧，工作年龄的成年人对社交媒体表现出更多与隐私相关的担忧。我们的发现可以用于潜在的定制应用程序，以更好地适应老年人的隐私问题。
papers.title_zh: “警告他们”还是“只是阻止他们”？:调查老年人和工作年龄成人的隐私问题

papers.title: Website Fingerprinting in the Age of QUIC
papers.authors: Jean-Pierre Smith, Prateek Mittal, Adrian Perrig
papers.abstract: Abstract With the meteoric rise of the QUIC protocol, the supremacy of TCP as the de facto transport protocol underlying web traffic will soon cease. HTTP/3, the next version of the HTTP protocol, will not support TCP. Current website-fingerprinting literature has ignored the introduction of this new protocol to all modern browsers. In this work, we investigate whether classifiers trained in the TCP setting generalise to QUIC traces, whether QUIC is inherently more difficult to fingerprint than TCP, how feature importance changes between these protocols, and how to jointly classify QUIC and TCP traces. Experiments using four state-of-theart website-fingerprinting classifiers and our combined QUIC-TCP dataset of ~117,000 traces show that while QUIC is not inherently more difficult to fingerprint than TCP, TCP-trained classifiers may fail to detect up to 96% of QUIC visits to monitored URLs. Furthermore, classifiers that take advantage of the common information between QUIC and TCP traces for the same URL may outperform ensembles of protocol-specific classifiers in limited data settings.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要随着QUIC协议的迅速崛起，TCP作为web流量基础的事实上的传输协议的优势将很快消失。HTTP协议的下一个版本HTTP/3将不支持TCP。当前的网站指纹文献忽略了这种新协议对所有现代浏览器的引入。在这项工作中，我们研究了在TCP环境中训练的分类器是否适用于QUIC轨迹，QUIC是否比TCP更难以指纹识别，这些协议之间的特征重要性如何变化，以及如何联合分类QUIC和TCP轨迹。使用四个最先进的网站指纹分类器和我们的大约117，000个轨迹的组合QUIC-TCP数据集的实验表明，虽然QUIC本质上并不比TCP更难进行指纹识别，但TCP训练的分类器可能无法检测到高达96%的QUIC访问监控的URL。此外，在有限的数据设置中，利用相同URL的QUIC和TCP踪迹之间的公共信息的分类器可能优于特定于协议的分类器的整体。
papers.title_zh: QUIC时代的网站指纹

papers.title: EL PASSO: Efficient and Lightweight Privacy-preserving Single Sign On
papers.authors: Zhiyi Zhang, Michal Król, Alberto Sonnino, Lixia Zhang, Etienne Rivière
papers.abstract: Abstract Anonymous credentials are a solid foundation for privacy-preserving Single Sign-On (SSO). They enable unlinkable authentication across domains and allow users to prove their identity without revealing more than necessary. Unfortunately, anonymous credentials schemes remain difficult to use and complex to deploy. They require installation and use of complex software at the user side, suffer from poor performance, and do not support security features that are now common, such as two-factor authentication, secret recovery, or support for multiple devices. In contrast, Open ID Connect (OIDC), the de facto standard for SSO is widely deployed and used despite its lack of concern for users’ privacy. We present EL PASSO, a privacy-preserving SSO system based on anonymous credentials that does not trade security for usability, and can be incrementally deployed at scale alongside Open ID Connect with no significant changes to end-user operations. EL PASSO client-side operations leverage a WebAssembly module that can be downloaded on the fly and cached by users’ browsers, requiring no prior software installation or specific hardware. We develop automated procedures for managing cryptographic material, supporting multi-device support, secret recovery, and privacy-preserving two-factor authentication using only the built-in features of common Web browsers. Our implementation using PS Signatures achieves 39x to 180x lower computational cost than previous anonymous credentials schemes, similar or lower sign-on latency than Open ID Connect and is amenable for use on mobile devices.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象匿名凭证是隐私保护单点登录(SSO)的坚实基础。它们支持跨域的不可链接的身份验证，并允许用户证明他们的身份，而无需透露不必要的信息。不幸的是，匿名凭证方案仍然难以使用并且部署复杂。它们需要在用户端安装和使用复杂的软件，性能很差，并且不支持现在常见的安全功能，例如双因素认证、秘密恢复或对多种设备的支持。相比之下，开放式身份连接(OIDC)，SSO的事实上的标准，被广泛部署和使用，尽管它缺乏对用户隐私的关注。我们提出了EL PASSO，这是一个基于匿名凭证的隐私保护SSO系统，它不以安全性换取可用性，并且可以与Open ID Connect一起大规模增量部署，而不会对最终用户操作产生重大影响。EL PASSO客户端操作利用一个WebAssembly模块，该模块可以动态下载并由用户的浏览器缓存，不需要预先安装软件或特定的硬件。我们开发了用于管理加密材料、支持多设备支持、秘密恢复和隐私保护双因素身份验证的自动化程序，仅使用普通Web浏览器的内置功能。我们使用PS签名的实现实现了比以前的匿名证书方案低39到180倍的计算成本，与Open ID Connect相似或更低的登录延迟，并且适合在移动设备上使用。
papers.title_zh: EL PASSO:高效和轻量级的隐私保护单点登录

papers.title: Automated Extraction and Presentation of Data Practices in Privacy Policies
papers.authors: Duc Bui, Kang G. Shin, Jong-Min Choi, Junbum Shin
papers.abstract: Abstract Privacy policies are documents required by law and regulations that notify users of the collection, use, and sharing of their personal information on services or applications. While the extraction of personal data objects and their usage thereon is one of the fundamental steps in their automated analysis, it remains challenging due to the complex policy statements written in legal (vague) language. Prior work is limited by small/generated datasets and manually created rules. We formulate the extraction of fine-grained personal data phrases and the corresponding data collection or sharing practices as a sequence-labeling problem that can be solved by an entity-recognition model. We create a large dataset with 4.1k sentences (97k tokens) and 2.6k annotated fine-grained data practices from 30 real-world privacy policies to train and evaluate neural networks. We present a fully automated system, called PI-Extract, which accurately extracts privacy practices by a neural model and outperforms, by a large margin, strong rule-based baselines. We conduct a user study on the effects of data practice annotation which highlights and describes the data practices extracted by PI-Extract to help users better understand privacy-policy documents. Our experimental evaluation results show that the annotation significantly improves the users’ reading comprehension of policy texts, as indicated by a 26.6% increase in the average total reading score.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要隐私政策是法律和法规要求的文档，用于通知用户其个人信息在服务或应用程序上的收集、使用和共享。虽然个人数据对象的提取及其在其上的使用是其自动化分析中的基本步骤之一，但由于以法律(模糊)语言编写的复杂政策声明，它仍然具有挑战性。先前的工作受限于小型/生成的数据集和手动创建的规则。我们将细粒度个人数据短语的提取以及相应的数据收集或共享实践公式化为一个序列标记问题，该问题可以通过实体识别模型来解决。我们创建了一个大型数据集，其中包含4.1k个句子(97k个标记)和2.6k个来自30个真实世界隐私政策的带注释的细粒度数据实践，以训练和评估神经网络。我们提出了一个完全自动化的系统，称为PI-Extract，它通过一个神经模型准确地提取隐私实践，并远远超过强大的基于规则的基线。我们进行了一项关于数据实践注释效果的用户研究，该研究强调并描述了PI-Extract提取的数据实践，以帮助用户更好地理解隐私政策文档。我们的实验评估结果表明，注释显著提高了用户对政策文本的阅读理解，平均总阅读分数提高了26.6%。
papers.title_zh: 隐私政策中数据实践的自动提取和呈现

papers.title: Efficient homomorphic evaluation of k-NN classifiers
papers.authors: Martin Zuber, Renaud Sirdey
papers.abstract: Abstract We design and implement an efficient, secure, homomorphic k-Nearest Neighbours determination algorithm, to be used for regression or classification over private data. Our algorithm runs in quadratic complexity with regard to the size of the database but is the only one in the literature to make the secure determination completely non-interactively. We show that our secure algorithm is both efficient and accurate when applied to classification problems requiring a small set of model vectors, and still scales to larger sets of model vectors with high accuracy yet at greater (sequential) computational costs.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要我们设计并实现了一个高效、安全、同态的k近邻确定算法，用于私有数据的回归或分类。我们的算法相对于数据库的大小以二次复杂度运行，但是是文献中唯一一个完全非交互地进行安全确定的算法。我们表明，我们的安全算法在应用于需要一小组模型向量的分类问题时既高效又准确，并且仍然可以以更高的准确性扩展到更大的模型向量组，同时具有更大的(连续的)计算成本。
papers.title_zh: k-NN分类器的高效同态评估

papers.title: Defending Against Microphone-Based Attacks with Personalized Noise
papers.authors: Yuchen Liu, Ziyu Xiang, Eun Ji Seong, Apu Kapadia, Donald S. Williamson
papers.abstract: Abstract Voice-activated commands have become a key feature of popular devices such as smartphones, home assistants, and wearables. For convenience, many people configure their devices to be ‘always on’ and listening for voice commands from the user using a trigger phrase such as “Hey Siri,” “Okay Google,” or “Alexa.” However, false positives for these triggers often result in privacy violations with conversations being inadvertently uploaded to the cloud. In addition, malware that can record one’s conversations remains a signifi-cant threat to privacy. Unlike with cameras, which people can physically obscure and be assured of their privacy, people do not have a way of knowing whether their microphone is indeed off and are left with no tangible defenses against voice based attacks. We envision a general-purpose physical defense that uses a speaker to inject specialized obfuscating ‘babble noise’ into the microphones of devices to protect against automated and human based attacks. We present a comprehensive study of how specially crafted, personalized ‘babble’ noise (‘MyBabble’) can be effective at moderate signal-to-noise ratios and can provide a viable defense against microphone based eavesdropping attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要语音激活命令已经成为智能手机、家庭助理和可穿戴设备等流行设备的一个关键功能。为了方便起见，许多人将他们的设备配置为“永远在线”，并使用“嘿Siri”、“好的谷歌”或“Alexa”等触发短语来收听用户的语音命令。然而，这些触发器的误报通常会导致隐私侵犯，因为对话会被无意中上传到云中。此外，可以记录个人对话的恶意软件仍然是隐私的一个重大威胁。与人们可以在物理上隐藏并确保其隐私的相机不同，人们没有办法知道他们的麦克风是否确实关闭，并且没有针对基于语音的攻击的切实防御措施。我们设想了一种通用的物理防御，它使用扬声器将专门的混淆“胡言乱语噪声”注入设备的麦克风，以防止自动和人为的攻击。我们全面研究了特制的个性化“多路重合”噪声(“我的多路重合”)如何在中等信噪比下有效，以及如何针对基于麦克风的窃听攻击提供可行的防御。
papers.title_zh: 利用个性化噪声防御基于麦克风的攻击

papers.title: Holes in the Geofence: Privacy Vulnerabilities in "Smart" DNS Services
papers.authors: Rahel A. Fainchtein, Adam J. Aviv, Micah Sherr, Stephen Ribaudo, Armaan Khullar
papers.abstract: Abstract Smart DNS (SDNS) services advertise access to geofenced content (typically, video streaming sites such as Netflix or Hulu) that is normally inaccessible unless the client is within a prescribed geographic region. SDNS is simple to use and involves no software installation. Instead, it requires only that users modify their DNS settings to point to an SDNS resolver. The SDNS resolver “smartly” identifies geofenced domains and, in lieu of their proper DNS resolutions, returns IP addresses of proxy servers located within the geofence. These servers then transparently proxy traffic between the users and their intended destinations, allowing for the bypass of these geographic restrictions. This paper presents the first academic study of SDNS services. We identify a number of serious and pervasive privacy vulnerabilities that expose information about the users of these systems. These include architectural weaknesses that enable content providers to identify which requesting clients use SDNS. Worse, we identify flaws in the design of some SDNS services that allow any arbitrary third party to enumerate these services’ users (by IP address), even if said users are currently offline. We present mitigation strategies to these attacks that have been adopted by at least one SDNS provider in response to our findings.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要智能DNS (SDNS)服务公布对地理围栏内容(通常是网飞或Hulu等视频流网站)的访问，这些内容通常无法访问，除非客户端位于指定的地理区域内。SDNS易于使用，不需要安装软件。相反，它只要求用户修改他们的DNS设置以指向SDNS解析器。SDNS解析器“智能地”识别地理围栏域，并返回位于地理围栏内的代理服务器的IP地址，而不是正确的DNS解析。然后，这些服务器透明地代理用户与其预定目的地之间的流量，允许绕过这些地理限制。本文首次对SDNS服务业进行了学术研究。我们发现了许多严重且普遍存在的隐私漏洞，这些漏洞暴露了这些系统用户的信息。这些缺陷包括体系结构上的弱点，使得内容提供商能够识别哪些请求客户端使用SDNS。更糟糕的是，我们发现一些SDNS服务的设计存在缺陷，允许任何第三方列举这些服务的用户(通过IP地址)，即使这些用户目前离线。我们提出了针对这些攻击的缓解策略，这些策略已经被至少一个SDNS提供商采用，以响应我们的发现。
papers.title_zh: 地理围栏中的漏洞:“智能”DNS服务中的隐私漏洞

papers.title: Too Close for Comfort: Morasses of (Anti-) Censorship in the Era of CDNs
papers.authors: Devashish Gosain, Mayank Mohindra, Sambuddho Chakravarty
papers.abstract: Abstract Recent research claims that “powerful” nation-states may be hegemonic over significant web traffic of “underserved” nations (e.g., Brazil and India). Such traffic may be surveilled when transiting (or ending in) these powerful nations. On the other hand, content distribution networks (CDNs) are designed to bring web content closer to end-users. Thus it is natural to ask whether CDNs have led to the localization of Internet traffic within the country’s boundary, challenging the notion of nation-state hegemony. Further, such traffic localization may inadvertently enhance a country’s ability to coerce content providers to censor (or monitor) access within its boundary. On top of that, the obvious solution, i.e., anti-censorship approaches, may sadly face a new dilemma. Traditional ones, relying on proxies, are easily discoverable. Whereas newer ones (e.g., Decoy Routing, Cache-Browser, Domain Fronting and CovertCast etc.) might not work as they require accessing web content hosted outside the censors’ boundary. We thus quantitatively analyzed the impact of web content localization on various anti-censorship systems. Such analysis requires geolocating the websites. Thus we adapted a multilateration method, Constraint Based Geolocation (CBG), with additional heuristics. We call it as Region Specific CBG (R-CBG). In more than 89% cases, R-CBG correctly classifies hosts as inside (or outside) w.r.t. a nation. Our empirical study, involving five countries, shows that the majority (61%−92%) of popular country-specific websites are hosted within a client’s own country. Further, additional heuristics classify the majority of them to be on CDNs.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要最近的研究声称，“强大”的民族国家可能在“服务不足”的国家(如巴西和印度)的重要网络流量上处于霸权地位。这种交通可能会被监视，当过境(或结束)这些强大的国家。另一方面，内容分发网络(cdn)旨在使网络内容更接近最终用户。因此，人们很自然地会问，cdn是否导致了互联网流量在该国境内的本地化，挑战了民族国家霸权的概念。此外，这种流量本地化可能会无意中增强一个国家迫使内容提供商审查(或监控)其境内访问的能力。除此之外，显而易见的解决方案，即反审查方法，可能会不幸地面临一个新的困境。依靠代理的传统方法很容易被发现。而较新的(例如，诱骗路由、缓存浏览器、域转发和覆盖广播等。)可能无法工作，因为它们需要访问在审查边界之外的网络内容。因此，我们定量分析了网络内容本地化对各种反审查系统的影响。这种分析需要对网站进行地理定位。因此，我们采用了一种多点定位方法，基于约束的地理定位(CBG)，带有额外的启发式。我们称之为区域特定CBG (R-CBG)。在超过89%的情况下，R-CBG正确地将主机分类为一个国家内部(或外部)。我们涉及五个国家的实证研究表明，大多数(61 %- 92 %)受欢迎的特定国家网站位于客户自己的国家。此外，额外的试探法将它们中的大多数分类到cdn上。
papers.title_zh: 太近了，令人不安:CDNs时代的(反)审查困境

papers.title: Privacy-Preserving & Incrementally-Deployable Support for Certificate Transparency in Tor
papers.authors: Rasmus Dahlberg, Tobias Pulls, Tom Ritter, Paul Syverson
papers.abstract: Abstract The security of the web improved greatly throughout the last couple of years. A large majority of the web is now served encrypted as part of HTTPS, and web browsers accordingly moved from positive to negative security indicators that warn the user if a connection is insecure. A secure connection requires that the server presents a valid certificate that binds the domain name in question to a public key. A certificate used to be valid if signed by a trusted Certificate Authority (CA), but web browsers like Google Chrome and Apple’s Safari have additionally started to mandate Certificate Transparency (CT) logging to overcome the weakest-link security of the CA ecosystem. Tor and the Firefox-based Tor Browser have yet to enforce CT. In this paper, we present privacy-preserving and incrementally-deployable designs that add support for CT in Tor. Our designs go beyond the currently deployed CT enforcements that are based on blind trust: if a user that uses Tor Browser is man-in-the-middled over HTTPS, we probabilistically detect and disclose cryptographic evidence of CA and/or CT log misbehavior. The first design increment allows Tor to play a vital role in the overall goal of CT: detect mis-issued certificates and hold CAs accountable. We achieve this by randomly cross-logging a subset of certificates into other CT logs. The final increments hold misbehaving CT logs accountable, initially assuming that some logs are benign and then without any such assumption. Given that the current CT deployment lacks strong mechanisms to verify if log operators play by the rules, exposing misbehavior is important for the web in general and not just Tor. The full design turns Tor into a system for maintaining a probabilistically-verified view of the CT log ecosystem available from Tor’s consensus. Each increment leading up to it preserves privacy due to and how we use Tor.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要在过去的几年中，web的安全性有了很大的提高。作为HTTPS的一部分，现在大部分web都是加密的，web浏览器也相应地从正面安全指示器转变为负面安全指示器，在连接不安全时警告用户。安全连接要求服务器提供有效的证书，该证书将域名绑定到公钥。过去，如果由可信的证书颁发机构(CA)签名，证书就是有效的，但像Google Chrome和Apple的Safari这样的web浏览器已经开始强制要求证书透明性(CT)日志记录，以克服CA生态系统中最薄弱的安全环节。Tor和基于Firefox的Tor浏览器还没有实施CT。在本文中，我们提出了隐私保护和可增量部署的设计，增加了对Tor中CT的支持。我们的设计超越了当前部署的基于盲目信任的ct实施:如果使用Tor浏览器的用户是HTTPS的中间人，我们有可能检测并披露CA和/或CT日志不当行为的加密证据。第一个设计增量允许Tor在CT的总体目标中发挥至关重要的作用:检测错误颁发的证书并让ca负责。我们通过将证书的子集随机交叉记录到其他CT日志中来实现这一点。最后的增量使行为不当的CT日志负责，最初假设一些日志是良性的，然后没有任何这样的假设。鉴于当前的CT部署缺乏强有力的机制来验证日志操作者是否遵守规则，揭露不当行为对整个网络都很重要，而不仅仅是Tor。完整的设计将Tor转变为一个系统，用于维护从Tor共识中获得的CT测井生态系统的概率验证视图。由于我们使用Tor，以及如何使用Tor，每一个增量都会保护隐私。
papers.title_zh: Tor中对证书透明性的隐私保护和可增量部署支持

papers.title: DyPS: Dynamic, Private and Secure GWAS
papers.authors: Túlio A. Pascoal, Jérémie Decouchant, Antoine Boutet, Paulo Jorge Esteves Veríssimo
papers.abstract: Abstract Genome-Wide Association Studies (GWAS) identify the genomic variations that are statistically associated with a particular phenotype (e.g., a disease). The confidence in GWAS results increases with the number of genomes analyzed, which encourages federated computations where biocenters would periodically share the genomes they have sequenced. However, for economical and legal reasons, this collaboration will only happen if biocenters cannot learn each others’ data. In addition, GWAS releases should not jeopardize the privacy of the individuals whose genomes are used. We introduce DyPS, a novel framework to conduct dynamic privacy-preserving federated GWAS. DyPS leverages a Trusted Execution Environment to secure dynamic GWAS computations. Moreover, DyPS uses a scaling mechanism to speed up the releases of GWAS results according to the evolving number of genomes used in the study, even if individuals retract their participation consent. Lastly, DyPS also tolerates up to all-but-one colluding biocenters without privacy leaks. We implemented and extensively evaluated DyPS through several scenarios involving more than 6 million simulated genomes and up to 35,000 real genomes. Our evaluation shows that DyPS updates test statistics with a reasonable additional request processing delay (11% longer) compared to an approach that would update them with minimal delay but would lead to 8% of the genomes not being protected. In addition, DyPS can result in the same amount of aggregate statistics as a static release (i.e., at the end of the study), but can produce up to 2.6 times more statistics information during earlier dynamic releases. Besides, we show that DyPS can support a larger number of genomes and SNP positions without any significant performance penalty.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要全基因组关联研究(GWAS)确定了与特定表型(如疾病)统计相关的基因组变异。随着分析的基因组数量的增加，对GWAS结果的信心增加，这鼓励了联合计算，其中biocenters将定期共享他们已测序的基因组。然而，由于经济和法律原因，这种合作只有在biocenters无法了解彼此的数据时才会发生。此外，GWAS的发布不应该危及基因组被使用的个人的隐私。我们介绍了DyPS，一个新的框架来进行动态隐私保护的联邦GWAS。DyPS利用可信执行环境来保护动态GWAS计算。此外，DyPS使用一种缩放机制，根据研究中使用的基因组数量的变化，加快GWAS结果的发布，即使个人撤回他们的参与同意。最后，DyPS还可以容忍除了一个以外的所有共谋生物中心，而不会泄露隐私。我们通过几个场景实施并广泛评估了DyPS，这些场景涉及超过600万个模拟基因组和多达35，000个真实基因组。我们的评估表明，与以最小延迟更新测试统计数据但会导致8%的基因组不受保护的方法相比，DyPS以合理的额外请求处理延迟(长11%)更新测试统计数据。此外，DyPS可以产生与静态发布(即，在研究结束时)相同数量的汇总统计信息，但是在早期动态发布期间可以产生高达2.6倍的统计信息。此外，我们表明DyPS可以支持更大数量的基因组和SNP位置，而没有任何明显的性能损失。
papers.title_zh: DyPS:动态、私密、安全的GWAS

papers.title: Validity and Reliability of the Scale Internet Users' Information Privacy Concerns (IUIPC)
papers.authors: Thomas Groß
papers.abstract: Abstract Internet Users’ Information Privacy Concerns (IUIPC-10) is one of the most endorsed privacy concern scales. It is widely used in the evaluation of human factors of PETs and the investigation of the privacy paradox. Even though its predecessor Concern For Information Privacy (CFIP) has been evaluated independently and the instrument itself seen some scrutiny, we are still missing a dedicated confirmation of IUIPC-10, itself. We aim at closing this gap by systematically analyzing IUIPC’s construct validity and reliability. We obtained three mutually independent samples with a total of N = 1031 participants. We conducted a confirmatory factor analysis (CFA) on our main sample to assert the validity and reliability of IUIPC-10. Having found weaknesses, we proposed a respecified instrument IUIPC-8 with improved psychometric properties. Finally, we confirmed our findings on a validation sample. While we found sound foundations for content validity and could confirm the overall three-dimensionality of IUIPC-10, we observed evidence of biases in the question wording and found that IUIPC-10 consistently missed the mark in evaluations of construct validity and reliability, calling into question the unidimensionality of its sub-scales Awareness and Control. Our respecified scale IUIPC-8 offers a statistically significantly better model and outperforms IUIPC-10’s construct validity and reliability. The disconfirming evidence on IUIPC-10’s construct validity raises doubts how well it measures the latent variable Information Privacy Concern. The less than desired reliability could yield spurious and erratic results as well as attenuate relations with other latent variables, such as behavior. Thereby, the instrument could confound studies of human factors of PETs or the privacy paradox, in general.
papers.abstract_zh: 互联网用户信息隐私担忧(IUIPC-10)是最受认可的隐私担忧量表之一。它被广泛应用于评估宠物的人为因素和调查隐私悖论。尽管其前身“关注信息隐私”( CFIP)已经过独立评估，并且该工具本身也经过了一些审查，但我们仍然缺少对IUIPC-10本身的专门确认。我们旨在通过系统分析IUIPC的结构效度和信度来弥补这一差距。我们获得了三个相互独立的样本，共有N = 1031名参与者。我们对主要样本进行了验证性因素分析(CFA ),以确定IUIPC-10的有效性和可靠性。发现弱点后，我们提出了一个特殊的工具IUIPC-8具有改善的心理测量属性。最后，我们在一个验证样本上证实了我们的发现。虽然我们发现了内容效度的良好基础，并可以证实IUIPC-10的整体三维性，但我们观察到问题措辞中存在偏见的证据，并发现IUIPC-10在结构效度和可靠性的评估中一直没有达到目标，这就对其子量表意识和控制的单维性提出了质疑。我们重新指定的量表IUIPC-8提供了一个统计学上显著更好的模型，并且优于IUIPC-10的结构效度和信度。关于IUIPC-10结构效度的不确定证据提出了质疑，它如何衡量潜在的可变信息隐私问题。低于预期的可靠性可能会产生虚假和不稳定的结果，以及削弱与其他潜在变量的关系，如行为。因此，一般来说，该仪器可能会混淆宠物的人为因素或隐私悖论的研究。
papers.title_zh: 互联网用户信息隐私担忧量表的信度和效度研究

papers.title: A Calculus of Tracking: Theory and Practice
papers.authors: Giorgio Di Tizio, Fabio Massacci
papers.abstract: Abstract Online tracking techniques, the interactions among trackers, and the economic and social impact of these procedures in the advertising ecosystem have received increasing attention in the last years. This work proposes a novel formal model that describes the foundations on which the visible process of data sharing behaves in terms of the network configurations of the Internet (included CDNs, shared cookies, etc.). From our model, we define relations that can be used to evaluate the impact of different privacy mitigations and determine if websites should comply with privacy regulations. We show that the calculus, based on a fragment of intuitionistic logic, is tractable and constructive: any formal derivation in the model corresponds to an actual tracking practice that can be implemented given the current configuration of the Internet. We apply our model on a dataset obtained from OpenWPM to evaluate the effectiveness of tracking mitigations up to Alexa Top 100.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要在线跟踪技术，跟踪者之间的相互作用，以及这些程序在广告生态系统中的经济和社会影响，在过去的几年里受到了越来越多的关注。这项工作提出了一个新颖的形式模型，描述了数据共享的可视过程根据互联网的网络配置(包括cdn、共享cookies等)表现的基础。).根据我们的模型，我们定义了可用于评估不同隐私缓解措施的影响并确定网站是否应遵守隐私法规的关系。我们表明，基于直觉主义逻辑片段的演算是易处理的和建设性的:模型中的任何形式推导都对应于在给定当前互联网配置的情况下可以实现的实际跟踪实践。我们将我们的模型应用于从OpenWPM获得的数据集，以评估跟踪缓解的有效性，直到Alexa Top 100。
papers.title_zh: 追踪演算:理论与实践

papers.title: "Did you know this camera tracks your mood?": Understanding Privacy Expectations and Preferences in the Age of Video Analytics
papers.authors: Shikun Zhang, Yuanyuan Feng, Lujo Bauer, Lorrie Faith Cranor, Anupam Das, Norman M. Sadeh
papers.abstract: Abstract Cameras are everywhere, and are increasingly coupled with video analytics software that can identify our face, track our mood, recognize what we are doing, and more. We present the results of a 10-day in-situ study designed to understand how people feel about these capabilities, looking both at the extent to which they expect to encounter them as part of their everyday activities and at how comfortable they are with the presence of such technologies across a range of realistic scenarios. Results indicate that while some widespread deployments are expected by many (e.g., surveillance in public spaces), others are not, with some making people feel particularly uncomfortable. Our results further show that individuals’ privacy preferences and expectations are complicated and vary with a number of factors such as the purpose for which footage is captured and analyzed, the particular venue where it is captured, and whom it is shared with. Finally, we discuss the implications of people’s rich and diverse preferences on opt-in or opt-out rights for the collection and use (including sharing) of data associated with these video analytics scenarios as mandated by regulations. Because of the user burden associated with the large number of privacy decisions people could be faced with, we discuss how new types of privacy assistants could possibly be configured to help people manage these decisions.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象相机无处不在，并且越来越多地与视频分析软件结合，这些软件可以识别我们的面部，跟踪我们的情绪，识别我们在做什么，等等。我们展示了一项为期10天的现场研究的结果，旨在了解人们对这些功能的感受，考察他们在日常活动中对这些功能的预期程度，以及他们在一系列现实场景中对这些技术的适应程度。结果表明，虽然一些广泛的部署是许多人所期望的(例如，公共场所的监控)，但另一些却不是，有些会让人感到特别不舒服。我们的结果进一步表明，个人的隐私偏好和期望是复杂的，并随着许多因素而变化，如拍摄和分析镜头的目的，拍摄的特定地点，以及与谁共享。最后，我们讨论了人们在选择加入或选择退出权利方面丰富多样的偏好对法规要求的与这些视频分析场景相关的数据的收集和使用(包括共享)的影响。由于用户可能面临大量隐私决策带来的负担，我们将讨论如何配置新型隐私助手来帮助人们管理这些决策。
papers.title_zh: "你知道这个摄像头会记录你的情绪吗？":了解视频分析时代的隐私期望和偏好

papers.title: GANDaLF: GAN for Data-Limited Fingerprinting
papers.authors: Se Eun Oh, Nate Mathews, Mohammad Saidur Rahman, Matthew Wright, Nicholas Hopper
papers.abstract: Abstract We introduce Generative Adversarial Networks for Data-Limited Fingerprinting (GANDaLF), a new deep-learning-based technique to perform Website Fingerprinting (WF) on Tor traffic. In contrast to most earlier work on deep-learning for WF, GANDaLF is intended to work with few training samples, and achieves this goal through the use of a Generative Adversarial Network to generate a large set of “fake” data that helps to train a deep neural network in distinguishing between classes of actual training data. We evaluate GANDaLF in low-data scenarios including as few as 10 training instances per site, and in multiple settings, including fingerprinting of website index pages and fingerprinting of non-index pages within a site. GANDaLF achieves closed-world accuracy of 87% with just 20 instances per site (and 100 sites) in standard WF settings. In particular, GANDaLF can outperform Var-CNN and Triplet Fingerprinting (TF) across all settings in subpage fingerprinting. For example, GANDaLF outperforms TF by a 29% margin and Var-CNN by 38% for training sets using 20 instances per site.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要本文介绍了一种新的基于深度学习的技术——有限数据指纹生成对抗网络(GANDaLF ),用于对Tor流量进行网站指纹识别(WF)。与WF的大多数早期深度学习工作相比，GANDaLF旨在使用少量训练样本工作，并通过使用生成式对抗网络来生成大量“虚假”数据，以帮助训练深度神经网络来区分实际训练数据的类别，从而实现这一目标。我们在低数据场景中评估GANDaLF，包括每个站点只有10个训练实例，以及多种设置，包括网站索引页面的指纹识别和站点内非索引页面的指纹识别。在标准WF环境下，GANDaLF在每个站点只有20个实例(和100个站点)的情况下实现了87%的封闭世界准确率。特别是，GANDaLF可以在子页面指纹的所有设置中胜过Var-CNN和三元组指纹(TF)。例如，对于每个站点使用20个实例的训练集，GANDaLF比TF高出29%,比Var-CNN高出38%。
papers.title_zh: GANDaLF:用于数据受限指纹识别的GAN

papers.title: Scalable Privacy-Preserving Distributed Learning
papers.authors: David Froelicher, Juan Ramón Troncoso-Pastoriza, Apostolos Pyrgelis, Sinem Sav, Joao Sa Sousa, Jean-Philippe Bossuat, Jean-Pierre Hubaux
papers.abstract: Abstract In this paper, we address the problem of privacy-preserving distributed learning and the evaluation of machine-learning models by analyzing it in the widespread MapReduce abstraction that we extend with privacy constraints. We design spindle (Scalable Privacy-preservINg Distributed LEarning), the first distributed and privacy-preserving system that covers the complete ML workflow by enabling the execution of a cooperative gradient-descent and the evaluation of the obtained model and by preserving data and model confidentiality in a passive-adversary model with up to N −1 colluding parties. spindle uses multiparty homomorphic encryption to execute parallel high-depth computations on encrypted data without significant overhead. We instantiate spindle for the training and evaluation of generalized linear models on distributed datasets and show that it is able to accurately (on par with non-secure centrally-trained models) and efficiently (due to a multi-level parallelization of the computations) train models that require a high number of iterations on large input data with thousands of features, distributed among hundreds of data providers. For instance, it trains a logistic-regression model on a dataset of one million samples with 32 features distributed among 160 data providers in less than three minutes.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要在本文中，我们通过在广泛使用的MapReduce抽象中分析隐私保护的分布式学习和机器学习模型的评估问题，并使用隐私约束对其进行扩展。我们设计了spindle(可扩展的隐私保护分布式学习)，这是第一个覆盖完整ML工作流的分布式隐私保护系统，它支持执行协作梯度下降和评估获得的模型，并在最多有N-1个共谋方的被动对手模型中保护数据和模型的机密性。spindle使用多方同态加密来对加密数据执行并行的深度计算，而没有显著的开销。我们实例化了spindle，用于在分布式数据集上训练和评估广义线性模型，并表明它能够准确地(与不安全的集中训练模型相当)和有效地(由于计算的多级并行化)训练模型，这些模型需要对具有数千个特征的大型输入数据进行大量迭代，这些数据分布在数百个数据提供者中。例如，它在不到三分钟的时间内，对分布在160个数据提供商中的100万个样本的数据集训练了一个逻辑回归模型。
papers.title_zh: 可扩展的隐私保护分布式学习

papers.title: Revisiting Membership Inference Under Realistic Assumptions
papers.authors: Bargav Jayaraman, Lingxiao Wang, Katherine Knipmeyer, Quanquan Gu, David Evans
papers.abstract: Abstract We study membership inference in settings where assumptions commonly used in previous research are relaxed. First, we consider cases where only a small fraction of the candidate pool targeted by the adversary are members and develop a PPV-based metric suitable for this setting. This skewed prior setting is more realistic than the balanced prior setting typically considered. Second, we consider adversaries that select inference thresholds according to their attack goals, such as identifying as many members as possible with a given false positive tolerance. We develop a threshold selection designed for achieving particular attack goals. Since previous inference attacks fail in imbalanced prior settings, we develop new inference attacks based on the intuition that inputs corresponding to training set members will be near a local minimum in the loss function. An attack that combines this with thresholds on the per-instance loss can achieve high PPV even in settings where other attacks are ineffective.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要我们在放松了以往研究中常用的假设的情况下研究成员推理。首先，我们考虑这样的情况，即只有一小部分被对手锁定的候选人才库是成员，并开发适合这种设置的基于PPV的度量。这种偏斜的先验设置比通常考虑的平衡先验设置更现实。第二，我们考虑根据他们的攻击目标选择推理阈值的对手，例如识别尽可能多的具有给定假阳性容限的成员。我们开发了为实现特定攻击目标而设计的阈值选择。由于先前的推理攻击在不平衡的先验设置中失败，我们基于对应于训练集成员的输入将接近损失函数中的局部最小值的直觉来开发新的推理攻击。将这一点与每个实例的损失阈值相结合的攻击甚至可以在其他攻击无效的情况下获得高PPV。
papers.title_zh: 现实假设下的隶属度推断

papers.title: Face-Off: Adversarial Face Obfuscation
papers.authors: Varun Chandrasekaran, Chuhan Gao, Brian Tang, Kassem Fawaz, Somesh Jha, Suman Banerjee
papers.abstract: Abstract Advances in deep learning have made face recognition technologies pervasive. While useful to social media platforms and users, this technology carries significant privacy threats. Coupled with the abundant information they have about users, service providers can associate users with social interactions, visited places, activities, and preferences–some of which the user may not want to share. Additionally, facial recognition models used by various agencies are trained by data scraped from social media platforms. Existing approaches to mitigate associated privacy risks result in an imbalanced trade-off between privacy and utility. In this paper, we address this trade-off by proposing Face-Off, a privacy-preserving framework that introduces strategic perturbations to images of the user’s face to prevent it from being correctly recognized. To realize Face-Off, we overcome a set of challenges related to the black-box nature of commercial face recognition services, and the scarcity of literature for adversarial attacks on metric networks. We implement and evaluate Face-Off to find that it deceives three commercial face recognition services from Microsoft, Amazon, and Face++. Our user study with 423 participants further shows that the perturbations come at an acceptable cost for the users.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要深度学习的进步使得人脸识别技术无处不在。虽然这项技术对社交媒体平台和用户很有用，但也带来了严重的隐私威胁。再加上他们掌握的大量用户信息，服务提供商可以将用户与社交互动、访问过的地方、活动和偏好联系起来——其中一些用户可能不想分享。此外，各种机构使用的面部识别模型是通过从社交媒体平台收集的数据进行训练的。减轻相关隐私风险的现有方法导致隐私和效用之间的不平衡权衡。在本文中，我们通过提出Face-Off来解决这种权衡，Face-Off是一种隐私保护框架，它对用户面部的图像进行战略性扰动，以防止它被正确识别。为了实现Face-Off，我们克服了一系列与商业人脸识别服务的黑盒性质相关的挑战，以及针对度量网络的对抗性攻击的文献稀缺。我们实现并评估了Face-Off，发现它欺骗了来自微软、亚马逊和Face++的三个商业人脸识别服务。我们对423名参与者的用户研究进一步表明，这种干扰对用户来说成本是可以接受的。
papers.title_zh: 对峙:对抗性的面孔混淆

papers.title: Déjà vu: Abusing Browser Cache Headers to Identify and Track Online Users
papers.authors: Vikas Mishra, Pierre Laperdrix, Walter Rudametkin, Romain Rouvoy
papers.abstract: Abstract Many browser cache attacks have been proposed in the literature to sniff the user’s browsing history. All of them rely on specific time measurements to infer if a resource is in the cache or not. Unlike the state-of-the-art, this paper reports on a novel cache-based attack that is not a timing attack but that abuses the HTTP cache-control and expires headers to extract the exact date and time when a resource was cached by the browser. The privacy implications are serious as this information can not only be utilized to detect if a website was visited by the user but it can also help build a timeline of the user’s visits. This goes beyond traditional history sniffing attacks as we can observe patterns of visit and model user’s behavior on the web. To evaluate the impact of our attack, we tested it on all major browsers and found that all of them, except the ones based on WebKit, are vulnerable to it. Since our attack requires specific HTTP headers to be present, we also crawled the Tranco Top 100K websites and identified 12, 970 of them can be detected with our approach. Among them, 1, 910 deliver resources that have expiry dates greater than 100 days, enabling long-term user tracking. Finally, we discuss possible defenses at both the browser and standard levels to prevent users from being tracked.
papers.abstract_zh: 文献中已经提出了许多浏览器缓存攻击来嗅探用户的浏览历史。它们都依赖于特定的时间测量来推断资源是否在缓存中。与现有技术不同，本文报告了一种新颖的基于缓存的攻击，这种攻击不是定时攻击，而是滥用HTTP缓存控制和expires报头来提取浏览器缓存资源的确切日期和时间。隐私问题很严重，因为这些信息不仅可以用来检测用户是否访问过网站，还可以帮助建立用户访问的时间表。这超越了传统的历史嗅探攻击，因为我们可以观察访问模式并模拟用户在网络上的行为。为了评估我们的攻击的影响，我们在所有主要的浏览器上进行测试，发现除了基于WebKit的浏览器之外，所有的浏览器都容易受到攻击。由于我们的攻击需要特定的HTTP头，我们还搜索了Tranco Top 100K网站，发现其中12，970个可以用我们的方法检测到。其中，1，910个提供到期日超过100天的资源，支持长期用户跟踪。最后，我们讨论了在浏览器和标准级别上防止用户被跟踪的可能防御措施。
papers.title_zh: 似曾相识:滥用浏览器缓存标题来识别和跟踪在线用户

papers.title: Editors' Introduction
papers.authors: Aaron Johnson, Florian Kerschbaum
papers.abstract: Is there currently a crisis of confidence in psychological science reflecting an unprecedented level of doubt among practitioners about the reliability of research findings in the field? It would certainly appear that there is. These doubts emerged and grew as a series of unhappy events unfolded in 2011: the Diederik Stapel fraud case (see Stroebe, Postmes, & Spears, 2012, this issue), the publication in a major social psychology journal of an article purporting to show evidence of extrasensory perception (Bem, 2011) followed by widespread public mockery (see Galak, LeBoeuf, Nelson, & Simmons, in press; Wagenmakers, Wetzels, Borsboom, & van der Maas, 2011), reports by Wicherts and colleagues that psychologists are often unwilling or unable to share their published data for reanalysis (Wicherts, Bakker, & Molenaar, 2011; see also Wicherts, Borsboom, Kats, & Molenaar, 2006), and the publication of an important article in Psychological Science showing how easily researchers can, in the absence of any real effects, nonetheless obtain statistically significant differences through various questionable research practices (QRPs) such as exploring multiple dependent variables or covariates and only reporting these when they yield significant results (Simmons, Nelson, & Simonsohn, 2011). For those psychologists who expected that the embarrassments of 2011 would soon recede into memory, 2012 offered instead a quick plunge from bad to worse, with new indications of outright fraud in the field of social cognition (Simonsohn, 2012), an article in Psychological Science showing that many psychologists admit to engaging in at least some of the QRPs examined by Simmons and colleagues (John, Loewenstein, & Prelec, 2012), troubling new meta-analytic evidence suggesting that the QRPs described by Simmons and colleagues may even be leaving telltale signs visible in the distribution of p values in the psychological literature (Masicampo & Lalande, in press; Simonsohn, 2012), and an acrimonious dust-up in science magazines and blogs centered around the problems some investigators were having in replicating well-known results from the field of social cognition (Bower, 2012; Yong, 2012). Although the very public problems experienced by psychology over this 2-year period are embarrassing to those of us working in the field, some have found comfort in the fact that, over the same period, similar concerns have been arising across the scientific landscape (triggered by revelations that will be described shortly). Some of the suspected causes of unreplicability, such as publication bias (the tendency to publish only positive findings) have been discussed for years; in fact, the phrase file-drawer problem was first coined by a distinguished psychologist several decades ago (Rosenthal, 1979). However, many have speculated that these problems have been exacerbated in recent years as academia reaps the harvest of a hypercompetitive academic climate and an incentive scheme that provides rich rewards for overselling one’s work and few rewards at all for caution and circumspection (see Giner-Sorolla, 2012, this issue). Equally disturbing, investigators seem to be replicating each others’ work even less often than they did in the past, again presumably reflecting an incentive scheme gone askew (a point discussed in several articles in this issue, e.g., Makel, Plucker, & Hegarty, 2012). The frequency with which errors appear in the psychological literature is not presently known, but a number of facts suggest it might be disturbingly high. Ioannidis (2005) has shown through simple mathematical modeling that any scientific field that ignores replication can easily come to the miserable state wherein (as the title of his most famous article puts it) “most published research findings are false” (see also Ioannidis, 2012, this issue, and Pashler & Harris, 2012, this issue). Meanwhile, reports emerging from cancer research have made such grim scenarios seem more plausible: In 2012, several large pharmaceutical companies revealed that their efforts to replicate exciting preclinical findings from published academic studies in cancer biology were only rarely verifying the original results (Begley & Ellis, 2012; see also Osherovich, 2011; Prinz, Schlange, & Asadullah, 2011).
