papers.abstract: Abstract Vehicular data-collection platforms as part of Original Equipment Manufacturers’ (OEMs’) connected telematics services are on the rise in order to provide diverse connected services to the users. They also allow the collected data to be shared with third-parties upon users’ permission. Under the current suggested permission model, we find these platforms leaking users’ location information without explicitly obtaining users’ permission. We analyze the accuracy of inferring a vehicle’s location from seemingly benign steering wheel angle (SWA) traces, and show its impact on the driver’s location privacy. By collecting and processing real-life SWA traces, we can infer the users’ exact traveled routes with up to 71% accuracy, which is much higher than the state-of-the-art.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要作为原始设备制造商(OEM)联网远程信息服务的一部分，车载数据收集平台正在兴起，以便为用户提供多样化的联网服务。它们还允许在用户许可的情况下与第三方共享收集的数据。在当前建议的权限模型下，我们发现这些平台在没有明确获得用户权限的情况下泄露用户的位置信息。我们分析了从看似良性的方向盘转角(SWA)痕迹推断车辆位置的准确性，并显示了其对驾驶员位置隐私的影响。通过收集和处理现实生活中的SWA轨迹，我们可以以高达71%的准确率推断出用户的确切出行路线，这远远高于最先进的水平
papers.title_zh: 间谍:汽车方向盘揭示你的旅行路线！

papers.title: A Framework of Metrics for Differential Privacy from Local Sensitivity
papers.authors: Peeter Laud, Alisa Pankova, Martin Pettai
papers.abstract: Abstract The meaning of differential privacy (DP) is tightly bound with the notion of distance on databases, typically defined as the number of changed rows. Considering the semantics of data, this metric may be not the most suitable one, particularly when a distance comes out as larger than the data owner desired (which would undermine privacy). In this paper, we give a mechanism to specify continuous metrics that depend on the locations and amounts of changes in a much more nuanced manner. Our metrics turn the set of databases into a Banach space. In order to construct DP information release mechanisms based on our metrics, we introduce derivative sensitivity, an analogue to local sensitivity for continuous functions. We use this notion in an analysis that determines the amount of noise to be added to the result of a database query in order to obtain a certain level of differential privacy, and demonstrate that derivative sensitivity allows us to employ powerful mechanisms from calculus to perform the analysis for a variety of queries. We have implemented the analyzer and evaluated its efficiency and precision.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要差分隐私(DP)的含义与数据库上的距离概念紧密相关，通常定义为改变的行数。考虑到数据的语义，这种度量可能不是最合适的，特别是当距离大于数据所有者期望的距离时(这会破坏隐私)。在本文中，我们给出了一种机制，以更细致的方式指定依赖于位置和变化量的连续度量。我们的度量将数据库集合转化为Banach空间。为了基于我们的度量构建DP信息发布机制，我们引入了导数灵敏度，这是对连续函数的局部灵敏度的模拟。我们在分析中使用这一概念，以确定添加到数据库查询结果中的噪声量，从而获得一定程度的差分隐私，并证明导数灵敏度允许我们采用微积分中的强大机制来执行对各种查询的分析。我们已经实现了分析器，并评估了它的效率和精度。
papers.title_zh: 基于局部敏感性的差异隐私度量框架

papers.title: Secure and Scalable Document Similarity on Distributed Databases: Differential Privacy to the Rescue
papers.authors: Phillipp Schoppmann, Lennart Vogelsang, Adrià Gascón, Borja Balle
papers.abstract: Abstract Privacy-preserving collaborative data analysis enables richer models than what each party can learn with their own data. Secure Multi-Party Computation (MPC) offers a robust cryptographic approach to this problem, and in fact several protocols have been proposed for various data analysis and machine learning tasks. In this work, we focus on secure similarity computation between text documents, and the application to k-nearest neighbors (k-NN) classification. Due to its non-parametric nature, k-NN presents scalability challenges in the MPC setting. Previous work addresses these by introducing non-standard assumptions about the abilities of an attacker, for example by relying on non-colluding servers. In this work, we tackle the scalability challenge from a different angle, and instead introduce a secure preprocessing phase that reveals differentially private (DP) statistics about the data. This allows us to exploit the inherent sparsity of text data and significantly speed up all subsequent classifications.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象的隐私保护协作数据分析实现了比各方通过自己的数据所能了解到的更丰富的模型。安全多方计算(MPC)为这个问题提供了一种健壮的加密方法，事实上，已经为各种数据分析和机器学习任务提出了几个协议。在本文中，我们主要研究文本文档之间的安全相似度计算，以及它在k-近邻分类中的应用。由于其非参数性质，k-NN在MPC设置中呈现出可扩展性挑战。先前的工作通过引入关于攻击者能力的非标准假设来解决这些问题，例如通过依赖非共谋服务器。在这项工作中，我们从一个不同的角度解决可伸缩性的挑战，而是引入一个安全的预处理阶段，揭示关于数据的差分私有(DP)统计。这使得我们能够利用文本数据固有的稀疏性，并显著加快所有后续分类的速度。
papers.title_zh: 分布式数据库上安全和可扩展的文档相似性:不同隐私的拯救

papers.title: Differentially Private SQL with Bounded User Contribution
papers.authors: Royce J. Wilson, Celia Yuxin Zhang, William Lam, Damien Desfontaines, Daniel Simmons-Marengo, Bryant Gipson
papers.abstract: Abstract Differential privacy (DP) provides formal guarantees that the output of a database query does not reveal too much information about any individual present in the database. While many differentially private algorithms have been proposed in the scientific literature, there are only a few end-to-end implementations of differentially private query engines. Crucially, existing systems assume that each individual is associated with at most one database record, which is unrealistic in practice. We propose a generic and scalable method to perform differentially private aggregations on databases, even when individuals can each be associated with arbitrarily many rows. We express this method as an operator in relational algebra, and implement it in an SQL engine. To validate this system, we test the utility of typical queries on industry benchmarks, and verify its correctness with a stochastic test framework we developed. We highlight the promises and pitfalls learned when deploying such a system in practice, and we publish its core components as open-source software.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要差分隐私(DP)提供了一种形式上的保证，即数据库查询的输出不会泄露数据库中任何个人的太多信息。虽然在科学文献中已经提出了许多差分私有算法，但是差分私有查询引擎只有少数端到端实现。重要的是，现有系统假设每个人最多与一个数据库记录相关联，这在实践中是不现实的。我们提出了一种通用的、可伸缩的方法来对数据库执行不同的私有聚合，即使每个个体可以与任意多的行相关联。我们将该方法表示为关系代数中的一个操作符，并在SQL引擎中实现它。为了验证该系统，我们在行业基准上测试了典型查询的效用，并使用我们开发的随机测试框架验证了其正确性。我们强调在实践中部署这样一个系统时所学到的承诺和陷阱，并且我们将它的核心组件作为开源软件发布。
papers.title_zh: 具有有限用户贡献的差异私有SQL

papers.title: Listen Only When Spoken To: Interpersonal Communication Cues as Smart Speaker Privacy Controls
papers.authors: Abraham H. Mhaidli, Manikandan Kandadai Venkatesh, Yixin Zou, Florian Schaub
papers.abstract: Abstract Internet of Things and smart home technologies pose challenges for providing effective privacy controls to users, as smart devices lack both traditional screens and input interfaces. We investigate the potential for leveraging interpersonal communication cues as privacy controls in the IoT context, in particular for smart speakers. We propose privacy controls based on two kinds of interpersonal communication cues – gaze direction and voice volume level – that only selectively activate a smart speaker’s microphone or voice recognition when the device is being addressed, in order to avoid constant listening and speech recognition by the smart speaker microphones and reduce false device activation. We implement these privacy controls in a smart speaker prototype and assess their feasibility, usability and user perception in two lab studies. We find that privacy controls based on interpersonal communication cues are practical, do not impair the smart speaker’s functionality, and can be easily used by users to selectively mute the microphone. Based on our findings, we discuss insights regarding the use of interpersonal cues as privacy controls for smart speakers and other IoT devices.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要物联网和智能家居技术为用户提供有效的隐私控制带来了挑战，因为智能设备缺乏传统的屏幕和输入界面。我们调查了在物联网环境中利用人际交流线索作为隐私控制的潜力，特别是对于智能扬声器。我们提出了基于两种人际交流线索的隐私控制——凝视方向和音量水平——仅在设备被寻址时选择性地激活智能扬声器的麦克风或语音识别，以避免智能扬声器麦克风的持续监听和语音识别，并减少错误的设备激活。我们在智能扬声器原型中实现了这些隐私控制，并在两项实验室研究中评估了它们的可行性、可用性和用户感知。我们发现，基于人际交流线索的隐私控制是实用的，不会损害智能扬声器的功能，并且用户可以很容易地使用它来选择性地使麦克风静音。基于我们的发现，我们讨论了关于使用人际线索作为智能扬声器和其他物联网设备的隐私控制的见解。
papers.title_zh: 只听别人说话:作为智能扬声器隐私控制的人际交流线索

papers.title: Enhanced Performance and Privacy for TLS over TCP Fast Open
papers.authors: Erik Sy, Tobias Mueller, Christian Burkert, Hannes Federrath, Mathias Fischer
papers.abstract: Abstract Small TCP flows make up the majority of web flows. For them, the TCP three-way handshake induces significant delay overhead. The TCP Fast Open (TFO) protocol can significantly decrease this delay via zero round-trip time (0-RTT) handshakes for all TCP handshakes that follow a full initial handshake to the same host. However, this comes at the cost of privacy limitations and also has some performance limitations. In this paper, we investigate the TFP deployment on popular websites and browsers. We found that a client revisiting a web site for the first time fails to use an abbreviated TFO handshake in 40% of all cases due to web server load-balancing using multiple IP addresses. Our analysis further reveals significant privacy problems of the protocol design and implementation. Network-based attackers and online trackers can exploit TFO to track the online activities of users. As a countermeasure, we introduce a novel protocol called TCP Fast Open Privacy (FOP). TCP FOP prevents tracking by network attackers and impedes third-party tracking, while still allowing 0-RTT handshakes as in TFO. As a proof-of-concept, we have implemented the proposed protocol for the Linux kernel and a TLS library. Our measurements indicate that TCP FOP outperforms TLS over TFO when websites are served from multiple IP addresses.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要小型TCP流构成了web流的大部分。对他们来说，TCP三次握手会导致显著的延迟开销。TCP快速开放(TFO)协议可以通过在与同一主机的完整初始握手之后的所有TCP握手的零往返时间(0-RTT)握手来显著减少这种延迟。然而，这是以隐私限制为代价的，并且也有一些性能限制。在本文中，我们调查了TFP在流行的网站和浏览器上的部署情况。我们发现，由于使用多个IP地址的web服务器负载平衡，第一次访问网站的客户端在40%的情况下无法使用简短的TFO握手。我们的分析进一步揭示了协议设计和实现中的重要隐私问题。基于网络的攻击者和在线跟踪器可以利用TFO来跟踪用户的在线活动。作为对策，我们引入了一种称为TCP快速开放隐私(FOP)的新协议。TCP FOP防止网络攻击者的跟踪，并阻止第三方跟踪，同时仍然允许0-RTT握手，就像在TFO一样。作为概念验证，我们已经为Linux内核和TLS库实现了提议的协议。我们的测量表明，当网站由多个IP地址提供服务时，TCP FOP优于TLS，优于TFO。
papers.title_zh: TCP上TLS的增强性能和隐私快速开放

papers.title: SoK: Differential privacies
papers.authors: Damien Desfontaines, Balázs Pejó
papers.abstract: Abstract Shortly after it was first introduced in 2006, differential privacy became the flagship data privacy definition. Since then, numerous variants and extensions were proposed to adapt it to different scenarios and attacker models. In this work, we propose a systematic taxonomy of these variants and extensions. We list all data privacy definitions based on differential privacy, and partition them into seven categories, depending on which aspect of the original definition is modified. These categories act like dimensions: variants from the same category cannot be combined, but variants from different categories can be combined to form new definitions. We also establish a partial ordering of relative strength between these notions by summarizing existing results. Furthermore, we list which of these definitions satisfy some desirable properties, like composition, postprocessing, and convexity by either providing a novel proof or collecting existing ones.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要差分隐私在2006年首次推出后不久，就成为了旗舰数据隐私定义。从那时起，许多变种和扩展被提出来，以适应不同的场景和攻击者模型。在这项工作中，我们提出了这些变种和扩展的系统分类法。我们列出了所有基于差分隐私的数据隐私定义，并根据原始定义的哪个方面被修改，将它们划分为七个类别。这些类别的作用类似于维度:来自同一类别的变体不能组合，但是来自不同类别的变体可以组合起来形成新的定义。通过总结现有的结果，我们还建立了这些概念之间的相对强度的部分排序。此外，我们通过提供一个新的证明或收集现有的证明，列出了这些定义中哪些满足一些期望的性质，如合成、后处理和凸性。
papers.title_zh: SoK:差异隐私

papers.title: Angel or Devil? A Privacy Study of Mobile Parental Control Apps
papers.authors: Álvaro Feal, Paolo Calciati, Narseo Vallina-Rodriguez, Carmela Troncoso, Alessandra Gorla
papers.abstract: Abstract Android parental control applications are used by parents to monitor and limit their children’s mobile behaviour (e.g., mobile apps usage, web browsing, calling, and texting). In order to offer this service, parental control apps require privileged access to system resources and access to sensitive data. This may significantly reduce the dangers associated with kids’ online activities, but it raises important privacy concerns. These concerns have so far been overlooked by organizations providing recommendations regarding the use of parental control applications to the public. We conduct the first in-depth study of the Android parental control app’s ecosystem from a privacy and regulatory point of view. We exhaustively study 46 apps from 43 developers which have a combined 20M installs in the Google Play Store. Using a combination of static and dynamic analysis we find that: these apps are on average more permissions-hungry than the top 150 apps in the Google Play Store, and tend to request more dangerous permissions with new releases; 11% of the apps transmit personal data in the clear; 34% of the apps gather and send personal information without appropriate consent; and 72% of the apps share data with third parties (including online advertising and analytics services) without mentioning their presence in their privacy policies. In summary, parental control applications lack transparency and lack compliance with regulatory requirements. This holds even for those applications recommended by European and other national security centers.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要父母使用Android家长控制应用程序来监控和限制孩子的移动行为(例如，移动应用程序的使用、网页浏览、通话和发短信)。为了提供这项服务，家长控制应用程序需要对系统资源和敏感数据的特权访问。这可能会大大减少与孩子的网上活动相关的危险，但它提出了重要的隐私问题。到目前为止，向公众提供有关使用家长控制应用程序的建议的组织忽略了这些问题。我们从隐私和监管的角度对Android父母控制应用的生态系统进行了首次深入研究。我们详尽地研究了来自43家开发商的46款应用，它们在谷歌Play商店总共有2000万次安装。结合静态和动态分析，我们发现:这些应用程序平均比谷歌Play商店排名前150位的应用程序更渴望权限，并倾向于在新版本中请求更危险的权限；11%的应用程序明文传输个人数据；34%的应用程序在未经适当同意的情况下收集和发送个人信息；72%的应用程序与第三方(包括在线广告和分析服务)共享数据，而没有在其隐私政策中提及它们的存在。总之，家长控制应用程序缺乏透明度，并且不符合监管要求。这甚至适用于欧洲和其他国家安全中心推荐的应用程序。
papers.title_zh: 天使还是魔鬼？移动家长控制应用的隐私研究

papers.title: T0RTT: Non-Interactive Immediate Forward-Secret Single-Pass Circuit Construction
papers.authors: Sebastian Lauer, Kai Gellert, Robert Merget, Tobias Handirk, Jörg Schwenk
papers.abstract: Abstract Maintaining privacy on the Internet with the presence of powerful adversaries such as nation-state attackers is a challenging topic, and the Tor project is currently the most important tool to protect against this threat. The circuit construction protocol (CCP) negotiates cryptographic keys for Tor circuits, which overlay TCP/IP by routing Tor cells over n onion routers. The current circuit construction protocol provides strong security guarantees such as forward secrecy by exchanging 𝒪(n2) messages. For several years it has been an open question if the same strong security guarantees could be achieved with less message overhead, which is desirable because of the inherent latency in overlay networks. Several publications described CCPs which require only 𝒪(n) message exchanges, but significantly reduce the security of the resulting Tor circuit. It was even conjectured that it is impossible to achieve both message complexity 𝒪(n) and forward secrecy immediately after circuit construction (so-called immediate forward secrecy). Inspired by the latest advancements in zero round-trip time key exchange (0-RTT), we present a new CCP protocol Tor 0-RTT (T0RTT). Using modern cryptographic primitives such as puncturable encryption allow to achieve immediate forward secrecy using only 𝒪(n) messages. We implemented these new primitives to give a first indication of possible problems and how to overcome them in order to build practical CCPs with 𝒪(n) messages and immediate forward secrecy in the future.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要在存在强大对手(如民族国家攻击者)的情况下，维护互联网上的隐私是一个具有挑战性的话题，Tor项目是目前防止这种威胁的最重要的工具。电路构造协议(CCP)为Tor电路协商加密密钥，Tor电路通过在n个洋葱路由器上路由Tor信元来覆盖TCP/IP。当前的电路构造协议提供了强大的安全保证，例如通过交换𝒪(n2消息的前向保密。几年来，是否可以用更少的消息开销实现同样强的安全保证一直是一个公开的问题，由于覆盖网络中固有的等待时间，这是合乎需要的。一些出版物描述了仅需要𝒪(n消息交换的CCP，但是显著降低了所得到的Tor电路的安全性。甚至有人推测，在电路构建之后，不可能同时实现消息复杂度(𝒪(n)和前向保密(所谓的立即前向保密)。受零往返时间密钥交换(0-RTT)最新进展的启发，我们提出了一个新的0-RTT CCP协议(T0RTT)。使用诸如可穿孔加密之类的现代密码原语允许仅使用𝒪(n消息来实现立即前向保密。我们实现了这些新的原语，以给出可能的问题以及如何克服这些问题的初步指示，以便在将来构建具有𝒪(n消息和直接转发保密的实际CCPs。
papers.title_zh: T0RTT:非交互式立即前向保密单通电路结构

papers.title: Averaging Attacks on Bounded Noise-based Disclosure Control Algorithms
papers.authors: Hassan Jameel Asghar, Dali Kaafar
papers.abstract: Abstract We describe and evaluate an attack that reconstructs the histogram of any target attribute of a sensitive dataset which can only be queried through a specific class of real-world privacy-preserving algorithms which we call bounded perturbation algorithms. A defining property of such an algorithm is that it perturbs answers to the queries by adding zero-mean noise distributed within a bounded (possibly undisclosed) range. Other key properties of the algorithm include only allowing restricted queries (enforced via an online interface), suppressing answers to queries which are only satisfied by a small group of individuals (e.g., by returning a zero as an answer), and adding the same perturbation to two queries which are satisfied by the same set of individuals (to thwart differencing or averaging attacks). A real-world example of such an algorithm is the one deployed by the Australian Bureau of Statistics’ (ABS) online tool called TableBuilder, which allows users to create tables, graphs and maps of Australian census data [30]. We assume an attacker (say, a curious analyst) who is given oracle access to the algorithm via an interface. We describe two attacks on the algorithm. Both attacks are based on carefully constructing (different) queries that evaluate to the same answer. The first attack finds the hidden perturbation parameter r (if it is assumed not to be public knowledge). The second attack removes the noise to obtain the original answer of some (counting) query of choice. We also show how to use this attack to find the number of individuals in the dataset with a target attribute value a of any attribute A, and then for all attribute values ai ∈ A. None of the attacks presented here depend on any background information. Our attacks are a practical illustration of the (informal) fundamental law of information recovery which states that “overly accurate estimates of too many statistics completely destroys privacy” [9, 15].
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要我们描述和评估一种攻击，这种攻击重建敏感数据集的任何目标属性的直方图，该敏感数据集只能通过我们称为有界扰动算法的特定类别的真实世界隐私保护算法来查询。这种算法的定义属性是，它通过添加分布在有界(可能未公开)范围内的零均值噪声来干扰对查询的回答。该算法的其他关键属性包括仅允许受限查询(通过在线界面实施)，抑制仅由一小组个体满足的查询的答案(例如，通过返回零作为答案)，以及向由同一组个体满足的两个查询添加相同的扰动(以阻止差分或平均攻击)。这种算法的一个真实例子是澳大利亚统计局(ABS)部署的在线工具TableBuilder，它允许用户创建澳大利亚人口普查数据的表格、图形和地图[30]。我们假设一个攻击者(比如说，一个好奇的分析师)通过一个接口获得了oracle对算法的访问权。我们描述对算法的两种攻击。这两种攻击都是基于仔细构建的(不同的)查询，这些查询评估出相同的答案。第一次攻击找到隐藏的扰动参数r(如果假设它不是公共知识)。第二种攻击是去除噪声，以获得某个(计数)查询的原始答案。我们还展示了如何使用这种攻击来查找数据集中具有任何属性A的目标属性值A的个体的数量，然后查找所有属性值ai ∈ A。此处呈现的攻击都不依赖于任何背景信息。我们的攻击实际上说明了信息恢复的(非正式)基本法则，即“对太多统计数据的过度精确估计会完全破坏隐私”[9，15]。
papers.title_zh: 对基于有界噪声的披露控制算法的平均攻击

papers.title: Impact of Frequency of Location Reports on the Privacy Level of Geo-indistinguishability
papers.authors: Ricardo Mendes, Mariana Cunha, João P. Vilela
papers.abstract: Abstract Location privacy has became an emerging topic due to the pervasiveness of Location-Based Services (LBSs). When sharing location, a certain degree of privacy can be achieved through the use of Location Privacy-Preserving Mechanisms (LPPMs), in where an obfuscated version of the exact user location is reported instead. However, even obfuscated location reports disclose information which poses a risk to privacy. Based on the formal notion of differential privacy, Geo-indistinguishability has been proposed to design LPPMs that limit the amount of information that is disclosed to a potential adversary observing the reports. While promising, this notion considers reports to be independent from each other, thus discarding the potential threat that arises from exploring the correlation between reports. This assumption might hold for the sporadic release of data, however, there is still no formal nor quantitative boundary between sporadic and continuous reports and thus we argue that the consideration of independence is valid depending on the frequency of reports made by the user. This work intends to fill this research gap through a quantitative evaluation of the impact on the privacy level of Geo-indistinguishability under different frequency of reports. Towards this end, state-of-the-art localization attacks and a tracking attack are implemented against a Geo-indistinguishable LPPM under several values of privacy budget and the privacy level is measured along different frequencies of updates using real mobility data.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要由于基于位置的服务的普及，位置隐私已经成为一个新兴的话题。当共享位置时，可以通过使用位置隐私保护机制(LPPMs)来实现一定程度的隐私，其中报告确切用户位置的模糊版本。然而，即使是模糊的位置报告也会泄露对隐私构成风险的信息。基于差分隐私的正式概念，提出了地理不可区分性来设计LPPMs，以限制向观察报告的潜在对手公开的信息量。虽然这种想法很有希望，但它认为报告是相互独立的，因此排除了探索报告之间的相关性所带来的潜在威胁。这种假设可能适用于零星发布的数据，但是，在零星报告和连续报告之间仍然没有正式或定量的界限，因此我们认为，根据用户报告的频率，独立性的考虑是有效的。这项工作旨在通过定量评估不同报告频率下地理不可区分性对隐私水平的影响来填补这一研究空白。为此，在几个隐私预算值下，针对地理上不可区分的LPPM实施了最先进的定位攻击和跟踪攻击，并且使用真实移动数据沿着不同的更新频率测量隐私级别。
papers.title_zh: 位置报告频率对地理不可区分性隐私水平的影响

papers.title: Mind the Gap: Ceremonies for Applied Secret Sharing
papers.authors: Bailey Kacsmar, Chelsea Komlo, Florian Kerschbaum, Ian Goldberg
papers.abstract: Abstract Secret sharing schemes are desirable across a variety of real-world settings due to the security and privacy properties they can provide, such as availability and separation of privilege. However, transitioning secret sharing schemes from theoretical research to practical use must account for gaps in achieving these properties that arise due to the realities of concrete implementations, threat models, and use cases. We present a formalization and analysis, using Ellison’s notion of ceremonies, that demonstrates how simple variations in use cases of secret sharing schemes result in the potential loss of some security properties, a result that cannot be derived from the analysis of the underlying cryptographic protocol alone. Our framework accounts for such variations in the design and analysis of secret sharing implementations by presenting a more detailed user-focused process and defining previously overlooked assumptions about user roles and actions within the scheme to support analysis when designing such ceremonies. We identify existing mechanisms that, when applied to an appropriate implementation, close the security gaps we identified. We present our implementation including these mechanisms and a corresponding security assessment using our framework.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要由于秘密共享方案能够提供安全性和隐私性，例如可用性和特权分离，所以它们在各种现实环境中都是合乎需要的。然而，将秘密共享方案从理论研究过渡到实际应用必须考虑在实现这些属性时由于具体实现、威胁模型和用例的现实而出现的差距。我们使用Ellison的仪式概念给出了一个形式化和分析，证明了秘密共享方案的用例中的简单变化如何导致一些安全属性的潜在损失，这一结果不能仅从底层密码协议的分析中得出。我们的框架考虑了秘密共享实现的设计和分析中的这种变化，通过呈现更详细的以用户为中心的过程，并定义以前忽略的关于方案中用户角色和动作的假设，以支持设计这种仪式时的分析。我们确定现有的机制，当应用于适当的实现时，这些机制可以弥补我们确定的安全漏洞。我们提出了我们的实现，包括这些机制和相应的安全评估使用我们的框架。
papers.title_zh: 小心差距:应用秘密共享的仪式

papers.title: Privacy at a Glance: The User-Centric Design of Glanceable Data Exposure Visualizations
papers.authors: Daricia Wilkinson, Paritosh Bahirat, Moses Namara, Jing Lyu, Arwa Alsubhi, Jessica Qiu, Pamela J. Wisniewski, Bart P. Knijnenburg
papers.abstract: Abstract Smartphone users are often unaware of mobile applications’ (“apps”) third-party data collection and sharing practices, which put them at higher risk of privacy breaches. One way to raise awareness of these practices is by providing unobtrusive but pervasive visualizations that can be presented in a glanceable manner. In this paper, we applied Wogalter et al.’s Communication-Human Information Processing model (C-HIP) to design and prototype eight different visualizations that depict smartphone apps’ data sharing activities. We varied the granularity and type (i.e., data-centric or app-centric) of information shown to users and used the screensaver/lock screen as a design probe. Through interview-based design probes with Android users (n=15), we investigated the aspects of the data exposure visualizations that influenced users’ comprehension and privacy awareness. Our results shed light on how users’ perceptions of privacy boundaries influence their preference regarding the information structure of these visualizations, and the tensions that exist in these visualizations between glanceability and granularity. We discuss how a pervasive, soft paternalistic approach to privacy-related visualization may raise awareness by enhancing the transparency of information flow, thereby, unobtrusively increasing users’ understanding of data sharing practices of mobile apps. We also discuss implications for privacy research and glanceable security.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要智能手机用户通常不知道移动应用程序(“应用程序”)的第三方数据收集和共享做法，这使他们面临更高的隐私泄露风险。提高对这些实践的认识的一个方法是提供不显眼但普遍的可视化，可以用一种简略的方式呈现。在本文中，我们应用Wogalter等人的沟通-人类信息处理模型(C-HIP)来设计和构建八种不同的可视化模型，这些模型描述了智能手机应用程序的数据共享活动。我们改变了显示给用户的信息的粒度和类型(即以数据为中心或以应用程序为中心),并使用屏保/锁屏作为设计探针。通过对Android用户(n=15)进行基于访谈的设计调查，我们研究了影响用户理解和隐私意识的数据暴露可视化的各个方面。我们的结果揭示了用户对隐私边界的感知如何影响他们对这些可视化信息结构的偏好，以及这些可视化中存在的可浏览性和粒度之间的紧张关系。我们讨论了一种普遍的、软家长式的隐私相关可视化方法如何通过增强信息流的透明度来提高意识，从而不引人注目地增加用户对移动应用程序数据共享实践的理解。我们还讨论了隐私研究和简略安全的含义。
papers.title_zh: 隐私一览:以用户为中心的简略数据暴露可视化设计

papers.title: Smart Devices in Airbnbs: Considering Privacy and Security for both Guests and Hosts
papers.authors: Shrirang Mare, Franziska Roesner, Tadayoshi Kohno
papers.abstract: Abstract Consumer smart home devices are becoming increasingly pervasive. As Airbnb hosts deploy smart devices in spaces shared with guests, we seek to understand the security and privacy implications of these devices for both hosts and guests. We conducted a large-scale survey of 82 hosts and 554 guests to explore their current technology practices, their preferences for smart devices and data collection/sharing, and their privacy and security concerns in the context of Airbnbs. We found that guests preferred smart devices, even viewed them as a luxury, but some guests were concerned that smart devices enable excessive monitoring and control, which could lead to repercussions from hosts (e.g., locked thermostat). On average, the views of guests and hosts on data collection in Airbnb were aligned, but for the data types where differences occur, serious privacy violations might happen. For example, 90% of our guest participants did not want to share their Internet history with hosts, but one in five hosts wanted access to that information. Overall, our findings surface tensions between hosts and guests around the use of smart devices and in-home data collection. We synthesize recommendations to address the surfaced tensions and identify broader research challenges.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要消费智能家居设备正变得越来越普及。随着Airbnb主机在与客人共享的空间部署智能设备，我们试图了解这些设备对主机和客人的安全和隐私影响。我们对82名主持人和554名客人进行了大规模调查，以了解他们当前的技术实践、他们对智能设备和数据收集/共享的偏好，以及他们在Airbnbs环境下的隐私和安全问题。我们发现，客人更喜欢智能设备，甚至将其视为奢侈品，但一些客人担心智能设备会导致过度的监控和控制，这可能会导致主机的反应(例如，锁定恒温器)。一般来说，客人和主人对Airbnb中数据收集的观点是一致的，但对于出现差异的数据类型，可能会发生严重的隐私侵犯。例如，90%的嘉宾参与者不希望与主持人分享他们的互联网历史，但五分之一的主持人希望访问这些信息。总的来说，我们的发现揭示了主人和客人在使用智能设备和家庭数据收集方面的紧张关系。我们综合建议，以解决表面的紧张局势，并确定更广泛的研究挑战。
papers.title_zh: 空中旅馆中的智能设备:考虑客人和主人的隐私和安全

papers.title: FLASH: Fast and Robust Framework for Privacy-preserving Machine Learning
papers.authors: Megha Byali, Harsh Chaudhari, Arpita Patra, Ajith Suresh
papers.abstract: Abstract Privacy-preserving machine learning (PPML) via Secure Multi-party Computation (MPC) has gained momentum in the recent past. Assuming a minimal network of pair-wise private channels, we propose an efficient four-party PPML framework over rings ℤ2ℓ, FLASH, the first of its kind in the regime of PPML framework, that achieves the strongest security notion of Guaranteed Output Delivery (all parties obtain the output irrespective of adversary’s behaviour). The state of the art ML frameworks such as ABY3 by Mohassel et.al (ACM CCS’18) and SecureNN by Wagh et.al (PETS’19) operate in the setting of 3 parties with one malicious corruption but achieve the weaker security guarantee of abort. We demonstrate PPML with real-time efficiency, using the following custom-made tools that overcome the limitations of the aforementioned state-of-the-art– (a) dot product, which is independent of the vector size unlike the state-of-the-art ABY3, SecureNN and ASTRA by Chaudhari et.al (ACM CCSW’19), all of which have linear dependence on the vector size. (b) Truncation and MSB Extraction, which are constant round and free of circuits like Parallel Prefix Adder (PPA) and Ripple Carry Adder (RCA), unlike ABY3 which uses these circuits and has round complexity of the order of depth of these circuits. We then exhibit the application of our FLASH framework in the secure server-aided prediction of vital algorithms– Linear Regression, Logistic Regression, Deep Neural Networks, and Binarized Neural Networks. We substantiate our theoretical claims through improvement in benchmarks of the aforementioned algorithms when compared with the current best framework ABY3. All the protocols are implemented over a 64-bit ring in LAN and WAN. Our experiments demonstrate that, for MNIST dataset, the improvement (in terms of throughput) ranges from 24 × to 1390 × over LAN and WAN together.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要近年来，通过安全多方计算(MPC)的隐私保护机器学习(PPML)获得了发展势头。假设一个成对专用信道的最小网络，我们提出了一个在环ℤ2ℓ上的高效的四方PPML框架，这是PPML框架体系中的第一个，它实现了保证输出传递的最强安全概念(所有各方都获得输出，而不管对手的行为)。诸如Mohassel等人的aby 3(ACM CCS’18)和Wagh等人的SecureNN(PETS’19)等现有ML框架在具有一次恶意破坏的三方环境中运行，但是实现了较弱的中止安全保证。我们使用以下定制的工具，以实时效率演示PPML，这些工具克服了上述最新技术的限制–( a)点积，它与矢量大小无关，而不像Chaudhari等人的最新技术ABY3、SecureNN和ASTRA(ACM CCSW ' 19)，所有这些工具都与矢量大小线性相关。(b)截断和MSB提取，它们是常数舍入，并且没有类似并行前缀加法器(PPA)和波纹进位加法器(RCA)的电路，不像ABY3使用这些电路并且具有这些电路的深度量级的舍入复杂度。然后，我们展示了我们的FLASH框架在安全的服务器辅助生命算法预测中的应用——线性回归、逻辑回归、深度神经网络和二进制神经网络。我们通过与目前最好的框架ABY3进行比较，改进了上述算法的基准，从而证实了我们的理论主张。所有协议都在局域网和广域网的64位环上实现。我们的实验表明，对于MNIST数据集，与局域网和广域网相比，性能提高了24倍到1390倍。
papers.title_zh: FLASH:保护隐私的快速健壮的机器学习框架

papers.title: Multiple Purposes, Multiple Problems: A User Study of Consent Dialogs after GDPR
papers.authors: Dominique Machuletz, Rainer Böhme
papers.abstract: Abstract The European Union’s General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) requires websites to ask for consent to the use of cookies for specific purposes. This enlarges the relevant design space for consent dialogs. Websites could try to maximize click-through rates and positive consent decision, even at the risk of users agreeing to more purposes than intended. We evaluate a practice observed on popular websites by conducting an experiment with one control and two treatment groups (N = 150 university students in two countries). We hypothesize that users’ consent decision is influenced by (1) the number of options, connecting to the theory of choice proliferation, and (2) the presence of a highlighted default button (“select all”), connecting to theories of social norms and deception in consumer research. The results show that participants who see a default button accept cookies for more purposes than the control group, while being less able to correctly recall their choice. After being reminded of their choice, they regret it more often and perceive the consent dialog as more deceptive than the control group. Whether users are presented one or three purposes has no significant effect on their decisions and perceptions. We discuss the results and outline policy implications.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要欧盟一般数据保护条例(GDPR)要求网站为特定目的使用cookies时必须征得同意。这扩大了同意对话框的相关设计空间。网站可以试图最大限度地提高点击率和积极同意的决定，即使用户同意比预期更多的目的。我们通过对一个控制组和两个治疗组(两个国家的150名大学生)进行实验来评估在流行网站上观察到的实践。我们假设用户的同意决定受到以下因素的影响:(1)选项的数量，这与选择扩散理论有关，以及(2)突出显示的默认按钮(“全选”)的存在，这与消费者研究中的社会规范和欺骗理论有关。结果显示，与对照组相比，看到默认按钮的参与者接受cookies的目的更多，但更难正确回忆起他们的选择。在被提醒他们的选择后，他们更经常后悔，并且认为同意对话框比控制组更具欺骗性。用户是否被呈现一个或三个目的对他们的决定和感知没有显著的影响。我们讨论了结果并概述了政策含义。
papers.title_zh: 多重目的，多重问题:GDPR事件后同意对话的用户研究

papers.title: Missed by Filter Lists: Detecting Unknown Third-Party Trackers with Invisible Pixels
papers.authors: Imane Fouad, Nataliia Bielova, Arnaud Legout, Natasa Sarafijanovic-Djukic
papers.abstract: Abstract Web tracking has been extensively studied over the last decade. To detect tracking, previous studies and user tools rely on filter lists. However, it has been shown that filter lists miss trackers. In this paper, we propose an alternative method to detect trackers inspired by analyzing behavior of invisible pixels. By crawling 84,658 webpages from 8,744 domains, we detect that third-party invisible pixels are widely deployed: they are present on more than 94.51% of domains and constitute 35.66% of all third-party images. We propose a fine-grained behavioral classification of tracking based on the analysis of invisible pixels. We use this classification to detect new categories of tracking and uncover new collaborations between domains on the full dataset of 4, 216, 454 third-party requests. We demonstrate that two popular methods to detect tracking, based on EasyList&EasyPrivacy and on Disconnect lists respectively miss 25.22% and 30.34% of the trackers that we detect. Moreover, we find that if we combine all three lists, 379, 245 requests originated from 8,744 domains still track users on 68.70% of websites.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要网络跟踪在过去的十年中得到了广泛的研究。为了检测跟踪，以前的研究和用户工具依赖于过滤器列表。然而，已经表明过滤器列出了错过的跟踪器。在本文中，我们提出了一种替代的方法来检测跟踪的启发分析行为的不可见像素。通过从8，744个域中抓取84，658个网页，我们检测到第三方不可见像素被广泛部署:它们出现在超过94.51%的域中，并构成所有第三方图像的35.66%。我们提出了一种基于不可见像素分析的细粒度跟踪行为分类方法。我们使用这种分类来检测跟踪的新类别，并在4，216，454个第三方请求的完整数据集上发现域之间的新协作。我们证明，基于EasyList&EasyPrivacy和基于Disconnect lists的两种流行的跟踪检测方法分别错过了我们检测到的25.22%和30.34%的跟踪者。此外，我们发现，如果我们结合所有三个列表，来自8，744个域的379，245个请求仍然在68.70%的网站上跟踪用户。
papers.title_zh: 被过滤器列表遗漏:检测带有不可见像素的未知第三方跟踪器

papers.title: A Tale of Two Trees: One Writes, and Other Reads
papers.authors: Duc Viet Le, Lizzy Tengana Hurtado, Adil Ahmad, Mohsen Minaei, Byoungyoung Lee, Aniket Kate
papers.abstract: Abstract The Bitcoin network has offered a new way of securely performing financial transactions over the insecure network. Nevertheless, this ability comes with the cost of storing a large (distributed) ledger, which has become unsuitable for personal devices of any kind. Although the simplified payment verification (SPV) clients can address this storage issue, a Bitcoin SPV client has to rely on other Bitcoin nodes to obtain its transaction history and the current approaches offer no privacy guarantees to the SPV clients. This work presents T3, a trusted hardware-secured Bitcoin full client that supports efficient oblivious search/update for Bitcoin SPV clients without sacrificing the privacy of the clients. In this design, we leverage the trusted execution and attestation capabilities of a trusted execution environment (TEE) and the ability to hide access patterns of oblivious random access machine (ORAM) to protect SPV clients’ requests from potentially malicious nodes. The key novelty of T3 lies in the optimizations introduced to conventional ORAM, tailored for expected SPV client usages. In particular, by making a natural assumption about the access patterns of SPV clients, we are able to propose a two-tree ORAM construction that overcomes the concurrency limitation associated with traditional ORAMs. We have implemented and tested our system using the current Bitcoin Unspent Transaction Output (UTXO) Set. Our experiment shows that T3 is feasible to be deployed in practice while providing strong privacy and security guarantees to Bitcoin SPV clients.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要比特币网络提供了一种在不安全的网络上安全进行金融交易的新方式。然而，这种能力伴随着存储大型(分布式)分类账的成本，这已经变得不适合任何种类的个人设备。虽然简化支付验证(SPV)客户端可以解决这个存储问题，但比特币SPV客户端必须依赖其他比特币节点来获取其交易历史，并且当前的方法没有向SPV客户端提供隐私保证。这项工作介绍了T3，一个可信的硬件安全的比特币全客户端，支持比特币SPV客户端的高效遗忘搜索/更新，而不牺牲客户端的隐私。在该设计中，我们利用可信执行环境(TEE)的可信执行和证明功能，以及隐藏不经意随机访问机器(ORAM)的访问模式的能力，来保护SPV客户端的请求免受潜在恶意节点的攻击。T3的主要创新之处在于对传统ORAM进行了优化，为预期的SPV客户使用量身定制。特别地，通过对SPV客户端的访问模式进行自然假设，我们能够提出一种二叉树ORAM结构，该结构克服了与传统ORAMs相关的并发限制。我们已经使用当前的比特币未用交易输出(UTXO)集实现并测试了我们的系统。我们的实验表明，T3在实践中部署是可行的，同时为比特币SPV客户提供了强大的隐私和安全保障。
papers.title_zh: 两棵树的故事:一棵树写，另一棵树读

papers.title: Identifying Influential Spreaders in a Social Network (While Preserving Privacy)
papers.authors: Varsha Bhat Kukkala, S. R. S. Iyengar
papers.abstract: Abstract In order to disseminate information in a social network, it is important to first identify the influential spreaders in the network. Using them as the seed spreaders, the aim is to ensure that the information is cascaded throughout the network. The traditional approach to identifying influential nodes is to determine the top-r ranked nodes in accordance with various ranking methods such as PageRank, k-Shell decomposition, ClusterRank and VoteRank. In the current work, we study the problem of ranking the nodes when the underlying graph is distributedly held by a set of individuals, who consider their share of the data as private information. In particular, we design efficient secure multiparty computation (MPC) protocols for k-Shell decomposition, PageRank and VoteRank. For improved efficiency, we employ the oblivious RAM construct in conjunction with efficient data-oblivious graph data structures. We are the first to propose a secure variant of the VoteRank algorithm. We prove that the proposed protocols are asymptotically more efficient and have lower runtime in practice than the previous best known MPC protocols for computing k-Shell decomposition and PageRank centrality scores.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要为了在社交网络中传播信息，首先识别网络中有影响力的传播者是很重要的。使用它们作为种子传播器，目的是确保信息在整个网络中级联。识别有影响的节点的传统方法是根据诸如PageRank、k壳分解、ClusterRank和VoteRank之类的各种排序方法来确定排名前r的节点。在当前的工作中，我们研究了底层图由一组个人分布式持有时的节点排序问题，这些个人认为他们的数据份额是私有信息。特别地，我们为k壳分解、PageRank和VoteRank设计了有效的安全多方计算(MPC)协议。为了提高效率，我们将不经意RAM结构与高效的数据不经意图数据结构结合使用。我们首先提出了VoteRank算法的安全变体。我们证明了在计算k壳分解和PageRank中心性分数时，所提出的协议在实践中比以前最著名的MPC协议渐进地更有效并且具有更低的运行时间。
papers.title_zh: 识别社交网络中有影响力的传播者(同时保护隐私)

papers.title: Long-Term Observation on Browser Fingerprinting: Users' Trackability and Perspective
papers.authors: Gaston Pugliese, Christian Riess, Freya Gassmann, Zinaida Benenson
papers.abstract: Abstract Browser fingerprinting as a tracking technique to recognize users based on their browsers’ unique features or behavior has been known for more than a decade. We present the results of a 3-year online study on browser fingerprinting with more than 1,300 users. This is the first study with ground truth on user level, which allows the assessment of trackability based on fingerprints of multiple browsers and devices per user. Based on our longitudinal observations of 88,000 measurements with over 300 considered browser features, we optimized feature sets for mobile and desktop devices. Further, we conducted two user surveys to determine the representativeness of our user sample based on users’ demographics and technical background, and to learn how users perceive browser fingerprinting and how they protect themselves.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要浏览器指纹识别作为一种基于用户浏览器的独特特征或行为来识别用户的跟踪技术已经被人们所知十多年了。我们展示了对1，300多名用户进行的为期3年的浏览器指纹在线研究的结果。这是第一个在用户层面上使用地面实况的研究，它允许基于每个用户的多个浏览器和设备的指纹来评估可跟踪性。基于我们对88，000项测量和300多项浏览器功能的纵向观察，我们优化了移动和桌面设备的功能集。此外，我们进行了两次用户调查，以根据用户的人口统计和技术背景来确定我们的用户样本的代表性，并了解用户如何看待浏览器指纹以及他们如何保护自己。
papers.title_zh: 浏览器指纹的长期观察:用户的可追踪性和前景

papers.title: Editors' Introduction
papers.authors: Kostas Chatzikokolakis, Aaron Johnson
papers.abstract: Is there currently a crisis of confidence in psychological science reflecting an unprecedented level of doubt among practitioners about the reliability of research findings in the field? It would certainly appear that there is. These doubts emerged and grew as a series of unhappy events unfolded in 2011: the Diederik Stapel fraud case (see Stroebe, Postmes, & Spears, 2012, this issue), the publication in a major social psychology journal of an article purporting to show evidence of extrasensory perception (Bem, 2011) followed by widespread public mockery (see Galak, LeBoeuf, Nelson, & Simmons, in press; Wagenmakers, Wetzels, Borsboom, & van der Maas, 2011), reports by Wicherts and colleagues that psychologists are often unwilling or unable to share their published data for reanalysis (Wicherts, Bakker, & Molenaar, 2011; see also Wicherts, Borsboom, Kats, & Molenaar, 2006), and the publication of an important article in Psychological Science showing how easily researchers can, in the absence of any real effects, nonetheless obtain statistically significant differences through various questionable research practices (QRPs) such as exploring multiple dependent variables or covariates and only reporting these when they yield significant results (Simmons, Nelson, & Simonsohn, 2011). For those psychologists who expected that the embarrassments of 2011 would soon recede into memory, 2012 offered instead a quick plunge from bad to worse, with new indications of outright fraud in the field of social cognition (Simonsohn, 2012), an article in Psychological Science showing that many psychologists admit to engaging in at least some of the QRPs examined by Simmons and colleagues (John, Loewenstein, & Prelec, 2012), troubling new meta-analytic evidence suggesting that the QRPs described by Simmons and colleagues may even be leaving telltale signs visible in the distribution of p values in the psychological literature (Masicampo & Lalande, in press; Simonsohn, 2012), and an acrimonious dust-up in science magazines and blogs centered around the problems some investigators were having in replicating well-known results from the field of social cognition (Bower, 2012; Yong, 2012). Although the very public problems experienced by psychology over this 2-year period are embarrassing to those of us working in the field, some have found comfort in the fact that, over the same period, similar concerns have been arising across the scientific landscape (triggered by revelations that will be described shortly). Some of the suspected causes of unreplicability, such as publication bias (the tendency to publish only positive findings) have been discussed for years; in fact, the phrase file-drawer problem was first coined by a distinguished psychologist several decades ago (Rosenthal, 1979). However, many have speculated that these problems have been exacerbated in recent years as academia reaps the harvest of a hypercompetitive academic climate and an incentive scheme that provides rich rewards for overselling one’s work and few rewards at all for caution and circumspection (see Giner-Sorolla, 2012, this issue). Equally disturbing, investigators seem to be replicating each others’ work even less often than they did in the past, again presumably reflecting an incentive scheme gone askew (a point discussed in several articles in this issue, e.g., Makel, Plucker, & Hegarty, 2012). The frequency with which errors appear in the psychological literature is not presently known, but a number of facts suggest it might be disturbingly high. Ioannidis (2005) has shown through simple mathematical modeling that any scientific field that ignores replication can easily come to the miserable state wherein (as the title of his most famous article puts it) “most published research findings are false” (see also Ioannidis, 2012, this issue, and Pashler & Harris, 2012, this issue). Meanwhile, reports emerging from cancer research have made such grim scenarios seem more plausible: In 2012, several large pharmaceutical companies revealed that their efforts to replicate exciting preclinical findings from published academic studies in cancer biology were only rarely verifying the original results (Begley & Ellis, 2012; see also Osherovich, 2011; Prinz, Schlange, & Asadullah, 2011).
papers.abstract_zh: 目前心理科学是否出现了信任危机，反映出从业者对该领域研究结果的可靠性产生了前所未有的怀疑？显然是有的。随着2011年一系列不愉快事件的发生，这些怀疑出现了，并有所增长:Diederik Stapel欺诈案(见Stroebe，Postmes，& Spears，2012，这一期)，在一份主要的社会心理学杂志上发表了一篇文章，声称显示了超感知觉的证据(Bem，2011)，随后受到了广泛的公开嘲笑(见Galak，LeBoeuf，Nelson，& Simmons，正在出版中；Wagenmakers，Wetzels，Borsboom，& van der Maas，2011)，Wicherts及其同事报告说，心理学家往往不愿意或不能分享他们发表的数据进行再分析(Wicherts，Bakker，& Molenaar，2011；另见Wicherts，Borsboom，Kats，& Molenaar，2006)，以及发表在《心理科学》上的一篇重要文章，该文章表明，在没有任何实际影响的情况下，研究人员可以通过各种有问题的研究实践(qrp)轻松地获得统计学上的显著差异，如探索多个因变量或协变量，并仅在它们产生显著结果时报告这些结果(Simmons，Nelson，& Simonsohn，2011)。对于那些预计2011年的尴尬将很快消失在记忆中的心理学家来说，2012年反而提供了一个从糟糕到更糟糕的快速跳水，在社会认知领域出现了新的明显的欺诈迹象(Simonsohn，2012)，心理科学中的一篇文章显示，许多心理学家承认至少参与了Simmons及其同事检查的一些快速反应程序(John，Loewenstein，& Prelec，2012)。 令人不安的新荟萃分析证据表明，Simmons及其同事描述的qrp甚至可能在心理学文献中的p值分布中留下明显的迹象(Masicampo & Lalande，出版中； Simonsohn，2012)，科学杂志和博客上围绕一些研究人员在复制社会认知领域的知名结果时遇到的问题展开了激烈的争论(Bower，2012；永，2012)。虽然心理学在这两年中所经历的非常公开的问题令我们这些在该领域工作的人感到尴尬，但一些人已经找到了安慰，因为在同一时期，类似的担忧已经在整个科学领域出现(由即将描述的启示引发)。一些不可复制的可疑原因，如发表偏倚(倾向于只发表积极的发现)已经讨论了多年；事实上，抽屉问题这个短语是由一位杰出的心理学家在几十年前首次提出的(Rosenthal，1979)。然而，许多人推测，这些问题在最近几年已经恶化，因为学术界收获了高度竞争的学术氛围和奖励计划，这种奖励计划为过度销售自己的工作提供了丰厚的奖励，而对谨慎和谨慎却几乎没有奖励(见吉纳-索罗拉，2012年，这一期)。同样令人不安的是，研究人员似乎比过去更少地重复彼此的工作，这可能再次反映了一个倾斜的激励机制(这一点在本期的几篇文章中讨论过，例如，马克尔、普吕克尔和赫加蒂，2012)。错误出现在心理学文献中的频率目前还不清楚，但许多事实表明它可能高得令人不安。约安尼迪斯(2005)通过简单的数学建模表明，任何忽视复制的科学领域都很容易陷入悲惨的境地，其中(正如他最著名的文章的标题所言)“大多数发表的研究结果都是错误的”(另见约安尼迪斯，2012，本期，以及Pashler & Harris，2012，本期)。与此同时，来自癌症研究的报告让这种严峻的情景看起来更加可信:2012年，几家大型制药公司透露，他们在癌症生物学方面复制已发表学术研究中令人兴奋的临床前发现的努力很少验证原始结果(Begley & Ellis，2012；另见Osherovich，2011年；普林茨、施朗格和阿萨杜拉，2011年)。
papers.title_zh: 编辑介绍

papers.title: Tik-Tok: The Utility of Packet Timing in Website Fingerprinting Attacks
papers.authors: Mohammad Saidur Rahman, Payap Sirinam, Nate Mathews, Kantha Girish Gangadhara, Matthew Wright
papers.abstract: Abstract A passive local eavesdropper can leverage Website Fingerprinting (WF) to deanonymize the web browsing activity of Tor users. The value of timing information to WF has often been discounted in recent works due to the volatility of low-level timing information. In this paper, we more carefully examine the extent to which packet timing can be used to facilitate WF attacks. We first propose a new set of timing-related features based on burst-level characteristics to further identify more ways that timing patterns could be used by classifiers to identify sites. Then we evaluate the effectiveness of both raw timing and directional timing which is a combination of raw timing and direction in a deep-learning-based WF attack. Our closed-world evaluation shows that directional timing performs best in most of the settings we explored, achieving: (i) 98.4% in undefended Tor traffic; (ii) 93.5% on WTF-PAD traffic, several points higher than when only directional information is used; and (iii) 64.7% against onion sites, 12% higher than using only direction. Further evaluations in the open-world setting show small increases in both precision (+2%) and recall (+6%) with directional-timing on WTF-PAD traffic. To further investigate the value of timing information, we perform an information leakage analysis on our proposed handcrafted features. Our results show that while timing features leak less information than directional features, the information contained in each feature is mutually exclusive to one another and can thus improve the robustness of a classifier.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要被动的本地窃听者可以利用网站指纹(WF)来解密Tor用户的网页浏览活动。由于低水平定时信息的波动性，定时信息对WF的价值在最近的工作中经常被打折扣。在本文中，我们更仔细地研究了数据包计时在多大程度上可以被用来促进WF攻击。我们首先提出一组新的基于突发级特征的时序相关特征，以进一步识别时序模式可以被分类器用来识别站点的更多方式。然后，我们评估了原始定时和方向定时的有效性，方向定时是基于深度学习的WF攻击中原始定时和方向的组合。我们的封闭世界评估表明，定向计时在我们探索的大多数设置中表现最佳，实现了:(I)在无防御Tor流量中98.4%；(ii)WTF-PAD业务量的93.5%，比仅使用方向信息时高几个点；和(iii)针对洋葱站点的64.7%，比仅使用方向高12%。在开放世界环境中的进一步评估显示，在WTF-PAD流量上使用定向计时，精确度(+2%)和召回率(+6%)都有小幅提高。为了进一步研究定时信息的价值，我们对我们提出的手工制作的特征进行了信息泄漏分析。我们的结果表明，虽然定时特征泄漏的信息比方向特征少，但每个特征中包含的信息相互排斥，因此可以提高分类器的鲁棒性。
papers.title_zh: Tik-Tok:数据包计时在网站指纹攻击中的效用

papers.title: Multi-χ: Identifying Multiple Authors from Source Code Files
papers.authors: Mohammed Abuhamad, Tamer AbuHmed, DaeHun Nyang, David Mohaisen
papers.abstract: Abstract Most authorship identification schemes assume that code samples are written by a single author. However, real software projects are typically the result of a team effort, making it essential to consider a finegrained multi-author identification in a single code sample, which we address with Multi-χ. Multi-χ leverages a deep learning-based approach for multi-author identification in source code, is lightweight, uses a compact representation for efficiency, and does not require any code parsing, syntax tree extraction, nor feature selection. In Multi-χ, code samples are divided into small segments, which are then represented as a sequence of n-dimensional term representations. The sequence is fed into an RNN-based verification model to assist a segment integration process which integrates positively verified segments, i.e., integrates segments that have a high probability of being written by one author. Finally, the resulting segments from the integration process are represented using word2vec or TF-IDF and fed into the identification model. We evaluate Multi-χ with several Github projects (Caffe, Facebook’s Folly, Tensor-Flow, etc.) and show remarkable accuracy. For example, Multi-χ achieves an authorship example-based accuracy (A-EBA) of 86.41% and per-segment authorship identification of 93.18% for identifying 562 programmers. We examine the performance against multiple dimensions and design choices, and demonstrate its effectiveness.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要大多数作者身份识别方案都假设代码样本由一个作者编写。然而，真正的软件项目通常是团队努力的结果，这使得在单个代码样本中考虑细粒度的多作者标识变得至关重要，我们用Multi-χ来解决这个问题。Multi-χ利用基于深度学习的方法来识别源代码中的多作者，是轻量级的，使用紧凑的表示来提高效率，并且不需要任何代码解析、语法树提取，也不需要特征选择。在Multi-χ中，代码样本被分成小段，然后这些小段被表示为n维项表示的序列。该序列被馈送到基于RNN的验证模型中，以帮助片段整合过程，该过程整合肯定被验证的片段，即，整合具有被一个作者写入的高概率的片段。最后，使用word2vec或TF-IDF表示集成过程产生的片段，并将其输入到识别模型中。我们用几个Github项目(Caffe，脸书的Folly，Tensor-Flow等)评估Multi-χ。)并表现出非凡的准确性。例如，对于识别562个程序员，Multi-χ实现了86.41%的基于作者实例的准确度(A-EBA)和93.18%的每段作者身份识别。我们根据多个维度和设计选择检查性能，并展示其有效性。
papers.title_zh: 多重χ:从源代码文件中识别多个作者

papers.title: Secure k-ish Nearest Neighbors Classifier
papers.authors: Hayim Shaul, Dan Feldman, Daniela Rus
papers.abstract: Abstract The k-nearest neighbors (kNN) classifier predicts a class of a query, q, by taking the majority class of its k neighbors in an existing (already classified) database, S. In secure kNN, q and S are owned by two different parties and q is classified without sharing data. In this work we present a classifier based on kNN, that is more efficient to implement with homomorphic encryption (HE). The efficiency of our classifier comes from a relaxation we make to consider κ nearest neighbors for κ ≈k with probability that increases as the statistical distance between Gaussian and the distribution of the distances from q to S decreases. We call our classifier k-ish Nearest Neighbors (k-ish NN). For the implementation we introduce double-blinded coin-toss where the bias and output of the toss are encrypted. We use it to approximate the average and variance of the distances from q to S in a scalable circuit whose depth is independent of |S|. We believe these to be of independent interest. We implemented our classifier in an open source library based on HElib and tested it on a breast tumor database. Our classifier has accuracy and running time comparable to current state of the art (non-HE) MPC solution that have better running time but worse communication complexity. It also has communication complexity similar to naive HE implementation that have worse running time.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要k-最近邻(kNN)分类器通过在现有(已经分类的)数据库S中取其k个邻居的大多数类来预测查询的类q。在安全kNN中，q和S由两个不同的方拥有，并且q在没有共享数据的情况下被分类。在这篇文章中，我们提出了一个基于kNN的分类器，使用同态加密(HE)可以更有效地实现它。我们的分类器的效率来自于我们考虑κ ≈k的κ最近邻的放松，其概率随着高斯和从q到S的距离分布之间的统计距离的减小而增加。我们称我们的分类器为k-ish最近邻(k-ish NN)。为了实现，我们引入了双盲投币，其中投币的偏差和输出被加密。我们用它来近似深度与|S|无关的可扩展电路中从q到S的距离的平均值和方差。我们认为这些是独立的利益。我们在基于HElib的开源库中实现了我们的分类器，并在乳腺肿瘤数据库上进行测试。我们的分类器的准确性和运行时间与当前技术水平(非he)的MPC解决方案相当，后者具有更好的运行时间，但通信复杂度更低。它还具有类似于具有更差运行时间的简单HE实现的通信复杂性。
papers.title_zh: 安全的k-ish最近邻分类器

papers.title: P4TC - Provably-Secure yet Practical Privacy-Preserving Toll Collection
papers.authors: Valerie Fetzer, Max Hoffmann, Matthias Nagel, Andy Rupp, Rebecca Schwerdt
papers.abstract: Abstract Electronic toll collection (ETC) is widely used all over the world not only to finance our road infrastructures, but also to realize advanced features like congestion management and pollution reduction by means of dynamic pricing. Unfortunately, existing systems rely on user identification and allow tracing a user’s movements. Several abuses of this personalized location data have already become public. In view of the planned Europeanwide interoperable tolling system EETS and the new EU General Data Protection Regulation, location privacy becomes of particular importance. In this paper, we propose a flexible security model and crypto protocol framework designed for privacy-preserving toll collection in the most dominant setting, i.e., Dedicated Short Range Communication (DSRC) ETC. A major challenge in designing the framework at hand was to combine provable security and practicality, where the latter includes practical performance figures and a suitable treatment of real-world issues, like broken onboard units etc. To the best of our knowledge, our work is the first in the DSRC setting with a rigorous security model and proof and arguably the most comprehensive formal treatment of ETC security and privacy overall. Additionally, we provide a prototypical implementation on realistic hardware which already features fairly practical performance figures. An interaction between an onboard unit and a road-side unit is estimated to take less than a second allowing for toll collection at full speed assuming one road-side unit per lane.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要电子不停车收费系统(ETC)在世界范围内被广泛应用，它不仅可以为我们的道路基础设施提供资金，还可以通过动态收费来实现拥堵管理和减少污染等先进功能。不幸的是，现有的系统依赖于用户识别，并允许跟踪用户的移动。这种个性化位置数据的一些滥用已经公开。鉴于计划中的全欧洲互操作收费系统EETS和新的欧盟通用数据保护条例，位置隐私变得特别重要。在本文中，我们提出了一个灵活的安全模型和加密协议框架，设计用于在最主要的设置，即专用短程通信(DSRC)等中保护隐私的收费。设计当前框架的一个主要挑战是结合可证明的安全性和实用性，后者包括实际的性能数据和对现实世界问题的适当处理，如损坏的机载单元等。据我们所知，我们的工作在DSRC环境中是第一个，具有严格的安全模型和证明，可以说是对ETC安全性和隐私的最全面的正式处理。此外，我们还提供了一个在真实硬件上的原型实现，它已经具有相当实用的性能数据。假设每条车道一个路侧单元，车载单元和路侧单元之间的交互估计花费不到一秒钟，从而允许全速收费。
papers.title_zh: P4TC -可证明安全且实用的隐私保护收费

papers.title: Differentially-Private Multi-Party Sketching for Large-Scale Statistics
papers.authors: Seung Geol Choi, Dana Dachman-Soled, Mukul Kulkarni, Arkady Yerukhimovich
papers.abstract: Abstract We consider a scenario where multiple organizations holding large amounts of sensitive data from their users wish to compute aggregate statistics on this data while protecting the privacy of individual users. To support large-scale analytics we investigate how this privacy can be provided for the case of sketching algorithms running in time sub-linear of the input size. We begin with the well-known LogLog sketch for computing the number of unique elements in a data stream. We show that this algorithm already achieves differential privacy (even without adding any noise) when computed using a private hash function by a trusted curator. Next, we show how to eliminate this requirement of a private hash function by injecting a small amount of noise, allowing us to instantiate an efficient LogLog protocol for the multi-party setting. To demonstrate the practicality of this approach, we run extensive experimentation on multiple data sets, including the publicly available IP address data set from University of Michigan’s scans of internet IPv4 space, to determine the trade-offs among efficiency, privacy and accuracy of our implementation for varying numbers of parties and input sizes. Finally, we generalize our approach for the LogLog sketch and obtain a general framework for constructing multi-party differentially private protocols for several other sketching algorithms.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要我们考虑这样一个场景:拥有大量用户敏感数据的多个组织希望在保护单个用户隐私的同时计算这些数据的汇总统计数据。为了支持大规模分析，我们研究了如何为在输入大小的次线性时间内运行的草图算法提供这种隐私。我们从众所周知的计算数据流中唯一元素数量的对数草图开始。我们证明，当可信管理者使用私有散列函数计算时，该算法已经实现了差分隐私(即使没有添加任何噪声)。接下来，我们将展示如何通过注入少量噪声来消除对私有散列函数的这一需求，从而允许我们为多方设置实例化一个高效的LogLog协议。为了证明这种方法的实用性，我们对多个数据集进行了广泛的实验，包括来自密歇根大学的互联网IPv4空间扫描的公开可用的IP地址数据集，以确定对于不同数量的参与方和输入大小，我们实施的效率、隐私和准确性之间的权衡。最后，我们将我们的方法推广到LogLog sketch，并得到了一个为其他几种sketch算法构造多方差分私有协议的通用框架。
papers.title_zh: 用于大规模统计的差分私有多方草图

papers.title: Scaling Up Anonymous Communication with Efficient Nanopayment Channels
papers.authors: Thien-Nam Dinh, Florentin Rochet, Olivier Pereira, Dan S. Wallach
papers.abstract: Abstract Tor, the most widely used and well-studied traffic anonymization network in the world, suffers from limitations in its network diversity and performance. We propose to mitigate both problems simultaneously through the introduction of a premium bandwidth market between clients and relays. To this end, we present moneTor: incentivizing nodes to join and support Tor by giving them anonymous payments from Tor users. Our approach uses efficient cryptographic nanopayments delivered alongside regular Tor traffic. Our approach also gives a degree of centralized control, allowing Tor’s managers to shape the economy created by these payments. In this paper, we present a novel payment algorithm as well as a data-driven simulation and evaluation of its costs and benefits. The results show that moneTor is both feasible and flexible, offering upwards of 100% improvements in differentiated bandwidth for paying users with near-optimal throughput and latency overheads.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要Tor是世界上使用最广泛和研究最深入的流量匿名网络，但它在网络多样性和性能方面存在局限性。我们建议通过在客户端和中继之间引入额外带宽市场来同时缓解这两个问题。为此，我们提出moneTor:通过Tor用户的匿名支付，激励节点加入并支持Tor。我们的方法使用高效的加密纳米支付与常规Tor流量一起交付。我们的方法还提供了一定程度的集中控制，允许Tor的经理们通过这些支付来塑造经济。在本文中，我们提出了一种新的支付算法，以及数据驱动的模拟和评估其成本和收益。结果表明，moneTor既可行又灵活，为付费用户提供了高达100%的差异化带宽改善，吞吐量和延迟开销接近最佳。
papers.title_zh: 通过高效的纳米支付渠道扩大匿名通信

papers.title: Mitigator: Privacy policy compliance using trusted hardware
papers.authors: Miti Mazmudar, Ian Goldberg
papers.abstract: Abstract Through recent years, much research has been conducted into processing privacy policies and presenting them in ways that are easy for users to understand. However, understanding privacy policies has little utility if the website’s data processing code does not match the privacy policy. Although systems have been proposed to achieve compliance of internal software to access control policies, they assume a large trusted computing base and are not designed to provide a proof of compliance to an end user. We design Mitigator, a system to enforce compliance of a website’s source code with a privacy policy model that addresses these two drawbacks of previous work. We use trusted hardware platforms to provide a guarantee to an end user that their data is only handled by code that is compliant with the privacy policy. Such an end user only needs to trust a small module in the hardware of the remote back-end machine and related libraries but not the entire OS. We also provide a proof-of-concept implementation of Mitigator and evaluate it for its latency. We conclude that it incurs only a small overhead with respect to an unmodified system that does not provide a guarantee of privacy policy compliance to the end user.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要近年来，在处理隐私策略和以用户易于理解的方式呈现隐私策略方面进行了大量的研究。然而，如果网站的数据处理代码与隐私政策不匹配，那么理解隐私政策就没有多大用处。尽管已经提出了系统来实现内部软件对访问控制策略的遵从，但是它们假定了大的可信计算基础，并且没有被设计成向最终用户提供遵从的证明。我们设计了Mitigator，一个强制网站源代码符合隐私策略模型的系统，解决了以前工作的这两个缺点。我们使用可信硬件平台向最终用户保证，他们的数据仅由符合隐私政策的代码处理。这样的终端用户只需要信任远程后端机器的硬件中的一个小模块和相关的库，而不是整个操作系统。我们还提供了Mitigator的概念验证实现，并对其延迟进行了评估。我们的结论是，相对于没有向最终用户提供隐私策略遵从性保证的未修改的系统，它仅招致很小的开销。
papers.title_zh: Mitigator:使用可信硬件遵守隐私策略

papers.title: The Price is (Not) Right: Comparing Privacy in Free and Paid Apps
papers.authors: Catherine Han, Irwin Reyes, Álvaro Feal, Joel Reardon, Primal Wijesekera, Narseo Vallina-Rodriguez, Amit Elazari Bar On, Kenneth A. Bamberger, Serge Egelman
papers.abstract: Abstract It is commonly assumed that “free” mobile apps come at the cost of consumer privacy and that paying for apps could offer consumers protection from behavioral advertising and long-term tracking. This work empirically evaluates the validity of this assumption by comparing the privacy practices of free apps and their paid premium versions, while also gauging consumer expectations surrounding free and paid apps. We use both static and dynamic analysis to examine 5,877 pairs of free Android apps and their paid counterparts for differences in data collection practices and privacy policies between pairs. To understand user expectations for paid apps, we conducted a 998-participant online survey and found that consumers expect paid apps to have better security and privacy behaviors. However, there is no clear evidence that paying for an app will actually guarantee protection from extensive data collection in practice. Given that the free version had at least one thirdparty library or dangerous permission, respectively, we discovered that 45% of the paid versions reused all of the same third-party libraries as their free versions, and 74% of the paid versions had all of the dangerous permissions held by the free app. Likewise, our dynamic analysis revealed that 32% of the paid apps exhibit all of the same data collection and transmission behaviors as their free counterparts. Finally, we found that 40% of apps did not have a privacy policy link in the Google Play Store and that only 3.7% of the pairs that did reflected differences between the free and paid versions.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要人们普遍认为，“免费”的移动应用程序是以牺牲消费者隐私为代价的，为应用程序付费可以保护消费者免受行为广告和长期跟踪的影响。这项工作通过比较免费应用程序及其付费高级版本的隐私做法，同时衡量消费者对免费和付费应用程序的期望，从经验上评估了这一假设的有效性。我们使用静态和动态分析来检查5，877对免费的Android应用程序和它们的付费应用程序，以了解它们之间在数据收集实践和隐私政策方面的差异。为了了解用户对付费应用的期望，我们进行了一项有998名参与者的在线调查，发现消费者希望付费应用具有更好的安全性和隐私行为。然而，没有明确的证据表明，为应用程序付费实际上会保证在实践中免受大量数据收集的影响。假设免费版本至少分别有一个第三方库或危险权限，我们发现45%的付费版本重用所有相同的第三方库作为其免费版本，74%的付费版本拥有免费应用程序拥有的所有危险权限。同样，我们的动态分析显示，32%的付费应用表现出与免费应用相同的数据收集和传输行为。最后，我们发现，在谷歌Play商店，40%的应用程序没有隐私政策链接，只有3.7%的应用程序反映了免费和付费版本之间的差异。
papers.title_zh: 价格(不)合适:比较免费和付费应用中的隐私

papers.title: SiegeBreaker: An SDN Based Practical Decoy Routing System
papers.authors: Piyush Kumar Sharma, Devashish Gosain, Himanshu Sagar, Chaitanya Kumar, Aneesh Dogra, Vinayak Naik, H. B. Acharya, Sambuddho Chakravarty
papers.abstract: Abstract Decoy Routing (DR), a promising approach to censorship circumvention, uses routers (rather than end hosts) as proxy servers. Users of censored networks, who wish to use DR, send specially crafted packets, nominally addressed to an uncensored website. Once safely out of the censored network, the packets encounter a special router (the Decoy Router) which identifies them using a secret handshake, and proxies them to their true destination (a censored site). However, DR has implementation problems: it is infeasible to reprogram routers for the complex operations required. Existing DR solutions fall back on using commodity servers as a Decoy Router. But as servers are not efficient at routing, most web applications show poor performance when accessed over DR. A further concern is that the Decoy Router has to inspect all flows in order to identify the ones that need DR. This may itself be a breach of privacy for other users (who neither require DR nor want to be monitored). In this paper, we present a novel DR system, Siege- Breaker (SB), which solves the aforementioned problems using an SDN-based architecture. Previous proposals involve a single unit which performs all major operations (inspecting all flows, identifying the DR requests and proxying them). In contrast, SB distributes the tasks for DR among three independent modules. (1) The SDN controller identifies DR requests via a covert, privacy preserving scheme, and does not need to inspect all flows. (2) The reconfigurable SDN switch intercepts packets, and forwards them to a secret proxy efficiently. (3) The secret proxy server proxies the client’s traffic to the censored site. Our modular, lightweight design achieves performance comparable to direct TCP downloads, for both in-lab setups, and Internet based tests involving commercial SDN switches.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要诱骗路由(DR)是一种很有前途的规避审查的方法，它使用路由器(而不是终端主机)作为代理服务器。希望使用灾难恢复的审查网络用户发送特制的数据包，名义上是发往未经审查的网站。一旦安全地离开审查的网络，数据包就会遇到一个特殊的路由器(诱饵路由器),它使用一个秘密握手来识别它们，并代理它们到它们真正的目的地(一个审查的站点)。然而，DR有实现问题:为所需的复杂操作重新编程路由器是不可行的。现有的灾难恢复解决方案依赖于使用商用服务器作为诱饵路由器。但是，由于服务器在路由方面效率低下，大多数web应用程序在通过DR访问时表现不佳。另一个问题是，诱饵路由器必须检查所有流，以便识别需要DR的流。这本身可能会侵犯其他用户(他们既不需要DR也不想被监控)的隐私。在本文中，我们提出了一种新颖的灾难恢复系统——攻城器(SB ),它使用基于SDN的架构来解决上述问题。先前的提议涉及执行所有主要操作(检查所有流、识别DR请求并代理它们)的单个单元。相比之下，SB将灾难恢复任务分配给三个独立的模块。(SDN控制器通过隐蔽的隐私保护方案识别DR请求，并且不需要检查所有流。(2)可重新配置的SDN交换机拦截数据包，并高效地将它们转发到秘密代理。(3)秘密代理服务器代理客户端到审查站点的流量。我们的模块化、轻量级设计实现了可与直接TCP下载相媲美的性能，适用于实验室内设置和涉及商用SDN交换机的基于互联网的测试。
papers.title_zh: SiegeBreaker:一个基于SDN的实用诱饵路由系统

papers.title: Exposing Private User Behaviors of Collaborative Filtering via Model Inversion Techniques
papers.authors: Seira Hidano, Takao Murakami, Shuichi Katsumata, Shinsaku Kiyomoto, Goichiro Hanaoka
papers.abstract: Abstract Privacy risks of collaborative filtering (CF) have been widely studied. The current state-of-theart inference attack on user behaviors (e.g., ratings/purchases on sensitive items) for CF is by Calandrino et al. (S&P, 2011). They showed that if an adversary obtained a moderate amount of user’s public behavior before some time T, she can infer user’s private behavior after time T. However, the existence of an attack that infers user’s private behavior before T remains open. In this paper, we propose the first inference attack that reveals past private user behaviors. Our attack departs from previous techniques and is based on model inversion (MI). In particular, we propose the first MI attack on factorization-based CF systems by leveraging data poisoning by Li et al. (NIPS, 2016) in a novel way. We inject malicious users into the CF system so that adversarialy chosen “decoy” items are linked with user’s private behaviors. We also show how to weaken the assumption made by Li et al. on the information available to the adversary from the whole rating matrix to only the item profile and how to create malicious ratings effectively. We validate the effectiveness of our inference algorithm using two real-world datasets.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要协同过滤的隐私风险已被广泛研究。当前对用户行为(如敏感商品的评级/购买)的推理攻击是由Calandrino等人提出的(S&P，2011)。他们表明，如果对手在某个时间T之前获得了适量的用户公开行为，她就可以推断出用户在时间T之后的私人行为。然而，推断出用户在T之前的私人行为的攻击仍然存在。在这篇文章中，我们提出了第一个推断攻击，揭示了过去的私人用户行为。我们的攻击不同于以前的技术，而是基于模型反演(MI)。特别地，我们以一种新颖的方式利用李等人(NIPS，2016)的数据中毒，提出了对基于因子分解的CF系统的第一个MI攻击。我们将恶意用户注入CF系统，使得恶意选择的“诱饵”项目与用户的私人行为相关联。我们还展示了如何削弱李等人对对手可用信息的假设，从整个评级矩阵到只有项目简档，以及如何有效地创建恶意评级。我们使用两个真实数据集验证了我们的推理算法的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 通过模型反演技术揭示协同过滤的私人用户行为

papers.title: Protecting Private Inputs: Bounded Distortion Guarantees With Randomised Approximations
papers.authors: Patrick Ah-Fat, Michael Huth
papers.abstract: Abstract Computing a function of some private inputs while maintaining the confidentiality of those inputs is an important problem, to which Differential Privacy and Secure Multi-party Computation can offer solutions under specific assumptions. Research in randomised algorithms aims at improving the privacy of such inputs by randomising the output of a computation while ensuring that large distortions of outputs occur with low probability. But use cases such as e-voting or auctions will not tolerate large distortions at all. Thus, we develop a framework for randomising the output of a privacypreserving computation, while guaranteeing that output distortions stay within a specified bound. We analyse the privacy gains of our approach and characterise them more precisely for our notion of sparse functions. We build randomisation algorithms, running in linearithmic time in the number of possible input values, for this class of functions and we prove that the computed randomisations maximise the inputs’ privacy. Experimental work demonstrates significant privacy gains when compared with existing approaches that guarantee distortion bounds, also for non-sparse functions.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要计算一些私有输入的函数同时保持这些输入的机密性是一个重要的问题，差分隐私和安全多方计算可以在特定的假设下提供解决方案。随机化算法的研究旨在通过随机化计算的输出，同时确保输出的大失真以低概率发生，来改善这种输入的私密性。但电子投票或拍卖等用例根本不会容忍大的扭曲。因此，我们开发了一个框架，用于随机化隐私保护计算的输出，同时保证输出失真保持在指定的范围内。我们分析了我们的方法的隐私收益，并为我们的稀疏函数的概念更精确地描述了它们。对于这类函数，我们建立了在多个可能的输入值中以线性时间运行的随机化算法，并且我们证明了计算的随机化最大化了输入的隐私。实验工作表明，与保证失真界限的现有方法相比，隐私收益显著，对于非稀疏函数也是如此。
papers.title_zh: 保护私人输入:随机逼近的有界失真保证

papers.title: dPHI: An improved high-speed network-layer anonymity protocol
papers.authors: Alexander Bajic, Georg T. Becker
papers.abstract: Abstract The Internet infrastructure has not been built with security or privacy in mind. As a result, an adversary who has control over a single Autonomous System can set-up mass surveillance systems to gather meta data by passively collecting the headers of the messages they route. To solve this problem, lightweight anonymous routing protocols such as LAP, DOVETAIL and most recently PHI have been proposed which are efficient enough to be deployed in a large scale infrastructure such as the Internet. In this paper we take a closer look at PHI and introduce several de-anonymization attacks malicious nodes can perform to reduce the sender and receiver anonymity. As a direct consequence of this analysis we propose a new protocol called dependable PHI (dPHI). The security analysis of dPHI includes a detailed quantitative anonymity analysis that compares dPHI with PHI, LAP and HORNET. Together with the performance analysis, this allows for a good comparison of trade-offs for these anonymity protocols.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要互联网基础设施的建立并没有考虑到安全性或隐私性。因此，控制单个自治系统的对手可以建立大规模监控系统，通过被动收集它们路由的消息头来收集元数据。为了解决这个问题，已经提出了轻量级匿名路由协议，例如LAP、燕尾和最近的PHI，它们足够有效地部署在诸如因特网的大规模基础设施中。在本文中，我们仔细研究了PHI，并介绍了恶意节点可以执行的几种去匿名化攻击，以减少发送方和接收方的匿名性。作为这种分析的直接结果，我们提出了一种新的协议，称为可靠PHI (dPHI)。dpi的安全性分析包括详细的量化匿名分析，将dpi与PHI、LAP和HORNET进行比较。与性能分析一起，这允许对这些匿名协议的折衷进行很好的比较。
papers.title_zh: dPHI:一种改进的高速网络层匿名协议

papers.title: Tandem: Securing Keys by Using a Central Server While Preserving Privacy
papers.authors: Wouter Lueks, Brinda Hampiholi, Greg Alpár, Carmela Troncoso
papers.abstract: Abstract Users’ devices, e.g., smartphones or laptops, are typically incapable of securely storing and processing cryptographic keys.We present Tandem, a novel set of protocols for securing cryptographic keys with support from a central server. Tandem uses one-time-use key-share tokens to preserve users’ privacy with respect to a malicious central server. Additionally, Tandem enables users to block their keys if they lose their device, and it enables the server to limit how often an adversary can use an unblocked key. We prove Tandem’s security and privacy properties, apply Tandem to attributebased credentials, and implement a Tandem proof of concept to show that it causes little overhead.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要用户的设备，例如智能手机或笔记本电脑，通常不能安全地存储和处理密钥。我们提出了Tandem，这是一组新颖的协议，用于在中央服务器的支持下保护密钥。Tandem使用一次性密钥共享令牌来保护用户隐私，防止恶意中央服务器攻击。此外，Tandem使用户能够在丢失设备的情况下阻止他们的密钥，并使服务器能够限制对手使用未被阻止的密钥的频率。我们证明了Tandem的安全和隐私属性，将Tandem应用于基于属性的凭证，并实现了一个Tandem概念证明，以表明它几乎不会产生开销。
papers.title_zh: 串联:通过使用中央服务器来保护密钥，同时保护隐私

papers.title: Comprehensive Anonymity Trilemma: User Coordination is not enough
papers.authors: Debajyoti Das, Sebastian Meiser, Esfandiar Mohammadi, Aniket Kate
papers.abstract: Abstract For anonymous communication networks (ACNs), Das et al. recently confirmed a long-suspected trilemma result that ACNs cannot achieve strong anonymity, low latency overhead and low bandwidth overhead at the same time. Our paper emanates from the careful observation that their analysis does not include a relevant class of ACNs with what we call user coordination where users proactively work together towards improving their anonymity. We show that such protocols can achieve better anonymity than predicted by the above trilemma result. As the main contribution, we present a stronger impossibility result that includes all ACNs we are aware of. Along with our formal analysis, we provide intuitive interpretations and lessons learned. Finally, we demonstrate qualitatively stricter requirements for the Anytrust assumption (all but one protocol party is compromised) prevalent across ACNs.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要对于匿名通信网络，Das等人最近证实了一个长期被怀疑的三元悖论结果，即匿名通信网络不能同时实现强匿名性、低延迟开销和低带宽开销。我们的论文来源于仔细的观察，他们的分析没有包括一个相关的ACN类，我们称之为用户协调，用户积极合作，以改善他们的匿名性。我们表明，这种协议可以实现比上述三难结果预测更好的匿名性。作为主要贡献，我们提出了一个更强的不可能性结果，包括所有我们知道的ACN。随着我们的正式分析，我们提供直观的解释和经验教训。最后，我们证明了ACN中普遍存在的Anytrust假设(除了一方协议外，所有协议都被破坏)在质量上更严格的要求。
papers.title_zh: 全面匿名三难困境:用户协调不够

papers.title: A Privacy-Focused Systematic Analysis of Online Status Indicators
papers.authors: Camille Cobb, Lucy Simko, Tadayoshi Kohno, Alexis Hiniker
papers.abstract: Abstract Online status indicators (or OSIs, i.e., interface elements that communicate whether a user is online) can leak potentially sensitive information about users. In this work, we analyze 184 mobile applications to systematically characterize the existing design space of OSIs. We identified 40 apps with OSIs across a variety of genres and conducted a design review of the OSIs in each, examining both Android and iOS versions of these apps. We found that OSI design decisions clustered into four major categories, namely: appearance, audience, settings, and fidelity to actual user behavior. Less than half of these apps allow users change the default settings for OSIs. Informed by our findings, we discuss: 1) how these design choices support adversarial behavior, 2) design guidelines for creating consistent, privacy-conscious OSIs, and 3) a set of novel design concepts for building future tools to augment users’ ability to control and understand the presence information they broadcast. By connecting the common design patterns we document to prior work on privacy in social technologies, we contribute an empirical understanding of the systematic ways in which OSIs can make users more or less vulnerable to unwanted information disclosure.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要在线状态指示器(或OSIs，即传达用户是否在线的界面元素)可能会泄露关于用户的潜在敏感信息。在这项工作中，我们分析了184个移动应用程序，以系统地表征OSIs的现有设计空间。我们在各种类型中确定了40个具有OSIs的应用程序，并对每个应用程序的OSIs进行了设计审查，检查了这些应用程序的Android和iOS版本。我们发现OSI设计决策分为四大类，即:外观、受众、设置和对实际用户行为的忠实度。不到一半的应用程序允许用户更改OSIs的默认设置。根据我们的发现，我们讨论:1)这些设计选择如何支持敌对行为，2)创建一致的、有隐私意识的OSIs的设计指南，以及3)一组用于构建未来工具的新颖设计概念，以增强用户控制和理解他们广播的在场信息的能力。通过将我们记录的常见设计模式与先前关于社交技术中的隐私的工作联系起来，我们有助于对OSIs可能使用户更容易受到不想要的信息泄露的系统性方式的经验性理解。
papers.title_zh: 在线状态指标的隐私聚焦系统分析

papers.title: MoneyMorph: Censorship Resistant Rendezvous using Permissionless Cryptocurrencies
papers.authors: Mohsen Minaei, Pedro Moreno-Sanchez, Aniket Kate
papers.abstract: Abstract Cryptocurrencies play a major role in the global financial ecosystem. Their presence across different geopolitical corridors, including in repressive regimes, has been one of their striking features. In this work, we leverage this feature for bootstrapping Censorship Resistant communication. We conceptualize the notion of stego-bootstrapping scheme and its security in terms of rareness and security against chosencovertext attacks. We present MoneyMorph, a provably secure stego-bootstrapping scheme using cryptocurrencies. MoneyMorph allows a censored user to interact with a decoder entity outside the censored region, through blockchain transactions as rendezvous, to obtain bootstrapping information such as a censorshipresistant proxy and its public key. Unlike the usual bootstrapping approaches (e.g., emailing) with heuristic security, if any, MoneyMorph employs public-key steganography over blockchain transactions to ensure provable cryptographic security. We design rendezvous over Bitcoin, Zcash, Monero, and Ethereum, and analyze their effectiveness in terms of available bandwidth and transaction cost. With its highly cryptographic structure, we show that Zcash provides 1148 byte bandwidth per transaction costing less than 0.01 USD as fee.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要加密货币在全球金融生态系统中扮演着重要角色。他们跨越不同的地缘政治走廊，包括专制政权，这是他们的显著特征之一。在这项工作中，我们利用这一特性来引导抵制审查的通信。我们从稀有性和抗选择密文攻击的安全性的角度，概念化了隐写自举方案及其安全性。我们提出了MoneyMorph，一个使用加密货币的可证明安全的隐写自举方案。MoneyMorph允许审查用户通过区块链交易作为会合点，与审查区域之外的解码器实体进行交互，以获得诸如防审查代理及其公钥之类的引导信息。与通常的启发式安全引导方法(如电子邮件)不同，MoneyMorph在区块链交易中使用公钥隐写术来确保可证明的加密安全性。我们设计了基于比特币、Zcash、Monero和以太坊的rendezvous，并从可用带宽和交易成本方面分析了它们的有效性。凭借其高度加密的结构，我们发现Zcash每笔交易提供1148字节的带宽，费用不到0.01美元。
papers.title_zh: MoneyMorph:使用无许可加密货币的抗审查集会

papers.title: Editors' Introduction
papers.authors: Kostas Chatzikokolakis, Aaron Johnson
papers.abstract: Is there currently a crisis of confidence in psychological science reflecting an unprecedented level of doubt among practitioners about the reliability of research findings in the field? It would certainly appear that there is. These doubts emerged and grew as a series of unhappy events unfolded in 2011: the Diederik Stapel fraud case (see Stroebe, Postmes, & Spears, 2012, this issue), the publication in a major social psychology journal of an article purporting to show evidence of extrasensory perception (Bem, 2011) followed by widespread public mockery (see Galak, LeBoeuf, Nelson, & Simmons, in press; Wagenmakers, Wetzels, Borsboom, & van der Maas, 2011), reports by Wicherts and colleagues that psychologists are often unwilling or unable to share their published data for reanalysis (Wicherts, Bakker, & Molenaar, 2011; see also Wicherts, Borsboom, Kats, & Molenaar, 2006), and the publication of an important article in Psychological Science showing how easily researchers can, in the absence of any real effects, nonetheless obtain statistically significant differences through various questionable research practices (QRPs) such as exploring multiple dependent variables or covariates and only reporting these when they yield significant results (Simmons, Nelson, & Simonsohn, 2011). For those psychologists who expected that the embarrassments of 2011 would soon recede into memory, 2012 offered instead a quick plunge from bad to worse, with new indications of outright fraud in the field of social cognition (Simonsohn, 2012), an article in Psychological Science showing that many psychologists admit to engaging in at least some of the QRPs examined by Simmons and colleagues (John, Loewenstein, & Prelec, 2012), troubling new meta-analytic evidence suggesting that the QRPs described by Simmons and colleagues may even be leaving telltale signs visible in the distribution of p values in the psychological literature (Masicampo & Lalande, in press; Simonsohn, 2012), and an acrimonious dust-up in science magazines and blogs centered around the problems some investigators were having in replicating well-known results from the field of social cognition (Bower, 2012; Yong, 2012). Although the very public problems experienced by psychology over this 2-year period are embarrassing to those of us working in the field, some have found comfort in the fact that, over the same period, similar concerns have been arising across the scientific landscape (triggered by revelations that will be described shortly). Some of the suspected causes of unreplicability, such as publication bias (the tendency to publish only positive findings) have been discussed for years; in fact, the phrase file-drawer problem was first coined by a distinguished psychologist several decades ago (Rosenthal, 1979). However, many have speculated that these problems have been exacerbated in recent years as academia reaps the harvest of a hypercompetitive academic climate and an incentive scheme that provides rich rewards for overselling one’s work and few rewards at all for caution and circumspection (see Giner-Sorolla, 2012, this issue). Equally disturbing, investigators seem to be replicating each others’ work even less often than they did in the past, again presumably reflecting an incentive scheme gone askew (a point discussed in several articles in this issue, e.g., Makel, Plucker, & Hegarty, 2012). The frequency with which errors appear in the psychological literature is not presently known, but a number of facts suggest it might be disturbingly high. Ioannidis (2005) has shown through simple mathematical modeling that any scientific field that ignores replication can easily come to the miserable state wherein (as the title of his most famous article puts it) “most published research findings are false” (see also Ioannidis, 2012, this issue, and Pashler & Harris, 2012, this issue). Meanwhile, reports emerging from cancer research have made such grim scenarios seem more plausible: In 2012, several large pharmaceutical companies revealed that their efforts to replicate exciting preclinical findings from published academic studies in cancer biology were only rarely verifying the original results (Begley & Ellis, 2012; see also Osherovich, 2011; Prinz, Schlange, & Asadullah, 2011).
