papers.abstract_zh: 目前心理科学是否出现了信任危机，反映出从业者对该领域研究结果的可靠性产生了前所未有的怀疑？显然是有的。随着2011年一系列不愉快事件的发生，这些怀疑出现了，并有所增长:Diederik Stapel欺诈案(见Stroebe，Postmes，& Spears，2012，这一期)，在一份主要的社会心理学杂志上发表了一篇文章，声称显示了超感知觉的证据(Bem，2011)，随后受到了广泛的公开嘲笑(见Galak，LeBoeuf，Nelson，& Simmons，正在出版中；Wagenmakers，Wetzels，Borsboom，& van der Maas，2011)，Wicherts及其同事报告说，心理学家往往不愿意或不能分享他们发表的数据进行再分析(Wicherts，Bakker，& Molenaar，2011；另见Wicherts，Borsboom，Kats，& Molenaar，2006)，以及发表在《心理科学》上的一篇重要文章，该文章表明，在没有任何实际影响的情况下，研究人员可以通过各种有问题的研究实践(qrp)轻松地获得统计学上的显著差异，如探索多个因变量或协变量，并仅在它们产生显著结果时报告这些结果(Simmons，Nelson，& Simonsohn，2011)。对于那些预计2011年的尴尬将很快消失在记忆中的心理学家来说，2012年反而提供了一个从糟糕到更糟糕的快速跳水，在社会认知领域出现了新的明显的欺诈迹象(Simonsohn，2012)，心理科学中的一篇文章显示，许多心理学家承认至少参与了Simmons及其同事检查的一些快速反应程序(John，Loewenstein，& Prelec，2012)。 令人不安的新荟萃分析证据表明，Simmons及其同事描述的qrp甚至可能在心理学文献中的p值分布中留下明显的迹象(Masicampo & Lalande，出版中； Simonsohn，2012)，科学杂志和博客上围绕一些研究人员在复制社会认知领域的知名结果时遇到的问题展开了激烈的争论(Bower，2012；永，2012)。虽然心理学在这两年中所经历的非常公开的问题令我们这些在该领域工作的人感到尴尬，但一些人已经找到了安慰，因为在同一时期，类似的担忧已经在整个科学领域出现(由即将描述的启示引发)。一些不可复制的可疑原因，如发表偏倚(倾向于只发表积极的发现)已经讨论了多年；事实上，抽屉问题这个短语是由一位杰出的心理学家在几十年前首次提出的(Rosenthal，1979)。然而，许多人推测，这些问题在最近几年已经恶化，因为学术界收获了高度竞争的学术氛围和奖励计划，这种奖励计划为过度销售自己的工作提供了丰厚的奖励，而对谨慎和谨慎却几乎没有奖励(见吉纳-索罗拉，2012年，这一期)。同样令人不安的是，研究人员似乎比过去更少地重复彼此的工作，这可能再次反映了一个倾斜的激励机制(这一点在本期的几篇文章中讨论过，例如，马克尔、普吕克尔和赫加蒂，2012)。错误出现在心理学文献中的频率目前还不清楚，但许多事实表明它可能高得令人不安。约安尼迪斯(2005)通过简单的数学建模表明，任何忽视复制的科学领域都很容易陷入悲惨的境地，其中(正如他最著名的文章的标题所言)“大多数发表的研究结果都是错误的”(另见约安尼迪斯，2012，本期，以及Pashler & Harris，2012，本期)。与此同时，来自癌症研究的报告让这种严峻的情景看起来更加可信:2012年，几家大型制药公司透露，他们在癌症生物学方面复制已发表学术研究中令人兴奋的临床前发现的努力很少验证原始结果(Begley & Ellis，2012；另见Osherovich，2011年；普林茨、施朗格和阿萨杜拉，2011年)。
papers.title_zh: 编辑介绍

papers.title: Automatic Discovery of Privacy-Utility Pareto Fronts
papers.authors: Brendan Avent, Javier González, Tom Diethe, Andrei Paleyes, Borja Balle
papers.abstract: Abstract Differential privacy is a mathematical framework for privacy-preserving data analysis. Changing the hyperparameters of a differentially private algorithm allows one to trade off privacy and utility in a principled way. Quantifying this trade-off in advance is essential to decision-makers tasked with deciding how much privacy can be provided in a particular application while maintaining acceptable utility. Analytical utility guarantees offer a rigorous tool to reason about this tradeoff, but are generally only available for relatively simple problems. For more complex tasks, such as training neural networks under differential privacy, the utility achieved by a given algorithm can only be measured empirically. This paper presents a Bayesian optimization methodology for efficiently characterizing the privacy– utility trade-off of any differentially private algorithm using only empirical measurements of its utility. The versatility of our method is illustrated on a number of machine learning tasks involving multiple models, optimizers, and datasets.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要差分隐私是一种隐私保护数据分析的数学框架。改变差分私有算法的超参数允许以有原则的方式在私有性和实用性之间进行权衡。对于决策者来说，提前量化这种权衡是至关重要的，他们的任务是决定在特定应用程序中可以提供多少隐私，同时保持可接受的效用。分析效用保证提供了一个严格的工具来推理这种权衡，但通常只适用于相对简单的问题。对于更复杂的任务，如在差分隐私下训练神经网络，给定算法实现的效用只能凭经验测量。本文提出了一种贝叶斯优化方法，用于仅使用其效用的经验测量来有效地表征任何差分隐私算法的隐私-效用权衡。我们的方法的多功能性在许多涉及多个模型、优化器和数据集的机器学习任务上得到了说明。
papers.title_zh: 隐私效用帕累托前沿的自动发现

papers.title: PriFi: Low-Latency Anonymity for Organizational Networks
papers.authors: Ludovic Barman, Italo Dacosta, Mahdi Zamani, Ennan Zhai, Apostolos Pyrgelis, Bryan Ford, Joan Feigenbaum, Jean-Pierre Hubaux
papers.abstract: Abstract Organizational networks are vulnerable to trafficanalysis attacks that enable adversaries to infer sensitive information fromnetwork traffic—even if encryption is used. Typical anonymous communication networks are tailored to the Internet and are poorly suited for organizational networks.We present PriFi, an anonymous communication protocol for LANs, which protects users against eavesdroppers and provides high-performance traffic-analysis resistance. PriFi builds onDining Cryptographers networks (DC-nets), but reduces the high communication latency of prior designs via a new client/relay/server architecture, in which a client’s packets remain on their usual network path without additional hops, and in which a set of remote servers assist the anonymization process without adding latency. PriFi also solves the challenge of equivocation attacks, which are not addressed by related work, by encrypting traffic based on communication history. Our evaluation shows that PriFi introduces modest latency overhead (≈ 100ms for 100 clients) and is compatible with delay-sensitive applications such as Voice-over-IP.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要组织网络容易受到流量分析攻击，这种攻击使对手能够从网络流量中推断出敏感信息—即使使用了加密。典型的匿名通信网络是为互联网定制的，不太适合组织网络。我们提出了PriFi，一种用于局域网的匿名通信协议，它保护用户免受窃听，并提供高性能的流量分析抵抗。PriFi构建了一个匿名密码器网络(DC网)，但通过一种新的客户端/中继/服务器架构降低了以前设计的高通信延迟，在这种架构中，客户端的数据包保留在它们通常的网络路径上，没有额外的跳跃，并且一组远程服务器在不增加延迟的情况下协助匿名化过程。PriFi还通过基于通信历史加密流量，解决了相关工作没有解决的可疑攻击的挑战。我们的评估表明，PriFi引入了适度的延迟开销(100个客户端约100毫秒)，并且与延迟敏感型应用(如IP语音)兼容。
papers.title_zh: PriFi:组织网络的低延迟匿名

papers.title: The Power of the Hybrid Model for Mean Estimation
papers.authors: Brendan Avent, Yatharth Dubey, Aleksandra Korolova
papers.abstract: Abstract We explore the power of the hybrid model of differential privacy (DP), in which some users desire the guarantees of the local model of DP and others are content with receiving the trusted-curator model guarantees. In particular, we study the utility of hybrid model estimators that compute the mean of arbitrary realvalued distributions with bounded support. When the curator knows the distribution’s variance, we design a hybrid estimator that, for realistic datasets and parameter settings, achieves a constant factor improvement over natural baselines.We then analytically characterize how the estimator’s utility is parameterized by the problem setting and parameter choices. When the distribution’s variance is unknown, we design a heuristic hybrid estimator and analyze how it compares to the baselines. We find that it often performs better than the baselines, and sometimes almost as well as the known-variance estimator. We then answer the question of how our estimator’s utility is affected when users’ data are not drawn from the same distribution, but rather from distributions dependent on their trust model preference. Concretely, we examine the implications of the two groups’ distributions diverging and show that in some cases, our estimators maintain fairly high utility. We then demonstrate how our hybrid estimator can be incorporated as a sub-component in more complex, higher-dimensional applications. Finally, we propose a new privacy amplification notion for the hybrid model that emerges due to interaction between the groups, and derive corresponding amplification results for our hybrid estimators.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要我们研究了差分隐私混合模型的能力，其中一些用户希望得到差分隐私本地模型的保证，而另一些用户则满足于得到可信管理人模型的保证。特别地，我们研究了在有界支持下计算任意实值分布均值的混合模型估计的效用。当策展人知道分布的方差时，我们设计了一个混合估计器，对于现实数据集和参数设置，实现了相对于自然基线的常数因子改进。然后，我们分析性地描述了如何通过问题设置和参数选择来参数化估计器的效用。当分布的方差未知时，我们设计一个启发式混合估计量，并分析它如何与基线相比较。我们发现它通常比基线表现得更好，有时几乎和已知方差估计量一样好。然后，我们回答这样一个问题:当用户的数据不是来自同一个分布，而是来自依赖于他们的信任模型偏好的分布时，我们的估计器的效用会受到怎样的影响。具体地说，我们检验了两组分布分歧的含义，并表明在某些情况下，我们的估计量保持相当高的效用。然后，我们演示了如何将我们的混合估计器作为子组件集成到更复杂、更高维的应用中。最后，我们对由于群体间的相互作用而出现的混合模型提出了一个新的隐私放大概念，并得到了相应的放大结果。
papers.title_zh: 均值估计的混合模型的能力

papers.title: The Road Not Taken: Re-thinking the Feasibility of Voice Calling Over Tor
papers.authors: Piyush Kumar Sharma, Shashwat Chaudhary, Nikhil Hassija, Mukulika Maity, Sambuddho Chakravarty
papers.abstract: Abstract Anonymous VoIP calls over the Internet holds great significance for privacy-conscious users, whistle-blowers and political activists alike. Prior research deems popular anonymization systems like Tor unsuitable for providing the requisite performance guarantees that real-time applications like VoIP need. Their claims are backed by studies that may no longer be valid due to constant advancements in Tor. Moreover, we believe that these studies lacked the requisite diversity and comprehensiveness. Thus, conclusions from these studies, led them to propose novel and tailored solutions. However, no such system is available for immediate use. Additionally, operating such new systems would incur significant costs for recruiting users and volunteered relays, to provide the necessary anonymity guarantees. It thus becomes an imperative that the exact performance of VoIP over Tor be quantified and analyzed, so that the potential performance bottlenecks can be amended. We thus conducted an extensive empirical study across various in-lab and real world scenarios to shed light on VoIP performance over Tor. In over half a million calls spanning 12 months, across seven countries and covering about 6650 Tor relays, we observed that Tor supports good voice quality (Perceptual Evaluation of Speech Quality (PESQ) >3 and one-way delay <400 ms) in more than 85% of cases. Further analysis indicates that in general for most Tor relays, the contentions due to cross-traffic were low enough to support VoIP calls, that are anyways transmitted at low rates (<120 Kbps). Our findings are supported by concordant measurements using iperf that show more than the adequate available bandwidth for most cases. Hence, unlike prior efforts, our research reveals that Tor is suitable for supporting anonymous VoIP calls.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要互联网上的匿名VoIP呼叫对于注重隐私的用户、告密者和政治活动家等都具有重要意义。先前的研究认为像Tor这样流行的匿名系统不适合提供像VoIP这样的实时应用所需要的必要的性能保证。他们的主张得到了研究的支持，但由于Tor的不断进步，这些研究可能不再有效。此外，我们认为这些研究缺乏必要的多样性和全面性。因此，从这些研究中得出的结论，引导他们提出新的和定制的解决方案。然而，没有这样的系统可供立即使用。此外，运行这样的新系统将导致招募用户和志愿中继的巨大成本，以提供必要的匿名保证。因此，量化和分析VoIP在Tor上的确切性能变得势在必行，以便可以修正潜在的性能瓶颈。因此，我们在各种实验室和现实世界场景中进行了广泛的实证研究，以揭示相对于Tor的VoIP性能。在12个月内，跨越7个国家，覆盖约6650个Tor中继的50多万次呼叫中，我们观察到Tor在超过85%的情况下支持良好的语音质量(语音质量感知评估(PESQ) >3，单向延迟< 400毫秒)。进一步的分析表明，一般来说，对于大多数Tor中继，由于交叉业务引起的竞争足够低，以支持VoIP呼叫，无论如何都是以低速率(< 120 Kbps)传输的。我们的发现得到了使用iperf的一致测量的支持，这些测量显示在大多数情况下可用带宽是足够的。因此，与先前的努力不同，我们的研究表明Tor适合于支持匿名VoIP呼叫。
papers.title_zh: 未选择的路:重新思考Tor上语音呼叫的可行性

papers.title: An Analysis of the Current State of the Consumer Credit Reporting System in China
papers.authors: Mo Chen, Jens Grossklags
papers.abstract: Abstract The Chinese Social Credit System (SCS), known as the first national digitally-implemented credit rating system, consists of two parallel arms: a government-run and a commercial one. The government-run arm of the SCS, especially efforts to blacklist and redlist individuals and organizations, has attracted significant attention worldwide. In contrast, the commercial part has been less often in the public spotlight except for discussions about Zhima Credit. The commercial arm of the SCS, also referred to as the Consumer Credit Reporting System (CCRS), has been under development for about two decades and took a major step forward in 2015 when 8 companies were granted permission to implement pilot consumer credit reporting programs. This development fundamentally increased the reach and impact of the SCS due to these companies’ sizable customer base and access to vast troves of consumer-related information. In this paper, we first map the Chinese CCRS to understand the actors in the credit reporting ecosystem. Then, we study 13 consumer credit reporting companies to examine how they collect and use personal information. Based on the findings, we discuss the relationship between the CCRS and the SCS including the changes in the power relationships between the government, consumer credit reporting companies and Chinese citizens.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要中国社会信用体系(SCS)被称为第一个全国数字化实施的信用评级系统，由两个平行的部门组成:政府经营的和商业的。国家安全委员会的政府分支，特别是将个人和组织列入黑名单和红名单的努力，引起了全世界的极大关注。相比之下，除了关于芝麻信用的讨论之外，商业部分很少成为公众关注的焦点。SCS的商业分支，也称为消费者信用报告系统(CCRS)，已经发展了大约二十年，并在2015年向前迈出了一大步，当时8家公司获准实施试点消费者信用报告计划。这一发展从根本上增加了SCS的覆盖面和影响力，因为这些公司拥有庞大的客户群，并且可以访问大量与消费者相关的信息。在本文中，我们首先绘制中国CCRS地图，以了解信用报告生态系统中的参与者。然后，我们研究了13家消费者信用报告公司，考察他们如何收集和使用个人信息。在此基础上，我们讨论了CCRS和中国证监会之间的关系，包括政府、个人信用报告公司和中国公民之间权力关系的变化。
papers.title_zh: 中国个人征信体系的现状分析

papers.title: Privacy Preserving Detection of Path Bias Attacks in Tor
papers.authors: Lauren Watson, Anupam Mediratta, Tariq Elahi, Rik Sarkar
papers.abstract: Abstract Anonymous communication networks like Tor are vulnerable to attackers that control entry and exit nodes. Such attackers can compromise the essential anonymity and privacy properties of the network. In this paper, we consider the path bias attack– where the attacker induces a client to use compromised nodes and thus links the client to their destination. We describe an efficient scheme that detects such attacks in Tor by collecting routing telemetry data from nodes in the network. The data collection is differentially private and thus does not reveal behaviour of individual users even to nodes within the network. We show provable bounds for the sample complexity of the scheme and describe methods to make it resilient to introduction of false data by the attacker to subvert the detection process. Simulations based on real configurations of the Tor network show that the method works accurately in practice.
papers.abstract_zh: 像Tor这样的匿名通信网络容易受到控制入口和出口节点的攻击者的攻击。这种攻击者可能危及网络的基本匿名和隐私属性。在本文中，我们考虑路径偏向攻击——攻击者诱导客户端使用受损节点，从而将客户端链接到其目的地。我们描述了一种有效的方案，通过从网络中的节点收集路由遥测数据来检测Tor中的这种攻击。数据收集是有差别的私有的，因此即使对网络内的节点也不会揭示单个用户的行为。我们展示了该方案的样本复杂度的可证明界限，并描述了使其对攻击者引入错误数据以破坏检测过程具有弹性的方法。基于Tor网络实际配置的仿真表明，该方法在实践中能准确工作。
papers.title_zh: Tor中路径偏向攻击的隐私保护检测

papers.title: Publishing Community-Preserving Attributed Social Graphs with a Differential Privacy Guarantee
papers.authors: Xihui Chen, Sjouke Mauw, Yunior Ramírez-Cruz
papers.abstract: Abstract We present a novel method for publishing differentially private synthetic attributed graphs. Our method allows, for the first time, to publish synthetic graphs simultaneously preserving structural properties, user attributes and the community structure of the original graph. Our proposal relies on CAGM, a new community-preserving generative model for attributed graphs. We equip CAGM with efficient methods for attributed graph sampling and parameter estimation. For the latter, we introduce differentially private computation methods, which allow us to release communitypreserving synthetic attributed social graphs with a strong formal privacy guarantee. Through comprehensive experiments, we show that our new model outperforms its most relevant counterparts in synthesising differentially private attributed social graphs that preserve the community structure of the original graph, as well as degree sequences and clustering coefficients.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要本文提出了一种发布差分私有合成属性图的新方法。我们的方法首次允许发布合成图，同时保留原始图的结构属性、用户属性和社区结构。我们的建议依赖于CAGM，一种新的社区保持的属性图生成模型。我们为CAGM提供了有效的属性图采样和参数估计方法。对于后者，我们引入差分隐私计算方法，允许我们发布具有强形式隐私保证的社区保持合成属性社交图。通过全面的实验，我们表明我们的新模型在合成保留原始图的社区结构以及度序列和聚类系数的差分私有属性社会图方面优于其最相关的对等物。
papers.title_zh: 发布具有不同隐私保证的社区保持属性社交图

papers.title: SoK: Anatomy of Data Breaches
papers.authors: Hamza Saleem, Muhammad Naveed
papers.abstract: Abstract We systematize the knowledge on data breaches into concise step-by-step breach workflows and use them to describe the breach methods. We present the most plausible workflows for 10 famous data breaches. We use information from a variety of sources to develop our breach workflows, however, we emphasize that for many data breaches, information about crucial steps was absent. We researched such steps to develop complete breach workflows; as such, our workflows provide descriptions of data breaches that were previously unavailable. For generalizability, we present a general workflow of 50 data breaches from 2015. Based on our data breach analysis, we develop requirements that organizations need to meet to thwart data breaches. We describe what requirements are met by existing security technologies and propose future research directions to thwart data breaches.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要我们将数据泄露方面的知识系统化为简明的分步泄露工作流，并使用它们来描述泄露方法。我们为10个著名的数据泄露事件提供了最合理的工作流。我们使用各种来源的信息来开发我们的违规工作流，但是，我们强调，对于许多数据违规，缺少关于关键步骤的信息。我们研究了这些步骤，以开发完整的违规工作流程；因此，我们的工作流提供了以前无法获得的数据泄露描述。为了概括，我们给出了2015年50个数据泄露的一般工作流。基于我们的数据泄露分析，我们制定了组织为阻止数据泄露而需要满足的要求。我们描述了现有安全技术满足哪些要求，并提出了阻止数据泄露的未来研究方向。
papers.title_zh: SoK:剖析数据泄露

papers.title: Effective writing style transfer via combinatorial paraphrasing
papers.authors: Tommi Gröndahl, N. Asokan
papers.abstract: Abstract Stylometry can be used to profile or deanonymize authors against their will based on writing style. Style transfer provides a defence. Current techniques typically use either encoder-decoder architectures or rule-based algorithms. Crucially, style transfer must reliably retain original semantic content to be actually deployable. We conduct a multifaceted evaluation of three state-of-the-art encoder-decoder style transfer techniques, and show that all fail at semantic retainment. In particular, they do not produce appropriate paraphrases, but only retain original content in the trivial case of exactly reproducing the text. To mitigate this problem we propose ParChoice: a technique based on the combinatorial application of multiple paraphrasing algorithms. ParChoice strongly outperforms the encoder-decoder baselines in semantic retainment. Additionally, compared to baselines that achieve nonnegligible semantic retainment, ParChoice has superior style transfer performance. We also apply ParChoice to multi-author style imitation (not considered by prior work), where we achieve up to 75% imitation success among five authors. Furthermore, when compared to two state-of-the-art rule-based style transfer techniques, ParChoice has markedly better semantic retainment. Combining ParChoice with the best performing rulebased baseline (Mutant-X [34]) also reaches the highest style transfer success on the Brennan-Greenstadt and Extended-Brennan-Greenstadt corpora, with much less impact on original meaning than when using the rulebased baseline techniques alone. Finally, we highlight a critical problem that afflicts all current style transfer techniques: the adversary can use the same technique for thwarting style transfer via adversarial training. We show that adding randomness to style transfer helps to mitigate the effectiveness of adversarial training.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要文体学可用于根据作者的写作风格，违背他们的意愿对其进行描述或去匿名。风格转移提供了一种防御。当前技术通常使用编码器-解码器架构或基于规则的算法。至关重要的是，样式转换必须可靠地保留原始语义内容，以便实际部署。我们对三种最先进的编码器-解码器风格转换技术进行了多方面的评估，并表明它们在语义保留方面都失败了。特别是，他们不产生适当的解释，而只是在精确复制文本的琐碎情况下保留原始内容。为了缓解这个问题，我们提出了ParChoice:一种基于多种解释算法组合应用的技术。ParChoice在语义保留方面明显优于编码器-解码器基线。此外，与实现不可忽略的语义保留的基线相比，ParChoice具有更好的风格转移性能。我们还将ParChoice应用于多作者风格模仿(先前的工作没有考虑到)，其中我们在五个作者中实现了高达75%的模仿成功。此外，与两种最先进的基于规则的风格转换技术相比，ParChoice具有明显更好的语义保留能力。在Brennan-Greenstadt和Extended-Brennan-Greenstadt语料库上，将ParChoice与表现最好的基于规则的基线(突变体-X [34])相结合也达到了最高的风格转换成功率，与单独使用基于规则的基线技术相比，对原始含义的影响要小得多。最后，我们强调了困扰所有当前风格转移技术的一个关键问题:对手可以通过对抗训练使用相同的技术来阻止风格转移。我们发现增加风格转移的随机性有助于降低对抗性训练的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 通过组合释义实现写作风格的有效转换

papers.title: Anonymous, Attribute Based, Decentralized, Secure, and Fair e-Donation
papers.authors: Osman Biçer, Alptekin Küpçü
papers.abstract: Abstract E-cash and cryptocurrency schemes have been a focus of applied cryptography for a long time. However, we acknowledge the continuing need for a cryptographic protocol that provides global scale, decentralized, secure, and fair delivery of donations. Such a protocol would replace central trusted entities (e.g., charity organizations) and guarantee the privacy of the involved parties (i.e., donors and recipients of the donations). In this work, we target this online donation problem and propose a practical solution for it. First, we propose a novel decentralized e-donation framework, along with its operational components and security definitions. Our framework relies on a public ledger that can be realized via a distributed blockchain. Second, we instantiate our e-donation framework with a practical scheme employing privacy-preserving cryptocurrencies and attributebased signatures. Third, we provide implementation results showing that our operations have feasible computation and communication costs. Finally, we prove the security of our e-donation scheme via formal reductions to the security of the underlying primitives.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要电子现金和加密货币方案长期以来一直是应用密码学的研究热点。然而，我们承认对提供全球范围的、分散的、安全的和公平的捐赠交付的加密协议的持续需求。这种协议将取代中央受托实体(例如慈善组织)，并保证有关各方(即捐助者和接受捐助者)的隐私。在这项工作中，我们针对这个在线捐赠问题，并提出了一个切实可行的解决方案。首先，我们提出了一个新颖的分散式电子捐赠框架，以及它的操作组件和安全定义。我们的框架依赖于可以通过分布式区块链实现的公共分类账。其次，我们用一个实用的方案实例化了我们的电子捐赠框架，该方案采用了保护隐私的加密货币和基于属性的签名。第三，我们提供了实现结果，表明我们的操作具有可行的计算和通信成本。最后，我们通过对底层原语安全性的形式化归约，证明了我们的电子捐赠方案的安全性。
papers.title_zh: 匿名、基于属性、分散、安全和公平的电子捐赠

papers.title: No boundaries: data exfiltration by third parties embedded on web pages
papers.authors: Gunes Acar, Steven Englehardt, Arvind Narayanan
papers.abstract: Abstract We investigate data exfiltration by third-party scripts directly embedded on web pages. Specifically, we study three attacks: misuse of browsers’ internal login managers, social data exfiltration, and whole-DOM exfiltration. Although the possibility of these attacks was well known, we provide the first empirical evidence based on measurements of 300,000 distinct web pages from 50,000 sites. We extend OpenWPM’s instrumentation to detect and precisely attribute these attacks to specific third-party scripts. Our analysis reveals invasive practices such as inserting invisible login forms to trigger autofilling of the saved user credentials, and reading and exfiltrating social network data when the user logs in via Facebook login. Further, we uncovered password, credit card, and health data leaks to third parties due to wholesale collection of the DOM. We discuss the lessons learned from the responses to the initial disclosure of our findings and fixes that were deployed by the websites, browser vendors, third-party libraries and privacy protection tools.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要我们研究直接嵌入在网页上的第三方脚本的数据渗透。具体来说，我们研究了三种攻击:滥用浏览器的内部登录管理器、社交数据泄漏和整个DOM泄漏。虽然这些攻击的可能性是众所周知的，但我们基于对来自50，000个网站的300，000个不同网页的测量提供了第一手经验证据。我们扩展了OpenWPM的工具来检测并精确地将这些攻击归因于特定的第三方脚本。我们的分析揭示了一些侵入性的做法，例如插入不可见的登录表单来触发已保存用户凭据的自动填充，以及当用户通过脸书登录时读取和渗透社交网络数据。此外，我们发现由于大规模收集DOM，密码、信用卡和健康数据泄露给了第三方。我们讨论了从对网站、浏览器供应商、第三方库和隐私保护工具部署的我们的发现和修复的初步披露的响应中吸取的经验教训。
papers.title_zh: 没有边界:嵌入网页的第三方数据渗透

papers.title: INFUSE: Invisible plausibly-deniable file system for NAND flash
papers.authors: Chen Chen, Anrin Chakraborti, Radu Sion
papers.abstract: Abstract Protecting sensitive data stored on local storage devices e.g., laptops, tablets etc. is essential for privacy. When adversaries are powerful enough to coerce users to reveal encryption keys/passwords, encryption alone becomes insufficient for data protection. Additional mechanisms are required to hide the very presence of sensitive data. Plausibly deniable storage systems (PDS) are designed to defend against such powerful adversaries. Plausible deniability allows a user to deny the existence of certain stored data even when an adversary has access to the storage medium. However, existing plausible deniability solutions leave users at the mercy of adversaries suspicious of their very use. Indeed, it may be difficult to justify the use of a plausible deniability system while claiming that no sensitive data is being hidden. This work introduces INFUSE, a plausibly-deniable file system that hides not only contents but also the evidence that a particular system is being used to hide data. INFUSE is “invisible” (identical layout with standard file system), provides redundancy, handles overwrites, survives data loss, and is secure in the presence of multi-snapshot adversaries. INFUSE is efficient. Public data operations are orders of magnitude faster than existing multi-snapshot resilient PD systems, and only 15% slower than a standard non-PD baseline, and hidden data operations perform comparably to existing systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要保护存储在本地存储设备(如笔记本电脑、平板电脑等)上的敏感数据。对隐私至关重要。当对手强大到足以迫使用户透露加密密钥/密码时，仅靠加密不足以保护数据。需要额外的机制来隐藏敏感数据的存在。貌似可信的可否认存储系统(PDS)就是为了抵御如此强大的对手而设计的。似是而非的可否认性允许用户否认某些存储数据的存在，即使对手可以访问存储介质。然而，现有的似是而非的可否认性解决方案让用户任由怀疑其用途的对手摆布。事实上，在声称没有隐藏任何敏感数据的同时，很难证明使用貌似合理的可否认性系统是合理的。这项工作引入了INFUSE，一个貌似可信的文件系统，它不仅隐藏了内容，还隐藏了特定系统被用来隐藏数据的证据。INFUSE是“不可见的”(与标准文件系统具有相同的布局)，提供冗余，处理覆盖，不会丢失数据，并且在存在多个快照对手的情况下也是安全的。INFUSE是高效的。公共数据操作比现有的多快照弹性PD系统快几个数量级，仅比标准的非PD基线慢15%，隐藏数据操作的性能与现有系统相当。
papers.title_zh: INFUSE:用于NAND闪存的不可见的貌似可信的文件系统

papers.title: When Speakers Are All Ears: Characterizing Misactivations of IoT Smart Speakers
papers.authors: Daniel J. Dubois, Roman Kolcun, Anna Maria Mandalari, Muhammad Talha Paracha, David R. Choffnes, Hamed Haddadi
papers.abstract: Abstract Internet-connected voice-controlled speakers, also known as smart speakers, are increasingly popular due to their convenience for everyday tasks such as asking about the weather forecast or playing music. However, such convenience comes with privacy risks: smart speakers need to constantly listen in order to activate when the “wake word” is spoken, and are known to transmit audio from their environment and record it on cloud servers. In particular, this paper focuses on the privacy risk from smart speaker misactivations, i.e., when they activate, transmit, and/or record audio from their environment when the wake word is not spoken. To enable repeatable, scalable experiments for exposing smart speakers to conversations that do not contain wake words, we turn to playing audio from popular TV shows from diverse genres. After playing two rounds of 134 hours of content from 12 TV shows near popular smart speakers in both the US and in the UK, we observed cases of 0.95 misactivations per hour, or 1.43 times for every 10,000 words spoken, with some devices having 10% of their misactivation durations lasting at least 10 seconds. We characterize the sources of such misactivations and their implications for consumers, and discuss potential mitigations.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要互联网连接的语音控制扬声器，也称为智能扬声器，因其方便日常任务，如询问天气预报或播放音乐而越来越受欢迎。然而，这种便利也伴随着隐私风险:智能扬声器需要不断地聆听，以便在说出“唤醒词”时激活，并且众所周知，智能扬声器会从其环境中传输音频，并将其记录在云服务器上。具体而言，本文重点关注智能扬声器误激活带来的隐私风险，即当他们在没有说出唤醒词的情况下激活、传输和/或记录来自其环境的音频。为了实现可重复、可扩展的实验，让智能扬声器参与不包含唤醒词的对话，我们转向播放来自不同流派的流行电视节目的音频。在美国和英国流行的智能扬声器附近播放了两轮12个电视节目的134小时内容后，我们观察到每小时0.95次误激活的情况，或每说出10，000个单词1.43次，一些设备有10%的误激活持续时间至少持续10秒。我们描述了这种误激活的来源及其对消费者的影响，并讨论了潜在的缓解措施。
papers.title_zh: 当扬声器全神贯注时:物联网智能扬声器误操作特征

papers.title: VideoDP: A Flexible Platform for Video Analytics with Differential Privacy
papers.authors: Han Wang, Shangyu Xie, Yuan Hong
papers.abstract: Abstract Massive amounts of videos are ubiquitously generated in personal devices and dedicated video recording facilities. Analyzing such data would be extremely beneficial in real world (e.g., urban traffic analysis). However, videos contain considerable sensitive information, such as human faces, identities and activities. Most of the existing video sanitization techniques simply obfuscate the video by detecting and blurring the region of interests (e.g., faces, vehicle plates, locations and timestamps). Unfortunately, privacy leakage in the blurred video cannot be effectively bounded, especially against unknown background knowledge. In this paper, to our best knowledge, we propose the first differentially private video analytics platform (VideoDP) which flexibly supports different video analyses with rigorous privacy guarantee. Given the input video, VideoDP randomly generates a utility-driven private video in which adding or removing any sensitive visual element (e.g., human, and object) does not significantly affect the output video. Then, different video analyses requested by untrusted video analysts can be flexibly performed over the sanitized video with differential privacy. Finally, we conduct experiments on real videos, and the experimental results demonstrate that VideoDP can generate accurate results for video analytics.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要在个人设备和专用视频记录设备中无处不在地产生大量视频。分析这样的数据在现实世界中是非常有益的(例如，城市交通分析)。然而，视频包含相当多的敏感信息，例如人脸、身份和活动。大多数现有的视频净化技术只是通过检测和模糊感兴趣的区域(例如，人脸、车牌、位置和时间戳)来模糊视频。不幸的是，模糊视频中的隐私泄露无法有效地被限制，尤其是在背景知识未知的情况下。在本文中，据我们所知，我们提出了第一个差分私有视频分析平台(VideoDP ),它灵活地支持不同的视频分析，并具有严格的隐私保证。给定输入视频，VideoDP随机生成实用程序驱动的私有视频，其中添加或移除任何敏感的视觉元素(例如，人和物体)不会显著影响输出视频。然后，由不可信视频分析师请求的不同视频分析可以在具有不同隐私的净化视频上灵活地执行。最后，我们在真实视频上进行了实验，实验结果表明，VideoDP可以产生准确的视频分析结果。
papers.title_zh: VideoDP:一个灵活的视频分析平台，支持不同的隐私保护

papers.title: Reputable List Curation from Decentralized Voting
papers.authors: Elizabeth C. Crites, Mary Maller, Sarah Meiklejohn, Rebekah Mercer
papers.abstract: Abstract Token-curated registries (TCRs) are a mechanism by which a set of users are able to jointly curate a reputable list about real-world information. Entries in the registry may have any form, so this primitive has been proposed for use—and deployed—in a variety of decentralized applications, ranging from the simple joint creation of lists to helping to prevent the spread of misinformation online. Despite this interest, the security of this primitive is not well understood, and indeed existing constructions do not achieve strong or provable notions of security or privacy. In this paper, we provide a formal cryptographic treatment of TCRs as well as a construction that provably hides the votes cast by individual curators. Along the way, we provide a model and proof of security for an underlying voting scheme, which may be of independent interest. We also demonstrate, via an implementation and evaluation, that our construction is practical enough to be deployed even on a constrained decentralized platform like Ethereum.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象令牌管理的注册中心(TCR)是一种机制，通过这种机制，一组用户能够共同管理关于真实世界信息的有信誉的列表。注册表中的条目可以具有任何形式，因此这种原语已经被提议用于——并部署在——各种分散的应用程序中，从简单的联合创建列表到帮助防止错误信息在线传播。尽管有这种兴趣，但这种原语的安全性并没有得到很好的理解，实际上现有的构造并没有实现强有力的或可证明的安全或隐私概念。在本文中，我们提供了一个TCR的正式密码处理以及一个构造，可证明隐藏了投票的个人策展人。在此过程中，我们提供了一个潜在投票方案的模型和安全性证明，这可能是独立的利益。通过实现和评估，我们还证明了我们的构造足够实用，甚至可以部署在像以太坊这样的受约束的分散平台上。
papers.title_zh: 分散投票产生的声誉良好的列表管理

papers.title: Running Refraction Networking for Real
papers.authors: Benjamin VanderSloot, Sergey Frolov, Jack Wampler, Sze Chuen Tan, Irv Simpson, Michalis Kallitsis, J. Alex Halderman, Nikita Borisov, Eric Wustrow
papers.abstract: Abstract Refraction networking is a next-generation censorship circumvention approach that locates proxy functionality in the network itself, at participating ISPs or other network operators. Following years of research and development and a brief pilot, we established the world’s first production deployment of a Refraction Networking system. Our deployment uses a highperformance implementation of the TapDance protocol and is enabled as a transport in the popular circumvention app Psiphon. It uses TapDance stations at four physical uplink locations of a mid-sized ISP, Merit Network, with an aggregate bandwidth of 140 Gbps. By the end of 2019, our system was enabled as a transport option in 559,000 installations of Psiphon, and it served upwards of 33,000 unique users per month. This paper reports on our experience building the deployment and operating it for the first year. We describe how we overcame engineering challenges, present detailed performance metrics, and analyze how our system has responded to dynamic censor behavior. Finally, we review lessons learned from operating this unique artifact and discuss prospects for further scaling Refraction Networking to meet the needs of censored users.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要折射网络是下一代审查规避方法，它在参与的ISP或其他网络运营商的网络本身中定位代理功能。经过多年的研发和短暂的试点，我们建立了世界上第一个折射网络系统的生产部署。我们的部署使用TapDance协议的高性能实现，并在流行的规避应用Psiphon中作为传输启用。它在一家中型ISP Merit Network的四个物理上行链路位置使用TapDance站，总带宽为140 Gbps。截至2019年底，我们的系统在559，000个Psiphon安装中作为运输选项启用，每月为超过33，000个独立用户提供服务。本文报告了我们在第一年构建和运行部署的经验。我们描述了我们如何克服工程挑战，提出了详细的性能指标，并分析了我们的系统如何响应动态审查行为。最后，我们回顾了从操作这一独特的人工产品中学到的经验教训，并讨论了进一步扩展折射网络以满足审查用户需求的前景。
papers.title_zh: 真实运行折射网络

papers.title: CanaryTrap: Detecting Data Misuse by Third-Party Apps on Online Social Networks
papers.authors: Shehroze Farooqi, Maaz Bin Musa, Zubair Shafiq, Fareed Zaffar
papers.abstract: Abstract Online social networks support a vibrant ecosystem of third-party apps that get access to personal information of a large number of users. Despite several recent high-profile incidents, methods to systematically detect data misuse by third-party apps on online social networks are lacking. We propose CanaryTrap to detect misuse of data shared with third-party apps. CanaryTrap associates a honeytoken to a user account and then monitors its unrecognized use via different channels after sharing it with the third-party app. We design and implement CanaryTrap to investigate misuse of data shared with third-party apps on Facebook. Specifically, we share the email address associated with a Facebook account as a honeytoken by installing a third-party app. We then monitor the received emails and use Facebook’s ad transparency tool to detect any unrecognized use of the shared honeytoken. Our deployment of CanaryTrap to monitor 1,024 Facebook apps has uncovered multiple cases of misuse of data shared with third-party apps on Facebook including ransomware, spam, and targeted advertising.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要在线社交网络支持一个充满活力的第三方应用生态系统，这些应用可以访问大量用户的个人信息。尽管最近发生了几起备受瞩目的事件，但仍缺乏系统检测在线社交网络上第三方应用滥用数据的方法。我们提出CanaryTrap来检测与第三方应用程序共享的数据的滥用。CanaryTrap将一个honeytoken关联到一个用户帐户，然后在与第三方应用程序共享后，通过不同的渠道监控其未被识别的使用。我们设计并实现了CanaryTrap来调查与脸书上的第三方应用程序共享的数据的滥用。具体来说，我们通过安装第三方应用程序，将与脸书账户相关的电子邮件地址作为honeytoken共享。然后，我们监控收到的电子邮件，并使用脸书的广告透明工具来检测任何未被识别的共享honeytoken的使用。我们部署CanaryTrap来监控1，024个脸书应用程序，发现了多起滥用与脸书第三方应用程序共享的数据的案例，包括勒索软件、垃圾邮件和定向广告。
papers.title_zh: CanaryTrap:检测在线社交网络上第三方应用的数据滥用

papers.title: Secure Evaluation of Quantized Neural Networks
papers.authors: Anders P. K. Dalskov, Daniel Escudero, Marcel Keller
papers.abstract: Abstract We investigate two questions in this paper: First, we ask to what extent “MPC friendly” models are already supported by major Machine Learning frameworks such as TensorFlow or PyTorch. Prior works provide protocols that only work on fixed-point integers and specialized activation functions, two aspects that are not supported by popular Machine Learning frameworks, and the need for these specialized model representations means that it is hard, and often impossible, to use e.g., TensorFlow to design, train and test models that later have to be evaluated securely. Second, we ask to what extent the functionality for evaluating Neural Networks already exists in general-purpose MPC frameworks. These frameworks have received more scrutiny, are better documented and supported on more platforms. Furthermore, they are typically flexible in terms of the threat model they support. In contrast, most secure evaluation protocols in the literature are targeted to a specific threat model and their implementations are only a “proof-of-concept”, making it very hard for their adoption in practice. We answer both of the above questions in a positive way:We observe that the quantization techniques supported by both TensorFlow, PyTorch and MXNet can provide models in a representation that can be evaluated securely; and moreover, that this evaluation can be performed by a general purpose MPC framework. We perform extensive benchmarks to understand the exact trade-offs between different corruption models, network sizes and efficiency. These experiments provide an interesting insight into cost between active and passive security, as well as honest and dishonest majority. Our work shows then that the separating line between existing ML frameworks and existing MPC protocols may be narrower than implicitly suggested by previous works.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要本文研究了两个问题:首先，我们询问主流机器学习框架(如TensorFlow或PyTorch)对“MPC友好”模型的支持程度。先前的工作提供了仅在定点整数和专用激活函数上工作的协议，这两个方面不受流行的机器学习框架支持，并且对这些专用模型表示的需要意味着很难并且通常不可能使用例如TensorFlow来设计、训练和测试稍后必须被安全评估的模型。第二，我们询问评估神经网络的功能在多大程度上已经存在于通用MPC框架中。这些框架受到了更多的审查，得到了更好的记录，并在更多的平台上得到支持。此外，就其支持的威胁模型而言，它们通常是灵活的。相比之下，文献中的大多数安全评估协议都是针对特定的威胁模型，它们的实现只是“概念验证”，因此很难在实践中采用。我们以肯定的方式回答了上述两个问题:我们观察到TensorFlow、PyTorch和MXNet都支持的量化技术可以在可以安全评估的表示中提供模型；此外，该评估可以由通用MPC框架来执行。我们执行广泛的基准测试，以了解不同腐败模式、网络规模和效率之间的确切权衡。这些实验提供了对主动和被动安全之间的成本，以及诚实和不诚实的大多数的有趣见解。我们的工作表明，现有的ML框架和现有的MPC协议之间的分界线可能比以前的工作暗示的要窄。
papers.title_zh: 量化神经网络的安全评估

papers.title: Energy-Efficient Dummy Traffic Generation for Home Automation Systems
papers.authors: Frederik Möllers
papers.abstract: Abstract Home and Building Automation Systems are becoming more and more popular these days. While they increase the comfort of living, they may also leak private information such as user presence to passive observers. In this paper we investigate approaches for the generation of dummy traffic in Home Automation Systems (HASs).We discuss fundamental requirements and their impact as well as two concrete dummy traffic generation algorithms.We measure the impact of Constant- Rate Dummy Traffic (CRDT) on the responsiveness and energy efficiency of Home Automation Systems. As an alternative, we present the Naive Exponential Dummies (NED) generation scheme in which the balance between privacy guarantees and energy efficiency can be arbitrarily moved. We formally prove its privacy guarantees and evaluate it against realistic sample data.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要目前，家庭和楼宇自动化系统变得越来越流行。虽然它们增加了生活的舒适性，但是它们也可能向被动的观察者泄露诸如用户存在的私人信息。在这篇论文中，我们研究了在家庭自动化系统(HASs)中产生虚拟流量的方法。我们讨论了基本要求及其影响，以及两个具体的虚拟流量生成算法。我们测量恒定速率虚拟交通(CRDT)对家庭自动化系统的响应性和能效的影响。作为一种替代方案，我们提出了朴素指数假人(NED)发电方案，其中隐私保证和能源效率之间的平衡可以任意移动。我们正式证明了它的隐私保证，并根据真实的样本数据进行评估。
papers.title_zh: 用于家庭自动化系统的高能效虚拟流量生成

papers.title: In-Depth Evaluation of Redirect Tracking and Link Usage
papers.authors: Martin Koop, Erik Tews, Stefan Katzenbeisser
papers.abstract: Abstract In today’s web, information gathering on users’ online behavior takes a major role. Advertisers use different tracking techniques that invade users’ privacy by collecting data on their browsing activities and interests. To preventing this threat, various privacy tools are available that try to block third-party elements. However, there exist various tracking techniques that are not covered by those tools, such as redirect link tracking. Here, tracking is hidden in ordinary website links pointing to further content. By clicking those links, or by automatic URL redirects, the user is being redirected through a chain of potential tracking servers not visible to the user. In this scenario, the tracker collects valuable data about the content, topic, or user interests of the website. Additionally, the tracker sets not only thirdparty but also first-party tracking cookies which are far more difficult to block by browser settings and ad-block tools. Since the user is forced to follow the redirect, tracking is inevitable and a chain of (redirect) tracking servers gain more insights in the users’ behavior. In this work we present the first large scale study on the threat of redirect link tracking. By crawling the Alexa top 50k websites and following up to 34 page links, we recorded traces of HTTP requests from 1.2 million individual visits of websites as well as analyzed 108,435 redirect chains originating from links clicked on those websites. We evaluate the derived redirect network on its tracking ability and demonstrate that top trackers are able to identify the user on the most visited websites. We also show that 11.6% of the scanned websites use one of the top 100 redirectors which are able to store nonblocked first-party tracking cookies on users’ machines even when third-party cookies are disabled. Moreover, we present the effect of various browser cookie settings, resulting in a privacy loss even when using third-party blocking tools.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要在当今的网络中，收集用户在线行为的信息起着重要的作用。广告商使用不同的跟踪技术，通过收集用户浏览活动和兴趣的数据来侵犯用户的隐私。为了防止这种威胁，可以使用各种隐私工具来阻止第三方元素。但是，这些工具没有涵盖各种跟踪技术，例如重定向链接跟踪。在这里，跟踪隐藏在指向进一步内容的普通网站链接中。通过点击这些链接，或者通过自动URL重定向，用户被重定向到一系列对用户不可见的潜在跟踪服务器。在这种情况下，跟踪器收集关于网站内容、主题或用户兴趣的有价值的数据。此外，追踪器不仅设置了第三方跟踪cookiesss，还设置了第一方跟踪cookie，这些cookie很难被浏览器设置和广告拦截工具拦截。由于用户被迫跟随重定向，跟踪是不可避免的，并且(重定向)跟踪服务器链获得了对用户行为的更多洞察。在这项工作中，我们提出了第一个关于重定向链接跟踪威胁的大规模研究。通过搜索Alexa排名前50k的网站并跟踪多达34个页面链接，我们记录了120万次网站访问的HTTP请求的痕迹，并分析了108，435个来自这些网站上点击链接的重定向链。我们评估了衍生重定向网络的跟踪能力，并证明了顶级追踪器能够识别最常访问的网站上的用户。我们还显示，11.6%的被扫描网站使用前100名重定向器中的一个，这些重定向器能够在用户的计算机上存储非阻止的第一方跟踪cookie，即使第三方cookie被禁用。此外，我们介绍了各种浏览器cookie设置的影响，即使使用第三方阻止工具也会导致隐私损失。
papers.title_zh: 对重定向跟踪和链接使用情况的深入评估

papers.title: Practical Privacy-Preserving K-means Clustering
papers.authors: Payman Mohassel, Mike Rosulek, Ni Trieu
papers.abstract: Abstract Clustering is a common technique for data analysis, which aims to partition data into similar groups. When the data comes from different sources, it is highly desirable to maintain the privacy of each database. In this work, we study a popular clustering algorithm (K-means) and adapt it to the privacypreserving context. Specifically, to construct our privacy-preserving clustering algorithm, we first propose an efficient batched Euclidean squared distance computation protocol in the amortizing setting, when one needs to compute the distance from the same point to other points. Furthermore, we construct a customized garbled circuit for computing the minimum value among shared values.We believe these new constructions may be of independent interest. We implement and evaluate our protocols to demonstrate their practicality and show that they are able to train datasets that are much larger and faster than in the previous work. The numerical results also show that the proposed protocol achieve almost the same accuracy compared to a K-means plain-text clustering algorithm.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要聚类是一种常用的数据分析技术，旨在将数据划分到相似的组中。当数据来自不同的来源时，非常需要维护每个数据库的隐私。在本文中，我们研究了一种流行的聚类算法(K-means ),并将其应用于隐私保护环境。具体来说，为了构造我们的隐私保护聚类算法，我们首先提出了一个有效的分批欧氏平方距离计算协议，当需要计算从同一点到其他点的距离时。此外，我们构建了一个定制的乱码电路，用于计算共享值中的最小值。我们相信这些新建筑可能是独立的利益。我们实现并评估了我们的协议，以证明它们的实用性，并表明它们能够训练比以前的工作更大、更快的数据集。数值结果还表明，与K-means纯文本聚类算法相比，该协议获得了几乎相同的准确率。
papers.title_zh: 实用的隐私保护K-均值聚类

papers.title: Self-Processing Private Sensor Data via Garbled Encryption
papers.authors: Nathan Manohar, Abhishek Jain, Amit Sahai
papers.abstract: Abstract We introduce garbled encryption, a relaxation of secret-key multi-input functional encryption (MiFE) where a function key can be used to jointly compute upon only a particular subset of all possible tuples of ciphertexts. We construct garbled encryption for general functionalities based on one-way functions. We show that garbled encryption can be used to build a self-processing private sensor data system where after a one-time trusted setup phase, sensors deployed in the field can periodically broadcast encrypted readings of private data that can be computed upon by anyone holding function keys to learn processed output, without any interaction. Such a system can be used to periodically check, e.g., whether a cluster of servers are in an “alarm” state. We implement our garbled encryption scheme and find that it performs quite well, with function evaluations in the microseconds. The performance of our scheme was tested on a standard commodity laptop.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要我们介绍乱码加密，它是密钥多输入函数加密(MiFE)的一种放松，在这种加密中，可以使用一个函数密钥来共同计算所有可能的密文元组的一个特定子集。我们基于单向函数为一般功能构造乱码加密。我们证明了乱码加密可用于构建自处理私有传感器数据系统，其中在一次性可信设置阶段之后，部署在现场的传感器可以定期广播私有数据的加密读数，任何持有功能键的人都可以计算这些读数，以了解处理后的输出，而无需任何交互。这种系统可以用于周期性地检查例如服务器集群是否处于“警报”状态。我们实现了我们的乱码加密方案，并发现它执行得相当好，函数求值只需几微秒。我们的方案的性能是在标准的商用笔记本电脑上测试的。
papers.title_zh: 通过乱码加密自我处理私有传感器数据

papers.title: Reimagining Secret Sharing: Creating a Safer and More Versatile Primitive by Adding Authenticity, Correcting Errors, and Reducing Randomness Requirements
papers.authors: Mihir Bellare, Wei Dai, Phillip Rogaway
papers.abstract: Abstract Aiming to strengthen classical secret-sharing to make it a more directly useful primitive for human endusers, we develop definitions, theorems, and efficient constructions for what we call adept secret-sharing. Our primary concerns are the properties we call privacy, authenticity, and error correction. Privacy strengthens the classical requirement by ensuring maximal confidentiality even if the dealer does not employ fresh, uniformly random coins with each sharing. That might happen either intentionally—to enable reproducible secretsharing— or unintentionally, when an entropy source fails. Authenticity is a shareholder’s guarantee that a secret recovered using his or her share will coincide with the value the dealer committed to at the time the secret was shared. Error correction is the guarantee that recovery of a secret will succeed, also identifying the valid shares, exactly when there is a unique explanation as to which shares implicate what secret. These concerns arise organically from a desire to create general-purpose libraries and apps for secret sharing that can withstand both strong adversaries and routine operational errors.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要为了加强经典的秘密共享，使其成为对人类终端用户更直接有用的原语，我们发展了我们称之为熟练秘密共享的定义、定理和有效构造。我们主要关心的是我们称之为隐私、真实性和纠错的属性。隐私通过确保最大的保密性加强了传统的要求，即使经销商在每次共享时不使用新鲜的、均匀随机的硬币。当熵源失效时，这可能是有意的——以实现可复制的秘密共享——也可能是无意的。真实性是股东的保证，即使用他或她的份额恢复的秘密将与经销商在秘密被共享时承诺的价值一致。纠错是成功恢复秘密的保证，也识别有效的部分，确切地说，当存在关于哪个部分包含什么秘密的唯一解释时。这些担忧源于一种愿望，即创建通用的秘密共享库和应用程序，能够抵御强大的对手和日常操作错误。
papers.title_zh: 重新想象秘密共享:通过增加真实性、纠正错误和减少随机性要求，创建一个更安全、更通用的原语

papers.title: How private is your period?: A systematic analysis of menstrual app privacy policies
papers.authors: Laura Shipp, Jorge Blasco
papers.abstract: Abstract Menstruapps are mobile applications that can track a user’s reproductive cycle, sex life and health in order to provide them with algorithmically derived insights into their body. These apps are now hugely popular, with the most favoured boasting over 100 million downloads. In this study, we investigate the privacy practices of a set of 30 Android menstruapps, a set which accounts for nearly 200 million downloads.We measured how the apps present information and behave on a number of privacy related topics, such as the complexity of the language used, the information collected by them, the involvement of third parties and how they describe user rights. Our results show that while common pieces of personal data such as name, email, etc. are treated appropriately by most applications, reproductive-related data is not covered by the privacy policies and in most cases, completely disregarded, even when it is required for the apps to work. We have informed app developers of our findings and have tried to engage them in dialogue around improving their privacy practices.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要月经应用程序是一种移动应用程序，可以跟踪用户的生殖周期、性生活和健康，以便为他们提供通过算法获得的对他们身体的见解。这些应用程序现在非常受欢迎，最受欢迎的下载量超过1亿次。在这项研究中，我们调查了一组30个Android月经应用程序的隐私做法，这一组占近2亿次下载。我们衡量了应用程序如何呈现信息以及在许多隐私相关主题上的表现，例如所用语言的复杂性、它们收集的信息、第三方的参与以及它们如何描述用户权利。我们的研究结果表明，虽然姓名、电子邮件等常见的个人数据。被大多数应用程序适当地处理，生殖相关的数据不在隐私政策的覆盖范围内，并且在大多数情况下，完全被忽略，即使它是应用程序工作所必需的。我们已经将我们的发现告知了应用程序开发者，并试图让他们参与到改善隐私实践的对话中来。
papers.title_zh: 你的经期有多私密？:月经应用隐私政策的系统分析

2019.journals_title: Proceedings on Privacy Enhancing Technologies, Volume 2019

papers.title: Editors' Introduction
papers.authors: Kostas Chatzikokolakis, Aaron Johnson
papers.abstract: Is there currently a crisis of confidence in psychological science reflecting an unprecedented level of doubt among practitioners about the reliability of research findings in the field? It would certainly appear that there is. These doubts emerged and grew as a series of unhappy events unfolded in 2011: the Diederik Stapel fraud case (see Stroebe, Postmes, & Spears, 2012, this issue), the publication in a major social psychology journal of an article purporting to show evidence of extrasensory perception (Bem, 2011) followed by widespread public mockery (see Galak, LeBoeuf, Nelson, & Simmons, in press; Wagenmakers, Wetzels, Borsboom, & van der Maas, 2011), reports by Wicherts and colleagues that psychologists are often unwilling or unable to share their published data for reanalysis (Wicherts, Bakker, & Molenaar, 2011; see also Wicherts, Borsboom, Kats, & Molenaar, 2006), and the publication of an important article in Psychological Science showing how easily researchers can, in the absence of any real effects, nonetheless obtain statistically significant differences through various questionable research practices (QRPs) such as exploring multiple dependent variables or covariates and only reporting these when they yield significant results (Simmons, Nelson, & Simonsohn, 2011). For those psychologists who expected that the embarrassments of 2011 would soon recede into memory, 2012 offered instead a quick plunge from bad to worse, with new indications of outright fraud in the field of social cognition (Simonsohn, 2012), an article in Psychological Science showing that many psychologists admit to engaging in at least some of the QRPs examined by Simmons and colleagues (John, Loewenstein, & Prelec, 2012), troubling new meta-analytic evidence suggesting that the QRPs described by Simmons and colleagues may even be leaving telltale signs visible in the distribution of p values in the psychological literature (Masicampo & Lalande, in press; Simonsohn, 2012), and an acrimonious dust-up in science magazines and blogs centered around the problems some investigators were having in replicating well-known results from the field of social cognition (Bower, 2012; Yong, 2012). Although the very public problems experienced by psychology over this 2-year period are embarrassing to those of us working in the field, some have found comfort in the fact that, over the same period, similar concerns have been arising across the scientific landscape (triggered by revelations that will be described shortly). Some of the suspected causes of unreplicability, such as publication bias (the tendency to publish only positive findings) have been discussed for years; in fact, the phrase file-drawer problem was first coined by a distinguished psychologist several decades ago (Rosenthal, 1979). However, many have speculated that these problems have been exacerbated in recent years as academia reaps the harvest of a hypercompetitive academic climate and an incentive scheme that provides rich rewards for overselling one’s work and few rewards at all for caution and circumspection (see Giner-Sorolla, 2012, this issue). Equally disturbing, investigators seem to be replicating each others’ work even less often than they did in the past, again presumably reflecting an incentive scheme gone askew (a point discussed in several articles in this issue, e.g., Makel, Plucker, & Hegarty, 2012). The frequency with which errors appear in the psychological literature is not presently known, but a number of facts suggest it might be disturbingly high. Ioannidis (2005) has shown through simple mathematical modeling that any scientific field that ignores replication can easily come to the miserable state wherein (as the title of his most famous article puts it) “most published research findings are false” (see also Ioannidis, 2012, this issue, and Pashler & Harris, 2012, this issue). Meanwhile, reports emerging from cancer research have made such grim scenarios seem more plausible: In 2012, several large pharmaceutical companies revealed that their efforts to replicate exciting preclinical findings from published academic studies in cancer biology were only rarely verifying the original results (Begley & Ellis, 2012; see also Osherovich, 2011; Prinz, Schlange, & Asadullah, 2011).
papers.abstract_zh: 目前心理科学是否出现了信任危机，反映出从业者对该领域研究结果的可靠性产生了前所未有的怀疑？显然是有的。随着2011年一系列不愉快事件的发生，这些怀疑出现了，并有所增长:Diederik Stapel欺诈案(见Stroebe，Postmes，& Spears，2012，这一期)，在一份主要的社会心理学杂志上发表了一篇文章，声称显示了超感知觉的证据(Bem，2011)，随后受到了广泛的公开嘲笑(见Galak，LeBoeuf，Nelson，& Simmons，正在出版中；Wagenmakers，Wetzels，Borsboom，& van der Maas，2011)，Wicherts及其同事报告说，心理学家往往不愿意或不能分享他们发表的数据进行再分析(Wicherts，Bakker，& Molenaar，2011；另见Wicherts，Borsboom，Kats，& Molenaar，2006)，以及发表在《心理科学》上的一篇重要文章，该文章表明，在没有任何实际影响的情况下，研究人员可以通过各种有问题的研究实践(qrp)轻松地获得统计学上的显著差异，如探索多个因变量或协变量，并仅在它们产生显著结果时报告这些结果(Simmons，Nelson，& Simonsohn，2011)。对于那些预计2011年的尴尬将很快消失在记忆中的心理学家来说，2012年反而提供了一个从糟糕到更糟糕的快速跳水，在社会认知领域出现了新的明显的欺诈迹象(Simonsohn，2012)，心理科学中的一篇文章显示，许多心理学家承认至少参与了Simmons及其同事检查的一些快速反应程序(John，Loewenstein，& Prelec，2012)。 令人不安的新荟萃分析证据表明，Simmons及其同事描述的qrp甚至可能在心理学文献中的p值分布中留下明显的迹象(Masicampo & Lalande，出版中； Simonsohn，2012)，科学杂志和博客上围绕一些研究人员在复制社会认知领域的知名结果时遇到的问题展开了激烈的争论(Bower，2012；永，2012)。虽然心理学在这两年中所经历的非常公开的问题令我们这些在该领域工作的人感到尴尬，但一些人已经找到了安慰，因为在同一时期，类似的担忧已经在整个科学领域出现(由即将描述的启示引发)。一些不可复制的可疑原因，如发表偏倚(倾向于只发表积极的发现)已经讨论了多年；事实上，抽屉问题这个短语是由一位杰出的心理学家在几十年前首次提出的(Rosenthal，1979)。然而，许多人推测，这些问题在最近几年已经恶化，因为学术界收获了高度竞争的学术氛围和奖励计划，这种奖励计划为过度销售自己的工作提供了丰厚的奖励，而对谨慎和谨慎却几乎没有奖励(见吉纳-索罗拉，2012年，这一期)。同样令人不安的是，研究人员似乎比过去更少地重复彼此的工作，这可能再次反映了一个倾斜的激励机制(这一点在本期的几篇文章中讨论过，例如，马克尔、普吕克尔和赫加蒂，2012)。错误出现在心理学文献中的频率目前还不清楚，但许多事实表明它可能高得令人不安。约安尼迪斯(2005)通过简单的数学建模表明，任何忽视复制的科学领域都很容易陷入悲惨的境地，其中(正如他最著名的文章的标题所言)“大多数发表的研究结果都是错误的”(另见约安尼迪斯，2012，本期，以及Pashler & Harris，2012，本期)。与此同时，来自癌症研究的报告让这种严峻的情景看起来更加可信:2012年，几家大型制药公司透露，他们在癌症生物学方面复制已发表学术研究中令人兴奋的临床前发现的努力很少验证原始结果(Begley & Ellis，2012；另见Osherovich，2011年；普林茨、施朗格和阿萨杜拉，2011年)。
papers.title_zh: 编辑介绍

papers.title: Olympus: Sensor Privacy through Utility Aware Obfuscation
papers.authors: Nisarg Raval, Ashwin Machanavajjhala, Jerry Pan
papers.abstract: Abstract Personal data garnered from various sensors are often offloaded by applications to the cloud for analytics. This leads to a potential risk of disclosing private user information. We observe that the analytics run on the cloud are often limited to a machine learning model such as predicting a user’s activity using an activity classifier. We present Olympus, a privacy framework that limits the risk of disclosing private user information by obfuscating sensor data while minimally affecting the functionality the data are intended for. Olympus achieves privacy by designing a utility aware obfuscation mechanism, where privacy and utility requirements are modeled as adversarial networks. By rigorous and comprehensive evaluation on a real world app and on benchmark datasets, we show that Olympus successfully limits the disclosure of private information without significantly affecting functionality of the application.
papers.abstract_zh: 从各种传感器收集的抽象个人数据通常由应用程序卸载到云中进行分析。这导致了泄露私人用户信息的潜在风险。我们观察到，在云上运行的分析通常局限于机器学习模型，例如使用活动分类器预测用户的活动。我们介绍了Olympus，这是一个隐私框架，它通过模糊传感器数据来限制泄露私人用户信息的风险，同时最大限度地影响数据的功能。Olympus通过设计一种效用感知混淆机制来实现隐私，其中隐私和效用需求被建模为敌对网络。通过对真实世界应用程序和基准数据集的严格和全面的评估，我们表明Olympus成功地限制了私人信息的泄露，而没有显著影响应用程序的功能。
papers.title_zh: 奥林巴斯:通过效用感知混淆实现传感器隐私

papers.title: RON-Gauss: Enhancing Utility in Non-Interactive Private Data Release
papers.authors: Thee Chanyaswad, Changchang Liu, Prateek Mittal
papers.abstract: Abstract A key challenge facing the design of differential privacy in the non-interactive setting is to maintain the utility of the released data. To overcome this challenge, we utilize the Diaconis-Freedman-Meckes (DFM) effect, which states that most projections of high-dimensional data are nearly Gaussian. Hence, we propose the RON-Gauss model that leverages the novel combination of dimensionality reduction via random orthonormal (RON) projection and the Gaussian generative model for synthesizing differentially-private data. We analyze how RON-Gauss benefits from the DFM effect, and present multiple algorithms for a range of machine learning applications, including both unsupervised and supervised learning. Furthermore, we rigorously prove that (a) our algorithms satisfy the strong ɛ-differential privacy guarantee, and (b) RON projection can lower the level of perturbation required for differential privacy. Finally, we illustrate the effectiveness of RON-Gauss under three common machine learning applications – clustering, classification, and regression – on three large real-world datasets. Our empirical results show that (a) RON-Gauss outperforms previous approaches by up to an order of magnitude, and (b) loss in utility compared to the non-private real data is small. Thus, RON-Gauss can serve as a key enabler for real-world deployment of privacy-preserving data release.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要非交互环境下差分隐私设计面临的一个关键挑战是维护发布数据的效用。为了克服这一挑战，我们利用了迪康尼斯-弗里德曼-梅克斯(DFM)效应，该效应表明大多数高维数据的投影接近高斯分布。因此，我们提出了RON-Gauss模型，该模型利用了通过随机正交投影(RON)进行维度缩减的新组合，以及用于合成差分私有数据的高斯生成模型。我们分析了RON-Gauss如何受益于DFM效应，并提出了一系列机器学习应用的多种算法，包括无监督和有监督学习。此外，我们严格证明:( a)我们的算法满足强ɛ-differential隐私保证,( b) RON投影可以降低差分隐私所需的扰动水平。最后，我们在三个大型真实数据集上说明了RON-Gauss在三种常见机器学习应用(聚类、分类和回归)下的有效性。我们的实证结果表明:( a) RON-Gauss比以前的方法高出一个数量级,( b)与非私有真实数据相比，效用损失很小。因此，RON-Gauss可以作为隐私保护数据发布的真实部署的关键使能器。
papers.title_zh: RON-Gauss:增强非交互式私人数据发布的效用

papers.title: Privacy-Preserving Similar Patient Queries for Combined Biomedical Data
papers.authors: Ahmed Salem, Pascal Berrang, Mathias Humbert, Michael Backes
papers.abstract: Abstract The decreasing costs of molecular profiling have fueled the biomedical research community with a plethora of new types of biomedical data, enabling a breakthrough towards more precise and personalized medicine. Naturally, the increasing availability of data also enables physicians to compare patients’ data and treatments easily and to find similar patients in order to propose the optimal therapy. Such similar patient queries (SPQs) are of utmost importance to medical practice and will be relied upon in future health information exchange systems. While privacy-preserving solutions have been previously studied, those are limited to genomic data, ignoring the different newly available types of biomedical data. In this paper, we propose new cryptographic techniques for finding similar patients in a privacy-preserving manner with various types of biomedical data, including genomic, epigenomic and transcriptomic data as well as their combination. We design protocols for two of the most common similarity metrics in biomedicine: the Euclidean distance and Pearson correlation coefficient. Moreover, unlike previous approaches, we account for the fact that certain locations contribute differently to a given disease or phenotype by allowing to limit the query to the relevant locations and to assign them different weights. Our protocols are specifically designed to be highly efficient in terms of communication and bandwidth, requiring only one or two rounds of communication and thus enabling scalable parallel queries. We rigorously prove our protocols to be secure based on cryptographic games and instantiate our technique with three of the most important types of biomedical data – namely DNA, microRNA expression, and DNA methylation. Our experimental results show that our protocols can compute a similarity query over a typical number of positions against a database of 1,000 patients in a few seconds. Finally, we propose and formalize strategies to mitigate the threat of malicious users or hospitals.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要分子特征分析成本的降低为生物医学研究界提供了大量的新型生物医学数据，从而实现了更精确和个性化医学的突破。自然，数据可用性的增加也使医生能够容易地比较患者的数据和治疗，并找到相似的患者，以便提出最佳治疗方案。这种类似的患者查询(SPQs)对于医疗实践是非常重要的，并且将在未来的健康信息交换系统中被依赖。虽然以前已经研究过隐私保护解决方案，但这些解决方案仅限于基因组数据，忽略了不同的新可用类型的生物医学数据。在本文中，我们提出了新的密码技术，用于以保护隐私的方式利用各种类型的生物医学数据，包括基因组、表观基因组和转录组数据以及它们的组合来发现相似的患者。我们为生物医学中两个最常见的相似性度量设计了协议:欧几里德距离和皮尔逊相关系数。此外，与以前的方法不同，我们考虑到这样一个事实，即通过允许将查询限制到相关位置并为它们分配不同的权重，某些位置对给定疾病或表型有不同的贡献。我们的协议被特别设计为在通信和带宽方面非常高效，只需要一两轮通信，因此支持可伸缩的并行查询。我们基于密码游戏严格证明了我们的协议是安全的，并用三种最重要的生物医学数据来实例化我们的技术，即DNA、microRNA表达和DNA甲基化。我们的实验结果表明，我们的协议可以在几秒钟内针对1000名患者的数据库在典型数量的位置上计算相似性查询。最后，我们提出并形式化策略，以减轻恶意用户或医院的威胁。
papers.title_zh: 对组合生物医学数据的隐私保护的相似患者查询

papers.title: Tithonus: A Bitcoin Based Censorship Resilient System
papers.authors: Ruben Recabarren, Bogdan Carbunar
papers.abstract: Abstract Providing reliable and surreptitious communications is difficult in the presence of adaptive and resourceful state level censors. In this paper we introduce Tithonus, a framework that builds on the Bitcoin blockchain and network to provide censorship-resistant communication mechanisms. In contrast to previous approaches, we do not rely solely on the slow and expensive blockchain consensus mechanism but instead fully exploit Bitcoin’s peer-to-peer gossip protocol. We develop adaptive, fast and cost effective data communication solutions that camouflage client requests into inconspicuous Bitcoin transactions. We propose solutions to securely request and transfer content, with unobservability and censorship resistance, and free, pay-per-access and subscription based payment options. When compared to state-of-the-art Bitcoin writing solutions, Tithonus reduces the cost of transferring data to censored clients by 2 orders of magnitude and increases the goodput by 3 to 5 orders of magnitude. We show that Tithonus client initiated transactions are hard to detect, while server initiated transactions cannot be censored without creating split world problems to the Bit-coin blockchain.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要在适应性强和足智多谋的国家级审查者面前，提供可靠和秘密的通信是困难的。在本文中，我们介绍了Tithonus，这是一个基于比特币区块链和网络的框架，提供了抗审查的通信机制。与以前的方法不同，我们不仅仅依赖缓慢而昂贵的区块链共识机制，而是充分利用比特币的点对点八卦协议。我们开发自适应、快速且经济高效的数据通信解决方案，将客户请求伪装成不显眼的比特币交易。我们提出了安全请求和传输内容的解决方案，具有不可观察性和审查阻力，以及免费、按次付费和基于订阅的支付选项。与最先进的比特币写入解决方案相比，Tithonus将向审查客户端传输数据的成本降低了2个数量级，并将有效吞吐量提高了3到5个数量级。我们证明了Tithonus客户端发起的事务很难被检测到，而服务器发起的事务不能被审查，否则会给比特硬币区块链带来分裂世界的问题。
papers.title_zh: Tithonus:一个基于比特币的审查弹性系统

papers.title: Systematizing Genome Privacy Research: A Privacy-Enhancing Technologies Perspective
papers.authors: Alexandros Mittos, Bradley A. Malin, Emiliano De Cristofaro
papers.abstract: Abstract Rapid advances in human genomics are enabling researchers to gain a better understanding of the role of the genome in our health and well-being, stimulating hope for more effective and cost efficient healthcare. However, this also prompts a number of security and privacy concerns stemming from the distinctive characteristics of genomic data. To address them, a new research community has emerged and produced a large number of publications and initiatives. In this paper, we rely on a structured methodology to contextualize and provide a critical analysis of the current knowledge on privacy-enhancing technologies used for testing, storing, and sharing genomic data, using a representative sample of the work published in the past decade. We identify and discuss limitations, technical challenges, and issues faced by the community, focusing in particular on those that are inherently tied to the nature of the problem and are harder for the community alone to address. Finally, we report on the importance and difficulty of the identified challenges based on an online survey of genome data privacy experts.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要人类基因组学的快速发展使研究人员能够更好地了解基因组在我们健康和福祉中的作用，激发了对更有效和更具成本效益的医疗保健的希望。然而，这也引发了许多源于基因组数据独特特征的安全和隐私问题。为了解决这些问题，一个新的研究团体出现了，并产生了大量的出版物和倡议。在本文中，我们依靠一种结构化的方法，使用过去十年中发表的代表性工作样本，对用于测试、存储和共享基因组数据的隐私增强技术的当前知识进行背景化和批判性分析。我们确定并讨论社区面临的限制、技术挑战和问题，特别关注那些与问题的本质有内在联系且社区难以单独解决的问题。最后，我们基于对基因组数据隐私专家的在线调查，报告了已确定挑战的重要性和难度。
papers.title_zh: 基因组隐私研究的系统化:隐私增强技术的视角

papers.title: My Genome Belongs to Me: Controlling Third Party Computation on Genomic Data
papers.authors: Dominic Deuber, Christoph Egger, Katharina Fech, Giulio Malavolta, Dominique Schröder, Sri Aravinda Krishnan Thyagarajan, Florian Battke, Claudia Durand
papers.abstract: Abstract An individual’s genetic information is possibly the most valuable personal information. While knowledge of a person’s DNA sequence can facilitate the diagnosis of several heritable diseases and allow personalized treatment, its exposure comes with significant threats to the patient’s privacy. Currently known solutions for privacy-respecting computation require the owner of the DNA to either be heavily involved in the execution of a cryptographic protocol or to completely outsource the access control to a third party. This motivates the demand for cryptographic protocols which enable computation over encrypted genomic data while keeping the owner of the genome in full control. We envision a scenario where data owners can exercise arbitrary and dynamic access policies, depending on the intended use of the analysis results and on the credentials of who is conducting the analysis. At the same time, data owners are not required to maintain a local copy of their entire genetic data and do not need to exhaust their computational resources in an expensive cryptographic protocol. In this work, we present METIS, a system that assists the computation over encrypted data stored in the cloud while leaving the decision on admissible computations to the data owner. It is based on garbled circuits and supports any polynomially-computable function. A critical feature of our system is that the data owner is free from computational overload and her communication complexity is independent of the size of the input data and only linear in the size of the circuit’s output. We demonstrate the practicality of our approach with an implementation and an evaluation of several functions over real datasets.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要个体的遗传信息可能是最有价值的个人信息。虽然了解一个人的DNA序列有助于诊断几种遗传性疾病，并允许个性化治疗，但其暴露会对患者的隐私造成重大威胁。目前已知的尊重隐私的计算解决方案要求DNA的所有者要么大量参与加密协议的执行，要么将访问控制完全外包给第三方。这激发了对加密协议的需求，该协议能够在加密的基因组数据上进行计算，同时保持基因组所有者的完全控制。我们设想了一个场景，其中数据所有者可以根据分析结果的预期用途和进行分析的人员的证书来实施任意的动态访问策略。同时，数据所有者不需要维护其整个遗传数据的本地副本，也不需要在昂贵的加密协议中耗尽其计算资源。在这项工作中，我们介绍了METIS，这是一个帮助计算存储在云中的加密数据的系统，同时将可接受计算的决定权留给数据所有者。它基于混乱的电路，支持任何多项式计算的功能。我们的系统的一个关键特征是数据拥有者免于计算过载，并且她的通信复杂度与输入数据的大小无关，仅与电路输出的大小成线性关系。我们通过在真实数据集上实现和评估几个函数来展示我们方法的实用性。
papers.title_zh: 我的基因组属于我:控制基因组数据上的第三方计算

papers.title: LOGAN: Membership Inference Attacks Against Generative Models
papers.authors: Jamie Hayes, Luca Melis, George Danezis, Emiliano De Cristofaro
papers.abstract: Abstract Generative models estimate the underlying distribution of a dataset to generate realistic samples according to that distribution. In this paper, we present the first membership inference attacks against generative models: given a data point, the adversary determines whether or not it was used to train the model. Our attacks leverage Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs), which combine a discriminative and a generative model, to detect overfitting and recognize inputs that were part of training datasets, using the discriminator’s capacity to learn statistical differences in distributions. We present attacks based on both white-box and black-box access to the target model, against several state-of-the-art generative models, over datasets of complex representations of faces (LFW), objects (CIFAR-10), and medical images (Diabetic Retinopathy). We also discuss the sensitivity of the attacks to different training parameters, and their robustness against mitigation strategies, finding that defenses are either ineffective or lead to significantly worse performances of the generative models in terms of training stability and/or sample quality.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象生成模型估计数据集的潜在分布，以根据该分布生成真实的样本。在本文中，我们提出了第一个针对生成模型的成员推理攻击:给定一个数据点，对手确定它是否用于训练模型。我们的攻击利用生成式对抗网络(GANs ),它结合了判别和生成模型，利用判别器学习分布中统计差异的能力来检测过度拟合并识别训练数据集的输入。我们提出了基于对目标模型的白盒和黑盒访问的攻击，针对几个最先进的生成模型，针对人脸(LFW)、物体(CIFAR-10)和医学图像(糖尿病视网膜病变)的复杂表示的数据集。我们还讨论了攻击对不同训练参数的敏感性，以及它们对缓解策略的鲁棒性，发现防御要么无效，要么导致生成模型在训练稳定性和/或样本质量方面的性能显著下降。
papers.title_zh: LOGAN:针对生成模型的成员推理攻击

papers.title: PD-DM: An efficient locality-preserving block device mapper with plausible deniability
papers.authors: Chen Chen, Anrin Chakraborti, Radu Sion
papers.abstract: Abstract Encryption protects sensitive data from unauthorized access, yet is not sufficient when users are forced to surrender keys under duress. In contrast, plausible deniability enables users to not only encrypt data but also deny its existence when challenged. Most existing plausible deniability work (e.g. the successful and unfortunately now-defunct TrueCrypt) tackles “single snapshot” adversaries, and cannot handle the more realistic scenario of adversaries gaining access to a device at multiple time points. Such “multi-snapshot” adversaries can simply observe modifications between snapshots and detect the existence of hidden data. Existing ideas handling “multi-snapshot” scenarios feature prohibitive overheads when deployed on practically-sized disks. This is mostly due to a lack of data locality inherent in certain standard access-randomization mechanisms, one of the building blocks used to ensure plausible deniability. In this work, we show that such randomization is not necessary for strong plausible deniability. Instead, it can be replaced by a canonical form that permits most of writes to be done sequentially. This has two key advantages: 1) it reduces the impact of seek due to random accesses; 2) it reduces the overall number of physical blocks that need to be written for each logical write. As a result, PD-DM increases I/O throughput by orders of magnitude (10–100× in typical setups) over existing work while maintaining strong plausible deniability against multi-snapshot adversaries. Notably, PD-DM is the first plausible-deniable system getting within reach of the performance of standard encrypted volumes (dm-crypt) for random I/O.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要加密保护敏感数据免受未经授权的访问，但当用户在胁迫下被迫交出密钥时，这是不够的。相反，似是而非的可否认性使用户不仅可以加密数据，还可以在受到质疑时否认数据的存在。大多数现有的似是而非的可否认性工作(例如，成功的但不幸现已失效的TrueCrypt)处理“单一快照”对手，并且不能处理对手在多个时间点获得对设备的访问的更现实的场景。这种“多快照”对手可以简单地观察快照之间的修改，并检测隐藏数据的存在。当部署在实际大小的磁盘上时，处理“多快照”场景的现有想法具有令人望而却步的开销。这主要是由于在某些标准的随机访问机制中缺乏固有的数据局部性，而随机访问机制是用来确保可信拒绝性的构造块之一。在这项工作中，我们表明这种随机化对于强似是而非的否认是不必要的。相反，它可以被允许大部分写操作顺序完成的规范形式所取代。这有两个关键的优点:1)它减少了由于随机访问引起的寻道的影响；2)它减少了每次逻辑写入需要写入的物理块数。因此，PD-DM将I/O吞吐量提高了几个数量级(在典型设置中为10–100倍),同时保持了对多快照对手的强有力的可信抵赖能力。值得注意的是，PD-DM是第一个达到标准加密卷(dm-crypt)性能的随机I/O系统。
papers.title_zh: PD-DM:一种有效的具有似是而非可否认性的保局块设备映射器

papers.title: Hardware-Supported ORAM in Effect: Practical Oblivious Search and Update on Very Large Dataset
papers.authors: Thang Hoang, Muslum Ozgur Ozmen, Yeongjin Jang, Attila A. Yavuz
papers.abstract: Abstract The ability to query and update over encrypted data is an essential feature to enable breach-resilient cyber-infrastructures. Statistical attacks on searchable encryption (SE) have demonstrated the importance of sealing information leaks in access patterns. In response to such attacks, the community has proposed the Oblivious Random Access Machine (ORAM). However, due to the logarithmic communication overhead of ORAM, the composition of ORAM and SE is known to be costly in the conventional client-server model, which poses a critical barrier toward its practical adaptations. In this paper, we propose a novel hardware-supported privacy-enhancing platform called Practical Oblivious Search and Update Platform (POSUP), which enables oblivious keyword search and update operations on large datasets with high efficiency. We harness Intel SGX to realize efficient oblivious data structures for oblivious search/update purposes. We implemented POSUP and evaluated its performance on a Wikipedia dataset containing ≥229 keyword-file pairs. Our implementation is highly efficient, taking only 1 ms to access a 3 KB block with Circuit-ORAM. Our experiments have shown that POSUP offers up to 70× less end-to-end delay with 100× reduced network bandwidth consumption compared with the traditional ORAM-SE composition without secure hardware. POSUP is also at least 4.5× faster for up to 99.5% of keywords that can be searched compared with state-of-the-art Intel SGX-assisted search platforms.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要对加密数据进行查询和更新的能力是实现具有抗破坏能力的网络基础设施的基本特征。对可搜索加密(SE)的统计攻击已经证明了在访问模式中密封信息泄漏的重要性。为了应对这种攻击，社会上提出了不经意随机存取机(ORAM)。然而，由于ORAM的对数通信开销，已知在传统的客户机-服务器模型中，ORAM和SE的组合成本很高，这对其实际应用构成了关键障碍。本文提出了一种新的硬件支持的隐私增强平台，称为实用的不经意搜索和更新平台(POSUP ),它能够在大数据集上高效地进行不经意关键词搜索和更新操作。我们利用SGX来实现高效的不经意数据结构，用于不经意搜索/更新目的。我们实现了POSUP，并在包含≥229个关键词-文件对的维基百科数据集上评估了它的性能。我们的实现是非常高效的，用电路ORAM访问一个3 KB的块只需要1 ms。我们的实验表明，与没有安全硬件的传统ORAM-SE组合相比，POSUP的端到端延迟减少了70倍，网络带宽消耗减少了100倍。与最先进的英特尔SGX辅助搜索平台相比，POSUP在搜索高达99.5%的关键词时速度至少提高了4.5倍。
papers.title_zh: 硬件支持的ORAM效果:在非常大的数据集上的实用的不经意搜索和更新

papers.title: Choosing Epsilon for Privacy as a Service
papers.authors: Sara Krehbiel
papers.abstract: Abstract In many real world scenarios, terms of service allow a producer of a service to collect data from its users. Producers value data but often only compensate users for their data indirectly with reduced prices for the service. This work considers how a producer (data analyst) may offer differential privacy as a premium service for its users (data subjects), where the degree of privacy offered may itself depend on the user data. Along the way, it strengthens prior negative results for privacy markets to the pay-for-privacy setting and develops a new notion of endogenous differential privacy. A positive result for endogenous privacy is given in the form of a class of mechanisms for privacy-as-a-service markets that 1) determine ɛ using the privacy and accuracy preferences of a heterogeneous body of data subjects and a single analyst, 2) collect and distribute payments for the chosen level of privacy, and 3) privately analyze the database. These mechanisms are endogenously differentially private with respect to data subjects’ privacy preferences as well as their private data, they directly elicit data subjects’ true preferences, and they determine a level of privacy that is efficient given all parties’ preferences.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要在许多真实的场景中，服务条款允许服务的生产者从其用户那里收集数据。生产者重视数据，但通常只是通过降低服务价格来间接补偿用户的数据。这项工作考虑生产者(数据分析师)如何为其用户(数据主体)提供差别隐私作为优质服务，其中提供的隐私程度本身可能取决于用户数据。与此同时，它加强了先前隐私市场对付费隐私设置的负面结果，并发展了内生差异隐私的新概念。内生隐私的积极结果以隐私即服务市场的一类机制的形式给出，这些机制1)使用异构数据主体和单个分析师的隐私和准确性偏好来确定ɛ，2)为选定的隐私级别收集和分配支付，以及3)私下分析数据库。这些机制对于数据主体的隐私偏好以及他们的隐私数据是内生的不同隐私，它们直接引出数据主体的真实偏好，并且它们确定在给定各方偏好的情况下有效的隐私级别。
papers.title_zh: 选择艾司隆的隐私即服务

papers.title: Lethe: Conceal Content Deletion from Persistent Observers
papers.authors: Mohsen Minaei, Mainack Mondal, Patrick Loiseau, Krishna P. Gummadi, Aniket Kate
papers.abstract: Abstract Most social platforms offer mechanisms allowing users to delete their posts, and a significant fraction of users exercise this right to be forgotten. However, ironically, users’ attempt to reduce attention to sensitive posts via deletion, in practice, attracts unwanted attention from stalkers specifically to those (deleted) posts. Thus, deletions may leave users more vulnerable to attacks on their privacy in general. Users hoping to make their posts forgotten face a “damned if I do, damned if I don’t” dilemma. Many are shifting towards ephemeral social platform like Snapchat, which will deprive us of important user-data archival. In the form of intermittent withdrawals, we present, Lethe, a novel solution to this problem of (really) forgetting the forgotten. If the next-generation social platforms are willing to give up the uninterrupted availability of non-deleted posts by a very small fraction, Lethe provides privacy to the deleted posts over long durations. In presence of Lethe, an adversarial observer becomes unsure if some posts are permanently deleted or just temporarily withdrawn by Lethe; at the same time, the adversarial observer is overwhelmed by a large number of falsely flagged undeleted posts. To demonstrate the feasibility and performance of Lethe, we analyze large-scale real data about users’ deletion over Twitter and thoroughly investigate how to choose time duration distributions for alternating between temporary withdrawals and resurrections of non-deleted posts. We find a favorable trade-off between privacy, availability and adversarial overhead in different settings for users exercising their right to delete. We show that, even against an ultimate adversary with an uninterrupted access to the entire platform, Lethe offers deletion privacy for up to 3 months from the time of deletion, while maintaining content availability as high as 95% and keeping the adversarial precision to 20%.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要大多数社交平台提供允许用户删除帖子的机制，相当一部分用户行使这种被遗忘的权利。然而，具有讽刺意味的是，用户试图通过删除来减少对敏感帖子的关注，实际上吸引了跟踪者对那些(已删除)帖子的不必要的关注。因此，一般来说，删除可能会使用户的隐私更容易受到攻击。希望自己的帖子被遗忘的用户面临着一个“如果我做，就该死，如果我不做，就该死”的困境。许多人正在转向Snapchat等短暂的社交平台，这将剥夺我们重要的用户数据存档。在间歇性退缩的形式中，我们提出了遗忘这个问题的新解决方案。如果下一代社交平台愿意放弃一小部分未删除帖子的不间断可用性，Lethe可以在很长时间内为已删除的帖子提供隐私。在Lethe面前，敌对的观察者变得不确定一些帖子是被Lethe永久删除还是只是暂时撤回；与此同时，敌对观察员被大量错误标记的未删除帖子淹没。为了证明Lethe的可行性和性能，我们分析了用户在Twitter上删除的大规模真实数据，并深入研究了如何选择未删除帖子的临时撤回和恢复之间的持续时间分布。我们发现，对于行使删除权的用户来说，在不同的设置中，隐私、可用性和对抗性开销之间存在有利的权衡。我们发现，即使是针对能够不间断访问整个平台的终极对手，Lethe也能在删除后的3个月内提供删除隐私，同时保持内容可用性高达95%，并将对抗精度保持在20%。
papers.title_zh: Lethe:对持久观察者隐藏内容删除

papers.title: Investigating sources of PII used in Facebook's targeted advertising
papers.authors: Giridhari Venkatadri, Elena Lucherini, Piotr Sapiezynski, Alan Mislove
papers.abstract: Online social networking services have become the gateway to the Internet for millions of users, accumulating rich databases of user data that form the basis of their powerful advertising platforms. Today, these services frequently collect various kinds of personally identifying information (PII), such as phone numbers, email addresses, and names and dates of birth. Since this PII often represents extremely accurate, unique, and verified user data, these services have the incentive to exploit it for other purposes, including to provide advertisers with more accurate targeting. Indeed, most popular services have launched PII-based targeting features that allow advertisers to target users with ads directly by uploading the intended targets’ PII. Unfortunately, these services often do not make such usage clear to users, and it is often impossible for users to determine how they are actually being targeted by advertisers. In this paper, we focus on Facebook and investigate the sources of PII used for its PII-based targeted advertising feature. We develop a novel technique that uses Facebook’s advertiser interface to check whether a given piece of PII can be used to target some Facebook user, and use this technique to study how Facebook’s advertising service obtains users’ PII. We investigate a range of potential sources of PII, finding that phone numbers and email addresses added as profile attributes, those provided for security purposes such as two-factor authentication, those provided to the Facebook Messenger app for the purpose of messaging, and those included in friends’ uploaded contact databases are all used by Facebook to allow advertisers to target users. These findings hold despite all the relevant privacy controls on our test
papers.abstract_zh: 在线社交网络服务已经成为数百万用户进入互联网的门户，积累了丰富的用户数据数据库，这些数据库构成了他们强大的广告平台的基础。如今，这些服务经常收集各种个人身份信息(PII)，如电话号码、电子邮件地址、姓名和出生日期。由于这种PII通常代表非常准确、独特和经过验证的用户数据，这些服务有动机利用它来实现其他目的，包括为广告商提供更准确的目标。事实上，大多数受欢迎的服务都推出了基于PII的定向功能，允许广告商通过上传目标用户的PII，直接向用户投放广告。不幸的是，这些服务通常不会让用户清楚这种用法，并且用户通常不可能确定他们实际上是如何被广告商瞄准的。在本文中，我们重点关注脸书，并调查其PII定向广告功能所使用的PII的来源。我们开发了一种新颖的技术，使用脸书的广告客户接口来检查给定的PII是否可以用于针对一些脸书用户，并使用这种技术来研究脸书的广告服务如何获得用户的PII。我们调查了PII的一系列潜在来源，发现电话号码和电子邮件地址作为个人资料属性添加，那些出于安全目的(如双重身份认证)提供的电话号码和电子邮件地址，那些出于发送消息目的提供给Facebook Messenger应用程序的电话号码和电子邮件地址，以及那些包含在朋友上传的联系人数据库中的电话号码和电子邮件地址，都被脸书用来让广告商锁定用户。尽管我们的测试有相关的隐私控制，这些发现仍然成立
papers.title_zh: 调查PII在脸书定向广告中的来源

papers.title: Breach-Resistant Structured Encryption
papers.authors: Ghous Amjad, Seny Kamara, Tarik Moataz
papers.abstract: Abstract Motivated by the problem of data breaches, we formalize a notion of security for dynamic structured encryption (STE) schemes that guarantees security against a snapshot adversary; that is, an adversary that receives a copy of the encrypted structure at various times but does not see the transcripts related to any queries. In particular, we focus on the construction of dynamic encrypted multi-maps which are used to build efficient searchable symmetric encryption schemes, graph encryption schemes and encrypted relational databases. Interestingly, we show that a form of snapshot security we refer to as breach resistance implies previously-studied notions such as a (weaker version) of history independence and write-only obliviousness. Moreover, we initiate the study of dual-secure dynamic STE constructions: schemes that are forward-private against a persistent adversary and breach-resistant against a snapshot adversary. The notion of forward privacy guarantees that updates to the encrypted structure do not reveal their association to any query made in the past. As a concrete instantiation, we propose a new dual-secure dynamic multi-map encryption scheme that outperforms all existing constructions; including schemes that are not dual-secure. Our construction has query complexity that grows with the selectivity of the query and the number of deletes since the client executed a linear-time rebuild protocol which can be de-amortized.
