papers.abstract_zh: 摘要匿名通信网络使个人能够在线维护他们的隐私。最受欢迎的此类网络是Tor，每天大约有200万用户；然而，Tor已经达到了其可扩展性的极限。Tor和类似网络设计的主要可扩展性瓶颈之一源于向所有网络客户端分发网络中服务器的全局视图的要求。这一要求是为了避免认知攻击，在这种攻击中，知道某些客户端知道网络的哪些部分而不知道的对手可以判定这些客户端是否对特定的网络流量负责。在这项工作中，我们引入了一种新的解决方案来解决这个可扩展性问题，通过利用不经意的RAM结构和可信的执行环境，使客户端能够只获取他们需要的网络视图的部分，而目录服务器不知道哪些部分正在被获取。我们将我们的设计与当前的Tor机制和其他相关工作进行了比较，从端到端的角度显示了一到两个数量级的性能提升。我们分析了今天实际部署这种方案的要求，并得出结论，只需要一小部分(< 2.5%)继电器具有所需的硬件支持；此外，这些中继可以以最小的网络带宽需求来执行它们的任务。
papers.title_zh: ConsenSGX:利用可信执行环境扩展匿名通信网络

papers.title: Circumventing Cryptographic Deniability with Remote Attestation
papers.authors: Lachlan J. Gunn, Ricardo Vieitez Parra, N. Asokan
papers.abstract: Abstract Deniable messaging protocols allow two parties to have ‘off-the-record’ conversations without leaving any record that can convince external verifiers about what either of them said during the conversation. Recent events like the Podesta email dump underscore the importance of deniable messaging to politicians, whistleblowers, dissidents and many others. Consequently, messaging protocols like Signal and OTR are designed with cryptographic mechanisms to ensure deniable communication, irrespective of whether the communications partner is trusted. Many commodity devices today support hardware-assisted remote attestation which can be used to convince a remote verifier of some property locally observed on the device. We show how an adversary can use remote attestation to undetectably generate a non-repudiable transcript from any deniable protocol (including messaging protocols) providing sender authentication, proving to skeptical verifiers what was said. We describe a concrete implementation of the technique using the Signal messaging protocol. We then show how to design protocols that are deniable even against an adversary capable of attestation, and in particular how attestation itself can be used to restore deniability by thwarting realistic classes of adversary.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要可否认消息协议允许双方进行“不记录”的对话，而不会留下任何记录来使外部验证者相信其中一方在对话中说了什么。最近的事件，如波德斯塔邮件转储，强调了可否认的信息对政治家，告密者，持不同政见者和许多其他人的重要性。因此，像Signal和OTR这样的消息传递协议被设计成具有加密机制，以确保可否认的通信，而不管通信伙伴是否可信。如今，许多商用设备都支持硬件辅助的远程证明，该证明可用于使远程验证者相信在设备上本地观察到的某些属性。我们展示了对手如何使用远程证明从任何提供发送者认证的可否认协议(包括消息协议)中不可检测地生成不可否认的副本，向怀疑的验证者证明所说的内容。我们描述了使用信号消息协议的技术的具体实现。然后，我们展示了如何设计即使对于能够证明的对手也是可否认的协议，特别是证明本身如何被用来通过挫败现实类别的对手来恢复可否认性。
papers.title_zh: 利用远程证明规避加密可否认性

papers.title: StealthDB: a Scalable Encrypted Database with Full SQL Query Support
papers.authors: Dhinakaran Vinayagamurthy, Alexey Gribov, Sergey Gorbunov
papers.abstract: Abstract Encrypted database systems provide a great method for protecting sensitive data in untrusted infrastructures. These systems are built using either special-purpose cryptographic algorithms that support operations over encrypted data, or by leveraging trusted computing co-processors. Strong cryptographic algorithms (e.g., public-key encryptions, garbled circuits) usually result in high performance overheads, while weaker algorithms (e.g., order-preserving encryption) result in large leakage profiles. On the other hand, some encrypted database systems (e.g., Cipherbase, TrustedDB) leverage non-standard trusted computing devices, and are designed to work around the architectural limitations of the specific devices used. In this work we build StealthDB – an encrypted database system from Intel SGX. Our system can run on any newer generation Intel CPU. StealthDB has a very small trusted computing base, scales to large transactional workloads, requires minor DBMS changes, and provides a relatively strong security guarantees at steady state and during query execution. Our prototype on top of Postgres supports the full TPC-C benchmark with a 30% decrease in the average throughput over an unmodified version of Postgres operating on a 2GB unencrypted dataset.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要加密数据库系统为保护不可信基础设施中的敏感数据提供了一种很好的方法。这些系统要么使用支持加密数据操作的专用加密算法，要么利用可信计算协处理器来构建。强密码算法(例如，公钥加密、乱码电路)通常会导致高性能开销，而弱算法(例如，保序加密)会导致大量泄漏。另一方面，一些加密数据库系统(例如，Cipherbase、TrustedDB)利用非标准的可信计算设备，并且被设计为绕过所使用的特定设备的架构限制而工作。在这项工作中，我们构建了stealth db——一个来自英特尔SGX公司的加密数据库系统。我们的系统可以在任何新一代英特尔CPU上运行。StealthDB具有非常小的可信计算基础，可扩展到大型事务性工作负载，需要少量的DBMS更改，并在稳定状态和查询执行期间提供相对较强的安全保证。我们基于Postgres的原型支持完整的TPC-C基准测试，与在2GB未加密数据集上运行的未修改版本的Postgres相比，平均吞吐量降低了30%。
papers.title_zh: StealthDB:一个可伸缩的加密数据库，支持完整的SQL查询

papers.title: Git Blame Who?: Stylistic Authorship Attribution of Small, Incomplete Source Code Fragments
papers.authors: Edwin Dauber, Aylin Caliskan, Richard E. Harang, Gregory Shearer, Michael J. Weisman, Frederica Free-Nelson, Rachel Greenstadt
papers.abstract: Abstract Program authorship attribution has implications for the privacy of programmers who wish to contribute code anonymously. While previous work has shown that individually authored complete files can be attributed, these efforts have focused on such ideal data sets as contest submissions and student assignments. We explore the problem of authorship attribution “in the wild,” examining source code obtained from open-source version control systems, and investigate how contributions can be attributed to their authors, either on an individual or a per-account basis. In this work, we present a study of attribution of code collected from collaborative environments and identify factors which make attribution of code fragments more or less successful. For individual contributions, we show that previous methods (adapted to be applied to short code fragments) yield an accuracy of approximately 50% or 60%, depending on whether we average by sample or by author, at identifying the correct author out of a set of 104 programmers. By ensembling the classification probabilities of a sufficiently large set of samples belonging to the same author we achieve much higher accuracy for assigning the set of samples to the correct author from a known suspect set. Additionally, we propose the use of calibration curves to identify which samples are by unknown and previously unencountered authors.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象程序作者身份归属对希望匿名贡献代码的程序员的隐私有影响。虽然以前的工作表明，个人创作的完整文件可以归属，但这些努力集中在理想的数据集上，如竞赛提交和学生作业。我们探索了“在野外”的作者身份归属问题，检查了从开源版本控制系统获得的源代码，并调查了如何在个人或每个帐户的基础上将贡献归因于作者。在这项工作中，我们提出了从协作环境中收集的代码属性的研究，并确定了使代码片段的属性或多或少成功的因素。对于个人贡献，我们表明，在从一组104名程序员中识别正确的作者时，先前的方法(适用于短代码片段)产生大约50%或60%的准确性，这取决于我们是按样本还是按作者进行平均。通过集合属于同一作者的足够大的样本集的分类概率，我们实现了更高的准确度，用于从已知的可疑集合中将样本集分配给正确的作者。此外，我们建议使用校准曲线来识别哪些样本是由未知的和以前未公开的作者提供的。
papers.title_zh: 怪谁呢？:小而不完整的源代码片段的风格作者归属

papers.title: Cryptography for #MeToo
papers.authors: Benjamin Kuykendall, Hugo Krawczyk, Tal Rabin
papers.abstract: Abstract Reporting sexual assault and harassment is an important and difficult problem. Since late 2017, it has received increased attention as the viral #MeToo movement has brought about accusations against high-profile individuals and a wider discussion around the prevalence of sexual violence. Addressing occurrences of sexual assault requires a system to record and process accusations. It is natural to ask what security guarantees are necessary and achievable in such a system. In particular, we focus on detecting repeat offenders: only when a set number of accusations are lodged against the same party will the accusations be revealed to a legal counselor. Previous solutions to this privacy-preserving reporting problem, such as the Callisto Protocol of Rajan et al., have focused on the confidentiality of accusers. This paper proposes a stronger security model that ensures the confidentiality of the accuser and the accused as well as the traceability of false accusations. We propose the WhoToo protocol to achieve this notion of security using suitable cryptographic techniques. The protocol design emphasizes practicality, preferring fast operations that are implemented in existing software libraries. We estimate that an implementation would be suitably performant for real-world deployment.
papers.abstract_zh: 举报性侵犯和性骚扰是一个重要而又困难的问题。自2017年底以来，随着病毒性#MeToo运动带来了对高调个人的指控和围绕性暴力盛行的更广泛讨论，它受到了越来越多的关注。处理性侵犯事件需要一个记录和处理指控的系统。人们自然会问，在这样一个系统中，什么样的安全保障是必要的和可以实现的。特别是，我们专注于发现惯犯:只有当对同一方提出一定数量的指控时，这些指控才会透露给法律顾问。以前对这种保护隐私的报告问题的解决方案，例如Rajan等人的Callisto协议，集中在原告的保密性上。本文提出了一个更强的安全模型，确保原告和被告的机密性以及虚假指控的可追溯性。我们提出了WhoToo协议，以使用合适的加密技术来实现这种安全概念。协议设计强调实用性，更喜欢在现有软件库中实现的快速操作。我们估计一个实现将适合于现实世界的部署。
papers.title_zh: #MeToo的加密技术

papers.title: Editors' Introduction
papers.authors: Kostas Chatzikokolakis, Aaron Johnson
papers.abstract: Is there currently a crisis of confidence in psychological science reflecting an unprecedented level of doubt among practitioners about the reliability of research findings in the field? It would certainly appear that there is. These doubts emerged and grew as a series of unhappy events unfolded in 2011: the Diederik Stapel fraud case (see Stroebe, Postmes, & Spears, 2012, this issue), the publication in a major social psychology journal of an article purporting to show evidence of extrasensory perception (Bem, 2011) followed by widespread public mockery (see Galak, LeBoeuf, Nelson, & Simmons, in press; Wagenmakers, Wetzels, Borsboom, & van der Maas, 2011), reports by Wicherts and colleagues that psychologists are often unwilling or unable to share their published data for reanalysis (Wicherts, Bakker, & Molenaar, 2011; see also Wicherts, Borsboom, Kats, & Molenaar, 2006), and the publication of an important article in Psychological Science showing how easily researchers can, in the absence of any real effects, nonetheless obtain statistically significant differences through various questionable research practices (QRPs) such as exploring multiple dependent variables or covariates and only reporting these when they yield significant results (Simmons, Nelson, & Simonsohn, 2011). For those psychologists who expected that the embarrassments of 2011 would soon recede into memory, 2012 offered instead a quick plunge from bad to worse, with new indications of outright fraud in the field of social cognition (Simonsohn, 2012), an article in Psychological Science showing that many psychologists admit to engaging in at least some of the QRPs examined by Simmons and colleagues (John, Loewenstein, & Prelec, 2012), troubling new meta-analytic evidence suggesting that the QRPs described by Simmons and colleagues may even be leaving telltale signs visible in the distribution of p values in the psychological literature (Masicampo & Lalande, in press; Simonsohn, 2012), and an acrimonious dust-up in science magazines and blogs centered around the problems some investigators were having in replicating well-known results from the field of social cognition (Bower, 2012; Yong, 2012). Although the very public problems experienced by psychology over this 2-year period are embarrassing to those of us working in the field, some have found comfort in the fact that, over the same period, similar concerns have been arising across the scientific landscape (triggered by revelations that will be described shortly). Some of the suspected causes of unreplicability, such as publication bias (the tendency to publish only positive findings) have been discussed for years; in fact, the phrase file-drawer problem was first coined by a distinguished psychologist several decades ago (Rosenthal, 1979). However, many have speculated that these problems have been exacerbated in recent years as academia reaps the harvest of a hypercompetitive academic climate and an incentive scheme that provides rich rewards for overselling one’s work and few rewards at all for caution and circumspection (see Giner-Sorolla, 2012, this issue). Equally disturbing, investigators seem to be replicating each others’ work even less often than they did in the past, again presumably reflecting an incentive scheme gone askew (a point discussed in several articles in this issue, e.g., Makel, Plucker, & Hegarty, 2012). The frequency with which errors appear in the psychological literature is not presently known, but a number of facts suggest it might be disturbingly high. Ioannidis (2005) has shown through simple mathematical modeling that any scientific field that ignores replication can easily come to the miserable state wherein (as the title of his most famous article puts it) “most published research findings are false” (see also Ioannidis, 2012, this issue, and Pashler & Harris, 2012, this issue). Meanwhile, reports emerging from cancer research have made such grim scenarios seem more plausible: In 2012, several large pharmaceutical companies revealed that their efforts to replicate exciting preclinical findings from published academic studies in cancer biology were only rarely verifying the original results (Begley & Ellis, 2012; see also Osherovich, 2011; Prinz, Schlange, & Asadullah, 2011).
papers.abstract_zh: 目前心理科学是否出现了信任危机，反映出从业者对该领域研究结果的可靠性产生了前所未有的怀疑？显然是有的。随着2011年一系列不愉快事件的发生，这些怀疑出现了，并有所增长:Diederik Stapel欺诈案(见Stroebe，Postmes，& Spears，2012，这一期)，在一份主要的社会心理学杂志上发表了一篇文章，声称显示了超感知觉的证据(Bem，2011)，随后受到了广泛的公开嘲笑(见Galak，LeBoeuf，Nelson，& Simmons，正在出版中；Wagenmakers，Wetzels，Borsboom，& van der Maas，2011)，Wicherts及其同事报告说，心理学家往往不愿意或不能分享他们发表的数据进行再分析(Wicherts，Bakker，& Molenaar，2011；另见Wicherts，Borsboom，Kats，& Molenaar，2006)，以及发表在《心理科学》上的一篇重要文章，该文章表明，在没有任何实际影响的情况下，研究人员可以通过各种有问题的研究实践(qrp)轻松地获得统计学上的显著差异，如探索多个因变量或协变量，并仅在它们产生显著结果时报告这些结果(Simmons，Nelson，& Simonsohn，2011)。对于那些预计2011年的尴尬将很快消失在记忆中的心理学家来说，2012年反而提供了一个从糟糕到更糟糕的快速跳水，在社会认知领域出现了新的明显的欺诈迹象(Simonsohn，2012)，心理科学中的一篇文章显示，许多心理学家承认至少参与了Simmons及其同事检查的一些快速反应程序(John，Loewenstein，& Prelec，2012)。 令人不安的新荟萃分析证据表明，Simmons及其同事描述的qrp甚至可能在心理学文献中的p值分布中留下明显的迹象(Masicampo & Lalande，出版中； Simonsohn，2012)，科学杂志和博客上围绕一些研究人员在复制社会认知领域的知名结果时遇到的问题展开了激烈的争论(Bower，2012；永，2012)。虽然心理学在这两年中所经历的非常公开的问题令我们这些在该领域工作的人感到尴尬，但一些人已经找到了安慰，因为在同一时期，类似的担忧已经在整个科学领域出现(由即将描述的启示引发)。一些不可复制的可疑原因，如发表偏倚(倾向于只发表积极的发现)已经讨论了多年；事实上，抽屉问题这个短语是由一位杰出的心理学家在几十年前首次提出的(Rosenthal，1979)。然而，许多人推测，这些问题在最近几年已经恶化，因为学术界收获了高度竞争的学术氛围和奖励计划，这种奖励计划为过度销售自己的工作提供了丰厚的奖励，而对谨慎和谨慎却几乎没有奖励(见吉纳-索罗拉，2012年，这一期)。同样令人不安的是，研究人员似乎比过去更少地重复彼此的工作，这可能再次反映了一个倾斜的激励机制(这一点在本期的几篇文章中讨论过，例如，马克尔、普吕克尔和赫加蒂，2012)。错误出现在心理学文献中的频率目前还不清楚，但许多事实表明它可能高得令人不安。约安尼迪斯(2005)通过简单的数学建模表明，任何忽视复制的科学领域都很容易陷入悲惨的境地，其中(正如他最著名的文章的标题所言)“大多数发表的研究结果都是错误的”(另见约安尼迪斯，2012，本期，以及Pashler & Harris，2012，本期)。与此同时，来自癌症研究的报告让这种严峻的情景看起来更加可信:2012年，几家大型制药公司透露，他们在癌症生物学方面复制已发表学术研究中令人兴奋的临床前发现的努力很少验证原始结果(Begley & Ellis，2012；另见Osherovich，2011年；普林茨、施朗格和阿萨杜拉，2011年)。
papers.title_zh: 编辑介绍

papers.title: Reducing Metadata Leakage from Encrypted Files and Communication with PURBs
papers.authors: Kirill Nikitin, Ludovic Barman, Wouter Lueks, Matthew Underwood, Jean-Pierre Hubaux, Bryan Ford
papers.abstract: Abstract Most encrypted data formats leak metadata via their plaintext headers, such as format version, encryption schemes used, number of recipients who can decrypt the data, and even the recipients’ identities. This leakage can pose security and privacy risks to users, e.g., by revealing the full membership of a group of collaborators from a single encrypted e-mail, or by enabling an eavesdropper to fingerprint the precise encryption software version and configuration the sender used. We propose that future encrypted data formats improve security and privacy hygiene by producing Padded Uniform Random Blobs or PURBs: ciphertexts indistinguishable from random bit strings to anyone without a decryption key. A PURB’s content leaks nothing at all, even the application that created it, and is padded such that even its length leaks as little as possible. Encoding and decoding ciphertexts with no cleartext markers presents efficiency challenges, however. We present cryptographically agile encodings enabling legitimate recipients to decrypt a PURB efficiently, even when encrypted for any number of recipients’ public keys and/or passwords, and when these public keys are from different cryptographic suites. PURBs employ Padmé, a novel padding scheme that limits information leakage via ciphertexts of maximum length M to a practical optimum of O(log log M) bits, comparable to padding to a power of two, but with lower overhead of at most 12% and decreasing with larger payloads.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要大多数加密数据格式通过它们的明文头泄漏元数据，例如格式版本、使用的加密方案、可以解密数据的接收者数量，甚至接收者的身份。这种泄漏会给用户带来安全和隐私风险，例如，通过从单个加密电子邮件中暴露一组合作者的全部成员，或者通过使窃听者能够对发送者使用的精确加密软件版本和配置进行指纹识别。我们建议未来的加密数据格式通过产生填充的统一随机二进制大对象或二进制大对象来提高安全性和隐私卫生性:没有解密密钥的任何人都无法将密文与随机位串区分开来。PURB的内容不会泄漏任何东西，甚至是创建它的应用程序，并且被填充以使它的长度尽可能少地泄漏。然而，对没有明文标记的密文进行编码和解码提出了效率挑战。我们提出了加密的敏捷编码，使得合法接收者能够有效地解密PURB，即使当针对任意数量的接收者的公钥和/或密码加密时，以及当这些公钥来自不同的加密套件时。PURBs采用Padmé，这是一种新的填充方案，通过最大长度为M的密文将信息泄漏限制在O(log log M)位的实际最佳值，相当于2的幂填充，但开销较低，最多为12%，并且随着有效载荷的增加而减少。
papers.title_zh: 减少加密文件的元数据泄漏和与PURBs的通信

papers.title: Handoff All Your Privacy - A Review of Apple's Bluetooth Low Energy Continuity Protocol
papers.authors: Jeremy Martin, Douglas Alpuche, Kristina Bodeman, Lamont Brown, Ellis Fenske, Lucas Foppe, Travis Mayberry, Erik C. Rye, Brandon Sipes, Sam Teplov
papers.abstract: Abstract We investigate Apple’s Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) Continuity protocol, designed to support interoperability and communication between iOS and macOS devices, and show that the price for this seamless experience is leakage of identifying information and behavioral data to passive adversaries. First, we reverse engineer numerous Continuity protocol message types and identify data fields that are transmitted unencrypted. We show that Continuity messages are broadcast over BLE in response to actions such as locking and unlocking a device’s screen, copying and pasting information, making and accepting phone calls, and tapping the screen while it is unlocked. Laboratory experiments reveal a significant flaw in the most recent versions of macOS that defeats BLE Media Access Control (MAC) address randomization entirely by causing the public MAC address to be broadcast. We demonstrate that the format and content of Continuity messages can be used to fingerprint the type and Operating System (OS) version of a device, as well as behaviorally profile users. Finally, we show that predictable sequence numbers in these frames can allow an adversary to track Apple devices across space and time, defeating existing anti-tracking techniques such as MAC address randomization.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要我们研究了苹果的蓝牙低能耗(BLE)连续性协议，该协议旨在支持iOS和macOS设备之间的互操作性和通信，并表明这种无缝体验的代价是识别信息和行为数据泄露给被动的对手。首先，我们对许多连续性协议消息类型进行反向工程，并识别未加密传输的数据字段。我们表明，连续性消息通过BLE广播，以响应诸如锁定和解锁设备屏幕、复制和粘贴信息、拨打和接听电话以及在屏幕解锁时点击屏幕等操作。实验室实验揭示了最新版本的macOS中的一个重大缺陷，该缺陷通过导致公共MAC地址被广播而完全挫败了BLE媒体访问控制(MAC)地址随机化。我们证明了连续性消息的格式和内容可用于识别设备的类型和操作系统(OS)版本，以及用户的行为特征。最后，我们表明，这些帧中可预测的序列号可以让对手跨空间和时间跟踪苹果设备，击败现有的反跟踪技术，如MAC地址随机化。
papers.title_zh: 交出你所有的隐私——苹果蓝牙低能量连续性协议述评

papers.title: A Girl Has No Name: Automated Authorship Obfuscation using Mutant-X
papers.authors: Asad Mahmood, Faizan Ahmad, Zubair Shafiq, Padmini Srinivasan, Fareed Zaffar
papers.abstract: Abstract Stylometric authorship attribution aims to identify an anonymous or disputed document’s author by examining its writing style. The development of powerful machine learning based stylometric authorship attribution methods presents a serious privacy threat for individuals such as journalists and activists who wish to publish anonymously. Researchers have proposed several authorship obfuscation approaches that try to make appropriate changes (e.g. word/phrase replacements) to evade attribution while preserving semantics. Unfortunately, existing authorship obfuscation approaches are lacking because they either require some manual effort, require significant training data, or do not work for long documents. To address these limitations, we propose a genetic algorithm based random search framework called Mutant-X which can automatically obfuscate text to successfully evade attribution while keeping the semantics of the obfuscated text similar to the original text. Specifically, Mutant-X sequentially makes changes in the text using mutation and crossover techniques while being guided by a fitness function that takes into account both attribution probability and semantic relevance. While Mutant-X requires black-box knowledge of the adversary’s classifier, it does not require any additional training data and also works on documents of any length. We evaluate Mutant-X against a variety of authorship attribution methods on two different text corpora. Our results show that Mutant-X can decrease the accuracy of state-of-the-art authorship attribution methods by as much as 64% while preserving the semantics much better than existing automated authorship obfuscation approaches. While Mutant-X advances the state-of-the-art in automated authorship obfuscation, we find that it does not generalize to a stronger threat model where the adversary uses a different attribution classifier than what Mutant-X assumes. Our findings warrant the need for future research to improve the generalizability (or transferability) of automated authorship obfuscation approaches.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要风格计量的作者归属旨在通过检查其写作风格来识别匿名或有争议文件的作者。基于强大的机器学习的风格作者归属方法的发展对诸如希望匿名发表的记者和活动家之类的个人提出了严重的隐私威胁。研究人员提出了几种作者身份混淆方法，试图做出适当的改变(例如，单词/短语替换)以避免归属，同时保留语义。不幸的是，现有的作者身份模糊方法是缺乏的，因为它们要么需要一些人工努力，需要大量的训练数据，要么不适用于长文档。为了解决这些限制，我们提出了一个基于遗传算法的随机搜索框架，称为突变体-X，它可以自动混淆文本以成功逃避属性，同时保持混淆文本的语义与原始文本相似。具体来说，突变体-X在考虑归因概率和语义相关性的适应度函数的指导下，使用突变和交叉技术顺序地改变文本。虽然突变体-X需要对手的分类器的黑盒知识，但它不需要任何额外的训练数据，也可以处理任何长度的文档。我们在两个不同的文本语料库上针对多种作者归属方法评估了突变体-X。我们的结果表明，与现有的自动化作者身份混淆方法相比，突变体-X可以将最先进的作者身份归属方法的准确性降低多达64%，同时保持语义。虽然突变体-X在自动化作者身份混淆方面取得了最新进展，但我们发现它并没有推广到更强的威胁模型，其中对手使用了与突变体-X假设不同的属性分类器。我们的发现证明了未来的研究需要提高自动化作者身份混淆方法的可推广性(或可转移性)。
papers.title_zh: 一个没有名字的女孩:使用突变体-X的自动作者身份混淆

papers.title: #DontTweetThis: Scoring Private Information in Social Networks
papers.authors: Qiaozhi Wang, Hao Xue, Fengjun Li, Dongwon Lee, Bo Luo
papers.abstract: Abstract With the growing popularity of online social networks, a large amount of private or sensitive information has been posted online. In particular, studies show that users sometimes reveal too much information or unintentionally release regretful messages, especially when they are careless, emotional, or unaware of privacy risks. As such, there exist great needs to be able to identify potentially-sensitive online contents, so that users could be alerted with such findings. In this paper, we propose a context-aware, text-based quantitative model for private information assessment, namely PrivScore, which is expected to serve as the foundation of a privacy leakage alerting mechanism. We first solicit diverse opinions on the sensitiveness of private information from crowdsourcing workers, and examine the responses to discover a perceptual model behind the consensuses and disagreements. We then develop a computational scheme using deep neural networks to compute a context-free PrivScore (i.e., the “consensus” privacy score among average users). Finally, we integrate tweet histories, topic preferences and social contexts to generate a personalized context-aware PrivScore. This privacy scoring mechanism could be employed to identify potentially-private messages and alert users to think again before posting them to OSNs.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要随着在线社交网络的日益普及，大量的隐私或敏感信息被发布到网上。特别是，研究表明，用户有时会透露太多信息或无意中发布遗憾的消息，尤其是当他们不小心、情绪化或没有意识到隐私风险时。因此，非常需要能够识别潜在敏感的在线内容，以便可以向用户警告这些发现。在本文中，我们提出了一个上下文感知的、基于文本的隐私信息评估量化模型PrivScore，该模型有望成为隐私泄露警报机制的基础。我们首先从众包工作者那里征求关于私人信息敏感性的不同意见，并检查回应以发现共识和分歧背后的感知模型。然后，我们开发了一种计算方案，使用深度神经网络来计算上下文无关的PrivScore(即，普通用户中的“共识”隐私分数)。最后，我们整合了推文历史、主题偏好和社会背景，以生成个性化的背景感知PrivScore。这种隐私评分机制可以用来识别潜在的隐私消息，并提醒用户在将它们发布到osn之前要三思。
papers.title_zh: # DontTweetThis:在社交网络中为私人信息打分

papers.title: TOPPool: Time-aware Optimized Privacy-Preserving Ridesharing
papers.authors: Elena Pagnin, Gunnar Gunnarsson, Pedram Talebi, Claudio Orlandi, Andrei Sabelfeld
papers.abstract: Abstract Ridesharing is revolutionizing the transportation industry in many countries. Yet, the state of the art is based on heavily centralized services and platforms, where the service providers have full possession of the users’ location data. Recently, researchers have started addressing the challenge of enabling privacy-preserving ridesharing. The initial proposals, however, have shortcomings, as some rely on a central party, some incur high performance penalties, and most do not consider time preferences for ridesharing. TOPPool encompasses ridesharing based on the proximity of end-points of a ride as well as partial itinerary overlaps. To achieve the latter, we propose a simple yet powerful reduction to a private set intersection on trips represented as sets of consecutive road segments. We show that TOPPool includes time preferences while preserving privacy and without relying on a third party. We evaluate our approach on real-world data from the New York’s Taxi & Limousine Commission. Our experiments demonstrate that TOPPool is superior in performance over the prior work: our intersection-based itinerary matching runs in less than 0.3 seconds for reasonable trip length, in contrast, on the same set of trips prior work takes up to 10 hours.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要拼车正在许多国家彻底改变运输业。然而，现有技术基于高度集中的服务和平台，服务提供商完全拥有用户的位置数据。最近，研究人员已经开始解决保护隐私的拼车挑战。然而，最初的建议有缺点，因为一些依赖于中央党，一些招致高性能惩罚，并且大多数没有考虑拼车的时间偏好。TOPPool包括基于乘车终点的接近度以及部分路线重叠的拼车。为了实现后者，我们提出了一种简单而有效的方法来减少出行中由连续路段集合表示的私有集合交叉口。我们证明了TOPPool包含了时间偏好，同时保护了隐私并且不依赖于第三方。我们在来自纽约出租车和豪华轿车委员会的真实世界数据上评估了我们的方法。我们的实验表明，TOPPool在性能上优于先前的工作:对于合理的行程长度，我们基于交叉口的路线匹配在不到0.3秒的时间内运行，相比之下，在同一组行程上，先前的工作需要长达10个小时。
papers.title_zh: TOPPool:时间感知优化隐私保护的拼车

papers.title: A Bit More Than a Bit Is More Than a Bit Better: Faster (essentially) optimal-rate many-server PIR
papers.authors: Syed Mahbub Hafiz, Ryan Henry
papers.title_zh: 多一点就是好一点:更快(本质上)最优速率多服务器PIR

papers.title: Security-Efficiency Tradeoffs in Searchable Encryption
papers.authors: Raphael Bost, Pierre-Alain Fouque
papers.abstract: Abstract Besides their security, the efficiency of searchable encryption schemes is a major criteria when it comes to their adoption: in order to replace an unencrypted database by a more secure construction, it must scale to the systems which rely on it. Unfortunately, the relationship between the efficiency and the security of searchable encryption has not been widely studied, and the minimum cost of some crucial security properties is still unclear. In this paper, we present new lower bounds on the trade-offs between the size of the client state, the efficiency and the security for searchable encryption schemes. These lower bounds target two kinds of schemes: schemes hiding the repetition of search queries, and forward-private dynamic schemes, for which updates are oblivious. We also show that these lower bounds are tight, by either constructing schemes matching them, or by showing that even a small increase in the amount of leaked information allows for constructing schemes breaking the lower bounds.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要除了安全性之外，可搜索加密方案的效率是采用它们的一个主要标准:为了用更安全的结构取代未加密的数据库，它必须能适应依赖于它的系统。不幸的是，可搜索加密的效率和安全性之间的关系还没有得到广泛的研究，一些关键的安全属性的最小成本仍然不清楚。在本文中，我们提出了可搜索加密方案的客户端状态大小、效率和安全性之间权衡的新下界。这些下限针对两种方案:隐藏重复搜索查询的方案，以及前向私有动态方案，对于这些方案，更新是不经意的。我们还通过构建匹配它们的方案，或者通过表明即使泄露信息量的少量增加也允许构建突破下限的方案，来表明这些下限是严格的。
papers.title_zh: 可搜索加密中的安全-效率权衡

papers.title: "Because... I was told... so much": Linguistic Indicators of Mental Health Status on Twitter
papers.authors: Janith Weerasinghe, Kediel Morales, Rachel Greenstadt
papers.abstract: Abstract Recent studies have shown that machine learning can identify individuals with mental illnesses by analyzing their social media posts. Topics and words related to mental health are some of the top predictors. These findings have implications for early detection of mental illnesses. However, they also raise numerous privacy concerns. To fully evaluate the implications for privacy, we analyze the performance of different machine learning models in the absence of tweets that talk about mental illnesses. Our results show that machine learning can be used to make predictions even if the users do not actively talk about their mental illness. To fully understand the implications of these findings, we analyze the features that make these predictions possible. We analyze bag-of-words, word clusters, part of speech n-gram features, and topic models to understand the machine learning model and to discover language patterns that differentiate individuals with mental illnesses from a control group. This analysis confirmed some of the known language patterns and uncovered several new patterns. We then discuss the possible applications of machine learning to identify mental illnesses, the feasibility of such applications, associated privacy implications, and analyze the feasibility of potential mitigations.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要最近的研究表明，机器学习可以通过分析社交媒体帖子来识别患有精神疾病的个人。与心理健康相关的话题和词汇是一些最重要的预测因素。这些发现对精神疾病的早期检测有意义。然而，它们也引发了许多隐私问题。为了全面评估对隐私的影响，我们分析了不同机器学习模型在没有谈论精神疾病的推文中的表现。我们的结果表明，即使用户不积极谈论他们的精神疾病，机器学习也可以用来进行预测。为了充分理解这些发现的含义，我们分析了使这些预测成为可能的特征。我们分析词袋、词簇、词性n元语法特征和主题模型，以了解机器学习模型，并发现区分精神疾病患者和对照组的语言模式。这项分析证实了一些已知的语言模式，并发现了一些新的模式。然后，我们讨论了机器学习识别精神疾病的可能应用，这种应用的可行性，相关的隐私影响，并分析了潜在缓解的可行性。
papers.title_zh: “因为...有人告诉我...这么多”:推特上心理健康状况的语言指标

papers.title: No Place to Hide: Inadvertent Location Privacy Leaks on Twitter
papers.authors: Jonathan Rusert, Osama Khalid, Dat Hong, Zubair Shafiq, Padmini Srinivasan
papers.abstract: Abstract There is a natural tension between the desire to share information and keep sensitive information private on online social media. Privacy seeking social media users may seek to keep their location private by avoiding the mentions of location revealing words such as points of interest (POIs), believing this to be enough. In this paper, we show that it is possible to uncover the location of a social media user’s post even when it is not geotagged and does not contain any POI information. Our proposed approach Jasoos achieves this by exploiting the shared vocabulary between users who reveal their location and those who do not. To this end, Jasoos uses a variant of the Naive Bayes algorithm to identify location revealing words or hashtags based on both temporal and atemporal perspectives. Our evaluation using tweets collected from four different states in the United States shows that Jasoos can accurately infer the locations of close to half a million tweets corresponding to more than 20,000 distinct users (i.e., more than 50% of the test users) from the four states. Our work demonstrates that location privacy leaks do occur despite due precautions by a privacy conscious user. We design and evaluate countermeasures based Jasoos to mitigate location privacy leaks.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要在在线社交媒体上，分享信息的愿望和保持敏感信息的私密性之间存在一种天然的紧张关系。寻求隐私的社交媒体用户可以通过避免提及诸如兴趣点(poi)之类的暴露位置的词语来寻求保持他们位置的隐私，认为这就足够了。在本文中，我们表明，即使社交媒体用户的帖子没有地理标记并且不包含任何兴趣点信息，也有可能发现该帖子的位置。我们提出的方法Jasoos通过利用暴露位置的用户和不暴露位置的用户之间的共享词汇表来实现这一点。为此，Jasoos使用朴素贝叶斯算法的一种变体来识别基于时间和非时间视角的位置揭示词或标签。我们使用从美国四个不同州收集的推文进行的评估表明，Jasoos可以准确地推断出这四个州超过20，000个不同用户(即超过50%的测试用户)对应的近50万条推文的位置。我们的工作表明，尽管有隐私意识的用户采取了适当的预防措施，位置隐私泄露还是会发生。我们设计和评估基于Jasoos的对策来减轻位置隐私泄露。
papers.title_zh: 无处可藏:Twitter上不经意的位置隐私泄露

papers.title: The privacy of the TLS 1.3 protocol
papers.authors: Ghada Arfaoui, Xavier Bultel, Pierre-Alain Fouque, Adina Nedelcu, Cristina Onete
papers.abstract: Abstract TLS (Transport Layer Security) is a widely deployed protocol that plays a vital role in securing Internet traffic. Given the numerous known attacks for TLS 1.2, it was imperative to change and even redesign the protocol in order to address them. In August 2018, a new version of the protocol, TLS 1.3, was standardized by the IETF (Internet Engineering Task Force). TLS 1.3 not only benefits from stronger security guarantees, but aims to protect the identities of the server and client by encrypting messages as soon as possible during the authentication. In this paper, we model the privacy guarantees of TLS 1.3 when parties execute a full handshake or use a session resumption, covering all the handshake modes of TLS. We build our privacy models on top of the one defined by Hermans et al. for RFIDs (Radio Frequency Identification Devices) that mostly targets authentication protocols. The enhanced models share similarities to the Bellare-Rogaway AKE (Authenticated Key Exchange) security model and consider adversaries that can compromise both types of participants in the protocol. In particular, modeling session resumption is non-trivial, given that session resumption tickets are essentially a state transmitted from one session to another and such link reveals information on the parties. On the positive side, we prove that TLS 1.3 protects the privacy of its users at least against passive adversaries, contrary to TLS 1.2, and against more powerful ones.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要TLS(传输层安全协议)是一种广泛使用的协议，在保证互联网流量安全方面起着至关重要的作用。鉴于针对TLS 1.2的众多已知攻击，必须改变甚至重新设计协议来解决这些攻击。2018年8月，IETF(互联网工程任务组)对该协议的新版本TLS 1.3进行了标准化。TLS 1.3不仅受益于更强的安全保证，而且旨在通过在身份验证期间尽快加密消息来保护服务器和客户端的身份。在本文中，我们对各方执行完全握手或使用会话恢复时TLS 1.3的隐私保证进行了建模，涵盖了TLS的所有握手模式。我们在Hermans等人为RFIDs(射频识别设备)定义的隐私模型的基础上构建我们的隐私模型，该模型主要针对认证协议。增强的模型与贝拉雷-罗加威AKE(认证密钥交换)安全模型有相似之处，并且考虑了可以危及协议中两种类型的参与者的对手。特别地，假设会话恢复票据本质上是从一个会话传输到另一个会话的状态，并且这种链接揭示了关于各方的信息，那么对会话恢复进行建模是非常重要的。从积极的方面来看，我们证明了TLS 1.3至少保护了用户的隐私免受被动对手的攻击，这与TLS 1.2相反，并且可以抵御更强大的对手。
papers.title_zh: TLS 1.3协议的隐私

papers.title: "What if?" Predicting Individual Users' Smart Home Privacy Preferences and Their Changes
papers.authors: Natã Miccael Barbosa, Joon S. Park, Yaxing Yao, Yang Wang
papers.abstract: Abstract Smart home devices challenge a long-held notion that the home is a private and protected place. With this in mind, many developers market their products with a focus on privacy in order to gain user trust, yet privacy tensions arise with the growing adoption of these devices and the risk of inappropriate data practices in the smart home (e.g., secondary use of collected data). Therefore, it is important for developers to consider individual user preferences and how they would change under varying circumstances, in order to identify actionable steps towards developing user trust and exercising privacy-preserving data practices. To help achieve this, we present the design and evaluation of machine learning models that predict (1) personalized allow/deny decisions for different information flows involving various attributes, purposes, and devices (AUC .868), (2) what circumstances may change original decisions (AUC .899), and (3) how much (US dollars) one may be willing to pay or receive in exchange for smart home privacy (RMSE 12.459). We show how developers can use our models to derive actionable steps toward privacy-preserving data practices in the smart home.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要智能家居设备挑战了长期以来认为家是私人的、受保护的地方的观念。考虑到这一点，许多开发商在营销其产品时注重隐私，以获得用户的信任，但随着这些设备的日益普及和智能家居中不适当数据做法的风险(例如，收集的数据的二次使用)，隐私问题也随之出现。因此，对于开发者来说，重要的是要考虑个人用户偏好以及它们在不同情况下会如何变化，以便确定可操作的步骤来发展用户信任并实施隐私保护数据实践。为了帮助实现这一点，我们提出了机器学习模型的设计和评估，这些模型预测(1)针对涉及各种属性、目的和设备的不同信息流的个性化允许/拒绝决策(AUC .868)，(2)什么情况可能会改变原始决策(AUC .899)，以及(3)一个人可能愿意支付或接受多少(美元)来交换智能家居隐私(RMSE 12.459)。我们展示了开发人员如何使用我们的模型，在智能家居中为隐私保护数据实践制定可行的步骤。
papers.title_zh: “如果呢？”预测个人用户的智能家居隐私偏好及其变化

papers.title: Monte Carlo and Reconstruction Membership Inference Attacks against Generative Models
papers.authors: Benjamin Hilprecht, Martin Härterich, Daniel Bernau
papers.abstract: Abstract We present two information leakage attacks that outperform previous work on membership inference against generative models. The first attack allows membership inference without assumptions on the type of the generative model. Contrary to previous evaluation metrics for generative models, like Kernel Density Estimation, it only considers samples of the model which are close to training data records. The second attack specifically targets Variational Autoencoders, achieving high membership inference accuracy. Furthermore, previous work mostly considers membership inference adversaries who perform single record membership inference. We argue for considering regulatory actors who perform set membership inference to identify the use of specific datasets for training. The attacks are evaluated on two generative model architectures, Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) and Variational Autoen-coders (VAEs), trained on standard image datasets. Our results show that the two attacks yield success rates superior to previous work on most data sets while at the same time having only very mild assumptions. We envision the two attacks in combination with the membership inference attack type formalization as especially useful. For example, to enforce data privacy standards and automatically assessing model quality in machine learning as a service setups. In practice, our work motivates the use of GANs since they prove less vulnerable against information leakage attacks while producing detailed samples.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要我们提出了两种信息泄漏攻击，这两种攻击优于先前针对生成模型的成员推理工作。第一种攻击允许成员关系推断，而无需对生成模型的类型进行假设。与以前的生成模型评估度量(如核密度估计)相反，它只考虑接近训练数据记录的模型样本。第二种攻击专门针对变化的自动编码器，实现高成员推理精度。此外，以前的工作大多考虑成员推理对手谁执行单一记录成员推理。我们主张考虑执行集合成员推理的监管行为者，以识别特定数据集用于训练。在标准图像数据集上训练的两种生成模型架构(生成对抗网络(GANs)和变分自动编码器(VAEs ))上评估攻击。我们的结果表明，这两种攻击产生的成功率优于以前在大多数数据集上的工作，同时只有非常温和的假设。我们设想这两种攻击与成员推理攻击类型形式化相结合会特别有用。例如，在机器学习即服务设置中实施数据隐私标准和自动评估模型质量。在实践中，我们的工作激励了GANs的使用，因为它们在产生详细样本时被证明不容易受到信息泄漏攻击。
papers.title_zh: 针对生成模型的蒙特卡罗和重构成员推理攻击

papers.title: Privacy Attitudes of Smart Speaker Users
papers.authors: Nathan Malkin, Joe Deatrick, Allen Tong, Primal Wijesekera, Serge Egelman, David A. Wagner
papers.abstract: Abstract As devices with always-on microphones located in people’s homes, smart speakers have significant privacy implications. We surveyed smart speaker owners about their beliefs, attitudes, and concerns about the recordings that are made and shared by their devices. To ground participants’ responses in concrete interactions, rather than collecting their opinions abstractly, we framed our survey around randomly selected recordings of saved interactions with their devices. We surveyed 116 owners of Amazon and Google smart speakers and found that almost half did not know that their recordings were being permanently stored and that they could review them; only a quarter reported reviewing interactions, and very few had ever deleted any. While participants did not consider their own recordings especially sensitive, they were more protective of others’ recordings (such as children and guests) and were strongly opposed to use of their data by third parties or for advertising. They also considered permanent retention, the status quo, unsatisfactory. Based on our findings, we make recommendations for more agreeable data retention policies and future privacy controls.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要智能音箱是一种家用麦克风设备，具有重要的隐私保护意义。我们调查了智能音箱的用户，了解他们对通过设备制作和分享的录音的信念、态度和担忧。为了让参与者在具体的互动中做出反应，而不是抽象地收集他们的意见，我们围绕随机选择的与他们的设备进行互动的记录来设计我们的调查。我们调查了116名亚马逊和谷歌智能音箱的所有者，发现几乎一半的人不知道他们的录音被永久存储，他们可以查看这些录音；只有四分之一的人报告回顾了互动，很少有人删除过任何互动。虽然参与者并不认为自己的记录特别敏感，但他们更倾向于保护其他人(如儿童和客人)的记录，并强烈反对第三方使用他们的数据或用于广告。他们还认为永久保留现状是不令人满意的。基于我们的发现，我们对更合适的数据保留政策和未来的隐私控制提出了建议。
papers.title_zh: 智能音箱用户的隐私态度

papers.title: Guard Placement Attacks on Path Selection Algorithms for Tor
papers.authors: Gerry Wan, Aaron Johnson, Ryan Wails, Sameer Wagh, Prateek Mittal
papers.abstract: Abstract The popularity of Tor has made it an attractive target for a variety of deanonymization and fingerprinting attacks. Location-based path selection algorithms have been proposed as a countermeasure to defend against such attacks. However, adversaries can exploit the location-awareness of these algorithms by strategically placing relays in locations that increase their chances of being selected as a client’s guard. Being chosen as a guard facilitates website fingerprinting and traffic correlation attacks over extended time periods. In this work, we rigorously define and analyze the guard placement attack. We present novel guard placement attacks and show that three state-of-the-art path selection algorithms—Counter-RAPTOR, DeNASA, and LASTor—are vulnerable to these attacks, overcoming defenses considered by all three systems. For instance, in one attack, we show that an adversary contributing only 0.216% of Tor’s total bandwidth can attain an average selection probability of 18.22%, 84× higher than what it would be under Tor currently. Our findings indicate that existing location-based path selection algorithms allow guards to achieve disproportionately high selection probabilities relative to the cost required to run the guard. Finally, we propose and evaluate a generic defense mechanism that provably defends any path selection algorithm against guard placement attacks. We run our defense mechanism on each of the three path selection algorithms, and find that our mechanism significantly enhances the security of these algorithms against guard placement attacks with only minimal impact to the goals or performance of the original algorithms.
papers.abstract_zh: Tor的流行使得它成为各种去匿名化和指纹攻击的目标。基于位置的路径选择算法已经被提出作为抵御这种攻击的对策。然而，对手可以利用这些算法的位置感知，通过在增加他们被选为客户警卫的机会的位置战略性地放置中继。被选为守卫有助于网站指纹和流量相关性攻击的长期发展。在这篇文章中，我们严格地定义和分析了守卫布局攻击。我们提出了新颖的守卫放置攻击，并表明三种最先进的路径选择算法——Counter-RAPTOR、DeNASA和LASTor——容易受到这些攻击，克服了所有三个系统都考虑的防御。例如，在一次攻击中，我们发现只贡献Tor总带宽0.216%的对手可以获得18.22%的平均选择概率，比当前Tor下的平均选择概率高84倍。我们的发现表明，现有的基于位置的路径选择算法允许警卫获得相对于运行警卫所需的成本而言不成比例的高选择概率。最后，我们提出并评估了一个通用的防御机制，该机制可以证明可以防御任何路径选择算法对保护放置的攻击。我们在三种路径选择算法中的每一种上运行我们的防御机制，并且发现我们的机制显著地增强了这些算法抵抗保护放置攻击的安全性，而对原始算法的目标或性能只有最小的影响。
papers.title_zh: 针对Tor路径选择算法的防护放置攻击

papers.title: Var-CNN: A Data-Efficient Website Fingerprinting Attack Based on Deep Learning
papers.authors: Sanjit Bhat, David Lu, Albert Kwon, Srinivas Devadas
papers.abstract: Abstract In recent years, there have been several works that use website fingerprinting techniques to enable a local adversary to determine which website a Tor user visits. While the current state-of-the-art attack, which uses deep learning, outperforms prior art with medium to large amounts of data, it attains marginal to no accuracy improvements when both use small amounts of training data. In this work, we propose Var-CNN, a website fingerprinting attack that leverages deep learning techniques along with novel insights specific to packet sequence classification. In open-world settings with large amounts of data, Var-CNN attains over 1% higher true positive rate (TPR) than state-of-the-art attacks while achieving 4× lower false positive rate (FPR). Var-CNN’s improvements are especially notable in low-data scenarios, where it reduces the FPR of prior art by 3.12% while increasing the TPR by 13%. Overall, insights used to develop Var-CNN can be applied to future deep learning based attacks, and substantially reduce the amount of training data needed to perform a successful website fingerprinting attack. This shortens the time needed for data collection and lowers the likelihood of having data staleness issues.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要近年来，已经有几项工作使用网站指纹技术来使本地对手能够确定用户访问了哪个网站。虽然使用深度学习的当前技术水平的攻击在中到大量数据的情况下优于现有技术，但是当两者都使用少量训练数据时，其获得的准确度提高很小甚至没有提高。在这项工作中，我们提出了Var-CNN，这是一种利用深度学习技术和特定于数据包序列分类的新见解的网站指纹攻击。在具有大量数据的开放世界设置中，Var-CNN的真阳性率(TPR)比最先进的攻击高1%以上，而假阳性率(FPR)低4倍。Var-CNN的改进在低数据场景中尤其显著，其中它将现有技术的FPR减少了3.12%，同时将TPR增加了13%。总的来说，用于开发Var-CNN的见解可以应用于未来基于深度学习的攻击，并大大减少执行成功的网站指纹攻击所需的训练数据量。这缩短了数据收集所需的时间，并降低了出现数据过时问题的可能性。
papers.title_zh: Var-CNN:一种基于深度学习的高效数据网站指纹攻击

papers.title: Detecting TCP/IP Connections via IPID Hash Collisions
papers.authors: Geoffrey Alexander, Antonio M. Espinoza, Jedidiah R. Crandall
papers.abstract: Abstract We present a novel attack for detecting the presence of an active TCP connection between a remote Linux server and an arbitrary client machine. The attack takes advantage of side-channels present in the Linux kernel’s handling of the values used to populate an IPv4 packet’s IPID field and applies to kernel versions of 4.0 and higher. We implement and test this attack and evaluate its real world effectiveness and performance when used on active connections to popular web servers. Our evaluation shows that the attack is capable of correctly detecting the IP-port 4-tuple representing an active TCP connection in 84% of our mock attacks. We also demonstrate how the attack can be used by the middle onion router in a Tor circuit to test whether a given client is connected to the guard entry node associated with a given circuit. In addition we discuss the potential issues an attacker would face when attempting to scale it to real world attacks, as well as possible mitigations against the attack. Our attack does not exhaust any global resource, and therefore challenges the notion that there is a direct one-to-one connection between shared, limited resources and non-trivial network side-channels. This means that simply enumerating global shared resources and considering the ways in which they can be exhausted will not suffice for certifying a kernel TCP/IP network stack to be free of privacy risk side-channels.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要我们提出了一种新的攻击方法，用于检测远程Linux服务器和任意客户机之间的活动TCP连接的存在。该攻击利用了Linux内核在处理用于填充IPv4数据包的IPID字段的值时存在的旁路，适用于4.0及更高版本的内核。我们实现并测试了这种攻击，并评估了它在与流行的web服务器进行活动连接时的实际效果和性能。我们的评估表明，在84%的模拟攻击中，该攻击能够正确地检测到代表活动TCP连接的IP端口4元组。我们还演示了Tor电路中的中间洋葱路由器如何利用该攻击来测试给定客户端是否连接到与给定电路相关联的防护入口节点。此外，我们还讨论了攻击者在尝试将其扩展到现实世界攻击时可能面临的问题，以及针对攻击的可能缓解措施。我们的攻击没有耗尽任何全局资源，因此挑战了在共享的有限资源和非平凡的网络侧信道之间存在直接一对一连接的概念。这意味着简单地列举全局共享资源并考虑它们被耗尽的方式不足以证明内核TCP/IP网络栈没有隐私风险旁路。
papers.title_zh: 通过IPID哈希冲突检测TCP/IP连接

2017.journals_title: Proceedings on Privacy Enhancing Technologies, Volume 2017

papers.title: Editors' Introduction
papers.authors: Kostas Chatzikokolakis, Aaron Johnson
papers.abstract: Is there currently a crisis of confidence in psychological science reflecting an unprecedented level of doubt among practitioners about the reliability of research findings in the field? It would certainly appear that there is. These doubts emerged and grew as a series of unhappy events unfolded in 2011: the Diederik Stapel fraud case (see Stroebe, Postmes, & Spears, 2012, this issue), the publication in a major social psychology journal of an article purporting to show evidence of extrasensory perception (Bem, 2011) followed by widespread public mockery (see Galak, LeBoeuf, Nelson, & Simmons, in press; Wagenmakers, Wetzels, Borsboom, & van der Maas, 2011), reports by Wicherts and colleagues that psychologists are often unwilling or unable to share their published data for reanalysis (Wicherts, Bakker, & Molenaar, 2011; see also Wicherts, Borsboom, Kats, & Molenaar, 2006), and the publication of an important article in Psychological Science showing how easily researchers can, in the absence of any real effects, nonetheless obtain statistically significant differences through various questionable research practices (QRPs) such as exploring multiple dependent variables or covariates and only reporting these when they yield significant results (Simmons, Nelson, & Simonsohn, 2011). For those psychologists who expected that the embarrassments of 2011 would soon recede into memory, 2012 offered instead a quick plunge from bad to worse, with new indications of outright fraud in the field of social cognition (Simonsohn, 2012), an article in Psychological Science showing that many psychologists admit to engaging in at least some of the QRPs examined by Simmons and colleagues (John, Loewenstein, & Prelec, 2012), troubling new meta-analytic evidence suggesting that the QRPs described by Simmons and colleagues may even be leaving telltale signs visible in the distribution of p values in the psychological literature (Masicampo & Lalande, in press; Simonsohn, 2012), and an acrimonious dust-up in science magazines and blogs centered around the problems some investigators were having in replicating well-known results from the field of social cognition (Bower, 2012; Yong, 2012). Although the very public problems experienced by psychology over this 2-year period are embarrassing to those of us working in the field, some have found comfort in the fact that, over the same period, similar concerns have been arising across the scientific landscape (triggered by revelations that will be described shortly). Some of the suspected causes of unreplicability, such as publication bias (the tendency to publish only positive findings) have been discussed for years; in fact, the phrase file-drawer problem was first coined by a distinguished psychologist several decades ago (Rosenthal, 1979). However, many have speculated that these problems have been exacerbated in recent years as academia reaps the harvest of a hypercompetitive academic climate and an incentive scheme that provides rich rewards for overselling one’s work and few rewards at all for caution and circumspection (see Giner-Sorolla, 2012, this issue). Equally disturbing, investigators seem to be replicating each others’ work even less often than they did in the past, again presumably reflecting an incentive scheme gone askew (a point discussed in several articles in this issue, e.g., Makel, Plucker, & Hegarty, 2012). The frequency with which errors appear in the psychological literature is not presently known, but a number of facts suggest it might be disturbingly high. Ioannidis (2005) has shown through simple mathematical modeling that any scientific field that ignores replication can easily come to the miserable state wherein (as the title of his most famous article puts it) “most published research findings are false” (see also Ioannidis, 2012, this issue, and Pashler & Harris, 2012, this issue). Meanwhile, reports emerging from cancer research have made such grim scenarios seem more plausible: In 2012, several large pharmaceutical companies revealed that their efforts to replicate exciting preclinical findings from published academic studies in cancer biology were only rarely verifying the original results (Begley & Ellis, 2012; see also Osherovich, 2011; Prinz, Schlange, & Asadullah, 2011).
papers.abstract_zh: 目前心理科学是否出现了信任危机，反映出从业者对该领域研究结果的可靠性产生了前所未有的怀疑？显然是有的。随着2011年一系列不愉快事件的发生，这些怀疑出现了，并有所增长:Diederik Stapel欺诈案(见Stroebe，Postmes，& Spears，2012，这一期)，在一份主要的社会心理学杂志上发表了一篇文章，声称显示了超感知觉的证据(Bem，2011)，随后受到了广泛的公开嘲笑(见Galak，LeBoeuf，Nelson，& Simmons，正在出版中；Wagenmakers，Wetzels，Borsboom，& van der Maas，2011)，Wicherts及其同事报告说，心理学家往往不愿意或不能分享他们发表的数据进行再分析(Wicherts，Bakker，& Molenaar，2011；另见Wicherts，Borsboom，Kats，& Molenaar，2006)，以及发表在《心理科学》上的一篇重要文章，该文章表明，在没有任何实际影响的情况下，研究人员可以通过各种有问题的研究实践(qrp)轻松地获得统计学上的显著差异，如探索多个因变量或协变量，并仅在它们产生显著结果时报告这些结果(Simmons，Nelson，& Simonsohn，2011)。对于那些预计2011年的尴尬将很快消失在记忆中的心理学家来说，2012年反而提供了一个从糟糕到更糟糕的快速跳水，在社会认知领域出现了新的明显的欺诈迹象(Simonsohn，2012)，心理科学中的一篇文章显示，许多心理学家承认至少参与了Simmons及其同事检查的一些快速反应程序(John，Loewenstein，& Prelec，2012)。 令人不安的新荟萃分析证据表明，Simmons及其同事描述的qrp甚至可能在心理学文献中的p值分布中留下明显的迹象(Masicampo & Lalande，出版中； Simonsohn，2012)，科学杂志和博客上围绕一些研究人员在复制社会认知领域的知名结果时遇到的问题展开了激烈的争论(Bower，2012；永，2012)。虽然心理学在这两年中所经历的非常公开的问题令我们这些在该领域工作的人感到尴尬，但一些人已经找到了安慰，因为在同一时期，类似的担忧已经在整个科学领域出现(由即将描述的启示引发)。一些不可复制的可疑原因，如发表偏倚(倾向于只发表积极的发现)已经讨论了多年；事实上，抽屉问题这个短语是由一位杰出的心理学家在几十年前首次提出的(Rosenthal，1979)。然而，许多人推测，这些问题在最近几年已经恶化，因为学术界收获了高度竞争的学术氛围和奖励计划，这种奖励计划为过度销售自己的工作提供了丰厚的奖励，而对谨慎和谨慎却几乎没有奖励(见吉纳-索罗拉，2012年，这一期)。同样令人不安的是，研究人员似乎比过去更少地重复彼此的工作，这可能再次反映了一个倾斜的激励机制(这一点在本期的几篇文章中讨论过，例如，马克尔、普吕克尔和赫加蒂，2012)。错误出现在心理学文献中的频率目前还不清楚，但许多事实表明它可能高得令人不安。约安尼迪斯(2005)通过简单的数学建模表明，任何忽视复制的科学领域都很容易陷入悲惨的境地，其中(正如他最著名的文章的标题所言)“大多数发表的研究结果都是错误的”(另见约安尼迪斯，2012，本期，以及Pashler & Harris，2012，本期)。与此同时，来自癌症研究的报告让这种严峻的情景看起来更加可信:2012年，几家大型制药公司透露，他们在癌症生物学方面复制已发表学术研究中令人兴奋的临床前发现的努力很少验证原始结果(Begley & Ellis，2012；另见Osherovich，2011年；普林茨、施朗格和阿萨杜拉，2011年)。
papers.title_zh: 编辑介绍

papers.title: Generic Adaptively Secure Searchable Phrase Encryption
papers.authors: Zachary A. Kissel, Jie Wang
papers.abstract: Abstract In recent years searchable symmetric encryption has seen a rapid increase in query expressiveness including keyword, phrase, Boolean, and fuzzy queries. With this expressiveness came increasingly complex constructions. Having these facts in mind, we present an efficient and generic searchable symmetric encryption construction for phrase queries. Our construction is straightforward to implement, and is proven secure under adaptively chosen query attacks (CQA2) in the random oracle model with an honest-but-curious adversary. To our knowledge, this is the first encrypted phrase search system that achieves CQA2 security. Moreover, we demonstrate that our document collection preprocessing algorithm allows us to extend a dynamic SSE construction so that it supports phrase queries. We also provide a compiler theorem which transforms any CQA2-secure SSE construction for keyword queries into a CQA2-secure SSE construction that supports phrase queries.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要近年来，可搜索的对称加密已看到查询表现力的迅速增加，包括关键字，短语，布尔值和模糊查询。 随着这种表现力，越来越复杂的结构。 考虑到这些事实，我们为短语查询提供了有效且通用的可搜索的对称加密结构。 我们的构造很容易实施，并且在随机甲骨文模型中具有诚实但充满好奇的对手的自适应查询攻击（CQA2），被证明是安全的。 据我们所知，这是实现CQA2安全性的第一个加密短语搜索系统。 此外，我们证明了我们的文档收集预处理算法使我们能够扩展动态的SSE构造，从而支持短语查询。 我们还提供了一个编译器定理，该编译器定理将任何CQA2-安全SSE构造转换为关键字查询的构造成一个支持短语查询的CQA2-Secure SSE Construction。
papers.title_zh: 通用自适应安全可搜索短语加密

papers.title: The Onion Name System
papers.authors: Jesse Victors, Ming Li, Xinwen Fu
papers.abstract: Abstract Tor onion services, also known as hidden services, are anonymous servers of unknown location and ownership that can be accessed through any Torenabled client. They have gained popularity over the years, but since their introduction in 2002 still suffer from major usability challenges primarily due to their cryptographically-generated non-memorable addresses. In response to this difficulty, in this work we introduce the Onion Name System (OnioNS), a privacy-enhanced decentralized name resolution service. OnioNS allows Tor users to reference an onion service by a meaningful globally-unique verifiable domain name chosen by the onion service administrator.We construct OnioNS as an optional backwards-compatible plugin for Tor, simplify our design and threat model by embedding OnioNS within the Tor network, and provide mechanisms for authenticated denial-of-existence with minimal networking costs. We introduce a lottery-like system to reduce the threat of land rushes and domain squatting. Finally, we provide a security analysis, integrate our software with the Tor Browser, and conduct performance tests of our prototype.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象的Tor Onion服务（也称为隐藏服务）是可以通过任何Torenabled客户端访问的位置和所有权的匿名服务器。 多年来，他们已经越来越受欢迎，但是自2002年推出以来，他们仍然面临着主要的可用性挑战，主要是由于它们具有密码生成的非可持续地址。 为了应对这一困难，在这项工作中，我们介绍了洋葱名称系统（洋葱），即隐私增强的分散名称分辨率服务。 洋葱允许TOR用户通过洋葱服务管理员选择的有意义的全球唯一可验证域名引用洋葱服务。我们将洋葱作为一个可选的向后兼容插件，以简化我们的设计和威胁模型，通过将洋葱嵌入tor中 网络，并提供机制，以最低的网络成本来验证拒绝存在。 我们介绍了一个类似彩票的系统，以减少陆地冲刺和域蹲的威胁。 最后，我们提供了安全分析，将软件与TOR浏览器集成在一起，并对原型进行性能测试。
papers.title_zh: 洋葱命名系统

papers.title: Topics of Controversy: An Empirical Analysis of Web Censorship Lists
papers.authors: Zachary Weinberg, Mahmood Sharif, Janos Szurdi, Nicolas Christin
papers.abstract: Abstract Studies of Internet censorship rely on an experimental technique called probing. From a client within each country under investigation, the experimenter attempts to access network resources that are suspected to be censored, and records what happens. The set of resources to be probed is a crucial, but often neglected, element of the experimental design. We analyze the content and longevity of 758,191 webpages drawn from 22 different probe lists, of which 15 are alleged to be actual blacklists of censored webpages in particular countries, three were compiled using a priori criteria for selecting pages with an elevated chance of being censored, and four are controls. We find that the lists have very little overlap in terms of specific pages. Mechanically assigning a topic to each page, however, reveals common themes, and suggests that handcurated probe lists may be neglecting certain frequently censored topics. We also find that pages on controversial topics tend to have much shorter lifetimes than pages on uncontroversial topics. Hence, probe lists need to be continuously updated to be useful. To carry out this analysis, we have developed automated infrastructure for collecting snapshots of webpages, weeding out irrelevant material (e.g. site “boilerplate” and parked domains), translating text, assigning topics, and detecting topic changes. The system scales to hundreds of thousands of pages collected.
papers.abstract_zh: 互联网审查制度的摘要研究取决于一种称为探测的实验技术。 从每个正在调查的国家 /地区的客户中，实验者试图访问怀疑被审查的网络资源，并记录发生的情况。 要探讨的资源集是实验设计的至关重要但经常被忽略的元素。 我们分析了从22个不同的探针列表中绘制的758,191个网页的内容和寿命，其中15个据称是特定国家 /地区的实际黑名单的实际黑名单，使用了3个，使用3个编制的标准，用于选择具有较高机会被审查的机会的先验标准。 四个是控件。 我们发现，在特定页面方面，列表几乎没有重叠。 但是，机械地将主题分配给每个页面，都会揭示共同的主题，并表明手工策略的探测列表可能忽略了某些经常受到审查的主题。 我们还发现，有争议的主题的页面往往比毫无争议的主题的页面要短得多。 因此，需要连续更新探测列表才能有用。 为了进行这项分析，我们开发了自动化基础架构，用于收集网页快照，淘汰无关紧要的材料（例如站点“样板”和停放的域），翻译文本，分配主题以及检测主题更改。 该系统将收集到数十万页。
papers.title_zh: 争议话题:网络审查清单的实证分析

papers.title: Toward Practical Secure Stable Matching
papers.authors: M. Sadegh Riazi, Ebrahim M. Songhori, Ahmad-Reza Sadeghi, Thomas Schneider, Farinaz Koushanfar
papers.abstract: Abstract The Stable Matching (SM) algorithm has been deployed in many real-world scenarios including the National Residency Matching Program (NRMP) and financial applications such as matching of suppliers and consumers in capital markets. Since these applications typically involve highly sensitive information such as the underlying preference lists, their current implementations rely on trusted third parties. This paper introduces the first provably secure and scalable implementation of SM based on Yao’s garbled circuit protocol and Oblivious RAM (ORAM). Our scheme can securely compute a stable match for 8k pairs four orders of magnitude faster than the previously best known method. We achieve this by introducing a compact and efficient sub-linear size circuit. We even further decrease the computation cost by three orders of magnitude by proposing a novel technique to avoid unnecessary iterations in the SM algorithm. We evaluate our implementation for several problem sizes and plan to publish it as open-source.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要稳定的匹配（SM）算法已在许多现实世界中部署，包括国家住院医师匹配计划（NRMP）和财务应用以及资本市场中供应商和消费者的匹配。 由于这些应用程序通常涉及高度敏感的信息，例如基础优先列表，因此它们当前的实现依赖于受信任的第三方。 本文介绍了第一个基于Yao的乱码电路协议和Oblevious RAM（ORAM）的第一个可证明可证明可扩展的SM实现。 我们的方案可以安全地计算出8K对的稳定匹配，比以前最著名的方法快四个数量级。 我们通过引入紧凑而有效的亚线性尺寸电路来实现这一目标。 我们甚至通过提出一种新技术来避免SM算法中不必要的迭代，从而进一步将计算成本降低了三个数量级。 我们评估了几种问题规模的实施，并计划将其发布为开源。
papers.title_zh: 走向实用的安全稳定匹配

papers.title: Towards Seamless Tracking-Free Web: Improved Detection of Trackers via One-class Learning
papers.authors: Muhammad Ikram, Hassan Jameel Asghar, Mohamed Ali Kâafar, Anirban Mahanti, Balachander Krishnamurthy
papers.abstract: Abstract Numerous tools have been developed to aggressively block the execution of popular JavaScript programs in Web browsers. Such blocking also affects functionality of webpages and impairs user experience. As a consequence, many privacy preserving tools that have been developed to limit online tracking, often executed via JavaScript programs, may suffer from poor performance and limited uptake. A mechanism that can isolate JavaScript programs necessary for proper functioning of the website from tracking JavaScript programs would thus be useful. Through the use of a manually labelled dataset composed of 2,612 JavaScript programs, we show how current privacy preserving tools are ineffective in finding the right balance between blocking tracking JavaScript programs and allowing functional JavaScript code. To the best of our knowledge, this is the first study to assess the performance of current web privacy preserving tools in determining tracking vs. functional JavaScript programs. To improve this balance, we examine the two classes of JavaScript programs and hypothesize that tracking JavaScript programs share structural similarities that can be used to differentiate them from functional JavaScript programs. The rationale of our approach is that web developers often “borrow” and customize existing pieces of code in order to embed tracking (resp. functional) JavaScript programs into their webpages. We then propose one-class machine learning classifiers using syntactic and semantic features extracted from JavaScript programs. When trained only on samples of tracking JavaScript programs, our classifiers achieve accuracy of 99%, where the best of the privacy preserving tools achieve accuracy of 78%. The performance of our classifiers is comparable to that of traditional two-class SVM. One-class classification, where a training set of only tracking JavaScript programs is used for learning, has the advantage that it requires fewer labelled examples that can be obtained via manual inspection of public lists of well-known trackers. We further test our classifiers and several popular privacy preserving tools on a larger corpus of 4,084 websites with 135,656 JavaScript programs. The output of our best classifier on this data is between 20 to 64% different from the tools under study. We manually analyse a sample of the JavaScript programs for which our classifier is in disagreement with all other privacy preserving tools, and show that our approach is not only able to enhance user web experience by correctly classifying more functional JavaScript programs, but also discovers previously unknown tracking services.
papers.abstract_zh: 已经开发了摘要的许多工具来积极地阻止Web浏览器中流行的JavaScript程序的执行。 这种阻止还会影响网页的功能并损害用户体验。 结果，已经开发了许多用于限制在线跟踪的隐私工具，通常是通过JavaScript程序执行的，可能会遭受性能差和吸收有限的障碍。 因此，可以隔离网站适当运行所需的JavaScript程序的机制将是有用的。 通过使用由2,612个JavaScript程序组成的手动标记的数据集，我们展示了当前隐私保护工具如何无效地在阻止跟踪JavaScript程序和允许功能JavaScript代码之间找到适当的平衡。 据我们所知，这是评估当前Web隐私保护工具的性能在确定跟踪与功能JavaScript程序时的性能。 为了提高这种平衡，我们检查了两个类别的JavaScript程序，并假设跟踪JavaScript程序共享结构性相似性，可用于将它们与功能性JavaScript程序区分开来。 我们方法的理由是，Web开发人员经常“借用”并自定义现有的代码部分，以便将跟踪（分别功能）JavaScript程序嵌入其网页中。 然后，我们使用从JavaScript程序中提取的句法和语义功能提出了一级机器学习分类器。 当仅针对跟踪JavaScript程序的样本进行培训时，我们的分类器的准确性为99％，其中最好的隐私工具可以达到78％的准确性。 分类器的性能与传统的两级SVM相当。 仅使用跟踪JavaScript程序的培训集的培训集用于学习，其优势是，它需要更少的标记示例，这些示例可以通过手动检查公共著名跟踪器的公共列表来获得。 我们进一步测试了我们的分类器和几种流行的隐私保护工具，该工具在4,084个网站的较大语料库中，具有135,656个JavaScript程序。 我们在此数据上最好的分类器的输出与所研究工具的20％至64％之间。 我们手动分析了我们的分类器与所有其他隐私保护工具不同意的JavaScript程序的样本，并证明我们的方法不仅能够通过正确分类更有功能的JavaScript程序来增强用户Web体验，而且还发现以前未知的未知 跟踪服务。
papers.title_zh: 走向无缝无跟踪网络:通过一类学习改进跟踪者的检测

papers.title: PHI: Path-Hidden Lightweight Anonymity Protocol at Network Layer
papers.authors: Chen Chen, Adrian Perrig
papers.abstract: Abstract We identify two vulnerabilities for existing highspeed network-layer anonymity protocols, such as LAP and Dovetail. First, the header formats of LAP and Dovetail leak path information, reducing the anonymity-set size when an adversary launches topological attacks. Second, ASes can launch session hijacking attacks to deanonymize destinations. HORNET addresses these problems but incurs additional bandwidth overhead and latency. In this paper, we propose PHI, a Path-HIdden lightweight anonymity protocol that solves both challenges while maintaining the same level of efficiency as LAP and Dovetail. We present an efficient packet header format that hides path information and a new back-off setup method that is compatible with current and future network architectures. Our experiments demonstrate that PHI expands anonymity sets of LAP and Dovetail by over 30x and reaches 120 Gbps forwarding speed on a commodity software router.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要我们确定了现有的高速网络层匿名协议的两个漏洞，例如Lap和Dovetail。 首先，膝盖和Dovetail泄漏路径信息的标头格式，当对手发射拓扑攻击时，匿名集尺寸降低。 其次，ASES可以启动会话劫持攻击以脱离象征性的目的地。 大黄蜂解决了这些问题，但会产生额外的带宽开销和延迟。 在本文中，我们提出了PHI，PHI是一种隐藏的轻量级匿名协议，可以解决这两个挑战，同时保持与膝盖和燕尾尾巴相同的效率水平。 我们提出了一种有效的数据包标头格式，该格式隐藏了路径信息和一种与当前和未来网络体系结构兼容的新的退出设置方法。 我们的实验表明，PHI扩大了匿名的lap and lap and Dovetail套件以上超过30倍，并在商品软件路由器上达到120 Gbps的转发速度。
papers.title_zh: PHI:网络层路径隐藏的轻量级匿名协议

papers.title: Analyzing Remote Server Locations for Personal Data Transfers in Mobile Apps
papers.authors: Mojtaba Eskandari, Bruno Kessler, Maqsood Ahmad, Anderson Santana de Oliveira, Bruno Crispo
papers.abstract: Abstract The prevalence of mobile devices and their capability to access high speed internet has transformed them into a portable pocket cloud interface. Being home to a wide range of users’ personal data, mobile devices often use cloud servers for storage and processing. The sensitivity of a user’s personal data demands adequate level of protection at the back-end servers. In this regard, the European Union Data Protection regulations (e.g., article 25.1) impose restriction on the locations of European users’ personal data transfer. The matter of concern, however, is the enforcement of such regulations. The first step in this regard is to analyze mobile apps and identify the location of servers to which personal data is transferred. To this end, we design and implement an app analysis tool, PDTLoc (Personal Data Transfer Location Analyzer), to detect violation of the mentioned regulations. We analyze 1, 498 most popular apps in the EEA using PDTLoc to investigate the data recipient server locations. We found that 16.5% (242) of these apps transfer users’ personal data to servers located at places outside Europe without being under the control of a data protection framework. Moreover, we inspect the privacy policies of the apps revealing that 51% of these apps do not provide any privacy policy while almost all of them contact the servers hosted outside Europe.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要移动设备的流行及其访问高速互联网的能力已将它们转变为便携式口袋云界面。 移动设备是广泛的用户个人数据的所在地，通常使用云服务器进行存储和处理。 用户个人数据的敏感性需要在后端服务器上足够的保护水平。 在这方面，《欧盟数据保护条例》（例如第25.1条）对欧洲用户个人数据传输的位置施加了限制。 但是，问题是执行此类法规。 这方面的第一步是分析移动应用程序并确定传输个人数据的服务器的位置。 为此，我们设计和实施了一个应用程序分析工具PDTLOC（个人数据传输位置分析仪），以检测违反上述法规的行为。 我们使用PDTLOC分析了EEA中最受欢迎的498个最受欢迎的应用程序，以调查数据收件人服务器位置。 我们发现，这些应用程序中有16.5％（242）将用户的个人数据传输到欧洲以外地方的服务器，而不会受到数据保护框架的控制。 此外，我们检查了应用程序的隐私政策，揭示了这些应用程序中有51％不提供任何隐私政策，而几乎所有这些应用程序都与欧洲以外的服务器联系。
papers.title_zh: 分析移动应用中个人数据传输的远程服务器位置

papers.title: ErasuCrypto: A Light-weight Secure Data Deletion Scheme for Solid State Drives
papers.authors: Chen Liu, Hoda Aghaei Khouzani, Chengmo Yang
papers.abstract: Abstract Securely deleting invalid data from secondary storage is critical to protect users’ data privacy against unauthorized accesses. However, secure deletion is very costly for solid state drives (SSDs), which unlike hard disks do not support in-place update. When applied to SSDs, both erasure-based and cryptography-based secure deletion methods inevitably incur large amount of valid data migrations and/or block erasures, which not only introduce extra latency and energy consumption, but also harm SSD lifetime. This paper proposes ErasuCrypto, a light-weight secure deletion framework with low block erasure and data migration overhead. ErasuCrypto integrates both erasurebased and encryption-based data deletion methods and flexibly selects the more cost-effective one to securely delete invalid data. We formulate a deletion cost minimization problem and give a greedy heuristic as the starting point. We further show that the problem can be reduced to a maximum-edge biclique finding problem, which can be effectively solved with existing heuristics. Experiments on real-world benchmarks show that ErasuCrypto can reduce the secure deletion cost of erasurebased scheme by 71% and the cost of cryptographybased scheme by 37%, while guaranteeing 100% security by deleting all the invalid data.
papers.abstract_zh: 从辅助存储中摘要删除无效的数据对于保护用户的数据隐私避免未经授权的访问至关重要。 但是，对于固态驱动器（SSD）而言，安全删除非常昂贵，与硬盘不同，该驱动器不支持就地更新。 当应用于SSD时，基于擦除和基于加密的安全删除方法不可避免地会引起大量有效的数据迁移和/或阻止擦除，这不仅会引入额外的延迟和能耗，还会伤害SSD的寿命。 本文提出了Erasucrypto，这是一个轻巧的安全删除框架，具有低块擦除和数据迁移开销。 Erasucrypto集成了基于擦除和加密的数据删除方法，并灵活地选择了更具成本效益的方法来安全地删除无效的数据。 我们制定了一个删除成本最小化问题，并给出贪婪的启发式方法作为起点。 我们进一步表明，该问题可以简化为最大边缘的比克利克（Biclique）发现问题，该问题可以通过现有的启发式方法有效地解决。 现实世界基准的实验表明，ERASUCRYPTO可以将基于擦除的方案的安全删除成本降低71％，而基于密码的方案的成本则减少37％，同时通过删除所有无效数据来保证100％的安全性。
papers.title_zh: ErasuCrypto:一种轻量级的固态硬盘安全数据删除方案

papers.title: Are you The One to Share? Secret Transfer with Access Structure
papers.authors: Yongjun Zhao, Sherman S. M. Chow
papers.abstract: Abstract Sharing information to others is common nowadays, but the question is with whom to share. To address this problem, we propose the notion of secret transfer with access structure (STAS). STAS is a twoparty computation protocol that enables the server to transfer a secret to a client who satisfies the prescribed access structure. In this paper, we focus on threshold secret transfer (TST), which is STAS for threshold policy and can be made more expressive by using linear secret sharing. TST enables a number of applications including a simple construction of oblivious transfer (OT) with threshold access control, and (a variant of) threshold private set intersection (t-PSI), which are the first of their kinds in the literature to the best of our knowledge. The underlying primitive of STAS is a variant of OT, which we call OT for a sparse array. We provide two constructions which are inspired by state-of-the-art PSI techniques including oblivious polynomial evaluation (OPE) and garbled Bloom filter (GBF). The OPEbased construction is secure in the malicious model, while the GBF-based one is more efficient. We implemented the latter one and showed its performance in applications such as privacy-preserving matchmaking.
papers.abstract_zh: 如今，向他人分享信息很普遍，但是问题是要与谁共享。 为了解决这个问题，我们提出了使用访问结构（Stas）的秘密转移概念。 Stas是一个两性计算协议，它使服务器能够将秘密传输到满足规定访问结构的客户端。 在本文中，我们专注于阈值秘密转移（TST），这是阈值策略的Stas，可以通过使用线性秘密共享来更具表现力。 TST启用了许多应用程序，包括具有阈值访问控制的简单遗忘转移（OT），以及（一个）阈值私有集合交叉点（T-PSI），这是文献中其第一个在文献中的第一个。 我们的知识。 Stas的基本原始性是OT的变体，我们称其为稀疏阵列的OT。 我们提供了两种构造，这些结构灵感来自最先进的PSI技术，包括遗忘多项式评估（OPE）和杂乱无章的花朵过滤器（GBF）。 基于Opebf的结构在恶意模型中是安全的，而基于GBF的结构则更有效。 我们实施了后者，并在诸如保护隐私对接之类的应用中表现出了其性能。
papers.title_zh: 你是那个愿意分享的人吗？具有访问结构的秘密传输

papers.title: Phonion: Practical Protection of Metadata in Telephony Networks
papers.authors: Stephan Heuser, Bradley Reaves, Praveen Kumar Pendyala, Henry Carter, Alexandra Dmitrienko, William Enck, Negar Kiyavash, Ahmad-Reza Sadeghi, Patrick Traynor
papers.abstract: Abstract The majority of people across the globe rely on telephony networks as their primary means of communication. As such, many of the most sensitive personal, corporate and government related communications pass through these systems every day. Unsurprisingly, such connections are subject to a wide range of attacks. Of increasing concern is the use of metadata contained in Call Detail Records (CDRs), which contain source, destination, start time and duration of a call. This information is potentially dangerous as the very act of two parties communicating can reveal significant details about their relationship and put them in the focus of targeted observation or surveillance, which is highly critical especially for journalists and activists. To address this problem, we develop the Phonion architecture to frustrate such attacks by separating call setup functions from call delivery. Specifically, Phonion allows users to preemptively establish call circuits across multiple providers and technologies before dialing into the circuit and does not require constant Internet connectivity. Since no single carrier can determine the ultimate destination of the call, it provides unlinkability for its users and helps them to avoid passive surveillance. We define and discuss a range of adversary classes and analyze why current obfuscation technologies fail to protect users against such metadata attacks. In our extensive evaluation we further analyze advanced anonymity technologies (e.g., VoIP over Tor), which do not preserve our functional requirements for high voice quality in the absence of constant broadband Internet connectivity and compatibility with landline and feature phones. Phonion is the first practical system to provide guarantees of unlinkable communication against a range of practical adversaries in telephony systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要全球大多数人都依靠电话网络作为其主要交流手段。 因此，许多最敏感的个人，公司和政府相关的通信每天都会通过这些系统。 毫不奇怪，这种连接受到广泛的攻击。 越来越关注的是呼叫详细信息记录中包含的元数据（CDR），其中包含源，目的地，开始时间和呼叫的持续时间。 这些信息可能是危险的，因为两个政党交流的行为可以揭示有关其关系的重要细节，并将其放在有针对性的观察或监视的重点，这对于记者和激进主义者来说至关重要。 为了解决此问题，我们开发了声音体系结构，以通过将呼叫设置功能与呼叫传递分开来挫败此类攻击。 具体而言，Phonion允许用户在拨入电路之前先跨多个提供商和技术建立呼叫电路，并且不需要持续的Internet连接。 由于没有任何一个载体可以确定呼叫的最终目的地，因此它为其用户提供了无链接性，并帮助他们避免被动监视。 我们定义和讨论一系列对手类，并分析为什么当前的混淆技术无法保护用户免受此类元数据攻击。 在我们的广泛评估中，我们进一步分析了先进的匿名技术（例如，voip of tor），这在没有恒定的宽带互联网连接以及与座机和功能手机的兼容性的情况下，并不能保留我们对高音质量的功能要求。 Phonion是第一个实用系统，可以保证与电话系统中的一系列实用对手进行不可链接的沟通。
papers.title_zh: Phonion:电话网络中元数据的实际保护

papers.title: Editors' Introduction
papers.authors: Kostas Chatzikokolakis, Aaron Johnson
papers.abstract: Is there currently a crisis of confidence in psychological science reflecting an unprecedented level of doubt among practitioners about the reliability of research findings in the field? It would certainly appear that there is. These doubts emerged and grew as a series of unhappy events unfolded in 2011: the Diederik Stapel fraud case (see Stroebe, Postmes, & Spears, 2012, this issue), the publication in a major social psychology journal of an article purporting to show evidence of extrasensory perception (Bem, 2011) followed by widespread public mockery (see Galak, LeBoeuf, Nelson, & Simmons, in press; Wagenmakers, Wetzels, Borsboom, & van der Maas, 2011), reports by Wicherts and colleagues that psychologists are often unwilling or unable to share their published data for reanalysis (Wicherts, Bakker, & Molenaar, 2011; see also Wicherts, Borsboom, Kats, & Molenaar, 2006), and the publication of an important article in Psychological Science showing how easily researchers can, in the absence of any real effects, nonetheless obtain statistically significant differences through various questionable research practices (QRPs) such as exploring multiple dependent variables or covariates and only reporting these when they yield significant results (Simmons, Nelson, & Simonsohn, 2011). For those psychologists who expected that the embarrassments of 2011 would soon recede into memory, 2012 offered instead a quick plunge from bad to worse, with new indications of outright fraud in the field of social cognition (Simonsohn, 2012), an article in Psychological Science showing that many psychologists admit to engaging in at least some of the QRPs examined by Simmons and colleagues (John, Loewenstein, & Prelec, 2012), troubling new meta-analytic evidence suggesting that the QRPs described by Simmons and colleagues may even be leaving telltale signs visible in the distribution of p values in the psychological literature (Masicampo & Lalande, in press; Simonsohn, 2012), and an acrimonious dust-up in science magazines and blogs centered around the problems some investigators were having in replicating well-known results from the field of social cognition (Bower, 2012; Yong, 2012). Although the very public problems experienced by psychology over this 2-year period are embarrassing to those of us working in the field, some have found comfort in the fact that, over the same period, similar concerns have been arising across the scientific landscape (triggered by revelations that will be described shortly). Some of the suspected causes of unreplicability, such as publication bias (the tendency to publish only positive findings) have been discussed for years; in fact, the phrase file-drawer problem was first coined by a distinguished psychologist several decades ago (Rosenthal, 1979). However, many have speculated that these problems have been exacerbated in recent years as academia reaps the harvest of a hypercompetitive academic climate and an incentive scheme that provides rich rewards for overselling one’s work and few rewards at all for caution and circumspection (see Giner-Sorolla, 2012, this issue). Equally disturbing, investigators seem to be replicating each others’ work even less often than they did in the past, again presumably reflecting an incentive scheme gone askew (a point discussed in several articles in this issue, e.g., Makel, Plucker, & Hegarty, 2012). The frequency with which errors appear in the psychological literature is not presently known, but a number of facts suggest it might be disturbingly high. Ioannidis (2005) has shown through simple mathematical modeling that any scientific field that ignores replication can easily come to the miserable state wherein (as the title of his most famous article puts it) “most published research findings are false” (see also Ioannidis, 2012, this issue, and Pashler & Harris, 2012, this issue). Meanwhile, reports emerging from cancer research have made such grim scenarios seem more plausible: In 2012, several large pharmaceutical companies revealed that their efforts to replicate exciting preclinical findings from published academic studies in cancer biology were only rarely verifying the original results (Begley & Ellis, 2012; see also Osherovich, 2011; Prinz, Schlange, & Asadullah, 2011).
papers.abstract_zh: 目前心理科学是否出现了信任危机，反映出从业者对该领域研究结果的可靠性产生了前所未有的怀疑？显然是有的。随着2011年一系列不愉快事件的发生，这些怀疑出现了，并有所增长:Diederik Stapel欺诈案(见Stroebe，Postmes，& Spears，2012，这一期)，在一份主要的社会心理学杂志上发表了一篇文章，声称显示了超感知觉的证据(Bem，2011)，随后受到了广泛的公开嘲笑(见Galak，LeBoeuf，Nelson，& Simmons，正在出版中；Wagenmakers，Wetzels，Borsboom，& van der Maas，2011)，Wicherts及其同事报告说，心理学家往往不愿意或不能分享他们发表的数据进行再分析(Wicherts，Bakker，& Molenaar，2011；另见Wicherts，Borsboom，Kats，& Molenaar，2006)，以及发表在《心理科学》上的一篇重要文章，该文章表明，在没有任何实际影响的情况下，研究人员可以通过各种有问题的研究实践(qrp)轻松地获得统计学上的显著差异，如探索多个因变量或协变量，并仅在它们产生显著结果时报告这些结果(Simmons，Nelson，& Simonsohn，2011)。对于那些预计2011年的尴尬将很快消失在记忆中的心理学家来说，2012年反而提供了一个从糟糕到更糟糕的快速跳水，在社会认知领域出现了新的明显的欺诈迹象(Simonsohn，2012)，心理科学中的一篇文章显示，许多心理学家承认至少参与了Simmons及其同事检查的一些快速反应程序(John，Loewenstein，& Prelec，2012)。 令人不安的新荟萃分析证据表明，Simmons及其同事描述的qrp甚至可能在心理学文献中的p值分布中留下明显的迹象(Masicampo & Lalande，出版中； Simonsohn，2012)，科学杂志和博客上围绕一些研究人员在复制社会认知领域的知名结果时遇到的问题展开了激烈的争论(Bower，2012；永，2012)。虽然心理学在这两年中所经历的非常公开的问题令我们这些在该领域工作的人感到尴尬，但一些人已经找到了安慰，因为在同一时期，类似的担忧已经在整个科学领域出现(由即将描述的启示引发)。一些不可复制的可疑原因，如发表偏倚(倾向于只发表积极的发现)已经讨论了多年；事实上，抽屉问题这个短语是由一位杰出的心理学家在几十年前首次提出的(Rosenthal，1979)。然而，许多人推测，这些问题在最近几年已经恶化，因为学术界收获了高度竞争的学术氛围和奖励计划，这种奖励计划为过度销售自己的工作提供了丰厚的奖励，而对谨慎和谨慎却几乎没有奖励(见吉纳-索罗拉，2012年，这一期)。同样令人不安的是，研究人员似乎比过去更少地重复彼此的工作，这可能再次反映了一个倾斜的激励机制(这一点在本期的几篇文章中讨论过，例如，马克尔、普吕克尔和赫加蒂，2012)。错误出现在心理学文献中的频率目前还不清楚，但许多事实表明它可能高得令人不安。约安尼迪斯(2005)通过简单的数学建模表明，任何忽视复制的科学领域都很容易陷入悲惨的境地，其中(正如他最著名的文章的标题所言)“大多数发表的研究结果都是错误的”(另见约安尼迪斯，2012，本期，以及Pashler & Harris，2012，本期)。与此同时，来自癌症研究的报告让这种严峻的情景看起来更加可信:2012年，几家大型制药公司透露，他们在癌症生物学方面复制已发表学术研究中令人兴奋的临床前发现的努力很少验证原始结果(Begley & Ellis，2012；另见Osherovich，2011年；普林茨、施朗格和阿萨杜拉，2011年)。
papers.title_zh: 编辑介绍

papers.title: Waterfilling: Balancing the Tor network with maximum diversity
papers.authors: Florentin Rochet, Olivier Pereira
papers.abstract: Abstract We present the Waterfilling circuit selection method, which we designed in order to mitigate the risks of a successful end-to-end traffic correlation attack. Waterfilling proceeds by balancing the Tor network load as evenly as possible on endpoints of user paths. We simulate the use of Waterfilling thanks to the TorPS and Shadow tools. Applying several security metrics, we show that the adoption of Waterfilling considerably increases the number of nodes that an adversary needs to control in order to be able to mount a successful attack, while somewhat decreasing the minimum amount of bandwidth required to do so. Moreover, we evaluate Waterfilling in Shadow and show that it does not impact significantly the performance of the network. Furthermore, Waterfilling reduces the benefits that an attacker could obtain by hacking into a top bandwidth Tor relay, hence limiting the risks raised by such relays. Waterfilling does not require any major change in Tor, and can co-exist with the current circuit selection algorithm.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要我们提出了水填充电路选择方法，我们设计的是为了减轻成功的端到端交通相关攻击的风险。 通过在用户路径的端点上尽可能均匀地平衡TOR网络负载来进行水填充。 我们通过Torps和Shadow工具模拟了水填充的使用。 应用几个安全指标，我们表明水填充的采用大大增加了对手需要控制的节点的数量，以便能够进行成功的攻击，同时降低了这样做所需的最小带宽量。 此外，我们评估了阴影中的水填充，并表明它不会显着影响网络的性能。 此外，水填充可降低攻击者通过入侵顶部带宽TOR继电器可以获得的好处，从而限制了此类继电器所带来的风险。 水填充不需要TOR的任何重大变化，并且可以与当前的电路选择算法共存。
papers.title_zh: 注水:用最大的多样性平衡Tor网络

papers.title: Look before you Authorize: Using Eye-Tracking to Enforce User Attention towards Application Permissions
papers.authors: Yousra Javed, Mohamed Shehab
papers.abstract: Abstract Habituation is a key factor behind the lack of attention towards permission authorization dialogs during third party application installation. Various solutions have been proposed to combat the problem of achieving attention switch towards permissions.
