However, users continue to ignore these dialogs, and authorize dangerous permissions, which leads to security and privacy breaches. We leverage eye-tracking to approach this problem, and propose a mechanism for enforcing user attention towards application permissions before users are able to authorize them. We deactivate the dialog’s decision buttons initially, and use feedback from the eye-tracker to ensure that the user has looked at the permissions. After determining user attention, the buttons are activated. We implemented a prototype of our approach as a Chrome browser extension, and conducted a user study on Facebook’s application authorization dialogs. Using participants’ permission identification, eye-gaze fixations, and authorization decisions, we evaluate participants’ attention towards permissions. The participants who used our approach on authorization dialogs were able to identify the permissions better, compared to the rest of the participants, even after the habituation period. Their average number of eye-gaze fixations on the permission text was significantly higher than the other group participants. However, examining the rate in which participants denied a dangerous and unnecessary permission, the hypothesized increase from the control group to the treatment group was not statistically significant.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象习惯是在第三方申请安装期间缺乏注意力授权对话的关注的关键因素。 已经提出了各种解决方案，以解决将注意力转移到权限的问题。 但是，用户继续忽略这些对话框，并授权危险权限，从而导致安全和隐私漏洞。 我们利用眼睛跟踪来解决此问题，并提出了一种机制，以在用户能够授权它们之前对用户关注的应用程序权限。 我们最初停用了对话框的决策按钮，并使用眼球跟踪器的反馈来确保用户查看权限。 确定用户注意力后，将激活按钮。 我们将方法的原型作为Chrome浏览器扩展程序实施，并在Facebook的应用程序授权对话框上进行了用户研究。 使用参与者的权限识别，注视固定和授权决策，我们评估了参与者对权限的关注。 与其他参与者相比，即使在习惯期之后，使用我们的授权对话方法的参与者也能够更好地识别权限。 他们在许可文本上的平均注视固定数量明显高于其他小组参与者。 但是，检查参与者否认危险和不必要的许可的速度，从对照组到治疗组的假设增加在统计学上没有意义。
papers.title_zh: 授权前先看:使用眼球追踪来加强用户对应用程序权限的关注

papers.title: PrivateRide: A Privacy-Enhanced Ride-Hailing Service
papers.authors: Anh Pham, Italo Dacosta, Bastien Jacot-Guillarmod, Kévin Huguenin, Taha Hajar, Florian Tramèr, Virgil D. Gligor, Jean-Pierre Hubaux
papers.abstract: Abstract In the past few years, we have witnessed a rise in the popularity of ride-hailing services (RHSs), an online marketplace that enables accredited drivers to use their own cars to drive ride-hailing users. Unlike other transportation services, RHSs raise significant privacy concerns, as providers are able to track the precise mobility patterns of millions of riders worldwide. We present the first survey and analysis of the privacy threats in RHSs. Our analysis exposes high-risk privacy threats that do not occur in conventional taxi services. Therefore, we propose PrivateRide, a privacy-enhancing and practical solution that offers anonymity and location privacy for riders, and protects drivers’ information from harvesting attacks. PrivateRide lowers the high-risk privacy threats in RHSs to a level that is at least as low as that of many taxi services. Using real data-sets from Uber and taxi rides, we show that PrivateRide significantly enhances riders’ privacy, while preserving tangible accuracy in ride matching and fare calculation, with only negligible effects on convenience. Moreover, by using our Android implementation for experimental evaluations, we show that PrivateRide’s overhead during ride setup is negligible. In short, we enable privacy-conscious riders to achieve levels of privacy that are not possible in current RHSs and even in some conventional taxi services, thereby offering a potential business differentiator.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要在过去的几年中，我们目睹了乘车服务（RHSS）的普及，这是一个在线市场，使经认可的驾驶员能够使用自己的汽车来驾驶乘车用户。 与其他运输服务不同，RHS提出了重大的隐私问题，因为提供商能够跟踪全球数百万骑手的确切流动性模式。 我们介绍了RHS中隐私威胁的第一个调查和分析。 我们的分析暴露了常规出租车服务中未发生的高风险隐私威胁。 因此，我们提出了私人化的私人化和实用解决方案，可为骑手提供匿名性和位置隐私，并保护驾驶员的信息免于收获攻击。 私有ide将RHS中的高风险隐私威胁降低到至少与许多出租车服务的水平。 使用Uber和Taxi乘车的实际数据集，我们表明私有区可显着增强骑手的隐私，同时保持骑行匹配和票价计算中有形的准确性，仅对便利性的影响可忽略不计。 此外，通过使用我们的Android实施进行实验评估，我们表明私人骑行设置期间的开销可以忽略不计。 简而言之，我们使具有隐私意识的骑手能够达到当前RHS甚至某些常规出租车服务中无法实现的隐私水平，从而提供了潜在的业务差异化。
papers.title_zh: PrivateRide:一种隐私增强的叫车服务

papers.title: Vulnerable GPU Memory Management: Towards Recovering Raw Data from GPU
papers.authors: Zhe Zhou, Wenrui Diao, Xiangyu Liu, Zhou Li, Kehuan Zhang, Rui Liu
papers.abstract: Abstract According to previous reports, information could be leaked from GPU memory; however, the security implications of such a threat were mostly over-looked, because only limited information could be indirectly extracted through side-channel attacks. In this paper, we propose a novel algorithm for recovering raw data directly from the GPU memory residues of many popular applications such as Google Chrome and Adobe PDF reader. Our algorithm enables harvesting highly sensitive information including credit card numbers and email contents from GPU memory residues. Evaluation results also indicate that nearly all GPU-accelerated applications are vulnerable to such attacks, and adversaries can launch attacks without requiring any special privileges both on traditional multi-user operating systems, and emerging cloud computing scenarios.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要根据以前的报告，可以从GPU内存中泄漏信息； 但是，这种威胁的安全含义大多被忽略了，因为只能通过侧向通道攻击间接提取有限的信息。 在本文中，我们提出了一种新型算法，用于直接从许多流行应用的GPU内存残基（例如Google Chrome和Adobe PDF读取器）中恢复原始数据。 我们的算法使收集高度敏感的信息，包括信用卡号码和来自GPU内存残留物中的电子邮件内容。 评估结果还表明，几乎所有GPU加速应用程序都容易受到此类攻击的影响，并且对手可以发动攻击，而无需在传统的多用户操作系统上均需要任何特殊特权，以及新兴的云计算场景。
papers.title_zh: 易受攻击的GPU内存管理:从GPU恢复原始数据

papers.title: PeerFlow: Secure Load Balancing in Tor
papers.authors: Aaron Johnson, Rob Jansen, Nicholas Hopper, Aaron Segal, Paul Syverson
papers.abstract: Abstract We present PeerFlow, a system to securely load balance client traffic in Tor. Security in Tor requires that no adversary handle too much traffic. However, Tor relays are run by volunteers who cannot be trusted to report the relay bandwidths, which Tor clients use for load balancing. We show that existing methods to determine the bandwidths of Tor relays allow an adversary with little bandwidth to attack large amounts of client traffic. These methods include Tor’s current bandwidth-scanning system, TorFlow, and the peer-measurement system EigenSpeed. We present an improved design called PeerFlow that uses a peer-measurement process both to limit an adversary’s ability to increase his measured bandwidth and to improve accuracy. We show our system to be secure, fast, and efficient. We implement PeerFlow in Tor and demonstrate its speed and accuracy in large-scale network simulations.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要我们提出Peerflow，这是一个系统，可以安全地加载TOR中的客户流量。 TOR中的安全性要求没有对手处理过多的流量。 但是，Tor继电器是由志愿者经营的，他们不能信任报告中继带宽，Tor客户端将其用于负载平衡。 我们表明，确定TOR继电器带宽的现有方法允许几乎没有带宽的对手攻击大量客户端流量。 这些方法包括TOR当前的带宽扫描系统，Torflow和同行测量系统Eigenspeed。 我们提出了一种名为Peerflow的改进设计，该设计使用同行测量过程，既可以限制对手增加其测量带宽并提高准确性的能力。 我们向我们的系统表明安全，快速和高效。 我们在TOR中实现PEERFLOW，并在大规模网络模拟中演示其速度和准确性。
papers.title_zh: peer flow:Tor中的安全负载平衡

papers.title: On the Privacy and Security of the Ultrasound Ecosystem
papers.authors: Vasilios Mavroudis, Shuang Hao, Yanick Fratantonio, Federico Maggi, Christopher Kruegel, Giovanni Vigna
papers.abstract: Abstract Nowadays users often possess a variety of electronic devices for communication and entertainment. In particular, smartphones are playing an increasingly central role in users’ lives: Users carry them everywhere they go and often use them to control other devices. This trend provides incentives for the industry to tackle new challenges, such as cross-device authentication, and to develop new monetization schemes. A new technology based on ultrasounds has recently emerged to meet these demands. Ultrasound technology has a number of desirable features: it is easy to deploy, flexible, and inaudible by humans. This technology is already utilized in a number of different real-world applications, such as device pairing, proximity detection, and cross-device tracking. This paper examines the different facets of ultrasound-based technology. Initially, we discuss how it is already used in the real world, and subsequently examine this emerging technology from the privacy and security perspectives. In particular, we first observe that the lack of OS features results in violations of the principle of least privilege: an app that wants to use this technology currently needs to require full access to the device microphone. We then analyse real-world Android apps and find that tracking techniques based on ultrasounds suffer from a number of vulnerabilities and are susceptible to various attacks. For example, we show that ultrasound cross-device tracking deployments can be abused to perform stealthy deanonymization attacks (e.g., to unmask users who browse the Internet through anonymity networks such as Tor), to inject fake or spoofed audio beacons, and to leak a user’s private information. Based on our findings, we introduce several defense mechanisms. We first propose and implement immediately deployable defenses that empower practitioners, researchers, and everyday users to protect their privacy. In particular, we introduce a browser extension and an Android permission that enable the user to selectively suppress frequencies falling within the ultrasonic spectrum. We then argue for the standardization of ultrasound beacons, and we envision a flexible OS-level API that addresses both the effortless deployment of ultrasound-enabled applications, and the prevention of existing privacy and security problems.
papers.abstract_zh: 如今，摘要用户通常拥有各种用于通信和娱乐的电子设备。 特别是，智能手机在用户的生活中起着越来越重要的作用：用户将它们随身携带，并且经常使用它们来控制其他设备。 这种趋势为行业提供了应对新挑战的激励措施，例如跨设备身份验证，并制定新的货币化计划。 最近出现了一项基于超声波的新技术以满足这些需求。 超声技术具有许多理想的特征：人类易于部署，灵活和听不清。 该技术已经用于许多不同的现实应用程序中，例如设备配对，接近度检测和跨设备跟踪。 本文研究了基于超声的技术的不同方面。 最初，我们讨论了它在现实世界中的使用方式，并随后从隐私和安全角度研究了这一新兴技术。 特别是，我们首先观察到，缺乏操作系统功能会导致违反特权原则：目前需要使用此技术的应用需要完全访问设备麦克风。 然后，我们分析现实世界的Android应用程序，发现基于超声波的跟踪技术遭受了许多漏洞，并且容易受到各种攻击的影响。 例如，我们表明，可以滥用超声跨设备跟踪部署来执行隐形脱名字攻击（例如，揭开通过TOR等匿名网络浏览Internet的用户），以注射假或欺骗的音频和泄漏 用户的私人信息。 根据我们的发现，我们介绍了几种防御机制。 我们首先提出并实施立即可部署的防御能力，以授权从业者，研究人员和日常用户保护其隐私。 特别是，我们引入了浏览器扩展名和Android许可，该浏览器可以选择性地抑制属于超声波频谱中的频率。 然后，我们主张超声信标的标准化，并设想一个灵活的OS级API，该API既解决超声启用应用程序的轻松部署，又解决了预防现有的隐私和安全问题。
papers.title_zh: 超声生态系统的隐私和安全

papers.title: Cross-Cultural Privacy Prediction
papers.authors: Yao Li, Alfred Kobsa, Bart P. Knijnenburg, M.-H. Carolyn Nguyen
papers.abstract: Abstract The influence of cultural background on people’s privacy decisions is widely recognized. However, a cross-cultural approach to predicting privacy decisions is still lacking. Our paper presents a first integrated cross-cultural privacy prediction model that merges cultural, demographic, attitudinal and contextual prediction. The model applies supervised machine learning to users’ decisions on the collection of their personal data, collected from a large-scale quantitative study in eight different countries. We find that adding culture-related predictors (i.e. country of residence, language, Hofstede’s cultural dimensions) to demographic, attitudinal and contextual predictors in the model can improve the prediction accuracy. Hofstede’s variables - particularly individualism and indulgence - outperform country and language. We further apply generalized linear mixed-effect regression to explore possible interactions between culture and other predictors. We find indeed that the impact of contextual and attitudinal predictors varies between different cultures. The implications of such models in developing privacy-enabling technologies are discussed.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要文化背景对人们隐私决策的影响得到了广泛认可。 但是，仍然缺乏预测隐私决策的跨文化方法。 我们的论文介绍了首个综合跨文化隐私预测模型，该模型融合了文化，人口，态度和上下文预测。 该模型将监督的机器学习应用于用户对收集其个人数据的决策，这是从八个不同国家的一项大规模定量研究中收集的。 我们发现，在模型中，将与文化相关的预测变量（即居住国，语言，霍夫斯泰德的文化维度）增加到人口，态度和上下文预测因子可以提高预测准确性。 霍夫斯泰德的变量，尤其是个人主义和放纵 - 胜过国家和语言。 我们进一步应用广义线性混合效应回归来探索培养物与其他预测因子之间可能的相互作用。 我们确实发现，背景和态度预测因素的影响在不同文化之间有所不同。 讨论了此类模型在开发增强隐私技术方面的含义。
papers.title_zh: 跨文化隐私预测

papers.title: Cross-Device Tracking: Measurement and Disclosures
papers.authors: Justin Brookman, Phoebe Rouge, Aaron Alva, Christina Yeung
papers.abstract: Abstract Internet advertising and analytics technology companies are increasingly trying to find ways to link behavior across the various devices consumers own. This cross-device tracking can provide a more complete view into a consumer’s behavior and can be valuable for a range of purposes, including ad targeting, research, and conversion attribution. However, consumers may not be aware of how and how often their behavior is tracked across different devices. We designed this study to try to assess what information about cross-device tracking (including data flows and policy disclosures) is observable from the perspective of the end user. Our paper demonstrates how data that is routinely collected and shared online could be used by online third parties to track consumers across devices.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象的互联网广告和分析技术公司越来越多地试图找到消费者拥有的各种设备上的行为的方法。 这种跨设备跟踪可以为消费者的行为提供更完整的视图，并且对于包括广告定位，研究和转换归因在内的一系列目的可能是有价值的。 但是，消费者可能不知道如何和多久在不同设备上跟踪其行为。 我们设计了这项研究，试图评估有关跨设备跟踪（包括数据流和策略披露）的哪些信息，可以从最终用户的角度观察到。 我们的论文展示了在线第三方如何使用常规收集和在线共享的数据来跟踪跨设备的消费者。
papers.title_zh: 跨设备跟踪:测量和披露

papers.title: Externally Verifiable Oblivious RAM
papers.authors: Joshua Gancher, Adam Groce, Alex Ledger
papers.abstract: Abstract We present the idea of externally verifiable oblivious RAM (ORAM). Our goal is to allow a client and server carrying out an ORAM protocol to have disputes adjudicated by a third party, allowing for the enforcement of penalties against an unreliable or malicious server. We give a security definition that guarantees protection not only against a malicious server but also against a client making false accusations. We then give modifications of the Path ORAM [15] and Ring ORAM [9] protocols that meet this security definition. These protocols both have the same asymptotic runtimes as the semi-honest original versions and require the external verifier to be involved only when the client or server deviates from the protocol. Finally, we implement externally verified ORAM, along with an automated cryptocurrency contract to use as the external verifier.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要我们提出了外部可验证的遗忘RAM（ORAM）的想法。 我们的目标是允许执行ORAM协议的客户和服务器具有由第三方裁定的争议，从而允许对不可靠或恶意服务器执行罚款。 我们给出了一个安全定义，该定义不仅保证了针对恶意服务器的保护，还可以保证对客户进行虚假指控的保护。 然后，我们对符合此安全定义的PATH [15]和RING ORAM [9]协议进行修改。 这些协议都具有与半honest原始版本相同的渐近运行时间，并且只有在客户端或服务器偏离协议时才需要外部验证器。 最后，我们实施了外部验证的ORAM，以及自动加密货币合同以用作外部验证者。
papers.title_zh: 外部可验证的不经意RAM

papers.title: Social Engineering Attacks on Government Opponents: Target Perspectives
papers.authors: William R. Marczak, Vern Paxson
papers.abstract: Abstract New methods of dissident surveillance employed by repressive nation-states increasingly involve socially engineering targets into unwitting cooperation (e.g., by convincing them to open a malicious attachment or link). While a fair amount is understood about the nature of these threat actors and the types of tools they use, there is comparatively little understood about targets’ perceptions of the risks associated with their online activity, and their security posture. We conducted in-depth interviews of 30 potential targets of Middle Eastern and Horn of Africa-based governments, also examining settings and software on their computers and phones. Our engagement illuminates the ways that likely targets are vulnerable to the types of social engineering employed by nation-states.
papers.abstract_zh: 压制性民族国家采用的抽象新方法越来越多地涉及社会工程目标参与不知情的合作（例如，通过说服他们打开恶意的依恋或链接）。 尽管这些威胁行为者的性质及其使用的工具类型可以理解相当多的理解，但关于目标对与其在线活动相关的风险及其安全姿势的风险的看法相对较少了解。 我们对基于非洲的中东和号角的30个潜在目标进行了深入的访谈，还检查了其计算机和电话上的设置和软件。 我们的参与阐明了可能目标的方式容易受到民族国家使用的社会工程类型的影响。
papers.title_zh: 对政府反对者的社会工程攻击:目标视角

papers.title: Website Fingerprinting Defenses at the Application Layer
papers.authors: Giovanni Cherubin, Jamie Hayes, Marc Juárez
papers.abstract: Abstract Website Fingerprinting (WF) allows a passive network adversary to learn the websites that a client visits by analyzing traffic patterns that are unique to each website. It has been recently shown that these attacks are particularly effective against .onion sites, anonymous web servers hosted within the Tor network. Given the sensitive nature of the content of these services, the implications of WF on the Tor network are alarming. Prior work has only considered defenses at the client-side arguing that web servers lack of incentives to adopt countermeasures. Furthermore, most of these defenses have been designed to operate on the stream of network packets, making practical deployment difficult. In this paper, we propose two application-level defenses including the first server-side defense against WF, as .onion services have incentives to support it. The other defense is a lightweight client-side defense implemented as a browser add-on, improving ease of deployment over previous approaches. In our evaluations, the server-side defense is able to reduce WF accuracy on Tor .onion sites from 69.6% to 10% and the client-side defense reduces accuracy from 64% to 31.5%.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要网站指纹（WF）允许被动网络对手可以通过分析每个网站唯一的流量模式来了解客户访问的网站。 最近已经显示，这些攻击对.onion网站，TOR网络中托管的匿名网络服务器特别有效。 鉴于这些服务内容的敏感性，WF在TOR网络上的含义令人震惊。 先前的工作仅在客户端考虑了防御，认为网络服务器缺乏采用对策的激励措施。 此外，这些防御措施中的大多数旨在在网络数据包中运行，从而使实际部署变得困难。 在本文中，我们提出了两个申请级防御，包括针对WF的第一个服务器端防御，因为.inion Services具有支持它的动机。 另一个防御是一种轻巧的客户端防御，该辩护以浏览器附加组件实施，从而提高了对以前方法的易于部署。 在我们的评估中，服务器端防御能够将Tor .onion网站上的WF准确度从69.6％降低到10％，而客户端的防御将准确性从64％降低到31.5％。
papers.title_zh: 应用层的网站指纹防御

papers.title: Editors' Introduction
papers.authors: Kostas Chatzikokolakis, Aaron Johnson
papers.abstract: Is there currently a crisis of confidence in psychological science reflecting an unprecedented level of doubt among practitioners about the reliability of research findings in the field? It would certainly appear that there is. These doubts emerged and grew as a series of unhappy events unfolded in 2011: the Diederik Stapel fraud case (see Stroebe, Postmes, & Spears, 2012, this issue), the publication in a major social psychology journal of an article purporting to show evidence of extrasensory perception (Bem, 2011) followed by widespread public mockery (see Galak, LeBoeuf, Nelson, & Simmons, in press; Wagenmakers, Wetzels, Borsboom, & van der Maas, 2011), reports by Wicherts and colleagues that psychologists are often unwilling or unable to share their published data for reanalysis (Wicherts, Bakker, & Molenaar, 2011; see also Wicherts, Borsboom, Kats, & Molenaar, 2006), and the publication of an important article in Psychological Science showing how easily researchers can, in the absence of any real effects, nonetheless obtain statistically significant differences through various questionable research practices (QRPs) such as exploring multiple dependent variables or covariates and only reporting these when they yield significant results (Simmons, Nelson, & Simonsohn, 2011). For those psychologists who expected that the embarrassments of 2011 would soon recede into memory, 2012 offered instead a quick plunge from bad to worse, with new indications of outright fraud in the field of social cognition (Simonsohn, 2012), an article in Psychological Science showing that many psychologists admit to engaging in at least some of the QRPs examined by Simmons and colleagues (John, Loewenstein, & Prelec, 2012), troubling new meta-analytic evidence suggesting that the QRPs described by Simmons and colleagues may even be leaving telltale signs visible in the distribution of p values in the psychological literature (Masicampo & Lalande, in press; Simonsohn, 2012), and an acrimonious dust-up in science magazines and blogs centered around the problems some investigators were having in replicating well-known results from the field of social cognition (Bower, 2012; Yong, 2012). Although the very public problems experienced by psychology over this 2-year period are embarrassing to those of us working in the field, some have found comfort in the fact that, over the same period, similar concerns have been arising across the scientific landscape (triggered by revelations that will be described shortly). Some of the suspected causes of unreplicability, such as publication bias (the tendency to publish only positive findings) have been discussed for years; in fact, the phrase file-drawer problem was first coined by a distinguished psychologist several decades ago (Rosenthal, 1979). However, many have speculated that these problems have been exacerbated in recent years as academia reaps the harvest of a hypercompetitive academic climate and an incentive scheme that provides rich rewards for overselling one’s work and few rewards at all for caution and circumspection (see Giner-Sorolla, 2012, this issue). Equally disturbing, investigators seem to be replicating each others’ work even less often than they did in the past, again presumably reflecting an incentive scheme gone askew (a point discussed in several articles in this issue, e.g., Makel, Plucker, & Hegarty, 2012). The frequency with which errors appear in the psychological literature is not presently known, but a number of facts suggest it might be disturbingly high. Ioannidis (2005) has shown through simple mathematical modeling that any scientific field that ignores replication can easily come to the miserable state wherein (as the title of his most famous article puts it) “most published research findings are false” (see also Ioannidis, 2012, this issue, and Pashler & Harris, 2012, this issue). Meanwhile, reports emerging from cancer research have made such grim scenarios seem more plausible: In 2012, several large pharmaceutical companies revealed that their efforts to replicate exciting preclinical findings from published academic studies in cancer biology were only rarely verifying the original results (Begley & Ellis, 2012; see also Osherovich, 2011; Prinz, Schlange, & Asadullah, 2011).
papers.abstract_zh: 目前心理科学是否出现了信任危机，反映出从业者对该领域研究结果的可靠性产生了前所未有的怀疑？显然是有的。随着2011年一系列不愉快事件的发生，这些怀疑出现了，并有所增长:Diederik Stapel欺诈案(见Stroebe，Postmes，& Spears，2012，这一期)，在一份主要的社会心理学杂志上发表了一篇文章，声称显示了超感知觉的证据(Bem，2011)，随后受到了广泛的公开嘲笑(见Galak，LeBoeuf，Nelson，& Simmons，正在出版中；Wagenmakers，Wetzels，Borsboom，& van der Maas，2011)，Wicherts及其同事报告说，心理学家往往不愿意或不能分享他们发表的数据进行再分析(Wicherts，Bakker，& Molenaar，2011；另见Wicherts，Borsboom，Kats，& Molenaar，2006)，以及发表在《心理科学》上的一篇重要文章，该文章表明，在没有任何实际影响的情况下，研究人员可以通过各种有问题的研究实践(qrp)轻松地获得统计学上的显著差异，如探索多个因变量或协变量，并仅在它们产生显著结果时报告这些结果(Simmons，Nelson，& Simonsohn，2011)。对于那些预计2011年的尴尬将很快消失在记忆中的心理学家来说，2012年反而提供了一个从糟糕到更糟糕的快速跳水，在社会认知领域出现了新的明显的欺诈迹象(Simonsohn，2012)，心理科学中的一篇文章显示，许多心理学家承认至少参与了Simmons及其同事检查的一些快速反应程序(John，Loewenstein，& Prelec，2012)。 令人不安的新荟萃分析证据表明，Simmons及其同事描述的qrp甚至可能在心理学文献中的p值分布中留下明显的迹象(Masicampo & Lalande，出版中； Simonsohn，2012)，科学杂志和博客上围绕一些研究人员在复制社会认知领域的知名结果时遇到的问题展开了激烈的争论(Bower，2012；永，2012)。虽然心理学在这两年中所经历的非常公开的问题令我们这些在该领域工作的人感到尴尬，但一些人已经找到了安慰，因为在同一时期，类似的担忧已经在整个科学领域出现(由即将描述的启示引发)。一些不可复制的可疑原因，如发表偏倚(倾向于只发表积极的发现)已经讨论了多年；事实上，抽屉问题这个短语是由一位杰出的心理学家在几十年前首次提出的(Rosenthal，1979)。然而，许多人推测，这些问题在最近几年已经恶化，因为学术界收获了高度竞争的学术氛围和奖励计划，这种奖励计划为过度销售自己的工作提供了丰厚的奖励，而对谨慎和谨慎却几乎没有奖励(见吉纳-索罗拉，2012年，这一期)。同样令人不安的是，研究人员似乎比过去更少地重复彼此的工作，这可能再次反映了一个倾斜的激励机制(这一点在本期的几篇文章中讨论过，例如，马克尔、普吕克尔和赫加蒂，2012)。错误出现在心理学文献中的频率目前还不清楚，但许多事实表明它可能高得令人不安。约安尼迪斯(2005)通过简单的数学建模表明，任何忽视复制的科学领域都很容易陷入悲惨的境地，其中(正如他最著名的文章的标题所言)“大多数发表的研究结果都是错误的”(另见约安尼迪斯，2012，本期，以及Pashler & Harris，2012，本期)。与此同时，来自癌症研究的报告让这种严峻的情景看起来更加可信:2012年，几家大型制药公司透露，他们在癌症生物学方面复制已发表学术研究中令人兴奋的临床前发现的努力很少验证原始结果(Begley & Ellis，2012；另见Osherovich，2011年；普林茨、施朗格和阿萨杜拉，2011年)。
papers.title_zh: 编辑介绍

papers.title: Wiretapping End-to-End Encrypted VoIP Calls: Real-World Attacks on ZRTP
papers.authors: Dominik Schürmann, Fabian Kabus, Gregor Hildermeier, Lars C. Wolf
papers.abstract: Abstract Voice calls are still one of the most common use cases for smartphones. Often, sensitive personal information but also confidential business information is shared. End-to-end security is required to protect against wiretapping of voice calls. For such real-time communication, the ZRTP key-agreement protocol has been proposed. By verbally comparing a small number of on-screen characters or words, called Short Authentication Strings, the participants can be sure that no one is wiretapping the call. Since 2011, ZRTP is an IETF standard implemented in several VoIP clients. In this paper, we analyzed attacks on real-world VoIP systems, in particular those implementing the ZRTP standard. We evaluate the protocol compliance, error handling, and user interfaces of the most common ZRTP-capable VoIP clients. Our extensive analysis uncovered a critical vulnerability that allows wiretapping even though Short Authentication Strings are compared correctly. We discuss shortcomings in the clients’ error handling and design of security indicators potentially leading to insecure connections.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象语音调用仍然是智能手机最常见的用例之一。 通常，敏感的个人信息和机密业务信息会共享。 需要端到端的安全性才能防止窃听语音呼叫。 对于这种实时通信，已经提出了ZRTP键合协议。 通过口头比较少数屏幕字符或单词，称为简单验证字符串，参与者可以确定没有人在窃听呼叫。 自2011年以来，ZRTP是在几个VoIP客户端实施的IETF标准。 在本文中，我们分析了对现实世界VoIP系统的攻击，特别是那些实施ZRTP标准的攻击。 我们评估了最常见的具有ZRTP的VoIP客户端的协议合规性，错误处理和用户界面。 我们的广泛分析发现了一个关键的脆弱性，即使正确比较了简短的身份验证字符串，也可以窃听。 我们讨论了客户对安全指标的错误处理和设计可能导致不安全连接的缺点。
papers.title_zh: 窃听端到端加密VoIP呼叫:对ZRTP的真实攻击

papers.title: Privacy-Preserving Computation with Trusted Computing via Scramble-then-Compute
papers.authors: Hung Dang, Tien Tuan Anh Dinh, Ee-Chien Chang, Beng Chin Ooi
papers.abstract: Abstract We consider privacy-preserving computation of big data using trusted computing primitives with limited private memory. Simply ensuring that the data remains encrypted outside the trusted computing environment is insufficient to preserve data privacy, for data movement observed during computation could leak information. While it is possible to thwart such leakage using generic solution such as ORAM [42], designing efficient privacy-preserving algorithms is challenging. Besides computation efficiency, it is critical to keep trusted code bases lean, for large ones are unwieldy to vet and verify. In this paper, we advocate a simple approach wherein many basic algorithms (e.g., sorting) can be made privacy-preserving by adding a step that securely scrambles the data before feeding it to the original algorithms. We call this approach Scramble-then-Compute (StC), and give a sufficient condition whereby existing external memory algorithms can be made privacy-preserving via StC. This approach facilitates code-reuse, and its simplicity contributes to a smaller trusted code base. It is also general, allowing algorithm designers to leverage an extensive body of known efficient algorithms for better performance. Our experiments show that StC could offer up to 4.1× speedups over known, application-specific alternatives.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要我们考虑使用具有有限私人内存的受信任的计算原始人对大数据进行隐私计算。 简单地确保在受信任的计算环境之外保持数据的加密不足以保留数据隐私，因为在计算过程中观察到的数据移动可能会泄漏信息。 尽管有可能使用普通解决方案（例如Oram [42]）挫败此类泄漏，但设计有效的隐私算法是具有挑战性的。 除了计算效率外，至关重要的是要保持信任的代码库精益，因为大型代码库对于审查和验证很笨拙。 在本文中，我们提倡一种简单的方法，其中许多基本算法（例如，排序）可以通过添加一个步骤在将数据馈送到原始算法之前将其安全地拼凑起来，从而使其具有隐私性。 我们将这种方法称为争夺-Compute（STC），并提供足够的条件，可以通过STC使现有的外部内存算法具有隐私性。 这种方法促进了代码复制，其简单性有助于较小的值得信赖的代码库。 它也是一般的，允许算法设计师利用广泛的已知有效算法的体系来提高性能。 我们的实验表明，STC可以在已知的，特定于应用的替代方案上提供高达4.1倍的加速。
papers.title_zh: 基于先加扰后计算的可信计算隐私保护计算

papers.title: SeaGlass: Enabling City-Wide IMSI-Catcher Detection
papers.authors: Peter Ney, Ian Smith, Gabriel Cadamuro, Tadayoshi Kohno
papers.abstract: Abstract Cell-site simulators, also known as IMSI-catchers and stingrays, are used around the world by governments and criminals to track and eavesdrop on cell phones. Despite extensive public debate surrounding their use, few hard facts about them are available. For example, the richest sources of information on U.S. government cell-site simulator usage are from anonymous leaks, public records requests, and court proceedings. This lack of concrete information and the difficulty of independently obtaining such information hampers the public discussion. To address this deficiency, we build, deploy, and evaluate SeaGlass, a city-wide cellsite simulator detection network. SeaGlass consists of sensors that measure and upload data on the cellular environment to find the signatures of portable cell-site simulators. SeaGlass sensors are designed to be robust, low-maintenance, and deployable in vehicles for long durations. The data they generate is used to learn a city’s network properties to find anomalies consistent with cell-site simulators. We installed SeaGlass sensors into 15 ridesharing vehicles across two cities, collecting two months of data in each city. Using this data, we evaluate the system and show how SeaGlass can be used to detect signatures of portable cell-site simulators. Finally, we evaluate our signature detection methods and discuss anomalies discovered in the data.
papers.abstract_zh: 政府和犯罪分子在世界范围内使用了抽象的单位模拟器，也称为IMSI捕捉器和黄貂鱼，用于跟踪和窃听手机。 尽管围绕他们的使用进行了广泛的公众辩论，但几乎没有关于它们的艰难事实。 例如，有关美国政府单位模拟器使用的最丰富信息来源来自匿名泄漏，公共记录请求和法院诉讼。 缺乏具体信息和独立获取此类信息的困难会阻碍公众讨论。 为了解决这一缺陷，我们建立，部署和评估Seaglass，这是一个全市层的蜂窝状模拟器检测网络。 海胶由在细胞环境上测量和上传数据的传感器组成，以找到便携式细胞位点模拟器的签名。 海棒传感器的设计为稳健，低维护性，并且可以在长时间内在车辆中部署。 他们生成的数据用于学习城市的网络属性，以查找与单位模拟器一致的异常。 我们在两个城市的15辆乘车车辆中安装了15辆乘车传感器，在每个城市收集了两个月的数据。 使用此数据，我们评估了系统，并展示了如何使用海类的检测便携式单元点模拟器的特征。 最后，我们评估了我们的签名检测方法，并讨论数据中发现的异常情况。
papers.title_zh: SeaGlass:实现城市范围的IMSI捕手探测

papers.title: Hardening Stratum, the Bitcoin Pool Mining Protocol
papers.authors: Ruben Recabarren, Bogdan Carbunar
papers.abstract: Abstract Stratum, the de-facto mining communication protocol used by blockchain based cryptocurrency systems, enables miners to reliably and efficiently fetch jobs from mining pool servers. In this paper we exploit Stratum’s lack of encryption to develop passive and active attacks on Bitcoin’s mining protocol, with important implications on the privacy, security and even safety of mining equipment owners. We introduce StraTap and ISP Log attacks, that infer miner earnings if given access to miner communications, or even their logs. We develop BiteCoin, an active attack that hijacks shares submitted by miners, and their associated payouts. We build BiteCoin on WireGhost, a tool we developed to hijack and surreptitiously maintain Stratum connections. Our attacks reveal that securing Stratum through pervasive encryption is not only undesirable (due to large overheads), but also ineffective: an adversary can predict miner earnings even when given access to only packet timestamps. Instead, we devise Bedrock, a minimalistic Stratum extension that protects the privacy and security of mining participants. We introduce and leverage the mining cookie concept, a secret that each miner shares with the pool and includes in its puzzle computations, and that prevents attackers from reconstructing or hijacking the puzzles. We have implemented our attacks and collected 138MB of Stratum protocol traffic from mining equipment in the US and Venezuela. We show that Bedrock is resilient to active attacks even when an adversary breaks the crypto constructs it uses. Bedrock imposes a daily overhead of 12.03s on a single pool server that handles mining traffic from 16,000 miners.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象层是基于区块链的加密货币系统使用的事实上的开采通信协议，使矿工能够从采矿池服务器可靠，有效地找到作业。 在本文中，我们利用Stratum缺乏对比特币采矿协议的被动和主动攻击的攻击，对采矿设备所有者的隐私，安全甚至安全性具有重要意义。 我们介绍Stratap和ISP日志攻击，如果可以访问矿工通信，甚至是其日志，则推断矿工收入。 我们开发了Bitecoin，这是一种劫持矿工提交的股票及其相关支出的积极攻击。 我们在WireGhost上建立了Bitecoin，这是我们开发劫持的工具，并秘密地维护层连接。 我们的攻击表明，通过普遍加密确保层面不仅是不希望的（由于大开销），而且也无效：即使只能访问数据包时间戳，对手也可以预测矿工收入。 取而代之的是，我们设计了Bedrock，这是一种极简主义的层次扩展，可保护采矿参与者的隐私和安全性。 我们介绍并利用了采矿饼干概念，这是每个矿工与游泳池共享的秘密，并包括在其难题计算中，并阻止攻击者重建或劫持难题。 我们已经实施了攻击，并从美国和委内瑞拉收集了138MB的地层协议流量。 我们表明，即使对手打破了它使用的加密构造，基岩也可以抵御主动攻击。 BedRock每天在单个泳池服务器上施加12.03秒的开销，该服务器处理16,000名矿工的采矿流量。
papers.title_zh: 硬化地层，比特币池开采协议

papers.title: Why can't users choose their identity providers on the web?
papers.authors: Kevin Corre, Olivier Barais, Gerson Sunyé, Vincent Frey, Jean-Michel Crom
papers.abstract: Abstract Authentication delegation is a major function of the modern web. Identity Providers (IdP) acquired a central role by providing this function to other web services. By knowing which web services or web applications access its service, an IdP can violate the enduser privacy by discovering information that the user did not want to share with its IdP. For instance, WebRTC introduces a new field of usage as authentication delegation happens during the call session establishment, between two users. As a result, an IdP can easily discover that Bob has a meeting with Alice. A second issue that increases the privacy violation is the lack of choice for the end-user to select its own IdP. Indeed, on many web-applications, the end-user can only select between a subset of IdPs, in most cases Facebook or Google. In this paper, we analyze this phenomena, in particular why the end-user cannot easily select its preferred IdP, though there exists standards in this field such as OpenID Connect and OAuth 2? To lead this analysis, we conduct three investigations. The first one is a field survey on OAuth 2 and OpenID Connect scope usage by web sites to understand if scopes requested by websites could allow for user defined IdPs. The second one tries to understand whether the problem comes from the OAuth 2 protocol or its implementations by IdP. The last one tries to understand if trust relations between websites and IdP could prevent the end user to select its own IdP. Finally, we sketch possible architecture for web browser based identity management, and report on the implementation of a prototype.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象身份验证委托是现代网络的主要功能。 身份提供商（IDP）通过将此功能提供给其他Web服务，从而获得了核心角色。 通过知道哪个Web服务或Web应用程序访问其服务，IDP可以通过发现用户不想与IDP共享的信息来侵犯Ednuser隐私。 例如，WEBRTC引入了一个新的用法领域，因为身份验证委托在呼叫会话建立期间发生在两个用户之间。 结果，IDP可以轻松地发现鲍勃与爱丽丝会面。 增加侵犯隐私的第二个问题是最终用户选择自己的IDP缺乏选择。 确实，在许多Web应用程序上，最终用户只能在IDP的子集之间进行选择，在大多数情况下，Facebook或Google。 在本文中，我们分析了这种现象，特别是为什么最终用户不能轻易选择其首选IDP，尽管该领域中存在标准，例如OpenID Connect和Oauth 2？ 为了领导这一分析，我们进行了三项研究。 第一个是在OAuth 2和OpenID连接范围使用网站上使用的现场调查，以了解网站要求的范围是否允许使用用户定义的IDP。 第二个试图了解问题是来自OAuth 2协议还是IDP实现。 最后一个试图了解网站和IDP之间的信任关系是否可以阻止最终用户选择自己的IDP。 最后，我们为基于Web浏览器的身份管理绘制可能的体系结构，并报告原型的实现。
papers.title_zh: 为什么用户不能在web上选择他们的身份提供者？

papers.title: A Usability Evaluation of Tor Launcher
papers.authors: Linda Naeun Lee, David Fifield, Nathan Malkin, Ganesh Iyer, Serge Egelman, David A. Wagner
papers.abstract: Abstract Although Tor has state-of-the art anticensorship measures, users in heavily censored environments will not be able to connect to Tor if they cannot configure their connections. We perform the first usability evaluation of Tor Launcher, the graphical user interface (GUI) that Tor Browser uses to configure connections to Tor. Our study shows that 79% (363 of 458) of user attempts to connect to Tor in simulated censored environments failed. We found that users were often frustrated during the process and tried options at random. In this paper, we measure potential usability issues, discuss design constraints unique to Tor, and provide recommendations based on what we learned to help more users connect to Tor while reducing the time they take to do so. Tor Browser incorporated the changes proposed by this study.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要尽管Tor具有最先进的抗发射措施，但在经过严格审查的环境中的用户如果无法配置连接，将无法连接到TOR。 我们对TOR启动器（TOR浏览器使用图形用户界面（GUI））进行了第一个可用性评估，用于配置与TOR的连接。 我们的研究表明，在模拟的审查环境中，79％（458个中的363个）尝试连接到TOR的尝试失败了。 我们发现在此过程中，用户通常会感到沮丧，并随机尝试选择。 在本文中，我们衡量潜在的可用性问题，讨论TOR独有的设计约束，并根据我们学会的知识提供建议，以帮助更多的用户与TOR联系，同时减少他们所花费的时间。 TOR浏览器结合了本研究提出的更改。
papers.title_zh: Tor发射器的可用性评估

papers.title: PathShuffle: Credit Mixing and Anonymous Payments for Ripple
papers.authors: Pedro Moreno-Sanchez, Tim Ruffing, Aniket Kate
papers.abstract: Abstract The I owe you (IOU) credit network Ripple is one of the most prominent alternatives in the burgeoning field of decentralized payment systems. Ripple’s path-based transactions set it apart from cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin. Its pseudonymous nature, while still maintaining some regulatory capabilities, has motivated several financial institutions across the world to use Ripple for processing their daily transactions. Nevertheless, with its public ledger, a credit network such as Ripple is no different from a cryptocurrency in terms of weak privacy; recent demonstrative deanonymization attacks raise important concerns regarding the privacy of the Ripple users and their transactions. However, unlike for cryptocurrencies, there is no known privacy solution compatible with the existing credit networks such as Ripple. In this paper, we present PathShuffle, the first path mixing protocol for credit networks. PathShuffle is fully compatible with the current credit networks. As its essential building block, we propose PathJoin, a novel protocol to perform atomic transactions in credit networks. Using PathJoin and the P2P mixing protocol DiceMix, PathShuffle is a decentralized solution for anonymizing path-based transactions. We demonstrate the practicality of PathShuffle by performing path mixing in Ripple.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要我欠您（IOU）信用网络涟漪是在分散支付系统新兴领域中最突出的替代方案之一。 Ripple的基于路径的交易使其与比特币等加密货币区分开来。 它的假名性质虽然仍保持某些监管能力，但仍激发了世界各地的几家金融机构，使用Ripple来处理其日常交易。 然而，凭借其公共分类帐，像弱隐私相比，像Ripple这样的信用网络与加密货币没有什么不同。 最近的示范性脱名字攻击引起了关于连锁用户及其交易的隐私的重要关注点。 但是，与加密货币不同，没有已知的隐私解决方案与现有信用网络（例如Ripple）兼容。 在本文中，我们介绍了Pathshufle，这是信用网络的第一个路径混合协议。 Pathshufle与当前的信用网络完全兼容。 作为其必不可少的构件，我们提出了PathJoin，这是一种在信用网络中执行原子交易的新协议。 使用Path Join和P2P混合协议DICEMIX，Pathshuffle是用于基于路径的交易的分散解决方案。 我们通过在波纹中执行路径混合来证明路径舍馆的实用性。
papers.title_zh: path shuffle:Ripple的信用混合和匿名支付

papers.title: Detecting Anti Ad-blockers in the Wild
papers.authors: Muhammad Haris Mughees, Zhiyun Qian, Zubair Shafiq
papers.abstract: Abstract The rise of ad-blockers is viewed as an economic threat by online publishers who primarily rely on online advertising to monetize their services. To address this threat, publishers have started to retaliate by employing anti ad-blockers, which scout for ad-block users and react to them by pushing users to whitelist the website or disable ad-blockers altogether. The clash between ad-blockers and anti ad-blockers has resulted in a new arms race on the Web. In this paper, we present an automated machine learning based approach to identify anti ad-blockers that detect and react to ad-block users. The approach is promising with precision of 94.8% and recall of 93.1%. Our automated approach allows us to conduct a large-scale measurement study of anti ad-blockers on Alexa top-100K websites. We identify 686 websites that make visible changes to their page content in response to ad-block detection. We characterize the spectrum of different strategies used by anti ad-blockers. We find that a majority of publishers use fairly simple first-party anti ad-block scripts. However, we also note the use of third-party anti ad-block services that use more sophisticated tactics to detect and respond to ad-blockers.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要在线出版商将广告街区的兴起视为经济威胁，他们主要依靠在线广告来获利其服务。 为了应对这一威胁，出版商已经开始通过使用反广告障碍者来进行报复，该反广告街区对广告块用户进行侦察，并通过将用户推向白名单网站或完全禁用广告障碍者来对其做出反应。 广告街区和反广告街区之间的冲突导致网络上进行了新的武器竞赛。 在本文中，我们提出了一种基于机器学习的方法，以识别检测并反应广告块用户的反广告障碍物。 该方法有希望的精度为94.8％，召回93.1％。 我们的自动化方法使我们能够对Alexa Top-100k网站上的反广告街区进行大规模的测量研究。 我们确定了686个网站，这些网站可根据AD-Block检测对其页面内容进行可见的更改。 我们表征了反广告障碍者使用的不同策略的范围。 我们发现，大多数发布者都使用相当简单的第一方反广告板脚本。 但是，我们还注意到使用第三方反广告块服务，这些服务使用更复杂的策略来检测和响应广告街区。
papers.title_zh: 在野外检测抗广告阻断剂

papers.title: Privacy-Preserving Interdomain Routing at Internet Scale
papers.authors: Gilad Asharov, Daniel Demmler, Michael Schapira, Thomas Schneider, Gil Segev, Scott Shenker, Michael Zohner
papers.abstract: Abstract The Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) computes routes between the organizational networks that make up today’s Internet. Unfortunately, BGP suffers from deficiencies, including slow convergence, security problems, a lack of innovation, and the leakage of sensitive information about domains’ routing preferences. To overcome some of these problems, we revisit the idea of centralizing and using secure multi-party computation (MPC) for interdomain routing which was proposed by Gupta et al. (ACM HotNets’12). We implement two algorithms for interdomain routing with state-of-the-art MPC protocols. On an empirically derived dataset that approximates the topology of today’s Internet (55 809 nodes), our protocols take as little as 6 s of topology-independent precomputation and only 3 s of online time. We show, moreover, that when our MPC approach is applied at country/region-level scale, runtimes can be as low as 0.17 s online time and 0.20 s pre-computation time. Our results motivate the MPC approach for interdomain routing and furthermore demonstrate that current MPC techniques are capable of efficiently tackling real-world problems at a large scale.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要边境网关协议（BGP）计算组成当今互联网的组织网络之间的路线。 不幸的是，BGP患有缺陷，包括缓慢的收敛性，安全性问题，缺乏创新以及有关域路由偏好的敏感信息的泄漏。 为了克服其中一些问题，我们重新审视了Gupta等人提出的集中和使用安全的多方计算（MPC）进行集中和使用安全的多方计算（MPC）的想法。 （ACM热门网书12）。 我们实施了两种算法，用于与最先进的MPC协议的域间路由。 在一个近似于当今互联网拓扑（55 809个节点）的经验得出的数据集中，我们的协议仅占独立于拓扑的预录的6 s，仅在线时间仅3 s。 此外，我们表明，当我们的MPC方法以国家/地区/地区级别的规模应用时，运行时间可能低至0.17 s的在线时间和0.20 s的预启动时间。 我们的结果促使MPC进行域间路由的方法，此外表明，当前的MPC技术能够有效地大规模解决现实世界中的问题。
papers.title_zh: 互联网规模的隐私保护域间路由

papers.title: A Leakage-Abuse Attack Against Multi-User Searchable Encryption
papers.authors: Cédric Van Rompay, Refik Molva, Melek Önen
papers.abstract: Abstract Searchable Encryption (SE) allows a user to upload data to the cloud and to search it in a remote fashion while preserving the privacy of both the data and the queries. Recent research results describe attacks on SE schemes using the access pattern, denoting the ids of documents matching search queries, which most SE schemes reveal during query processing. However SE schemes usually leak more than just the access pattern, and this extra leakage can lead to attacks (much) more harmful than the ones using basic access pattern leakage only. We remark that in the special case of Multi-User Searchable Encryption (MUSE), where many users upload and search data in a cloud-based infrastructure, a large number of existing solutions have a common leakage in addition to the well-studied access pattern leakage. We show that this seemingly small extra leakage allows a very simple yet powerful attack, and that the privacy degree of the affected schemes have been overestimated. We also show that this new vulnerability affects existing software. Finally we formalize the newly identified leakage profile and show how it relates to previously defined ones.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象可搜索的加密（SE）允许用户将数据上传到云，并以远程方式搜索，同时保留数据和查询的隐私。 最近的研究结果描述了使用访问模式对SE方案的攻击，表示匹配搜索查询的文档的ID，大多数SE方案在查询处理过程中都会揭示出来。 但是，SE计划通常不仅泄漏了访问模式，而且这种额外的泄漏可能会导致攻击（比使用基本访问模式泄漏的攻击）更大。 我们指出的是，在多用户可搜索的加密（MUSE）的特殊情况下，许多用户在基于云的基础架构中上传和搜索数据，许多现有解决方案除了经过良好研究的访问模式外，还具有共同的泄漏 泄漏。 我们表明，这种看似很小的额外泄漏允许非常简单而强大的攻击，并且受影响方案的隐私程度被高估了。 我们还表明，这种新的漏洞会影响现有软件。 最后，我们正式化了新确定的泄漏配置文件，并展示了它与以前定义的泄漏概况的关系。
papers.title_zh: 一种针对多用户可搜索加密的泄漏滥用攻击

papers.title: DataLair: Efficient Block Storage with Plausible Deniability against Multi-Snapshot Adversaries
papers.authors: Anrin Chakraborti, Chen Chen, Radu Sion
papers.abstract: Abstract Sensitive information is present on our phones, disks, watches and computers. Its protection is essential. Plausible deniability of stored data allows individuals to deny that their device contains a piece of sensitive information. This constitutes a key tool in the fight against oppressive governments and censorship. Unfortunately, existing solutions, such as the now defunct TrueCrypt [5], can defend only against an adversary that can access a user’s device at most once (“single-snapshot adversary”). Recent solutions have traded significant performance overheads for the ability to handle more powerful adversaries able to access the device at multiple points in time (“multi-snapshot adversary”). In this paper we show that this sacrifice is not necessary. We introduce and build DataLair1, a practical plausible deniability mechanism. When compared with existing approaches, DataLair is two orders of magnitude faster for public data accesses, and 5 times faster for hidden data accesses. An important component in DataLair is a new write-only ORAM construction which improves on the complexity of the state of the art write-only ORAM by a factor of O(logN), where N denotes the underlying storage disk size.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象敏感信息存在于我们的手机，磁盘，手表和计算机上。 它的保护至关重要。 存储数据的合理可否认性允许个人否认其设备包含一块敏感信息。 这构成了与压迫性政府和审查制度斗争的关键工具。 不幸的是，现有的解决方案（例如现在已停用的TrueCrypt [5]）只能防御最多一次可以访问用户设备的对手（“单秒击打对手”）。 最近的解决方案已经交易了大量的性能开销，以便能够处理能够以多个时间点访问设备的功能更强大的对手（“ Multi-Snapshot Arversary”）。 在本文中，我们表明这种牺牲是不必要的。 我们介绍和构建DataLair1，这是一种可行的可否认性机制。 与现有方法相比，DataLair的公共数据访问更快的速度是两个数量级，而隐藏数据访问的速度更快。 DataLair中的一个重要组成部分是一种新的仅写入Oram结构，它改善了最先进的仅写入Oram的复杂性，而O（logN）的含量为O（logN），其中N表示基础存储磁盘的大小。
papers.title_zh: DataLair:高效的数据块存储，对多快照对手具有可信的可否认性

papers.title: Editors' Introduction
papers.authors: Kostas Chatzikokolakis, Aaron Johnson
papers.abstract: Is there currently a crisis of confidence in psychological science reflecting an unprecedented level of doubt among practitioners about the reliability of research findings in the field? It would certainly appear that there is. These doubts emerged and grew as a series of unhappy events unfolded in 2011: the Diederik Stapel fraud case (see Stroebe, Postmes, & Spears, 2012, this issue), the publication in a major social psychology journal of an article purporting to show evidence of extrasensory perception (Bem, 2011) followed by widespread public mockery (see Galak, LeBoeuf, Nelson, & Simmons, in press; Wagenmakers, Wetzels, Borsboom, & van der Maas, 2011), reports by Wicherts and colleagues that psychologists are often unwilling or unable to share their published data for reanalysis (Wicherts, Bakker, & Molenaar, 2011; see also Wicherts, Borsboom, Kats, & Molenaar, 2006), and the publication of an important article in Psychological Science showing how easily researchers can, in the absence of any real effects, nonetheless obtain statistically significant differences through various questionable research practices (QRPs) such as exploring multiple dependent variables or covariates and only reporting these when they yield significant results (Simmons, Nelson, & Simonsohn, 2011). For those psychologists who expected that the embarrassments of 2011 would soon recede into memory, 2012 offered instead a quick plunge from bad to worse, with new indications of outright fraud in the field of social cognition (Simonsohn, 2012), an article in Psychological Science showing that many psychologists admit to engaging in at least some of the QRPs examined by Simmons and colleagues (John, Loewenstein, & Prelec, 2012), troubling new meta-analytic evidence suggesting that the QRPs described by Simmons and colleagues may even be leaving telltale signs visible in the distribution of p values in the psychological literature (Masicampo & Lalande, in press; Simonsohn, 2012), and an acrimonious dust-up in science magazines and blogs centered around the problems some investigators were having in replicating well-known results from the field of social cognition (Bower, 2012; Yong, 2012). Although the very public problems experienced by psychology over this 2-year period are embarrassing to those of us working in the field, some have found comfort in the fact that, over the same period, similar concerns have been arising across the scientific landscape (triggered by revelations that will be described shortly). Some of the suspected causes of unreplicability, such as publication bias (the tendency to publish only positive findings) have been discussed for years; in fact, the phrase file-drawer problem was first coined by a distinguished psychologist several decades ago (Rosenthal, 1979). However, many have speculated that these problems have been exacerbated in recent years as academia reaps the harvest of a hypercompetitive academic climate and an incentive scheme that provides rich rewards for overselling one’s work and few rewards at all for caution and circumspection (see Giner-Sorolla, 2012, this issue). Equally disturbing, investigators seem to be replicating each others’ work even less often than they did in the past, again presumably reflecting an incentive scheme gone askew (a point discussed in several articles in this issue, e.g., Makel, Plucker, & Hegarty, 2012). The frequency with which errors appear in the psychological literature is not presently known, but a number of facts suggest it might be disturbingly high. Ioannidis (2005) has shown through simple mathematical modeling that any scientific field that ignores replication can easily come to the miserable state wherein (as the title of his most famous article puts it) “most published research findings are false” (see also Ioannidis, 2012, this issue, and Pashler & Harris, 2012, this issue). Meanwhile, reports emerging from cancer research have made such grim scenarios seem more plausible: In 2012, several large pharmaceutical companies revealed that their efforts to replicate exciting preclinical findings from published academic studies in cancer biology were only rarely verifying the original results (Begley & Ellis, 2012; see also Osherovich, 2011; Prinz, Schlange, & Asadullah, 2011).
papers.abstract_zh: 目前心理科学是否出现了信任危机，反映出从业者对该领域研究结果的可靠性产生了前所未有的怀疑？显然是有的。随着2011年一系列不愉快事件的发生，这些怀疑出现了，并有所增长:Diederik Stapel欺诈案(见Stroebe，Postmes，& Spears，2012，这一期)，在一份主要的社会心理学杂志上发表了一篇文章，声称显示了超感知觉的证据(Bem，2011)，随后受到了广泛的公开嘲笑(见Galak，LeBoeuf，Nelson，& Simmons，正在出版中；Wagenmakers，Wetzels，Borsboom，& van der Maas，2011)，Wicherts及其同事报告说，心理学家往往不愿意或不能分享他们发表的数据进行再分析(Wicherts，Bakker，& Molenaar，2011；另见Wicherts，Borsboom，Kats，& Molenaar，2006)，以及发表在《心理科学》上的一篇重要文章，该文章表明，在没有任何实际影响的情况下，研究人员可以通过各种有问题的研究实践(qrp)轻松地获得统计学上的显著差异，如探索多个因变量或协变量，并仅在它们产生显著结果时报告这些结果(Simmons，Nelson，& Simonsohn，2011)。对于那些预计2011年的尴尬将很快消失在记忆中的心理学家来说，2012年反而提供了一个从糟糕到更糟糕的快速跳水，在社会认知领域出现了新的明显的欺诈迹象(Simonsohn，2012)，心理科学中的一篇文章显示，许多心理学家承认至少参与了Simmons及其同事检查的一些快速反应程序(John，Loewenstein，& Prelec，2012)。 令人不安的新荟萃分析证据表明，Simmons及其同事描述的qrp甚至可能在心理学文献中的p值分布中留下明显的迹象(Masicampo & Lalande，出版中； Simonsohn，2012)，科学杂志和博客上围绕一些研究人员在复制社会认知领域的知名结果时遇到的问题展开了激烈的争论(Bower，2012；永，2012)。虽然心理学在这两年中所经历的非常公开的问题令我们这些在该领域工作的人感到尴尬，但一些人已经找到了安慰，因为在同一时期，类似的担忧已经在整个科学领域出现(由即将描述的启示引发)。一些不可复制的可疑原因，如发表偏倚(倾向于只发表积极的发现)已经讨论了多年；事实上，抽屉问题这个短语是由一位杰出的心理学家在几十年前首次提出的(Rosenthal，1979)。然而，许多人推测，这些问题在最近几年已经恶化，因为学术界收获了高度竞争的学术氛围和奖励计划，这种奖励计划为过度销售自己的工作提供了丰厚的奖励，而对谨慎和谨慎却几乎没有奖励(见吉纳-索罗拉，2012年，这一期)。同样令人不安的是，研究人员似乎比过去更少地重复彼此的工作，这可能再次反映了一个倾斜的激励机制(这一点在本期的几篇文章中讨论过，例如，马克尔、普吕克尔和赫加蒂，2012)。错误出现在心理学文献中的频率目前还不清楚，但许多事实表明它可能高得令人不安。约安尼迪斯(2005)通过简单的数学建模表明，任何忽视复制的科学领域都很容易陷入悲惨的境地，其中(正如他最著名的文章的标题所言)“大多数发表的研究结果都是错误的”(另见约安尼迪斯，2012，本期，以及Pashler & Harris，2012，本期)。与此同时，来自癌症研究的报告让这种严峻的情景看起来更加可信:2012年，几家大型制药公司透露，他们在癌症生物学方面复制已发表学术研究中令人兴奋的临床前发现的努力很少验证原始结果(Begley & Ellis，2012；另见Osherovich，2011年；普林茨、施朗格和阿萨杜拉，2011年)。
papers.title_zh: 编辑介绍

papers.title: DeltaShaper: Enabling Unobservable Censorship-resistant TCP Tunneling over Videoconferencing Streams
papers.authors: Diogo Barradas, Nuno Santos, Luís E. T. Rodrigues
papers.abstract: Abstract This paper studies the possibility of using the encrypted video channel of widely used videoconferencing applications, such as Skype, as a carrier for unobservable covert TCP/IP communications. We propose and evaluate different alternatives to encode information in the video stream in order to increase available throughput while preserving the packet-level characteristics of the video stream. We have built a censorship-resistant system, named DeltaShaper, which offers a data-link interface and supports TCP/IP applications that tolerate low throughput / high latency links. Our results show that it is possible to run standard protocols such as FTP, SMTP, or HTTP over Skype video streams.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要本文研究了使用广泛使用的视频会议应用程序（例如Skype）作为无法观察到的秘密TCP/IP通信的载体的加密视频通道的可能性。 我们建议和评估不同的替代方案，以编码视频流中的信息，以增加可用的吞吐量，同时保留视频流的数据包级特征。 我们已经构建了一个名为DeltaShaper的审查系统的系统，该系统提供了数据链接接口并支持可耐受低吞吐量 /高潜伏期链接的TCP / IP应用程序。 我们的结果表明，可以通过Skype视频流运行标准协议，例如FTP，SMTP或HTTP。
papers.title_zh: DeltaShaper:在视频会议流上实现不可观察的抗审查TCP隧道

papers.title: Preprocessing Based Verification of Multiparty Protocols with Honest Majority
papers.authors: Peeter Laud, Alisa Pankova, Roman Jagomägis
papers.abstract: Abstract This paper presents a generic “GMW-style” method for turning passively secure protocols into protocols secure against covert attacks, adding relatively cheap offline preprocessing and post-execution verification phases. Our construction performs best with a small number of parties, and its main benefit is the total cost of the online and the offline phases. In the preprocessing phase, each party generates and shares a sufficient amount of verified multiplication triples that will be later used to assist that party’s proof. The execution phase, after which the computed result is already available to the parties, has only negligible overhead that comes from signatures on sent messages. In the postprocessing phase, the verifiers repeat the computation of the prover in secret-shared manner, checking that they obtain the same messages that the prover sent out during execution. The verification preserves the privacy guarantees of the original protocol. It is applicable to protocols doing computations over finite rings, even if the same protocol performs its computation over several distinct rings. We apply our verification method to the Sharemind platform for secure multiparty computations (SMC), evaluate its performance and compare it to other existing SMC platforms offering security against stronger than passive attackers.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要本文提出了一种通用的“ GMW风格”方法，用于将被动安全的协议转换为安全攻击的协议，从而增加了相对便宜的离线预处理和公开后验证阶段。 我们的施工在少数聚会上表现最佳，其主要好处是在线和离线阶段的总成本。 在预处理阶段，各方生成并共享足够数量的经过验证的乘法三元组，以后将用于协助该党的证明。 执行阶段之后，当事方已计算出的结果已经可用，只有来自已发送消息的签名带来的可忽略的开销。 在后处理阶段，验证者以秘密共享的方式重复了谚语的计算，检查他们是否获得了在执行过程中发出的相同消息。 该验证保留了原始协议的隐私保证。 它适用于对有限环进行计算的协议，即使同一协议在几个不同的环上执行其计算。 我们将验证方法应用于安全多方计算（SMC）的Sharemind平台，评估其性能并将其与其他现有的SMC平台进行比较，该平台可与被动攻击者相比，可针对强力提供安全性。
papers.title_zh: 基于预处理的诚实多数多方协议验证

papers.title: Location Privacy for Rank-based Geo-Query Systems
papers.authors: Wisam Eltarjaman, Rinku Dewri, Ramakrishna Thurimella
papers.abstract: Abstract The mobile eco-system is driven by an increasing number of location-aware applications. Consequently, a number of location privacy models have been proposed to prevent the unwanted inference of sensitive information from location traces. A primary focus in these models is to ensure that a privacy mechanism can indeed retrieve results that are geographically the closest. However, geo-query results are, in most cases, ranked using a combination of distance and importance data, thereby producing a result landscape that is periodically flat and not always dictated by distance. A privacy model that does not exploit this structure of geo-query results may enforce weaker levels of location privacy. Towards this end, we explore a formal location privacy principle designed to capture arbitrary similarity between locations, be it distance, or the number of objects common in their result sets. We propose a composite privacy mechanism that performs probabilistic cloaking and exponentially weighted sampling to provide coarse grain location hiding within a tunable area, and finer privacy guarantees under the principle inside this area. We present extensive empirical evidence to supplement claims on the effectiveness of the approach, along with comparative results to assert the stronger privacy guarantees.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要移动生态系统是由越来越多的位置感知应用程序驱动的。 因此，已经提出了许多位置隐私模型，以防止位置痕迹中敏感信息的不必要推断。 这些模型的主要重点是确保隐私机制确实可以检索最接近地理的结果。 但是，在大多数情况下，使用距离和重要性数据的组合对地理疑要结果进行了排名，从而产生了定期平坦的结果景观，并非总是由距离决定。 一个不利用这种地理疑要结果结构的隐私模型可能会强制执行较弱的位置隐私级别。 为此，我们探索了一个正式的位置隐私原则，旨在捕获位置之间的任意相似性，无论是距离还是结果集中常见的对象数量。 我们提出了一种复合隐私机制，该机制执行概率披肩和成倍加权采样，以提供隐藏在可调区域内的粗晶粒位置，并根据该区域内部的原理保证了更精细的隐私性。 我们提供了广泛的经验证据，以补充有关方法有效性的主张，以及比较结果，以主张更强的隐私保证。
papers.title_zh: 基于排名的地理查询系统的位置隐私

papers.title: Why Privacy Is All But Forgotten
papers.authors: Kovila P. L. Coopamootoo, Thomas Groß
papers.abstract: Abstract Privacy and sharing are believed to share a dynamic and dialectical tension, where individuals have competing needs to be both open and closed in contact with others [8]. Online, technology can impact this dynamic process [68]. Indeed, a number of researchers observed that users’ stated privacy attitude do not match their behavior [2, 3, 23, 30, 64, 81]. In these studies privacy attitude is compared with behavior via a number of concepts related to privacy. While it is known in psychology that attitudes are multidimensional constructs [10, 15, 76], the question arises whether the user ambivalence with regards to privacy is due to different or contradictory cognitive and affective components of privacy and sharing attitude. We conducted an empirical study to investigate the difference between privacy attitude and sharing attitude. A US sample of N = 60 MTurk workers was assigned to two groups and asked to describe in a 250-word free-form response what [privacy/sharing] online means for them. Responses were coded in quantitative content analysis. The presence and frequency of codes were compared across conditions. Emotions and relationships to other parties were evaluated as predictors for a discriminative logistic regression classifying both attitudes. We found that privacy and sharing attitude differ significantly across a number of the extracted codes. Participants in privacy attitude were significantly more likely to express fear and significantly less likely to express happiness. For sharing attitude the reverse is true. We found that a discriminant logistic regression on a tone analysis of the participants’ responses offers excellent discrimination between privacy and sharing attitude. We cross-validated this classifier with another sample of N′ = 54. The observed differences contribute an understanding of user states in privacy (and sharing) situations online and has implications for both privacy research and practice.
papers.abstract_zh: 据信抽象的隐私和共享分享具有动态和辩证法的张力，个人有竞争需要开放和关闭，并与他人接触[8]。 在线技术会影响这个动态过程[68]。 确实，许多研究人员观察到用户的隐私态度与他们的行为不符[2，3，23，30，64，81]。 在这些研究中，通过与隐私有关的许多概念将隐私态度与行为进行了比较。 虽然心理学在心理学中众所周知，态度是多维结构[10，15，76]，但出现的问题是否是由于隐私的不同或矛盾的隐私和共享态度的矛盾性是由于不同或矛盾的认知和情感成分。 我们进行了一项实证研究，以研究隐私态度和共享态度之间的差异。 美国n = 60 mturk工人的样本被分配给两个小组，并要求在250字的自由响应中描述[隐私/共享]在线对他们的含义。 响应在定量含量分析中编码。 比较了代码的存在和频率。 将情绪和与其他各方的关系评估为歧视逻辑回归的预测指标，将两种态度分类为分类。 我们发现，在许多提取的代码中，隐私和共享态度有很大差异。 隐私态度的参与者表达恐惧的可能性更大，表达幸福的可能性明显较小。 为了分享态度，相反是真的。 我们发现，对参与者回答的语调分析进行判别逻辑回归，可以在隐私和共享态度之间进行极好的歧视。 我们将该分类器与N'= 54的另一个样本进行了交叉验证。观察到的差异有助于了解在线隐私（和共享）情况下的用户状态，并且对隐私研究和实践都有影响。
papers.title_zh: 为什么隐私几乎被遗忘了

papers.title: To Permit or Not to Permit, That is the Usability Question: Crowdsourcing Mobile Apps' Privacy Permission Settings
papers.authors: Qatrunnada Ismail, Tousif Ahmed, Kelly Caine, Apu Kapadia, Michael K. Reiter
papers.abstract: Abstract Millions of apps available to smartphone owners request various permissions to resources on the devices including sensitive data such as location and contact information. Disabling permissions for sensitive resources could improve privacy but can also impact the usability of apps in ways users may not be able to predict. We study an efficient approach that ascertains the impact of disabling permissions on the usability of apps through large-scale, crowdsourced user testing with the ultimate goal of making recommendations to users about which permissions can be disabled for improved privacy without sacrificing usability. We replicate and significantly extend previous analysis that showed the promise of a crowdsourcing approach where crowd workers test and report back on various configurations of an app. Through a large, between-subjects user experiment, our work provides insight into the impact of removing permissions within and across different apps (our participants tested three apps: Facebook Messenger (N=218), Instagram (N=227), and Twitter (N=110)). We study the impact of removing various permissions within and across apps, and we discover that it is possible to increase user privacy by disabling app permissions while also maintaining app usability.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象的数百万个应用程序可用于智能手机所有者的应用程序，要求对设备上的资源进行各种权限，包括敏感数据，例如位置和联系信息。 禁用敏感资源的权限可以改善隐私权，但也可能以用户无法预测的方式影响应用程序的可用性。 我们研究了一种有效的方法，该方法通过大规模的众包用户测试确定禁用权限对应用程序可用性的影响，其最终目标是向用户向用户提供建议，以提高哪些权限，以改善隐私而不牺牲可用性。 我们复制并显着扩展了先前的分析，该分析表明了人群工人测试并报告应用程序的各种配置的希望。 通过大型主题间用户实验，我们的工作提供了有关删除不同应用程序内部和跨不同应用程序权限的影响的洞察力（我们的参与者测试了三个应用程序：Facebook Messenger（n = 218），Instagram（n = 227）和Twitter（Twitter）（ n = 110））。 我们研究了在应用程序内部和跨应用程序内部和跨应用程序中删除各种权限的影响，我们发现可以通过禁用应用程序权限的同时维护应用程序可用性来提高用户隐私。
papers.title_zh: 允许还是不允许，这是一个可用性问题:众包移动应用的隐私权限设置

papers.title: Expectation-Maximization Tensor Factorization for Practical Location Privacy Attacks
papers.authors: Takao Murakami
papers.abstract: Abstract Location privacy attacks based on a Markov chain model have been widely studied to de-anonymize or de-obfuscate mobility traces. An adversary can perform various kinds of location privacy attacks using a personalized transition matrix, which is trained for each target user. However, the amount of training data available to the adversary can be very small, since many users do not disclose much location information in their daily lives. In addition, many locations can be missing from the training traces, since many users do not disclose their locations continuously but rather sporadically. In this paper, we show that the Markov chain model can be a threat even in this realistic situation. Specifically, we focus on a training phase (i.e. mobility profile building phase) and propose Expectation-Maximization Tensor Factorization (EMTF), which alternates between computing a distribution of missing locations (E-step) and computing personalized transition matrices via tensor factorization (M-step). Since the time complexity of EMTF is exponential in the number of missing locations, we propose two approximate learning methods, one of which uses the Viterbi algorithm while the other uses the Forward Filtering Backward Sampling (FFBS) algorithm. We apply our learning methods to a de-anonymization attack and a localization attack, and evaluate them using three real datasets. The results show that our learning methods significantly outperform a random guess, even when there is only one training trace composed of 10 locations per user, and each location is missing with probability 80% (i.e. even when users hardly disclose two temporally-continuous locations).
papers.abstract_zh: 基于马尔可夫链模型的抽象位置隐私攻击已被广泛研究，以取消匿名化或脱离弹性移动性痕迹。 对手可以使用个性化的过渡矩阵进行各种位置隐私攻击，该矩阵对每个目标用户进行培训。 但是，对手可用的培训数据数量可能很小，因为许多用户在日常生活中没有披露太多位置信息。 此外，训练轨迹可能会丢失许多位置，因为许多用户不会连续披露其位置，却是零星的。 在本文中，我们表明，即使在这种现实情况下，马尔可夫链模型也可能是威胁。 具体而言，我们关注训练阶段（即移动性概况构建阶段），并提出了期望最大化张量分解（EMTF），该分解在计算缺失位置（E-step）的分布和计算个性化的过渡矩阵之间交替（M -步）。 由于EMTF的时间复杂性在缺失位置的数量中是指数级的，因此我们提出了两种近似学习方法，其中一种使用Viterbi算法，而另一个使用前向后滤波向后采样（FFBS）算法。 我们将学习方法应用于匿名化攻击和本地化攻击，并使用三个真实数据集对其进行评估。 结果表明，即使只有一个由每个用户组成10个位置的训练轨迹，我们的学习方法也大大胜过随机的猜测，并且概率为80％（即，即使用户几乎没有披露两个时间上连续的位置） 。
papers.title_zh: 实际位置隐私攻击的期望最大化张量分解

papers.title: What Does The Crowd Say About You? Evaluating Aggregation-based Location Privacy
papers.authors: Apostolos Pyrgelis, Carmela Troncoso, Emiliano De Cristofaro
papers.abstract: Abstract Information about people’s movements and the locations they visit enables an increasing number of mobility analytics applications, e.g., in the context of urban and transportation planning, In this setting, rather than collecting or sharing raw data, entities often use aggregation as a privacy protection mechanism, aiming to hide individual users’ location traces. Furthermore, to bound information leakage from the aggregates, they can perturb the input of the aggregation or its output to ensure that these are differentially private. In this paper, we set to evaluate the impact of releasing aggregate location time-series on the privacy of individuals contributing to the aggregation. We introduce a framework allowing us to reason about privacy against an adversary attempting to predict users’ locations or recover their mobility patterns. We formalize these attacks as inference problems, and discuss a few strategies to model the adversary’s prior knowledge based on the information she may have access to. We then use the framework to quantify the privacy loss stemming from aggregate location data, with and without the protection of differential privacy, using two real-world mobility datasets. We find that aggregates do leak information about individuals’ punctual locations and mobility profiles. The density of the observations, as well as timing, play important roles, e.g., regular patterns during peak hours are better protected than sporadic movements. Finally, our evaluation shows that both output and input perturbation offer little additional protection, unless they introduce large amounts of noise ultimately destroying the utility of the data.
papers.abstract_zh: 有关人们的运动及其访问地点的摘要信息，可以使越来越多的移动性分析应用程序，例如，在城市和运输计划的背景下，在这种情况下，而不是收集或共享原始数据，实体经常将汇总用作隐私保护 机制，旨在隐藏单个用户的位置轨迹。 此外，要绑定了从聚合物中泄漏的信息，它们可以扰动聚合或其输出的输入，以确保它们是私密的。 在本文中，我们着手评估释放总定位时间序列对促成聚集的个人隐私的影响。 我们介绍了一个框架，使我们能够对隐私进行推理，以防止试图预测用户位置或恢复其移动性模式的对手。 我们将这些攻击正式为推理问题，并讨论了一些策略，以根据她可能可以访问的信息来建模对手的先验知识。 然后，我们使用框架来使用两个现实世界中的移动性数据集量化来自汇总位置数据的隐私损失。 我们发现，聚合确实会泄漏有关个人守时位置和移动性概况的信息。 观察值的密度以及时间扮演着重要的作用，例如，高峰时段的常规模式比零星运动更好。 最后，我们的评估表明，输出和输入扰动几乎没有其他保护，除非它们引入大量噪声最终破坏了数据的效用。
papers.title_zh: 观众对你有什么看法？评估基于聚合的位置隐私

papers.title: Private Set Intersection for Unequal Set Sizes with Mobile Applications
papers.authors: Ágnes Kiss, Jian Liu, Thomas Schneider, N. Asokan, Benny Pinkas
papers.abstract: Abstract Private set intersection (PSI) is a cryptographic technique that is applicable to many privacy-sensitive scenarios. For decades, researchers have been focusing on improving its efficiency in both communication and computation. However, most of the existing solutions are inefficient for an unequal number of inputs, which is common in conventional client-server settings. In this paper, we analyze and optimize the efficiency of existing PSI protocols to support precomputation so that they can efficiently deal with such input sets. We transform four existing PSI protocols into the precomputation form such that in the setup phase the communication is linear only in the size of the larger input set, while in the online phase the communication is linear in the size of the smaller input set. We implement all four protocols and run experiments between two PCs and between a PC and a smartphone and give a systematic comparison of their performance. Our experiments show that a protocol based on securely evaluating a garbled AES circuit achieves the fastest setup time by several orders of magnitudes, and the fastest online time in the PC setting where AES-NI acceleration is available. In the mobile setting, the fastest online time is achieved by a protocol based on the Diffie-Hellman assumption.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象的私人集交叉点（PSI）是一种适用于许多隐私敏感场景的加密技术。 几十年来，研究人员一直专注于提高其在通信和计算方面的效率。 但是，大多数现有解决方案对于不平等数量的输入效率低下，这在常规客户端服务器设置中很常见。 在本文中，我们分析并优化了现有PSI协议的效率，以支持预约，以便它们可以有效地处理此类输入集。 我们将四个现有的PSI协议转换为预先计算形式，以便在设置阶段中，通信仅在较大的输入集的大小上是线性的，而在在线阶段，通信在较小的输入集的大小上是线性的。 我们实施了所有四个协议，并在两台PC之间以及PC和智能手机之间进行实验，并对其性能进行系统的比较。 我们的实验表明，基于安全评估AES电路的协议可以通过几个幅度订单来实现最快的设置时间，并且在PC设置中最快的在线时间可以实现AES-NI加速度的最快在线时间。 在移动设置中，最快的在线时间是通过基于Diffie-Hellman假设的协议来实现的。
papers.title_zh: 用于具有移动应用的不相等集合大小的私有集合交集

papers.title: Two Is Not Enough: Privacy Assessment of Aggregation Schemes in Smart Metering
papers.authors: Niklas Büscher, Spyros Boukoros, Stefan Bauregger, Stefan Katzenbeisser
papers.abstract: Abstract The widespread deployment of smart meters that frequently report energy consumption information, is a known threat to consumers’ privacy. Many promising privacy protection mechanisms based on secure aggregation schemes have been proposed. Even though these schemes are cryptographically secure, the energy provider has access to the plaintext aggregated power consumption. A privacy trade-off exists between the size of the aggregation scheme and the personal data that might be leaked, where smaller aggregation sizes leak more personal data. Recently, a UK industrial body has studied this privacy trade-off and identified that two smart meters forming an aggregate, are sufficient to achieve privacy. In this work, we challenge this study and investigate which aggregation sizes are sufficient to achieve privacy in the smart grid. Therefore, we propose a flexible, yet formal privacy metric using a cryptographic game based definition. Studying publicly-available, real world energy consumption datasets with various temporal resolutions, ranging from minutes to hourly intervals, we show that a typical household can be identified with very high probability. For example, we observe a 50% advantage over random guessing in identifying households for an aggregation size of 20 households with a 15-minutes reporting interval. Furthermore, our results indicate that single appliances can be identified with significant probability in aggregation sizes up to 10 households.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要经常报告能源消耗信息的智能电表的广泛部署是对消费者隐私的已知威胁。 已经提出了许多基于安全汇总计划的有前途的隐私保护机制。 即使这些方案在密码上是密码的，但能源提供商仍可以访问明文汇总的功耗。 隐私权衡位于聚合方案的大小与可能被泄漏的个人数据之间存在，较小的聚合大小泄漏了更多的个人数据。 最近，一个英国工业机构研究了这种隐私权衡权衡，并确定两个形成总体的智能仪表足以实现隐私。 在这项工作中，我们挑战这项研究并研究哪些聚合大小足以在智能电网中获得隐私。 因此，我们使用基于加密游戏的定义提出了一个灵活但正式的隐私指标。 通过各种时间分辨率研究公共可用的现实世界能源消耗数据集，范围从分钟到每小时的时间间隔，我们表明可以以很高的可能性来识别典型的家庭。 例如，我们观察到比随机猜测的50％优势在识别20个家庭的聚合大小为15分钟的报告间隔时的聚合大小。 此外，我们的结果表明，可以在多达10个家庭的聚合大小中识别单个电器的可能性很大。
papers.title_zh: 两个还不够:智能计量中聚合方案的隐私评估

papers.title: Bayes, not Naïve: Security Bounds on Website Fingerprinting Defenses
papers.authors: Giovanni Cherubin
papers.abstract: Abstract Website Fingerprinting (WF) attacks raise major concerns about users’ privacy. They employ Machine Learning (ML) techniques to allow a local passive adversary to uncover the Web browsing behavior of a user, even if she browses through an encrypted tunnel (e.g. Tor, VPN). Numerous defenses have been proposed in the past; however, it is typically difficult to have formal guarantees on their security, which is most often evaluated empirically against state-of-the-art attacks. In this paper, we present a practical method to derive security bounds for any WF defense, where the bounds depend on a chosen feature set. This result derives from reducing WF attacks to an ML classification task, where we can determine the smallest achievable error (the Bayes error). Such error can be estimated in practice, and is a lower bound for a WF adversary, for any classification algorithm he may use. Our work has two main consequences: i) it allows determining the security of WF defenses, in a black-box manner, with respect to the state-of-the-art feature set and ii) it favors shifting the focus of future WF research to identifying optimal feature sets. The generality of this approach further suggests that the method could be used to define security bounds for other ML-based attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要网站指纹（WF）攻击引起了对用户隐私的主要关注点。 他们采用机器学习（ML）技术来允许当地的被动对手发现用户的Web浏览行为，即使她浏览了加密的隧道（例如TOR，VPN）。 过去已经提出了许多防御。 但是，通常很难对其安全性进行正式保证，这通常是针对最新攻击的经验评估。 在本文中，我们提出了一种实用方法，以得出任何WF防御的安全界限，其中界限取决于所选功能集。 该结果源于将WF攻击减少到ML分类任务，在此我们可以确定最小的可实现错误（贝叶斯错误）。 可以在实践中估算此类错误，并且是WF对手的下限，对于他可能使用的任何分类算法。 我们的工作有两个主要的后果：i）允许以黑盒方式确定WF防御的安全性，相对于最先进的功能集，ii）有利于改变未来WF研究的重点 识别最佳功能集。 这种方法的一般性进一步表明该方法可用于为其他基于ML的攻击定义安全界限。
papers.title_zh: 贝叶斯，不是天真:网站指纹防御的安全界限

papers.title: UnLynx: A Decentralized System for Privacy-Conscious Data Sharing
papers.authors: David Froelicher, Patricia Egger, João Sá Sousa, Jean Louis Raisaro, Zhicong Huang, Christian Mouchet, Bryan Ford, Jean-Pierre Hubaux
papers.abstract: Abstract Current solutions for privacy-preserving data sharing among multiple parties either depend on a centralized authority that must be trusted and provides only weakest-link security (e.g., the entity that manages private/secret cryptographic keys), or leverage on decentralized but impractical approaches (e.g., secure multi-party computation). When the data to be shared are of a sensitive nature and the number of data providers is high, these solutions are not appropriate. Therefore, we present UnLynx, a new decentralized system for efficient privacy-preserving data sharing. We consider m servers that constitute a collective authority whose goal is to verifiably compute on data sent from n data providers. UnLynx guarantees the confidentiality, unlinkability between data providers and their data, privacy of the end result and the correctness of computations by the servers. Furthermore, to support differentially private queries, UnLynx can collectively add noise under encryption. All of this is achieved through a combination of a set of new distributed and secure protocols that are based on homomorphic cryptography, verifiable shuffling and zero-knowledge proofs. UnLynx is highly parallelizable and modular by design as it enables multiple security/privacy vs. runtime tradeoffs. Our evaluation shows that UnLynx can execute a secure survey on 400,000 personal data records containing 5 encrypted attributes, distributed over 20 independent databases, for a total of 2,000,000 ciphertexts, in 24 minutes.
papers.abstract_zh: 多个各方之间针对隐私数据共享的抽象当前解决方案要么取决于必须信任的集中权威，并且仅提供最弱的链接安全性（例如，管理私人/秘密加密密钥的实体），或者对分散但不切实际的方法进行杠杆作用 （例如，安全的多方计算）。 当要共享的数据具有敏感性质并且数据提供商的数量很高时，这些解决方案是不合适的。 因此，我们提出了Unlynx，这是一种新的分散系统，用于有效地保护隐私数据共享。 我们考虑构成集体权威的M服务器，其目标是确切地计算从N数据提供商发送的数据。 Unlynx保证数据提供商及其数据之间的机密性，无链性，最终结果的隐私以及服务器的计算正确性。 此外，为了支持不同的私有查询，Unlynx可以集体添加加密下的噪声。 所有这些都是通过基于同构密码学，可验证的改组和零知识证明的一组新的分布式和安全协议的组合来实现的。 Unlynx是高度可行的，并且按设计模块化，因为它可以实现多个安全/隐私与运行时折衷方案。 我们的评估表明，Unlynx可以在400,000个个人数据记录上执行安全调查，其中包含5个加密属性，分布在20个独立数据库中，共24分钟，总计2,000,000个密文。
papers.title_zh: UnLynx:一个关注隐私的数据共享的分散系统

papers.title: Fingerprinting Keywords in Search Queries over Tor
papers.authors: Se Eun Oh, Shuai Li, Nicholas Hopper
papers.abstract: Abstract Search engine queries contain a great deal of private and potentially compromising information about users. One technique to prevent search engines from identifying the source of a query, and Internet service providers (ISPs) from identifying the contents of queries is to query the search engine over an anonymous network such as Tor. In this paper, we study the extent to which Website Fingerprinting can be extended to fingerprint individual queries or keywords to web applications, a task we call Keyword Fingerprinting (KF). We show that by augmenting traffic analysis using a two-stage approach with new task-specific feature sets, a passive network adversary can in many cases defeat the use of Tor to protect search engine queries. We explore three popular search engines, Google, Bing, and Duckduckgo, and several machine learning techniques with various experimental scenarios. Our experimental results show that KF can identify Google queries containing one of 300 targeted keywords with recall of 80% and precision of 91%, while identifying the specific monitored keyword among 300 search keywords with accuracy 48%. We also further investigate the factors that contribute to keyword fingerprintability to understand how search engines and users might protect against KF.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象搜索引擎查询包含大量有关用户的私人且潜在的损害信息。 一种防止搜索引擎识别查询源的技术，以及互联网服务提供商（ISP）识别查询内容的一种技术是通过像TOR这样的匿名网络查询搜索引擎。 在本文中，我们研究了可以将网站指纹识别扩展到指纹单个查询或关键字的程度，该任务是我们称之为关键字指纹识别（KF）的任务。 我们表明，通过使用具有新的特定任务功能集的两阶段方法来增强流量分析，在许多情况下，被动网络对手可以击败使用TOR来保护搜索引擎查询。 我们探索了三台流行的搜索引擎，Google，Bing和DuckDuckgo，以及几种具有各种实验场景的机器学习技术。 我们的实验结果表明，KF可以识别包含300个目标关键字之一的Google查询，召回80％和91％的精度，同时识别300个搜索关键字的特定监视关键字，准确度为48％。 我们还进一步研究了有助于关键字指纹的因素，以了解搜索引擎和用户如何防止KF。
papers.title_zh: Tor上搜索查询中的关键词指纹识别

papers.title: Personalized Pseudonyms for Servers in the Cloud
papers.authors: Qiuyu Xiao, Michael K. Reiter, Yinqian Zhang
papers.abstract: Abstract A considerable and growing fraction of servers, especially of web servers, is hosted in compute clouds. In this paper we opportunistically leverage this trend to improve privacy of clients from network attackers residing between the clients and the cloud: We design a system that can be deployed by the cloud operator to prevent a network adversary from determining which of the cloud’s tenant servers a client is accessing. The core innovation in our design is a PoPSiCl (pronounced “popsicle”), a persistent pseudonym for a tenant server that can be used by a single client to access the server, whose real identity is protected by the cloud from both passive and active network attackers. When instantiated for TLS-based access to web servers, our design works with all major browsers and requires no additional client-side software and minimal changes to the client user experience. Moreover, changes to tenant servers can be hidden in supporting software (operating systems and web-programming frameworks) without imposing on web-content development. Perhaps most notably, our system boosts privacy with minimal impact to web-browsing performance, after some initial setup during a user’s first access to each web server.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要在计算云中托管了大量且不断增长的服务器，尤其是Web服务器的服务器。 在本文中，我们有机会地利用这种趋势来提高客户与云之间的网络攻击者的隐私：我们设计了一个可以由云操作员部署的系统，以防止网络对手确定云的租户服务器的哪个 客户正在访问。 我们设计中的核心创新是popsicl（发音为“冰棒”），这是一个持续的租户服务器的持续性化名，可以由单个客户端使用来访问服务器，其真实身份受被动和活动网络的云保护。 攻击者。 当实例化基于TLS的Web服务器访问时，我们的设计与所有主要浏览器一起使用，并且不需要其他客户端软件，并且对客户端用户体验的更改最小。 此外，对租户服务器的更改可以隐藏在支持软件（操作系统和网络编程框架）中，而无需强加于Web-Content开发。 也许最值得注意的是，在用户首次访问每个Web服务器的初始设置之后，我们的系统对Web浏览性能的影响最小。
papers.title_zh: 云中服务器的个性化假名

papers.title: TagIt: Tagging Network Flows using Blind Fingerprints
papers.authors: Fatemeh Rezaei, Amir Houmansadr
papers.abstract: Abstract Flow fingerprinting is a mechanism for linking obfuscated network flows at large scale. In this paper, we introduce the first blind flow fingerprinting system called TagIt. Our system works by modulating fingerprint signals into the timing patterns of network flows through slightly delaying packets into secret time intervals only known to the fingerprinting parties. We design TagIt to to enable reliable fingerprint extraction by legitimate fingerprinting parties despite natural network noise, but invisible to an adversary who does not possess the secret fingerprinting key. TagIt makes use of randomization to resist various detection attacks such as multi-flow attacks. We evaluate the performance and invisibility of TagIt through theoretical analysis as well as simulations and experimentation on live network flows.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象流动指纹识别是将混淆的网络流大规模链接的机制。 在本文中，我们介绍了名为Tagit的第一个盲流指纹系统。 我们的系统通过将指纹信号调节到网络流的时机流量中，通过将数据包稍微延迟到秘密时间间隔中，只有指纹各方已知。 我们设计标记以通过自然网络噪声来启用合法指纹方的可靠指纹提取，但对于不具备秘密指纹钥匙的对手来说是看不见的。 Tagit利用随机化来抵抗各种检测攻击，例如多流动攻击。 我们通过理论分析以及对实时网络流的模拟和实验来评估Tagit的性能和隐形性。
papers.title_zh: TagIt:使用盲指纹标记网络流

papers.title: Efficient Utility Improvement for Location Privacy
papers.authors: Konstantinos Chatzikokolakis, Ehab ElSalamouny, Catuscia Palamidessi
papers.abstract: Abstract The continuously increasing use of location-based services poses an important threat to the privacy of users. A natural defense is to employ an obfuscation mechanism, such as those providing geo-indistinguishability, a framework for obtaining formal privacy guarantees that has become popular in recent years. Ideally, one would like to employ an optimal obfuscation mechanism, providing the best utility among those satisfying the required privacy level. In theory optimal mechanisms can be constructed via linear programming. In practice, however, this is only feasible for a radically small number of locations. As a consequence, all known applications of geo-indistinguishability simply use noise drawn from a planar Laplace distribution. In this work, we study methods for substantially improving the utility of location obfuscation, while maintaining practical applicability as a main goal. We provide such solutions for both infinite (continuous or discrete) as well as large but finite domains of locations, using a Bayesian remapping procedure as a key ingredient. We evaluate our techniques in two real world complete datasets, without any restriction on the evaluation area, and show important utility improvements with respect to the standard planar Laplace approach.
