papers.abstract_zh: 摘要基于位置的服务不断增加的使用对用户的隐私构成了重要的威胁。 一种自然的辩护是采用一种混淆机制，例如提供地理独立性的机制，这是获得近年来正式隐私保证的框架。 理想情况下，人们希望采用最佳的混淆机制，在满足所需的隐私水平的人们中提供最佳的效用。 从理论上讲，最佳机制可以通过线性编程构建。 但是，实际上，这仅对于少数位置的位置才是可行的。 因此，所有已知的地理性可区分性应用都可以使用平面拉普拉斯分布中抽出的噪声。 在这项工作中，我们研究了基本改善位置混淆效用的方法，同时将实际适用性作为主要目标。 我们使用贝叶斯重新映射程序作为关键成分，为无限（连续或离散）以及大型但有限的位置域提供了这种解决方案。 我们在两个现实世界完整数据集中评估了我们的技术，而无需对评估领域进行任何限制，并就标准的平面拉普拉斯方法显示了重要的效用改进。
papers.title_zh: 位置隐私的有效效用改进

papers.title: Certificate Transparency with Privacy
papers.authors: Saba Eskandarian, Eran Messeri, Joseph Bonneau, Dan Boneh
papers.abstract: Abstract Certificate transparency (CT) is an elegant mechanism designed to detect when a certificate authority (CA) has issued a certificate incorrectly. Many CAs now support CT and it is being actively deployed in browsers. However, a number of privacy-related challenges remain. In this paper we propose practical solutions to two issues. First, we develop a mechanism that enables web browsers to audit a CT log without violating user privacy. Second, we extend CT to support non-public subdomains.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象证书透明度（CT）是一种优雅的机制，旨在检测证书授权（CA）何时发布证书。 现在，许多CAS支持CT，并且正在积极部署浏览器。 但是，仍然存在许多与隐私有关的挑战。 在本文中，我们提出了两个问题的实用解决方案。 首先，我们开发了一种机制，该机制使Web浏览器能够在不违反用户隐私的情况下审核CT日志。 其次，我们扩展CT以支持非公共子域。
papers.title_zh: 带有隐私的证书透明性

papers.title: Privacy-Preserving Distributed Linear Regression on High-Dimensional Data
papers.authors: Adrià Gascón, Phillipp Schoppmann, Borja Balle, Mariana Raykova, Jack Doerner, Samee Zahur, David Evans
papers.abstract: Abstract We propose privacy-preserving protocols for computing linear regression models, in the setting where the training dataset is vertically distributed among several parties. Our main contribution is a hybrid multi-party computation protocol that combines Yao’s garbled circuits with tailored protocols for computing inner products. Like many machine learning tasks, building a linear regression model involves solving a system of linear equations. We conduct a comprehensive evaluation and comparison of different techniques for securely performing this task, including a new Conjugate Gradient Descent (CGD) algorithm. This algorithm is suitable for secure computation because it uses an efficient fixed-point representation of real numbers while maintaining accuracy and convergence rates comparable to what can be obtained with a classical solution using floating point numbers. Our technique improves on Nikolaenko et al.’s method for privacy-preserving ridge regression (S&P 2013), and can be used as a building block in other analyses. We implement a complete system and demonstrate that our approach is highly scalable, solving data analysis problems with one million records and one hundred features in less than one hour of total running time.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要我们建议在计算线性回归模型的情况下，在训练数据集在几个方之间垂直分布的环境中。 我们的主要贡献是一种混合多方计算协议，该协议将Yao的乱码电路与用于计算内部产品的量身定制的协议相结合。 像许多机器学习任务一样，构建线性回归模型涉及求解线性方程系统。 我们进行了全面的评估和比较不同的技术，以安全执行此任务，包括新的共轭梯度下降（CGD）算法。 该算法适用于安全计算，因为它使用了实数的有效定点表示，同时保持准确性和收敛速率可与使用浮点数使用经典解决方案获得的准确性和收敛速率相当。 我们的技术改进了Nikolaenko等人的隐私山脊回归方法（S＆P 2013），可以用作其他分析的基础。 我们实施了一个完整的系统，并证明我们的方法是高度可扩展的，可以在不到一百万个记录和一百个功能的情况下解决数据分析问题，不到一小时的总运行时间。
papers.title_zh: 高维数据上保护隐私的分布式线性回归

papers.title: A Study of MAC Address Randomization in Mobile Devices and When it Fails
papers.authors: Jeremy Martin, Travis Mayberry, Collin Donahue, Lucas Foppe, Lamont Brown, Chadwick Riggins, Erik C. Rye, Dane Brown
papers.abstract: Abstract Media Access Control (MAC) address randomization is a privacy technique whereby mobile devices rotate through random hardware addresses in order to prevent observers from singling out their traffic or physical location from other nearby devices. Adoption of this technology, however, has been sporadic and varied across device manufacturers. In this paper, we present the first wide-scale study of MAC address randomization in the wild, including a detailed breakdown of different randomization techniques by operating system, manufacturer, and model of device. We then identify multiple flaws in these implementations which can be exploited to defeat randomization as performed by existing devices. First, we show that devices commonly make improper use of randomization by sending wireless frames with the true, global address when they should be using a randomized address. We move on to extend the passive identification techniques of Vanhoef et al. to effectively defeat randomization in ~96% of Android phones. Finally, we identify a previously unknown flaw in the way wireless chipsets handle low-level control frames which applies to 100% of devices we tested. This flaw permits an active attack that can be used under certain circumstances to track any existing wireless device.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象媒体访问控制（MAC）地址随机化是一种隐私技术，移动设备通过随机硬件地址旋转，以防止观察者从附近的其他设备中挑出其流量或物理位置。 然而，这项技术的采用是零星的，并且在设备制造商的各个方面都有不同。 在本文中，我们介绍了野外MAC地址随机化的首次大规模研究，包括通过操作系统，制造商和设备模型对不同随机技术的详细分解。 然后，我们确定这些实现中的多个缺陷，可以利用这些缺陷来击败现有设备执行的随机化。 首先，我们表明设备通常通过在应使用随机地址时发送带有真实全局地址的无线框架来不当使用随机化。 我们继续扩展Vanhoef等人的被动识别技术。 有效地在约96％的Android手机中击败随机化。 最后，我们确定了一个以前未知的缺陷，无线芯片组处理低级控制帧的方式，该框架适用于我们测试的100％的设备。 该缺陷允许在某些情况下使用的主动攻击来跟踪任何现有的无线设备。
papers.title_zh: 移动设备中的MAC地址随机化及其失败时的研究

papers.title: Provably Secure Anonymous-yet-Accountable Crowdsensing with Scalable Sublinear Revocation
papers.authors: Sazzadur Rahaman, Long Cheng, Danfeng Daphne Yao, He Li, Jung-Min "Jerry" Park
papers.abstract: Abstract Group signature schemes enable anonymous-yet-accountable communications. Such a capability is extremely useful for applications, such as smartphone-based crowdsensing and citizen science. However, the performance of modern group signature schemes is still inadequate to manage large dynamic groups. In this paper, we design the first provably secure verifier-local revocation (VLR) - based group signature scheme that supports sublinear revocation, named Sublinear Revocation with Backward unlinkability and Exculpability (SRBE). To achieve this performance gain, SRBE introduces time bound pseudonyms for the signer. By introducing low-cost short-lived pseudonyms with sublinear revocation checking, SRBE drastically improves the efficiency of the group-signature primitive. The backward-unlinkable anonymity of SRBE guarantees that even after the revocation of a signer, her previously generated signatures remain unlinkable across epochs. This behavior favors the dynamic nature of real-world crowdsensing settings. We prove its security and discuss parameters that influence its scalability. Using SRBE, we also implement a prototype named GroupSense for anonymous-yet-accountable crowdsensing, where our experimental findings confirm GroupSense’s scalability. We point out the open problems remaining in this space.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象组签名方案启用了匿名召集的通信。 这样的功能对于应用程序（例如基于智能手机的人群和公民科学）非常有用。 但是，现代组签名方案的表现仍然不足以管理大型动态群体。 在本文中，我们设计了第一个可证明安全的验证者 - 本地撤销（VLR） - 基于组的组签名方案，该方案支持sublinear撤销，称为Sublinear撤销，并以向后的无链接性和剥夺性（SRBE）（SRBE）。 为了达到这一性能增长，SRBE引入了签名者的时间绑定的假名。 通过引入具有sublinear撤销检查的低成本短期假名，SRBE极大地提高了组签名原始的效率。 SRBE的向后无意义的匿名性保证，即使在签名者撤销后，她以前生成的签名在整个时期仍然无法链接。 这种行为有利于现实世界众包设置的动态性质。 我们证明其安全性并讨论影响其可扩展性的参数。 使用SRBE，我们还针对匿名召集人的人群来实施一个名为GroupSense的原型，我们的实验发现证实了GroupSense的可扩展性。 我们指出该空间中剩下的开放问题。
papers.title_zh: 具有可扩展次线性撤销的可证明安全的匿名但可问责的众测

papers.title: Systematizing Decentralization and Privacy: Lessons from 15 Years of Research and Deployments
papers.authors: Carmela Troncoso, Marios Isaakidis, George Danezis, Harry Halpin
papers.abstract: Abstract Decentralized systems are a subset of distributed systems where multiple authorities control different components and no authority is fully trusted by all. This implies that any component in a decentralized system is potentially adversarial. We revise fifteen years of research on decentralization and privacy, and provide an overview of key systems, as well as key insights for designers of future systems. We show that decentralized designs can enhance privacy, integrity, and availability but also require careful trade-offs in terms of system complexity, properties provided, and degree of decentralization. These trade-offs need to be understood and navigated by designers. We argue that a combination of insights from cryptography, distributed systems, and mechanism design, aligned with the development of adequate incentives, are necessary to build scalable and successful privacy-preserving decentralized systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象分散系统是分布式系统的子集，其中多个当局控制不同的组件，并且所有人都没有完全信任所有人。 这意味着分散系统中的任何组件都可能是对手。 我们修改了十五年的权力下放和隐私研究，并概述了关键系统，以及对未来系统设计师的关键见解。 我们表明，分散设计可以增强隐私，完整性和可用性，但还需要在系统复杂性，提供的属性和权力下放程度方面进行仔细的权衡。 这些权衡需要由设计师理解和导航。 我们认为，从密码学，分布式系统和机制设计中的见解结合在一起，与足够的激励措施的发展是一致的，对于构建可扩展和成功的隐私分散系统是必不可少的。
papers.title_zh: 系统化去中心化和隐私:15年研究和部署的教训

2018.journals_title: Proceedings on Privacy Enhancing Technologies, Volume 2018

papers.title: Editors' Introduction
papers.authors: Kostas Chatzikokolakis, Aaron Johnson
papers.abstract: Is there currently a crisis of confidence in psychological science reflecting an unprecedented level of doubt among practitioners about the reliability of research findings in the field? It would certainly appear that there is. These doubts emerged and grew as a series of unhappy events unfolded in 2011: the Diederik Stapel fraud case (see Stroebe, Postmes, & Spears, 2012, this issue), the publication in a major social psychology journal of an article purporting to show evidence of extrasensory perception (Bem, 2011) followed by widespread public mockery (see Galak, LeBoeuf, Nelson, & Simmons, in press; Wagenmakers, Wetzels, Borsboom, & van der Maas, 2011), reports by Wicherts and colleagues that psychologists are often unwilling or unable to share their published data for reanalysis (Wicherts, Bakker, & Molenaar, 2011; see also Wicherts, Borsboom, Kats, & Molenaar, 2006), and the publication of an important article in Psychological Science showing how easily researchers can, in the absence of any real effects, nonetheless obtain statistically significant differences through various questionable research practices (QRPs) such as exploring multiple dependent variables or covariates and only reporting these when they yield significant results (Simmons, Nelson, & Simonsohn, 2011). For those psychologists who expected that the embarrassments of 2011 would soon recede into memory, 2012 offered instead a quick plunge from bad to worse, with new indications of outright fraud in the field of social cognition (Simonsohn, 2012), an article in Psychological Science showing that many psychologists admit to engaging in at least some of the QRPs examined by Simmons and colleagues (John, Loewenstein, & Prelec, 2012), troubling new meta-analytic evidence suggesting that the QRPs described by Simmons and colleagues may even be leaving telltale signs visible in the distribution of p values in the psychological literature (Masicampo & Lalande, in press; Simonsohn, 2012), and an acrimonious dust-up in science magazines and blogs centered around the problems some investigators were having in replicating well-known results from the field of social cognition (Bower, 2012; Yong, 2012). Although the very public problems experienced by psychology over this 2-year period are embarrassing to those of us working in the field, some have found comfort in the fact that, over the same period, similar concerns have been arising across the scientific landscape (triggered by revelations that will be described shortly). Some of the suspected causes of unreplicability, such as publication bias (the tendency to publish only positive findings) have been discussed for years; in fact, the phrase file-drawer problem was first coined by a distinguished psychologist several decades ago (Rosenthal, 1979). However, many have speculated that these problems have been exacerbated in recent years as academia reaps the harvest of a hypercompetitive academic climate and an incentive scheme that provides rich rewards for overselling one’s work and few rewards at all for caution and circumspection (see Giner-Sorolla, 2012, this issue). Equally disturbing, investigators seem to be replicating each others’ work even less often than they did in the past, again presumably reflecting an incentive scheme gone askew (a point discussed in several articles in this issue, e.g., Makel, Plucker, & Hegarty, 2012). The frequency with which errors appear in the psychological literature is not presently known, but a number of facts suggest it might be disturbingly high. Ioannidis (2005) has shown through simple mathematical modeling that any scientific field that ignores replication can easily come to the miserable state wherein (as the title of his most famous article puts it) “most published research findings are false” (see also Ioannidis, 2012, this issue, and Pashler & Harris, 2012, this issue). Meanwhile, reports emerging from cancer research have made such grim scenarios seem more plausible: In 2012, several large pharmaceutical companies revealed that their efforts to replicate exciting preclinical findings from published academic studies in cancer biology were only rarely verifying the original results (Begley & Ellis, 2012; see also Osherovich, 2011; Prinz, Schlange, & Asadullah, 2011).
papers.abstract_zh: 目前心理科学是否出现了信任危机，反映出从业者对该领域研究结果的可靠性产生了前所未有的怀疑？显然是有的。随着2011年一系列不愉快事件的发生，这些怀疑出现了，并有所增长:Diederik Stapel欺诈案(见Stroebe，Postmes，& Spears，2012，这一期)，在一份主要的社会心理学杂志上发表了一篇文章，声称显示了超感知觉的证据(Bem，2011)，随后受到了广泛的公开嘲笑(见Galak，LeBoeuf，Nelson，& Simmons，正在出版中；Wagenmakers，Wetzels，Borsboom，& van der Maas，2011)，Wicherts及其同事报告说，心理学家往往不愿意或不能分享他们发表的数据进行再分析(Wicherts，Bakker，& Molenaar，2011；另见Wicherts，Borsboom，Kats，& Molenaar，2006)，以及发表在《心理科学》上的一篇重要文章，该文章表明，在没有任何实际影响的情况下，研究人员可以通过各种有问题的研究实践(qrp)轻松地获得统计学上的显著差异，如探索多个因变量或协变量，并仅在它们产生显著结果时报告这些结果(Simmons，Nelson，& Simonsohn，2011)。对于那些预计2011年的尴尬将很快消失在记忆中的心理学家来说，2012年反而提供了一个从糟糕到更糟糕的快速跳水，在社会认知领域出现了新的明显的欺诈迹象(Simonsohn，2012)，心理科学中的一篇文章显示，许多心理学家承认至少参与了Simmons及其同事检查的一些快速反应程序(John，Loewenstein，& Prelec，2012)。 令人不安的新荟萃分析证据表明，Simmons及其同事描述的qrp甚至可能在心理学文献中的p值分布中留下明显的迹象(Masicampo & Lalande，出版中； Simonsohn，2012)，科学杂志和博客上围绕一些研究人员在复制社会认知领域的知名结果时遇到的问题展开了激烈的争论(Bower，2012；永，2012)。虽然心理学在这两年中所经历的非常公开的问题令我们这些在该领域工作的人感到尴尬，但一些人已经找到了安慰，因为在同一时期，类似的担忧已经在整个科学领域出现(由即将描述的启示引发)。一些不可复制的可疑原因，如发表偏倚(倾向于只发表积极的发现)已经讨论了多年；事实上，抽屉问题这个短语是由一位杰出的心理学家在几十年前首次提出的(Rosenthal，1979)。然而，许多人推测，这些问题在最近几年已经恶化，因为学术界收获了高度竞争的学术氛围和奖励计划，这种奖励计划为过度销售自己的工作提供了丰厚的奖励，而对谨慎和谨慎却几乎没有奖励(见吉纳-索罗拉，2012年，这一期)。同样令人不安的是，研究人员似乎比过去更少地重复彼此的工作，这可能再次反映了一个倾斜的激励机制(这一点在本期的几篇文章中讨论过，例如，马克尔、普吕克尔和赫加蒂，2012)。错误出现在心理学文献中的频率目前还不清楚，但许多事实表明它可能高得令人不安。约安尼迪斯(2005)通过简单的数学建模表明，任何忽视复制的科学领域都很容易陷入悲惨的境地，其中(正如他最著名的文章的标题所言)“大多数发表的研究结果都是错误的”(另见约安尼迪斯，2012，本期，以及Pashler & Harris，2012，本期)。与此同时，来自癌症研究的报告让这种严峻的情景看起来更加可信:2012年，几家大型制药公司透露，他们在癌症生物学方面复制已发表学术研究中令人兴奋的临床前发现的努力很少验证原始结果(Begley & Ellis，2012；另见Osherovich，2011年；普林茨、施朗格和阿萨杜拉，2011年)。
papers.title_zh: 编辑介绍

papers.title: Efficient Dynamic Searchable Encryption with Forward Privacy
papers.authors: Mohammad Etemad, Alptekin Küpçü, Charalampos Papamanthou, David Evans
papers.abstract: Abstract Searchable symmetric encryption (SSE) enables a client to perform searches over its outsourced encrypted files while preserving privacy of the files and queries. Dynamic schemes, where files can be added or removed, leak more information than static schemes. For dynamic schemes, forward privacy requires that a newly added file cannot be linked to previous searches. We present a new dynamic SSE scheme that achieves forward privacy by replacing the keys revealed to the server on each search. Our scheme is efficient and parallelizable and outperforms the best previous schemes providing forward privacy, and achieves competitive performance with dynamic schemes without forward privacy. We provide a full security proof in the random oracle model. In our experiments on the Wikipedia archive of about four million pages, the server takes one second to perform a search with 100,000 results.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象可搜索的对称加密（SSE）使客户可以在保留文件和查询的隐私的同时对其外包加密文件进行搜索。 动态方案，可以添加或删除文件，泄漏的信息比静态方案更多。 对于动态方案，远期隐私要求新添加的文件不能链接到以前的搜索。 我们提出了一种新的动态SSE方案，该方案通过更换每个搜索中向服务器显示的键来实现向前隐私。 我们的计划是有效且可行的，并且胜过提供前瞻性隐私的最好的以前的计划，并通过没有前瞻性隐私的动态方案来实现竞争性能。 我们在随机Oracle模型中提供完整的安全性证明。 在我们对Wikipedia档案库的实验中，服务器需要一秒钟才能进行100,000个结果的搜索。
papers.title_zh: 具有前向隐私的高效动态可搜索加密

papers.title: Improved Strongly Deniable Authenticated Key Exchanges for Secure Messaging
papers.authors: Nik Unger, Ian Goldberg
papers.abstract: Abstract A deniable authenticated key exchange (DAKE) protocol establishes a secure channel without producing cryptographic evidence of communication. A DAKE offers strong deniability if transcripts provide no evidence even if long-term key material is compromised (offline deniability) and no outsider can obtain evidence even when interactively colluding with an insider (online deniability). Unfortunately, existing strongly deniable DAKEs have not been adopted by secure messaging tools due to security and deployability weaknesses. In this work, we propose three new strongly deniable key exchange protocols—DAKEZ, ZDH, and XZDH—that are designed to be used in modern secure messaging applications while eliminating the weaknesses of previous approaches. DAKEZ offers strong deniability in synchronous network environments, while ZDH and XZDH can be used to construct asynchronous secure messaging systems with offline and partial online deniability. DAKEZ and XZDH provide forward secrecy against active adversaries, and all three protocols can provide forward secrecy against future quantum adversaries while remaining classically secure if attacks against quantum-resistant cryptosystems are found. We seek to reduce barriers to adoption by describing our protocols from a practitioner’s perspective, including complete algebraic specifications, cryptographic primitive recommendations, and prototype implementations. We evaluate concrete instantiations of our DAKEs and show that they are the most efficient strongly deniable schemes; with all of our classical security guarantees, our exchanges require only 1 ms of CPU time on a typical desktop computer and at most 464 bytes of data transmission. Our constructions are nearly as efficient as key exchanges with weaker deniability, such as the ones used by the popular OTR and Signal protocols.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要拒绝验证的密钥交换（DAKE）协议建立了一个安全的渠道，而无需产生密码学证据。 即使长期关键材料受到损害（离线可否认性），即使在与内部人士（在线可否认）上互动勾结时，也没有任何证据（在线可否认）也无法获得证据。 不幸的是，由于安全性和可部署性弱点，安全的消息传递工具尚未采用现有的强烈否认的头发。 在这项工作中，我们提出了三个新的强烈拒绝的密钥交换协议 -  Dakez，ZDH和XZDH，它们被设计用于现代安全消息传递应用程序中，同时消除了先前方法的弱点。 Dakez在同步网络环境中提供了强大的可否认性，而ZDH和XZDH可用于构建具有离线和部分在线可否认性的异步安全消息系统。 Dakez和XZDH提供了针对主动对手的远期保密性，并且所有三个方案都可以为未来的量子对手提供前瞻性保密，同时如果发现针对Quantum耐药的密码系统的攻击，则保持经典的安全。 我们试图通过从从业者的角度描述我们的协议，包括完整的代数规格，加密原始建议和原型实施，以减少采用障碍。 我们评估了抽签的具体实例，并表明它们是最有效的强烈拒绝方案。 有了我们所有的经典安全保证，我们的交换仅需在典型的台式计算机上和最多464个数据传输的CPU时间。 我们的构造几乎与具有较弱的可否认性的密钥交换一样有效，例如流行的OTR和信号协议所使用的效率。
papers.title_zh: 用于安全消息传递的改进的强可否认认证密钥交换

papers.title: SafePub: A Truthful Data Anonymization Algorithm With Strong Privacy Guarantees
papers.authors: Raffael Bild, Klaus A. Kuhn, Fabian Prasser
papers.abstract: Abstract Methods for privacy-preserving data publishing and analysis trade off privacy risks for individuals against the quality of output data. In this article, we present a data publishing algorithm that satisfies the differential privacy model. The transformations performed are truthful, which means that the algorithm does not perturb input data or generate synthetic output data. Instead, records are randomly drawn from the input dataset and the uniqueness of their features is reduced. This also offers an intuitive notion of privacy protection. Moreover, the approach is generic, as it can be parameterized with different objective functions to optimize its output towards different applications. We show this by integrating six well-known data quality models. We present an extensive analytical and experimental evaluation and a comparison with prior work. The results show that our algorithm is the first practical implementation of the described approach and that it can be used with reasonable privacy parameters resulting in high degrees of protection. Moreover, when parameterizing the generic method with an objective function quantifying the suitability of data for building statistical classifiers, we measured prediction accuracies that compare very well with results obtained using state-of-the-art differentially private classification algorithms.
papers.abstract_zh: 隐私数据发布和分析的摘要方法与个人对产出数据质量的贸易风险进行了贸易。 在本文中，我们提出了满足差异隐私模型的数据出版算法。 执行的转换是真实的，这意味着该算法不会扰动输入数据或生成合成输出数据。 取而代之的是，记录是从输入数据集中随机绘制的，并减少了其功能的独特性。 这也提供了隐私保护的直观概念。 此外，该方法是通用的，因为它可以使用不同的目标函数进行参数化，以优化其对不同应用程序的输出。 我们通过整合六个众所周知的数据质量模型来证明这一点。 我们提出了广泛的分析和实验评估，并与先前的工作进行了比较。 结果表明，我们的算法是所述方法的第一个实际实现，可以与合理的隐私参数一起使用，从而获得高度的保护。 此外，当通过目标函数量化数据对构建统计分类器的适用性进行参数化通用方法时，我们测量了预测准确性，这些精度与使用最先进的私人分类算法获得的结果非常好。
papers.title_zh: SafePub:一种具有强大隐私保证的真实数据匿名算法

papers.title: Every Move You Make: Exploring Practical Issues in Smartphone Motion Sensor Fingerprinting and Countermeasures
papers.authors: Anupam Das, Nikita Borisov, Edward Chou
papers.abstract: Abstract The ability to track users’ activities across different websites and visits is a key tool in advertising and surveillance. The HTML5 DeviceMotion interface creates a new opportunity for such tracking via fingerprinting of smartphone motion sensors. We study the feasibility of carrying out such fingerprinting under real-world constraints and on a large scale. In particular, we collect measurements from several hundred users under realistic scenarios and show that the state-of-the-art techniques provide very low accuracy in these settings. We then improve fingerprinting accuracy by changing the classifier as well as incorporating auxiliary information. We also show how to perform fingerprinting in an open-world scenario where one must distinguish between known and previously unseen users. We next consider the problem of developing fingerprinting countermeasures; we evaluate the usability of a previously proposed obfuscation technique and a newly developed quantization technique via a large-scale user study. We find that both techniques are able to drastically reduce fingerprinting accuracy without significantly impacting the utility of the sensors in web applications.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象能够在不同网站和访问中跟踪用户活动的能力是广告和监视的关键工具。 HTML5 Devicemotion接口为通过智能手机运动传感器的指纹识别这种跟踪创造了一个新的机会。 我们研究了在现实世界的约束下并在大规模上进行此类指纹识别的可行性。 特别是，在现实情况下，我们从数百个用户那里收集测量结果，并表明最先进的技术在这些设置中提供了非常低的精度。 然后，我们通过更改分类器以及合并辅助信息来提高指纹精度。 我们还展示了如何在开放世界的场景中执行指纹识别，其中必须区分已知和以前看不见的用户。 接下来，我们考虑开发指纹对策的问题； 我们通过大规模用户研究评估了先前提出的混淆技术的可用性和新开发的量化技术。 我们发现，这两种技术都能够大大降低指纹精度，而不会显着影响传感器在Web应用程序中的实用性。
papers.title_zh: 你的一举一动:探索智能手机运动传感器指纹识别的实际问题和对策

papers.title: I never signed up for this! Privacy implications of email tracking
papers.authors: Steven Englehardt, Jeffrey Han, Arvind Narayanan
papers.abstract: Abstract We show that the simple act of viewing emails contains privacy pitfalls for the unwary. We assembled a corpus of commercial mailing-list emails, and find a network of hundreds of third parties that track email recipients via methods such as embedded pixels. About 30% of emails leak the recipient’s email address to one or more of these third parties when they are viewed. In the majority of cases, these leaks are intentional on the part of email senders, and further leaks occur if the recipient clicks links in emails. Mail servers and clients may employ a variety of defenses, but we analyze 16 servers and clients and find that they are far from comprehensive. We propose, prototype, and evaluate a new defense, namely stripping tracking tags from emails based on enhanced versions of existing web tracking protection lists.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要我们表明，查看电子邮件的简单行为包含了无情的隐私陷阱。 我们组建了一系列商业邮件列表电子邮件，并通过嵌入式像素等方法找到了数百个第三方的网络，该网络跟踪电子邮件收件人。 当收件人查看时，大约有30％的电子邮件将收件人的电子邮件地址泄漏到这些第三方中的一个或多个。 在大多数情况下，这些泄漏是电子邮件发送者有意的，如果收件人在电子邮件中单击链接，则会发生进一步的泄漏。 邮件服务器和客户可能会采用各种防御，但是我们分析了16个服务器和客户，发现它们远非全面。 我们建议，原型和评估新的防御，即基于现有Web跟踪保护列表的增强版本的电子邮件中剥离跟踪标签。
papers.title_zh: 我从来没有报名参加过！电子邮件跟踪的隐私含义

papers.title: Recognizing and Imitating Programmer Style: Adversaries in Program Authorship Attribution
papers.authors: Lucy Simko, Luke Zettlemoyer, Tadayoshi Kohno
papers.abstract: Abstract Source code attribution classifiers have recently become powerful. We consider the possibility that an adversary could craft code with the intention of causing a misclassification, i.e., creating a forgery of another author’s programming style in order to hide the forger’s own identity or blame the other author. We find that it is possible for a non-expert adversary to defeat such a system. In order to inform the design of adversarially resistant source code attribution classifiers, we conduct two studies with C/C++ programmers to explore the potential tactics and capabilities both of such adversaries and, conversely, of human analysts doing source code authorship attribution. Through the quantitative and qualitative analysis of these studies, we (1) evaluate a state-of-the-art machine classifier against forgeries, (2) evaluate programmers as human analysts/forgery detectors, and (3) compile a set of modifications made to create forgeries. Based on our analyses, we then suggest features that future source code attribution systems might incorporate in order to be adversarially resistant.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象源代码归因分类器最近变得强大。 我们认为，对手可以制定代码的可能性是为了导致错误分类，即创建另一个作者的编程风格的伪造，以掩盖伪造者自己的身份或责备另一个作者。 我们发现，非专家对手有可能击败这种系统。 为了告知对抗性源代码归因分类器的设计，我们对C/C ++程序员进行了两项研究，以探索此类对手的潜在策略和能力，而相反，人类分析师从事源代码代码作者资格属性。 通过对这些研究的定量和定性分析，我们（1）评估针对伪造的最先进的机器分类器，（2）评估程序员作为人类分析师/伪造探测器，以及（3）编译一组修改 创建伪造。 基于我们的分析，我们建议将来可能合并的源代码归因系统以对抗性抗性。
papers.title_zh: 识别和模仿程序员风格:程序作者归属中的对手

papers.title: Guard Sets in Tor using AS Relationships
papers.authors: Mohsen Imani, Armon Barton, Matthew Wright
papers.abstract: Abstract The mechanism for picking guards in Tor suffers from security problems like guard fingerprinting and from performance issues. To address these issues, Hayes and Danezis proposed the use of guard sets, in which the Tor system groups all guards into sets, and each client picks one of these sets and uses its guards. Unfortunately, guard sets frequently need nodes added or they are broken up due to fluctuations in network bandwidth. In this paper, we first show that these breakups create opportunities for malicious guards to join many guard sets by merely tuning the bandwidth they make available to Tor, and this greatly increases the number of clients exposed to malicious guards. To address this problem, we propose a new method for forming guard sets based on Internet location. We construct a hierarchy that keeps clients and guards together more reliably and prevents guards from easily joining arbitrary guard sets. This approach also has the advantage of confining an attacker with access to limited locations on the Internet to a small number of guard sets. We simulate this guard set design using historical Tor data in the presence of both relay-level adversaries and networklevel adversaries, and we find that our approach is good at confining the adversary into few guard sets, thus limiting the impact of attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要在TOR中采摘警卫的机制遇到了安全问题，例如防护指纹和性能问题。 为了解决这些问题，海斯和戴尼兹（Hayes）和丹尼斯（Danezis）提出了使用防护套件的使用，其中TOR系统将所有警卫队组成集合，每个客户都选择其中一组并使用其警卫。 不幸的是，后卫设置经常需要添加节点，或者由于网络带宽的波动而被分解。 在本文中，我们首先表明，这些分手为恶意警卫提供了机会加入许多警卫队，仅通过调整它们可用于TOR的带宽，这大大增加了暴露于恶意警卫的客户数量。 为了解决这个问题，我们提出了一种基于Internet位置组建防护设置的新方法。 我们构建了一个层次结构，该层次结构使客户和警卫更加可靠，并防止警卫轻松加入任意后卫。 这种方法还具有将攻击者限制在互联网上有限位置的少量后卫设置的优势。 我们在中继级对手和网络级对手的存在下使用历史托架数据模拟了此防护设置设计，我们发现我们的方法擅长将对手局限于几个后卫套装，从而限制了攻击的影响。
papers.title_zh: Tor中的保护集用作关系

papers.title: Editors' Introduction
papers.authors: Kostas Chatzikokolakis, Aaron Johnson
papers.abstract: Is there currently a crisis of confidence in psychological science reflecting an unprecedented level of doubt among practitioners about the reliability of research findings in the field? It would certainly appear that there is. These doubts emerged and grew as a series of unhappy events unfolded in 2011: the Diederik Stapel fraud case (see Stroebe, Postmes, & Spears, 2012, this issue), the publication in a major social psychology journal of an article purporting to show evidence of extrasensory perception (Bem, 2011) followed by widespread public mockery (see Galak, LeBoeuf, Nelson, & Simmons, in press; Wagenmakers, Wetzels, Borsboom, & van der Maas, 2011), reports by Wicherts and colleagues that psychologists are often unwilling or unable to share their published data for reanalysis (Wicherts, Bakker, & Molenaar, 2011; see also Wicherts, Borsboom, Kats, & Molenaar, 2006), and the publication of an important article in Psychological Science showing how easily researchers can, in the absence of any real effects, nonetheless obtain statistically significant differences through various questionable research practices (QRPs) such as exploring multiple dependent variables or covariates and only reporting these when they yield significant results (Simmons, Nelson, & Simonsohn, 2011). For those psychologists who expected that the embarrassments of 2011 would soon recede into memory, 2012 offered instead a quick plunge from bad to worse, with new indications of outright fraud in the field of social cognition (Simonsohn, 2012), an article in Psychological Science showing that many psychologists admit to engaging in at least some of the QRPs examined by Simmons and colleagues (John, Loewenstein, & Prelec, 2012), troubling new meta-analytic evidence suggesting that the QRPs described by Simmons and colleagues may even be leaving telltale signs visible in the distribution of p values in the psychological literature (Masicampo & Lalande, in press; Simonsohn, 2012), and an acrimonious dust-up in science magazines and blogs centered around the problems some investigators were having in replicating well-known results from the field of social cognition (Bower, 2012; Yong, 2012). Although the very public problems experienced by psychology over this 2-year period are embarrassing to those of us working in the field, some have found comfort in the fact that, over the same period, similar concerns have been arising across the scientific landscape (triggered by revelations that will be described shortly). Some of the suspected causes of unreplicability, such as publication bias (the tendency to publish only positive findings) have been discussed for years; in fact, the phrase file-drawer problem was first coined by a distinguished psychologist several decades ago (Rosenthal, 1979). However, many have speculated that these problems have been exacerbated in recent years as academia reaps the harvest of a hypercompetitive academic climate and an incentive scheme that provides rich rewards for overselling one’s work and few rewards at all for caution and circumspection (see Giner-Sorolla, 2012, this issue). Equally disturbing, investigators seem to be replicating each others’ work even less often than they did in the past, again presumably reflecting an incentive scheme gone askew (a point discussed in several articles in this issue, e.g., Makel, Plucker, & Hegarty, 2012). The frequency with which errors appear in the psychological literature is not presently known, but a number of facts suggest it might be disturbingly high. Ioannidis (2005) has shown through simple mathematical modeling that any scientific field that ignores replication can easily come to the miserable state wherein (as the title of his most famous article puts it) “most published research findings are false” (see also Ioannidis, 2012, this issue, and Pashler & Harris, 2012, this issue). Meanwhile, reports emerging from cancer research have made such grim scenarios seem more plausible: In 2012, several large pharmaceutical companies revealed that their efforts to replicate exciting preclinical findings from published academic studies in cancer biology were only rarely verifying the original results (Begley & Ellis, 2012; see also Osherovich, 2011; Prinz, Schlange, & Asadullah, 2011).
papers.abstract_zh: 目前心理科学是否出现了信任危机，反映出从业者对该领域研究结果的可靠性产生了前所未有的怀疑？显然是有的。随着2011年一系列不愉快事件的发生，这些怀疑出现了，并有所增长:Diederik Stapel欺诈案(见Stroebe，Postmes，& Spears，2012，这一期)，在一份主要的社会心理学杂志上发表了一篇文章，声称显示了超感知觉的证据(Bem，2011)，随后受到了广泛的公开嘲笑(见Galak，LeBoeuf，Nelson，& Simmons，正在出版中；Wagenmakers，Wetzels，Borsboom，& van der Maas，2011)，Wicherts及其同事报告说，心理学家往往不愿意或不能分享他们发表的数据进行再分析(Wicherts，Bakker，& Molenaar，2011；另见Wicherts，Borsboom，Kats，& Molenaar，2006)，以及发表在《心理科学》上的一篇重要文章，该文章表明，在没有任何实际影响的情况下，研究人员可以通过各种有问题的研究实践(qrp)轻松地获得统计学上的显著差异，如探索多个因变量或协变量，并仅在它们产生显著结果时报告这些结果(Simmons，Nelson，& Simonsohn，2011)。对于那些预计2011年的尴尬将很快消失在记忆中的心理学家来说，2012年反而提供了一个从糟糕到更糟糕的快速跳水，在社会认知领域出现了新的明显的欺诈迹象(Simonsohn，2012)，心理科学中的一篇文章显示，许多心理学家承认至少参与了Simmons及其同事检查的一些快速反应程序(John，Loewenstein，& Prelec，2012)。 令人不安的新荟萃分析证据表明，Simmons及其同事描述的qrp甚至可能在心理学文献中的p值分布中留下明显的迹象(Masicampo & Lalande，出版中； Simonsohn，2012)，科学杂志和博客上围绕一些研究人员在复制社会认知领域的知名结果时遇到的问题展开了激烈的争论(Bower，2012；永，2012)。虽然心理学在这两年中所经历的非常公开的问题令我们这些在该领域工作的人感到尴尬，但一些人已经找到了安慰，因为在同一时期，类似的担忧已经在整个科学领域出现(由即将描述的启示引发)。一些不可复制的可疑原因，如发表偏倚(倾向于只发表积极的发现)已经讨论了多年；事实上，抽屉问题这个短语是由一位杰出的心理学家在几十年前首次提出的(Rosenthal，1979)。然而，许多人推测，这些问题在最近几年已经恶化，因为学术界收获了高度竞争的学术氛围和奖励计划，这种奖励计划为过度销售自己的工作提供了丰厚的奖励，而对谨慎和谨慎却几乎没有奖励(见吉纳-索罗拉，2012年，这一期)。同样令人不安的是，研究人员似乎比过去更少地重复彼此的工作，这可能再次反映了一个倾斜的激励机制(这一点在本期的几篇文章中讨论过，例如，马克尔、普吕克尔和赫加蒂，2012)。错误出现在心理学文献中的频率目前还不清楚，但许多事实表明它可能高得令人不安。约安尼迪斯(2005)通过简单的数学建模表明，任何忽视复制的科学领域都很容易陷入悲惨的境地，其中(正如他最著名的文章的标题所言)“大多数发表的研究结果都是错误的”(另见约安尼迪斯，2012，本期，以及Pashler & Harris，2012，本期)。与此同时，来自癌症研究的报告让这种严峻的情景看起来更加可信:2012年，几家大型制药公司透露，他们在癌症生物学方面复制已发表学术研究中令人兴奋的临床前发现的努力很少验证原始结果(Begley & Ellis，2012；另见Osherovich，2011年；普林茨、施朗格和阿萨杜拉，2011年)。
papers.title_zh: 编辑介绍

papers.title: Privacy-preserving Wi-Fi Analytics
papers.authors: Mohammad Alaggan, Mathieu Cunche, Sébastien Gambs
papers.abstract: Abstract As communications-enabled devices are becoming more ubiquitous, it becomes easier to track the movements of individuals through the radio signals broadcasted by their devices. Thus, while there is a strong interest for physical analytics platforms to leverage this information for many purposes, this tracking also threatens the privacy of individuals. To solve this issue, we propose a privacy-preserving solution for collecting aggregate mobility patterns while satisfying the strong guarantee of ε-differential privacy. More precisely, we introduce a sanitization mechanism for efficient, privacy-preserving and non-interactive approximate distinct counting for physical analytics based on perturbed Bloom filters called Pan-Private BLIP. We also extend and generalize previous approaches for estimating distinct count of events and joint events (i.e., intersection and more generally t-out-of-n cardinalities). Finally, we evaluate expirementally our approach and compare it to previous ones on real datasets.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要随着支持通信的设备变得越来越普遍，通过其设备广播的无线电信号跟踪个人的动作变得更加容易。 因此，尽管物理分析平台有很大的兴趣将这些信息用于许多目的，但这种跟踪也威胁到个人的隐私。 为了解决这个问题，我们提出了一种隐私的解决方案，用于收集总体移动性模式，同时满足ε-差异性隐私的强烈保证。 更确切地说，我们引入了一种消毒机制，用于基于扰动的泛滥过滤器的物理分析，用于有效，保存和非交互性近似计数，称为Pan-Private Blip。 我们还扩展并推广了以前的方法，以估计事件和联合事件的不同计数（即相交和更普遍的N红衣主教）。 最后，我们对我们的方法进行评估，并将其与实际数据集上的以前的方法进行比较。
papers.title_zh: 保护隐私的Wi-Fi分析

papers.title: Dropping on the Edge: Flexibility and Traffic Confirmation in Onion Routing Protocols
papers.authors: Florentin Rochet, Olivier Pereira
papers.abstract: Abstract The design of Tor includes a feature that is common to most distributed systems: the protocol is flexible. In particular, the Tor protocol requires nodes to ignore messages that are not understood, in order to guarantee the compatibility with future protocol versions. This paper shows how to exploit this flexibility by proposing two new active attacks: one against onion services and the other against Tor clients. Our attack against onion services is a new low-cost side-channel guard discovery attack that makes it possible to retrieve the entry node used by an onion service in one day, without injecting any relay in the network. This attack uses the possibility to send dummy cells that are silently dropped by onion services, in accordance with the flexible protocol design, and the possibility to observe those cells by inspecting public bandwidth measurements, which act as a side channel. Our attack against Tor clients, called the dropmark attack, is an efficient 1-bit conveying active attack that correlates flows. Simulations performed in Shadow show that the attack succeeds with an overwhelming probability and with no noticeable impact on user performance. Finally, we open the discussion regarding a trade-off between flexibility and security in anonymous communication systems, based on what we learned within the scope of our attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要TOR的设计包含大多数分布式系统共有的功能：协议是灵活的。 特别是，TOR协议要求节点忽略未理解的消息，以确保与未来协议版本的兼容性。 本文展示了如何通过提出两次新的主动攻击来利用这种灵活性：一个反对洋葱服务，另一个针对TOR客户。 我们对洋葱服务的攻击是一种新的低成本侧通道后卫发现攻击，它可以在一天内检索洋葱服务使用的输入节点，而无需在网络中注入任何中继。 这次攻击使用了根据柔性协议设计将洋葱服务默默掉落的虚拟细胞的可能性，以及通过检查公共带宽测量值来观察这些单元的可能性，这些测量充当侧通道。 我们对TOR客户的攻击称为Dropmark攻击，是一种有效的1位传达的主动攻击，与流动相关。 在影子中进行的模拟表明，攻击以压倒性的概率成功，对用户性能没有明显影响。 最后，我们基于在攻击范围内所学到的知识，就匿名通信系统中的灵活性和安全性之间的权衡进行了讨论。
papers.title_zh: 边缘丢弃:洋葱路由协议中的灵活性和流量确认

papers.title: Cracking ShadowCrypt: Exploring the Limitations of Secure I/O Systems in Internet Browsers
papers.authors: Michael Freyberger, Warren He, Devdatta Akhawe, Michelle L. Mazurek, Prateek Mittal
papers.abstract: Abstract An important line of privacy research is investigating the design of systems for secure input and output (I/O) within Internet browsers. These systems would allow for users’ information to be encrypted and decrypted by the browser, and the specific web applications will only have access to the users’ information in encrypted form. The state-of-the-art approach for a secure I/O system within Internet browsers is a system called ShadowCrypt created by UC Berkeley researchers [23]. This paper will explore the limitations of ShadowCrypt in order to provide a foundation for the general principles that must be followed when designing a secure I/O system within Internet browsers. First, we developed a comprehensive UI attack that cannot be mitigated with popular UI defenses, and tested the efficacy of the attack through a user study administered on Amazon Mechanical Turk. Only 1 of the 59 participants who were under attack successfully noticed the UI attack, which validates the stealthiness of the attack. Second, we present multiple attack vectors against Shadow-Crypt that do not rely upon UI deception. These attack vectors expose the privacy weaknesses of Shadow DOM—the key browser primitive leveraged by ShadowCrypt. Finally, we present a sketch of potential countermeasures that can enable the design of future secure I/O systems within Internet browsers.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要，一项重要的隐私研究线是研究Internet浏览器中安全输入和输出（I/O）的系统设计。 这些系统将允许浏览器对用户的信息进行加密和解密，并且特定的Web应用程序只能以加密形式访问用户的信息。 Internet浏览器中安全的I/O系统的最新方法是由UC Berkeley研究人员创建的名为ShadowCrypt的系统[23]。 本文将探讨ShadowCrypt的局限性，以便为在Internet浏览器中设计安全的I/O系统时必须遵循的一般原则提供基础。 首先，我们开发了一种全面的UI攻击，无法通过流行的UI防御措施来缓解，并通过在亚马逊机械Turk上进行的用户研究测试了攻击的功效。 在受到攻击的59名参与者中，只有1个成功地注意到了UI攻击，这证实了攻击的隐身性。 其次，我们提出了不依赖UI欺骗的Shadow-Crypt的多次攻击向量。 这些攻击向量暴露了阴影DOM的隐私弱点，这是ShadowCrypt杠杆杠杆的主要浏览器。 最后，我们提供了一个潜在的对策的草图，这些草图可以使Internet浏览器中的未来安全I/O系统的设计。
papers.title_zh: 破解ShadowCrypt:探索因特网浏览器中安全I/O系统的局限性

papers.title: Functional Credentials
papers.authors: Dominic Deuber, Matteo Maffei, Giulio Malavolta, Max Rabkin, Dominique Schröder, Mark Simkin
papers.abstract: Abstract A functional credential allows a user to anonymously prove possession of a set of attributes that fulfills a certain policy. The policies are arbitrary polynomially computable predicates that are evaluated over arbitrary attributes. The key feature of this primitive is the delegation of verification to third parties, called designated verifiers. The delegation protects the privacy of the policy: A designated verifier can verify that a user satisfies a certain policy without learning anything about the policy itself. We illustrate the usefulness of this property in different applications, including outsourced databases with access control. We present a new framework to construct functional credentials that does not require (non-interactive) zero-knowledge proofs. This is important in settings where the statements are complex and thus the resulting zero-knowledge proofs are not efficient. Our construction is based on any predicate encryption scheme and the security relies on standard assumptions. A complexity analysis and an experimental evaluation confirm the practicality of our approach.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要功能凭据允许用户匿名证明拥有一组符合某个策略的属性。 这些策略是根据任意属性进行评估的任意多项式计算谓词。 该原始性的关键特征是将验证委派给第三方，称为指定验证者。 代表团保护政策的隐私：指定的验证者可以验证用户在不学习策略本身的情况下满足某个策略。 我们说明了该属性在不同应用程序中的有用性，包括具有访问控制的外包数据库。 我们提出了一个新的框架来构建不需要（非相互作用）零知识证明的功能凭据。 这在语句很复杂的设置中很重要，因此所得的零知识证明是不有效的。 我们的构建基于任何谓词加密方案，安全性依赖于标准假设。 复杂性分析和实验评估证实了我们方法的实用性。
papers.title_zh: 功能凭证

papers.title: Onion-AE: Foundations of Nested Encryption
papers.authors: Phillip Rogaway, Yusi Zhang
papers.abstract: Abstract Nested symmetric encryption is a well-known technique for low-latency communication privacy. But just what problem does this technique aim to solve? In answer, we provide a provable-security treatment for onion authenticated-encryption (onion-AE). Extending the conventional notion for authenticated-encryption, we demand indistinguishability from random bits and time-of-exit authenticity verification. We show that the encryption technique presently used in Tor does not satisfy our definition of onion-AE security, but that a construction by Mathewson (2012), based on a strong, tweakable, wideblock PRP, does do the job. We go on to discuss three extensions of onion-AE, giving definitions to handle inbound flows, immediate detection of authenticity errors, and corrupt ORs.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象的嵌套对称加密是低延迟通信隐私的众所周知的技术。 但是，这项技术旨在解决什么问题？ 在答案中，我们为洋葱身份验证加热（Onion-ae）提供了可证明的安全处理。 为了扩展常规概念以进行身份验证，我们要求与随机位和外部真实性验证的不可区分性。 我们表明，目前在TOR中使用的加密技术不能满足我们对洋葱安全性的定义，但是Mathewson（2012）的结构（基于强大，可调节，广泛的PRP）确实可以完成这项工作。 我们继续讨论洋葱ae的三个扩展，给出了处理入站流，立即检测真实性错误和腐败的定义。
papers.title_zh: Onion-AE:嵌套加密的基础

papers.title: Möbius: Trustless Tumbling for Transaction Privacy
papers.authors: Sarah Meiklejohn, Rebekah Mercer
papers.abstract: Abstract Cryptocurrencies allow users to securely transfer money without relying on a trusted intermediary, and the transparency of their underlying ledgers also enables public verifiability. This openness, however, comes at a cost to privacy, as even though the pseudonyms users go by are not linked to their real-world identities, all movement of money among these pseudonyms is traceable. In this paper, we present Möbius, an Ethereum-based tumbler or mixing service. Möbius achieves strong notions of anonymity, as even malicious senders cannot identify which pseudonyms belong to the recipients to whom they sent money, and is able to resist denial-of-service attacks. It also achieves a much lower off-chain communication complexity than all existing tumblers, with senders and recipients needing to send only two initial messages in order to engage in an arbitrary number of transactions.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象的加密货币允许用户在不依赖受信任的中介机构的情况下安全地转移资金，其基础分类帐的透明度也可以公开验证。 但是，这种开放性是为了支付隐私的代价，即使用户的化名与他们的现实世界的身份没有链接，但这些假名中的所有货币移动都是可以追溯的。 在本文中，我们提出了基于以太坊的玻璃杯或混合服务Möbius。 莫比乌斯（Möbius）达到了匿名的强烈概念，因为即使是恶意的发件人也无法确定哪种假名属于他们寄钱的接收者，并且能够抵制拒绝服务的攻击。 它还比所有现有的不倒翁要达到的离链沟通复杂性要低得多，而发件人和接收者只需要发送两条初始消息才能进行任意数量的交易。
papers.title_zh: 莫比乌斯:无信任的交易隐私翻滚

papers.title: Touch and You're Trapp(ck)ed: Quantifying the Uniqueness of Touch Gestures for Tracking
papers.authors: Rahat Masood, Benjamin Zi Hao Zhao, Hassan Jameel Asghar, Mohamed Ali Kâafar
papers.abstract: Abstract We argue that touch-based gestures on touch-screen devices enable the threat of a form of persistent and ubiquitous tracking which we call touch-based tracking. Touch-based tracking goes beyond the tracking of virtual identities and has the potential for cross-device tracking as well as identifying multiple users using the same device. We demonstrate the likelihood of touch-based tracking by focusing on touch gestures widely used to interact with touch devices such as swipes and taps.. Our objective is to quantify and measure the information carried by touch-based gestures which may lead to tracking users. For this purpose, we develop an information theoretic method that measures the amount of information about users leaked by gestures when modelled as feature vectors. Our methodology allows us to evaluate the information leaked by individual features of gestures, samples of gestures, as well as samples of combinations of gestures. Through our purpose-built app, called TouchTrack, we gather gesture samples from 89 users, and demonstrate that touch gestures contain sufficient information to uniquely identify and track users. Our results show that writing samples (on a touch pad) can reveal 73.7% of information (when measured in bits), and left swipes can reveal up to 68.6% of information. Combining different combinations of gestures results in higher uniqueness, with the combination of keystrokes, swipes and writing revealing up to 98.5% of information about users. We further show that, through our methodology, we can correctly re-identify returning users with a success rate of more than 90%.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要我们认为，触摸屏设备上的基于触摸的手势实现了一种持久和无处不在的跟踪形式的威胁，我们称之为基于触摸的跟踪。 基于触摸的跟踪超出了虚拟身份的跟踪，并且具有跨设备跟踪以及使用同一设备识别多个用户的潜力。 我们通过专注于与触摸设备（如滑动和水龙头）相互作用的触摸手势来证明基于触摸的跟踪的可能性。我们的目标是量化和测量可能导致用户的基于触摸的手势所携带的信息。 为此，我们开发了一种信息理论方法，该方法可以测量以特征向量建模时通过手势泄漏的有关用户的信息。 我们的方法使我们能够评估通过手势的各个特征，手势样本以及手势组合样本泄漏的信息。 通过我们的专用应用程序（称为TouchTrack），我们收集了来自89个用户的手势样本，并证明触摸手势包含足够的信息来唯一识别和跟踪用户。 我们的结果表明，编写样品（在触摸板上）可以揭示73.7％的信息（以钻头进行测量），左侧滑动可以揭示多达68.6％的信息。 结合不同手势的组合会导致更高的独特性，以及击键，滑动和写作的组合，揭示了多达98.5％的有关用户的信息。 我们进一步表明，通过我们的方法，我们可以正确地重新识别返回用户的成功率超过90％。
papers.title_zh: 触摸，你就被困住了:量化触摸手势的独特性进行跟踪

papers.title: Editors' Introduction
papers.authors: Kostas Chatzikokolakis, Aaron Johnson
papers.abstract: Is there currently a crisis of confidence in psychological science reflecting an unprecedented level of doubt among practitioners about the reliability of research findings in the field? It would certainly appear that there is. These doubts emerged and grew as a series of unhappy events unfolded in 2011: the Diederik Stapel fraud case (see Stroebe, Postmes, & Spears, 2012, this issue), the publication in a major social psychology journal of an article purporting to show evidence of extrasensory perception (Bem, 2011) followed by widespread public mockery (see Galak, LeBoeuf, Nelson, & Simmons, in press; Wagenmakers, Wetzels, Borsboom, & van der Maas, 2011), reports by Wicherts and colleagues that psychologists are often unwilling or unable to share their published data for reanalysis (Wicherts, Bakker, & Molenaar, 2011; see also Wicherts, Borsboom, Kats, & Molenaar, 2006), and the publication of an important article in Psychological Science showing how easily researchers can, in the absence of any real effects, nonetheless obtain statistically significant differences through various questionable research practices (QRPs) such as exploring multiple dependent variables or covariates and only reporting these when they yield significant results (Simmons, Nelson, & Simonsohn, 2011). For those psychologists who expected that the embarrassments of 2011 would soon recede into memory, 2012 offered instead a quick plunge from bad to worse, with new indications of outright fraud in the field of social cognition (Simonsohn, 2012), an article in Psychological Science showing that many psychologists admit to engaging in at least some of the QRPs examined by Simmons and colleagues (John, Loewenstein, & Prelec, 2012), troubling new meta-analytic evidence suggesting that the QRPs described by Simmons and colleagues may even be leaving telltale signs visible in the distribution of p values in the psychological literature (Masicampo & Lalande, in press; Simonsohn, 2012), and an acrimonious dust-up in science magazines and blogs centered around the problems some investigators were having in replicating well-known results from the field of social cognition (Bower, 2012; Yong, 2012). Although the very public problems experienced by psychology over this 2-year period are embarrassing to those of us working in the field, some have found comfort in the fact that, over the same period, similar concerns have been arising across the scientific landscape (triggered by revelations that will be described shortly). Some of the suspected causes of unreplicability, such as publication bias (the tendency to publish only positive findings) have been discussed for years; in fact, the phrase file-drawer problem was first coined by a distinguished psychologist several decades ago (Rosenthal, 1979). However, many have speculated that these problems have been exacerbated in recent years as academia reaps the harvest of a hypercompetitive academic climate and an incentive scheme that provides rich rewards for overselling one’s work and few rewards at all for caution and circumspection (see Giner-Sorolla, 2012, this issue). Equally disturbing, investigators seem to be replicating each others’ work even less often than they did in the past, again presumably reflecting an incentive scheme gone askew (a point discussed in several articles in this issue, e.g., Makel, Plucker, & Hegarty, 2012). The frequency with which errors appear in the psychological literature is not presently known, but a number of facts suggest it might be disturbingly high. Ioannidis (2005) has shown through simple mathematical modeling that any scientific field that ignores replication can easily come to the miserable state wherein (as the title of his most famous article puts it) “most published research findings are false” (see also Ioannidis, 2012, this issue, and Pashler & Harris, 2012, this issue). Meanwhile, reports emerging from cancer research have made such grim scenarios seem more plausible: In 2012, several large pharmaceutical companies revealed that their efforts to replicate exciting preclinical findings from published academic studies in cancer biology were only rarely verifying the original results (Begley & Ellis, 2012; see also Osherovich, 2011; Prinz, Schlange, & Asadullah, 2011).
papers.abstract_zh: 目前心理科学是否出现了信任危机，反映出从业者对该领域研究结果的可靠性产生了前所未有的怀疑？显然是有的。随着2011年一系列不愉快事件的发生，这些怀疑出现了，并有所增长:Diederik Stapel欺诈案(见Stroebe，Postmes，& Spears，2012，这一期)，在一份主要的社会心理学杂志上发表了一篇文章，声称显示了超感知觉的证据(Bem，2011)，随后受到了广泛的公开嘲笑(见Galak，LeBoeuf，Nelson，& Simmons，正在出版中；Wagenmakers，Wetzels，Borsboom，& van der Maas，2011)，Wicherts及其同事报告说，心理学家往往不愿意或不能分享他们发表的数据进行再分析(Wicherts，Bakker，& Molenaar，2011；另见Wicherts，Borsboom，Kats，& Molenaar，2006)，以及发表在《心理科学》上的一篇重要文章，该文章表明，在没有任何实际影响的情况下，研究人员可以通过各种有问题的研究实践(qrp)轻松地获得统计学上的显著差异，如探索多个因变量或协变量，并仅在它们产生显著结果时报告这些结果(Simmons，Nelson，& Simonsohn，2011)。对于那些预计2011年的尴尬将很快消失在记忆中的心理学家来说，2012年反而提供了一个从糟糕到更糟糕的快速跳水，在社会认知领域出现了新的明显的欺诈迹象(Simonsohn，2012)，心理科学中的一篇文章显示，许多心理学家承认至少参与了Simmons及其同事检查的一些快速反应程序(John，Loewenstein，& Prelec，2012)。 令人不安的新荟萃分析证据表明，Simmons及其同事描述的qrp甚至可能在心理学文献中的p值分布中留下明显的迹象(Masicampo & Lalande，出版中； Simonsohn，2012)，科学杂志和博客上围绕一些研究人员在复制社会认知领域的知名结果时遇到的问题展开了激烈的争论(Bower，2012；永，2012)。虽然心理学在这两年中所经历的非常公开的问题令我们这些在该领域工作的人感到尴尬，但一些人已经找到了安慰，因为在同一时期，类似的担忧已经在整个科学领域出现(由即将描述的启示引发)。一些不可复制的可疑原因，如发表偏倚(倾向于只发表积极的发现)已经讨论了多年；事实上，抽屉问题这个短语是由一位杰出的心理学家在几十年前首次提出的(Rosenthal，1979)。然而，许多人推测，这些问题在最近几年已经恶化，因为学术界收获了高度竞争的学术氛围和奖励计划，这种奖励计划为过度销售自己的工作提供了丰厚的奖励，而对谨慎和谨慎却几乎没有奖励(见吉纳-索罗拉，2012年，这一期)。同样令人不安的是，研究人员似乎比过去更少地重复彼此的工作，这可能再次反映了一个倾斜的激励机制(这一点在本期的几篇文章中讨论过，例如，马克尔、普吕克尔和赫加蒂，2012)。错误出现在心理学文献中的频率目前还不清楚，但许多事实表明它可能高得令人不安。约安尼迪斯(2005)通过简单的数学建模表明，任何忽视复制的科学领域都很容易陷入悲惨的境地，其中(正如他最著名的文章的标题所言)“大多数发表的研究结果都是错误的”(另见约安尼迪斯，2012，本期，以及Pashler & Harris，2012，本期)。与此同时，来自癌症研究的报告让这种严峻的情景看起来更加可信:2012年，几家大型制药公司透露，他们在癌症生物学方面复制已发表学术研究中令人兴奋的临床前发现的努力很少验证原始结果(Begley & Ellis，2012；另见Osherovich，2011年；普林茨、施朗格和阿萨杜拉，2011年)。
papers.title_zh: 编辑介绍

papers.title: Quantifying Privacy Loss of Human Mobility Graph Topology
papers.authors: Dionysis Manousakas, Cecilia Mascolo, Alastair R. Beresford, Dennis Chan, Nikhil Sharma
papers.abstract: Abstract Human mobility is often represented as a mobility network, or graph, with nodes representing places of significance which an individual visits, such as their home, work, places of social amenity, etc., and edge weights corresponding to probability estimates of movements between these places. Previous research has shown that individuals can be identified by a small number of geolocated nodes in their mobility network, rendering mobility trace anonymization a hard task. In this paper we build on prior work and demonstrate that even when all location and timestamp information is removed from nodes, the graph topology of an individual mobility network itself is often uniquely identifying. Further, we observe that a mobility network is often unique, even when only a small number of the most popular nodes and edges are considered. We evaluate our approach using a large dataset of cell-tower location traces from 1 500 smartphone handsets with a mean duration of 430 days. We process the data to derive the top−N places visited by the device in the trace, and find that 93% of traces have a unique top−10 mobility network, and all traces are unique when considering top−15 mobility networks. Since mobility patterns, and therefore mobility networks for an individual, vary over time, we use graph kernel distance functions, to determine whether two mobility networks, taken at different points in time, represent the same individual. We then show that our distance metrics, while imperfect predictors, perform significantly better than a random strategy and therefore our approach represents a significant loss in privacy.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象的人类流动性通常被表示为流动网络或图形，节点代表了各个访问的重要性，例如他们的家，工作，社交设施等等，以及与概率估计的概率估算的边缘权重 这些地方。 先前的研究表明，可以通过其移动性网络中的少数地理节点来识别个人，从而使移动性跟踪匿名化是一项艰巨的任务。 在本文中，我们以先前的工作为基础，并证明即使所有位置和时间戳信息都从节点中删除，单个移动网络本身的图形拓扑本身通常也可以唯一地识别。 此外，我们观察到，即使仅考虑了最受欢迎的节点和边缘，移动性网络通常是唯一的。 我们使用1500个智能手机手机的大型细胞位置痕迹来评估我们的方法，平均持续时间为430天。 我们处理数据以得出该设备在跟踪中访问的顶级n位置，并发现93％的痕迹具有唯一的TOP -10移动性网络，并且在考虑Top -15 Mobility网络时，所有痕迹都是唯一的。 由于移动性模式，因此个人的移动性网络随着时间的流逝而变化，因此我们使用图内距离函数来确定在不同时间点采用的两个移动性网络是否代表同一个人。 然后，我们表明我们的距离指标虽然不完美的预测因子的性能明显优于随机策略，因此我们的方法代表了隐私的重大损失。
papers.title_zh: 量化人类移动图拓扑的隐私损失

papers.title: Tempest: Temporal Dynamics in Anonymity Systems
papers.authors: Ryan Wails, Yixin Sun, Aaron Johnson, Mung Chiang, Prateek Mittal
papers.abstract: Abstract Many recent proposals for anonymous communication omit from their security analyses a consideration of the effects of time on important system components. In practice, many components of anonymity systems, such as the client location and network structure, exhibit changes and patterns over time. In this paper, we focus on the effect of such temporal dynamics on the security of anonymity networks. We present Tempest, a suite of novel attacks based on (1) client mobility, (2) usage patterns, and (3) changes in the underlying network routing. Using experimental analysis on real-world datasets, we demonstrate that these temporal attacks degrade user privacy across a wide range of anonymity networks, including deployed systems such as Tor; pathselection protocols for Tor such as DeNASA, TAPS, and Counter-RAPTOR; and network-layer anonymity protocols for Internet routing such as Dovetail and HORNET. The degradation is in some cases surprisingly severe. For example, a single host failure or network route change could quickly and with high certainty identify the client’s ISP to a malicious host or ISP. The adversary behind each attack is relatively weak – generally passive and in control of one network location or a small number of hosts. Our findings suggest that designers of anonymity systems should rigorously consider the impact of temporal dynamics when analyzing anonymity.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要许多有关匿名通信的最新建议从其安全分析中省略了对时间对重要系统组件的影响的考虑。 在实践中，随着时间的推移，匿名系统的许多组件，例如客户端位置和网络结构，都会显示出变化和模式。 在本文中，我们专注于这种时间动态对匿名网络安全性的影响。 我们提出了Tempest，这是一套基于（1）客户端移动性，（2）使用模式和（3）基础网络路由的变化的新颖攻击。 使用对现实世界数据集的实验分析，我们证明了这些时间攻击会降低各种匿名网络的用户隐私，包括已部署的系统，例如TOR； DENASA，TAPS和反起跑者等TOR的路径选择协议； 以及用于Internet路由的网络层匿名协议，例如Dovetail和Hornet。 在某些情况下，降解非常严重。 例如，单个主机故障或网络路由更改可以迅速而高确定性地将客户的ISP识别为恶意主机或ISP。 每次攻击背后的对手相对较弱 - 通常被动并控制一个网络位置或少量主机。 我们的发现表明，匿名系统的设计师在分析匿名时应严格考虑时间动态的影响。
papers.title_zh: Tempest:匿名系统中的时间动力学

papers.title: Secure asymmetry and deployability for decoy routing systems
papers.authors: Cecylia Bocovich, Ian Goldberg
papers.abstract: Abstract Censorship circumvention is often characterized as a cat-and-mouse game between a nation-state censor and the developers of censorship resistance systems. Decoy routing systems offer a solution to censor- ship resistance that has the potential to tilt this race in the favour of the censorship resistor by using real connections to unblocked, overt sites to deliver censored content to users. This is achieved by employing the help of Internet Service Providers (ISPs) or Autonomous Systems (ASes) that own routers in the middle of the net- work. However, the deployment of decoy routers has yet to reach fruition. Obstacles to deployment such as the heavy requirements on routers that deploy decoy router relay stations, and the impact on the quality of service for customers that pass through these routers have deterred potential participants from deploying existing systems. Furthermore, connections from clients to overt sites often follow different paths in the upstream and downstream direction, making some existing designs impractical. Although decoy routing systems that lessen the burden on participating routers and accommodate asymmetric flows have been proposed, these arguably more deployable systems suffer from security vulnerabilities that put their users at risk of discovery or make them prone to censorship or denial of service attacks. In this paper, we propose a technique for supporting route asymmetry in previously symmetric decoy routing systems. The resulting asymmetric solution is more secure than previous asymmetric proposals and provides an option for tiered deployment, allowing more cautious ASes to deploy a lightweight, non-blocking relay station that aids in defending against routing-capable adversaries. We also provide an experimental evaluation of relay station performance on off-the-shelf hardware and additional security improvements to recently proposed systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象的审查规定通常被认为是民族国家审查员与审查制度阻力系统开发商之间的猫和鼠标游戏。 诱饵路由系统为审查阻力提供了一种解决方案，该解决方案有可能通过使用实际连接到未经阻止的，公开的站点来向用户提供审查的内容，从而有利于审查电阻。 这是通过在网络中间拥有路由器的互联网服务提供商（ISP）或自主系统（ASP）的帮助来实现的。 但是，诱饵路由器的部署尚未实现。 部署的障碍，例如部署诱饵路由器中继站的路由器的繁重要求，以及对通过这些路由器的客户的服务质量的影响，阻止了潜在的参与者部署现有系统。 此外，从客户到公开站点的连接通常沿着上游和下游方向遵循不同的路径，使一些现有的设计变得不切实际。 尽管已经提出了减轻参与路由器和适应不对称流动的负担的诱饵路线系统，但这些可以说的更可部署的系统遭受了安全脆弱性的损失，这些漏洞使他们的用户处于发现风险或使其容易受到审查或拒绝服务攻击。 在本文中，我们提出了一种用于支持先前对称诱饵路由系统中不对称路线的技术。 所得的不对称解决方案比以前的不对称建议更安全，并为分层部署提供了一种选择，使更谨慎的ASE可以部署轻巧的，非阻滞的无继电器站，该站有助于防御可抵抗可通过路由的对手进行防御。 我们还对现成硬件的继电器站性能以及最近提议的系统的其他安全性改进提供了实验评估。
papers.title_zh: 诱饵路由系统的安全不对称性和可部署性

papers.title: "Won't Somebody Think of the Children?" Examining COPPA Compliance at Scale
papers.authors: Irwin Reyes, Primal Wijesekera, Joel Reardon, Amit Elazari Bar On, Abbas Razaghpanah, Narseo Vallina-Rodriguez, Serge Egelman
papers.abstract: Abstract We present a scalable dynamic analysis framework that allows for the automatic evaluation of the privacy behaviors of Android apps. We use our system to analyze mobile apps’ compliance with the Children’s Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA), one of the few stringent privacy laws in the U.S. Based on our automated analysis of 5,855 of the most popular free children’s apps, we found that a majority are potentially in violation of COPPA, mainly due to their use of thirdparty SDKs. While many of these SDKs offer configuration options to respect COPPA by disabling tracking and behavioral advertising, our data suggest that a majority of apps either do not make use of these options or incorrectly propagate them across mediation SDKs. Worse, we observed that 19% of children’s apps collect identifiers or other personally identifiable information (PII) via SDKs whose terms of service outright prohibit their use in child-directed apps. Finally, we show that efforts by Google to limit tracking through the use of a resettable advertising ID have had little success: of the 3,454 apps that share the resettable ID with advertisers, 66% transmit other, non-resettable, persistent identifiers as well, negating any intended privacy-preserving properties of the advertising ID.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要我们提出了一个可扩展的动态分析框架，该框架允许自动评估Android应用程序的隐私行为。 我们使用系统来分析移动应用程序遵守《儿童在线隐私保护法》（COPPA），这是我们对5,855个最受欢迎的免费儿童应用程序的自动分析，是美国为数不多的严格隐私法律之一，我们发现这是一个 大多数人可能违反COPPA，这主要是由于他们使用第三部分SDK。 尽管这些SDK中的许多SDK都提供了配置选项来通过禁用跟踪和行为广告来尊重COPPA，但我们的数据表明，大多数应用程序要么不使用这些选项，要么在调解SDK上不正确地传播它们。 更糟糕的是，我们观察到，有19％的儿童应用程序通过SDK收集标识符或其他个人身份信息（PII），其服务条款完全禁止其在儿童指导的应用程序中使用。 最后，我们表明，Google为通过使用可重置广告ID的使用而限制跟踪的努力几乎没有成功：在与广告商共享可重复ID的3,454个应用程序中，有66％的人也会传输其他，不可撤销的，持久的标识符， 否定广告ID的任何预期隐私权属性。
papers.title_zh: “不会有人想到孩子们吗？”大规模检查COPPA合规性

papers.title: Toward Distribution Estimation under Local Differential Privacy with Small Samples
papers.authors: Takao Murakami, Hideitsu Hino, Jun Sakuma
papers.abstract: Abstract A number of studies have recently been made on discrete distribution estimation in the local model, in which users obfuscate their personal data (e.g., location, response in a survey) by themselves and a data collector estimates a distribution of the original personal data from the obfuscated data. Unlike the centralized model, in which a trusted database administrator can access all users’ personal data, the local model does not suffer from the risk of data leakage. A representative privacy metric in this model is LDP (Local Differential Privacy), which controls the amount of information leakage by a parameter ∈ called privacy budget. When ∈ is small, a large amount of noise is added to the personal data, and therefore users’ privacy is strongly protected. However, when the number of users ℕ is small (e.g., a small-scale enterprise may not be able to collect large samples) or when most users adopt a small value of ∈, the estimation of the distribution becomes a very challenging task. The goal of this paper is to accurately estimate the distribution in the cases explained above. To achieve this goal, we focus on the EM (Expectation-Maximization) reconstruction method, which is a state-of-the-art statistical inference method, and propose a method to correct its estimation error (i.e., difference between the estimate and the true value) using the theory of Rilstone et al. We prove that the proposed method reduces the MSE (Mean Square Error) under some assumptions.We also evaluate the proposed method using three largescale datasets, two of which contain location data while the other contains census data. The results show that the proposed method significantly outperforms the EM reconstruction method in all of the datasets when ℕ or ∈ is small.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要最近对本地模型中的离散分配估计进行了许多研究，其中用户本身将其个人数据（例如，位置，调查中的位置，响应）混淆，数据收集器估计了从中估计原始个人数据的分布 混淆的数据。 与集中式模型不同，在该模型中，受信任的数据库管理员可以访问所有用户的个人数据，本地模型不会遭受数据泄漏的风险。 该模型中的代表性隐私度量是LDP（本地差异隐私），该公私于该参数漏的信息泄漏量，称为隐私预算。 当∈很小时，将大量的噪声添加到个人数据中，因此用户的隐私受到强烈保护。 但是，当用户数量较小时（例如，小规模企业可能无法收集大型样本），或者大多数用户采用少量值∈时，分布的估计成为非常具有挑战性的任务。 本文的目的是准确估计上述案例的分布。 为了实现这一目标，我们专注于EM（期望最大化）重建方法，该方法是一种最新的统计推理方法，并提出了一种纠正其估计误差的方法（即估计与估算之间的差异 真实价值）使用Rilstone等人的理论。 我们证明，所提出的方法在某些假设下减少了MSE（均方误差）。我们还使用三个LargesCale数据集评估了所提出的方法，其中两个包含位置数据，而另一个包含人口普查数据。 结果表明，当ℕ或∈很小时，所提出的方法在所有数据集中都显着优于EM重建方法。
papers.title_zh: 小样本局部微分隐私下的分布估计

papers.title: Undermining Privacy in the Aircraft Communications Addressing and Reporting System (ACARS)
papers.authors: Matthew Smith, Daniel Moser, Martin Strohmeier, Vincent Lenders, Ivan Martinovic
papers.abstract: Abstract Despite the Aircraft Communications, Addressing and Reporting System (ACARS) being widely deployed for over twenty years, little scrutiny has been applied to it outside of the aviation community. Whilst originally utilized by commercial airlines to track their flights and provide automated timekeeping on crew, today it serves as a multi-purpose air-ground data link for many aviation stakeholders including private jet owners, state actors and military. Such a change has caused ACARS to be used far beyond its original mandate; to date no work has been undertaken to assess the extent of this especially with regard to privacy and the various stakeholder groups which use it. In this paper, we present an analysis of ACARS usage by privacy sensitive actors-military, government and business. We conduct this using data from the VHF (both traditional ACARS, and VDL mode 2) and satellite communications subnetworks. Based on more than two million ACARS messages collected over the course of 16 months, we demonstrate that current ACARS usage systematically breaches location privacy for all examined aviation stakeholder groups, explaining the types of messages used to cause this problem.We illustrate the challenges with three case studies-one for each stakeholder group-to show how much privacy sensitive information can be constructed with a handful of ACARS messages. We contextualize our findings with opinions on the issue of privacy in ACARS from 40 aviation industry professionals. From this, we explore recommendations for how to address these issues, including use of encryption and policy measures.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要尽管进行了飞机通信，解决和报告系统（ACAR）已被广泛部署了二十年以上，但在航空社区之外几乎没有对其进行审查。 尽管最初由商业航空公司使用来跟踪其航班并为机组提供自动计时，但如今，它是许多航空利益相关者，包括私人飞机所有者，州演员和军事的多功能空气地面数据链路。 这种变化导致ACAR的使用远远超出了其原始任务。 迄今为止，尚未开展任何工作来评估这一程度，尤其是在隐私方面和使用它的各种利益相关者群体。 在本文中，我们介绍了对隐私敏感行为者军事，政府和商业的ACAR使用分析。 我们使用来自VHF（传统ACAR和VDL模式2）和卫星通信子网的数据进行此数据。 基于16个月内收集的超过200万个ACARS消息，我们证明了当前的ACARS使用系统地违反了所有检查的航空利益相关者群体的位置隐私，解释了用于引起此问题的消息的类型。我们用三个挑战说明了三个挑战。 每个利益相关者组的案例研究都显示，可以使用少数ACARS消息来构建多少隐私敏感信息。 我们将发现对40名航空业专业人士的ACAR的隐私问题的意见与我们的发现相关。 从中，我们探讨了有关如何解决这些问题的建议，包括使用加密和政策措施。
papers.title_zh: 破坏飞机通信寻址和报告系统(ACARS)的隐私

papers.title: Privacy-preserving Machine Learning as a Service
papers.authors: Ehsan Hesamifard, Hassan Takabi, Mehdi Ghasemi, Rebecca N. Wright
papers.abstract: Abstract Machine learning algorithms based on deep Neural Networks (NN) have achieved remarkable results and are being extensively used in different domains. On the other hand, with increasing growth of cloud services, several Machine Learning as a Service (MLaaS) are offered where training and deploying machine learning models are performed on cloud providers’ infrastructure. However, machine learning algorithms require access to the raw data which is often privacy sensitive and can create potential security and privacy risks. To address this issue, we present CryptoDL, a framework that develops new techniques to provide solutions for applying deep neural network algorithms to encrypted data. In this paper, we provide the theoretical foundation for implementing deep neural network algorithms in encrypted domain and develop techniques to adopt neural networks within practical limitations of current homomorphic encryption schemes. We show that it is feasible and practical to train neural networks using encrypted data and to make encrypted predictions, and also return the predictions in an encrypted form. We demonstrate applicability of the proposed CryptoDL using a large number of datasets and evaluate its performance. The empirical results show that it provides accurate privacy-preserving training and classification.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于深神经网络（NN）的抽象机器学习算法已取得了显着的结果，并广泛用于不同领域。 另一方面，随着云服务的增长，提供了几种机器学习作为服务（MLAA）（MLAA），在培训和部署机器学习模型上，请在云提供商的基础架构上进行。 但是，机器学习算法需要访问通常对隐私敏感的原始数据访问，并且可以产生潜在的安全性和隐私风险。 为了解决这个问题，我们提出了Cryptodl，该框架开发了新技术，以提供用于将深度神经网络算法应用于加密数据的解决方案。 在本文中，我们为在加密领域中实施深层神经网络算法提供了理论基础，并开发了在当前同质加密方案实际局限性内采用神经网络的技术。 我们表明，使用加密数据训练神经网络并做出加密预测，并以加密形式返回预测是可行和实用的。 我们使用大量数据集证明了提出的加密型的适用性，并评估其性能。 经验结果表明，它提供了准确的隐私培训和分类。
papers.title_zh: 保护隐私的机器学习服务

papers.title: An Empirical Analysis of Traceability in the Monero Blockchain
papers.authors: Malte Möser, Kyle Soska, Ethan Heilman, Kevin Lee, Henry Heffan, Shashvat Srivastava, Kyle Hogan, Jason Hennessey, Andrew Miller, Arvind Narayanan, Nicolas Christin
papers.abstract: Abstract Monero is a privacy-centric cryptocurrency that allows users to obscure their transactions by including chaff coins, called “mixins,” along with the actual coins they spend. In this paper, we empirically evaluate two weaknesses in Monero’s mixin sampling strategy. First, about 62% of transaction inputs with one or more mixins are vulnerable to “chain-reaction” analysis - that is, the real input can be deduced by elimination. Second, Monero mixins are sampled in such a way that they can be easily distinguished from the real coins by their age distribution; in short, the real input is usually the “newest” input. We estimate that this heuristic can be used to guess the real input with 80% accuracy over all transactions with 1 or more mixins. Next, we turn to the Monero ecosystem and study the importance of mining pools and the former anonymous marketplace AlphaBay on the transaction volume. We find that after removing mining pool activity, there remains a large amount of potentially privacy-sensitive transactions that are affected by these weaknesses. We propose and evaluate two countermeasures that can improve the privacy of future transactions.
papers.abstract_zh: Abstract Monero是一种以隐私为中心的加密货币，可以通过包括称为“ Mixins”的Chaff硬币以及他们花费的实际硬币来掩盖其交易。 在本文中，我们在Monero的Mixin抽样策略中经验评估了两个弱点。 首先，约有62％的具有一个或多个混合蛋白的交易输入很容易受到“链反应”分析的影响 - 也就是说，可以通过消除来推导实际输入。 其次，对Monero Mixins进行采样，以至于可以通过年龄分布轻松地将它们与真实硬币区分开； 简而言之，实际输入通常是“最新”输入。 我们估计，这种启发式方法可用于猜测与1个或更多Mixins的所有交易相比，精度为80％的真实输入。 接下来，我们转向Monero生态系统，研究采矿池和前匿名市场对交易量的重要性。 我们发现，在删除了采矿池活动后，仍有大量受这些弱点影响的潜在隐私敏感性交易。 我们提出和评估两个可以改善未来交易隐私的对策。
papers.title_zh: Monero区块链可追溯性的实证分析

papers.title: Privacy Pass: Bypassing Internet Challenges Anonymously
papers.authors: Alex Davidson, Ian Goldberg, Nick Sullivan, George Tankersley, Filippo Valsorda
papers.abstract: Abstract The growth of content delivery networks (CDNs) has engendered centralized control over the serving of internet content. An unwanted by-product of this growth is that CDNs are fast becoming global arbiters for which content requests are allowed and which are blocked in an attempt to stanch malicious traffic. In particular, in some cases honest users-especially those behind shared IP addresses, including users of privacy tools such as Tor, VPNs, and I2P - can be unfairly targeted by attempted ‘catch-all solutions’ that assume these users are acting maliciously. In this work, we provide a solution to prevent users from being exposed to a disproportionate amount of internet challenges such as CAPTCHAs. These challenges are at the very least annoying and at their worst - when coupled with bad implementations - can completely block access from web resources. We detail a 1-RTT cryptographic protocol (based on an implementation of an oblivious pseudorandom function) that allows users to receive a significant amount of anonymous tokens for each challenge solution that they provide. These tokens can be exchanged in the future for access without having to interact with a challenge. We have implemented our initial solution in a browser extension named “Privacy Pass”, and have worked with the Cloudflare CDN to deploy compatible server-side components in their infrastructure. However, we envisage that our solution could be used more generally for many applications where anonymous and honest access can be granted (e.g., anonymous wiki editing). The anonymity guarantee of our solution makes it immediately appropriate for use by users of Tor/VPNs/ I2P. We also publish figures from Cloudflare indicating the potential impact from the global release of Privacy Pass.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要内容输送网络（CDN）的增长已对互联网内容的服务产生集中控制。 这种增长的不必要的副产品是CDN迅速成为允许内容请求并被阻止以阻止恶意流量的全球仲裁者。 特别是，在某些情况下，诚实的用户（尤其是共享IP地址的背后的用户，包括Tor，VPN和I2P等隐私工具的用户），可以通过尝试使用这些用户恶意行事的“接收器解决方案”而不公平地针对。 在这项工作中，我们提供了一种解决方案，以防止用户受到诸如CAPTCHA等互联网挑战的不成比例。 这些挑战至少令人讨厌，而且在最糟糕的情况下 - 加上不良的实现，可以完全阻止Web资源的访问。 我们详细介绍了一个1-RTT加密协议（基于遗忘的伪随机函数的实现），该协议允许用户为他们提供的每个挑战解决方案接收大量的匿名令牌。 这些令牌将来可以交换以供访问，而不必与挑战互动。 我们已经在名为“隐私通行证”的浏览器扩展程序中实现了初始解决方案，并与CloudFlare CDN合作，在其基础架构中部署兼容的服务器端组件。 但是，我们设想，我们的解决方案可以更普遍地用于许多可以授予匿名和诚实访问的应用程序（例如，匿名Wiki编辑）。 我们解决方案的匿名保证使其立即适用于TOR/ VPNS/ I2P的用户使用。 我们还发布了Cloudflare的数字，这表明全球隐私通行证的潜在影响。
papers.title_zh: 隐私通行证:匿名绕过互联网挑战

papers.title: Consistent Synchronous Group Off-The-Record Messaging with SYM-GOTR
papers.authors: Michael Schliep, Eugene Y. Vasserman, Nicholas Hopper
papers.abstract: Abstract We describe SYM-GOTR, a protocol for secure Group Off-The-Record (GOTR) messaging. In contrast to previous work, SYM-GOTR is the first protocol to offer confidential, authenticated, and repudiable conversations among a dynamic group with the additional properties of message unlinkability and the guarantee that all users see the same conversation, while providing efficient use of network and CPU resources. SYM-GOTR achieves these properties through the use of a novel optimistic consistency check protocol that either determines that all users agree on a transcript with constant-size messages or identifies at least one user that has not followed the protocol. We provide an implementation of SYM-GOTR as a Java library along with a plugin for the Jitsi instant messaging client. We analyze the performance of SYM-GOTR in a real world deployment scenario and discuss the challenges of providing a usable implementation without compromising the security of the conversation.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要我们描述了Sym-GOTR，这是一种安全组外录（GOTR）消息的协议。 与以前的工作相反，Sym-GOTR是第一个在动态组之间提供机密，认证和可抵制的对话的协议，该组具有消息无链性的附加属性，并保证所有用户都会看到相同的对话，同时提供有效的网络使用 和CPU资源。 Sym-GOTR通过使用新颖的乐观一致性检查协议来实现这些属性，该协议是否确定所有用户都同意具有恒定消息的成绩单，或者至少识别一个尚未遵循协议的用户。 我们提供Sym-GOTR作为Java库的实现以及JITSI Instant Messaging客户端的插件。 我们在现实世界部署方案中分析了Sym-GOTR的性能，并讨论提供可用实施的挑战，而不会损害对话的安全性。
papers.title_zh: 使用SYM-GOTR进行一致的同步组非记录消息传递

papers.title: Editors' Introduction
papers.authors: Kostas Chatzikokolakis, Aaron Johnson
papers.abstract: Is there currently a crisis of confidence in psychological science reflecting an unprecedented level of doubt among practitioners about the reliability of research findings in the field? It would certainly appear that there is. These doubts emerged and grew as a series of unhappy events unfolded in 2011: the Diederik Stapel fraud case (see Stroebe, Postmes, & Spears, 2012, this issue), the publication in a major social psychology journal of an article purporting to show evidence of extrasensory perception (Bem, 2011) followed by widespread public mockery (see Galak, LeBoeuf, Nelson, & Simmons, in press; Wagenmakers, Wetzels, Borsboom, & van der Maas, 2011), reports by Wicherts and colleagues that psychologists are often unwilling or unable to share their published data for reanalysis (Wicherts, Bakker, & Molenaar, 2011; see also Wicherts, Borsboom, Kats, & Molenaar, 2006), and the publication of an important article in Psychological Science showing how easily researchers can, in the absence of any real effects, nonetheless obtain statistically significant differences through various questionable research practices (QRPs) such as exploring multiple dependent variables or covariates and only reporting these when they yield significant results (Simmons, Nelson, & Simonsohn, 2011). For those psychologists who expected that the embarrassments of 2011 would soon recede into memory, 2012 offered instead a quick plunge from bad to worse, with new indications of outright fraud in the field of social cognition (Simonsohn, 2012), an article in Psychological Science showing that many psychologists admit to engaging in at least some of the QRPs examined by Simmons and colleagues (John, Loewenstein, & Prelec, 2012), troubling new meta-analytic evidence suggesting that the QRPs described by Simmons and colleagues may even be leaving telltale signs visible in the distribution of p values in the psychological literature (Masicampo & Lalande, in press; Simonsohn, 2012), and an acrimonious dust-up in science magazines and blogs centered around the problems some investigators were having in replicating well-known results from the field of social cognition (Bower, 2012; Yong, 2012). Although the very public problems experienced by psychology over this 2-year period are embarrassing to those of us working in the field, some have found comfort in the fact that, over the same period, similar concerns have been arising across the scientific landscape (triggered by revelations that will be described shortly). Some of the suspected causes of unreplicability, such as publication bias (the tendency to publish only positive findings) have been discussed for years; in fact, the phrase file-drawer problem was first coined by a distinguished psychologist several decades ago (Rosenthal, 1979). However, many have speculated that these problems have been exacerbated in recent years as academia reaps the harvest of a hypercompetitive academic climate and an incentive scheme that provides rich rewards for overselling one’s work and few rewards at all for caution and circumspection (see Giner-Sorolla, 2012, this issue). Equally disturbing, investigators seem to be replicating each others’ work even less often than they did in the past, again presumably reflecting an incentive scheme gone askew (a point discussed in several articles in this issue, e.g., Makel, Plucker, & Hegarty, 2012). The frequency with which errors appear in the psychological literature is not presently known, but a number of facts suggest it might be disturbingly high. Ioannidis (2005) has shown through simple mathematical modeling that any scientific field that ignores replication can easily come to the miserable state wherein (as the title of his most famous article puts it) “most published research findings are false” (see also Ioannidis, 2012, this issue, and Pashler & Harris, 2012, this issue). Meanwhile, reports emerging from cancer research have made such grim scenarios seem more plausible: In 2012, several large pharmaceutical companies revealed that their efforts to replicate exciting preclinical findings from published academic studies in cancer biology were only rarely verifying the original results (Begley & Ellis, 2012; see also Osherovich, 2011; Prinz, Schlange, & Asadullah, 2011).
papers.abstract_zh: 目前心理科学是否出现了信任危机，反映出从业者对该领域研究结果的可靠性产生了前所未有的怀疑？显然是有的。随着2011年一系列不愉快事件的发生，这些怀疑出现了，并有所增长:Diederik Stapel欺诈案(见Stroebe，Postmes，& Spears，2012，这一期)，在一份主要的社会心理学杂志上发表了一篇文章，声称显示了超感知觉的证据(Bem，2011)，随后受到了广泛的公开嘲笑(见Galak，LeBoeuf，Nelson，& Simmons，正在出版中；Wagenmakers，Wetzels，Borsboom，& van der Maas，2011)，Wicherts及其同事报告说，心理学家往往不愿意或不能分享他们发表的数据进行再分析(Wicherts，Bakker，& Molenaar，2011；另见Wicherts，Borsboom，Kats，& Molenaar，2006)，以及发表在《心理科学》上的一篇重要文章，该文章表明，在没有任何实际影响的情况下，研究人员可以通过各种有问题的研究实践(qrp)轻松地获得统计学上的显著差异，如探索多个因变量或协变量，并仅在它们产生显著结果时报告这些结果(Simmons，Nelson，& Simonsohn，2011)。对于那些预计2011年的尴尬将很快消失在记忆中的心理学家来说，2012年反而提供了一个从糟糕到更糟糕的快速跳水，在社会认知领域出现了新的明显的欺诈迹象(Simonsohn，2012)，心理科学中的一篇文章显示，许多心理学家承认至少参与了Simmons及其同事检查的一些快速反应程序(John，Loewenstein，& Prelec，2012)。 令人不安的新荟萃分析证据表明，Simmons及其同事描述的qrp甚至可能在心理学文献中的p值分布中留下明显的迹象(Masicampo & Lalande，出版中； Simonsohn，2012)，科学杂志和博客上围绕一些研究人员在复制社会认知领域的知名结果时遇到的问题展开了激烈的争论(Bower，2012；永，2012)。虽然心理学在这两年中所经历的非常公开的问题令我们这些在该领域工作的人感到尴尬，但一些人已经找到了安慰，因为在同一时期，类似的担忧已经在整个科学领域出现(由即将描述的启示引发)。一些不可复制的可疑原因，如发表偏倚(倾向于只发表积极的发现)已经讨论了多年；事实上，抽屉问题这个短语是由一位杰出的心理学家在几十年前首次提出的(Rosenthal，1979)。然而，许多人推测，这些问题在最近几年已经恶化，因为学术界收获了高度竞争的学术氛围和奖励计划，这种奖励计划为过度销售自己的工作提供了丰厚的奖励，而对谨慎和谨慎却几乎没有奖励(见吉纳-索罗拉，2012年，这一期)。同样令人不安的是，研究人员似乎比过去更少地重复彼此的工作，这可能再次反映了一个倾斜的激励机制(这一点在本期的几篇文章中讨论过，例如，马克尔、普吕克尔和赫加蒂，2012)。错误出现在心理学文献中的频率目前还不清楚，但许多事实表明它可能高得令人不安。约安尼迪斯(2005)通过简单的数学建模表明，任何忽视复制的科学领域都很容易陷入悲惨的境地，其中(正如他最著名的文章的标题所言)“大多数发表的研究结果都是错误的”(另见约安尼迪斯，2012，本期，以及Pashler & Harris，2012，本期)。与此同时，来自癌症研究的报告让这种严峻的情景看起来更加可信:2012年，几家大型制药公司透露，他们在癌症生物学方面复制已发表学术研究中令人兴奋的临床前发现的努力很少验证原始结果(Begley & Ellis，2012；另见Osherovich，2011年；普林茨、施朗格和阿萨杜拉，2011年)。
papers.title_zh: 编辑介绍

papers.title: Turtles, Locks, and Bathrooms: Understanding Mental Models of Privacy Through Illustration
