papers.authors: Maggie Oates, Yama Ahmadullah, Abigail Marsh, Chelse Swoopes, Shikun Zhang, Rebecca Balebako, Lorrie Faith Cranor
papers.abstract: Abstract Are the many formal definitions and frameworks of privacy consistent with a layperson’s understanding of privacy? We explored this question and identified mental models and metaphors of privacy, conceptual tools that can be used to improve privacy tools, communication, and design for everyday users. Our investigation focused on a qualitative analysis of 366 drawings of privacy from laypeople, privacy experts, children, and adults. Illustrators all responded to the prompt “What does privacy mean to you?” We coded each image for content, identifying themes from established privacy frameworks and defining the visual and conceptual metaphors illustrators used to model privacy. We found that many non-expert drawings illustrated a strong divide between public and private physical spaces, while experts were more likely to draw nuanced data privacy spaces. Young children’s drawings focused on bedrooms, bathrooms, or cheating on schoolwork, and seldom addressed data privacy. The metaphors, themes, and symbols identified by these findings can be used for improving privacy communication, education, and design by inspiring and informing visual and conceptual strategies for reaching laypeople.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要是否与外行人对隐私的理解一致的许多正式定义和隐私框架是否是一致的？ 我们探索了这个问题，并确定了隐私的心理模型和隐喻，可用于改善日常用户的隐私工具，通信和设计的概念工具。 我们的调查重点是对外行，隐私专家，儿童和成人的366张隐私图的定性分析。 插图画家都回应了提示：“隐私对您意味着什么？” 我们为内容编码了每个图像，从已建立的隐私框架中识别主题，并定义用于建模隐私的视觉和概念隐喻。 我们发现，许多非专家图纸都说明了公共和私人物理空间之间的巨大鸿沟，而专家则更有可能绘制细微的数据隐私空间。 幼儿的绘画集中在卧室，浴室或作弊方面，很少涉及数据隐私。 这些发现确定的隐喻，主题和符号可以通过鼓舞和告知到达外行的视觉和概念策略来改善隐私沟通，教育和设计。
papers.title_zh: 乌龟、锁和浴室:通过插图理解隐私的心理模型

papers.title: Panoptispy: Characterizing Audio and Video Exfiltration from Android Applications
papers.authors: Elleen Pan, Jingjing Ren, Martina Lindorfer, Christo Wilson, David R. Choffnes
papers.abstract: Abstract The high-fidelity sensors and ubiquitous internet connectivity offered by mobile devices have facilitated an explosion in mobile apps that rely on multimedia features. However, these sensors can also be used in ways that may violate user’s expectations and personal privacy. For example, apps have been caught taking pictures without the user’s knowledge and passively listened for inaudible, ultrasonic audio beacons. The developers of mobile device operating systems recognize that sensor data is sensitive, but unfortunately existing permission models only mitigate some of the privacy concerns surrounding multimedia data. In this work, we present the first large-scale empirical study of media permissions and leaks from Android apps, covering 17,260 apps from Google Play, AppChina, Mi.com, and Anzhi. We study the behavior of these apps using a combination of static and dynamic analysis techniques. Our study reveals several alarming privacy risks in the Android app ecosystem, including apps that over-provision their media permissions and apps that share image and video data with other parties in unexpected ways, without user knowledge or consent. We also identify a previously unreported privacy risk that arises from third-party libraries that record and upload screenshots and videos of the screen without informing the user and without requiring any permissions.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要移动设备提供的高保真传感器和无处不在的互联网连接促进了依赖多媒体功能的移动应用程序中的爆炸。 但是，这些传感器也可以以可能违反用户的期望和个人隐私的方式使用。 例如，在没有用户知识的情况下，已经发现了应用程序拍照，并被动地听取了听不清的超声音频信标。 移动设备操作系统的开发人员认识到传感器数据很敏感，但不幸的是，现有的许可模型仅缓解了围绕多媒体数据的某些隐私问题。 在这项工作中，我们介绍了媒体权限和Android应用程序泄漏的首次大规模实证研究，涵盖了Google Play，Appchina，Mi.com和Anzhi的17,260个应用程序。 我们使用静态和动态分析技术的组合研究了这些应用程序的行为。 我们的研究揭示了Android App生态系统中的几种令人震惊的隐私风险，包括在未经用户知识或同意的情况下，以意外方式与其他方共享图像和视频数据的应用程序过度证明其媒体权限和应用程序。 我们还确定了先前未报告的隐私风险，该风险来自第三方库，该图书馆记录和上传屏幕上的屏幕截图和视频，而无需通知用户并且无需任何权限。
papers.title_zh: Panoptispy:表征Android应用程序的音频和视频泄漏

papers.title: Exploiting TLS Client Authentication for Widespread User Tracking
papers.authors: Lucas Foppe, Jeremy Martin, Travis Mayberry, Erik C. Rye, Lamont Brown
papers.abstract: Abstract TLS, and SSL before it, has long supported the option for clients to authenticate to servers using their own certificates, but this capability has not been widely used. However, with the development of its Push Notification Service, Apple has deployed this technology on millions of devices for the first time. Wachs et al. [42] determined iOS client certificates could be used by passive network adversaries to track individual devices across the internet. Subsequently, Apple has patched their software to fix this vulnerability. We show these countermeasures are not effective by demonstrating three novel active attacks against TLS Client Certificate Authentication that are successful despite the defenses. Additionally, we show these attacks work against all known instances of TLS Client Certificate Authentication, including smart cards like those widely deployed by the Estonian government as part of their Digital ID program. Our attacks include in-path man-in-the-middle versions as well as a more powerful on-path attack that can be carried out without full network control.
papers.abstract_zh: 在其之前，抽象的TLS和SSL长期以来一直支持客户使用自己的证书对服务器进行身份验证的选项，但是此功能尚未被广泛使用。 但是，随着推动通知服务的开发，苹果首次将这项技术部署在数百万个设备上。 Wachs等。 [42]确定iOS客户端证书可以由被动网络对手使用，以跟踪整个Internet的单个设备。 随后，Apple修补了他们的软件以修复此漏洞。 我们表明，通过证明对TLS客户证书身份验证的三场新型主动攻击，尽管有防御能力，但这些对策无效。 此外，我们显示这些攻击对TLS客户证书身份验证的所有已知实例有效，包括智能卡，例如爱沙尼亚政府广泛部署的智能卡作为其数字ID计划的一部分。 我们的攻击包括中间人的中间人版本以及更强大的课程攻击，可以在没有完全网络控制的情况下进行。
papers.title_zh: 利用TLS客户端身份验证进行广泛的用户跟踪

papers.title: Differentially Private Oblivious RAM
papers.authors: Sameer Wagh, Paul Cuff, Prateek Mittal
papers.abstract: Abstract In this work, we investigate if statistical privacy can enhance the performance of ORAM mechanisms while providing rigorous privacy guarantees. We propose a formal and rigorous framework for developing ORAM protocols with statistical security viz., a differentially private ORAM (DP-ORAM). We present Root ORAM, a family of DP-ORAMs that provide a tunable, multi-dimensional trade-off between the desired bandwidth overhead, local storage and system security. We theoretically analyze Root ORAM to quantify both its security and performance. We experimentally demonstrate the benefits of Root ORAM and find that (1) Root ORAM can reduce local storage overhead by about 2× for a reasonable values of privacy budget, significantly enhancing performance in memory limited platforms such as trusted execution environments, and (2) Root ORAM allows tunable trade-offs between bandwidth, storage, and privacy, reducing bandwidth overheads by up to 2×-10× (at the cost of increased storage/statistical privacy), enabling significant reductions in ORAM access latencies for cloud environments. We also analyze the privacy guarantees of DP-ORAMs through the lens of information theoretic metrics of Shannon entropy and Min-entropy [16]. Finally, Root ORAM is ideally suited for applications which have a similar access pattern, and we showcase its utility via the application of Private Information Retrieval.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要在这项工作中，我们研究统计隐私是否可以增强Oram机制的性能，同时提供严格的隐私保证。 我们为使用统计安全性开发ORAM协议的正式和严格框架，即私人Oram（DP-Oram）。 我们提出了根Oram，这是一个DP-Oram家族，在所需的带宽开销，本地存储和系统安全性之间提供了可调的，多维的权衡。 我们从理论上分析了根ORAM以量化其安全性和性能。 我们在实验上证明了根Oram的好处，发现（1）根ORAM可以将本地存储开销减少约2倍，以获得合理的隐私预算值，从而大大提高了内存有限平台（例如可信赖的执行环境）的性能，以及（2） Root Oram允许在带宽，存储和隐私之间进行可调整的权衡，从而将带宽开销降低了2×-10×（以增加存储/统计隐私为代价），从而使Oram访问潜伏期的云环境可显着减少。 我们还通过Shannon熵和最小内部信息的信息理论指标来分析DP-orams的隐私保证[16]。 最后，Root Oram非常适合具有类似访问模式的应用程序，我们通过应用私人信息检索来展示其实用程序。
papers.title_zh: 差分私有不经意RAM

papers.title: Diffusion of User Tracking Data in the Online Advertising Ecosystem
papers.authors: Muhammad Ahmad Bashir, Christo Wilson
papers.abstract: Abstract Advertising and Analytics (A&A) companies have started collaborating more closely with one another due to the shift in the online advertising industry towards Real Time Bidding (RTB). One natural way to understand how user tracking data moves through this interconnected advertising ecosystem is by modeling it as a graph. In this paper, we introduce a novel graph representation, called an Inclusion graph, to model the impact of RTB on the diffusion of user tracking data in the advertising ecosystem. Through simulations on the Inclusion graph, we provide upper and lower estimates on the tracking information observed by A&A companies. We find that 52 A&A companies observe at least 91% of an average user’s browsing history under reasonable assumptions about information sharing within RTB auctions. We also evaluate the effectiveness of blocking strategies (e.g., AdBlock Plus), and find that major A&A companies still observe 40–90% of user impressions, depending on the blocking strategy.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于在线广告行业向实时竞标（RTB）的转变，摘要广告和分析（A＆A）公司已经开始更紧密地与彼此合作。 了解用户跟踪数据如何通过此相互联系的广告生态系统移动的一种自然方法是将其作为图形进行建模。 在本文中，我们介绍了一种名为“包含图”的新颖图表表示，以建模RTB对广告生态系统中用户跟踪数据扩散的影响。 通过在包含图上的模拟，我们对A＆A公司观察到的跟踪信息提供了上和较低的估计。 我们发现，在合理假设RTB拍卖中，52 A＆A公司至少观察到普通用户浏览历史记录的91％。 我们还评估了阻止策略的有效性（例如，Adblock Plus），并发现A＆A大型公司仍然观察到40-90％的用户印象，具体取决于阻止策略。
papers.title_zh: 在线广告生态系统中用户跟踪数据的扩散

papers.title: Privacy-Preserving Search of Similar Patients in Genomic Data
papers.authors: Gilad Asharov, Shai Halevi, Yehuda Lindell, Tal Rabin
papers.abstract: Abstract The growing availability of genomic data holds great promise for advancing medicine and research, but unlocking its full potential requires adequate methods for protecting the privacy of individuals whose genome data we use. One example of this tension is running Similar Patient Query on remote genomic data: In this setting a doctor that holds the genome of his/her patient may try to find other individuals with “close” genomic data, and use the data of these individuals to help diagnose and find effective treatment for that patient’s conditions. This is clearly a desirable mode of operation. However, the privacy exposure implications are considerable, and so we would like to carry out the above “closeness” computation in a privacy preserving manner. In this work we put forward a new approach for highly efficient secure computation for computing an approximation of the Similar Patient Query problem. We present contributions on two fronts. First, an approximation method that is designed with the goal of achieving efficient private computation. Second, further optimizations of the two-party protocol. Our tests indicate that the approximation method works well, it returns the exact closest records in 98% of the queries and very good approximation otherwise. As for speed, our protocol implementation takes just a few seconds to run on databases with thousands of records, each of length thousands of alleles, and it scales almost linearly with both the database size and the length of the sequences in it. As an example, in the datasets of the recent iDASH competition, after a one-time preprocessing of around 12 seconds, it takes around a second to find the nearest five records to a query, in a size-500 dataset of length- 3500 sequences. This is 2-3 orders of magnitude faster than using state-of-the-art secure protocols with existing edit distance algorithms.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要基因组数据的日益增长的可用性在进行医学和研究方面具有巨大的希望，但是释放其全部潜力需要足够的方法来保护我们使用的基因组数据的个人的隐私。 这种张力的一个例子是在远程基因组数据上运行类似的患者查询：在此设置中，拥有其患者基因组的医生可能会尝试找到具有“关闭”基因组数据的其他人，并使用这些人的数据来 帮助诊断并为患者的病情找到有效的治疗方法。 这显然是一种理想的操作方式。 但是，隐私暴露的含义是相当大的，因此我们希望以隐私的方式执行上述“亲密”计算。 在这项工作中，我们提出了一种新的方法，用于高效的安全计算，以计算类似患者查询问题的近似值。 我们在两个方面提出贡献。 首先，一种近似方法，其目的是实现有效的私人计算。 其次，两党协议的进一步优化。 我们的测试表明，近似方法效果很好，它返回了98％的查询中最接近的记录，否则近似很好。 至于速度，我们的协议实现仅需几秒钟即可在具有数千个记录的数据库上运行，每个记录都有数千个等位基因，并且与数据库大小和其中序列的长度几乎线性地缩放。 例如，在最近的IDASH竞赛的数据集中，一次性预处理约12秒，大约需要一秒钟才能找到最接近查询的五个记录，该记录是在size-500的长度-3500序列的尺寸-500数据集中 。 这比使用现有编辑距离算法的最新安全协议要快2-3个数量级。
papers.title_zh: 基因组数据中相似患者的隐私保护搜索

papers.title: NoMoAds: Effective and Efficient Cross-App Mobile Ad-Blocking
papers.authors: Anastasia Shuba, Athina Markopoulou, Zubair Shafiq
papers.abstract: Abstract Although advertising is a popular strategy for mobile app monetization, it is often desirable to block ads in order to improve usability, performance, privacy, and security. In this paper, we propose NoMoAds to block ads served by any app on a mobile device. NoMoAds leverages the network interface as a universal vantage point: it can intercept, inspect, and block outgoing packets from all apps on a mobile device. NoMoAds extracts features from packet headers and/or payload to train machine learning classifiers for detecting ad requests. To evaluate NoMoAds, we collect and label a new dataset using both EasyList and manually created rules. We show that NoMoAds is effective: it achieves an F-score of up to 97.8% and performs well when deployed in the wild. Furthermore, NoMoAds is able to detect mobile ads that are missed by EasyList (more than one-third of ads in our dataset). We also show that NoMoAds is efficient: it performs ad classification on a per-packet basis in real-time. To the best of our knowledge, NoMoAds is the first mobile ad-blocker to effectively and efficiently block ads served across all apps using a machine learning approach.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要尽管广告是移动应用货币化的流行策略，但通常希望阻止广告以提高可用性，性能，隐私和安全性。 在本文中，我们建议NOMOADS阻止移动设备上任何应用程序提供的广告。 NomoAds利用网络接口作为通用的有利位置：它可以拦截，检查和阻止移动设备上所有应用程序的传出数据包。 NOMOADS从数据包标题和/或有效载荷提取功能，以培训机器学习分类器以检测广告请求。 要评估NOMOADS，我们使用EasyList和手动创建的规则收集和标记一个新数据集。 我们表明，Nomoads是有效的：它的F得分高达97.8％，并且在部署在野外时的表现良好。 此外，NOMOADS能够检测易于列表丢失的移动广告（我们数据集中的广告的三分之一以上）。 我们还表明，NOMOADS是有效的：它可以实时按每包进行AD分类。 据我们所知，Nomoads是第一个使用机器学习方法有效，有效地阻止在所有应用程序中使用的广告的移动广告障碍者。
papers.title_zh: NoMoAds:有效且高效的跨应用移动广告拦截

papers.title: Power to peep-all: Inference Attacks by Malicious Batteries on Mobile Devices
papers.authors: Pavel Lifshits, Roni Forte, Yedid Hoshen, Matt Halpern, Manuel Philipose, Mohit Tiwari, Mark Silberstein
papers.abstract: Abstract Mobile devices are equipped with increasingly smart batteries designed to provide responsiveness and extended lifetime. However, such smart batteries may present a threat to users’ privacy. We demonstrate that the phone’s power trace sampled from the battery at 1KHz holds enough information to recover a variety of sensitive information. We show techniques to infer characters typed on a touchscreen; to accurately recover browsing history in an open-world setup; and to reliably detect incoming calls, and the photo shots including their lighting conditions. Combined with a novel exfiltration technique that establishes a covert channel from the battery to a remote server via a web browser, these attacks turn the malicious battery into a stealthy surveillance device. We deconstruct the attack by analyzing its robustness to sampling rate and execution conditions. To find mitigations we identify the sources of the information leakage exploited by the attack. We discover that the GPU or DRAM power traces alone are sufficient to distinguish between different websites. However, the CPU and power-hungry peripherals such as a touchscreen are the primary sources of fine-grain information leakage. We consider and evaluate possible mitigation mechanisms, highlighting the challenges to defend against the attacks. In summary, our work shows the feasibility of the malicious battery and motivates further research into system and application-level defenses to fully mitigate this emerging threat.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象的移动设备配备了越来越智能的电池，旨在提供响应能力和延长的寿命。 但是，这种智能电池可能会对用户的隐私构成威胁。 我们证明，手机的电源跟踪是从1kHz的电池中采样的，可以拥有足够的信息来恢复各种敏感信息。 我们展示了推断在触摸屏上键入字符的技术； 在开放世界设置中准确恢复浏览历史记录； 并可靠地检测到传入的呼叫，以及包括照明条件在内的照片。 结合一种新颖的渗透技术，该技术通过网络浏览器建立了从电池到远程服务器的秘密通道，这些攻击将恶意电池变成了隐秘的监视设备。 我们通过分析其对采样率和执行条件的鲁棒性来解构攻击。 为了找到缓解，我们确定攻击利用的信息泄漏的来源。 我们发现，仅GPU或DRAM功率痕迹就足以区分不同的网站。 但是，诸如触摸屏之类的CPU和渴望的外围设备是细粒信息泄漏的主要来源。 我们考虑并评估可能的缓解机制，强调了防御袭击的挑战。 总而言之，我们的工作显示了恶意电池的可行性，并激发了对系统和应用程序级防御的进一步研究，以完全减轻这种新兴威胁。
papers.title_zh: 窥视一切的力量:移动设备上恶意电池的推理攻击

papers.title: PIR-PSI: Scaling Private Contact Discovery
papers.authors: Daniel Demmler, Peter Rindal, Mike Rosulek, Ni Trieu
papers.abstract: Abstract An important initialization step in many social-networking applications is contact discovery, which allows a user of the service to identify which of its existing social contacts also use the service. Naïve approaches to contact discovery reveal a user’s entire set of social/professional contacts to the service, presenting a significant tension between functionality and privacy. In this work, we present a system for private contact discovery, in which the client learns only the intersection of its own contact list and a server’s user database, and the server learns only the (approximate) size of the client’s list. The protocol is specifically tailored to the case of a small client set and large user database. Our protocol has provable security guarantees and combines new ideas with state-of-the-art techniques from private information retrieval and private set intersection. We report on a highly optimized prototype implementation of our system, which is practical on real-world set sizes. For example, contact discovery between a client with 1024 contacts and a server with 67 million user entries takes 1.36 sec (when using server multi-threading) and uses only 4.28 MiB of communication.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要在许多社交网络应用程序中，一个重要的初始化步骤是联系发现，它允许该服务的用户确定其现有的社交联系中的哪些也使用该服务。 幼稚的接触发现方法揭示了用户与该服务的整个社交/专业联系人集合，从而在功能和隐私之间产生了很大的张力。 在这项工作中，我们提出了一个用于私人联系发现的系统，在该系统中，客户端仅了解其自己的联系人列表和服务器的用户数据库的交集，而服务器仅学习客户端列表的（大约）大小。 该协议专门针对小客户端集和大型用户数据库的情况进行量身定制。 我们的协议具有可证明的安全保证，并将新想法与私人信息检索和私人设置交集的最新技术相结合。 我们报告了系统的高度优化的原型实现，该原型实现在现实世界中的大小上是实用的。 例如，具有1024个联系人的客户端与具有6700万用户条目的服务器之间的联系人（使用服务器多线程），仅使用4.28 MIB通信。
papers.title_zh: PIR-PSI:扩展私人联系人发现

papers.title: When the cookie meets the blockchain: Privacy risks of web payments via cryptocurrencies
papers.authors: Steven Goldfeder, Harry A. Kalodner, Dillon Reisman, Arvind Narayanan
papers.abstract: Abstract We show how third-party web trackers can deanonymize users of cryptocurrencies. We present two distinct but complementary attacks. On most shopping websites, third party trackers receive information about user purchases for purposes of advertising and analytics. We show that, if the user pays using a cryptocurrency, trackers typically possess enough information about the purchase to uniquely identify the transaction on the blockchain, link it to the user’s cookie, and further to the user’s real identity. Our second attack shows that if the tracker is able to link two purchases of the same user to the blockchain in this manner, it can identify the user’s cluster of addresses and transactions on the blockchain, even if the user employs blockchain anonymity techniques such as CoinJoin. The attacks are passive and hence can be retroactively applied to past purchases. We discuss several mitigations, but none are perfect.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要我们展示了第三方Web跟踪器如何将加密货币用户脱名。 我们提出了两次不同但互补的攻击。 在大多数购物网站上，第三方跟踪器以广告和分析目的获得有关用户购买的信息。 我们表明，如果用户使用加密货币付款，则跟踪器通常拥有有关购买的足够信息，可以唯一地识别区块链上的交易，将其链接到用户的cookie，并将其链接到用户的真实身份。 我们的第二次攻击表明，如果跟踪器能够以这种方式将同一用户的两个购买链接到区块链，则可以识别用户在区块链上的地址和交易群，即使用户使用了区块链匿名技术，例如COINJOIN 。 攻击是被动的，因此可以追溯地应用于过去的购买。 我们讨论了几种缓解，但没有一个完美。
papers.title_zh: 当饼干遇到区块链:通过加密货币进行网络支付的隐私风险

papers.title: Feature Selection for Website Fingerprinting
papers.authors: Junhua Yan, Jasleen Kaur
papers.abstract: Abstract Website fingerprinting based on TCP/IP headers is of significant relevance to several Internet entities. Prior work has focused only on a limited set of features, and does not help understand the extents of fingerprint-ability. We address this by conducting an exhaustive feature analysis within eight different communication scenarios. Our analysis helps reveal several previously-unknown features in several scenarios, that can be used to fingerprint websites with much higher accuracy than previously demonstrated. This work helps the community better understand the extents of learnability (and vulnerability) from TCP/IP headers.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于TCP/IP标头的摘要网站指纹识别与多个互联网实体具有重要意义。 先前的工作仅集中在有限的功能上，并且无助于了解指纹性能的范围。 我们通过在八个不同的沟通场景中进行详尽的功能分析来解决这一问题。 我们的分析有助于揭示几种以前未知的功能，这些功能可用于指纹网站的准确性比以前所证明的要高得多。 这项工作有助于社区更好地了解TCP/IP标头的可学习性（和脆弱性）的范围。
papers.title_zh: 网站指纹的特征选择

2016.journals_title: Proceedings on Privacy Enhancing Technologies, Volume 2016

papers.title: Editor's Introduction
papers.authors: Apu Kapadia
papers.abstract: Model-driven engineering technologies offer a promising approach to address the inability of third-generation languages to alleviate the complexity of platforms and express domain concepts effectively.
papers.abstract_zh: 模型驱动的工程技术提供了一种有希望的方法来解决第三代语言无法有效地减轻平台的复杂性并有效地表达领域概念。
papers.title_zh: 编辑介绍

papers.title: Fingerprinting Mobile Devices Using Personalized Configurations
papers.authors: Andreas Kurtz, Hugo Gascon, Tobias Becker, Konrad Rieck, Felix C. Freiling
papers.abstract: Abstract Recently, Apple removed access to various device hardware identifiers that were frequently misused by iOS third-party apps to track users. We are, therefore, now studying the extent to which users of smartphones can still be uniquely identified simply through their personalized device configurations. Using Apple’s iOS as an example, we show how a device fingerprint can be computed using 29 different configuration features. These features can be queried from arbitrary thirdparty apps via the official SDK. Experimental evaluations based on almost 13,000 fingerprints from approximately 8,000 different real-world devices show that (1) all fingerprints are unique and distinguishable; and (2) utilizing a supervised learning approach allows returning users or their devices to be recognized with a total accuracy of 97% over time
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要最近，Apple删除了对iOS第三方应用程序经常滥用的各种设备硬件标识符的访问，以跟踪用户。 因此，我们现在正在研究智能手机用户在多大程度上仅通过其个性化设备配置来唯一地识别的用户。 以Apple的iOS为例，我们展示了如何使用29种不同的配置功能来计算设备指纹。 可以通过官方SDK从任意的第三方应用程序查询这些功能。 基于大约8,000种不同现实世界设备的近13,000种指纹的实验评估表明，（1）所有指纹都是独特且可区分的； （2）使用有监督的学习方法允许返回用户或其设备随着时间的推移的总准确度为97％
papers.title_zh: 使用个性化配置对移动设备进行指纹识别

papers.title: Are You Sure You Want to Contact Us? Quantifying the Leakage of PII via Website Contact Forms
papers.authors: Oleksii Starov, Phillipa Gill, Nick Nikiforakis
papers.abstract: Abstract The majority of commercial websites provide users the ability to contact them via dedicated contact pages. In these pages, users are typically requested to provide their names, email addresses, and reason for contacting the website. This effectively makes contact pages a gateway from being anonymous or pseudonymous, i.e., identified via stateful and stateless identifiers, to being eponymous. As such, the environment where users provide their personally identifiable information (PII) has to be trusted and free from intentional and unintentional information leaks. In this paper, we report on the first large-scale study of PII leakage via contact pages of the 100,000 most popular sites of the web. We develop a reliable methodology for identifying and interacting with contact forms as well as techniques that allow us to discover the leakage of PII towards thirdparties, even when that information is obfuscated. Using these methods, we witness the leakage of PII towards third-parties in a wide range of ways, including the leakage through third-party form submissions, third-party scripts that collect PII information from a first-party page, and unintended leakage through a browser’s Referer header. To recover the lost control of users over their PII, we design and develop Formlock, a browser extension that warns the user when contact forms are using PII-leaking practices, and provides the ability to comprehensively lock-down a form so that a user’s details cannot be, neither accidentally, nor intentionally, leaked to third parties
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要大多数商业网站为用户提供了通过专用联系页面与他们联系的能力。 在这些页面中，通常要求用户提供其姓名，电子邮件地址以及与网站联系的原因。 这有效地使联系页面是从匿名或假名，即通过状态和无状态标识符识别到同名的网关。 因此，用户提供其个人身份信息（PII）的环境必须受到信任，并且没有故意和无意的信息泄漏。 在本文中，我们通过网络上100,000个最受欢迎的网站的联系页面进行了首次对PII泄漏的大规模研究。 我们开发了一种可靠的方法，用于识别和与接触形式的互动以及技术，即使在这些信息被混淆的情况下，也使我们能够发现PII向第三方的泄漏。 使用这些方法，我们以多种方式目睹了PII向第三方的泄漏，包括通过第三方形式提交的泄漏，第三方脚本，从第一方页面收集PII信息的第三方脚本，以及通过意外泄漏 浏览器的推荐人标头。 为了恢复用户对PII的丢失的控制，我们设计和开发Formlock，这是一种浏览器扩展程序，警告用户在使用PII-leaking实践时，并提供了全面锁定表单以使用户详细信息的能力 不能偶然或故意泄漏到第三方
papers.title_zh: 您确定要联系我们吗？通过网站联系表格量化PII的泄漏

papers.title: Automobile Driver Fingerprinting
papers.authors: Miro Enev, Alex Takakuwa, Karl Koscher, Tadayoshi Kohno
papers.abstract: Advanced technologies are constantly emerging in automobile industry, which not only provides drivers with a comfortable driving experience, but also enhances the safety of passengers. However, there are still some security issues need to be solved in automobiles, such as automobile driver fingerprinting. At present, identification technologies, such as fingerprint recognition and iris recognition, cannot monitor the driver's identity in real-time manner. Therefore, it is of great significance to design a real-time automobile driver fingerprinting scheme to ensure the safety of people's properties and even lives. Different from previous work concerning automobile driver fingerprinting, in this article, we conduct a comprehensive study on behavioral characteristics of drivers in two vehicles, namely Luxgen U5 SUV and Buick Regal. We exploit the actual data of the controller area network to construct a driver identity comparison library by extracting and processing the feature data. Then, we construct a combined model based on convolutional neural network and support vector domain description to achieve efficient automobile driver fingerprinting. Extensive experimental results show that the proposed driver fingerprinting scheme can dynamically match the driver's identity in real time without affecting the normal driving.
papers.abstract_zh: 高级技术在汽车行业不断出现，这不仅为驾驶员提供了舒适的驾驶体验，而且还可以提高乘客的安全性。 但是，仍然需要在汽车中解决一些安全问题，例如汽车驱动器指纹。 目前，识别技术（例如指纹识别和虹膜识别）无法实时监视驾驶员的身份。 因此，设计实时汽车驱动器指纹方案以确保人们的财产甚至生活的安全是重要的。 与以前关于汽车驱动器指纹的工作不同，在本文中，我们对两辆驾驶员的行为特征进行了全面研究，即两辆车的行为特征，即Luxgen U5 SUV和Buick Regal。 我们利用控制器区域网络的实际数据来通过提取和处理功能数据来构建驱动程序身份比较库。 然后，我们基于卷积神经网络和支持向量域的描述构建一个组合模型，以实现有效的汽车驱动器指纹。 广泛的实验结果表明，所提出的驱动器指纹方案可以实时动态匹配驾驶员的身份，而不会影响正常驾驶。
papers.title_zh: 汽车驾驶员指纹识别

papers.title: Editors' Introduction
papers.authors: Kostas Chatzikokolakis, Aaron Johnson
papers.abstract: Is there currently a crisis of confidence in psychological science reflecting an unprecedented level of doubt among practitioners about the reliability of research findings in the field? It would certainly appear that there is. These doubts emerged and grew as a series of unhappy events unfolded in 2011: the Diederik Stapel fraud case (see Stroebe, Postmes, & Spears, 2012, this issue), the publication in a major social psychology journal of an article purporting to show evidence of extrasensory perception (Bem, 2011) followed by widespread public mockery (see Galak, LeBoeuf, Nelson, & Simmons, in press; Wagenmakers, Wetzels, Borsboom, & van der Maas, 2011), reports by Wicherts and colleagues that psychologists are often unwilling or unable to share their published data for reanalysis (Wicherts, Bakker, & Molenaar, 2011; see also Wicherts, Borsboom, Kats, & Molenaar, 2006), and the publication of an important article in Psychological Science showing how easily researchers can, in the absence of any real effects, nonetheless obtain statistically significant differences through various questionable research practices (QRPs) such as exploring multiple dependent variables or covariates and only reporting these when they yield significant results (Simmons, Nelson, & Simonsohn, 2011). For those psychologists who expected that the embarrassments of 2011 would soon recede into memory, 2012 offered instead a quick plunge from bad to worse, with new indications of outright fraud in the field of social cognition (Simonsohn, 2012), an article in Psychological Science showing that many psychologists admit to engaging in at least some of the QRPs examined by Simmons and colleagues (John, Loewenstein, & Prelec, 2012), troubling new meta-analytic evidence suggesting that the QRPs described by Simmons and colleagues may even be leaving telltale signs visible in the distribution of p values in the psychological literature (Masicampo & Lalande, in press; Simonsohn, 2012), and an acrimonious dust-up in science magazines and blogs centered around the problems some investigators were having in replicating well-known results from the field of social cognition (Bower, 2012; Yong, 2012). Although the very public problems experienced by psychology over this 2-year period are embarrassing to those of us working in the field, some have found comfort in the fact that, over the same period, similar concerns have been arising across the scientific landscape (triggered by revelations that will be described shortly). Some of the suspected causes of unreplicability, such as publication bias (the tendency to publish only positive findings) have been discussed for years; in fact, the phrase file-drawer problem was first coined by a distinguished psychologist several decades ago (Rosenthal, 1979). However, many have speculated that these problems have been exacerbated in recent years as academia reaps the harvest of a hypercompetitive academic climate and an incentive scheme that provides rich rewards for overselling one’s work and few rewards at all for caution and circumspection (see Giner-Sorolla, 2012, this issue). Equally disturbing, investigators seem to be replicating each others’ work even less often than they did in the past, again presumably reflecting an incentive scheme gone askew (a point discussed in several articles in this issue, e.g., Makel, Plucker, & Hegarty, 2012). The frequency with which errors appear in the psychological literature is not presently known, but a number of facts suggest it might be disturbingly high. Ioannidis (2005) has shown through simple mathematical modeling that any scientific field that ignores replication can easily come to the miserable state wherein (as the title of his most famous article puts it) “most published research findings are false” (see also Ioannidis, 2012, this issue, and Pashler & Harris, 2012, this issue). Meanwhile, reports emerging from cancer research have made such grim scenarios seem more plausible: In 2012, several large pharmaceutical companies revealed that their efforts to replicate exciting preclinical findings from published academic studies in cancer biology were only rarely verifying the original results (Begley & Ellis, 2012; see also Osherovich, 2011; Prinz, Schlange, & Asadullah, 2011).
papers.abstract_zh: 目前心理科学是否出现了信任危机，反映出从业者对该领域研究结果的可靠性产生了前所未有的怀疑？显然是有的。随着2011年一系列不愉快事件的发生，这些怀疑出现了，并有所增长:Diederik Stapel欺诈案(见Stroebe，Postmes，& Spears，2012，这一期)，在一份主要的社会心理学杂志上发表了一篇文章，声称显示了超感知觉的证据(Bem，2011)，随后受到了广泛的公开嘲笑(见Galak，LeBoeuf，Nelson，& Simmons，正在出版中；Wagenmakers，Wetzels，Borsboom，& van der Maas，2011)，Wicherts及其同事报告说，心理学家往往不愿意或不能分享他们发表的数据进行再分析(Wicherts，Bakker，& Molenaar，2011；另见Wicherts，Borsboom，Kats，& Molenaar，2006)，以及发表在《心理科学》上的一篇重要文章，该文章表明，在没有任何实际影响的情况下，研究人员可以通过各种有问题的研究实践(qrp)轻松地获得统计学上的显著差异，如探索多个因变量或协变量，并仅在它们产生显著结果时报告这些结果(Simmons，Nelson，& Simonsohn，2011)。对于那些预计2011年的尴尬将很快消失在记忆中的心理学家来说，2012年反而提供了一个从糟糕到更糟糕的快速跳水，在社会认知领域出现了新的明显的欺诈迹象(Simonsohn，2012)，心理科学中的一篇文章显示，许多心理学家承认至少参与了Simmons及其同事检查的一些快速反应程序(John，Loewenstein，& Prelec，2012)。 令人不安的新荟萃分析证据表明，Simmons及其同事描述的qrp甚至可能在心理学文献中的p值分布中留下明显的迹象(Masicampo & Lalande，出版中； Simonsohn，2012)，科学杂志和博客上围绕一些研究人员在复制社会认知领域的知名结果时遇到的问题展开了激烈的争论(Bower，2012；永，2012)。虽然心理学在这两年中所经历的非常公开的问题令我们这些在该领域工作的人感到尴尬，但一些人已经找到了安慰，因为在同一时期，类似的担忧已经在整个科学领域出现(由即将描述的启示引发)。一些不可复制的可疑原因，如发表偏倚(倾向于只发表积极的发现)已经讨论了多年；事实上，抽屉问题这个短语是由一位杰出的心理学家在几十年前首次提出的(Rosenthal，1979)。然而，许多人推测，这些问题在最近几年已经恶化，因为学术界收获了高度竞争的学术氛围和奖励计划，这种奖励计划为过度销售自己的工作提供了丰厚的奖励，而对谨慎和谨慎却几乎没有奖励(见吉纳-索罗拉，2012年，这一期)。同样令人不安的是，研究人员似乎比过去更少地重复彼此的工作，这可能再次反映了一个倾斜的激励机制(这一点在本期的几篇文章中讨论过，例如，马克尔、普吕克尔和赫加蒂，2012)。错误出现在心理学文献中的频率目前还不清楚，但许多事实表明它可能高得令人不安。约安尼迪斯(2005)通过简单的数学建模表明，任何忽视复制的科学领域都很容易陷入悲惨的境地，其中(正如他最著名的文章的标题所言)“大多数发表的研究结果都是错误的”(另见约安尼迪斯，2012，本期，以及Pashler & Harris，2012，本期)。与此同时，来自癌症研究的报告让这种严峻的情景看起来更加可信:2012年，几家大型制药公司透露，他们在癌症生物学方面复制已发表学术研究中令人兴奋的临床前发现的努力很少验证原始结果(Begley & Ellis，2012；另见Osherovich，2011年；普林茨、施朗格和阿萨杜拉，2011年)。
papers.title_zh: 编辑介绍

papers.title: Isolating Graphical Failure-Inducing Input for Privacy Protection in Error Reporting Systems
papers.authors: João Matos, João Garcia, Nuno Coração
papers.abstract: Abstract This work proposes a new privacy-enhancing system that minimizes the disclosure of information in error reports. Error reporting mechanisms are of the utmost importance to correct software bugs but, unfortunately, the transmission of an error report may reveal users’ private information. Some privacy-enhancing systems for error reporting have been presented in the past years, yet they rely on path condition analysis, which we show in this paper to be ineffective when it comes to graphical-based input. Knowing that numerous applications have graphical user interfaces (GUI), it is very important to overcome such limitation. This work describes a new privacy-enhancing error reporting system, based on a new input minimization algorithm called GUIᴍɪɴ that is geared towards GUI, to remove input that is unnecessary to reproduce the observed failure. Before deciding whether to submit the error report, the user is provided with a step-by-step graphical replay of the minimized input, to evaluate whether it still yields sensitive information. We also provide an open source implementation of the proposed system and evaluate it with well-known applications.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要这项工作提出了一种新的增强隐私性系统，该系统将信息报告中的信息披露最小化。 错误报告机制对于纠正软件错误至关重要，但不幸的是，错误报告的传输可能会揭示用户的私人信息。 在过去的几年中，已经提出了一些用于错误报告的隐私性增强系统，但它们依赖于路径条件分析，我们在本文中表明，在基于图形的输入方面，这是无效的。 知道许多应用程序具有图形用户界面（GUI），因此要克服这种限制非常重要。 这项工作描述了一种新的增强隐私错误报告系统，该系统基于一种称为GUIᴍɪɴ的新输入最小化算法，该算法适合GUI，以删除不需要重现观察到的失败的输入。 在确定是否提交错误报告之前，向用户提供了最小化输入的分步图形重播，以评估其是否仍会产生敏感信息。 我们还提供了拟议系统的开源实施，并通过众所周知的应用进行评估。
papers.title_zh: 在错误报告系统中隔离导致故障的图形输入以保护隐私

papers.title: Scalable and Anonymous Group Communication with MTor
papers.authors: Dong Lin, Micah Sherr, Boon Thau Loo
papers.abstract: Abstract This paper presents MTor, a low-latency anonymous group communication system. We construct MTor as an extension to Tor, allowing the construction of multi-source multicast trees on top of the existing Tor infrastructure. MTor does not depend on an external service to broker the group communication, and avoids central points of failure and trust. MTor’s substantial bandwidth savings and graceful scalability enable new classes of anonymous applications that are currently too bandwidth-intensive to be viable through traditional unicast Tor communication-e.g., group file transfer, collaborative editing, streaming video, and real-time audio conferencing. We detail the design of MTor and then analyze its performance and anonymity. By simulating MTor in Shadow and TorPS using realistic models of the live Tor network’s topology and recent consensus records from the live Tor network, we show that MTor achieves a 29% savings in network bandwidth and a 73% reduction in transmission time as compared to the baseline approach for anonymous group communication among 20 group members. We also demonstrate that MTor scales gracefully with the number of group participants, and allows dynamic group composition over time. Importantly, as more Tor users switch to group communication, we show that the overall performance and utilization for group communication improves. Finally, we discuss the anonymity implications of MTor and measure its resistance to traffic correlation.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要本文介绍了MTOR，这是一种低延迟的匿名组通信系统。 我们将MTOR构建为TOR的扩展，从而允许在现有的TOR基础架构之上构建多源多播树。 MTOR不依赖外部服务来促进小组交流，并避免失败和信任的中心点。 MTOR的大量带宽节省和优雅的可扩展性实现了新的匿名应用程序类别，这些应用程序目前过于包含带宽的应用程序，无法通过传统的Unicast Tor Communication-e.g。，组文件传输，协作编辑，流媒体视频和实时音频会议来可行。 我们详细介绍MTOR的设计，然后分析其性能和匿名性。 通过使用Live Tor网络拓扑的现实模型和Live Tor Network的最新共识记录模拟MTOR和TORPS中的MTOR，我们表明MTOR可在网络带宽中节省29％的节省，而与该网络相比，传输时间降低了73％ 20个小组成员之间的匿名小组沟通的基线方法。 我们还证明了MTOR与小组参与者的数量优雅地缩放，并允许随着时间的推移动态组成。 重要的是，随着越来越多的TOR用户切换到小组通信，我们表明了组通信的总体绩效和利用率有所改善。 最后，我们讨论了MTOR的匿名含义，并衡量其对交通相关性的抵抗力。
papers.title_zh: 使用MTor进行可扩展的匿名群组通信

papers.title: Your Choice MATor(s): Large-scale Quantitative Anonymity Assessment of Tor Path Selection Algorithms Against Structural Attacks
papers.authors: Michael Backes, Sebastian Meiser, Marcin Slowik
papers.abstract: In this paper, we present a rigorous methodology for quantifying the anonymity provided by Tor against a variety of structural attacks, i.e., adversaries that corrupt Tor nodes and thereby perform eavesdropping attacks to deanonymize Tor users. First, we provide an algorithmic approach for computing the anonymity impact of such structural attacks against Tor. The algorithm is parametric in the considered path selection algorithm and is, hence, capable of reasoning about variants of Tor and alternative path selection algorithms as well. Second, we present formalizations of various instantiations of structural attacks against Tor and show that the computed anonymity impact of each of these adversaries indeed constitutes a worst-case anonymity bound for the cryptographic realization of Tor. Third, we use our methodology to conduct a rigorous, largescale evaluation of Tor’s anonymity which establishes worst-case anonymity bounds against various structural attacks for Tor and for alternative path selection algorithms such as DistribuTor, SelekTOR, and LASTor. This yields the first rigorous anonymity comparison between different path selection algorithms. As part of our analysis, we quantify the anonymity impact of a path selection transition phase, i.e., a small number of users decides to run an alternative algorithm while the vast majority still uses the original one. The source code of our implementation is publicly available.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们提出了一种严格的方法，用于量化TOR提供的匿名性，以针对各种结构攻击，即损坏Tor节点的对手，从而对窃听攻击进行逐出攻击，以使Tor用户脱颖而出。 首先，我们提供了一种计算这种结构攻击对TOR的匿名影响的算法方法。 该算法在考虑的路径选择算法中是参数，因此，也能够推理TOR和替代路径选择算法的变体。 其次，我们介绍了针对TOR的结构攻击的各种实例化的形式化，并表明这些对手的计算匿名影响确实构成了最坏的匿名性，该匿名性是针对TOR的加密实现的。 第三，我们使用我们的方法来对TOR的匿名性进行严格的，大的评估，该评估对TOR的各种结构攻击建立了最差的匿名性界限，以及用于替代路径选择算法（例如分销商，Selektor和Lastor）。 这产生了不同路径选择算法之间的第一个严格的匿名比较。 作为分析的一部分，我们量化了路径选择过渡阶段的匿名影响，即，少数用户决定运行替代算法，而绝大多数用户仍然使用原始算法。 我们实施的源代码公开可用。
papers.title_zh: 你的选择MATor(s):针对结构化攻击的Tor路径选择算法的大规模量化匿名评估

papers.title: Towards a Model on the Factors Influencing Social App Users' Valuation of Interdependent Privacy
papers.authors: Yu Pu, Jens Grossklags
papers.abstract: Abstract In the context of third-party social apps, the problem of interdependency of privacy refers to users making app adoption decisions which cause the collection and utilization of personal information of users’ friends. In contrast, users’ friends have typically little or no direct influence over these decision-making processes. We conduct a conjoint analysis study with two treatment conditions which vary the app data collection context (i.e., to which degree the functionality of the app makes it necessary for the app developer to collect friends’ information). Analyzing the data, we are able to quantify the monetary value which app users place on their friends’ and their own personal information in each context. Combining these valuations with the responses to a comprehensive survey, we apply structural equation modeling (SEM) analysis to investigate the roles of privacy concern, its antecedents, as well as app data collection context to work towards a model of interdependent privacy for the scenario of third-party social app adoption. We find that individuals’ past experiences regarding privacy invasions are negatively associated with their trust for third-party social apps’ proper handling of their personal information, which in turn influences their concerns for their own privacy associated with third-party social apps. In addition, positive effects of users’ privacy knowledge on concerns for their own privacy and concerns for friends’ privacy regarding app adoption are partially supported. These privacy concerns are further found to affect how users value their own and their friends’ personal information. However, we are unable to support an association between users’ online social capital and their concerns for friends’ privacy. Nor do we have enough evidence to show that treatment conditions moderate the association between the concern for friends’ personal information and the value of such information in app adoption contexts.
papers.abstract_zh: 在第三方社交应用程序的背景下，隐私相互依存的问题是指做出应用程序采用决策的用户会导致收集和利用用户朋友的个人信息。 相比之下，用户的朋友通常对这些决策过程几乎没有直接影响。 我们对两个治疗条件进行了一项联合分析研究，这些处理条件改变了应用程序数据收集上下文（即，应用程序的功能使应用程序开发人员收集朋友的信息是必要的）。 分析数据，我们能够量化应用程序用户在每个上下文中放置在其朋友和他们自己的个人信息上的货币价值。 将这些估值与对综合调查的回应相结合，我们应用结构方程建模（SEM）分析，以调查隐私问题的作用，其先决条件以及应用数据收集上下文，以朝着相互依存的隐私模型致力于以下情况。 第三方社交应用程序采用。 我们发现，个人对隐私入侵的过去经历与他们对第三方社交应用程序正确处理其个人信息的信任有负相关，这反过来又影响了他们对与第三方社交应用相关的隐私的关注。 此外，用户隐私知识对自己隐私的关注以及对朋友采用的隐私的担忧的积极影响得到了部分支持。 进一步发现这些隐私问题会影响用户如何重视自己和朋友的个人信息。 但是，我们无法支持用户的在线社会资本与他们对朋友隐私的关注之间的关联。 我们也没有足够的证据表明，治疗条件减轻了对朋友个人信息的关注与应用程序采用环境中此类信息的价值之间的关联。
papers.title_zh: 社交应用用户对相互依赖隐私价值的影响因素模型研究

papers.title: Efficient Server-Aided 2PC for Mobile Phones
papers.authors: Payman Mohassel, Ostap Orobets, Ben Riva
papers.abstract: Abstract Secure Two-Party Computation (2PC) protocols allow two parties to compute a function of their private inputs without revealing any information besides the output of the computation. There exist low cost general-purpose protocols for semi-honest parties that can be efficiently executed even on smartphones. However, for the case of malicious parties, current 2PC protocols are significantly less efficient, limiting their use to more resourceful devices. In this work we present an efficient 2PC protocol that is secure against malicious parties and is light enough to be used on mobile phones. The protocol is an adaptation of the protocol of Nielsen et al. (Crypto, 2012) to the Server-Aided setting, a natural relaxation of the plain model for secure computation that allows the parties to interact with a server (e.g., a cloud) who is assumed not to collude with any of the parties. Our protocol has two stages: In an offline stage - where no party knows which function is to be computed, nor who else is participating - each party interacts with the server and downloads a file. Later, in the online stage, when two parties decide to execute a 2PC together, they can use the files they have downloaded earlier to execute the computation with cost that is lower than the currently best semi-honest 2PC protocols. We show an implementation of our protocol for Android mobile phones, discuss several optimizations and report on its evaluation for various circuits. For example, the online stage for evaluating a single AES circuit requires only 2.5 seconds and can be further reduced to 1 second (amortized time) with multiple executions.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象安全的两方计算（2PC）协议允许两个方计算其私人输入的函数，而无需揭示计算输出以外的任何信息。 对于半honest政党，存在低成本的通用协议，即使在智能手机上也可以有效地执行。 但是，对于恶意政党的情况，当前的2pc协议的效率明显降低，将其用于更具机智的设备。 在这项工作中，我们提出了一种有效的2PC协议，该协议可抵御恶意派对，并且足够轻到可以在手机上使用。 该方案是Nielsen等人协议的适应。 （Crypto，2012）到服务器辅助设置，这是对安全计算的普通模型的自然放松，该模型允许当事方与服务器（例如，云）交互，后者被认为不与任何当事方相交。 我们的协议有两个阶段：在离线阶段 - 没有什么方知道要计算哪个功能，也不知道谁参与 - 每个方与服务器进行交互并下载文件。 后来，在在线阶段，当两个方决定一起执行2pc时，他们可以使用他们之前下载的文件以低于当前最佳的半honest 2pc协议的成本执行计算。 我们展示了我们针对Android手机的协议的实施，讨论了几种优化并报告其对各种电路的评估。 例如，用于评估单个AES电路的在线阶段仅需要2.5秒，并且可以通过多次执行将其进一步降低到1秒（摊销时间）。
papers.title_zh: 面向移动电话的高效服务器辅助2PC

papers.title: Towards Mining Latent Client Identifiers from Network Traffic
papers.authors: Sakshi Jain, Mobin Javed, Vern Paxson
papers.abstract: Abstract Websites extensively track users via identifiers that uniquely map to client machines or user accounts. Although such tracking has desirable properties like enabling personalization and website analytics, it also raises serious concerns about online user privacy, and can potentially enable illicit surveillance by adversaries who broadly monitor network traffic. In this work we seek to understand the possibilities of latent identifiers appearing in user traffic in forms beyond those already well-known and studied, such as browser and Flash cookies. We develop a methodology for processing large network traces to semi-automatically discover identifiers sent by clients that distinguish users/devices/browsers, such as usernames, cookies, custom user agents, and IMEI numbers. We address the challenges of scaling such discovery up to enterprise-sized data by devising multistage filtering and streaming algorithms. The resulting methodology reflects trade-offs between reducing the ultimate analysis burden and the risk of missing potential identifier strings. We analyze 15 days of data from a site with several hundred users and capture dozens of latent identifiers, primarily in HTTP request components, but also in non-HTTP protocols.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象网站通过标识符广泛跟踪用户，这些标识符唯一地映射到客户端计算机或用户帐户。 尽管这种跟踪具有理想的属性，例如启用个性化和网站分析，但它也引起了人们对在线用户隐私的严重关注，并有可能通过广泛监视网络流量的对手来实现非法监视。 在这项工作中，我们试图了解潜在标识符在用户流量中出现的潜在标识符的可能性，而不是已经知名和研究的表格，例如浏览器和闪光饼干。 我们开发了一种处理大型网络跟踪的方法，以发现由客户/设备/浏览器（例如用户名，cookie，自定义用户代理和IMEI号）区分的客户发送的标识符。 我们通过设计多阶段过滤和流算法来解决将这种发现扩展到企业大小数据的挑战。 最终的方法反映了减轻最终分析负担和缺失潜在标识符字符串的风险之间的权衡。 我们分析了来自几百个用户的站点的15天数据，并捕获了数十个潜在标识符，主要是在HTTP请求组件中，还包括非HTTP协议。
papers.title_zh: 从网络流量中挖掘潜在客户标识符

papers.title: Riffle: An Efficient Communication System With Strong Anonymity
papers.authors: Albert Kwon, David Lazar, Srinivas Devadas, Bryan Ford
papers.abstract: Existing anonymity systems sacrifice anonymity for efficient communication or vice-versa. Onion-routing achieves low latency, high bandwidth, and scalable anonymous communication, but is susceptible to traffic analysis attacks. Designs based on DC-Nets, on the other hand, protect the users against traffic analysis attacks, but sacrifice bandwidth. Verifiable mixnets maintain strong anonymity with low bandwidth overhead, but suffer from high computation overhead instead. In this paper, we present Riffle, a bandwidth and computation efficient communication system with strong anonymity. Riffle consists of a small set of anonymity servers and a large number of users, and guarantees anonymity among all honest clients as long as there exists at least one honest server. Riffle uses a new hybrid verifiable shuffle technique and private information retrieval for bandwidthand computation-efficient anonymous communication. Our evaluation of Riffle in file sharing and microblogging applications shows that Riffle can achieve a bandwidth of over 100KB/s per user in an anonymity set of 200 users in the case of file sharing, and handle over 100,000 users with less than 10 second latency in the case of microblogging.
papers.abstract_zh: 现有的匿名系统为有效的交流或反之亦然牺牲匿名性。 洋葱路线可实现低潜伏期，高带宽和可扩展的匿名通信，但容易受到交通分析攻击的影响。 另一方面，基于DC-NET的设计保护用户免受交通分析攻击，但要牺牲带宽。 可验证的混合网保持在低带宽开销的情况下保持强大的匿名性，但却遭受了高度计算的开销。 在本文中，我们提出了Riffle，这是具有强大匿名性的带宽和计算有效的通信系统。 Riffle由一小部分匿名服务器和大量用户组成，并且只要至少存在一台诚实的服务器，就可以保证所有诚实客户的匿名性。 Riffle使用一种新的混合验证的洗牌技术和私人信息检索，用于带宽计算有效的匿名通信。 我们对文件共享和微博的应用程序的评估表明，在文件共享的情况下，Riffle可以在200个用户的匿名集中实现每个用户的带宽超过100kb/s，并且处理超过1000,000多个用户，并且在100,000多个用户中，在10秒内延迟了10秒。 微博的情况。
papers.title_zh: Riffle:一种高效的强匿名通信系统

papers.title: (Do Not) Track Me Sometimes: Users' Contextual Preferences for Web Tracking
papers.authors: William Melicher, Mahmood Sharif, Joshua Tan, Lujo Bauer, Mihai Christodorescu, Pedro Giovanni Leon
papers.abstract: Abstract Online trackers compile profiles on users for targeting ads, customizing websites, and selling users’ information. In this paper, we report on the first detailed study of the perceived benefits and risks of tracking-and the reasons behind them-conducted in the context of users’ own browsing histories. Prior work has studied this in the abstract; in contrast, we collected browsing histories from and interviewed 35 people about the perceived benefits and risks of online tracking in the context of their own browsing behavior. We find that many users want more control over tracking and think that controlled tracking has benefits, but are unwilling to put in the effort to control tracking or distrust current tools. We confirm previous findings that users’ general attitudes about tracking are often at odds with their comfort in specific situations. We also identify specific situational factors that contribute to users’ preferences about online tracking and explore how and why. Finally, we examine a sample of popular tools for controlling tracking and show that they only partially address the situational factors driving users’ preferences.We suggest opportunities to improve such tools, and explore the use of a classifier to automatically determine whether a user would be comfortable with tracking on a particular page visit; our results suggest this is a promising direction for future work.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象在线跟踪器编译用户的配置文件，以定位广告，自定义网站和出售用户的信息。 在本文中，我们报告了有关跟踪的感知益处和风险的首次详细研究，以及在用户自己的浏览历史上所带来的原因背后的原因。 先前的工作已经抽象地研究了这一点。 相比之下，我们从他们自己的浏览行为的背景下收集了浏览历史记录，并采访了35个人在线跟踪的感知好处和风险。 我们发现，许多用户希望对跟踪进行更多控制，并认为受控跟踪具有好处，但不愿意控制跟踪或不信任当前工具。 我们证实了以前的发现，用户对跟踪的一般态度通常与他们在特定情况下的舒适感不符。 我们还确定了特定的情况因素，这些因素有助于用户对在线跟踪的偏好并探讨如何和原因。 最后，我们研究了一个流行的工具来控制跟踪的样本，并表明它们仅部分解决了驱动用户偏好的情况。我们建议机会改善此类工具，并探索使用分类器以自动确定用户是否会成为用户 可以在特定页面访问中跟踪； 我们的结果表明，这是未来工作的有希望的方向。
papers.title_zh: (不要)有时跟踪我:用户对网络跟踪的上下文偏好

papers.title: XPIR : Private Information Retrieval for Everyone
papers.authors: Carlos Aguilar Melchor, Joris Barrier, Laurent Fousse, Marc-Olivier Killijian
papers.abstract: Abstract A Private Information Retrieval (PIR) scheme is a protocol in which a user retrieves a record from a database while hiding which from the database administrators. PIR can be achieved using mutuallydistrustful replicated databases, trusted hardware, or cryptography. In this paper we focus on the later setting which is known as single-database computationally- Private Information Retrieval (cPIR). Classic cPIR protocols require that the database server executes an algorithm over all the database content at very low speeds which impairs their usage. In [1], given certain assumptions, realistic at the time, Sion and Carbunar showed that cPIR schemes were not practical and most likely would never be. To this day, this conclusion is widely accepted by researchers and practitioners. Using the paradigm shift introduced by lattice-based cryptography, we show that the conclusion of Sion and Carbunar is not valid anymore: cPIR is of practical value. This is achieved without compromising security, using standard crytosystems, and conservative parameter choices.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要私人信息检索（PIR）方案是一个协议，其中用户在隐藏数据库管理员的同时从数据库中检索记录。 可以使用互补的复制数据库，可信赖的硬件或密码学来实现PIR。 在本文中，我们专注于后来的设置，该设置称为单数据库计算 - 私人信息检索（CPIR）。 经典的CPIR协议要求数据库服务器以非常低的速度对所有数据库内容执行算法，从而损害其使用情况。 在[1]中，鉴于某些假设，当时现实，Sion和Carbunar表明，CPIR计划是不切实际的，很可能永远不会。 直到今天，研究人员和从业人员都广泛接受了这一结论。 使用基于晶格的密码学引入的范式偏移，我们表明锡昂和卡泊纳的结论不再有效：CPIR具有实际价值。 使用标准的Crytosystems和保守的参数选择，这是在不损害安全性的情况下实现的。
papers.title_zh: XPIR:面向所有人的私人信息检索

papers.title: Mailet: Instant Social Networking under Censorship
papers.authors: Shuai Li, Nicholas Hopper
papers.abstract: Abstract Social media websites are blocked in many regimes where Internet censorship is applied. In this paper, we introduce Mailet, an unobservable transport proxy which enables the users to access social websites by email applications. Without assuming the Mailet servers are trustworthy, Mailet can support the services requiring privileges without having the complete credential. Particularly, the credential is split and distributed in two Mailet servers, and neither of them can recover the credential alone. To recover the credential in a TLS record message, we propose a highly efficient Galois/ Counter Mode(GCM) based secure computation, which can enable the two servers to conceal their separate credential copies in the computation. We implemented a prototype for Twitter.com to demonstrate the usability and security of Mailet.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象的社交媒体网站在应用互联网审查的许多制度中被阻止。 在本文中，我们介绍了Mailet，这是一种不可观察的运输代理，使用户能够通过电子邮件应用程序访问社交网站。 在不假设Mailet服务器值得信赖的情况下，Mailet可以支持需要特权的服务而无需拥有完整的凭据。 特别是，凭据分配并分配在两个邮件服务器中，并且它们都无法单独恢复凭据。 为了在TLS记录消息中恢复凭据，我们建议基于高效的GALOIS/ COUNTER模式（GCM）的安全计算，这可以使两家服务器能够在计算中隐藏其单独的凭据副本。 我们为Twitter.com实施了原型，以演示Mailet的可用性和安全性。
papers.title_zh: Mailet:审查下的即时社交网络

papers.title: Editors' Introduction
papers.authors: Kostas Chatzikokolakis, Aaron Johnson
papers.abstract: Is there currently a crisis of confidence in psychological science reflecting an unprecedented level of doubt among practitioners about the reliability of research findings in the field? It would certainly appear that there is. These doubts emerged and grew as a series of unhappy events unfolded in 2011: the Diederik Stapel fraud case (see Stroebe, Postmes, & Spears, 2012, this issue), the publication in a major social psychology journal of an article purporting to show evidence of extrasensory perception (Bem, 2011) followed by widespread public mockery (see Galak, LeBoeuf, Nelson, & Simmons, in press; Wagenmakers, Wetzels, Borsboom, & van der Maas, 2011), reports by Wicherts and colleagues that psychologists are often unwilling or unable to share their published data for reanalysis (Wicherts, Bakker, & Molenaar, 2011; see also Wicherts, Borsboom, Kats, & Molenaar, 2006), and the publication of an important article in Psychological Science showing how easily researchers can, in the absence of any real effects, nonetheless obtain statistically significant differences through various questionable research practices (QRPs) such as exploring multiple dependent variables or covariates and only reporting these when they yield significant results (Simmons, Nelson, & Simonsohn, 2011). For those psychologists who expected that the embarrassments of 2011 would soon recede into memory, 2012 offered instead a quick plunge from bad to worse, with new indications of outright fraud in the field of social cognition (Simonsohn, 2012), an article in Psychological Science showing that many psychologists admit to engaging in at least some of the QRPs examined by Simmons and colleagues (John, Loewenstein, & Prelec, 2012), troubling new meta-analytic evidence suggesting that the QRPs described by Simmons and colleagues may even be leaving telltale signs visible in the distribution of p values in the psychological literature (Masicampo & Lalande, in press; Simonsohn, 2012), and an acrimonious dust-up in science magazines and blogs centered around the problems some investigators were having in replicating well-known results from the field of social cognition (Bower, 2012; Yong, 2012). Although the very public problems experienced by psychology over this 2-year period are embarrassing to those of us working in the field, some have found comfort in the fact that, over the same period, similar concerns have been arising across the scientific landscape (triggered by revelations that will be described shortly). Some of the suspected causes of unreplicability, such as publication bias (the tendency to publish only positive findings) have been discussed for years; in fact, the phrase file-drawer problem was first coined by a distinguished psychologist several decades ago (Rosenthal, 1979). However, many have speculated that these problems have been exacerbated in recent years as academia reaps the harvest of a hypercompetitive academic climate and an incentive scheme that provides rich rewards for overselling one’s work and few rewards at all for caution and circumspection (see Giner-Sorolla, 2012, this issue). Equally disturbing, investigators seem to be replicating each others’ work even less often than they did in the past, again presumably reflecting an incentive scheme gone askew (a point discussed in several articles in this issue, e.g., Makel, Plucker, & Hegarty, 2012). The frequency with which errors appear in the psychological literature is not presently known, but a number of facts suggest it might be disturbingly high. Ioannidis (2005) has shown through simple mathematical modeling that any scientific field that ignores replication can easily come to the miserable state wherein (as the title of his most famous article puts it) “most published research findings are false” (see also Ioannidis, 2012, this issue, and Pashler & Harris, 2012, this issue). Meanwhile, reports emerging from cancer research have made such grim scenarios seem more plausible: In 2012, several large pharmaceutical companies revealed that their efforts to replicate exciting preclinical findings from published academic studies in cancer biology were only rarely verifying the original results (Begley & Ellis, 2012; see also Osherovich, 2011; Prinz, Schlange, & Asadullah, 2011).
papers.abstract_zh: 目前心理科学是否出现了信任危机，反映出从业者对该领域研究结果的可靠性产生了前所未有的怀疑？显然是有的。随着2011年一系列不愉快事件的发生，这些怀疑出现了，并有所增长:Diederik Stapel欺诈案(见Stroebe，Postmes，& Spears，2012，这一期)，在一份主要的社会心理学杂志上发表了一篇文章，声称显示了超感知觉的证据(Bem，2011)，随后受到了广泛的公开嘲笑(见Galak，LeBoeuf，Nelson，& Simmons，正在出版中；Wagenmakers，Wetzels，Borsboom，& van der Maas，2011)，Wicherts及其同事报告说，心理学家往往不愿意或不能分享他们发表的数据进行再分析(Wicherts，Bakker，& Molenaar，2011；另见Wicherts，Borsboom，Kats，& Molenaar，2006)，以及发表在《心理科学》上的一篇重要文章，该文章表明，在没有任何实际影响的情况下，研究人员可以通过各种有问题的研究实践(qrp)轻松地获得统计学上的显著差异，如探索多个因变量或协变量，并仅在它们产生显著结果时报告这些结果(Simmons，Nelson，& Simonsohn，2011)。对于那些预计2011年的尴尬将很快消失在记忆中的心理学家来说，2012年反而提供了一个从糟糕到更糟糕的快速跳水，在社会认知领域出现了新的明显的欺诈迹象(Simonsohn，2012)，心理科学中的一篇文章显示，许多心理学家承认至少参与了Simmons及其同事检查的一些快速反应程序(John，Loewenstein，& Prelec，2012)。 令人不安的新荟萃分析证据表明，Simmons及其同事描述的qrp甚至可能在心理学文献中的p值分布中留下明显的迹象(Masicampo & Lalande，出版中； Simonsohn，2012)，科学杂志和博客上围绕一些研究人员在复制社会认知领域的知名结果时遇到的问题展开了激烈的争论(Bower，2012；永，2012)。虽然心理学在这两年中所经历的非常公开的问题令我们这些在该领域工作的人感到尴尬，但一些人已经找到了安慰，因为在同一时期，类似的担忧已经在整个科学领域出现(由即将描述的启示引发)。一些不可复制的可疑原因，如发表偏倚(倾向于只发表积极的发现)已经讨论了多年；事实上，抽屉问题这个短语是由一位杰出的心理学家在几十年前首次提出的(Rosenthal，1979)。然而，许多人推测，这些问题在最近几年已经恶化，因为学术界收获了高度竞争的学术氛围和奖励计划，这种奖励计划为过度销售自己的工作提供了丰厚的奖励，而对谨慎和谨慎却几乎没有奖励(见吉纳-索罗拉，2012年，这一期)。同样令人不安的是，研究人员似乎比过去更少地重复彼此的工作，这可能再次反映了一个倾斜的激励机制(这一点在本期的几篇文章中讨论过，例如，马克尔、普吕克尔和赫加蒂，2012)。错误出现在心理学文献中的频率目前还不清楚，但许多事实表明它可能高得令人不安。约安尼迪斯(2005)通过简单的数学建模表明，任何忽视复制的科学领域都很容易陷入悲惨的境地，其中(正如他最著名的文章的标题所言)“大多数发表的研究结果都是错误的”(另见约安尼迪斯，2012，本期，以及Pashler & Harris，2012，本期)。与此同时，来自癌症研究的报告让这种严峻的情景看起来更加可信:2012年，几家大型制药公司透露，他们在癌症生物学方面复制已发表学术研究中令人兴奋的临床前发现的努力很少验证原始结果(Begley & Ellis，2012；另见Osherovich，2011年；普林茨、施朗格和阿萨杜拉，2011年)。
papers.title_zh: 编辑介绍

papers.title: Linking Health Records for Federated Query Processing
papers.authors: Rinku Dewri, Toan Ong, Ramakrishna Thurimella
papers.abstract: Abstract A federated query portal in an electronic health record infrastructure enables large epidemiology studies by combining data from geographically dispersed medical institutions. However, an individual’s health record has been found to be distributed across multiple carrier databases in local settings. Privacy regulations may prohibit a data source from revealing clear text identifiers, thereby making it non-trivial for a query aggregator to determine which records correspond to the same underlying individual. In this paper, we explore this problem of privately detecting and tracking the health records of an individual in a distributed infrastructure. We begin with a secure set intersection protocol based on commutative encryption, and show how to make it practical on comparison spaces as large as 1010 pairs. Using bigram matching, precomputed tables, and data parallelism, we successfully reduced the execution time to a matter of minutes, while retaining a high degree of accuracy even in records with data entry errors. We also propose techniques to prevent the inference of identifier information when knowledge of underlying data distributions is known to an adversary. Finally, we discuss how records can be tracked utilizing the detection results during query processing.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要电子健康记录基础设施中的联合查询门户通过结合地理分散医疗机构的数据来实现大型流行病学研究。 但是，已经发现个人的健康记录分布在本地设置中的多个运营商数据库中。 隐私法规可能会禁止数据源揭示清晰的文本标识符，从而使查询聚合器不乏味来确定哪些记录与同一基础个体相对应。 在本文中，我们探讨了私下检测和跟踪分布式基础架构中个人健康记录的问题。 我们从基于交换加密的安全集相交协议开始，并展示如何使其在比较空间的1010对上实用。 使用BigRam匹配，预先计算的表和数据并行性，我们将执行时间成功地减少到了几分钟，同时即使在具有数据输入错误的记录中也保持了高度准确性。 当对手知道基础数据分布的知识时，我们还提出了防止标识符信息推断的技术。 最后，我们讨论如何利用查询处理过程中的检测结果来跟踪记录。
papers.title_zh: 为联邦查询处理链接健康记录

papers.title: Beeswax: a platform for private web apps
papers.authors: Jean-Sébastien Légaré, Róbert Sumi, William Aiello
papers.abstract: Abstract Even if a web-based messaging service offered confidential channels, how would users know whether their keys, or indeed even their plaintext, was not being exfiltrated? What if a variety of applications offered confidentiality? How would a user gain trust in all of them? In this paper we argue that a platform for private web applications is the only practical way for users to gain assurance about the confidentiality claims of a large number of full-featured web-services.We introduce Beeswax, a client-side platform that allows confidential data to be exchanged between users at the behest of an application, through a narrow set of APIs. Beeswax installs in a modern browser to deliver a complete practical solution, from key distribution to isolation of private data from the applications, thereby making an analysis of application code unnecessary. This focuses scrutiny and trust on the platform itself, rather than on all the applications using it.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要即使基于网络的消息传递服务提供了机密渠道，用户如何知道他们的钥匙，甚至是他们的明文，都没有被淘汰？ 如果各种应用程序提供了机密性怎么办？ 用户将如何对所有这些都有信任？ 在本文中，我们认为，专用Web应用程序的平台是用户对大量全功能的Web-Services的机密性要求保证的唯一实际方法。我们介绍BeesWax，BeesWax，这是一个客户端平台，允许机密的平台 通过一组狭窄的API在应用程序的要求下在用户之间交换的数据。 BeeSwax在现代浏览器中安装，以提供一个完整的实用解决方案，从关键分布到从应用程序隔离私人数据，从而不必要分析应用程序代码。 这重点介绍了平台本身，而不是使用它的所有应用程序。
papers.title_zh: 蜂蜡:私人网络应用的平台

papers.title: Building a RAPPOR with the Unknown: Privacy-Preserving Learning of Associations and Data Dictionaries
papers.authors: Giulia Fanti, Vasyl Pihur, Úlfar Erlingsson
papers.abstract: Abstract Techniques based on randomized response enable the collection of potentially sensitive data from clients in a privacy-preserving manner with strong local differential privacy guarantees. A recent such technology, RAPPOR [12], enables estimation of the marginal frequencies of a set of strings via privacy-preserving crowdsourcing. However, this original estimation process relies on a known dictionary of possible strings; in practice, this dictionary can be extremely large and/or unknown. In this paper, we propose a novel decoding algorithm for the RAPPOR mechanism that enables the estimation of “unknown unknowns,” i.e., strings we do not know we should be estimating. To enable learning without explicit dictionary knowledge, we develop methodology for estimating the joint distribution of multiple variables collected with RAPPOR. Our contributions are not RAPPOR-specific, and can be generalized to other local differential privacy mechanisms for learning distributions of string-valued random variables.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于随机响应的抽象技术可以以隐私的方式收集客户的潜在敏感数据，并提供强大的当地差异隐私保证。 最近的这项技术，Rappor [12]，可以通过保护隐私的众包来估计一组字符串的边际频率。 但是，这个原始的估计过程依赖于已知的字符串字典。 在实践中，该字典可能非常大和/或未知。 在本文中，我们提出了一种新颖的解码算法，以实现与“未知未知数”的估计，即我们不知道我们应该估算的字符串。 为了使学习能够没有明确的词典知识，我们开发了估计与竞争收集的多个变量的联合分布的方法。 我们的贡献不是拉普尔特定的，并且可以推广到其他局部差异隐私机制，以学习弦值的随机变量的分布。
papers.title_zh: 建立一个未知的说唱者:协会和数据字典的隐私保护学习

papers.title: Black-Box Accumulation: Collecting Incentives in a Privacy-Preserving Way
papers.authors: Tibor Jager, Andy Rupp
papers.abstract: Abstract We formalize and construct black-box accumulation (BBA), a useful building block for numerous important user-centric protocols including loyalty systems, refund systems, and incentive systems (as, e.g., employed in participatory sensing and vehicle-to-grid scenarios). A core requirement all these systems share is a mechanism to let users collect and sum up values (call it incentives, bonus points, reputation points, etc.) issued by some other parties in a privacy-preserving way such that curious operators may not be able to link the different transactions of a user. At the same time, a group of malicious users may not be able to cheat the system by pretending to have collected a higher amount than what was actually issued to them. As a first contribution, we fully formalize the core functionality and properties of this important building block. Furthermore, we present a generic and non-interactive construction of a BBA system based on homomorphic commitments, digital signatures, and non-interactive zero-knowledge proofs of knowledge. For our construction, we formally prove security and privacy properties. Finally, we propose a concrete instantiation of our construction using Groth-Sahai commitments and proofs as well as the optimal structure-preserving signature scheme of Abe et al. and analyze its efficiency.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要我们正式和构建黑盒积累（BBA），这是一个有用的构建块，适用于许多重要的以用户为中心的协议，包括忠诚度系统，退款系统和激励系统（例如，在参与式感应和车辆对网格场景中使用 ）。 核心要求所有这些系统共享都是一种机制，可以让用户收集和总结价值（称其为激励措施，奖励积分，声誉点等），其他各方以隐私性的方式发出 能够链接用户的不同交易。 同时，一群恶意用户可能无法通过假装收集的数量高于实际发给他们的数量来欺骗系统。 作为第一个贡献，我们完全正式化了这个重要构件的核心功能和属性。 此外，我们基于同构承诺，数字签名和非交互式零知识证明知识证明的BBA系统的通用和非相互作用构建。 对于我们的构建，我们正式证明了安全性和隐私权。 最后，我们提出了使用格罗斯 - 撒哈伊（Groth-Sahai）承诺和证明以及Abe等人的最佳结构签名方案对我们的构建进行具体实例化。 并分析其效率。
papers.title_zh: 黑箱积累:以保护隐私的方式收集激励

papers.title: Crowdsourcing for Context: Regarding Privacy in Beacon Encounters via Contextual Integrity
papers.authors: Emmanuel Bello-Ogunu, Mohamed Shehab
papers.abstract: Abstract Research shows that context is important to the privacy perceptions associated with technology. With Bluetooth Low Energy beacons, one of the latest technologies for providing proximity and indoor tracking, the current identifiers that characterize a beacon are not sufficient for ordinary users to make informed privacy decisions about the location information that could be shared. One solution would be to have standardized category and privacy labels, produced by beacon providers or an independent third-party. An alternative solution is to find an approach driven by users, for users. In this paper, we propose a novel crowdsourcing based approach to introduce elements of context in beacon encounters.We demonstrate the effectiveness of this approach through a user study, where participants use a crowd-based mobile app designed to collect beacon category and privacy information as a scavenger hunt game. Results show that our approach was effective in helping users label beacons according to the specific context of a given beacon encounter, as well as the privacy perceptions associated with it. This labeling was done with an accuracy of 92%, and with an acceptance rate of 82% of all recommended crowd labels. Lastly, we conclusively show how crowdsourcing for context can be used towards a user-centric framework for privacy management during beacon encounters.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要研究表明，上下文对与技术相关的隐私感很重要。 借助蓝牙低能信标，这是提供邻近和室内跟踪的最新技术之一，当前表征信标的标识符不足以使普通用户可以就可以共享的位置信息做出明智的隐私决策。 一种解决方案是拥有标准化类别和隐私标签，该标签由信标提供商或独立的第三方制作。 另一种解决方案是为用户找到一种由用户驱动的方法。 在本文中，我们提出了一种基于众包的新方法，以在信标相遇中介绍上下文元素。我们通过用户研究演示了这种方法的有效性，参与者使用基于人群的移动应用程序，旨在将信标类别和隐私信息收集为 寻宝游戏。 结果表明，我们的方法可有效地根据给定标准相遇的特定上下文以及与之相关的隐私感知来帮助用户标记信标。 此标签的精度为92％，接受率的所有推荐人群标签占82％。 最后，我们最终展示了如何将上下文的众包用于以用户为中心的框架，以实现信标遇到的隐私管理。
papers.title_zh: 背景下的众包:通过背景完整性关注灯塔遭遇中的隐私

papers.title: SoK: Privacy on Mobile Devices - It's Complicated
papers.authors: Chad Spensky, Jeffrey Stewart, Arkady Yerukhimovich, Richard Shay, Ari Trachtenberg, Rick Housley, Robert K. Cunningham
papers.abstract: Abstract Modern mobile devices place a wide variety of sensors and services within the personal space of their users. As a result, these devices are capable of transparently monitoring many sensitive aspects of these users’ lives (e.g., location, health, or correspondences). Users typically trade access to this data for convenient applications and features, in many cases without a full appreciation of the nature and extent of the information that they are exposing to a variety of third parties. Nevertheless, studies show that users remain concerned about their privacy and vendors have similarly been increasing their utilization of privacy-preserving technologies in these devices. Still, despite significant efforts, these technologies continue to fail in fundamental ways, leaving users’ private data exposed. In this work, we survey the numerous components of mobile devices, giving particular attention to those that collect, process, or protect users’ private data. Whereas the individual components have been generally well studied and understood, examining the entire mobile device ecosystem provides significant insights into its overwhelming complexity. The numerous components of this complex ecosystem are frequently built and controlled by different parties with varying interests and incentives. Moreover, most of these parties are unknown to the typical user. The technologies that are employed to protect the users’ privacy typically only do so within a small slice of this ecosystem, abstracting away the greater complexity of the system. Our analysis suggests that this abstracted complexity is the major cause of many privacy-related vulnerabilities, and that a fundamentally new, holistic, approach to privacy is needed going forward. We thus highlight various existing technology gaps and propose several promising research directions for addressing and reducing this complexity.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象的现代移动设备将各种传感器和服务放置在用户的个人空间内。 结果，这些设备能够透明地监视这些用户生活的许多敏感方面（例如，位置，健康或信件）。 用户通常会以方便的应用程序和功能进行对这些数据的访问权限，在许多情况下，没有完全欣赏到他们暴露于各种第三方的信息的性质和程度。 尽管如此，研究表明，用户仍然关注自己的隐私，并且供应商同样也在增加对这些设备中隐私技术的利用。 尽管如此，尽管做出了巨大的努力，但这些技术仍以基本的方式继续失败，使用户的私人数据暴露出来。 在这项工作中，我们调查了移动设备的众多组件，特别关注那些收集，处理或保护用户私人数据的组件。 尽管对各个组件进行了广泛的研究和理解，但研究整个移动设备生态系统提供了对其极大的复杂性的重要见解。 这个复杂的生态系统的众多组成部分经常由具有不同利益和激励措施的不同政党建立和控制。 此外，这些政党中的大多数是典型用户未知的。 用于保护用户隐私的技术通常只在本生态系统的一小部分内进行，从而消除了系统的更大复杂性。 我们的分析表明，这种抽象的复杂性是许多与隐私有关的漏洞的主要原因，并且需要一种从根本上进行新的，整体的隐私方法。 因此，我们强调了各种现有的技术差距，并提出了一些有前途的研究方向，以解决和降低这种复杂性。
papers.title_zh: 索克:移动设备上的隐私——这很复杂

papers.title: Students and Taxes: a Privacy-Preserving Study Using Secure Computation
papers.authors: Dan Bogdanov, Liina Kamm, Baldur Kubo, Reimo Rebane, Ville Sokk, Riivo Talviste
papers.abstract: Abstract We describe the use of secure multi-party computation for performing a large-scale privacy-preserving statistical study on real government data. In 2015, statisticians from the Estonian Center of Applied Research (CentAR) conducted a big data study to look for correlations between working during university studies and failing to graduate in time. The study was conducted by linking the database of individual tax payments from the Estonian Tax and Customs Board and the database of higher education events from the Ministry of Education and Research. Data collection, preparation and analysis were conducted using the Share-mind secure multi-party computation system that provided end-to-end cryptographic protection to the analysis. Using ten million tax records and half a million education records in the analysis, this is the largest cryptographically private statistical study ever conducted on real data.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要我们描述了使用安全的多方计算来对真实政府数据进行大规模隐私的统计研究。 2015年，爱沙尼亚应用研究中心（Centar）的统计学家进行了一项大数据研究，以寻找大学研究期间工作与未能及时毕业的相关性。 这项研究是通过将爱沙尼亚税务和海关委员会的个人税款数据库以及教育和研究部的高等教育活动数据库链接。 数据收集，准备和分析是使用股份安全的多方计算系统进行的，该计算系统为分析提供了端到端的加密保护。 在分析中，使用一千万税记录和50万教育记录，这是有史以来最大的密码私人统计研究。
papers.title_zh: 学生和税收:使用安全计算的隐私保护研究

papers.title: Don't Interrupt Me While I Type: Inferring Text Entered Through Gesture Typing on Android Keyboards
papers.authors: Laurent Simon, Wenduan Xu, Ross J. Anderson
papers.abstract: Abstract We present a new side-channel attack against soft keyboards that support gesture typing on Android smartphones. An application without any special permissions can observe the number and timing of the screen hardware interrupts and system-wide software interrupts generated during user input, and analyze this information to make inferences about the text being entered by the user. System-wide information is usually considered less sensitive than app-specific information, but we provide concrete evidence that this may be mistaken. Our attack applies to all Android versions, including Android M where the SELinux policy is tightened. We present a novel application of a recurrent neural network as our classifier to infer text. We evaluate our attack against the “Google Keyboard” on Nexus 5 phones and use a real-world chat corpus in all our experiments. Our evaluation considers two scenarios. First, we demonstrate that we can correctly detect a set of pre-defined “sentences of interest” (with at least 6 words) with 70% recall and 60% precision. Second, we identify the authors of a set of anonymous messages posted on a messaging board. We find that even if the messages contain the same number of words, we correctly re-identify the author more than 97% of the time for a set of up to 35 sentences. Our study demonstrates a new way in which system-wide resources can be a threat to user privacy. We investigate the effect of rate limiting as a countermeasure but find that determining a proper rate is error-prone and fails in subtle cases. We conclude that real-time interrupt information should be made inaccessible, perhaps via a tighter SELinux policy in the next Android version.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要我们提出了针对软键盘的新侧通道攻击，该键盘支持在Android智能手机上打字的手势。 没有任何特殊权限的应用程序可以观察屏幕硬件中断和系统范围的软件中断用户输入期间生成的屏幕硬件的数量和时机，并分析此信息以推断用户输入的文本。 通常认为，系统范围的信息比特定于应用程序的信息不太敏感，但是我们提供了具体的证据表明这可能是错误的。 我们的攻击适用于所有Android版本，包括加紧Selinux政策的Android M。 我们提出了一个经常性神经网络作为分类器推断文本的新颖应用。 我们评估了Nexus 5手机上“ Google键盘”的攻击，并在我们所有实验中都使用现实世界中的聊天语料库。 我们的评估考虑了两种情况。 首先，我们证明我们可以正确检测一组预定的“感兴趣句子”（至少有6个单词），召回70％和60％的精度。 其次，我们确定了在消息传递板上发布的一组匿名消息的作者。 我们发现，即使消息包含相同数量的单词，我们也可以正确地重新识别作者的97％以上时间，以供一组最多35个句子。 我们的研究表明，全系统资源可能对用户隐私构成威胁的新方式。 我们研究限制速率的效果作为对策，但发现确定适当的速率容易出错，并且在微妙的情况下失败。 我们得出的结论是，应该通过下一个Android版本中的更严格的Selinux策略使实时中断信息无法访问。
papers.title_zh: 我打字时不要打断我:推断通过Android键盘上的手势输入的文本

papers.title: Blogs, Twitter Feeds, and Reddit Comments: Cross-domain Authorship Attribution
papers.authors: Rebekah Overdorf, Rachel Greenstadt
papers.abstract: Abstract Stylometry is a form of authorship attribution that relies on the linguistic information to attribute documents of unknown authorship based on the writing styles of a suspect set of authors. This paper focuses on the cross-domain subproblem where the known and suspect documents differ in the setting in which they were created. Three distinct domains, Twitter feeds, blog entries, and Reddit comments, are explored in this work. We determine that state-of-the-art methods in stylometry do not perform as well in cross-domain situations (34.3% accuracy) as they do in in-domain situations (83.5% accuracy) and propose methods that improve performance in the cross-domain setting with both feature and classification level techniques which can increase accuracy to up to 70%. In addition to testing these approaches on a large real world dataset, we also examine real world adversarial cases where an author is actively attempting to hide their identity. Being able to identify authors across domains facilitates linking identities across the Internet making this a key security and privacy concern; users can take other measures to ensure their anonymity, but due to their unique writing style, they may not be as anonymous as they believe.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象样式测量学是一种作者归因的一种形式，它依靠语言信息基于可疑作者的写作方式属于未知作者身份的文档。 本文着重于跨域子问题，在这些子问题上，已知和可疑文件在创建的环境中有所不同。 这项工作探讨了三个不同的域，Twitter提要，博客条目和Reddit评论。 我们确定在跨域情况（准确性34.3％）中，先进方法的最先进方法不能像在域内的情况下（83.5％的精度）一样，并提出提高交叉绩效的方法  - 具有功能和分类水平技术的域设置，可以提高准确性高达70％。 除了在大型现实世界数据集上测试这些方法外，我们还研究了作者正在积极试图隐藏其身份的现实世界对抗情况。 能够识别跨领域的作者有助于将互联网的身份联系起来，从而成为关键的安全性和隐私问题； 用户可以采取其他措施来确保其匿名性，但是由于其独特的写作风格，他们可能不会像他们想象的那样匿名。
papers.title_zh: 博客、Twitter订阅和Reddit评论:跨域作者归属

papers.title: Flying Eyes and Hidden Controllers: A Qualitative Study of People's Privacy Perceptions of Civilian Drones in The US
papers.authors: Yang Wang, Huichuan Xia, Yaxing Yao, Yun Huang
papers.abstract: Abstract Drones are unmanned aircraft controlled remotely or operated autonomously. While the extant literature suggests that drones can in principle invade people’s privacy, little is known about how people actually think about drones. Drawing from a series of in-depth interviews conducted in the United States, we provide a novel and rich account of people’s privacy perceptions of drones for civilian uses both in general and under specific usage scenarios. Our informants raised both physical and information privacy issues against government, organization and individual use of drones. Informants’ reasoning about the acceptance of drone use was in part based on whether the drone is operating in a public or private space. However, our informants differed significantly in their definitions of public and private spaces. While our informants’ privacy concerns such as surveillance, data collection and sharing have been raised for other tracking technologies such as camera phones and closed-circuit television (CCTV), our interviews highlight two heightened issues of drones: (1) powerful yet inconspicuous data collection, (2) hidden and inaccessible drone controllers. These two aspects of drones render some of people’s existing privacy practices futile (e.g., notice recording and ask controllers to stop or delete the recording). Some informants demanded notifications of drones near them and expected drone controllers asking for their explicit permissions before recording. We discuss implications for future privacy-enhancing drone designs.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象无人机是无人飞机控制或自动操作的。 尽管现有的文献表明无人机原则上可以侵犯人们的隐私，但人们对人们对无人机的看法知之甚少。 从美国进行的一系列深入访谈中，我们提供了一个新颖而丰富的叙述，即人们对一般和特定用法场景的无人机对平民使用的隐私感知。 我们的线人提出了针对政府，组织和个人使用无人机的物理和信息隐私问题。 线人对接受无人机使用的推理部分是基于无人机在公共或私人空间中运行的。 但是，我们的线人在公共和私人空间的定义上有很大差异。 尽管我们的线人的隐私问题（例如监视，数据收集和共享）已针对其他跟踪技术（例如相机电话和闭路电视电视（CCTV））提高，但我们的访谈突出了两个高度的无人机问题：（1）强大但不合时宜的数据 收集，（2）隐藏和无法访问的无人机控制器。 无人机的这两个方面使人们的一些现有隐私惯例徒劳无功（例如，通知记录并要求控制者停止或删除录音）。 一些线人要求在他们附近通知无人机，并希望无人机控制器在录制之前要求其明确的权限。 我们讨论对未来增强隐私的无人机设计的影响。
papers.title_zh: 飞眼和隐藏的控制者:美国民众对民用无人机隐私认知的定性研究

papers.title: Access Denied! Contrasting Data Access in the United States and Ireland
papers.authors: Samuel Grogan, Aleecia M. McDonald
papers.abstract: Abstract The ability of an Internet user to access data collected about himself as a result of his online activity is a key privacy safeguard. Online, data access has been overshadowed by other protections such as notice and choice. This paper describes attitudes about data access. 873 US and Irish Internet users participated in a survey designed to examine views on data access to information held by online companies and data brokers. We observed low levels of awareness of access mechanisms along with a high desire for access in both participant groups. We tested three proposed access systems in keeping with industry programs and regulatory proposals. User response was positive. We conclude that access remains an important privacy protection that is inadequately manifested in practice. Our study provides insight for lawmakers and policymakers, as well as computer scientists who implement these systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要互联网用户访问因其在线活动而收集的有关自己的数据的能力是关键的隐私保护。 在线，数据访问已被其他保护（例如通知和选择）所掩盖。 本文描述了有关数据访问的态度。 873美国和爱尔兰互联网用户参加了一项调查，旨在检查有关在线公司和数据经纪人持有的信息的数据访问的观点。 我们观察到访问机制的认识水平较低，同时对两个参与者群体的访问渴望很高。 我们测试了三个建议的访问系统，以与行业计划和监管建议保持一致。 用户响应是积极的。 我们得出的结论是，访问仍然是一个重要的隐私保护，在实践中表现不足。 我们的研究为立法者和政策制定者以及实施这些系统的计算机科学家提供了见解。
papers.title_zh: 拒绝访问！美国和爱尔兰的数据访问对比

papers.title: CovertCast: Using Live Streaming to Evade Internet Censorship
papers.authors: Richard McPherson, Amir Houmansadr, Vitaly Shmatikov
papers.abstract: Abstract We design, implement, and evaluate CovertCast, a censorship circumvention system that broadcasts the content of popular websites in real-time, encrypted video streams on common live-streaming services such as YouTube. CovertCast does not require any modifications to the streaming service and employs the same protocols, servers, and streaming software as any other user of the service. Therefore, CovertCast cannot be distinguished from other live streams by IP address filtering or protocol fingerprinting, raising the bar for censors.
