papers.abstract_zh: 摘要我们设计，实施和评估Covertcast，这是一种审查制度规避系统，该系统在常见的实时流传输服务（例如YouTube）上实时播放流行网站的内容。 Covertcast不需要对流服务进行任何修改，并且使用与该服务的任何其他用户相同的协议，服务器和流软件。 因此，通过IP地址过滤或协议指纹识别，无法将秘密播放与其他实时流有关，从而提高了审查员的标准。
papers.title_zh: CovertCast:利用直播逃避互联网审查

papers.title: Editors' Introduction
papers.authors: Kostas Chatzikokolakis, Aaron Johnson
papers.abstract: Is there currently a crisis of confidence in psychological science reflecting an unprecedented level of doubt among practitioners about the reliability of research findings in the field? It would certainly appear that there is. These doubts emerged and grew as a series of unhappy events unfolded in 2011: the Diederik Stapel fraud case (see Stroebe, Postmes, & Spears, 2012, this issue), the publication in a major social psychology journal of an article purporting to show evidence of extrasensory perception (Bem, 2011) followed by widespread public mockery (see Galak, LeBoeuf, Nelson, & Simmons, in press; Wagenmakers, Wetzels, Borsboom, & van der Maas, 2011), reports by Wicherts and colleagues that psychologists are often unwilling or unable to share their published data for reanalysis (Wicherts, Bakker, & Molenaar, 2011; see also Wicherts, Borsboom, Kats, & Molenaar, 2006), and the publication of an important article in Psychological Science showing how easily researchers can, in the absence of any real effects, nonetheless obtain statistically significant differences through various questionable research practices (QRPs) such as exploring multiple dependent variables or covariates and only reporting these when they yield significant results (Simmons, Nelson, & Simonsohn, 2011). For those psychologists who expected that the embarrassments of 2011 would soon recede into memory, 2012 offered instead a quick plunge from bad to worse, with new indications of outright fraud in the field of social cognition (Simonsohn, 2012), an article in Psychological Science showing that many psychologists admit to engaging in at least some of the QRPs examined by Simmons and colleagues (John, Loewenstein, & Prelec, 2012), troubling new meta-analytic evidence suggesting that the QRPs described by Simmons and colleagues may even be leaving telltale signs visible in the distribution of p values in the psychological literature (Masicampo & Lalande, in press; Simonsohn, 2012), and an acrimonious dust-up in science magazines and blogs centered around the problems some investigators were having in replicating well-known results from the field of social cognition (Bower, 2012; Yong, 2012). Although the very public problems experienced by psychology over this 2-year period are embarrassing to those of us working in the field, some have found comfort in the fact that, over the same period, similar concerns have been arising across the scientific landscape (triggered by revelations that will be described shortly). Some of the suspected causes of unreplicability, such as publication bias (the tendency to publish only positive findings) have been discussed for years; in fact, the phrase file-drawer problem was first coined by a distinguished psychologist several decades ago (Rosenthal, 1979). However, many have speculated that these problems have been exacerbated in recent years as academia reaps the harvest of a hypercompetitive academic climate and an incentive scheme that provides rich rewards for overselling one’s work and few rewards at all for caution and circumspection (see Giner-Sorolla, 2012, this issue). Equally disturbing, investigators seem to be replicating each others’ work even less often than they did in the past, again presumably reflecting an incentive scheme gone askew (a point discussed in several articles in this issue, e.g., Makel, Plucker, & Hegarty, 2012). The frequency with which errors appear in the psychological literature is not presently known, but a number of facts suggest it might be disturbingly high. Ioannidis (2005) has shown through simple mathematical modeling that any scientific field that ignores replication can easily come to the miserable state wherein (as the title of his most famous article puts it) “most published research findings are false” (see also Ioannidis, 2012, this issue, and Pashler & Harris, 2012, this issue). Meanwhile, reports emerging from cancer research have made such grim scenarios seem more plausible: In 2012, several large pharmaceutical companies revealed that their efforts to replicate exciting preclinical findings from published academic studies in cancer biology were only rarely verifying the original results (Begley & Ellis, 2012; see also Osherovich, 2011; Prinz, Schlange, & Asadullah, 2011).
papers.abstract_zh: 目前心理科学是否出现了信任危机，反映出从业者对该领域研究结果的可靠性产生了前所未有的怀疑？显然是有的。随着2011年一系列不愉快事件的发生，这些怀疑出现了，并有所增长:Diederik Stapel欺诈案(见Stroebe，Postmes，& Spears，2012，这一期)，在一份主要的社会心理学杂志上发表了一篇文章，声称显示了超感知觉的证据(Bem，2011)，随后受到了广泛的公开嘲笑(见Galak，LeBoeuf，Nelson，& Simmons，正在出版中；Wagenmakers，Wetzels，Borsboom，& van der Maas，2011)，Wicherts及其同事报告说，心理学家往往不愿意或不能分享他们发表的数据进行再分析(Wicherts，Bakker，& Molenaar，2011；另见Wicherts，Borsboom，Kats，& Molenaar，2006)，以及发表在《心理科学》上的一篇重要文章，该文章表明，在没有任何实际影响的情况下，研究人员可以通过各种有问题的研究实践(qrp)轻松地获得统计学上的显著差异，如探索多个因变量或协变量，并仅在它们产生显著结果时报告这些结果(Simmons，Nelson，& Simonsohn，2011)。对于那些预计2011年的尴尬将很快消失在记忆中的心理学家来说，2012年反而提供了一个从糟糕到更糟糕的快速跳水，在社会认知领域出现了新的明显的欺诈迹象(Simonsohn，2012)，心理科学中的一篇文章显示，许多心理学家承认至少参与了Simmons及其同事检查的一些快速反应程序(John，Loewenstein，& Prelec，2012)。 令人不安的新荟萃分析证据表明，Simmons及其同事描述的qrp甚至可能在心理学文献中的p值分布中留下明显的迹象(Masicampo & Lalande，出版中； Simonsohn，2012)，科学杂志和博客上围绕一些研究人员在复制社会认知领域的知名结果时遇到的问题展开了激烈的争论(Bower，2012；永，2012)。虽然心理学在这两年中所经历的非常公开的问题令我们这些在该领域工作的人感到尴尬，但一些人已经找到了安慰，因为在同一时期，类似的担忧已经在整个科学领域出现(由即将描述的启示引发)。一些不可复制的可疑原因，如发表偏倚(倾向于只发表积极的发现)已经讨论了多年；事实上，抽屉问题这个短语是由一位杰出的心理学家在几十年前首次提出的(Rosenthal，1979)。然而，许多人推测，这些问题在最近几年已经恶化，因为学术界收获了高度竞争的学术氛围和奖励计划，这种奖励计划为过度销售自己的工作提供了丰厚的奖励，而对谨慎和谨慎却几乎没有奖励(见吉纳-索罗拉，2012年，这一期)。同样令人不安的是，研究人员似乎比过去更少地重复彼此的工作，这可能再次反映了一个倾斜的激励机制(这一点在本期的几篇文章中讨论过，例如，马克尔、普吕克尔和赫加蒂，2012)。错误出现在心理学文献中的频率目前还不清楚，但许多事实表明它可能高得令人不安。约安尼迪斯(2005)通过简单的数学建模表明，任何忽视复制的科学领域都很容易陷入悲惨的境地，其中(正如他最著名的文章的标题所言)“大多数发表的研究结果都是错误的”(另见约安尼迪斯，2012，本期，以及Pashler & Harris，2012，本期)。与此同时，来自癌症研究的报告让这种严峻的情景看起来更加可信:2012年，几家大型制药公司透露，他们在癌症生物学方面复制已发表学术研究中令人兴奋的临床前发现的努力很少验证原始结果(Begley & Ellis，2012；另见Osherovich，2011年；普林茨、施朗格和阿萨杜拉，2011年)。
papers.title_zh: 编辑介绍

papers.title: Salmon: Robust Proxy Distribution for Censorship Circumvention
papers.authors: Frederick Douglas, Rorshach, Weiyang Pan, Matthew Caesar
papers.abstract: Abstract Many governments block their citizens’ access to much of the Internet. Simple workarounds are unreliable; censors quickly discover and patch them. Previously proposed robust approaches either have non-trivial obstacles to deployment, or rely on low-performance covert channels that cannot support typical Internet usage such as streaming video. We present Salmon, an incrementally deployable system designed to resist a censor with the resources of the “Great Firewall” of China. Salmon relies on a network of volunteers in uncensored countries to run proxy servers. Although any member of the public can become a user, Salmon protects the bulk of its servers from being discovered and blocked by the censor via an algorithm for quickly identifying malicious users. The algorithm entails identifying some users as especially trustworthy or suspicious, based on their actions. We impede Sybil attacks by requiring either an unobtrusive check of a social network account, or a referral from a trustworthy user.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要许多政府阻止了公民进入大部分互联网的机会。 简单的解决方法是不可靠的； 审查员很快发现并修补它们。 以前提出的强大方法要么具有非平凡的部署障碍，要么依靠无法支持典型的互联网使用（例如流媒体视频）的低绩效秘密渠道。 我们提出了鲑鱼，这是一种可逐渐部署的系统，旨在抵制中国“大防火墙”的资源的审查员。 鲑鱼依靠未经审查的国家 /地区的志愿者网络来运营代理服务器。 尽管任何公众都可以成为用户，但鲑鱼可以保护其大部分服务器，以免通过审查员通过算法发现和阻止其快速识别恶意用户。 该算法需要根据其行动将某些用户识别为特别值得信赖或可疑的算法。 我们通过需要对社交网络帐户的不显眼的检查或值得信赖的用户的推荐来阻碍Sybil攻击。
papers.title_zh: Salmon:规避审查的强大代理分发

papers.title: On Realistically Attacking Tor with Website Fingerprinting
papers.authors: Tao Wang, Ian Goldberg
papers.abstract: Abstract Website fingerprinting allows a local, passive observer monitoring a web-browsing client’s encrypted channel to determine her web activity. Previous attacks have shown that website fingerprinting could be a threat to anonymity networks such as Tor under laboratory conditions. However, there are significant differences between laboratory conditions and realistic conditions. First, in laboratory tests we collect the training data set together with the testing data set, so the training data set is fresh, but an attacker may not be able to maintain a fresh data set. Second, laboratory packet sequences correspond to a single page each, but for realistic packet sequences the split between pages is not obvious. Third, packet sequences may include background noise from other types of web traffic. These differences adversely affect website fingerprinting under realistic conditions. In this paper, we tackle these three problems to bridge the gap between laboratory and realistic conditions for website fingerprinting. We show that we can maintain a fresh training set with minimal resources. We demonstrate several classification-based techniques that allow us to split full packet sequences effectively into sequences corresponding to a single page each. We describe several new algorithms for tackling background noise. With our techniques, we are able to build the first website fingerprinting system that can operate directly on packet sequences collected in the wild.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要网站指纹识别允许当地的被动观察者监视网络浏览客户端的加密频道，以确定其网络活动。 先前的攻击表明，网站指纹可能会威胁到在实验室条件下TOR等匿名网络。 但是，实验室条件和现实条件之间存在显着差异。 首先，在实验室测试中，我们将培训数据集与测试数据集一起收集，因此培训数据集是新鲜的，但是攻击者可能无法维护新的数据集。 其次，实验室数据包序列对应于每个页面，但是对于逼真的数据包序列，页面之间的拆分并不明显。 第三，数据包序列可能包括来自其他类型的Web流量的背景噪声。 这些差异在现实条件下对网站指纹产生不利影响。 在本文中，我们解决了这三个问题，以弥合实验室和现实条件之间网站指纹识别的差距。 我们表明，我们可以维持最低资源的新培训。 我们演示了几种基于分类的技术，使我们能够将完整的数据包序列有效地分为对应于单个页面的序列。 我们描述了几种应对背景噪声的新算法。 借助我们的技术，我们能够构建第一个可以直接在野外收集的数据包序列上运行的网站指纹系统。
papers.title_zh: 基于网站指纹的Tor现实攻击研究

papers.title: SoK: Making Sense of Censorship Resistance Systems
papers.authors: Sheharbano Khattak, Tariq Elahi, Laurent Simon, Colleen M. Swanson, Steven J. Murdoch, Ian Goldberg
papers.abstract: Abstract An increasing number of countries implement Internet censorship at different scales and for a variety of reasons. Several censorship resistance systems (CRSs) have emerged to help bypass such blocks. The diversity of the censor’s attack landscape has led to an arms race, leading to a dramatic speed of evolution of CRSs. The inherent complexity of CRSs and the breadth of work in this area makes it hard to contextualize the censor’s capabilities and censorship resistance strategies. To address these challenges, we conducted a comprehensive survey of CRSs-deployed tools as well as those discussed in academic literature-to systematize censorship resistance systems by their threat model and corresponding defenses. To this end, we first sketch a comprehensive attack model to set out the censor’s capabilities, coupled with discussion on the scope of censorship, and the dynamics that influence the censor’s decision. Next, we present an evaluation framework to systematize censorship resistance systems by their security, privacy, performance and deployability properties, and show how these systems map to the attack model. We do this for each of the functional phases that we identify for censorship resistance systems: communication establishment, which involves distribution and retrieval of information necessary for a client to join the censorship resistance system; and conversation, where actual exchange of information takes place. Our evaluation leads us to identify gaps in the literature, question the assumptions at play, and explore possible mitigations.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要越来越多的国家以不同的范围实施互联网审查制度。 已经出现了几种审查阻力系统（CRS），以帮助绕过此类障碍。 审查员攻击格局的多样性导致了军备竞赛，导致了CRS的发展速度。 CRS的固有复杂性和该领域的工作广度使得很难将审查员的能力和审查阻力策略背景下背景。 为了应对这些挑战，我们对CRSS部署的工具进行了全面的调查，以及学术文献中讨论的工具，通过其威胁模型和相应的防御能力将审查阻力系统系统化。 为此，我们首先绘制了一个综合攻击模型，以阐明审查员的能力，并讨论审查范围的讨论以及影响审查员决定的动态。 接下来，我们提出一个评估框架，通过其安全性，隐私，性能和可部署性属性来系统化审查阻力系统，并显示这些系统如何映射到攻击模型。 我们为我们在审查阻力系统中确定的每个功能阶段：通信建立，涉及客户加入审查制度抵抗系统所需的信息； 和对话，实际信息交换发生。 我们的评估使我们确定文献中的差距，质疑发挥作用的假设，并探索可能的缓解。
papers.title_zh: 索克:理解审查抵制系统

papers.title: Location Privacy with Randomness Consistency
papers.authors: Hao Wu, Yih-Chun Hu
papers.abstract: Abstract Location-Based Social Network (LBSN) applications that support geo-location-based posting and queries to provide location-relevant information to mobile users are increasingly popular, but pose a location-privacy risk to posts. We investigated existing LBSNs and location privacy mechanisms, and found a powerful potential attack that can accurately locate users with relatively few queries, even when location data is well secured and location noise is applied. Our technique defeats previously proposed solutions including fake-location detection and query rate limits. To protect systems from this attack, we propose a simple, scalable, yet effective defense that quantizes the map into squares using hierarchical subdivision, consistently returns the same random result to multiple queries from the same square for posts from the same user, and responds to queries with different distance thresholds in a correlated manner, limiting the information gained by attackers, and ensuring that an attacker can never accurately know the quantized square containing a user. Finally, we verify the performance of our defense and analyze the trade-offs through comprehensive simulation in realistic settings. Surprisingly, our results show that in many environments, privacy level and user accuracy can be tuned using two independent parameters; in the remaining environments, a single parameter adjusts the tradeoff between privacy level and user accuracy. We also thoroughly explore the parameter space to provide guidance for actual deployments.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于位置的摘要社交网络（LBSN）应用程序支持基于地理位置的发布和查询以向移动用户提供与位置相关的信息的应用程序越来越流行，但对帖子构成了位置私人风险。 我们研究了现有的LBSN和位置隐私机制，并发现了强大的潜在攻击，即使在位置数据得到很好的固定位置并应用了位置噪声时，可以准确地找到用户相对较少的查询。 我们的技术击败了以前提出的解决方案，包括伪造检测和查询率限制。 为了保护系统免受此攻击的侵害，我们提出了一个简单，可扩展而有效的防御，使用层次分段将地图量化为正方形，一贯返回相同的随机结果，以从同一用户的帖子中从同一正方形中进行多个查询，并响应 以相关方式具有不同距离阈值的查询，限制了攻击者获得的信息，并确保攻击者永远无法准确了解包含用户的量化正方形。 最后，我们通过在现实环境中的全面模拟来验证防御的表现，并分析了权衡。 令人惊讶的是，我们的结果表明，在许多环境中，可以使用两个独立参数调整隐私级别和用户准确性。 在其余环境中，单个参数调整了隐私级别和用户准确性之间的权衡。 我们还彻底探索了参数空间，以为实际部署提供指导。
papers.title_zh: 具有随机性一致性的位置隐私

papers.title: A Framework for the Game-theoretic Analysis of Censorship Resistance
papers.authors: Tariq Elahi, John A. Doucette, Hadi Hosseini, Steven J. Murdoch, Ian Goldberg
papers.abstract: Abstract We present a game-theoretic analysis of optimal solutions for interactions between censors and censorship resistance systems (CRSs) by focusing on the data channel used by the CRS to smuggle clients’ data past the censors. This analysis leverages the inherent errors (false positives and negatives) made by the censor when trying to classify traffic as either non-circumvention traffic or as CRS traffic, as well as the underlying rate of CRS traffic. We identify Nash equilibrium solutions for several simple censorship scenarios and then extend those findings to more complex scenarios where we find that the deployment of a censorship apparatus does not qualitatively change the equilibrium solutions, but rather only affects the amount of traffic a CRS can support before being blocked. By leveraging these findings, we describe a general framework for exploring and identifying optimal strategies for the censorship circumventor, in order to maximize the amount of CRS traffic not blocked by the censor. We use this framework to analyze several scenarios with multiple data-channel protocols used as cover for the CRS. We show that it is possible to gain insights through this framework even without perfect knowledge of the censor’s (secret) values for the parameters in their utility function.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要，我们通过关注CRS使用的数据通道，以通过审查员的数据来审查客户的数据，对审查员和审查阻力系统（CRS）之间的交互作用进行了游戏理论分析。 该分析利用了审查员试图将流量分类为非循环流量或CRS流量以及CRS流量的基本速率时，利用了审查员的固有错误（误差和负面因素）。 我们为几种简单的审查情况识别NASH平衡解决方案，然后将这些发现扩展到更复杂的场景，在那里我们发现审查机构的部署不会在定性上改变平衡解决方案，而只会影响CRS之前的交通量 被阻止。 通过利用这些发现，我们描述了一个探索和确定审查制度最佳策略的一般框架，以最大程度地提高审查员未阻止的CRS流量的数量。 我们使用此框架来分析多个方案，其中多种数据通道协议用作CRS的封面。 我们表明，即使在其实用程序功能中参数的审查员（秘密）值的完整了解也可以通过此框架获得见解。
papers.title_zh: 抵制审查的博弈分析框架

papers.title: Privacy vs. Reward in Indoor Location-Based Services
papers.authors: Kassem Fawaz, Kyu-Han Kim, Kang G. Shin
papers.abstract: Abstract With the advance of indoor localization technology, indoor location-based services (ILBS) are gaining popularity. They, however, accompany privacy concerns. ILBS providers track the users’ mobility to learn more about their behavior, and then provide them with improved and personalized services. Our survey of 200 individuals highlighted their concerns about this tracking for potential leakage of their personal/private traits, but also showed their willingness to accept reduced tracking for improved service. In this paper, we propose PR-LBS (Privacy vs. Reward for Location-Based Service), a system that addresses these seemingly conflicting requirements by balancing the users’ privacy concerns and the benefits of sharing location information in indoor location tracking environments. PR-LBS relies on a novel location-privacy criterion to quantify the privacy risks pertaining to sharing indoor location information. It also employs a repeated play model to ensure that the received service is proportionate to the privacy risk. We implement and evaluate PR-LBS extensively with various real-world user mobility traces. Results show that PR-LBS has low overhead, protects the users’ privacy, and makes a good tradeoff between the quality of service for the users and the utility of shared location data for service providers.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要随着室内定位技术的发展，室内基于位置的服务（ILB）越来越受欢迎。 但是，他们伴随着隐私问题。 ILBS提供商跟踪用户的移动性，以了解有关其行为的更多信息，然后为他们提供改进和个性化的服务。 我们对200个人的调查强调了他们对这种对个人/私人特征潜在泄漏的跟踪的担忧，但也表明了他们愿意接受减少的跟踪以改善服务。 在本文中，我们提出了PR-LB（隐私与基于位置的服务的奖励），该系统通过平衡用户的隐私问题以及在室内位置跟踪环境中共享位置信息的好处来解决这些看似相互矛盾的要求。 PR-LBS依靠一个新颖的位置私人标准来量化与共享室内位置信息有关的隐私风险。 它还采用重复的游戏模型来确保收到的服务与隐私风险成比例。 我们使用各种现实世界的用户移动轨迹广泛实施和评估PR-LB。 结果表明，PR-LB的开销较低，保护用户的隐私，并在用户的服务质量与服务提供商共享位置数据的实用性之间做出了良好的权衡。
papers.title_zh: 室内定位服务中的隐私与回报

papers.title: The Curious Case of the PDF Converter that Likes Mozart: Dissecting and Mitigating the Privacy Risk of Personal Cloud Apps
papers.authors: Hamza Harkous, Rameez Rahman, Bojan Karlas, Karl Aberer
papers.abstract: Abstract Third party apps that work on top of personal cloud services, such as Google Drive and Drop-box, require access to the user’s data in order to provide some functionality. Through detailed analysis of a hundred popular Google Drive apps from Google’s Chrome store, we discover that the existing permission model is quite often misused: around two-thirds of analyzed apps are over-privileged, i.e., they access more data than is needed for them to function. In this work, we analyze three different permission models that aim to discourage users from installing over-privileged apps. In experiments with 210 real users, we discover that the most successful permission model is our novel ensemble method that we call Far-reaching Insights. Far-reaching Insights inform the users about the data-driven insights that apps can make about them (e.g., their topics of interest, collaboration and activity patterns etc.) Thus, they seek to bridge the gap between what third parties can actually know about users and users’ perception of their privacy leakage. The efficacy of Far-reaching Insights in bridging this gap is demonstrated by our results, as Far-reaching Insights prove to be, on average, twice as effective as the current model in discouraging users from installing over-privileged apps. In an effort to promote general privacy awareness, we deployed PrivySeal, a publicly available privacy-focused app store that uses Far-reaching Insights. Based on the knowledge extracted from data of the store’s users (over 115 gigabytes of Google Drive data from 1440 users with 662 installed apps), we also delineate the ecosystem for 3rd party cloud apps from the standpoint of developers and cloud providers. Finally, we present several general recommendations that can guide other future works in the area of privacy for the cloud. To the best of our knowledge, ours is the first work that tackles the privacy risk posed by 3rd party apps on cloud platforms in such depth.
papers.abstract_zh: 在个人云服务之上使用的抽象第三方应用程序（例如Google Drive和Drop-box）需要访问用户的数据，以提供一些功能。 通过对Google Chrome Store的一百个流行的Google Drive应用程序的详细分析，我们发现现有的许可模型经常被滥用：大约三分之二的分析应用程序过于特权，即它们访问比他们所需的数据更多的数据 功能。 在这项工作中，我们分析了三种不同的许可模型，旨在阻止用户安装过度私密的应用程序。 在与210个真实用户的实验中，我们发现最成功的权限模型是我们称之为深远见解的新颖集合方法。 深远的洞察力将应用程序可以对它们产生的数据驱动的见解（例如，他们的感兴趣，协作和活动模式等主题等）告知用户。 用户和用户对隐私泄漏的看法。 我们的结果证明了深远的洞察力在弥合此差距中的功效，因为深远的见解被证明是平均而言，在阻止用户安装过于私密的应用程序的情况下，平均而言是当前模型的两倍。 为了促进一般隐私意识，我们部署了PrivySeal，这是一种以隐私为重点的应用程序商店，使用了深远的见解。 基于从商店用户的数据中提取的知识（超过115 GB的Google Drive数据，来自1440个用户使用662个已安装的应用程序），我们还从开发人员和云提供商的角度来描述第三方云应用程序的生态系统。 最后，我们提出了一些一般建议，可以指导云隐私领域的其他未来作品。 据我们所知，我们的工作是第一批应对云平台上第三方应用程序在这种深度上构成的隐私风险的工作。
papers.title_zh: 喜欢莫扎特的PDF转换器的奇怪案例:剖析和减轻个人云应用的隐私风险

papers.title: Efficient Server-Aided Secure Two-Party Function Evaluation with Applications to Genomic Computation
papers.authors: Marina Blanton, Fattaneh Bayatbabolghani
papers.abstract: Abstract Computation based on genomic data is becoming increasingly popular today, be it for medical or other purposes. Non-medical uses of genomic data in a computation often take place in a server-mediated setting where the server offers the ability for joint genomic testing between the users. Undeniably, genomic data is highly sensitive, which in contrast to other biometry types, discloses a plethora of information not only about the data owner, but also about his or her relatives. Thus, there is an urgent need to protect genomic data. This is particularly true when the data is used in computation for what we call recreational non-health-related purposes. Towards this goal, in this work we put forward a framework for server-aided secure two-party computation with the security model motivated by genomic applications. One particular security setting that we treat in this work provides stronger security guarantees with respect to malicious users than the traditional malicious model. In particular, we incorporate certified inputs into secure computation based on garbled circuit evaluation to guarantee that a malicious user is unable to modify her inputs in order to learn unauthorized information about the other user’s data. Our solutions are general in the sense that they can be used to securely evaluate arbitrary functions and offer attractive performance compared to the state of the art. We apply the general constructions to three specific types of genomic tests: paternity, genetic compatibility, and ancestry testing and implement the constructions. The results show that all such private tests can be executed within a matter of seconds or less despite the large size of one’s genomic data.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于基因组数据的抽象计算如今越来越流行，无论是出于医学还是其他目的。 计算中基因组数据的非医学用途通常发生在服务器介导的设置中，服务器提供了用户之间的联合基因组测试的能力。 不可否认的是，基因组数据高度敏感，与其他生物特征类型相比，它不仅揭示了有关数据所有者的大量信息，而且还揭示了有关其亲戚的信息。 因此，迫切需要保护基因组数据。 当将数据用于计算中，这是我们所谓的娱乐性非健康相关目的时尤其如此。 为了实现这一目标，在这项工作中，我们提出了服务器辅助的安全两方计算的框架，该框架由基因组应用程序动机的安全模型。 与传统恶意模型相比，我们在这项工作中处理的一种特殊的安全设置可为恶意用户提供更强的安全保证。 特别是，我们将认证的输入纳入基于乱电路评估的安全计算中，以确保恶意用户无法修改其输入，以了解有关其他用户数据的未经授权的信息。 我们的解决方案是一般的，因为它们可以用来安全地评估任意功能并提供与最新状态相比提供有吸引力的性能。 我们将一般结构应用于三种特定类型的基因组检验：亲子鉴定，遗传兼容性和祖先测试和实施结构。 结果表明，尽管一个人的基因组数据尺寸较大，但所有这些私人测试都可以在几秒钟或更短的时间内执行。
papers.title_zh: 高效的服务器辅助安全两方函数评估及其在基因组计算中的应用

papers.title: On the Privacy Implications of Location Semantics
papers.authors: Berker Agir, Kévin Huguenin, Urs Hengartner, Jean-Pierre Hubaux
papers.abstract: Abstract Mobile users increasingly make use of location-based online services enabled by localization systems. Not only do they share their locations to obtain contextual services in return (e.g., ‘nearest restaurant’), but they also share, with their friends, information about the venues (e.g., the type, such as a restaurant or a cinema) they visit. This introduces an additional dimension to the threat to location privacy: location semantics, combined with location information, can be used to improve location inference by learning and exploiting patterns at the semantic level (e.g., people go to cinemas after going to restaurants). Conversely, the type of the venue a user visits can be inferred, which also threatens her semantic location privacy. In this paper, we formalize this problem and analyze the effect of venue-type information on location privacy. We introduce inference models that consider location semantics and semantic privacy-protection mechanisms and evaluate them by using datasets of semantic check-ins from Foursquare, totaling more than a thousand users in six large cities. Our experimental results show that there is a significant risk for users’ semantic location privacy and that semantic information improves inference of user locations.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要移动用户越来越多地利用由本地化系统启用的基于位置的在线服务。 他们不仅共享自己的位置以获得上下文服务的回报（例如“最近的餐厅”），而且他们还与朋友共享有关场地的信息（例如，类型，餐厅或电影院） 访问。 这引入了对位置隐私威胁的额外维度：位置语义以及位置信息，可用于通过在语义层面学习和利用模式来改善位置推断（例如，人们去餐馆后去电影院）。 相反，可以推断出用户访问的场地类型，这也威胁着她的语义位置隐私。 在本文中，我们将此问题进行正式化，并分析场地类型信息对位置隐私的影响。 我们介绍了考虑位置语义和语义隐私保护机制的推理模型，并通过使用Foursquare的语义检查数据集进行评估，总计六个大城市的一千多名用户。 我们的实验结果表明，用户的语义位置隐私存在很大的风险，并且语义信息改善了用户位置的推断。
papers.title_zh: 论位置语义学的隐私含义

papers.title: Lower-Cost ∈-Private Information Retrieval
papers.authors: Raphael R. Toledo, George Danezis, Ian Goldberg
papers.abstract: Abstract Private Information Retrieval (PIR), despite being well studied, is computationally costly and arduous to scale. We explore lower-cost relaxations of information-theoretic PIR, based on dummy queries, sparse vectors, and compositions with an anonymity system. We prove the security of each scheme using a flexible differentially private definition for private queries that can capture notions of imperfect privacy. We show that basic schemes are weak, but some of them can be made arbitrarily safe by composing them with large anonymity systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象的私人信息检索（PIR）尽管进行了充分的研究，但在计算上却是昂贵且艰巨的规模。 我们基于虚拟查询，稀疏向量和具有匿名系统的构图来探索信息理论PIR的较低成本放松。 我们使用灵活的私人定义来证明每种方案的安全性，以捕获不完美的隐私概念的私人查询。 我们表明，基本方案很弱，但是可以通过将它们组成大型匿名系统来任意安全地安全。
papers.title_zh: 低成本∑-私人信息检索

papers.title: Polynomial Batch Codes for Efficient IT-PIR
papers.authors: Ryan Henry
papers.abstract: Abstract Private information retrieval (PIR) is a way for clients to query a remote database without the database holder learning the clients’ query terms or the responses they generate. Compelling applications for PIR are abound in the cryptographic and privacy research literature, yet existing PIR techniques are notoriously inefficient. Consequently, no such PIRbased application to date has seen real-world at-scale deployment. This paper proposes new “batch coding” techniques to help address PIR’s efficiency problem. The new techniques exploit the connection between ramp secret sharing schemes and efficient information-theoretically secure PIR (IT-PIR) protocols. This connection was previously observed by Henry, Huang, and Goldberg (NDSS 2013), who used ramp schemes to construct efficient “batch queries” with which clients can fetch several database records for the same cost as fetching a single record using a standard, non-batch query. The new techniques in this paper generalize and extend those of Henry et al. to construct “batch codes” with which clients can fetch several records for only a fraction the cost of fetching a single record using a standard non-batch query over an unencoded database. The batch codes are highly tuneable, providing a means to trade off (i) lower server-side computation cost, (ii) lower server-side storage cost, and/or (iii) lower uni- or bi-directional communication cost, in exchange for a comparatively modest decrease in resilience to Byzantine database servers.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象的私人信息检索（PIR）是客户查询远程数据库的一种方法，而无需数据库持有人学习客户的查询术语或其生成的响应。 PIR的引人注目的应用在加密和隐私研究文献中充满了比比皆是，但现有的PIR技术效率低下。 因此，迄今为止，尚无此类基于PIRB的应用尚未看到现实世界中的部署。 本文提出了新的“批次编码”技术，以帮助解决PIR的效率问题。 新技术利用了坡道秘密共享方案与有效的信息在理论上安全的PIR（IT-PIR）协议之间的连接。 亨利（Henry），黄（Huang）和戈德堡（Goldberg）先前观察到了这种联系（NDSS 2013），他们使用坡道方案来构建有效的“批次查询”，客户可以使用标准记录以相同的成本获取几个数据库记录，并使用标准记录来获取单个记录，  - 批量查询。 本文中的新技术概括并扩展了亨利等人的新技术。 为了构建“批处理代码”，客户可以使用标准的非批次查询在未编码的数据库上获取单个记录的成本，以获取几个记录。 批处理代码非常可调，提供了一种交易的手段（i）服务器端计算成本较低，（ii）服务器端存储成本较低和/或（iii）较低的单向通信成本，在 交换对拜占庭数据库服务器的弹性相对适度的降低。
papers.title_zh: 高效IT-PIR的多项式批码

papers.title: Circuit-extension handshakes for Tor achieving forward secrecy in a quantum world
papers.authors: John M. Schanck, William Whyte, Zhenfei Zhang
papers.abstract: Abstract We propose a circuit extension handshake for Tor that is forward secure against adversaries who gain quantum computing capabilities after session negotiation. In doing so, we refine the notion of an authenticated and confidential channel establishment (ACCE) protocol and define pre-quantum, transitional, and post-quantum ACCE security. These new definitions reflect the types of adversaries that a protocol might be designed to resist. We prove that, with some small modifications, the currently deployed Tor circuit extension handshake, ntor, provides pre-quantum ACCE security. We then prove that our new protocol, when instantiated with a post-quantum key encapsulation mechanism, achieves the stronger notion of transitional ACCE security. Finally, we instantiate our protocol with NTRU-Encrypt and provide a performance comparison between ntor, our proposal, and the recent design of Ghosh and Kate.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要，我们提出了TOR的电路扩展握手，该电路握手是在会话谈判后获得量子计算能力的对手。 在此过程中，我们完善了经过身份验证和机密渠道建立（ACCE）协议的概念，并定义量化前，过渡和量词后的ACCE安全性。 这些新的定义反映了协议可以抗拒的对手类型。 我们证明，随着一些小的修改，当前部署的TOR电路扩展握手NTOR提供了预先的ACCE安全性。 然后，我们证明我们的新协议与量词后密钥封装机制实例化时，我们实现了过渡性ACCE安全性更强的概念。 最后，我们使用NTRU-Contrypt实例化协议，并提供NTOR，我们的建议和Ghosh和Kate的最新设计之间的性能比较。
papers.title_zh: 在量子世界中实现前向保密的电路扩展握手

papers.title: Tales from the Dark Side: Privacy Dark Strategies and Privacy Dark Patterns
papers.authors: Christoph Bösch, Benjamin Erb, Frank Kargl, Henning Kopp, Stefan Pfattheicher
papers.abstract: Abstract Privacy strategies and privacy patterns are fundamental concepts of the privacy-by-design engineering approach. While they support a privacy-aware development process for IT systems, the concepts used by malicious, privacy-threatening parties are generally less understood and known. We argue that understanding the “dark side”, namely how personal data is abused, is of equal importance. In this paper, we introduce the concept of privacy dark strategies and privacy dark patterns and present a framework that collects, documents, and analyzes such malicious concepts. In addition, we investigate from a psychological perspective why privacy dark strategies are effective. The resulting framework allows for a better understanding of these dark concepts, fosters awareness, and supports the development of countermeasures. We aim to contribute to an easier detection and successive removal of such approaches from the Internet to the benefit of its users.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象的隐私策略和隐私模式是设计工程方法隐私的基本概念。 尽管他们支持IT系统的隐私感知的开发过程，但恶意威胁隐私方使用的概念通常较少了解和已知。 我们认为，理解“黑暗面”，即滥用个人数据是同等重要的。 在本文中，我们介绍了隐私策略和隐私模式的概念，并提出了一个框架，以收集，文件和分析此类恶意概念。 此外，我们从心理学的角度研究了隐私策略为何有效。 由此产生的框架可以更好地理解这些黑暗概念，提高意识并支持对策的发展。 我们的目标是为更容易的检测和连续地从互联网中删除此类方法，从而使用户受益。
papers.title_zh: 来自黑暗面的故事:隐私黑暗策略和隐私黑暗模式

papers.title: Achieving Better Privacy for the 3GPP AKA Protocol
papers.authors: Pierre-Alain Fouque, Cristina Onete, Benjamin Richard
papers.abstract: Abstract Proposed by the 3rd Generation Partnership Project (3GPP) as a standard for 3G and 4G mobile-network communications, the AKA protocol is meant to provide a mutually-authenticated key-exchange between clients and associated network servers. As a result AKA must guarantee the indistinguishability from random of the session keys (key-indistinguishability), as well as client- and server-impersonation resistance. A paramount requirement is also that of client privacy, which 3GPP defines in terms of: user identity confidentiality, service untraceability, and location untraceability. Moreover, since servers are sometimes untrusted (in the case of roaming), the AKA protocol must also protect clients with respect to these third parties. Following the description of client-tracking attacks e.g. by using error messages or IMSI catchers, van den Broek et al. and respectively Arapinis et al. each proposed a new variant of AKA, addressing such problems. In this paper we use the approach of provable security to show that these variants still fail to guarantee the privacy of mobile clients. We propose an improvement of AKA, which retains most of its structure and respects practical necessities such as key-management, but which provably attains security with respect to servers and Man-in-the- Middle (MiM) adversaries. Moreover, it is impossible to link client sessions in the absence of client-corruptions. Finally, we prove that any variant of AKA retaining its mutual authentication specificities cannot achieve client-unlinkability in the presence of corruptions. In this sense, our proposed variant is optimal.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要由第三代伙伴关系项目（3GPP）作为3G和4G移动网络通信的标准，又名协议旨在在客户端和关联的网络服务器之间提供相互认可的密钥交换。 结果，也就是必须保证与会话键的随机性（键 - 可区分性）以及客户端和服务器障碍阻力的不可区分性。 最高要求也是客户隐私的要求，3GPP根据以下方式定义了：用户身份机密性，服务不可信性和位置不可信性。 此外，由于服务器有时是不受信任的（在漫游的情况下），因此，AKA协议还必须保护客户相对于这些第三方。 按照描述客户端跟踪攻击的描述。 通过使用错误消息或IMSI捕捉器，Van Den Broek等人。 和Arapinis等人分别。 每个人都提出了一种新的又名变体，解决了此类问题。 在本文中，我们使用可证明安全性的方法表明这些变体仍然无法保证移动客户端的隐私。 我们提出了对AKA的改进，该改进保留了其大多数结构，并尊重诸如钥匙管理之类的实际必需品，但事实证明，这可以在服务器和中间（MIM）对手方面获得安全性。 此外，在没有客户损失的情况下，不可能将客户会议链接。 最后，我们证明，又称其相互认证特异性的任何变体都无法在腐败存在的情况下实现客户 - 无关紧要。 从这个意义上讲，我们提出的变体是最佳的。
papers.title_zh: 为3GPP AKA协议实现更好的保密性

papers.title: Data-plane Defenses against Routing Attacks on Tor
papers.authors: Henry Tan, Micah Sherr, Wenchao Zhou
papers.abstract: Abstract Tor is susceptible to traffic correlation attacks in which an adversary who observes flows entering and leaving the anonymity network can apply statistical techniques to correlate flows and de-anonymize their endpoints. While an adversary may not be naturally positioned to conduct such attacks, a recent study shows that the Internet’s control-plane can be manipulated to increase an adversary’s view of the network, and consequently, improve its ability to perform traffic correlation. This paper explores, in-depth, the effects of control-plane attacks on the security of the Tor network. Using accurate models of the live Tor network, we quantify Tor’s susceptibility to these attacks by measuring the fraction of the Tor network that is vulnerable and the advantage to the adversary of performing the attacks. We further propose defense mechanisms that protect Tor users from manipulations at the control-plane. Perhaps surprisingly, we show that by leveraging existing trust anchors in Tor, defenses deployed only in the data-plane are sufficient to detect most control-plane attacks. Our defenses do not assume the active participation of Internet Service Providers, and require only very small changes to Tor. We show that our defenses result in a more than tenfold decrease in the effectiveness of certain control-plane attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象的Tor容易受到流量相关攻击的影响，在这种攻击中，观察流入并离开匿名网络的对手可以应用统计技术来关联流量并撤离其端点。 尽管对手可能不会自然地进行此类攻击，但最近的一项研究表明，可以操纵互联网的控制平面以增加对手对网络的看法，从而提高其执行交通相关性的能力。 本文深入探讨了控制平面攻击对TOR网络安全性的影响。 使用实时TOR网络的准确模型，我们通过测量脆弱的TOR网络的分数以及执行攻击的对手的优势来量化Tor对这些攻击的敏感性。 我们进一步提出了防御机制，以保护用户免受控制平面的操纵。 也许令人惊讶的是，我们表明，通过利用TOR中的现有信任锚，仅在数据平面中部署的防御能力就足以检测大多数控制平面攻击。 我们的防御能力不假定互联网服务提供商的积极参与，只需要很小的更改。 我们表明，我们的防御能力导致某些控制平面攻击的有效性降低了十倍以上。
papers.title_zh: 针对Tor路由攻击的数据平面防御

papers.title: Anonymity in Peer-assisted CDNs: Inference Attacks and Mitigation
papers.authors: Yaoqi Jia, Guangdong Bai, Prateek Saxena, Zhenkai Liang
papers.abstract: Abstract The peer-assisted CDN is a new content distribution paradigm supported by CDNs (e.g., Akamai), which enables clients to cache and distribute web content on behalf of a website. Peer-assisted CDNs bring significant bandwidth savings to website operators and reduce network latency for users. In this work, we show that the current designs of peer-assisted CDNs expose clients to privacy-invasive attacks, enabling one client to infer the set of browsed resources of another client. To alleviate this, we propose an anonymous peer-assisted CDN (APAC), which employs content delivery while providing initiator anonymity (i.e., hiding who sends the resource request) and responder anonymity (i.e., hiding who responds to the request) for peers. APAC can be a web service, compatible with current browsers and requiring no client-side changes. Our anonymity analysis shows that our APAC design can preserve a higher level of anonymity than state-of-the-art peer-assisted CDNs. In addition, our evaluation demonstrates that APAC can achieve desired performance gains.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要，同行辅助CDN是由CDN（例如Akamai）支持的新内容分布范式，它使客户能够代表网站缓存和分发Web内容。 同行辅助CDN为网站运营商带来了可观的带宽节省，并减少了用户的网络延迟。 在这项工作中，我们表明，当前的同行辅助CDN的设计使客户暴露于隐私侵入性攻击中，从而使一个客户能够推断另一个客户的浏览资源集。 为了减轻这一点，我们提出了一个匿名同行辅助CDN（APAC），该CDN（APAC）在提供启动者匿名性（即隐藏谁发送资源请求）和响应者的匿名性（即隐藏对同伴响应的人响应谁）时采用内容交付。 Apac可以是Web服务，与当前浏览器兼容，不需要客户端更改。 我们的匿名分析表明，与最先进的同伴辅助CDN相比，我们的APAC设计可以保留更高的匿名性。 此外，我们的评估表明APAC可以实现所需的性能提高。
papers.title_zh: 对等辅助CDNs中的匿名性:推理攻击和缓解

papers.title: Privacy Challenges in the Quantified Self Movement - An EU Perspective
papers.authors: Dominik Leibenger, Frederik Möllers, Anna Petrlic, Ronald Petrlic, Christoph Sorge
papers.abstract: Abstract The gathering of data about oneself (such as running speed, pulse, breathing rate, food consumption, etc.) is rapidly becoming more popular, and has lead to the catch phrase “Quantified Self” (QS). While this trend creates opportunities both for individuals and for society, it also creates risks, due to the data’s personal and often sensitive nature. Countering these risks, while keeping the benefits of QS services, is a task both for the legal system and for the technical community. However, it should also take users’ expectations into account. We therefore analyze the legal situation of QS services based on European law and the privacy policies of some major service providers to clarify the practical consequences for users. We present the result of a study concerning the users’ views on privacy, revealing a conflict between the user’s expectations and the providers’ practices. To help resolve the conflict, we discuss how existing and future privacy-enhancing technologies can avoid the risks associated with QS services.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象收集有关自己的数据（例如跑步速度，脉搏，呼吸速度，食物消耗等）正在迅速变得更加流行，并导致插条短语“量化自我”（QS）。 尽管这种趋势为个人和社会创造了机会，但由于数据的个人性和敏感性，它也会造成风险。 应对这些风险，同时保留QS服务的好处，既是法律体系和技术社区的任务。 但是，它也应考虑用户的期望。 因此，我们根据欧洲法律和一些主要服务提供商的隐私政策分析了QS服务的法律状况，以阐明对用户的实际后果。 我们介绍了一项有关用户对隐私观点的研究的结果，揭示了用户的期望与提供者的实践之间的冲突。 为了帮助解决冲突，我们讨论现有和未来的隐私增强技术如何避免与QS服务相关的风险。
papers.title_zh: 量化自我运动中的隐私挑战——欧盟视角

papers.title: Privately Evaluating Decision Trees and Random Forests
papers.authors: David J. Wu, Tony Feng, Michael Naehrig, Kristin E. Lauter
papers.abstract: Abstract Decision trees and random forests are common classifiers with widespread use. In this paper, we develop two protocols for privately evaluating decision trees and random forests. We operate in the standard two-party setting where the server holds a model (either a tree or a forest), and the client holds an input (a feature vector). At the conclusion of the protocol, the client learns only the model’s output on its input and a few generic parameters concerning the model; the server learns nothing. The first protocol we develop provides security against semi-honest adversaries. We then give an extension of the semi-honest protocol that is robust against malicious adversaries. We implement both protocols and show that both variants are able to process trees with several hundred decision nodes in just a few seconds and a modest amount of bandwidth. Compared to previous semi-honest protocols for private decision tree evaluation, we demonstrate a tenfold improvement in computation and bandwidth.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象决策树和随机森林是普遍使用的常见分类器。 在本文中，我们开发了两个协议，用于私下评估决策树和随机森林。 我们在服务器保存模型（树或森林）的标准两党设置中运行，客户端持有输入（功能向量）。 在协议结束时，客户端仅在其输入中学习模型的输出以及有关模型的一些通用参数。 服务器什么也没学。 我们开发的第一个协议可针对半honest对手提供安全性。 然后，我们提供了半honest协议的扩展，该协议对恶意对手有牢固的态度。 我们实施了协议，并表明两个变体都能够在短短几秒钟内使用数百个决策节点处理树，并且带宽量适中。 与以前用于私人决策树评估的半honest协议相比，我们证明了计算和带宽的十倍改进。
papers.title_zh: 私下评估决策树和随机森林

papers.title: DeNASA: Destination-Naive AS-Awareness in Anonymous Communications
papers.authors: Armon Barton, Matthew Wright
papers.abstract: Abstract Prior approaches to AS-aware path selection in Tor do not consider node bandwidth or the other characteristics that Tor uses to ensure load balancing and quality of service. Further, since the AS path from the client’s exit to her destination can only be inferred once the destination is known, the prior approaches may have problems constructing circuits in advance, which is important for Tor performance. In this paper, we propose and evaluate DeNASA, a new approach to AS-aware path selection that is destination-naive, in that it does not need to know the client’s destination to pick paths, and that takes advantage of Tor’s circuit selection algorithm. To this end, we first identify the most probable ASes to be traversed by Tor streams. We call this set of ASes the Suspect AS list and find that it consists of eight highest ranking Tier 1 ASes. Then, we test the accuracy of Qiu and Gao AS-level path inference on identifying the presence of these ASes in the path, and we show that inference accuracy is 90%. We develop an AS-aware algorithm called DeNASA that uses Qiu and Gao inference to avoid Suspect ASes. DeNASA reduces Tor stream vulnerability by 74%. We also show that DeNASA has performance similar to Tor. Due to the destination-naive property, time to first byte (TTFB) is close to Tor’s, and due to leveraging Tor’s bandwidth-weighted relay selection, time to last byte (TTLB) is also similar to Tor’s.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象的先验方法在TOR中选择了AS-WARE PATH选择不考虑节点带宽或TOR用于确保负载平衡和服务质量的其他特征。 此外，由于只有一旦知道目的地，才能推断出从客户出口到她的目的地的AS路径，因此先前的方法可能会提前构建电路，这对于TOR性能很重要。 在本文中，我们提出并评估Denasa，这是一种目的地选择的新方法，因为它不需要知道客户的目的地来选择路径，并且利用了Tor的电路选择算法。 为此，我们首先确定最可能被TOR流动的ASE。 我们将这组犯罪嫌疑人称为列表，发现它由八个最高排名第1级ASE组成。 然后，我们测试了QiU和GAO作为识别路径中这些ASE的存在的准确性，并表明推断精度为90％。 我们开发了一种称为denasa的感知算法，该算法使用qiu和gao推断来避免可疑的助理。 Denasa将TOR流脆弱性减少了74％。 我们还表明，Denasa的性能与TOR相似。 由于目的地属性，第一字节（TTFB）的时间接近TOR，并且由于利用Tor的带宽加权继电器选择，因此时间到达BYTE（TTLB）也类似于Tor的时间。
papers.title_zh: DeNASA:匿名通信中的目的天真AS感知

papers.title: Efficient Verifiable Range and Closest Point Queries in Zero-Knowledge
papers.authors: Esha Ghosh, Olga Ohrimenko, Roberto Tamassia
papers.abstract: Abstract We present an efficient method for answering one-dimensional range and closest-point queries in a verifiable and privacy-preserving manner. We consider a model where a data owner outsources a dataset of key-value pairs to a server, who answers range and closest-point queries issued by a client and provides proofs of the answers. The client verifies the correctness of the answers while learning nothing about the dataset besides the answers to the current and previous queries. Our work yields for the first time a zero-knowledge privacy assurance to authenticated range and closest-point queries. Previous work leaked the size of the dataset and used an inefficient proof protocol. Our construction is based on hierarchical identity-based encryption. We prove its security and analyze its efficiency both theoretically and with experiments on synthetic and real data (Enron email and Boston taxi datasets).
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要我们提出了一种有效的方法，用于以可验证和隐私的方式回答一维范围和最接近的点查询。 我们考虑一个模型，数据所有者将键值对数据集外包给服务器，该数据集由客户端发出的答案范围和最接近的查询，并提供答案的证明。 客户端验证答案的正确性，而除了当前和以前的查询的答案之外，对数据集的了解一无所知。 我们的工作首次对身份验证的范围和最接近的查询进行零知识的隐私保证。 先前的工作泄漏了数据集的大小，并使用了效率低下的证明协议。 我们的构建基于基于层次身份的加密。 我们证明了它的安全性，并通过理论上以及对合成和真实数据的实验（安然电子邮件和波士顿出租车数据集）进行了分析。
papers.title_zh: 零知识下高效的可验证范围和最近点查询

papers.title: The Right to be Forgotten in the Media: A Data-Driven Study
papers.authors: Minhui Xue, Gabriel Magno, Evandro Cunha, Virgílio A. F. Almeida, Keith W. Ross
papers.abstract: Abstract Due to the recent “Right to be Forgotten” (RTBF) ruling, for queries about an individual, Google and other search engines now delist links to web pages that contain “inadequate, irrelevant or no longer relevant, or excessive” information about that individual. In this paper we take a data-driven approach to study the RTBF in the traditional media outlets, its consequences, and its susceptibility to inference attacks. First, we do a content analysis on 283 known delisted UK media pages, using both manual investigation and Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA). We find that the strongest topic themes are violent crime, road accidents, drugs, murder, prostitution, financial misconduct, and sexual assault. Informed by this content analysis, we then show how a third party can discover delisted URLs along with the requesters’ names, thereby putting the efficacy of the RTBF for delisted media links in question. As a proof of concept, we perform an experiment that discovers two previously-unknown delisted URLs and their corresponding requesters. We also determine 80 requesters for the 283 known delisted media pages, and examine whether they suffer from the “Streisand effect,” a phenomenon whereby an attempt to hide a piece of information has the unintended consequence of publicizing the information more widely. To measure the presence (or lack of presence) of a Streisand effect, we develop novel metrics and methodology based on Google Trends and Twitter data. Finally, we carry out a demographic analysis of the 80 known requesters. We hope the results and observations in this paper can inform lawmakers as they refine RTBF laws in the future.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要由于最近的“被遗忘的权利”（RTBF）裁决，有关个人，Google和其他搜索引擎的疑问，现在将链接链接到包含“不足，无关紧要或不再相关或过度相关或过多的信息”的网页，涉及有关该网页的信息。 个人。 在本文中，我们采用了一种数据驱动的方法来研究传统媒体中的RTBF，其后果以及其对推理攻击的敏感性。 首先，我们使用手动调查和潜在的Dirichlet分配（LDA）对283个已知的英国媒体页面进行了内容分析。 我们发现，最强的话题主题是暴力犯罪，道路事故，毒品，谋杀，卖淫，财务不当行为和性侵犯。 通过此内容分析，我们随后展示了第三方如何发现杂物的URL以及请求者的名字，从而将RTBF的效力赋予了相关的媒体链接。 作为概念的证明，我们执行了一个实验，发现两个以前未知的URL及其相应的请求者。 我们还确定了80位已知媒体媒体页面的80个请求者，并检查他们是否遭受“ streisand效果”的困扰，这是一种试图隐藏信息的现象，其意想不到的结果是更广泛地宣传信息。 为了衡量（或缺乏存在）效果的存在（或缺乏存在），我们根据Google趋势和Twitter数据开发了新颖的指标和方法。 最后，我们对80个已知请求者进行了人口统计分析。 我们希望本文中的结果和观察能够在未来完善RTBF法律的情况下告知立法者。
papers.title_zh: 被媒体遗忘的权利:基于数据的研究

papers.title: On the (In)effectiveness of Mosaicing and Blurring as Tools for Document Redaction
papers.authors: Steven Hill, Zhimin Zhou, Lawrence K. Saul, Hovav Shacham
papers.abstract: Abstract In many online communities, it is the norm to redact names and other sensitive text from posted screenshots. Sometimes solid bars are used; sometimes a blur or other image transform is used. We consider the effectiveness of two popular image transforms - mosaicing (also known as pixelization) and blurring - for redaction of text. Our main finding is that we can use a simple but powerful class of statistical models - so-called hidden Markov models (HMMs) - to recover both short and indefinitely long instances of redacted text. Our approach borrows on the success of HMMs for automatic speech recognition, where they are used to recover sequences of phonemes from utterances of speech. Here we use HMMs in an analogous way to recover sequences of characters from images of redacted text. We evaluate an implementation of our system against multiple typefaces, font sizes, grid sizes, pixel offsets, and levels of noise. We also decode numerous real-world examples of redacted text. We conclude that mosaicing and blurring, despite their widespread usage, are not viable approaches for text redaction.
papers.abstract_zh: 在许多在线社区中，摘要是从已发布的屏幕截图中编辑名称和其他敏感文本的规范。 有时使用固体条； 有时会使用模糊或其他图像变换。 我们考虑了两个流行图像变换的有效性 - 镶嵌（也称为像素化）和模糊 - 用于编写文本。 我们的主要发现是，我们可以使用简单但功能强大的统计模型类别（所谓的隐藏马尔可夫模型（HMM））来恢复简短和无限期的编辑文本实例。 我们的方法借用了HMMS在自动语音识别方面的成功，它们被用来从语音的话语中恢复音素的序列。 在这里，我们以类似的方式使用HMM从编辑的文本图像中恢复字符序列。 我们评估了系统对多个字体，字体大小，网格尺寸，像素偏移和噪声级别的实现。 我们还解码了许多编辑文本的现实示例。 我们得出的结论是，尽管使用了广泛的用法，但镶嵌和模糊不是文本修订的可行方法。
papers.title_zh: 论镶嵌和模糊作为文档编辑工具的无效性

papers.title: Individual versus Organizational Computer Security and Privacy Concerns in Journalism
papers.authors: Susan E. McGregor, Franziska Roesner, Kelly Caine
papers.abstract: Abstract A free and open press is a critical piece of the civil-society infrastructure that supports both established and emerging democracies. However, as the professional activities of reporting and publishing are increasingly conducted by digital means, computer security and privacy risks threaten free and independent journalism around the globe. Through interviews with 15 practicing journalists and 14 organizational stakeholders (supervising editors and technologists), we reveal the distinct - and sometimes conflicting-computer security concerns and priorities of different stakeholder groups within journalistic institutions, as well as unique issues in journalism compared to other types of organizations. As these concerns have not been deeply studied by those designing computer security practices or technologies that may benefit journalism, this research offers insight into some of the practical and cultural constraints that can limit the computer security and privacy practices of the journalism community as a whole. Based on these findings, we suggest paths for future research and development that can bridge these gaps through new tools and practices.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要自由开放媒体是支持建立和新兴民主国家的公民社会基础设施的关键部分。 但是，随着报告和发布的专业活动越来越多地通过数字手段进行，计算机安全和隐私风险威胁着全球自由和独立的新闻业。 通过对15位实践记者和14位组织利益相关者（监督编辑和技术人员）的访谈，我们揭示了新闻机构中不同利益相关者群体的独特 - 有时甚至是冲突的竞争者安全问题和优先事项，以及与其他类型的独特问题相比 组织。 由于那些设计可能受益新闻业的计算机安全实践或技术的人尚未深入研究这些问题，因此这项研究提供了对一些实用和文化约束的见解，这些限制可能会限制整个新闻社区的计算机安全和隐私实践。 基于这些发现，我们建议未来的研发途径，可以通过新的工具和实践弥合这些差距。
papers.title_zh: 新闻业中个人与组织的计算机安全和隐私问题

papers.title: Listening to Whispers of Ripple: Linking Wallets and Deanonymizing Transactions in the Ripple Network
papers.authors: Pedro Moreno-Sanchez, Muhammad Bilal Zafar, Aniket Kate
papers.abstract: Abstract The decentralized I owe you (IOU) transaction network Ripple is gaining prominence as a fast, low-cost and efficient method for performing same and cross-currency payments. Ripple keeps track of IOU credit its users have granted to their business partners or friends, and settles transactions between two connected Ripple wallets by appropriately changing credit values on the connecting paths. Similar to cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, while the ownership of the wallets is implicitly pseudonymous in Ripple, IOU credit links and transaction flows between wallets are publicly available in an online ledger. In this paper, we present the first thorough study that analyzes this globally visible log and characterizes the privacy issues with the current Ripple network. In particular, we define two novel heuristics and perform heuristic clustering to group wallets based on observations on the Ripple network graph. We then propose reidentification mechanisms to deanonymize the operators of those clusters and show how to reconstruct the financial activities of deanonymized Ripple wallets. Our analysis motivates the need for better privacy-preserving payment mechanisms for Ripple and characterizes the privacy challenges faced by the emerging credit networks.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要分散的我欠您（IOU）交易网络涟漪正在成为一种快速，低成本和有效的方法，用于执行相同的交货和跨货币付款。 Ripple跟踪其用户已授予其业务合作伙伴或朋友的信用，并通过适当地改变连接路径上的信用价值来解决两个连接的Ripple钱包之间的交易。 类似于比特币等加密货币，尽管钱包的所有权在Ripple中隐含着化名，但在线分类帐中公开使用了信用链接和钱包之间的交易流。 在本文中，我们介绍了第一个彻底的研究，该研究分析了该全球可见日志，并通过当前的波纹网络来表征隐私问题。 特别是，我们根据有关Ripple网络图的观察结果定义了两种新型的启发式方法，并对组钱包进行启发式聚类。 然后，我们提出了重新识别机制，以使这些群集的运营商脱名单，并展示如何重建脱名字的Ripple Wallets的财务活动。 我们的分析促使需要更好地保存隐私的支付机制来进行波纹，并表征新兴信用网络所面临的隐私挑战。
papers.title_zh: 倾听Ripple的低语:在Ripple网络中连接钱包和去匿名化交易

papers.title: Selfrando: Securing the Tor Browser against De-anonymization Exploits
papers.authors: Mauro Conti, Stephen Crane, Tommaso Frassetto, Andrei Homescu, Georg Koppen, Per Larsen, Christopher Liebchen, Mike Perry, Ahmad-Reza Sadeghi
papers.abstract: Abstract Tor is a well-known anonymous communication system used by millions of users, including journalists and civil rights activists all over the world. The Tor Browser gives non-technical users an easy way to access the Tor Network. However, many government organizations are actively trying to compromise Tor not only in regions with repressive regimes but also in the free world, as the recent FBI incidents clearly demonstrate. Exploiting software vulnerabilities in general, and browser vulnerabilities in particular, constitutes a clear and present threat to the Tor software. The Tor Browser shares a large part of its attack surface with the Firefox browser. Therefore, Firefox vulnerabilities (even patched ones) are highly valuable to attackers trying to monitor users of the Tor Browser. In this paper, we present selfrando-an enhanced and practical load-time randomization technique for the Tor Browser that defends against exploits, such as the one FBI allegedly used against Tor users. Our solution significantly improves security over standard address space layout randomization (ASLR) techniques currently used by Firefox and other mainstream browsers. Moreover, we collaborated closely with the Tor Project to ensure that selfrando is fully compatible with AddressSanitizer (ASan), a compiler feature to detect memory corruption. ASan is used in a hardened version of Tor Browser for test purposes. The Tor Project decided to include our solution in the hardened releases of the Tor Browser, which is currently undergoing field testing.
papers.abstract_zh: Abstract Tor是一种著名的匿名通信系统，其中数百万用户，包括世界各地的记者和民权活动家。 TOR浏览器为非技术用户提供了访问TOR网络的简便方法。 但是，许多政府组织正在积极试图妥协不仅在具有压制性政权的地区，而且在自由世界中，正如最近的联邦调查局事件明确表明的那样。 一般而言，尤其是浏览器漏洞，构成了对TOR软件的明确而当前的威胁。 TOR浏览器与Firefox浏览器共享其攻击表面的很大一部分。 因此，Firefox漏洞（甚至是修补程序）对于试图监视TOR浏览器的用户的攻击者非常有价值。 在本文中，我们为TOR浏览器介绍了Selfrando-AN增强且实用的加载时间随机化技术，该技术可以防御可用于漏洞的漏洞，例如据称对TOR用户使用的FBI。 我们的解决方案大大提高了Firefox和其他主流浏览器当前使用的标准地址空间布局随机化（ASLR）技术的安全性。 此外，我们与TOR项目紧密合作，以确保SelfRando与advelionSanitizer（ASAN）完全兼容，这是一种编译器功能，可检测内存损坏。 ASAN用于测试目的的TOR浏览器的硬化版本中。 TOR项目决定将我们的解决方案包括在TOR浏览器的硬化版本中，该版本目前正在进行现场测试。
papers.title_zh: Selfrando:保护Tor浏览器免受匿名攻击

papers.title: Near-Optimal Fingerprinting with Constraints
papers.authors: Gábor György Gulyás, Gergely Ács, Claude Castelluccia
papers.abstract: Abstract Several recent studies have demonstrated that people show large behavioural uniqueness. This has serious privacy implications as most individuals become increasingly re-identifiable in large datasets or can be tracked, while they are browsing the web, using only a couple of their attributes, called as their fingerprints. Often, the success of these attacks depends on explicit constraints on the number of attributes learnable about individuals, i.e., the size of their fingerprints. These constraints can be budget as well as technical constraints imposed by the data holder. For instance, Apple restricts the number of applications that can be called by another application on iOS in order to mitigate the potential privacy threats of leaking the list of installed applications on a device. In this work, we address the problem of identifying the attributes (e.g., smartphone applications) that can serve as a fingerprint of users given constraints on the size of the fingerprint. We give the best fingerprinting algorithms in general, and evaluate their effectiveness on several real-world datasets. Our results show that current privacy guards limiting the number of attributes that can be queried about individuals is insufficient to mitigate their potential privacy risks in many practical cases.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要最近的一些研究表明，人们表现出巨大的行为独特性。 这具有严重的隐私影响，因为大多数人在大型数据集中变得越来越重新识别，或者可以在浏览网络时仅使用几个属性（称为其指纹）。 通常，这些攻击的成功取决于对有关个人的属性数量的明确约束，即指纹的大小。 这些限制可以是数据持有人施加的预算以及技术约束。 例如，Apple限制了iOS上另一个应用程序可以调用的应用程序数量，以减轻泄露设备上已安装应用程序列表的潜在隐私威胁。 在这项工作中，我们解决了可以识别属性（例如，智能手机应用程序）的问题，这些属性可以用作用户的指纹，给出了对指纹大小的限制。 通常，我们提供最佳的指纹算法，并评估它们对几个现实数据集的有效性。 我们的结果表明，当前的隐私警卫限制了可以查询个人的属性数量，在许多实际情况下不足以减轻其潜在的隐私风险。
papers.title_zh: 带约束的近似最优指纹识别

2015.journals_title: Proceedings on Privacy Enhancing Technologies, Volume 2015

papers.title: Editors' Introduction
papers.authors: Kostas Chatzikokolakis, Aaron Johnson
papers.abstract: Is there currently a crisis of confidence in psychological science reflecting an unprecedented level of doubt among practitioners about the reliability of research findings in the field? It would certainly appear that there is. These doubts emerged and grew as a series of unhappy events unfolded in 2011: the Diederik Stapel fraud case (see Stroebe, Postmes, & Spears, 2012, this issue), the publication in a major social psychology journal of an article purporting to show evidence of extrasensory perception (Bem, 2011) followed by widespread public mockery (see Galak, LeBoeuf, Nelson, & Simmons, in press; Wagenmakers, Wetzels, Borsboom, & van der Maas, 2011), reports by Wicherts and colleagues that psychologists are often unwilling or unable to share their published data for reanalysis (Wicherts, Bakker, & Molenaar, 2011; see also Wicherts, Borsboom, Kats, & Molenaar, 2006), and the publication of an important article in Psychological Science showing how easily researchers can, in the absence of any real effects, nonetheless obtain statistically significant differences through various questionable research practices (QRPs) such as exploring multiple dependent variables or covariates and only reporting these when they yield significant results (Simmons, Nelson, & Simonsohn, 2011). For those psychologists who expected that the embarrassments of 2011 would soon recede into memory, 2012 offered instead a quick plunge from bad to worse, with new indications of outright fraud in the field of social cognition (Simonsohn, 2012), an article in Psychological Science showing that many psychologists admit to engaging in at least some of the QRPs examined by Simmons and colleagues (John, Loewenstein, & Prelec, 2012), troubling new meta-analytic evidence suggesting that the QRPs described by Simmons and colleagues may even be leaving telltale signs visible in the distribution of p values in the psychological literature (Masicampo & Lalande, in press; Simonsohn, 2012), and an acrimonious dust-up in science magazines and blogs centered around the problems some investigators were having in replicating well-known results from the field of social cognition (Bower, 2012; Yong, 2012). Although the very public problems experienced by psychology over this 2-year period are embarrassing to those of us working in the field, some have found comfort in the fact that, over the same period, similar concerns have been arising across the scientific landscape (triggered by revelations that will be described shortly). Some of the suspected causes of unreplicability, such as publication bias (the tendency to publish only positive findings) have been discussed for years; in fact, the phrase file-drawer problem was first coined by a distinguished psychologist several decades ago (Rosenthal, 1979). However, many have speculated that these problems have been exacerbated in recent years as academia reaps the harvest of a hypercompetitive academic climate and an incentive scheme that provides rich rewards for overselling one’s work and few rewards at all for caution and circumspection (see Giner-Sorolla, 2012, this issue). Equally disturbing, investigators seem to be replicating each others’ work even less often than they did in the past, again presumably reflecting an incentive scheme gone askew (a point discussed in several articles in this issue, e.g., Makel, Plucker, & Hegarty, 2012). The frequency with which errors appear in the psychological literature is not presently known, but a number of facts suggest it might be disturbingly high. Ioannidis (2005) has shown through simple mathematical modeling that any scientific field that ignores replication can easily come to the miserable state wherein (as the title of his most famous article puts it) “most published research findings are false” (see also Ioannidis, 2012, this issue, and Pashler & Harris, 2012, this issue). Meanwhile, reports emerging from cancer research have made such grim scenarios seem more plausible: In 2012, several large pharmaceutical companies revealed that their efforts to replicate exciting preclinical findings from published academic studies in cancer biology were only rarely verifying the original results (Begley & Ellis, 2012; see also Osherovich, 2011; Prinz, Schlange, & Asadullah, 2011).
papers.abstract_zh: 目前心理科学是否出现了信任危机，反映出从业者对该领域研究结果的可靠性产生了前所未有的怀疑？显然是有的。随着2011年一系列不愉快事件的发生，这些怀疑出现了，并有所增长:Diederik Stapel欺诈案(见Stroebe，Postmes，& Spears，2012，这一期)，在一份主要的社会心理学杂志上发表了一篇文章，声称显示了超感知觉的证据(Bem，2011)，随后受到了广泛的公开嘲笑(见Galak，LeBoeuf，Nelson，& Simmons，正在出版中；Wagenmakers，Wetzels，Borsboom，& van der Maas，2011)，Wicherts及其同事报告说，心理学家往往不愿意或不能分享他们发表的数据进行再分析(Wicherts，Bakker，& Molenaar，2011；另见Wicherts，Borsboom，Kats，& Molenaar，2006)，以及发表在《心理科学》上的一篇重要文章，该文章表明，在没有任何实际影响的情况下，研究人员可以通过各种有问题的研究实践(qrp)轻松地获得统计学上的显著差异，如探索多个因变量或协变量，并仅在它们产生显著结果时报告这些结果(Simmons，Nelson，& Simonsohn，2011)。对于那些预计2011年的尴尬将很快消失在记忆中的心理学家来说，2012年反而提供了一个从糟糕到更糟糕的快速跳水，在社会认知领域出现了新的明显的欺诈迹象(Simonsohn，2012)，心理科学中的一篇文章显示，许多心理学家承认至少参与了Simmons及其同事检查的一些快速反应程序(John，Loewenstein，& Prelec，2012)。 令人不安的新荟萃分析证据表明，Simmons及其同事描述的qrp甚至可能在心理学文献中的p值分布中留下明显的迹象(Masicampo & Lalande，出版中； Simonsohn，2012)，科学杂志和博客上围绕一些研究人员在复制社会认知领域的知名结果时遇到的问题展开了激烈的争论(Bower，2012；永，2012)。虽然心理学在这两年中所经历的非常公开的问题令我们这些在该领域工作的人感到尴尬，但一些人已经找到了安慰，因为在同一时期，类似的担忧已经在整个科学领域出现(由即将描述的启示引发)。一些不可复制的可疑原因，如发表偏倚(倾向于只发表积极的发现)已经讨论了多年；事实上，抽屉问题这个短语是由一位杰出的心理学家在几十年前首次提出的(Rosenthal，1979)。然而，许多人推测，这些问题在最近几年已经恶化，因为学术界收获了高度竞争的学术氛围和奖励计划，这种奖励计划为过度销售自己的工作提供了丰厚的奖励，而对谨慎和谨慎却几乎没有奖励(见吉纳-索罗拉，2012年，这一期)。同样令人不安的是，研究人员似乎比过去更少地重复彼此的工作，这可能再次反映了一个倾斜的激励机制(这一点在本期的几篇文章中讨论过，例如，马克尔、普吕克尔和赫加蒂，2012)。错误出现在心理学文献中的频率目前还不清楚，但许多事实表明它可能高得令人不安。约安尼迪斯(2005)通过简单的数学建模表明，任何忽视复制的科学领域都很容易陷入悲惨的境地，其中(正如他最著名的文章的标题所言)“大多数发表的研究结果都是错误的”(另见约安尼迪斯，2012，本期，以及Pashler & Harris，2012，本期)。与此同时，来自癌症研究的报告让这种严峻的情景看起来更加可信:2012年，几家大型制药公司透露，他们在癌症生物学方面复制已发表学术研究中令人兴奋的临床前发现的努力很少验证原始结果(Begley & Ellis，2012；另见Osherovich，2011年；普林茨、施朗格和阿萨杜拉，2011年)。
papers.title_zh: 编辑介绍

papers.title: 20, 000 In League Under the Sea: Anonymous Communication, Trust, MLATs, and Undersea Cables
papers.authors: Aaron D. Jaggard, Aaron Johnson, Sarah Cortes, Paul Syverson, Joan Feigenbaum
papers.abstract: Abstract Motivated by the effectiveness of correlation attacks against Tor, the censorship arms race, and observations of malicious relays in Tor, we propose that Tor users capture their trust in network elements using probability distributions over the sets of elements observed by network adversaries. We present a modular system that allows users to efficiently and conveniently create such distributions and use them to improve their security. To illustrate this system, we present two novel types of adversaries. First, we study a powerful, pervasive adversary that can compromise an unknown number of Autonomous System organizations, Internet Exchange Point organizations, and Tor relay families. Second, we initiate the study of how an adversary might use Mutual Legal Assistance Treaties (MLATs) to enact surveillance. As part of this, we identify submarine cables as a potential subject of trust and incorporate data about these into our MLAT analysis by using them as a proxy for adversary power. Finally, we present preliminary experimental results that show the potential for our trust framework to be used by Tor clients and services to improve security.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象是由针对TOR的相关性攻击，审查武器竞赛以及对TOR中恶意继电器的观察的有效性的动机，我们建议TOR用户使用概率分布在网络对手观察到的元素集中捕获他们对网络元素的信任。 我们提出了一个模块化系统，该系统允许用户有效，方便地创建此类分布并使用它们来提高其安全性。 为了说明这一系统，我们提出了两种新型的对手。 首先，我们研究了一个强大而普遍的对手，该对手可能会损害数量未知数的自主系统组织，互联网交换点组织和Tor继电器家庭。 其次，我们开始研究对手如何使用相互法律援助条约（MLAT）进行监视的研究。 为此，我们将海底电缆确定为信任的潜在主题，并将有关这些数据的数据纳入我们的MLAT分析，将其使用作为对手力量的代理。 最后，我们提出了初步的实验结果，这表明了TOR客户和服务使用我们的信任框架以提高安全性的潜力。
papers.title_zh: 海底20，000人联盟:匿名通信、信任、MLATs和海底电缆

papers.title: Know Thy Neighbor: Crypto Library Detection in Cloud
papers.authors: Gorka Irazoqui, Mehmet Sinan Inci, Thomas Eisenbarth, Berk Sunar
papers.abstract: Abstract Software updates and security patches have become a standard method to fix known and recently discovered security vulnerabilities in deployed software. In server applications, outdated cryptographic libraries allow adversaries to exploit weaknesses and launch attacks with significant security results. The proposed technique exploits leakages at the hardware level to first, determine if a specific cryptographic library is running inside (or not) a co-located virtual machine (VM) and second to discover the IP of the co-located target. To this end, we use a Flush+Reload cache side-channel technique to measure the time it takes to call (load) a cryptographic library function. Shorter loading times are indicative of the library already residing in memory and shared by the VM manager through deduplication. We demonstrate the viability of the proposed technique by detecting and distinguishing various cryptographic libraries, including MatrixSSL, PolarSSL, GnuTLS, OpenSSL and CyaSSL along with the IP of the VM running these libraries. In addition, we show how to differentiate between various versions of libraries to better select an attack target as well as the applicable exploit. Our experiments show a complete attack setup scenario with single-trial success rates of up to 90% under light load and up to 50% under heavy load for libraries running in KVM.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象的软件更新和安全补丁已成为一种标准方法，用于修复已部署软件中已知且最近发现的安全漏洞。 在服务器应用程序中，过时的加密库允许对手利用弱点并发起具有重大安全性结果的攻击。 提出的技术利用了硬件级别的泄漏，首先确定特定的加密库是否在内部（是否）共同列置的虚拟机（VM）运行，其次是发现共同定位的目标的IP。 为此，我们使用冲洗+重新加载缓存侧通道技术来测量致电（加载）加密库功能所需的时间。 较短的加载时间指示库已经存在于内存中，并由VM Manager通过重复数据删除共享。 我们通过检测和区分各种加密文库，包括矩阵，PolarSSL，Gnutls，OpenSSL和Cyassl以及运行这些库的IP，来证明所提出的技术的生存能力。 此外，我们还展示了如何区分各种版本的库，以更好地选择攻击目标以及适用的利用。 我们的实验显示了一个完整的攻击设置方案，在光负载下，单审成功率高达90％，在重型库中，在KVM中运行的库中高达50％。
papers.title_zh: 了解你的邻居:云中的加密库检测

papers.title: Portrait of a Privacy Invasion
papers.authors: Yan Shoshitaishvili, Christopher Kruegel, Giovanni Vigna
papers.abstract: Abstract The popularity of online social networks has changed the way in which we share personal thoughts, political views, and pictures. Pictures have a particularly important role in the privacy of users, as they can convey substantial information (e.g., a person was attending an event, or has met with another person). Moreover, because of the nature of social networks, it has become increasingly difficult to control who has access to which content. Therefore, when a substantial amount of pictures are accessible to one party, there is a very serious potential for violations of the privacy of users. In this paper, we demonstrate a novel technique that, given a large corpus of pictures shared on a social network, automatically determines who is dating whom, with reasonable precision. More specifically, our approach combines facial recognition, spatial analysis, and machine learning techniques to determine pairs that are dating. To the best of our knowledge, this is the first privacy attack of this kind performed on social networks. We implemented our approach in a tool, called Creepic, and evaluated it on two real-world datasets. The results show that it is possible to automatically extract non-obvious, and nondisclosed, relationships between people represented in a group of pictures, even when the people involved are not directly part of a connected social clique.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要在线社交网络的普及改变了我们分享个人思想，政治观点和图片的方式。 图片在用户的隐私中具有特别重要的作用，因为他们可以传达大量信息（例如，一个人参加了一个活动或与他人会面）。 此外，由于社交网络的本质，控制谁可以访问哪个内容变得越来越困难。 因此，当一方可以访问大量图片时，侵犯用户隐私的可能性很大。 在本文中，我们演示了一种新颖的技术，鉴于在社交网络上共享的大量图片，自动确定谁在约会谁，以合理的精确度。 更具体地说，我们的方法结合了面部识别，空间分析和机器学习技术，以确定正在约会的对。 据我们所知，这是对社交网络上执行的这种隐私攻击。 我们在一种称为Creepic的工具中实现了我们的方法，并在两个现实世界数据集上对其进行了评估。 结果表明，即使相关人员并不是连接的社交集团的一部分，也可以自动提取非明显和非公开的人之间的关系。
papers.title_zh: 隐私侵犯的写照

papers.title: Analyzing the Great Firewall of China Over Space and Time
papers.authors: Roya Ensafi, Philipp Winter, Abdullah Mueen, Jedidiah R. Crandall
papers.abstract: Abstract A nation-scale firewall, colloquially referred to as the “Great Firewall of China,” implements many different types of censorship and content filtering to control China’s Internet traffic. Past work has shown that the firewall occasionally fails. In other words, sometimes clients in China are able to reach blacklisted servers outside of China. This phenomenon has not yet been characterized because it is infeasible to find a large and geographically diverse set of clients in China from which to test connectivity. In this paper, we overcome this challenge by using a hybrid idle scan technique that is able to measure connectivity between a remote client and an arbitrary server, neither of which are under the control of the researcher performing measurements. In addition to hybrid idle scans, we present and employ a novel side channel in the Linux kernel’s SYN backlog. We show that both techniques are practical by measuring the reachability of the Tor network which is known to be blocked in China. Our measurements reveal that failures in the firewall occur throughout the entire country without any conspicuous geographical patterns.We give some evidence that routing plays a role, but other factors (such as how the GFW maintains its list of IP/port pairs to block) may also be important.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要一个民族规模的防火墙，被称为“中国的大防火墙”，实施了许多不同类型的审查制度和内容过滤，以控制中国的互联网流量。 过去的工作表明，防火墙有时会失败。 换句话说，有时中国的客户能够接触到中国以外的黑名单服务器。 这种现象尚未得到特征，因为在中国找到一组大量且地理上多样化的客户来测试连通性是不可行的。 在本文中，我们通过使用能够衡量远程客户端和任意服务器之间的连接性的混合闲置扫描技术来克服这一挑战，而这些服务器都没有在研究人员的控制下进行测量。 除了混合闲置扫描外，我们还在Linux内核SYN积压列表中介绍并采用了一个新颖的侧渠道。 我们表明，通过测量已知在中国被阻止的TOR网络的可及性，这两种技术都是实用的。 我们的测量结果表明，防火墙的故障在整个国家发生，没有任何明显的地理模式。我们给出一些证据表明路由起着作用，但其他因素（例如，GFW如何保持其IP/端口对列表的方式）可能可能会阻止）。 也很重要。
papers.title_zh: 时空视角下的中国防火墙探析

papers.title: A Glance through the VPN Looking Glass: IPv6 Leakage and DNS Hijacking in Commercial VPN clients
papers.authors: Vasile Claudiu Perta, Marco Valerio Barbera, Gareth Tyson, Hamed Haddadi, Alessandro Mei
papers.abstract: Abstract Commercial Virtual Private Network (VPN) services have become a popular and convenient technology for users seeking privacy and anonymity. They have been applied to a wide range of use cases, with commercial providers often making bold claims regarding their ability to fulfil each of these needs, e.g., censorship circumvention, anonymity and protection from monitoring and tracking. However, as of yet, the claims made by these providers have not received a sufficiently detailed scrutiny. This paper thus investigates the claims of privacy and anonymity in commercial VPN services. We analyse 14 of the most popular ones, inspecting their internals and their infrastructures. Despite being a known issue, our experimental study reveals that the majority of VPN services suffer from IPv6 traffic leakage. The work is extended by developing more sophisticated DNS hijacking attacks that allow all traffic to be transparently captured.We conclude discussing a range of best practices and countermeasures that can address these vulnerabilities
papers.abstract_zh: 对于寻求隐私和匿名的用户来说，抽象商业虚拟专用网络（VPN）服务已成为一种流行，方便的技术。 它们已应用于广泛的用例中，商业提供商通常会对他们满足这些需求的能力做出大胆的主张，例如审查规避，匿名和免受监视和跟踪的保护。 但是，到目前为止，这些提供者提出的主张尚未得到足够详细的审查。 因此，本文调查了商业VPN服务中隐私和匿名性的主张。 我们分析了14个最受欢迎的人，检查了他们的内部和基础设施。 尽管是一个已知问题，但我们的实验研究表明，大多数VPN服务都遭受IPv6流量泄漏的影响。 通过开发更复杂的DNS劫持攻击来扩展工作，该攻击允许所有流量被透明地捕获。
papers.title_zh: 透过VPN窥镜一瞥:商用VPN客户端中的IPv6泄漏和DNS劫持

papers.title: Automated Experiments on Ad Privacy Settings
papers.authors: Amit Datta, Michael Carl Tschantz, Anupam Datta
papers.abstract: Abstract To partly address people’s concerns over web tracking, Google has created the Ad Settings webpage to provide information about and some choice over the profiles Google creates on users. We present AdFisher, an automated tool that explores how user behaviors, Google’s ads, and Ad Settings interact. AdFisher can run browser-based experiments and analyze data using machine learning and significance tests. Our tool uses a rigorous experimental design and statistical analysis to ensure the statistical soundness of our results. We use AdFisher to find that the Ad Settings was opaque about some features of a user’s profile, that it does provide some choice on ads, and that these choices can lead to seemingly discriminatory ads. In particular, we found that visiting webpages associated with substance abuse changed the ads shown but not the settings page. We also found that setting the gender to female resulted in getting fewer instances of an ad related to high paying jobs than setting it to male. We cannot determine who caused these findings due to our limited visibility into the ad ecosystem, which includes Google, advertisers, websites, and users. Nevertheless, these results can form the starting point for deeper investigations by either the companies themselves or by regulatory bodies.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要为了解决人们对Web跟踪的关注，Google创建了广告设置网页，以提供有关Google在用户创建的个人资料的信息和某些选择。 我们提出了Adfisher，这是一种自动化工具，探讨用户行为，Google的广告和广告设置如何交互。 Adfisher可以运行基于浏览器的实验，并使用机器学习和显着性测试来分析数据。 我们的工具使用严格的实验设计和统计分析来确保结果的统计声音。 我们使用Adfisher发现广告设置对用户个人资料的某些功能不透明，它确实为广告提供了一些选择，并且这些选择可以导致看似歧视性广告。 特别是，我们发现与药物滥用相关的访问网页更改了所示的广告，但没有更改设置页面。 我们还发现，将性别设置为女性导致与高薪工作相关的广告实例少于将其设置为男性。 由于我们对广告生态系统的可见性有限，我们无法确定谁引起了这些发现，其中包括Google，广告商，网站和用户。 然而，这些结果可以构成公司本身或监管机构进行更深入调查的起点。
papers.title_zh: 广告隐私设置的自动化实验

papers.title: Editors' Introduction
papers.authors: Kostas Chatzikokolakis, Aaron Johnson
papers.abstract: Is there currently a crisis of confidence in psychological science reflecting an unprecedented level of doubt among practitioners about the reliability of research findings in the field? It would certainly appear that there is. These doubts emerged and grew as a series of unhappy events unfolded in 2011: the Diederik Stapel fraud case (see Stroebe, Postmes, & Spears, 2012, this issue), the publication in a major social psychology journal of an article purporting to show evidence of extrasensory perception (Bem, 2011) followed by widespread public mockery (see Galak, LeBoeuf, Nelson, & Simmons, in press; Wagenmakers, Wetzels, Borsboom, & van der Maas, 2011), reports by Wicherts and colleagues that psychologists are often unwilling or unable to share their published data for reanalysis (Wicherts, Bakker, & Molenaar, 2011; see also Wicherts, Borsboom, Kats, & Molenaar, 2006), and the publication of an important article in Psychological Science showing how easily researchers can, in the absence of any real effects, nonetheless obtain statistically significant differences through various questionable research practices (QRPs) such as exploring multiple dependent variables or covariates and only reporting these when they yield significant results (Simmons, Nelson, & Simonsohn, 2011). For those psychologists who expected that the embarrassments of 2011 would soon recede into memory, 2012 offered instead a quick plunge from bad to worse, with new indications of outright fraud in the field of social cognition (Simonsohn, 2012), an article in Psychological Science showing that many psychologists admit to engaging in at least some of the QRPs examined by Simmons and colleagues (John, Loewenstein, & Prelec, 2012), troubling new meta-analytic evidence suggesting that the QRPs described by Simmons and colleagues may even be leaving telltale signs visible in the distribution of p values in the psychological literature (Masicampo & Lalande, in press; Simonsohn, 2012), and an acrimonious dust-up in science magazines and blogs centered around the problems some investigators were having in replicating well-known results from the field of social cognition (Bower, 2012; Yong, 2012). Although the very public problems experienced by psychology over this 2-year period are embarrassing to those of us working in the field, some have found comfort in the fact that, over the same period, similar concerns have been arising across the scientific landscape (triggered by revelations that will be described shortly). Some of the suspected causes of unreplicability, such as publication bias (the tendency to publish only positive findings) have been discussed for years; in fact, the phrase file-drawer problem was first coined by a distinguished psychologist several decades ago (Rosenthal, 1979). However, many have speculated that these problems have been exacerbated in recent years as academia reaps the harvest of a hypercompetitive academic climate and an incentive scheme that provides rich rewards for overselling one’s work and few rewards at all for caution and circumspection (see Giner-Sorolla, 2012, this issue). Equally disturbing, investigators seem to be replicating each others’ work even less often than they did in the past, again presumably reflecting an incentive scheme gone askew (a point discussed in several articles in this issue, e.g., Makel, Plucker, & Hegarty, 2012). The frequency with which errors appear in the psychological literature is not presently known, but a number of facts suggest it might be disturbingly high. Ioannidis (2005) has shown through simple mathematical modeling that any scientific field that ignores replication can easily come to the miserable state wherein (as the title of his most famous article puts it) “most published research findings are false” (see also Ioannidis, 2012, this issue, and Pashler & Harris, 2012, this issue). Meanwhile, reports emerging from cancer research have made such grim scenarios seem more plausible: In 2012, several large pharmaceutical companies revealed that their efforts to replicate exciting preclinical findings from published academic studies in cancer biology were only rarely verifying the original results (Begley & Ellis, 2012; see also Osherovich, 2011; Prinz, Schlange, & Asadullah, 2011).
papers.abstract_zh: 目前心理科学是否出现了信任危机，反映出从业者对该领域研究结果的可靠性产生了前所未有的怀疑？显然是有的。随着2011年一系列不愉快事件的发生，这些怀疑出现了，并有所增长:Diederik Stapel欺诈案(见Stroebe，Postmes，& Spears，2012，这一期)，在一份主要的社会心理学杂志上发表了一篇文章，声称显示了超感知觉的证据(Bem，2011)，随后受到了广泛的公开嘲笑(见Galak，LeBoeuf，Nelson，& Simmons，正在出版中；Wagenmakers，Wetzels，Borsboom，& van der Maas，2011)，Wicherts及其同事报告说，心理学家往往不愿意或不能分享他们发表的数据进行再分析(Wicherts，Bakker，& Molenaar，2011；另见Wicherts，Borsboom，Kats，& Molenaar，2006)，以及发表在《心理科学》上的一篇重要文章，该文章表明，在没有任何实际影响的情况下，研究人员可以通过各种有问题的研究实践(qrp)轻松地获得统计学上的显著差异，如探索多个因变量或协变量，并仅在它们产生显著结果时报告这些结果(Simmons，Nelson，& Simonsohn，2011)。对于那些预计2011年的尴尬将很快消失在记忆中的心理学家来说，2012年反而提供了一个从糟糕到更糟糕的快速跳水，在社会认知领域出现了新的明显的欺诈迹象(Simonsohn，2012)，心理科学中的一篇文章显示，许多心理学家承认至少参与了Simmons及其同事检查的一些快速反应程序(John，Loewenstein，& Prelec，2012)。 令人不安的新荟萃分析证据表明，Simmons及其同事描述的qrp甚至可能在心理学文献中的p值分布中留下明显的迹象(Masicampo & Lalande，出版中； Simonsohn，2012)，科学杂志和博客上围绕一些研究人员在复制社会认知领域的知名结果时遇到的问题展开了激烈的争论(Bower，2012；永，2012)。虽然心理学在这两年中所经历的非常公开的问题令我们这些在该领域工作的人感到尴尬，但一些人已经找到了安慰，因为在同一时期，类似的担忧已经在整个科学领域出现(由即将描述的启示引发)。一些不可复制的可疑原因，如发表偏倚(倾向于只发表积极的发现)已经讨论了多年；事实上，抽屉问题这个短语是由一位杰出的心理学家在几十年前首次提出的(Rosenthal，1979)。然而，许多人推测，这些问题在最近几年已经恶化，因为学术界收获了高度竞争的学术氛围和奖励计划，这种奖励计划为过度销售自己的工作提供了丰厚的奖励，而对谨慎和谨慎却几乎没有奖励(见吉纳-索罗拉，2012年，这一期)。同样令人不安的是，研究人员似乎比过去更少地重复彼此的工作，这可能再次反映了一个倾斜的激励机制(这一点在本期的几篇文章中讨论过，例如，马克尔、普吕克尔和赫加蒂，2012)。错误出现在心理学文献中的频率目前还不清楚，但许多事实表明它可能高得令人不安。约安尼迪斯(2005)通过简单的数学建模表明，任何忽视复制的科学领域都很容易陷入悲惨的境地，其中(正如他最著名的文章的标题所言)“大多数发表的研究结果都是错误的”(另见约安尼迪斯，2012，本期，以及Pashler & Harris，2012，本期)。与此同时，来自癌症研究的报告让这种严峻的情景看起来更加可信:2012年，几家大型制药公司透露，他们在癌症生物学方面复制已发表学术研究中令人兴奋的临床前发现的努力很少验证原始结果(Begley & Ellis，2012；另见Osherovich，2011年；普林茨、施朗格和阿萨杜拉，2011年)。
papers.title_zh: 编辑介绍

papers.title: DP5: A Private Presence Service
papers.authors: Nikita Borisov, George Danezis, Ian Goldberg
papers.abstract: Abstract Users of social applications like to be notified when their friends are online. Typically, this is done by a central server keeping track of who is online and offline, as well as of all of the users’ “buddy lists”, which contain sensitive information.
