We present DP5, a cryptographic service that implements online presence indication in a privacy-friendly way. DP5 allows clients to register their online presence and query the presence of their list of friends while keeping this list secret. Besides presence, high-integrity status updates are supported, to facilitate key update and rendezvous protocols. While infrastructure services are required for DP5 to operate, they are designed to not require any long-term secrets and provide perfect forward secrecy in case of compromise. We provide security arguments for the indistinguishability properties of the protocol, as well as an evaluation of its scalability and performance.
papers.abstract_zh: 社交应用程序的抽象用户喜欢在网上的朋友时通知。 通常，这是由中央服务器跟踪谁在线和离线以及所有用户的“好友列表”（包含敏感信息）来完成的。 我们提出DP5，这是一种以隐私友好方式实现在线形象的加密服务。 DP5允许客户注册其在线形象，并查询他们的朋友列表的存在，同时将此列表保密。 除存在外，还支持高融合状态更新，以促进关键更新和集合协议。 尽管DP5需要基础架构服务，但它们的设计不需要任何长期秘密，并在妥协时提供了完美的远期保密性。 我们为协议的不可区分性属性以及对其可扩展性和性能的评估提供了安全论点。
papers.title_zh: DP5:私人在线服务

papers.title: A Practical Set-Membership Proof for Privacy-Preserving NFC Mobile Ticketing
papers.authors: Ghada Arfaoui, Jean-François Lalande, Jacques Traoré, Nicolas Desmoulins, Pascal Berthomé, Saïd Gharout
papers.abstract: Abstract To ensure the privacy of users in transport systems, researchers are working on new protocols providing the best security guarantees while respecting functional requirements of transport operators. In this paper1, we design a secure NFC m-ticketing protocol for public transport that preserves users’ anonymity and prevents transport operators from tracing their customers’ trips. To this end, we introduce a new practical set-membership proof that does not require provers nor verifiers (but in a specific scenario for verifiers) to perform pairing computations. It is therefore particularly suitable for our (ticketing) setting where provers hold SIM/UICC cards that do not support such costly computations. We also propose several optimizations of Boneh-Boyen type signature schemes, which are of independent interest, increasing their performance and efficiency during NFC transactions. Our m-ticketing protocol offers greater flexibility compared to previous solutions as it enables the post-payment and the off-line validation of m-tickets. By implementing a prototype using a standard NFC SIM card, we show that it fulfils the stringent functional requirement imposed by transport operators whilst using strong security parameters. In particular, a validation can be completed in 184.25ms when the mobile is switched on, and in 266.52ms when the mobile is switched off or its battery is flat.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要为了确保用户在运输系统中的隐私，研究人员正在制定新协议，从而提供最佳的安全保证，同时尊重运输运营商的功能要求。 在本文中，我们为公共交通设计了一个安全的NFC M票协议，该协议可保留用户的匿名性，并防止运输运营商追踪其客户的旅行。 为此，我们介绍了一个新的实用设定会员证明，该证明不需要抛弃或验证者（但在特定方案中的验证者）来执行配对计算。 因此，它特别适用于我们（票务）设置，在该设置中，摊贩持有不支持此类昂贵计算的SIM/UICC卡。 我们还提出了具有独立感兴趣的Boneh-Boyen型特征方案的几种优化，从而提高了其在NFC交易中的性能和效率。 与以前的解决方案相比，我们的M门票协议提供了更大的灵活性，因为它可以实现后付款和离线验证M门票。 通过使用标准NFC SIM卡实现原型，我们表明它可以满足运输运算符强大的安全性参数所施加的严格功能要求。 特别是，当手机打开时，可以在184.25ms的184.25毫秒内完成验证，当关闭移动设备或电池平坦时，可以在266.52毫米中完成验证。
papers.title_zh: 一种实用的保密NFC手机售票集成员证明

papers.title: Blocking-resistant communication through domain fronting
papers.authors: David Fifield, Chang Lan, Rod Hynes, Percy Wegmann, Vern Paxson
papers.abstract: Abstract We describe “domain fronting,” a versatile censorship circumvention technique that hides the remote endpoint of a communication. Domain fronting works at the application layer, using HTTPS, to communicate with a forbidden host while appearing to communicate with some other host, permitted by the censor. The key idea is the use of different domain names at different layers of communication. One domain appears on the “outside” of an HTTPS request—in the DNS request and TLS Server Name Indication—while another domain appears on the “inside”—in the HTTP Host header, invisible to the censor under HTTPS encryption. A censor, unable to distinguish fronted and nonfronted traffic to a domain, must choose between allowing circumvention traffic and blocking the domain entirely, which results in expensive collateral damage. Domain fronting is easy to deploy and use and does not require special cooperation by network intermediaries. We identify a number of hard-to-block web services, such as content delivery networks, that support domain-fronted connections and are useful for censorship circumvention. Domain fronting, in various forms, is now a circumvention workhorse. We describe several months of deployment experience in the Tor, Lantern, and Psiphon circumvention systems, whose domain-fronting transports now connect thousands of users daily and transfer many terabytes per month.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要我们描述了一种“域转向”，这是一种隐藏了通信端点的多功能审查技术。 在应用层的域使用HTTPS在应用层上工作，与禁止的主机进行通信，同时与审查员允许的其他主机进行通信。 关键的想法是在不同层的交流层上使用不同的域名。 一个域出现在HTTPS请求的“外部”（在DNS请求和TLS服务器名称指示下）出现，而另一个域则出现在“内部”上 - 在HTTP主机标头上，在HTTPS加密下对审查员看不见。 一个审查员无法将前面和非偏置流量区分为域，必须在允许绕行交通和完全阻止域之间进行选择，从而造成昂贵的附带损害。 前面的域很容易部署和使用，并且不需要网络中介机构的特殊合作。 我们确定了许多难以块的Web服务，例如内容交付网络，这些服务支持域名的连接，并且对审查规定非常有用。 各种形式的领域现在是一个规避的主力。 我们描述了在TOR，Lantern和Psiphon Bucking Systems的几个月内部署经验，他们的域往返运输现在每天连接数千个用户，并每月转移许多Terabytes。
papers.title_zh: 通过域转发的抗阻塞通信

papers.title: Guard Sets for Onion Routing
papers.authors: Jamie Hayes, George Danezis
papers.abstract: Abstract “Entry” guards protect the Tor onion routing system from variants of the “predecessor” attack, that would allow an adversary with control of a fraction of routers to eventually de-anonymize some users. Research has however shown the three guard scheme has drawbacks and Dingledine et al. proposed in 2014 for each user to have a single long-term guard. We first show that such a guard selection strategy would be optimal if the Tor network was failure-free and static. However under realistic failure conditions the one guard proposal still suffers from the classic fingerprinting attacks, uniquely identifying users. Furthermore, under dynamic network conditions using single guards offer smaller anonymity sets to users of fresh guards. We propose and analyze an alternative guard selection scheme by way of grouping guards together to form shared guard sets. We compare the security and performance of guard sets with the three guard scheme and the one guard proposal. We show guard sets do provide increased resistance to a number of attacks, while foreseeing no significant degradation in performance or bandwidth utilization.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象的“入口”守卫保护Tor洋葱路由系统免受“前任”攻击的变体，这将使对手控制一小部分路由器，最终可以将某些用户撤销。 但是，研究表明，三个后卫方案具有弊端和Dingledine等。 在2014年提议，每个用户都有一个长期的后卫。 我们首先表明，如果TOR网络无故障且静态，这种防护策略将是最佳的。 但是，在现实的故障条件下，一个警卫提案仍然遭受经典的指纹攻击，独特地识别用户。 此外，在动态网络条件下，使用单卫队为新鲜警卫的用户提供较小的匿名集。 我们通过将警卫分组在一起以形成共享的后卫设置来提出和分析替代的后卫选择计划。 我们将后卫设置的安全性和性能与三个后卫计划和一个后卫提案进行了比较。 我们显示的后卫设置确实具有对许多攻击的阻力，同时预见到性能或带宽利用率没有显着降解。
papers.title_zh: 洋葱路由的保护集

papers.title: Practical Forward-Secure Range and Sort Queries with Update-Oblivious Linked Lists
papers.authors: Erik-Oliver Blass, Travis Mayberry, Guevara Noubir
papers.abstract: Abstract We revisit the problem of privacy-preserving range search and sort queries on encrypted data in the face of an untrusted data store. Our new protocol RASP has several advantages over existing work. First, RASP strengthens privacy by ensuring forward security: after a query for range [a, b], any new record added to the data store is indistinguishable from random, even if the new record falls within range [a, b]. We are able to accomplish this using only traditional hash and block cipher operations, abstaining from expensive asymmetric cryptography and bilinear pairings. Consequently, RASP is highly practical, even for large database sizes. Additionally, we require only cloud storage and not a computational cloud like related works, which can reduce monetary costs significantly. At the heart of RASP, we develop a new update-oblivious bucket-based data structure. We allow for data to be added to buckets without leaking into which bucket it has been added. As long as a bucket is not explicitly queried, the data store does not learn anything about bucket contents. Furthermore, no information is leaked about data additions following a query. Besides formally proving RASP’s privacy, we also present a practical evaluation of RASP on Amazon Dynamo, demonstrating its efficiency and real world applicability.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要我们在面对不受信任的数据存储时重新审视了隐私保护范围搜索的问题，并在加密数据上进行了查询。 我们的新协议RASP比现有工作具有多个优势。 首先，RASP通过确保向前的安全性来增强隐私：在查询范围[a，b]之后，即使新记录属于范围内[a，b]，添加到数据存储中的任何新记录都与随机区别不可分割。 我们只能使用传统的哈希和阻止密码操作来实现这一目标，从而弃权不对称的不对称加密和双线性配对。 因此，即使对于大型数据库尺寸，RASP也是非常实用的。 此外，我们只需要云存储，而不需要像相关工作这样的计算云，这可以大大降低货币成本。 从RASP的核心，我们开发了一个新的基于更新的基于桶的数据结构。 我们允许将数据添加到存储桶中，而不会泄漏到添加哪个桶中。 只要没有明确查询存储桶，数据存储就不会学到有关存储桶内容的任何知识。 此外，查询后没有泄漏有关数据添加的信息。 除了正式证明RASP的隐私外，我们还对Amazon Dynamo上的RASP进行了实际评估，证明了其效率和现实世界的适用性。
papers.title_zh: 具有更新无关链表的实用前向安全范围和排序查询

papers.title: De-anonymizing Genomic Databases Using Phenotypic Traits
papers.authors: Mathias Humbert, Kévin Huguenin, Joachim Hugonot, Erman Ayday, Jean-Pierre Hubaux
papers.abstract: Abstract People increasingly have their genomes sequenced and some of them share their genomic data online. They do so for various purposes, including to find relatives and to help advance genomic research. An individual’s genome carries very sensitive, private information such as its owner’s susceptibility to diseases, which could be used for discrimination. Therefore, genomic databases are often anonymized. However, an individual’s genotype is also linked to visible phenotypic traits, such as eye or hair color, which can be used to re-identify users in anonymized public genomic databases, thus raising severe privacy issues. For instance, an adversary can identify a target’s genome using known her phenotypic traits and subsequently infer her susceptibility to Alzheimer’s disease. In this paper, we quantify, based on various phenotypic traits, the extent of this threat in several scenarios by implementing de-anonymization attacks on a genomic database of OpenSNP users sequenced by 23andMe. Our experimental results show that the proportion of correct matches reaches 23% with a supervised approach in a database of 50 participants. Our approach outperforms the baseline by a factor of four, in terms of the proportion of correct matches, in most scenarios. We also evaluate the adversary’s ability to predict individuals’ predisposition to Alzheimer’s disease, and we observe that the inference error can be halved compared to the baseline. We also analyze the effect of the number of known phenotypic traits on the success rate of the attack. As progress is made in genomic research, especially for genotype-phenotype associations, the threat presented in this paper will become more serious.
papers.abstract_zh: 抽象的人越来越多地对基因组进行了测序，其中一些人在线共享他们的基因组数据。 他们是出于各种目的这样做的，包括寻找亲戚并帮助推进基因组研究。 一个人的基因组具有非常敏感的私人信息，例如所有者对疾病的敏感性，可用于歧视。 因此，基因组数据库通常被匿名化。 但是，一个人的基因型也与可见的表型特征（例如眼睛或头发颜色）有关，可用于在匿名公共基因组数据库中重新识别用户，从而引发严重的隐私问题。 例如，对手可以使用已知的表型特征来识别目标的基因组，然后推断出她对阿尔茨海默氏病的敏感性。 在本文中，我们基于各种表型特征来量化这种威胁在几种情况下通过对由23andMe测序的OpenSNP用户的基因组数据库实施De-Anonymination攻击。 我们的实验结果表明，在50名参与者的数据库中，正确匹配的比例通过有监督的方法达到23％。 就正确的匹配比例而言，我们的方法在大多数情况下的比例都超过了四倍。 我们还评估了对手预测个人对阿尔茨海默氏病倾向的能力，我们观察到与基线相比，推断误差可以减半。 我们还分析了已知表型特征数量对攻击成功率的影响。 随着基因组研究的进展，尤其是对于基因型 - 表型关联，本文提出的威胁将变得更加严重。
papers.title_zh: 使用表型性状对基因组数据库去匿名化

papers.title: Recursive Trees for Practical ORAM
papers.authors: Tarik Moataz, Erik-Oliver Blass, Guevara Noubir
papers.abstract: Abstract We present a new, general data structure that reduces the communication cost of recent tree-based ORAMs. Contrary to ORAM trees with constant height and path lengths, our new construction r-ORAM allows for trees with varying shorter path length. Accessing an element in the ORAM tree results in different communication costs depending on the location of the element. The main idea behind r-ORAM is a recursive ORAM tree structure, where nodes in the tree are roots of other trees. While this approach results in a worst-case access cost (tree height) at most as any recent tree-based ORAM, we show that the average cost saving is around 35% for recent binary tree ORAMs. Besides reducing communication cost, r-ORAM also reduces storage overhead on the server by 4% to 20% depending on the ORAM’s client memory type. To prove r-ORAM’s soundness, we conduct a detailed overflow analysis. r-ORAM’s recursive approach is general in that it can be applied to all recent tree ORAMs, both constant and poly-log client memory ORAMs. Finally, we implement and benchmark r-ORAM in a practical setting to back up our theoretical claims.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要我们提出了一种新的一般数据结构，可降低最近基于树的Oram的通信成本。 与恒定高度和路径长度的Oram树相反，我们的新建筑R-Oram允许较短的路径长度的树木。 根据元素的位置，访问Oram树中的元素会导致不同的通信成本。 R-Oram背后的主要思想是递归的Oram树结构，树中的节点是其他树的根。 尽管这种方法最多可以在任何最近的基于树的Oram中产生最差的访问成本（树高），但我们表明，最近的二进制树Oram的平均成本节省约为35％。 除了降低通信成本外，R-ORAM还根据Oram的客户端存储器类型将服务器上的存储开销降低了4％至20％。 为了证明R-Oram的健全性，我们进行了详细的溢出分析。 R-Oram的递归方法普遍存在，它可以应用于所有恒定和多头式客户端存储器Oram的最新树。 最后，我们在实用环境中实施并基准了R-Oram，以支持我们的理论主张。
papers.title_zh: 实用ORAM的递归树

papers.title: Toward Mending Two Nation-Scale Brokered Identification Systems
papers.authors: Luís T. A. N. Brandão, Nicolas Christin, George Danezis, anonymous
papers.abstract: Abstract Available online public/governmental services requiring authentication by citizens have considerably expanded in recent years. This has hindered the usability and security associated with credential management by users and service providers. To address the problem, some countries have proposed nation-scale identification/authentication systems that intend to greatly reduce the burden of credential management, while seemingly offering desirable privacy benefits. In this paper we analyze two such systems: the Federal Cloud Credential Exchange (FCCX) in the United States and GOV.UK Verify in the United Kingdom, which altogether aim at serving more than a hundred million citizens. Both systems propose a brokered identification architecture, where an online central hub mediates user authentications between identity providers and service providers. We show that both FCCX and GOV.UK Verify suffer from serious privacy and security shortcomings, fail to comply with privacy-preserving guidelines they are meant to follow, and may actually degrade user privacy. Notably, the hub can link interactions of the same user across different service providers and has visibility over private identifiable information of citizens. In case of malicious compromise it is also able to undetectably impersonate users. Within the structural design constraints placed on these nation-scale brokered identification systems, we propose feasible technical solutions to the privacy and security issues we identified. We conclude with a strong recommendation that FCCX and GOV.UK Verify be subject to a more in-depth technical and public review, based on a defined and comprehensive threat model, and adopt adequate structural adjustments.
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，摘要可在线公共/政府服务需要公民身份验证，已大大扩展。 这阻碍了用户和服务提供商与凭证管理相关的可用性和安全性。 为了解决这个问题，一些国家提出了民族规模的身份识别/身份验证系统，该系统打算大大减轻证书管理的负担，同时看似提供理想的隐私益处。 在本文中，我们分析了两个这样的系统：美国的联邦云证书交流（FCCX）和在英国验证的Gov.uk核实，该核对旨在为超过一亿公民服务。 这两个系统都提出了一个经纪的标识体系结构，在线中央枢纽介导了身份提供商和服务提供商之间的用户身份验证。 我们表明，FCCX和gov.uk都验证了严重的隐私和安全性缺陷，无法遵守他们本应遵循的隐私指南，并且实际上可能会退化用户隐私。 值得注意的是，集线器可以将同一用户在不同服务提供商之间的交互链接，并且对公民的私人可识别信息具有可见性。 如果恶意妥协，它也能够不可否认地假发用户。 在这些民族规模的基础标识系统上的结构设计约束中，我们建议对我们确定的隐私和安全问题的可行技术解决方案。 最后，我们强烈建议FCCX和gov.uk验证基于定义和全面的威胁模型，并进行更深入的技术和公众审查，并采用适当的结构调整。
papers.title_zh: 修复两个全国性的代理身份识别系统

papers.title: Constructing elastic distinguishability metrics for location privacy
papers.authors: Konstantinos Chatzikokolakis, Catuscia Palamidessi, Marco Stronati
papers.abstract: Abstract With the increasing popularity of hand-held devices, location-based applications and services have access to accurate and real-time location information, raising serious privacy concerns for their users. The recently introduced notion of geo-indistinguishability tries to address this problem by adapting the well-known concept of differential privacy to the area of location-based systems. Although geo-indistinguishability presents various appealing aspects, it has the problem of treating space in a uniform way, imposing the addition of the same amount of noise everywhere on the map. In this paper we propose a novel elastic distinguishability metric that warps the geometrical distance, capturing the different degrees of density of each area. As a consequence, the obtained mechanism adapts the level of noise while achieving the same degree of privacy everywhere. We also show how such an elastic metric can easily incorporate the concept of a “geographic fence” that is commonly employed to protect the highly recurrent locations of a user, such as his home or work. We perform an extensive evaluation of our technique by building an elastic metric for Paris’ wide metropolitan area, using semantic information from the OpenStreetMap database. We compare the resulting mechanism against the Planar Laplace mechanism satisfying standard geo-indistinguishability, using two real-world datasets from the Gowalla and Brightkite location-based social networks. The results show that the elastic mechanism adapts well to the semantics of each area, adjusting the noise as we move outside the city center, hence offering better overall privacy.1
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要随着手持设备的普及，基于位置的应用程序和服务可以访问准确，实时的位置信息，从而引起了对用户的严重隐私问题。 最近引入的地理独立性概念通过将众所周知的差异隐私概念调整为基于位置的系统的领域来解决此问题。 尽管地质独立性提出了各种吸引人的方面，但它存在以统一的方式处理空间的问题，并在地图上施加了相同数量的噪声。 在本文中，我们提出了一种新型的弹性可区分性度量，该指标扭曲了几何距离，从而捕获了每个区域的不同程度。 结果，所获得的机制适应了噪声的水平，同时在各处获得相同程度的隐私。 我们还展示了这样的弹性度量如何轻松地结合“地理围栏”的概念，该概念通常用于保护用户（例如他的家或工作）的高度复发位置。 我们通过使用OpenStreetMap数据库的语义信息为巴黎广泛的大都市区构建弹性度量，对我们的技术进行广泛的评估。 我们使用来自Gowalla和Brightkite基于位置的社交网络的两个现实世界数据集进行了比较，将产生的机制与满足标准地理可区分性的平面拉普拉斯机制进行了比较。 结果表明，弹性机制很好地适应了每个区域的语义，随着我们在市中心外移动时调节噪音，因此提供了更好的整体隐私。11
papers.title_zh: 为位置隐私构建弹性可分辨性度量

papers.title: Defending Tor from Network Adversaries: A Case Study of Network Path Prediction
papers.authors: Joshua Juen, Aaron Johnson, Anupam Das, Nikita Borisov, Matthew Caesar
papers.abstract: Abstract The Tor anonymity network has been shown vulnerable to traffic analysis attacks by autonomous systems (ASes) and Internet exchanges (IXes), which can observe different overlay hops belonging to the same circuit. We evaluate whether network path prediction techniques provide an accurate picture of the threat from such adversaries, and whether they can be used to avoid this threat. We perform a measurement study by collecting 17.2 million traceroutes from Tor relays to destinations around the Internet. We compare the collected traceroute paths to predicted paths using state-of-the-art path inference techniques. We find that traceroutes present a very different picture, with the set of ASes seen in the traceroute path differing from the predicted path 80% of the time. We also consider the impact that prediction errors have on Tor security. Using a simulator to choose paths over a week, our traceroutes indicate a user has nearly a 100% chance of at least one compromise in a week with 11% of total paths containing an AS compromise and less than 1% containing an IX compromise when using default Tor selection. We find modifying the path selection to choose paths predicted to be safe lowers total paths with an AS compromise to 0.14% but still presents a 5–11% chance of at least one compromise in a week while making 5% of paths fail, with 96% of failures due to false positives in path inferences. Our results demonstrate more measurement and better path prediction is necessary to mitigate the risk of AS and IX adversaries to Tor.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要TOR匿名网络已显示出对自主系统（ASE）和Internet交换（IXES）的流量分析攻击的攻击，它们可以观察到属于同一电路的不同覆盖啤酒花。 我们评估网络路径预测技术是否提供了这种对手威胁的准确图片，以及是否可以使用它们来避免这种威胁。 我们通过收集从TOR继电器到互联网目的地的1720万个示踪作品进行测量研究。 我们将收集的示踪路径与使用最新的路径推理技术进行了比较。 我们发现，示威者的图像非常不同，在示踪路径中看到的一组ASE与预测的路径80％的时间不同。 我们还考虑了预测错误对TOR安全性的影响。 使用模拟器在一周内选择路径，我们的示踪剂表明，用户在一周内至少有近100％的折衷机会，其中11％的总路径含有AS妥协，少于1％的使用IX折衷 默认的TOR选择。 我们发现修改路径选择以选择预测为安全的路径降低总路径，其妥协至0.14％，但仍会在一周内至少有5-11％的机会在一周内至少折衷，而使5％的路径失败，96 在路径推论中由于假阳性引起的失败的百分比。 我们的结果表明，为了减轻AS和IX对手的风险，必须进行更多的测量和更好的路径预测。
papers.title_zh: 防御来自网络对手的Tor:网络路径预测案例研究

papers.title: Parallel Oblivious Array Access for Secure Multiparty Computation and Privacy-Preserving Minimum Spanning Trees
papers.authors: Peeter Laud
papers.abstract: Abstract In this paper, we describe efficient protocols to perform in parallel many reads and writes in private arrays according to private indices. The protocol is implemented on top of the Arithmetic Black Box (ABB) and can be freely composed to build larger privacypreserving applications. For a large class of secure multiparty computation (SMC) protocols, our technique has better practical and asymptotic performance than any previous ORAM technique that has been adapted for use in SMC. Our ORAM technique opens up a large class of parallel algorithms for adoption to run on SMC platforms. In this paper, we demonstrate how the minimum spanning tree (MST) finding algorithm by Awerbuch and Shiloach can be executed without revealing any details about the underlying graph (beside its size). The data accesses of this algorithm heavily depend on the location and weight of edges (which are private) and our ORAM technique is instrumental in their execution. Our implementation is the first-ever realization of a privacypreserving MST algorithm with sublinear round complexity.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要在本文中，我们描述了根据私人指标在私人阵列中并行执行的有效协议。 该协议是在算术黑匣子（ABB）顶部实现的，可以自由组成以构建更大的隐私应用程序。 对于大量的安全多方计算（SMC）协议，我们的技术具有比以前适用于SMC的任何以前的ORAM技术更好的实用和渐近性能。 我们的Oram技术开设了一大类平行算法，以在SMC平台上运行。 在本文中，我们演示了如何执行Awerbuch和Shiloach的最小跨越树（MST）查找算法，而无需揭示有关基础图的任何细节（除了其大小之外）。 该算法的数据访问在很大程度上取决于边缘的位置和重量（这是私有的），我们的Oram技术在执行方面发挥了作用。 我们的实施是具有sublinear圆形复杂性的隐私算法的首次实现。
papers.title_zh: 用于安全多方计算和隐私保护最小生成树的并行不经意数组访问

papers.title: Accountable Metadata-Hiding Escrow: A Group Signature Case Study
papers.authors: Markulf Kohlweiss, Ian Miers
papers.abstract: Abstract A common approach to demands for lawful access to encrypted data is to allow a trusted third party (TTP) to gain access to private data. However, there is no way to verify that this trust is well placed as the TTP may open all messages indiscriminately. Moreover, existing approaches do not scale well when, in addition to the content of the conversation, one wishes to hide one’s identity. Given the importance of metadata this is a major problem. We propose a new approach in which users can retroactively verify cryptographically whether they were wiretapped. As a case study, we propose a new signature scheme that can act as an accountable replacement for group signatures, accountable forward and backward tracing signatures.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要对合法访问加密数据的一种常见方法是允许受信任的第三方（TTP）访问私人数据。 但是，由于TTP可能会不分青睐，因此无法验证该信任是否已很好地放置。 此外，当人们希望隐藏自己的身份时，现有方法并不能很好地扩展。 鉴于元数据的重要性这是一个主要问题。 我们提出了一种新的方法，用户可以追溯地通过密码核实是否被窃听。 作为一个案例研究，我们提出了一种新的签名计划，该计划可以用作团体签名，向前和向后跟踪签名的负责任替换。
papers.title_zh: 可问责的元数据隐藏托管:一个群签名案例研究

papers.title: Optimal Rate Private Information Retrieval from Homomorphic Encryption
papers.authors: Aggelos Kiayias, Nikos Leonardos, Helger Lipmaa, Kateryna Pavlyk, Qiang Tang
papers.abstract: Abstract We consider the problem of minimizing the communication in single-database private information retrieval protocols in the case where the length of the data to be transmitted is large. We present first rate-optimal protocols for 1-out-of-n computationallyprivate information retrieval (CPIR), oblivious transfer (OT), and strong conditional oblivious transfer (SCOT). These protocols are based on a new optimalrate leveled homomorphic encryption scheme for large-output polynomial-size branching programs, that might be of independent interest. The analysis of the new scheme is intricate: the optimal rate is achieved if a certain parameter s is set equal to the only positive root of a degree-(m + 1) polynomial, where m is the length of the branching program. We show, by using Galois theory, that even when m = 4, this polynomial cannot be solved in radicals. We employ the Newton-Puiseux algorithm to find a Puiseux series for s, and based on this, propose a Θ (logm)-time algorithm to find an integer approximation to s.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要，我们考虑在单数据库私人信息检索协议中最小化通信的问题，如果要传输的数据长度很大。 我们提出了最初的第一级计算驱动信息检索（CPIR），遗忘转移（OT）和强烈条件遗忘转移（SCOT）的最佳方案。 这些协议基于用于大输出多项式分支程序的新的最佳水平的同型加密方案，这可能具有独立的兴趣。 新方案的分析是复杂的：如果设置某个参数s等于度 - （m + 1）多项式的唯一正词，其中M是分支程序的长度，则达到最佳速率。 我们通过使用Galois理论表明，即使在M = 4时，该多项式也无法在自由基中解决。 我们采用牛顿 - 纯曲察算法来找到S的PUISEUX系列，并基于此提出θ（logm） - 时间算法以找到对s的整数近似。
papers.title_zh: 同态加密的最优速率私有信息检索

papers.title: Secure and scalable match: overcoming the universal circuit bottleneck using group programs
papers.authors: Rajesh Krishnan, Ravi Sundaram
papers.abstract: Abstract Confidential Content-Based Publish/Subscribe (C-CBPS) is an interaction model that allows parties to exchange content while protecting their security and privacy interests. In this paper we advance the state of the art in C-CBPS by showing how all predicate circuits in NC1 (logarithmic-depth, bounded fan-in) can be confidentially computed by a broker while guaranteeing perfect information-theoretic security. Previous work could handle only strictly shallower circuits (e.g. those with depth O(ℑ)). We present three protocols—UGP-Match, FSGP-Match and OFSGP-Match—based on 2-decomposable randomized encodings of group programs for circuits in NC1. UGP-Match is conceptually simple and has a clean proof of correctness but its running time is a polynomial with a high exponent and hence impractical. FSGP-Match uses a “fixed structure” construction that reduces the exponent drastically and achieves efficiency and scalability. OFSGP-Match optimizes the group programs further to shave off a linear factor.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于抽象的机密内容发布/订阅（C-CBP）是一个交互模型，允许当事方在保护其安全性和隐私兴趣的同时交换内容。 在本文中，我们通过展示NC1中的所有谓词电路（对数深度，有限的粉丝）如何通过经纪人秘密地计算出，同时保证完美的信息理论安全性，以限制计算NC1中的所有谓词电路（对数深度，有限的粉丝），从而推进C-CBP的最新技术。 以前的工作只能处理严格的较浅电路（例如那些具有深度O（ℑ）的电路）。 我们介绍了三个协议，分别是NC1中电路组的2个可分配的随机编码，基于2解释的随机编码。 UGP匹配在概念上很简单，并且具有干净的正确性证明，但其运行时间是一个多项式，具有较高的指数，因此不切实际。 FSGP匹配使用“固定结构”结构，可大大降低指数并达到效率和可扩展性。 OFSGP匹配将进一步优化组程序，以刮除线性因子。
papers.title_zh: 安全和可扩展的匹配:使用群组程序克服通用电路瓶颈

papers.title: Substring-Searchable Symmetric Encryption
papers.authors: Melissa Chase, Emily Shen
papers.abstract: Abstract In this paper, we consider a setting where a client wants to outsource storage of a large amount of private data and then perform substring search queries on the data – given a data string s and a search string p, find all occurrences of p as a substring of s. First, we formalize an encryption paradigm that we call queryable encryption, which generalizes searchable symmetric encryption (SSE) and structured encryption. Then, we construct a queryable encryption scheme for substring queries. Our construction uses suffix trees and achieves asymptotic efficiency comparable to that of unencrypted suffix trees. Encryption of a string of length n takes O(λn) time and produces a ciphertext of size O(λn), and querying for a substring of length m that occurs k times takes O(λm+k) time and three rounds of communication. Our security definition guarantees correctness of query results and privacy of data and queries against a malicious adversary. Following the line of work started by Curtmola et al. (ACM CCS 2006), in order to construct more efficient schemes we allow the query protocol to leak some limited information that is captured precisely in the definition. We prove security of our substring-searchable encryption scheme against malicious adversaries, where the query protocol leaks limited information about memory access patterns through the suffix tree of the encrypted string.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要在本文中，我们考虑了客户想要将大量私人数据存储外包的设置，然后在数据上执行子字符串搜索查询 - 给定数据字符串s和a搜索字符串P，找到P的所有出现为P s的子字符串。 首先，我们将其称为可查询加密的加密范式形式化，该范式概括了可搜索的对称加密（SSE）和结构化加密。 然后，我们构建了一个可查询的加密方案，以用于基因查询。 我们的建筑使用后缀树并实现与未加密的后缀树相当的渐近效率。 长度为n的字符串的加密需要O（λn）时间，并产生大小o（λn）的密文，并查询发生的长度m的子字符串，该长度m的长度为k次，则需要O（λm+k）时间和三轮通信。 我们的安全定义保证了查询结果的正确性以及数据和查询对恶意对手的隐私性。 遵循Curtmola等人发起的工作。 （ACM CCS 2006），为了构建更有效的方案，我们允许查询协议泄漏一些有限的信息，这些信息精确地捕获了定义。 我们证明了我们针对恶意对手的基本可搜索加密方案的安全性，在该方案中，查询协议通过加密字符串的后缀树泄漏了有关内存访问模式的有限信息。
papers.title_zh: 子串可搜索的对称加密

papers.title: An Automated Approach for Complementing Ad Blockers' Blacklists
papers.authors: David Gugelmann, Markus Happe, Bernhard Ager, Vincent Lenders
papers.abstract: Abstract Privacy in the Web has become a major concern resulting in the popular use of various tools for blocking tracking services. Most of these tools rely on manually maintained blacklists, which need to be kept up-to-date to protect Web users’ privacy efficiently. It is challenging to keep pace with today’s quickly evolving advertisement and analytics landscape. In order to support blacklist maintainers with this task, we identify a set of Web traffic features for identifying privacyintrusive services. Based on these features, we develop an automatic approach that learns the properties of advertisement and analytics services listed by existing blacklists and proposes new services for inclusion on blacklists. We evaluate our technique on real traffic traces of a campus network and find in the order of 200 new privacy-intrusive Web services that are not listed by the most popular Firefox plug-in Adblock Plus. The proposed Web traffic features are easy to derive, allowing a distributed implementation of our approach.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络中的抽象隐私已成为主要问题，导致人们普遍使用各种工具来阻止跟踪服务。 这些工具中的大多数都依赖于手动维护的黑名单，这些黑名单需要保持最新状态，以有效地保护Web用户的隐私。 与当今快速不断发展的广告和分析格局保持同步是一项挑战。 为了通过此任务支持黑名单维护者，我们确定了一组用于识别隐私服务的Web流量功能。 基于这些功能，我们开发了一种自动方法，该方法了解了现有黑名单列出的广告和分析服务的属性，并提出了新的服务，以纳入黑名单。 我们在校园网络的真实交通轨迹上评估了我们的技术，并以200个新的隐私性网络服务的顺序找到，这些服务未由最受欢迎的Firefox插件Adblock Plus列出。 提出的Web流量功能易于得出，从而允许我们的方法的分布式实现。
papers.title_zh: 补充广告拦截器黑名单的自动化方法

papers.title: Privacy Games: Optimal User-Centric Data Obfuscation
papers.authors: Reza Shokri
papers.abstract: Abstract Consider users who share their data (e.g., location) with an untrusted service provider to obtain a personalized (e.g., location-based) service. Data obfuscation is a prevalent user-centric approach to protecting users’ privacy in such systems: the untrusted entity only receives a noisy version of user’s data. Perturbing data before sharing it, however, comes at the price of the users’ utility (service quality) experience which is an inseparable design factor of obfuscation mechanisms. The entanglement of the utility loss and the privacy guarantee, in addition to the lack of a comprehensive notion of privacy, have led to the design of obfuscation mechanisms that are either suboptimal in terms of their utility loss, or ignore the user’s information leakage in the past, or are limited to very specific notions of privacy which e.g., do not protect against adaptive inference attacks or the adversary with arbitrary background knowledge. In this paper, we design user-centric obfuscation mechanisms that impose the minimum utility loss for guaranteeing user’s privacy. We optimize utility subject to a joint guarantee of differential privacy (indistinguishability) and distortion privacy (inference error). This double shield of protection limits the information leakage through obfuscation mechanism as well as the posterior inference. We show that the privacy achieved through joint differential-distortion mechanisms against optimal attacks is as large as the maximum privacy that can be achieved by either of these mechanisms separately. Their utility cost is also not larger than what either of the differential or distortion mechanisms imposes. We model the optimization problem as a leader-follower game between the designer of obfuscation mechanism and the potential adversary, and design adaptive mechanisms that anticipate and protect against optimal inference algorithms. Thus, the obfuscation mechanism is optimal against any inference algorithm.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要考虑与不信任的服务提供商共享数据（例如位置）的用户，以获得个性化（例如，基于位置的）服务。 数据混淆是一种以用户为中心的方法，可以保护用户在这种系统中的隐私：不受信任的实体仅收到用户数据的嘈杂版本。 但是，在共享数据之前，将数据以用户的实用程序（服务质量）体验的价格出现，这是混淆机制的密不可分的设计因素。 除了缺乏全面的隐私概念外，公用事业损失和隐私保证的纠缠还导致设计了混淆机制的设计，这些机制在其公用事业损失方面是次优的，或者忽略用户在用户中的信息泄漏 过去，或仅限于非常具体的隐私概念，例如，这些概念不会防止适应性推理攻击或具有任意背景知识的对手。 在本文中，我们设计了以用户为中心的混淆机制，以确保用户隐私的最小公用事业损失。 我们优化实用性，但可以通过差异隐私（不可区分性）和失真隐私（推理错误）的共同保证。 这种双重保护范围限制了通过混淆机制以及后推断的信息泄漏。 我们表明，针对最佳攻击的联合差分机制实现的隐私与分别通过这些机制中的任何一种可以实现的最大隐私一样大。 他们的效用成本也不比差异或失真机制所施加的效用。 我们将优化问题建模为“混淆机制的设计师”与潜在的对手的设计师和设计自适应机制之间的领导者追随者游戏，这些机制可以预期并防止最佳推理算法。 因此，对任何推论算法的混淆机制是最佳的。
papers.title_zh: 隐私游戏:以用户为中心的最佳数据混淆
